[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde da ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D127}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba d+harma swa b+hA ba sa ma tA bi pany+tsi ta sa mA d+hi rA dza nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros 
[\[1b.2\]]pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[1b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 
[\[1b.4\]]brgyad cu dang yang thabs cig ste/_thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas 'dus pa/_gzungs dang mdo 
[\[1b.5\]]sde rtogs par khong du chud pa/_sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par byed pa/_mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes brjod pa la mkhas pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]rol tu son pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad rnam par gzhag pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te rab tu bkur ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 
[\[2a.2\]]'phrul gyis 'gro ba la mkhas pa/_bdud thams cad skrag par bya ba'i shes pa la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[2a.3\]]cad la mchod pa'i las yang dag par sgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa/_lus dang ngag dang sems yang dag par brgyan pa/_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa/_bskal pa grangs med par yid 
[\[2a.4\]]mi skyo bar brtson 'grus che ba/_seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa/_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi zil gyis mi non pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[2a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po dang rab tu lhun po dang lhun po'i rtse mo 'dzin dang lhun po mar me'i rgyal po dang lhun po brtsegs pa dang lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang lhun po'i rgyal po dang lhun po'i rtse mo kun g.yo bar byed pa'i rgyal po dang lhun po'i dbyangs dang /_
[\[2a.6\]]sprin gyi rgyal po dang rnga dbyangs dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang rin po che'i tog dang rin po che'i rtse mo dang rin po che 'byung ba dang /_rin po che snang ba dang rin po che'i 'khar ba dang lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang rin po che'i bkod pa dang rin po che'i dra ba dang rin po che'i 'od dang rin po che'i 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]gling dang /_dga' bar byed pa dang chos bkod pa dang bkod pa'i rgyal po dang mtshan gyis kun tu brgyan pa dang dbyangs bkod pa dang dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang rin po che brtsegs pa dang nyi ma me'i 'od 'phro can dang skar ma la dga' ba dang zla ba'i 'od zer dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 
[\[2b.2\]]'khor lo skor ba dang gser bzang po rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_'jam 
[\[2b.3\]]dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang /_bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ma yin pa 
[\[2b.4\]]gzhan yang dbang che ba dang dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya che zhing rlabs che ba dag dang thabs cig go/_/bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_
[\[2b.5\]]mchod par byas/_rjed par byas/_gsol bar byas te/_'khor bzhi dang lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang phyag bya ba/_mchod par bya ba/_bkur stir bya ba/_bla mar bya ba/_ri mor bya ba/_rjed par bya ba/_gsol bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas 
[\[2b.6\]]yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_/tshig 'bru bzang po/_/ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de'i tshe 
[\[2b.7\]]'khor tshogs pa de nyid du zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_skye ba dran pa/_spobs pa thob pa/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_snying rje chen po la brtson pa zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom 
[\[3a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin 
[\[3a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gzhon nu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang dri ba dris pa de dang de nyid lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/gzhon nu nga ni thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_chos thams cad la stobs dang mi 
[\[3a.4\]]'jigs pas khyu mchog tu gyur pa rjes su thob pa/_sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ste/_gzhon nu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi gsan pa'am/_thugs su ma chud pa'am/_
[\[3a.5\]]mngon sum du ma mdzad pa'am/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa ci'ang med de/_gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa la dri ba dang yongs su dri ba'i phyir khyod la rtag tu skabs phyes/_dri ba dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[3a.6\]]skabs phye ba dang /_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_'jig rten mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od mdzad ji ltar spyad pa yis/_/bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes 'thob/_/phan mdzad lung yang bstan du gsol/_/mi yi khyu mchog mi dang lhas 
[\[3a.7\]]mchod pa/_/mi dbang bden gsungs ji ltar spyad pa yis/_/theg mchog dam pa gzhal med thob par 'gyur/_/mgon po gsung mchog zhus pa lung bstan gsol/_/bdag la g.yo ni ma mchis te/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas zhu ba lags/_/skyes bu dam pa ma gtogs par/_/bdag gi 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]dbang ni gzhan ma mchis/_/'dun dang smon lam rgya che bdag la mchis/_/bdag gi spyod pa shAkya seng ges mkhyen/_/bdag ni tshig la gtsor 'dzin ma lags kyis/_/mi dbang sgrub pa bdag la myur du gsungs/_/sangs rgyas theg par gces spras bgyid/_/yongs su sdud pa'i chos 
[\[3b.2\]]rnams gang /_/chos rnams kun gyi mthar phyin pa/_/dpa' bo chen po lung bstan gsol/_/ci nas mis bsten shes rab rnor 'gyur zhing /_/mi bzad 'jigs dang bral te mi skrag pas/_/tshul khrims phung po gtong bar mi bgyid cing /_/rgyags dang zhe sdang gti mug chags bral te/_/
[\[3b.3\]]nyes pa kun zhi spyad pa spyod pa yi/_/phan par bgyid pa'i chos rnams bdag la gsungs/_/ji ltar tshul khrims mi gtong zhing /_/ji ltar bsam gtan 'dor mi 'gyur/_/dgon pa la ni ji ltar bsten/_/shes rab dag gis ji ltar 'phel/_/ji ltar stobs bcu'i bstan pa rgya che la/_/
[\[3b.4\]]tshul khrims srung zhing mngon dga' rnyed par 'gyur/_/ji ltar tshul khrims phung po skyon med 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'dus byas rang bzhin 'jal bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar lus dang ngag gis kyang /_/mkhas pa rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/kun nas nyon mongs med sems kyis/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[3b.5\]]ye shes tshol bar 'gyur/_/lus kyi las ni ji ltar rnam dag 'gyur/_/tshig gi skyon ni ji ltar spangs par 'gyur/_/ji ltar sems la nyon mongs med par 'gyur/_/skyes mchog zhus pa bdag la lung bstan gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon 
[\[3b.6\]]nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na yon tan 'di dag thob par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_
[\[3b.7\]]gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa yin/_phan pa'i sems dang khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang mi mnyam pa med pa'i sems yin te/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig po 'di dang 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]ldan na yon tan 'di dag thob par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/_chos gcig yang dag blangs nas ni/_/
[\[4a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang gnas pa/_/yon tan 'di dag nges thob ste/_/myur du byang chub 'tshang yang rgya/_/de yi sems ni gang la'ang zhe mi sdang /_/zhe sdang med sems byang chub sems dpa' gang /_/tha ba mi skyed zhe sdang med pa dag_/khyad par ji skad brjod pa thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[4a.3\]]mnyam pa'i sems la bsten pa yis/_/rnam par smin pa mnyam par 'gyur/_/rkang pa'i mthil yang mnyam pa dang /_/cho ga spyod yul mnyam par 'gyur/_/mnyam zhing mi mnyam ma yin sems bsgoms nas/_/tha ba'i skyon bral nem nur rab spangs na/_/de yi rkang lag mthil yang 
[\[4a.4\]]mnyam 'gyur te/_/mchog tu 'od gsal dag cing blta na sdug_/byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcur lhang nger snang /_/sangs rgyas zhing du dpal dang 'od kyis khyab/_/nam des zhi ba'i sa ni thob pa'i tshe/_/sangs rgyas mkhyen la sems can mang po 'god/_/gzhon nu de la byang chub 
[\[4a.5\]]sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /_phan par sems pa dang /_sems khong khro ba med pa dang sems mi mnyam pa med pa ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu chos thams cad 
[\[4a.6\]]kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus kyi sdom pa dang ngag gi sdom pa dang yid kyi sdom pa dang las yongs su dag pa dang dmigs pa las yang dag par 'da' ba dang phung po yongs su shes pa dang /_khams mnyam pa nyid dang skye 
[\[4a.7\]]mched sel ba dang sred pa spong ba dang mi skye ba mngon sum du byed pa la 'jug pa dang rgyu gsal bar byed pa dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi gson pa dang chos mthong ba dang lam sgom pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sten pa dang shes rab rno ba dang bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang chos shes pa dang so so yang dag 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang yi ge dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang dngos po rnams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_sgra yongs su shes pa dang dga' ba rab tu thob pa dang chos kyi dga' ba rjes su myong ba dang drang ba dang /_mnyen pa dang shugs drang ba dang gya gyu med pa dang khros 
[\[4b.2\]]gnyer dang bral ba dang des pa dang ngang tshul dge ba dang byams par 'dzin pa dang 'jam pa dang bzhin 'dzum pa dang gsong por smra ba dang legs par 'ongs so/_/tshur shog ces smra ba dang le lo med pa dang bla ma la gus pa dang bla ma la sri zhu che ba dang skye bas chog shes pa dang chos dkar pos 
[\[4b.3\]]mi ngoms pa dang 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang dgon pa la gnas pa mi gtong ba dang sa rnam par bzhag pa shes pa dang dran pa chud mi gzon pa dang /_phung po la mkhas pa dang khams la mkhas pa dang skye mched la mkhas pa dang mngon par shes pa mngon sum du bya ba la 'jug pa dang /_
[\[4b.4\]]nyon mongs pa sel ba dang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa dang /_khyad par du 'gro ba dang bsgom pa'i rgyu 'thun pa dang nyes pa las dbyung ba la mkhas pa dang kun nas ldang ba gnon pa dang bag la nyal spong ba dang srid pa las yang dag par 'da' ba dang skye ba dran 
[\[4b.5\]]pa dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la nem nur med pa dang chos sems pa dang thos pa tshol ba dang /_ye shes rno ba dang ye shes la sred pa dang ye shes rjes su rtogs pa dang cang shes kyi sa dang sems ri lta bu dang mi sgul ba dang mi g.yo ba dang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rnam par gzhag pa shes pa dang /_
[\[4b.6\]]dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang sdig pa'i chos la smod pa dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'jog pa dang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes pa dang /_skye ba'i khyad par shes pa dang mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang tshig gi mtshams 
[\[4b.7\]]sbyar ba shes pa dang khyim na gnas pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' ba dang sems zhum pa med pa dang chos la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang chos srung ba dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang 'dul ba la mkhas 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]pa dang rtsod pa'i gzhi zhi bar byed pa dang 'gyed pa med pa dang rtsod pa med pa dang bzod pa'i sa dang bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang 'gro ba mnyam pa dang chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang chos gtan la dbab pa la mkhas pa dang chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang chos kyi tshig 
[\[5a.2\]]nges par dgod pa la mkhas pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' shes pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa dang da ltar byung ba shes pa dang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa shes pa dang /_lus gnas pa shes pa dang sems gnas pa shes pa dang spyod lam srung ba dang spyod 
[\[5a.3\]]lam mi 'khrugs pa dang spyod lam mi 'chos pa dang spyod lam mdzes pa dang don dang don ma yin pa la mkhas shing shes pa dang rigs par smra ba dang /_'jig rten shes pa dang lhug par gtong ba dang lag brkyang ba dang sems kyis 'dzin pa med pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang /_
[\[5a.4\]]mi dge ba'i sems la smod pa dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan mi gtong ba dang cho ga yang dag par 'dzin pa dang dga' bar spyod pa dang bla ma la ldang zhing stan 'ding ba dang nga rgyal tshar gcod pa dang sems yang dag par rab tu 'dzin pa dang sems skye ba shes pa dang don rtogs par shes pa dang ye shes 
[\[5a.5\]]rjes su rtogs pa dang /_mi shes pa med par gyur pa dang sems la 'jug pa shes pa dang sems kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /_sgrub pa dang nges par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang sgra skad thams cad shes pa dang nges pa'i tshig rnam par gzhag pa shes pa dang don 
[\[5a.6\]]gtan la dbab par shes pa dang gnod pa rnam par spong ba dang /_skyes bu dam pa dang 'grogs pa dang skyes bu ngan pa rnam par spong ba dang bsam gtan rnams sgrub cing de la ro myong bar mi byed pa dang mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_ming dang brda dang gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[5a.7\]]la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_btags pa yang dag par 'joms pa dang 'du byed rnams la skyo ba dang bkur sti mi 'dod pa dang bkur sti med pa la btang snyoms su byed pa dang rnyed pa la don du mi gnyer ba dang rnyed pa med pa la zhum pa med pa dang snyan pa mi 'dod pa dang mi snyan pa la khong khro ba med 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]pa dang bstod pa la dga' ba med pa dang smad pa la mi dga' ba med pa dang bde ba la mngon par ma chags pa dang sdug bsngal la yid 'byung bar mi byed pa dang 'du byed rnams len par mi byed pa dang bsngags pa yang dag pa la ma chags pa dang bsngags pa yang dag pa ma yin pa la mi mjed pa 
[\[5b.2\]]dang /_khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag dang mi sten pa dang /_spyod yul ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang spyod yul du rgyu ba dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang spyod pa ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang /_rigs sun par mi byed pa dang bstan pa srung ba dang smra ba nyung zhing mnyen pa dang dal gyis smra ba dang /_
[\[5b.3\]]tshig gi lan bla na pa la mkhas pa dang phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa dang dus su 'gro bar byed pa dang so so'i skye bo la yid mi rton pa dang sdug bsngal ba rnams khyad du gsod par mi byed cing de dag la nor sbyin pa dang /_dbul po rnams la brnyas par mi byed pa dang tshul khrims 'chal pa la snying rje ba dang 
[\[5b.4\]]phan pa'i dngos po dang snying brtse ba'i blo dang chos kyis phan 'dogs pa dang zang zing yongs su gtong ba dang /_mi [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par gnas pa dang tshul khrims la stod cing 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la smod pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa la g.yo med par sten pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su 
[\[5b.5\]]gtong ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pas gnyer ba dang /_ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa dang rgyun mi chad par sbyor ba dang gus par byas te dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang /_dpe shes pa dang sngon byung ba la mkhas pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon du 'gro ba dang thabs la mkhas pa dang mtshan ma spong ba dang 'du 
[\[5b.6\]]shes zlog pa dang dngos po rnams yongs su shes pa dang /_mdo sde mngon par sgrub pa dang 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang bden pa gtan la 'bebs pa dang rnam par grol ba mngon sum du bya ba la 'jug pa dang /_tshig mgo gcig tu smra ba dang ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing mthong ba mi gtong ba dang /_
[\[5b.7\]]nem nur med pa'i tshig dang stong pa nyid la sten pa dang mtshan ma med pa la sten pa dang smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed pa dang mi 'jigs pa thob pa dang ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa dang tshul khrims dam pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la gzhol ba dang /_gcig pur dga' ba dang /_
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]bdag shes pa dang shes kyi khe nyung ngus chog shes pa dang sems la rnyog pa med pa dang lta bar gyur pa rnam par spong ba dang /_gzungs thob pa dang ye shes la 'jug pa dang gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang /_'jug pa dang sgrub pa shes pa dang gtan tshigs dang /_rigs 
[\[6a.2\]]pa dang tshul dang sgo dang rgyu dang lam dang nan tan dang sgrub pa dang phrin dang gdams pa dang bsten pa la spyod pa dang /_rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang bzod pa'i sa dang mi bzod pa dang bral ba dang ye shes kyi sa dang mi shes pa spong ba dang shes pa la gnas pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang 
[\[6a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul dang /_skyes bu dam pa la bsten pa dang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa spong ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing khong du chud par shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa dang mkhas pa rnams kyis rjes su yi 
[\[6a.4\]]rang ba dang byis pa rnams kyis spangs pa dang nyan thos rnams kyis shes par dka' ba dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi shes pa dang mu stegs can gyi sa ma yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su gzung ba dang stobs bcu dag gis rjes su rtogs pa dang /_lha rnams kyis mchod 
[\[6a.5\]]par bya ba dang tshangs pas phyag bya ba dang brgya byin rnams kyis sngon du 'gro bar bya ba dang /_klu rnams kyis phyag bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin rnams kyis rjes su yi rang bar bya ba dang /_mi'am ci rnams kyis bstod par bya ba dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bsngags par bya ba dang /_
[\[6a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya ba dang /_mkhas pa rnams kyis kun chub par bya ba dang /_bla na med pa'i nor du gyur pa dang /_zang zing med pa'i sbyin pa dang /_nad pa rnams kyi sman du gyur pa dang /_ye shes kyi mdzod du gyur pa dang /_spobs pa mi zad pa dang /_
[\[6a.7\]]mdo sde rnams kyi tshul du gyur pa dang /_dpa' bo dag gi g.yul du gyur pa dang /_khams gsum yongs su shes pa dang /_pha rol tu 'gro ba dag la gzings lta bu dang /_chu bo'i nang du zhugs pa dag la gru lta bu dang /_grags pa 'dod pa dag gi grags pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]kyis bstod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags pa dang /_stobs bcu rnams kyis bstod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dag gi yon tan dang /_snying rje can dag gi btang snyoms dang /_nyes pa zhi bar 'dod pa dag gi byams pa dang /_theg pa chen po dag gi 
[\[6b.2\]]dbugs 'byin pa dang /_seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams kyi nan tan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam dang /_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal du gyur pa dang /_bdud kyi sde rnams skrag 
[\[6b.3\]]par byed pa dang /_bde bar 'gro ba rnams kyi rig pa dang /_don sgrub pa rnams kyi don dang /_dgra'i nang du song ba dag gi skyabs dang /_phyir rgol ba rnams chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i rnam pa dang /_stobs rnams yang dag par tshol 
[\[6b.4\]]ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi snga ltas su gyur pa dang /_chos kyi sku'i rgyan dang spyod pa rnams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams kyi rgyan dang /_thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi dga' ba dang /_sras thu bo rnams kyi dga' ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 
[\[6b.5\]]yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa dang /_sems rnam par dag pa dang /_lus yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_'dod 
[\[6b.6\]]chags 'byung ba med pa dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug gi sa ma yin pa dang /_ye shes 'byung ba dang /_rig pa skye ba dang /_ma rig pa spong ba dang /_rnam par grol ba snying por byed pa rnams kyi tshim pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin snying por byed pa rnams kyi dga' ba dang /_
[\[6b.7\]]lta 'dod pa rnams kyi mig tu gyur pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_mngon par sgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang thos pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyi gzungs dang /_dran pa mi brjed pa dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]dang /_'dren pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa dang /_mi brtson pa rnams kyi phra ba dang /_shes par dka' ba dang ma grol ba dag gis mi shes pa dang /_yi ge rnams ldog pa dang /_sgra shes par dka' ba dang /_rtogs pa rnams kyis kun shes pa dang /_des pa rnams kyis 
[\[7a.2\]]shes pa dang /_'dod pa chung ba rnams kyis rab tu rtogs pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyis gzung ba dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis bcangs pa dang /_sdug bsngal zad pa dang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang srid pa'i 'gro ba dang skye ba'i gnas thams cad gcig 
[\[7a.3\]]tu nges par bstan pa ste/_gzhon nu 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgu 
[\[7a.4\]]sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gsum gyis sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/dge 
[\[7a.5\]]slong stong du tshang ba len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/lha dang mi'i skye dgu las srog chags stong phrag drug cus chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/dge slong ma brgyad khri len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge 
[\[7a.6\]]bsnyen lnga brgyas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/dge bsnyen ma drug stong gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 
[\[7a.7\]]'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/_chem chem rab tu chem chem kun tu rab tu chem chem/_'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur te/_shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/_
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/_/byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/_/lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/_/mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/_/dbus dma' na mtha' mtho ste/_tshad med pa'i snang ba 'jig rten du byung nas 'jig rten gyi bar mun nag smag tu gyur 
[\[7b.2\]]pa gang yin pa de dag kyang snang ba des gsal bar gyur to/_/sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag gcig gis gcig shes par gyur te/_'di skad du kye sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes par gyur to zhes 'dzer te/_mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po'i bar du 
[\[7b.3\]]yang de bzhin no/_/gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu ngas dran pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod 
[\[7b.4\]]cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di nyid la bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la ngas 
[\[7b.5\]]rin po che thams cad dang me tog dang spos dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang rin po che'i gtsug lag khang rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du ma'i bkod 
[\[7b.6\]]pa thams cad kyis bkur stir byas bla mar byas ri mor byas mchod par byas rjed par byas gsol bar byas te/_gzhon nu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgyas par thos te/_bzung ngo /_/
[\[7b.7\]]dris so/_/bcangs so/_/bklags so/_/rab tu bton to/_/nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgoms so/_/mang du byas shing gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi tha ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgya stong gi dge 'dun byung ste/_de dag gi tshe'i 
[\[8a.2\]]tshad ni lo 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa drug tu gyur to/_/gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la ngas lo bye ba stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du mchod pa dang rim gro byas te lha'i tsan dan dang rin po che'i gtsug lag khang bye ba byas 
[\[8a.3\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba stong phrag bdun cu rtsa drug tu gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[8a.4\]]sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de'i drung du nga rab tu byung nas lo bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan cing bzung ste dris so/_/bcangs so/_/bklags so/_/rab tu bton to/_/nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgoms 
[\[8a.5\]]so/_/mang du byas shing gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[8a.6\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na khyod kyis kyang nga bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro dang g.yog bya ba la brtson par bya'o/_/gzhon nu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang 
[\[8a.7\]]rim gro dang g.yog byas pa'i rgyu 'thun pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par dka' ba ma yin na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos/_gzhon nu de lta bas na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro dang g.yog byas pa la rtag tu yid yongs su mi 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]skyo bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di nyid rgyas par tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/dran pa stobs bcu bye ba drug cu dag_/sngon tshe bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs/_/nga sngon byang 
[\[8b.2\]]chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di bshad byas te/_/de dag gi yang tha ma ni/_/'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/_/sA la'i dbang rgyal zhes bya ste/_de la nga yis yongs su dris/_/nga yang rgyal rigs nyid gyur te/_/rgyal po sa bdag gtso bo yin/_/nga yi bu yang lnga brgya 
[\[8b.3\]]ste/_de dag las ni mi nyung byung /_/sangs rgyas de yi gtsug lag khang /_/tsan dan khyad par can rnams dang /_/kha cig rin chen brtsegs pa yi/_/bye ba snyed ni ngas byas te/_/skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid 'ong ba/_/'jigs pa'i bla ma zhes bya rgyal por gyur/_/sangs rgyas la ni 
[\[8b.4\]]mchod pa dam pa dag_/lo stong bye ba [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bar du byas/_/rnam par 'dren pa sA la'i dbang po rgyal/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo rgyal ba ma smad pa/_/de yi dus na de yi tshe tshad ni/_/lo bye stong phrag bdun cu drug tu gyur/_/nyan thos mtshungs pa khrag khrig brgyad cu ste/_/gsum rig 
[\[8b.5\]]mngon shes drug ldan dbang po thul/_/zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa/_/de tshe mi mchog gi ni dge 'dun byung /_/lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la phan pa'i phyir/_/de tshe ting 'dzin 'di ni bdag 'dod pas/_/rgyal ba rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag la/_/mchod pa rnam pa mang po ngas byas 
[\[8b.6\]]te/_rgyal ba sA la'i dbang rgyal drung du yang /_/nga ni btsun mo sras bcas rab tu byung /_/lo yang bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir ni/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di ngas kyang yongs dris te/_/tshigs bcad khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu dang /_/gzhan yang dkrigs phrag bye ba brgya rnams ni/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[8b.7\]]'di nyid kyi ni le'u gcig po/_/ngas ni bde bar gshegs pa de las blangs/_/ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i phyir/_/mgo dang rkang lag chung ma de bzhin bu/_/rin chen mang po de bzhin bza' bca' rnams/_/sngon chad ngas ni ma btang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]med/_/sangs rgyas dag ni bye ba phrag 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]stong dang /_/de las lhag par gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/gang dag bya rgod phung po 'dir bzhugs nas/_/ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ston ngas dran te/_/de kun mtshan kyang shAkya khyu mchog yin/_/kun gyi sras kyang dgra gcan zin ces bya/_/zhabs 'bring ba yi ming yang 
[\[9a.2\]]kun dga' bo/_/ser skya'i grong nas thams cad rab tu byung /_/'phrul mchog shA ri'i bu dang pang nas skyes/_/skyob pa kun kyang mtshan ni 'thun par gyur/_/de tshe 'jig rten khams kyang ming 'dra ste/_/thams cad kyang ni snyigs ma'i dus su byung /_/byang chub spyad pa 'di ni spyod 
[\[9a.3\]]pa'i tshe/_/mi dbang de kun nga yis bkur stir byas/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni yongs su tshol ba'i tshe/_/rgyal la mchod pa ma byas ci yang med/_/nan tan gyis ni ting 'dzin 'di rnyed de/_/nan tan dag kyang rnam pa mang du gsungs/_/yon tan kun la rab tu gnas pa dag_/de la ting 'dzin 
[\[9a.4\]]'di ni rnyed mi dka'/_/bro ba dag la ma zhen mi bskam zhing /_/khyim rnams la yang ma chags phrag dog med/_/byams la gnas shing khro ba med pa gang /_/de la ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/_/rnyed dang bkur sti dag kyang mi 'dod cing /_/'tsho ba gtsang zhing ci yang mi 'chang ba/_/
[\[9a.5\]]tshul khrims rnam par dag cing 'jigs med pa/_/de la ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/_/g.yel ba med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_/dgon par gnas shing sbyangs la gnas gyur dang /_/bdag med bzod pa la yang rab gnas pa/_/de la ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/_/rgod 
[\[9a.6\]]pa med cing shin tu dul ba'i sems/_/spyod dang spyod lam dag la rab tu gnas/_/gtong la mos shing ser sna med pa dag_/de la ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/_/de la dpe byad bzang dang mtshan rnams dang /_/'dren pas sangs rgyas chos ni 
[\[9a.7\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_/stobs dang mi 'jigs gang brjod rnyed mi dka'/_/sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sems can gang /_/de dag dus gcig sangs rgyas nyid gyur la/_/de rnams re re'i tshe yi tshad kyang ni/_/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag bsam mi khyab/_/de dag re re la yang mgo 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]bo ni/_/rgya mtsho kun gyi bye ma de snyed yod/_/mgo bo ji snyed yod pa thams cad la/_/de snyed lce yang mgo bo kun la yod/_/de dag kun gyis ting 'dzin 'di las gang /_/tshigs bcad 'dzin 'di'i phan yon brjod kyang ni/_/cung zad yongs su brjod par mi 'gyur na/_/gang gis 
[\[9b.2\]]bslabs shing gzung ba ci zhig smos/_/ting 'dzin blta dka' zhi ba gang 'dzin pa/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan blangs shing spyod pa dag_/de la lha dang lha min gnod sbyin smon/_/rgyal po dag kyang phyi bzhin 'brang bar byed/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba rnyed dka' gang 'dzin pa/_/rgyal ba dag gis 
[\[9b.3\]]yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/_/lha dang klu rnams rtag tu rjes su 'brang /_/phas kyi rgol bas de yi gzi mi bzod/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/_/de yi spobs pa dag ni mtha' yas 'gyur/_/mdo sde dag ni stong rnams rab ston kyang /_/de la nam yang rgyun ni 'chad mi 
[\[9b.4\]]'gyur/_/gang rnams mi bzad chen po'i phyi dus na/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas 'dzin pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas 'dren pa snang ba dpag med dang /_/bde ldan 'jig rten khams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_/phan yon 'di dag rab tu bstan mdzad nas/_/yongs su mya ngan nga 'das phyi 
[\[9b.5\]]ma'i tshe/_/ting 'dzin rnam par dag pa 'di zung zhes/_/rang byung ston pa bdag nyid gsol ba 'debs/_/yongs su mya ngan gang 'das sangs rgyas dang /_/gang rnams ma byon da ltar byung ba yi/_/rgyal ba thams cad ting 'dzin 'di bslabs nas/_/byang chub rdul bral 'dus ma byas pa rtogs/_/
[\[9b.6\]]sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[9b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa yang dag par bstan pa dang /_don dang 'bru yongs su mi zad par bya ba dang bdag gi tshig thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung zhing 'byung bar 'dod na/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi don du ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya/_/kun chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_rab tu gdon par bya/_lung mnod par bya/_kha ton du bya/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgom pas bsgom par bya/_mang du bya gzhan dag la yang 
[\[10a.2\]]rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa gang yin zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon pa na 'dug kyang rung /_shing drung na 'dug kyang rung /_bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung /_
[\[10a.3\]]khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung 'di la yang dag par slob ste/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur 
[\[10a.4\]]ba/_bla ni med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bsod nams dag gi rgyu 'thun pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba/_bzod pas brgyan pa/_bsod nams kyi gter rnams kyi gzhi/_dpe byad bzang po rnams 
[\[10a.5\]]kyis spras pa/_mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa/_spyod yul ran par 'thun pa/_mthong na mi 'thun pa med pa/_dad pas mos pa rnams mngon par dga' ba/_shes rab zil gyis mi non pa/_stobs rnams la rdzi ba med pa/_sems can thams cad kyi ston pa/_byang chub sems 
[\[10a.6\]]dpa' rnams kyi yab/_'phags pa'i gang zag rnams kyi rgyal po las dang po pa rnams kyi ded dpon/_ye shes dpag tu med pa/_spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_gsung rnam par dag pa/_dbyangs snyan pa/_sku byad blta bas chog mi shes pa/_sku mtshungs pa med pa/_'dod 
[\[10a.7\]]pa dag gis ma gos pa/_gzugs dag gis nye bar ma gos pa/_gzugs med pa dag dang ma 'dres pa/_phung po dag las rab tu rnam par grol ba/_khams rnams dang mi ldan pa/_skye mched rnams bsdams pa/_mdud pa rnams shin tu bcad pa/_yongs su gdung ba 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]dag las rnam par grol ba/_srid pa las yongs su grol ba/_chu bo las rgal ba/_ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes la gnas pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa/_yang dag pa nyid 
[\[10b.2\]]kyi mtha' la gnas pa/_sems can thams cad la gzigs pa'i sa la bzhugs pa ste/_gzhon nu 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /_bsngags pa 'di 
[\[10b.3\]]dag dang ldan zhing ting nge 'dzin 'di la brten nas spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par bstan na don dang 'bru yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/_de'i tshig 
[\[10b.4\]]thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la rgyas par tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do/_/bskal pa stong phrag mang por 
[\[10b.5\]]rab bshad kyang /_/rgyal ba'i bsngags pa thams cad brjod mi sla/_/ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni tshol ba'i phyir/_/rgyal bas de lta'i yon tan yang dag bsgrubs/_/ngas ni ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di tshol bas/_/sngon tshe zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis su/_/bu mo gzugs bzang 
[\[10b.6\]]shin tu blta na sdug_/legs par lus brgyan yid du 'ong ba byin/_/ngas ni ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di tshol bas/_/sngon tshe zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis su/_/de bzhin bran pho bran mo nor dang 'bru/_/de bzhin nor bu mu tig gser dngul byin/_/ngas ni ting 'dzin zhi mchog 
[\[10b.7\]]'di tshol bas/_/nor bu rin chen sna tshogs mu tig phreng /_/gos dang gdu bu gser skud mdzes pa dag_/sngon tshe 'dren pa rnams la ngas btang byas/_/bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas dpag med par/_/dri mchog dri ldan dbyar gyi me tog dag_/rab tu bla na med pa'i sems bskyed 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]nas/_rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la nga yis phul/_/'khor gyi nang du ri mo bskyed nas kyang /_/de bzhin chos kyi sbyin pa ngas byin te/_/chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas nga grags snyam/_/nga la nam yang de 'dra'i sems ma skyes/_/sdug pa'i mchog byin bdag nyid spyad par 
[\[11a.2\]]ni/_/de snyam chags pa nga la yong ma byung /_/sbyin pa'i chos ni mang du ngas byin te/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas ye shes ngas thob snyam/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag kyang ngas sngon bsgrubs/_/nags mchog sgra nyung rtag tu gnas byas te/_/thams cad dus su snying rje mang bar gyur/_/rtag 
[\[11a.3\]]tu sangs rgyas ye shes ngas thob snyam/_/byams shing 'jam la 'ged pa'i ngang tshul can/_/thos pa 'dzin cing bzhin 'dzum tshig kyang 'jam/_/shin tu tshig snyan mang po kun kyang dga'/_/nga la skye bo kun lta ngoms mi 'gyur/_/ser sna can du skad cig ma gyur te/_/srid pa mang por 
[\[11a.4\]]nam yang ser sna med/_/rtag tu bsod snyoms dag la nga dga' ste/_/mgron du bos pa thams cad ma lus spangs/_/'di las rtsa bzhi tshigs bcad gcig bzung na/_/mang du thos shing thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/des ni nga la bla na med pa yi/_/dad pa'i mchog bskyed rtag tu bkur 
[\[11a.5\]]sti byas/_/ngas ni ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di tshol phyir/_/rnam par 'dren la mchod pa mang po byas/_/sbyin pa rnam pa mang po mtha' yas byin/_/de bzhin tshul khrims dag kyang yun ring bsrungs/_/'jig rten khams yangs sna tshogs mtha' yas pa/_/nor bu rin chen bkang ste sbyin byin 
[\[11a.6\]]pas/_/ting 'dzin 'di las tshigs bcad gcig bzung na/_/de bas bsod nams 'di ni rgya cher 'phags/_/bskal pa mtha' yas dpag med mang por yang /_/me tog mang po ji snyed yod pa dang /_/de bzhin spos rnams yid 'ong rgya che ba/_/bsod nams 'dod phyir rgyal ba mchod 
[\[11a.7\]]pa dang /_/bskal pa mtha' yas dpag med mang por ni/_/sil snyan mang po ji snyed yod pa dang /_/de bzhin snang gsal zhal zas na bza' yis/_/bsod nams 'dod phyir rgyal ba mchod pa bas/_/rang byung rgyal ba chos rjer bdag gyur ces/_/mi gang byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]nas/_/mnyam par gzhag pas tshigs bcad gcig bzung na/_/de bas bsod nams 'di ni rgya cher 'phags/_/gang gA'i bye ma mang po ji snyed pa/_/bskal pa de snyed du yang phan yon rnams/_/brjod kyang yongs su zad par mi nus te/_/ting 'dzin 'di bzung bsod nams 
[\[11b.2\]]shin tu che/_/de phyir sangs rgyas phan yon dag_/shin tu bzang po 'di thos nas/_/sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i ting 'dzin 'di/_/myur du lung yang mnod par gyis/_/sangs rgyas bye ba bdun cu gsum/_/sngon gyi skye bar bkur sti byas/_/sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis/_/
[\[11b.3\]]mdo sde 'di ni rab tu bshad/_/mdo sde 'di yi ming yang ni/_/snying rje chen por 'jug ces bya/_/'di la mang du thos bslabs na/_/sangs rgyas chos ni rnyed mi dka'/_/'jig rten 'dren pa mya ngan 'das/_/phyi ma'i dus na dge slong ni/_/sdom pa med pa mang po dag_/mang du thos pa mi 
[\[11b.4\]]'dod 'byung /_/tshul khrims bsngags pa rjod byed la/_/tshul khrims don du gnyer ba med/_/ting 'dzin bsngags pa rjod byed la/_/ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba med/_/shes rab bsngags pa rjod byed la/_/shes rab don du gnyer ba med/_/rnam grol bsngags pa rjod byed la/_/rnam 
[\[11b.5\]]grol don du gnyer ba med/_/ji ltar skyes bu la la dag_/tsan dan dag ni 'di 'dra ste/_/spos kyi rnam pa yid 'ong zhes/_/tsan dan dag gi yon tan brjod/_/de nas mi gzhan la la yis/_/de ltar bsngags pa brjod pa yi/_/tsan dan [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]srel tam zhes/_/skyes bu la las 
[\[11b.6\]]de dris na/_/skyes bu de la slar smras pa/_/gang gis 'tsho bar byed pa yi/_/spos kyi bsngags pa nga brjod pa/_/spos de nga la med ces smra/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pa/_/tshul khrims bsngags pas 'tsho ba dag_/phyi ma'i dus la 'byung 'gyur te/_/de dag la ni tshul khrims 
[\[11b.7\]]med/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pa/_/ting 'dzin bsngags pas 'tsho ba dag_/phyi ma'i dus la 'byung 'gyur te/_/de dag la ni ting 'dzin med/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pa/_/shes rab bsngags pas 'tsho ba dag_/phyi ma'i dus la 'byung 'gyur te/_/de dag la ni shes 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]rab med/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pa/_/rnam grol bsngags pas 'tsho ba dag_/phyi ma'i dus la 'byung 'gyur te/_/de dag la ni rnam grol med/_/ji ltar skyes bu dbul po la la zhig_/skye bo mang pos yongs su brnyas gyur la/_/de yis phyis gdod nor gyi gter 
[\[12a.2\]]rnyed nas/_/nor yod rig pas skye bo ri mor byed/_/de bzhin ting 'dzin 'di ni ma thob na/_/byang chub sems dpa' de yang lha mi dang /_/grul bum srin po mang pos mi bkur te/_/ji ltar skyes bu dbul po nor med bzhin/_/mkhas pas gzhal du med pa'i chos kyi gter/_/sa 'di 
[\[12a.3\]]nam zhig rab tu thob gyur na/_/lha dang mi dag de la re ba skyed/_/des kyang skye dgu bla med nor rnams byin/_/de phyir rgyal ba dag gis brjod pa yi/_/phan yon dam pa bzang po 'di thos nas/_/shes kyi khe dang bde rnyed kun spangs te/_/ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni lung nod gyis/_/sangs 
[\[12a.4\]]rgyas su dag phyogs su mya ngan 'das/_/gang dag da ltar byung dang ma 'ongs pa/_/de dag thams cad ting 'dzin 'di bslabs nas/_/byang chub bsam yas mtshungs med rnam sangs rgyas/_/zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa sems dga' nas/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar 'dug ste tshig smras pa/_/
[\[12a.5\]]skyes bu dam pa mya ngan yongs 'das nas/_/ma rungs dus na bdag gis mdo 'di gzung /_/bdag gis lus dang srog kyang yongs btang ste/_/'jig rten skyed pa ci mchis kun btang la/_/bdag gis 'jigs pa chen po'i dus der yang /_/ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni gzung bar 
[\[12a.6\]]bgyi/_/sems can mang la snying rje cher skyed de/_/sems can sdug bsngal mgon med mthong nas kyang /_/de dag la ni byams pa nyer sbyar zhing /_/ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni gzung bar bgyi/_/de yi tshe na ting 'dzin 'dzin pa dag_/lnga brgya las ni mi nyung der byung ste/_/
[\[12a.7\]]mdo sde mchog 'di rgya cher gzung ba la/_/de dag sngon du 'dren pa gzhon nu yin/_/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag par bsngags pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po/_bam po gnyis pa/_de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das 
[\[12b.2\]]kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu khyod la de 
[\[12b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal te bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas 'di 
[\[12b.4\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin ces bgyi ba de chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin ces bya 
[\[12b.5\]]ba ni 'di lta ste/_sems nges par rtogs pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang mtshams sbyor ba shes pa dang khur bor ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa dang /_'dod chags gso ba dang zhe sdang nye bar zhi ba dang gti mug bsal 
[\[12b.6\]]ba dang rigs par rnal 'byor du byed pa dang /_mi rigs pa rnam par spong ba dang dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang 'khor ba las thar bar 'dod pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa dang /_mi nyal ba la sten pa dang spong ba mi gtong ba dang chos dkar po rnams yongs su srung ba dang skye bo rnams la yid 
[\[12b.7\]]mi rton pa dang las rnams la mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang nang gi skye mched rnams yid la mi byed pa dang /_phyi'i skye mched rnams la kun tu mi spyod pa dang bdag la mi stod pa dang gzhan la mi smod pa dang khyim la chags pa med pa dang so so'i skye bo la yid mi rton pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]pa dang bsnyen par dka' ba dang gzi chen po dang bdag shes pa dang mi rgod pa dang spyod lam phun sum tshogs par gnas pa dang gnod sems med pa dang mi rtsub pa dang gzhan la mi gnod pa dang /_bshes gnyen rnams la rjes su srung ba dang gsang ba'i sngags kun srung ba 
[\[13a.2\]]dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rnam par mi 'tshe zhing gnod pa med pa dang 'jam por smra ba dang khams gsum thams cad la mi gnas pa dang chos thams cad la stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu 'dun pa ni gzhon nu ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/_
[\[13a.3\]]gzhon nu gang de lta bu'i chos de dag la sgrub par byed kyi log par sgrub par mi byed pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid ston cing de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la rgyas par 
[\[13a.4\]]tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/ngas ni bdud rtsi'i sgo yang rab tu phye/_/chos kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra de bzhin bshad/_/skye ba dag kyang ci 'dra ngas bstan te/_/mya ngan 'das pa phan yon bcas pa bshad/_/sdig pa'i grogs po rtag 
[\[13a.5\]]tu rnam par spang /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang bsnyen par bya/_/'du ba spangs te nags khrod gnas bca' zhing /_/byams pa'i sems ni rtag tu bsgom par bya/_/tshul khrims dag pa rtag tu bsrung byas te/_/sbyangs la dga' ba'ang rtag tu thob par bya/_/gtong ba dang 
[\[13a.6\]]ni shes rab bsnyen byas na/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/nyan thos mang po yi ni sa min pa/_/zhi ba'i sa 'di dag kyang thos nas ni/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i chos la mngon sum gyur/_/sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas thob par 'gyur/_/skyes bu blo ldan snod 
[\[13a.7\]]'gyur mthong nas kyang /_/de dag byang chub sems la yang dag chud/_/bla med ye shes la ni rab bkod na/_/ting 'dzin rgyal po 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/_/yongs su tshol dang kun du longs spyod dang /_/kha zas rgyu 'thun dag ni gang gi phyir/_/phrag dog skyes pa de la rab tu rtogs/_/
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed par yong mi dka'/_/ting 'dzin rgyal po stong pa 'di sgom pa/_/tshul khrims dag pa'i mgo la de 'dug ste/_/chos rnams rang bzhin rtag tu mnyam bzhag na/_/byis pa mi rigs brtson pas mi shes so/_/su dag ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di 'dod pa/_/de la nam yang 
[\[13b.2\]]'jigs pa'i blo mi 'byung /_/rab tu zhi ba'i sa 'di bsten nas ni/_/mi mchog rnams kyang rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byad gang dran pa/_/de ni yid zhi dbang po zhi bar 'gyur/_/sems la 'khrul med rtag tu mnyam par bzhag_/thos dang shes pa dag 
[\[13b.3\]]ni rgya mtsho bzhin/_/ting 'dzin 'di la rab tu gnas nas ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'chag sar su 'chags pa/_/des ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang /_/de bas lhag par gang gA'i bye snyed mthong /_/su dag sangs rgyas chos la tshad 'dzin pa/_/mi de'i sems ni shin tu myos par 
[\[13b.4\]]'gyur/_/tshad las 'das pa la ni tshad gzung med/_/'dren pa yon tan thams cad bsam mi khyab/_/phyogs bcu dag na sems can su yang ni/_/'jig rten mgon dang mnyam med su zhig lhag_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan kun ldan pa/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod 
[\[13b.5\]]cing thob par gyis/_/sku lus dag ni gser gyi mdog 'dra bas/_/'jig rten mgon po kun nas rab tu mdzes/_/dmigs pa 'di la gang gi sems 'jug pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni mnyam gzhag yin/_/mkhas pas 'dus byas 'dus ma byas rig ste/_/mtshan ma'i 
[\[13b.6\]]'du shes dag ni rnam bshig nas/_/mtshan ma med pa la ni de gnas na/_/chos rnams thams cad stong par rab tu shes/_/gang dag chos kyi sku la gnas gyur pa/_/de ni dngos po thams cad dngos med shes/_/de yis dngos po'i 'du shes rnam bshig nas/_/rgyal ba'i dbang po 
[\[13b.7\]]gzugs kyi skur mi lta/_/khyod la bsgo zhing khong du chud par bya/_/ji ltar mi dag mang du rtog byed pa/_/de la gnas pa'i rtog pa de dag gis/_/de bzhin du ni de la sems gzhol 'gyur/_/de bzhin rgyal ba yi ni sku byad dang /_/ye shes dpag tu med par thub dbang dran/_/rtag par 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]rjes su dran pa bsgom byas na/_/de la sems gzhol rab tu 'bab par 'gyur/_/de ni 'chags 'dug 'greng zhing gnas pa'i tshe/_/skyes bu dam pa'i ye shes rab tu 'dod/_/'jig rten rgyal ba bla med bdag 'gyur bar/_/'dod pas byang chub tu yang smon lam 
[\[14a.2\]]'debs/_/des ni sangs rgyas shes shing sangs rgyas mthong /_/sangs rgyas chos nyid la yang so sor rtog_/ting 'dzin 'di la rab tu gnas byas nas/_/mthu chen sangs rgyas la ni phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lus dang ngag dang yid rab dang ba yis/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas dag gi bsngags 
[\[14a.3\]]pa brjod/_/de ltar des ni sems kyi rgyud bsgoms pas/_/nyin mtshan du yang 'jig rten mgon po mthong /_/nam zhig de ni na zhing mi bde nas/_/shi la thug pa'i sdug bsngal tshor byung na/_/sangs rgyas la ni dran pa mi nyams te/_/sdug bsngal tshor bas 'phrogs par yong mi 'gyur/_/
[\[14a.4\]]de ltar de dag ye shes rnam brtags pas/_/'ongs dang ma 'ongs chos rnams stong par shes/_/de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul la de gnas pa/_/spyod pa yongs su spyod pas sems mi skyo/_/de phyir phan yon 'di dag thos nas ni/_/mtshungs med byang chub la yang mos pa skyed/_/bde 
[\[14a.5\]]gshegs dam pa mthong ba rnyed dka' yis/_/phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod pa skyes sa re/_/ngas ni rab tu bzang ba'i chos bshad kyang /_/khyed kyis thos nas yang dag ma spyad na/_/nad pa sman gyi rgyal ba thogs pa dag_/bdag gi nad ni gso bar mi nus bzhin/_/de phyir mkhas pa 
[\[14a.6\]]shin tu rtogs pa dag_/rtag tu ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dod pa yis/_/tshul khrims thos pa gtong ba bsnyen byas na/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed par yong mi dka'/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[14a.7\]]la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bu'i sems kyis pha dang ma dang 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]bu dang bu mo dang nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams dang gnyen dang rtsa lag dang chung ma la sogs pa me bzhin du spangs la rgyal srid kyi bde ba thams cad mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du bor te/_dgon pa la mngon du phyogs shing khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung bar bya'o/_/de 
[\[14b.2\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu dgon pa la mngon du phyogs shing khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par dka' ba ma yin na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos te/_gzhon nu de lta bas 
[\[14b.3\]]na bu dang mdza' bo dang /_nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams dang gnyen dang rtsa lag dang chung ma la sogs pa me bzhin du spangs la rgyal srid kyi bde ba thams cad mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du bor te/_dgon pa la mngon du phyogs shing /_khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung bar bya'o 
[\[14b.4\]]zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar rtag tu bslab par bya'o/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/_rgya che ba/_dpag tu med pa/_bsam gyis mi 
[\[14b.5\]]khyab pa gzhal du med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur 
[\[14b.6\]]ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin de'i nyan thos 'dus pa dang po ni thams cad 
[\[14b.7\]]kyang dgra bcom pa sha stag bye ba phrag brgyad cu byung ngo /_/nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa ni dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag bdun cu byung ngo /_/'dus pa gsum pa ni dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag drug cu byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]pa yang dpag tu med pa dag byung ngo /_/gzhon nu de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bzhi khrir gyur to/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di yang 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba/_lo legs 
[\[15a.2\]]pa/_nyams dga' ba/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar gyur to/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di na rgyal po stobs brtan dang /_stobs chen zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/_de la gcig ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa/_rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/_nyams dga' ba/_skye bo dang mi mang 
[\[15a.3\]]pos gang ba'i phyed la dbang ngo /_/cig shos kyang de'i phyed la dbang ngo /_/gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin de rgyal po stobs chen gyi rnam par rgyal ba'i sar byung ste/_gzhon nu de 
[\[15a.4\]]ltar rgyal po stobs chen gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang /_snyun gsos kyi sman dang yo byad 
[\[15a.5\]]brtags pa kun du spyad par rung ba/_kha na ma tho ba med pa la lo brgya stong tshang bar spyan drangs so/_/gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa 
[\[15a.6\]]nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang grags pa che bar gyur to/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang 
[\[15a.7\]]bcas/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la rnyed pa dang bkur sti cher byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin la bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/_rgyal po stobs chen gyi rjes 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]su slob cing 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi mchod pas rnyed pa dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin 'di snyam du gyur te/_kye ma'o sems can 'di 
[\[15b.2\]]dag ni tshul khrims dang gso sbyong yang dag par blang ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba las 
[\[15b.3\]]yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/_sems can 'di dag ni de'i 'og tu bde ba la lhur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de'i 'og tu bde ba ni 'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi zang zing gi mchod pa ni 'di yin te/_sems can 'di dag ni 'di lta ste/_mtho ris kyi 'jig rten 
[\[15b.4\]]la dmigs shing tshe 'di lhur byed pa/_tshe phyi ma lhur mi byed pa ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mthar gtugs pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/gzhon nu de la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mthar gtugs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shin tu rnam par dag pa dang tshangs par spyod pa la shin tu gnas 
[\[15b.5\]]pa dang shin tu mthar phyin pa dang shin tu mthar gtugs pa'o/_/ngas sems can de dag la ci nas kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi mchod pa dang chos kyi nan tan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bshad par bya'o snyam mo/_/gzhon nu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[15b.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin gyis de'i tshe rgyal po stobs chen dang bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag skyo bar bya bar dgongs pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sbyin pa rab byin gcig la gcig bsten pa/_/de dag phan tshun ri mor byed mi 
[\[15b.7\]]'gyur/_/mkhas pa bag chags rab tu spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas dag gis bsten pa de mi bsngags/_/gang dag srogs chags phan phyir chos ston pa/_/de 'dra'i mi des shin tu bsten pa yin/_/de dag gcig la gcig kyang mi phyed mdza'/_/bye ba snyed kyi bdud kyis 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]dbye mi nus/_/'jig rten zang zing dag gis sten pa'i mi/_/de dag tshe 'di'i don du kun 'gyur gyi/_/zang zing med pa'i chos la bsten pa ni/_/mi dag gi yang rab tu don cher 'gyur/_/zang zing med pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag ste/_/zang zing med pa'i chos rnams rab bshad 
[\[16a.2\]]la/_/gang dag zang zing med pa'i dga' ldan pa/_/de 'dra de dag myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/'dod pa dag la rab tu sten byed cing /_/bu dang chung ma la yang srid bskyed nas/_/khyim gnas smad pa nyid la sten byed na/_/bla med byang chub mchog des yong mi 'thob/_/su dag me mur bzhin du 
[\[16a.3\]]'dod spong zhing /_/bu dang chung ma la yang srid spangs nas/_/skrag cing dngangs pas khyim nas mngon byung ba/_/de dag byang chub mchog 'di rnyed mi dka'/_/gang dag khyim gyi dbus na 'dug bzhin du/_/byang chub dam pa mchog 'di thob pa ni/_/de 'dra'i sangs rgyas gang yang sngon ma byung /_/
[\[16a.4\]]ma byon pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa'ang med/_/rgyal srid mchil ma bzhin du rab spangs la/_/dben pa 'dod pas dgon par gnas par gyis/_/nyon mongs rab spangs bdud kyang rnam bcom na/_/byang chub rdul med 'dus ma byas pa rtogs/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/
[\[16a.5\]]bskal pa bye mang rim gro sus byas pas/_/gang zhig yongs su skyo ba'i yid kyis ni/_/khyim nas mngon par byung na 'di mchog 'gyur/_/ji ltar rab tu byung nas chos spyod pa/_/de ltar zas dang skom dang chos gos dang /_/me tog dang ni spos dang byug pa yis/_/mi mchog rgyal ba rim gro byas 
[\[16a.6\]]ma yin/_/su dag byang chub tu yang 'dod mos shing /_/sems can don phyir 'dus byas yongs skyo nas/_/dgon par bltas te gom pa bdun bor na/_/de bas bsod nams 'di ni khyad par 'phags/_/de nas gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[16a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin gyis khyim nas mngon par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod pa de lta bu rgyal po stobs chen gyis thos so/_/thos nas kyang ji ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i don shes pa ltar na bcom ldan 'das ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa mi 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]brjod kyi bcom ldan 'das ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu mthar gtugs pa'i bsngags pa brjod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa dang tshangs par spyod pa la shin tu gnas pa dang shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bsngags so zhes bsams nas de 'di snyam du khyim 
[\[16b.2\]]na gnas pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi nan tan sgrub pa'am/_don rjes su thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni sla ba ma yin te/_bla na med pa'i chos kyi nan tan las bdag yongs su nyams par 'gyur gyis/_bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo 
[\[16b.3\]]snyam mo/_/gzhon nu de nas rgyal po stobs chen bram ze dang khyim bdag brgyad khris bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[16b.4\]]kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des rgyal po stobs chen gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 
[\[16b.5\]]chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad do/_/de nas gzhon nu rgyal po stobs chen ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa dang rab tu mos pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas yang dag 
[\[16b.6\]]par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/de de ltar rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bzung ste bzung zhing kun chub par byas/_bcangs shing bklags nas bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas par gyur to/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis bskal pa 
[\[16b.7\]]bye ba phrag bcu'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma song ste/_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu la bsnyen bkur byas shing de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos so/_/sangs rgyas de dag las thos nas des bzung ste/_kun chub par byas/_bcangs 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]shing bklags nas bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas so/_/de de'i 'og tu dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis bskal pa bye ba phrag bcu 'das pa dang /_bskal pa 'bum tshang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 
[\[17a.2\]]gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes dpa' ba zhes bya bar gyur nas des sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi don byas te/_phyis sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de nas 
[\[17a.3\]]srog chags brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rgyal po stobs chen dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin gyi drung du 'ongs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas skra dang 
[\[17a.4\]]kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/de ltar de dag kyang rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bzung ste/_kun chub par byas/_bcangs shing bklags nas bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas so/_/
[\[17a.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis de dag bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shu'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma song ste/_bskal pa thams cad la yang sangs rgyas bye ba rnams mnyes par byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bzung ste/_
[\[17a.6\]]kun chub par byas bcangs shing bklags nas bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas te/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shu 'das pa dang /_de'i 'og tu bskal pa 'bum tshang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[17a.7\]]sangs rgyas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan dpa' brtan zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du byung ste/_de dag gis kyang sems can dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byas shing /_de dag gi don byas nas de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi mya 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na rnam grangs 'di nyid kyis 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gces spras byed pa yin te/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa sdud pa yin 
[\[17b.2\]]par rig par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di nyid rgyas par tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/ngas dran bsam gyis mi khyab bskal pa na/_/'das pa'i dus na mi yi gtso bo ni/_/drang 
[\[17b.3\]]srong chen po 'jig rten don mdzad byung /_/de yi mtshan ni dbyangs kyi byin zhes bya/_/bye brag brgyad cur yongs su tshang ba yi/_/de yi nyan thos 'khor mang dang po byung /_/gnyis pa bye ba bdun cur tshang ba byung /_/gsum pa dgra bcom bye ba drug cu yod/_/kun kyang zag pa zad cing nyon 
[\[17b.4\]]mongs med/_/thams cad rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis pha rol phyin/_/tshe tshad lo ni stong phrag bzhi bcu ste/_/zhing yang yongs su dag cing mdzes par gyur/_/skyob pa de yi byang chub sems dpa' gang byung ba/_/dpag med de dag gzhan phan dbang bskur thob/_/dbang dang sa la rab tu gnas pa 
[\[17b.5\]]ste/_/shing mchog drung du byang chub 'tshang rgyar nye/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po byung ba ni/_/stobs brtan dang ni stobs chen zhes bya ba/_/gcig ni de yi phyed dbang rgyal po byed/_/cig shos phyed la dbang ba'i rgyal por gyur/_/rgyal po stobs chen rnam par rgyal ba'i sar/_/lha dang 
[\[17b.6\]]mis mchod sangs rgyas byung bar gyur/_/bde bar gshegs la rgyal po dad rnyed nas/_/lo grangs stong du tshang bar bsnyen bkur byas/_/sems can gzhan mang de yi rjes slob pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang bkur sti byed/_/'jig rten zang zing gis te chos kyis min/_/nyan thos 
[\[17b.7\]]bcas pa rnyed pa mang bar gyur/_/skyes bu dam pa'i sems ni 'di snyam ste/_/ci nas 'di kun 'dod pa rab spangs nas/_/nga yi bstan pa 'di la rab 'byung bar/_/chos 'dod 'di dag la ni chos bstan snyam/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sbyangs chos bslab pa dang /_/khyim gnas nyes pa sdug 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]bsngal mtha' yas dang /_/chos la sgrub pa chos kyi mchod yin zhes/_/mi mchog des ni tshigs su bcad pa gsungs/_/sa bdag rgyal pos tshigs bcad de thos nas/_/mi dbang gcig pu dben song bsams pa ni/_/khyim na gnas bzhin du yang thams cad kyis/_/chos kyi 
[\[18a.2\]]mchod mchog bya bar mi nus snyam/_/mchil ma bzhin du rgyal srid des btang ste/_/srog chags stong phrag brgyad cur bcas pa dag_/rgyal ba de yi drung du nyer 'ongs te/_/zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas ni spyan sngar 'dug_/rgyal bas de dag gi yang bsam mkhyen nas/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 
[\[18a.3\]]blta dka' 'di bshad de/_/de dag dga' zhing rab mos bde bas tshim/_/mgu zhing rangs pas de tshe rab tu byung /_/de dag rab byung ting 'dzin 'di bzung ste/_/bcangs shing bklags te yongs su chub byas nas/_/bskal pa bye ba nyi shu tshang bar ni/_/nam yang ngan 'gro log ltung song ma gyur/_/
[\[18a.4\]]de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong legs par mthong /_/rgyal ba de dag kun gyi bstan pa la/_/de dag rab byung ting 'dzin 'di la bsgom/_/de dag phyi ma'i dus la sangs rgyas gyur/_/mtha' yas brtson pa ming ni dpa' brtan yin/_/srog chags 
[\[18a.5\]]bye ba mang po'i don byas te/_/phyi ma'i dus la me bzhin mya ngan 'das/_/sngon tshe rgyal po stobs chen byung ba ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes dpa' ba 'jig rten byung /_/de tshe srog chags bye stong mang po rnams/_/byang chub bkod nas phyi dus mya ngan 'das/_/de phyir sangs rgyas dag gis brjod pa yi/_/
[\[18a.6\]]mdo 'di phyi dus thos nas gzung bar gyis/_/'di lta bu yi chos mdzod 'di bzung na/_/mi yi gtso bor myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/dbyangs byin gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon 
[\[18a.7\]]nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/gzhon nu de la ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyang ba gang 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos snying rje chen po la zhugs pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la 'di lta ste/_chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams 
[\[18b.2\]]dang me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan rnams dang rol mo dang sil snyan rnams kyis mchod par bya ba la brtson pa yin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang ting nge 'dzin thob par yongs su bsngo'o/_/de chos 
[\[18b.3\]]gang la yang re ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par mi byed de/_'dod pa la re ba ma yin/_longs spyod la re ba ma yin/_mtho ris la re ba ma yin/_'khor ba la re ba ma yin gyi de ni chos la sems pa yin no/_/de 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skur yang mi dmigs na de 
[\[18b.4\]]gzugs kyi skur lta ga la zhig dmigs par 'gyur/_gzhon nu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa de ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ba dang /_bdag nyid mi dmigs pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'o/_/gzhon nu 'khor 
[\[18b.5\]]gsum yongs su dag pa'i mchod pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod na ting nge 'dzin 'di rab tu 'thob cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la ting nge 'dzin 
[\[18b.6\]]yongs su sbyang ba bstan pa 'di rgyas par tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/ye shes mtha' yas pa la spos phul bas/_/skyes bu rnams kyi dri yang mtha' yas 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye bar ngan 'gror de mi 'gro_/de dag dri bsung nga bar yong mi 'gyur/_/
[\[18b.7\]]de dag bskal pa bye bar spyad spyod cing /_/sangs rgyas bye ba stong la mchod byas nas/_/de dag ye shes spos kyis mngon 'phags te/_/sangs rgyas tshul khrims dri mchog ldan par 'gyur/_/gal te sems can gang dag spos byin dang /_/de bzhin gang la sbyin par bya ba dang /_/sems 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]'dis sbyin par byed pa med shes na/_/de ni de yi 'thun bzod chung ngu yin/_/bzod pa chen po bsten pa de la ni/_/bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/mi yis kham tshad tsam du bcad gtubs kyang /_/de yi sems ni ldog par yong mi 'gyur/_/ci yi phyir na 
[\[19a.2\]]bzod pa'i ming du gdags/_/ji ltar rjes su 'thun pa zhes kyang bya/_/gang gi rgyus ni phyir mi ldog ces bya/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang brjod/_/rang bzhin bdag med chos la de bzod de/_/bdag med 'du shes pa la nyon mongs med/_/chos rnams thams cad 
[\[19a.3\]]nam mkha' ji bzhin shes/_/de phyir de la bzod pa'i ming du btags/_/rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su 'thun slob cing /_/mkhas pa de ni chos min mi spyod de/_/sangs rgyas chos la the tsom mi skyed pa/_/de ni rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yin/_/de ltar spyod pa dag la 'jig rten na/_/ji 
[\[19a.4\]]snyed bdud yod sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur nas/_/byang chub rnyed dkas nyan thos gyis shig ces/_/tshig tu smra yang mi 'dzin ldog mi 'gyur/_/sems can mi 'thun lta las rtog byed cing /_/mi 'chi 'thob pa'i lam ni 'di'o zhes/_/log pa'i lam spangs lam la 'jog par byed/_/
[\[19a.5\]]de phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/rjes su 'thun bzod lam la gnas pa dang /_/bdag med shes pas sad par byas pa la/_/rmi lam na yang mi dang gang zag dang /_/srog dang sems can yod par yong mi 'dzin/_/bdud rnams bye ba gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/sangs 
[\[19a.6\]]rgyas gzugs bsgyur de dag drung 'ongs te/_/lus kyi nang na srog med gyur na ni/_/khyed cag sangs rgyas 'grub pa min zhes smra/_/ye shes kyis ni phung po stong par shes/_/shes nas nyon mongs rnams dang nga mi 'grogs/_/tha snyad tsam gyis rnam par spyod byed cing /_/'jig 
[\[19a.7\]]rten 'di na mya ngan 'das par gnas/_/ji ltar skyes bu dag gi bu skyes nas/_/'di yi ming ni 'di zhes ming btags pa/_/phyogs rnams su yang de yi ming mi rnyed/_/ming de gang nas kyang ni 'ongs pa med/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' ming btags te/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]'di zhes yongs btsal kyang /_/phyogs rnams na yang de yi ming mi rnyed/_/de ltar gang shes byang chub sems dpa' yin/_/rgya mtsho'i dbus nas ji ste me 'bar yang /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig tshogs lta ba med/_/'di ltar byang chub sems bskyed tshun chad ni/_/de la srog tu lta 
[\[19b.2\]]bar 'gyur ba med/_/'di la gang yang skyes shing shi med de/_/ming dang shed skyes sems can byung ba med/_/chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa sgyu ma bzhin/_/mu stegs can gyis rnam par rig mi nus/_/kha zas dag la shin tu brkam pa dang /_/lhung bzed gos la chags shing zhen med dang /_/
[\[19b.3\]]'phyar ba rnams dang khengs pa dag gis kyang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni shes mi nus/_/gnyid dang rmugs pas non pas le lo can/_/nga rgyal can dang khrel med 'gying ba dang /_/su dag sangs rgyas la ni dad med pa/_/de dag byang chub dam pa shes mi nus/_/tshul nyams pa yi 
[\[19b.4\]]so so'i skye bo dang /_/gang dag chos la dad pa med pa dang /_/tshangs pa mtshungs spyod dag la ri mo med/_/de dag byang chub 'di ni rtogs mi nus/_/tshul ma nyams shing khrel yod ngo tsha shes/_/chos dang sangs rgyas dag la gang dga' zhing /_/tshangs pa mtshungs spyod dag la rab tu gus/_/de 
[\[19b.5\]]dag byang chub dam pa mchog 'thob 'gyur/_/gang dag spyod yul dran pa nye bar gzhag_/bde zhing dga' ba'i mal du zhugs pa dang /_/zas su bsam gtan skom du ting nge 'dzin/_/de dag gis kyang byang chub mchog rab 'thob/_/bdag med pa yi 'du shes nyin par gnas/_/'chag 
[\[19b.6\]]sar stong pa dang ni rjes su dran/_/byang chub yan lag me tog yid 'ong bsung /_/brtson pa de dag byang chub dam pa thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa'i spyod pa dag_/skye bo gzhan rnams dang ni nyan thos dang /_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang ma yin na/_/de la rtogs par su zhig 
[\[19b.7\]]'dun mi skyed/_/gal te bskal bye gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/de srid du ni tshe yi tshad gyur nas/_/ngas ni sangs rgyas kyi yang ye shes kyi/_/spu gcig bsngags pa brjod kyang mthar mi phyin/_/de phyir zil gyis mi non rgyal ba yis/_/bshad pa'i phan yon 'di dag thos nas ni/_/
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]ting 'dzin 'di ni myur du lung mnod kyis/_/byang chub mchog ni rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyang ba bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu 
[\[20a.2\]]de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas bzod pa gsum gyi ye shes la mkhas par bya'o/_/des bzod pa dang po rab tu shes par bya/_
[\[20a.3\]]bzod pa gnyis pa rab tu shes par bya/_bzod pa gsum pa rab tu shes par bya ste/_bzod pa gsum gyi khyad par la mkhas par bya'o/_/bzod pa gsum gyi ye shes kyi khyad par la mkhas par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di ltar nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[20a.4\]]chen po bzod pa gsum gyi khyad par la mkhas par gyur cing /_bzod pa gsum gyi ye shes kyi khyad par la mkhas par gyur pa de'i tshe gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de myur du ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob cing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[20a.5\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas bzod pa gsum la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o/_/bzung nas kyang 
[\[20a.6\]]gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ste/_de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon 
[\[20a.7\]]nur gyur pa la bzod pa gsum la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/su dag dang yang rtsod par mi byed cing /_/don med ldan pa'i tshig rnams mi smra ste/_/don dang chos la rtag par rab tu gnas/_/'di dag bzod pa 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]dang por bshad pa yin/_/chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma 'drar shes te/_/de ni mtshan ma'i spyod yul ldan ma yin/_/ye shes 'phel ba'i sa las mi nyams te/_/'di dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro/_/mdo sde'i tshul kun la yang de mkhas shing /_/legs par smras la mkhas 
[\[20b.2\]]pa shin tu mos/_/bder gshegs mkhyen la mtha' yas ye shes can/_/'di dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro/_/legs par bshad pa'i chos ni gang thos kyang /_/sangs rgyas dag gis bshad par the tshom med/_/rgyal ba kun gyi chos la de mos te/_/'di dag bzod pa dang 
[\[20b.3\]]po'i khyad par ro/_/stong pa bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa ltar/_/nges don mdo sde dag gi bye brag shes/_/gang las sems can gang zag skyes bu bstan/_/chos de thams cad drang ba'i don du shes/_/'jig rten 'di na mu stegs mang yod pa/_/de dag la yang de ni yid mi khro/_/
[\[20b.4\]]de dag la ni snying rje nye bar 'jog_/'di dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro/_/de la gzungs rnams yongs su snang bar 'gyur/_/snang ba de la nam yang the tshom med/_/bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig smras te/_'di dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro/_/rlung dang chu dang me dang sa rnams 
[\[20b.5\]]kyi/_khams bzhi po ni rnam pa gzhan 'gyur yang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub las ni de mi ldog_/'di dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro/_/'jig rten bzo gnas mang po ci yod pa/_/thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des bslabs te/_/bdag las lhag pa su yang mi mthong ba/_/
[\[20b.6\]]'di dag bzod pa dang po'i khyad par ro/_/zhi gnas stobs kyis bskyod pa med gyur cing /_/lhag mthong gis ni ri bo lta bur gyur/_/sems can kun gyis 'khrugs par mi nus te/_/de ni bzod pa gnyis su bshad pa yin/_/mnyam par bzhag bzhin du ni ldang zhing smra/_/mnyam par bzhag 
[\[20b.7\]]pas 'dug cing 'chag par byed/_/mkhas pa ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol phyin/_/'di dag bzod pa gnyis pa'i khyad par ro/_/mnyam par bzhag pas mngon shes lnga thob ste/_/chos rnams ston cing zhing ni brgyar yang 'gro/_/de ni rdzu 'phrul stobs las mi nyams te/_/'di dag bzod pa 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]gnyis pa'i khyad par ro/_/de ni de 'dra'i ting 'dzin zhi ba bstan/_/mnyam par bzhag pa de yi sems kyi tshod/_/'dzin nus pa yi sems can gang yang med/_/'di dag bzod pa gnyis pa'i khyad par ro/_/'jig rten 'di na gang yod sems can kun/_/de dag sangs rgyas 
[\[21a.2\]]mkhyen pas chos ston kyang /_/bshad pa thams cad de bzhin 'dzin nus te/_/'di dag bzod pa gnyis pa'i khyad par ro/_/shar dang lho dang nub dang byang phyogs dang /_/steng dang 'og dang de bzhin phyogs mtshams ni/_/thams cad na yang 'jig rten mgon po mthong /_/de ni bzod pa 
[\[21a.3\]]gsum par bstan pa yin/_/gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sku lus su/_/'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab sprul nas ni/_/srog chags bye ba mang la chos ston te/_/'di dag bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'di'i 'dzam bu'i gling kun na/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni 
[\[21a.4\]]snang bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten lha dang lha min bcas par grags/_/'di dag bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul de bzhin cho ga dang /_/bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba/_/kun la byang chub sems dpa' des bslabs te/_/'di dag bzod pa gsum 
[\[21a.5\]]pa'i khyad par ro/_/'jig rten khams 'di sems can ci yod pas/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsngags pa brjod gyur la/_/de la yid ni rjes su dgar byed na/_/sangs rgyas ye shes la ni bslabs ma yin/_/'jig rten khams 'di'i sems can su yod pas/_/byang chub sems dpa' la ni 
[\[21a.6\]]mi snyan brjod/_de dag la ni yid kyis khro byed na/_/da dung sangs rgyas ye shes des ma bslabs/_/nor rnyed pas ni yid bder mi 'gyur te/_/nor rnams ma rnyed na yang mi dga' med/_/ri dang 'dra ba'i sems la rtag tu gnas/_/'di dag bzod pa gsum pa'i khyad par ro/_/sgra 
[\[21a.7\]]yi rjes 'gro bzod pa 'di bstan te/_/bsam pa sgom pa rjes su 'thun pa dang /_/thos pa las byung de ni skye ba med/_/'di la gang bslabs de ni byang chub lam/_/bzod pa bla na med pa gsum po 'di/_/byang chub sems dpas nam zhig thob gyur na/_/mi mchog bde bar gshegs 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]pa des mthong ste/_/rdul med byang chub tu yang de lung ston/_/de nas lung bstan pa ni de thob nas/_/sa yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/_/zhing rnams 'od kyis shin tu gsal bar gyur/_/lha rnams bye ba me tog char pa 'bebs/_/de la lung bstan de yang thos nas ni/_/sems can 
[\[21b.2\]]bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas kyang /_/bdag cag mchod rten rgyal bar 'gyur snyam ste/_/byang chub dam pa mchog la sems skyed 'gyur/_/nam zhig bla med bzod pa gsum po 'di/_/byang chub sems dpas thob par gyur pa na/_/de ni mi skye 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/_/de la 'chi 'pho med cing skye
