[\[21b.3\]]ba'ang med/_/nam zhig bla med bzod pa gsum po 'di/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpas thob gyur na/_/skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'ang mi mthong ste/_/chos rnams thams cad chos nyid gnas par mthong /_/'di ltar mi bden par ni des rig ste/_/chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur rang bzhin 
[\[21b.4\]]stong /_/stong pa dag kyang mi mthong 'chi ba'ang med/_/chos 'di thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_/nam zhig la las de la gus byas shing /_/rim gro bkur sti mchod pa byas na yang /_/de la yid ni dga' bar mi byed de/_/chos rnams rang bzhin stong par de yis shes/_/sems can 
[\[21b.5\]]dag gis spyos bsdigs brdegs na yang /_/de dag la ni nga rgyal khro mi srid/_/de dag sems can thar par bya ba'i phyir/_/de dag la ni byams pa brtan par skyed/_/rdo dang dbyug pa dag gis brdegs btsogs kyang /_/mkhas pa de la khro bar mi byed de/_/bdag med bzod la rab tu 
[\[21b.6\]]gnas pa la/_/nga rgyal dang ni khro ba'i tha ba med/_/'di ltar des ni mi bden nyid du shes/_/sgyu ma lta bur chos rnams rang bzhin stong /_/chos tshul de 'dra ba la de gnas na/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten dag na shin tu bkur/_/nam zhig sems can dag ni mtshon thogs nas/_/de yi 
[\[21b.7\]]lus dang yan lag mang gtubs kyang /_/de dag la ni yid kyis khro ba med/_/snying rje byams pa las kyang nyams mi 'gyur/_/de dag lus dang yan lag gcod pa'i tshe/_/de ni de la 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_/'di dag byang chub mchog la ma bkod par/_/de srid zhi bar mya ngan nga mi 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]'da'/_/de 'dra'i bzod stobs bla na med pa la/_/bdag med bzod pa mnyam nyid gnas pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po yis/_/bskal pa bye bar rtag tu shin tu bsgoms/_/de las lhag par gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/ji tsam sangs rgyas mkhyen pas don 
[\[22a.2\]]mi byed/_/de srid byang chub reg pa ma yin na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ci zhig smos/_/grags pa chen po brjod pa mtha' yas pa/_/bdag med bzod la rab tu gnas pa yi/_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgyar brjod kyang /_/de yi bsngags pa zad par sla ba min/_/de phyir byang 
[\[22a.3\]]chub mchog rab bla na med/_/ye shes phung po 'tshang rgyar su 'dod pa/_/de ni rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bzod pa sgoms/_/byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/bzod pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od 
[\[22a.4\]]gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing /_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[22a.5\]]kyi ye shes la mkhas par bya'o/_/gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad dngos po med pa/_ngo bo nyid 
[\[22a.6\]]med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_yi ge med pa/_stong pa/_gzod ma nas zhi ba/_rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin par rab tu shes par bya'o/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nam chos thams cad 
[\[22a.7\]]dngos po med pa/_ngo bo nyid med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_yi ge med pa/_stong pa/_gzod ma nas zhi ba/_rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin par rab tu shes par gyur pa de'i tshe gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pa de ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos thams 
[\[22b.2\]]cad la 'dod chags par mi byed/_zhe sdang bar mi byed/_gti mug par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /_chos de mi dmigs te/_gang 'dod chags pa dang gang la 'dod chags pa dang gang gis 'dod chags pa dang gang zhe sdang ba 
[\[22b.3\]]dang gang la zhe sdang ba dang gang gis zhe sdang ba dang gang gti mug pa dang gang la gti mug pa dang gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos de des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs so/_/chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing ma dmigs na khams gsum thams cad la ma chags par 
[\[22b.4\]]'gyur te myur du ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa ste/_/thams cad mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med/_/skyes pa med cing 
[\[22b.5\]]'gags pa med par yang /_/de ltar chos rnams shin tu rig par gyis/_/thams cad dngos po med cing yi ge med/_/stong pa zhi ba gzod nas dri ma med/_/de ltar chos rnams gang gis shes pa ni/_/gzhon nu de ni sangs rgyas zhes kyang brjod/_/de phyir rang bzhin mnyam nyid rnams 
[\[22b.6\]]spros pa/_/ngo bo nyid kyis chos kun rang bzhin med/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i yum 'di su 'dod pa/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi yum 'di 'thob par 'gyur/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa 
[\[22b.7\]]bas kyang ches grangs med pa/_rgya che ba/_gzhal du med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/gzhon nu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dngos po med pa 
[\[23a.2\]]las byung ba zhes bya zhe na/_gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa de skyes ma thag tu steng gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun tsam du 'phags nas gom pa bdun bor te tshig 'di skad gsung ngo /_/chos thams cad dngos po med pa las byung ba'o/_/chos thams cad dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes gsungs te/_gzhon nu 
[\[23a.3\]]sgra de'i dbyangs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams go bar byas so/_/de nas sa'i lha nas bzung ste tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra bsgrags shing dbyangs kyis rjes su go bar byas te/_e ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skyes ma thag tu steng gi nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 
[\[23a.4\]]'phags nas gom pa bdun bor te/_dngos po med pa'i sgra 'byin pa las na dngos po med pa las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes mtshan dngos po med pa las byung ba/_dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes btags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de byang chub thob pa na shing thams cad kyi lo ma dang rtsa ba dang shing 
[\[23a.5\]]gel pa dang nags tshal thams cad dang ri'i rtse mo thams cad las kyang dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes sgra byung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de na sgrar btags pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad las dngos po med pa las byung ba'o zhes rnam par rig par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[23a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba de'i gsung rab la rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa zhig byung ngo /_/gzhon nu de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje 
[\[23a.7\]]chen po sems de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dngos po med pa las byung bas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje chen po sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad do/_/de ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rab tu 
[\[23b.2\]]dad de sems rab tu dad pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bzung ste/_/bzung zhing bcangs bklags kun chub par byas nas bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas te/_de dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[23b.3\]]ba des bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur nam yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma song ngo /_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad las kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan to/_/sangs rgyas de dag thams cad las mnyan nas kyang bzung ngo kun chub par byas so/_/
[\[23b.4\]]bcangs so/_/bklags so/_/bton to/_/nyon mongs pa med par bsgoms shing mang du byas te/_bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par gnas so/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa nyi shu 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don 
[\[23b.5\]]legs par bsams pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_des sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byas sems can tshad med pa'i don byas nas de'i 'og tu shing zad pa'i me ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 
[\[23b.6\]]'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces spras byed pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di nyid rgyas par tshigs 
[\[23b.7\]]su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/sngon 'das dus kyi bskal pa bsam yas na/_/mi yi gtso bo byung ba ngas dran te/_/drang srong chen po gzengs kyis don mdzad pa/_/de ming dngos po med las byung zhes bya/_/skyes ma thag tu mkha' la rab 'dug nas/_/
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]chos rnams thams cad dngos po med par bstan/_/de tshe de dang 'thun par mtshan btags te/_/sgras ni 'jig rten kun tu grags par byas/_/lha rnams thams cad rab tu sgra 'byin pa/_/dngos po med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/skyes ma thag tu gom pa bdun bor 
[\[24a.2\]]te/_/rgyal bas chos rnams dngos po med par bshad/_/thub pa chos rnams thams cad ston pa yi/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal por nam 'gyur tshe/_/rtsi shing gel ba ri dang brag rnams las/_/chos rnams dngos po med ces sgra yang byung /_/'jig rten de na ji snyed sgra yod pa/_/thams 
[\[24a.3\]]cad dngos med ci yang med pa zhes/_/de lta bur ni 'jig rten 'dren pa yi/_/sgra dbyangs rnam pa shin tu byung bar gyur/_/de yi dus na rgyal po'i bu skyes pa/_/ming ni rtag tu snying rje sems zhes bya/_/shin tu gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa zhig_/rgyal ba de yi drung du nyer 'ongs te/_/thub 
[\[24a.4\]]pa khyu mchog zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_/ri mor bcas pas bskor bar byas nas ni/_/rdul bral bla na med pa'i chos mnyan phyir/_/rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis der 'dug go/_/rgyal ba dpa' bo des ni bsam mkhyen nas/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu bshad pa mdzad/_/des ni 
[\[24a.5\]]rdul bral ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/_/rgyal mchog bstan la myur bar rab tu byung /_/rab tu de byung ting 'dzin 'di yang ni/_/bzung zhing bklags te yongs su chub byas pas/_/bskal pa bye ba nyi shu tshang bar ni/_/log par ltung ba'i sar yang yong ma song /_/de ni dge bar byas pa'i 
[\[24a.6\]]las de yis/_/sangs rgyas bye phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas/_/rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du yang /_/ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni goms par byas/_/de phyis 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas gyur/_/ming ni don legs bsams zhes rtag tu brjod/_/sems can bye ba mang po'i 
[\[24a.7\]]don byas nas/_/phyi ma'i dus la me bzhin mya ngan 'das/_/dngos po med pa las byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/_bam po gsum pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji ltar na bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /_sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[24b.2\]]dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya/_/gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_bklag par bya/_rab tu 
[\[24b.3\]]gdon par bya/_lung nod cing kha ton du bya/_nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom par bya/_mang du bya/_gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di ni 
[\[24b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyed pa ste/_'di las de bzhin gshegs pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad byung ngo /_/gzhon nu de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[24b.5\]]thams cad skyed pa/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po gzung bar bya'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_de phyir byang chub tu ni 'tshang rgya zhing /_/srid pa'i mtsho las sems can sgrol 'dod pas/_/sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mdo sde 'di zung 
[\[24b.6\]]shig_/byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[24b.7\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]shes par bya'o/_/chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang brag ca lta bu dang mig yor lta bu dang chu zla lta bu dang sprul pa lta bu dang gzugs brnyan lta bu dang nam mkha' lta bur rab tu shes par bya'o/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nam chos thams 
[\[25a.2\]]cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes shing /_chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang brag ca lta bu dang mig yor lta bu dang chu zla lta bu dang sprul pa lta bu dang gzugs brnyan lta bu dang nam mkha' lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes pa de'i tshe/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[25a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po 'di chos zab mo bzod pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/chos zab mo bzod pa dang ldan pa de 'dod chags par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi chags/_zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i chos la mi sdang /_gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos la mi rmongs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos 
[\[25a.4\]]de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chos de mi dmigs te/_gang 'dod chags pa dang gang la 'dod chags pa dang gang gis 'dod chags pa dang gang zhe sdang ba dang gang la zhe sdang ba dang gang gis zhe sdang ba dang gang gti mug pa dang gang la gti mug pa dang gang gis gti mug par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[25a.5\]]chos de des yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos de mi dmigs so/_/chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs pas 'dod chags pa med pa/_zhe sdang ba med pa/_gti mug pa med pa/_sems phyin ci ma log pa/_mnyam par bzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/spros pa med pa 
[\[25a.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/rgal ba pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/skam la phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/bde bar son pa zhes bya'o/_/mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya'o/_/tshul khrims can zhes bya'o/_/ye shes can zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can zhes bya'o/_/bsod nams can zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[25a.7\]]can zhes bya'o/_/dran pa can zhes bya'o/_/blo gros can zhes bya'o/_/rtogs pa can zhes bya'o/_/ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/brtan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa med 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/ci 'ang med pa zhes bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/_/zag pa zad pa zhes bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_
[\[25b.2\]]khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dge sbyong zhes bya'o/_/bram ze zhes bya'o/_/
[\[25b.3\]]khrus byas pa zhes bya'o/_/pha rol tu song ba zhes bya'o/_/rig par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/gtsang sbra can zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi sras zhes bya'o/_/shAkya'i sras zhes bya'o/_/tsher ma dkrugs pa zhes bya'o/_/khrims ma dral ba zhes bya'o/_/'obs dral ba zhes bya'o/_/'obs las 
[\[25b.4\]]rgal ba ces bya'o/_/zug rngu phyung ba ces bya'o/_/nad med pa ces bya'o/_/dge slong zhes bya'o/_/kun nas dkris pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/skyes bu zhes bya'o/_/skyes bu dam pa zhes bya'o/_/skyes bu mchog ces bya'o/_/skyes bu chen po zhes bya'o/_/skyes bu seng ge zhes bya'o/_/skyes 
[\[25b.5\]]bu glang po che zhes bya'o/_/skyes bu cang shes pa zhes bya'o/_/skyes bu lcid khyer ba ces bya'o/_/skyes bu dpa' bo ces bya'o/_/skyes bu rtsal po che zhes bya'o/_/skyes bu me tog ces bya'o/_/skyes bu pad ma zhes bya'o/_/skyes bu pad ma dkar po zhes bya'o/_/skyes bu 'dul ba zhes bya'o/_/skyes 
[\[25b.6\]]bu zla ba zhes bya'o/_/skyes bu phal pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/mi gos pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos zab mo'i bzod pa la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/nam zhig 'jig rten khams 'di 'byung ba dang /_/
[\[25b.7\]]'jig rten thams cad nam mkhar gyur pa'i tshe/_/ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin te/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/'jig rten 'di na ji snyed ci yod pa/_/chu yi phung po 'di ni 'og tu 'gro_/'og tu ci 'drar steng du'ang de bzhin te/_/chos rnams thams cad 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]de bzhin shes par gyis/_/ji ltar bar snang cung zad sprin med las/_/skad cig tu ni sprin gyi dkyil 'khor snang /_/thog ma ga las byung bar shes par bya/_/de bzhin chos rnams thams cad shes par gyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das pa dag_/ji ltar yid la byas 
[\[26a.2\]]bzhin gzugs brnyan snang /_/sngon mtha' ji bzhin phyis kyang de bzhin te/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/ji ltar dbu ba mang po rdos pa dag_/chu bos khyer ba skyes bus nges mthong ste/_/de la brtags na snying po yong mi snang /_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes 
[\[26a.3\]]par gyis/_/ji ltar char pa'i thigs chen bab pa na/_/chu yi chu bur dag ni tha dad 'byung /_/byung nas zhig ste chu yi chu bur med/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/ji ltar spring yig grong gzhan bskur ba las/_/dge dang mi dge'i bya ba so sor 'byung /_/sgra las spring yig 
[\[26a.4\]]tu yang 'phos pa med/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/ji ltar mi dag chang gis myos nas ni/_/sa 'di kun tu 'khor snyam byed mod kyi/_/sa 'di 'gul zhing g.yos pa'ang med pa ltar/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/me long ngos dang 'bru 
[\[26a.5\]]mar snod rnams la/_/bud med kha bzhin rgyan pas bltas pa na/_/byis pa de ni de la chags bskyed nas/_/'dod pa tshol ba'i phyir yang shin tu rgyug_/bzhin ni der yang 'phos pa ma yin te/_/gzugs brnyan la ni nam yang bzhin mi rnyed/_/rmongs pa de dag 'dod chags skyes pa 
[\[26a.6\]]ltar/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/ji ltar smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang /_/sgyu ma ji bzhin rmi lam ji lta bur/_/mtshan ma sgom pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong /_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/ji ltar nam mkha' dang bar zla shar ba/_/de yi gzugs brnyan 
[\[26a.7\]]dang ba'i mtshor snang ste/_/zla ba chu yi nang du 'phos pa med/_/chos kun mtshan nyid de 'drar shes par gyis/_/ji ltar mi dag nags ri'i khrod 'dug nas/_/glu len smra dang rgod dang ngu ba las/_/brag ca thos kyang snang ba med pa ltar/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]glu dang rol mo de bzhin ngu ba yang /_/de la brten nas brag ca 'byung mod kyi/_/sgra la dbyangs de nam yang yod ma yin/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod bsten pa/_/skyes bu sad par gyur nas mi mthong ste/_/byis pa shin tu 'dod la chags 
[\[26b.2\]]shing zhen/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/sgyu ma byed pa dag gis gzugs sprul te/_/rta dang glang po shing rta sna tshogs byas/_/de la ji ltar snang ba gang yang med/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/ji ltar bu mo gzhon nu'i rmi lam na/_/bu pho 
[\[26b.3\]]byung zhing shi ba des mthong nas/_/byung nas dga' zhing shi nas mi dga' ltar/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/ji ltar mtshan mo chu yi zla ba dag_/dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i chu nang snang /_/chu zla stong pa gsog ste gzung du med/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin 
[\[26b.4\]]shes par gyis/_/ji ltar sos ka'i nyi ma phyed dus na/_/skyes bu skom pas gdungs shing 'gro ba yis/_/smig rgyu dag la chu yi phung por mthong /_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/smig rgyu la yang chu ni yong med na/_/sems can rmongs pa de la 'thung 'dod de/_/
[\[26b.5\]]mi bden chu ni 'thung bar yong mi nus/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/ji ltar chu shing rlon pa'i sdong po la/_/snying po 'dod phyir skyes bus de gshags kyang /_/nang dang phyi rol kun na snying po med/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/mig dang rna 
[\[26b.6\]]ba sna yang tshad ma min/_/lce dang lus dang sems kyang tshad ma min/_/dbang po 'di dag gal te tshad yin na/_/'phags pa'i lam gyis su la ci zhig bya/_/'di ltar dbang po 'di dag tshad min zhing /_/ngo bo nyid kyis bems po lung ma bstan/_/de phyir mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam 'dod pa/_/des ni 
[\[26b.7\]]'phags pa'i lam gyis bya ba byos/_/lus la sngon gyi mtha' ma rab brtags na/_/de la lus med lus su 'du shes med/_/gang la lus med lus su shes med pa/_/de ni 'dus ma byas kyi rigs zhes bya/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i chos la chos med de/_/gang phyir 'di med nam yang yod mi 'gyur/_/
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]rtog can dag gi yod dang med ces bya/_/de ltar spyod pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur/_/yod dang med ces bya ba gnyi ga mtha'/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang mtha' yin te/_/de phyir gnyis ka'i mtha' ni rnam spangs nas/_/mkhas pa dbus la'ang gnas par yong mi byed/_/yod 
[\[27a.2\]]dang med ces bya ba rtsod pa ste/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang 'di yang rtsod pa yin/_/rtsod par gyur pa sdug bsngal zhi mi 'gyur/_/rtsod pa med par gyur pa sdug bsngal 'gag_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam byas te/_/byis pa bdag nyid lus la mngon sum snyems/_/lus la mngon sum 
[\[27a.3\]]gyur pa rlom sems med/_/de ni rlom sems med do thams cad spangs/_/bsam gtan bzhi dag gi yang gtam byas nas/_/byis pa bdag nyid bsam gtan spyod yul smra/_/bsam gtan nyon mongs med cing rlom sems med/_/shes pas rtogs nas dregs pa rab tu spong /_/bden pa 
[\[27a.4\]]bzhi yi gtam rnams byas nas kyang /_/byis pa bdag nyid bden pa mthong zhes zer/_/bden pa mthong la rlom sems gang yang med/_/rlom sems med pa bden pa rgyal bas gsungs/_/tshul khrims srung zhing de yis snyems mi bya/_/chos rnams mnyan cing des ni mi bsnyems te/_/gang dag 
[\[27a.5\]]shes rab chung ngu de bsnyems pa/_/rtsa ba de las de yi sdug bsngal 'phel/_/'jig rten 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis/_/dregs pa sdug bsngal rtsa ba yin par bstan/_/rgyags pas dregs pa sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel/_/rlom sems med pa sdug bsngal 'gag par 'gyur/_/ji 
[\[27a.6\]]snyed chos mang yongs su chub byas nas/_/thos pas rgyags shing tshul khrims mi srung na/_/tshul khrims 'chal bas ngan 'gror de 'gro la/_/thos pa mang pos de la skyob mi nus/_/gal te tshul khrims grags pas de rgyags shing /_/mang du thos la brtson par mi byed na/_/tshul khrims 
[\[27a.7\]]'bras bu ma lus zad nas ni/_/phyir yang sdug bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten dag na ting 'dzin sgom byed kyang /_/de ni bdag tu 'du shes gzhig mi byed/_/de yi nyon mongs phyir yang rab tu ldang /_/lhag spyod kyis ni ting 'dzin 'dir bsgoms bzhin/_/gal te bdag med 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]chos la rab rtog cing /_/de dag brtags nas gal te sgom byed na/_/'bras bu mya ngan 'das thob rgyu de yin/_/rgyu gzhan de dag zhi bar 'gyur mi srid/_/mi zhig chom rkun mang pos rab gtses nas/_/'tsho bar 'dod pas bros shing 'gror brtsal na/_/de yi rkang pa 'gro zhing rgyug ma nus/_/
[\[27b.2\]]chom rkun dag gis de bzung bcom pa ltar/_/de bzhin tshul khrims nyams pa rmongs pa'i mi/_/'dus byas dag las 'bros par 'dod mod kyi/_/tshul khrims nyams pas de yang 'bros mi nus/_/na rga 'chi ba dag gis shin tu bcom/_/ji ltar mi rgod stong phrag mang po dag_/rnam pa du ma'i 
[\[27b.3\]]sgo nas sdigs byed pa/_/de bzhin nyon mongs sgo rnams du ma nas/_/mi rgod bzhin du dge ba'i phyogs rnams 'joms/_/gang gis phung po bdag med rab brtags te/_/spyos shing brgyad kyang zhum par mi 'gyur ba/_/nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang du de mi 'gro_/stong pa shes pa de la 'khrug 
[\[27b.4\]]pa med/_/'gro mang phung po stong par ston mod kyi/_/ji ltar bdag med de dag mi shes te/_/mi shes de dag gzhan gyis brgal na yang /_/khro ba'i zil gyis non cing tshig rtsub smra/_/mi dag na zhing lus ni sdug bsngal te/_/lo grangs mang por res 'ga' ma thar ba/_/de ni yun ring nad 
[\[27b.5\]]kyis nyon mongs pas/_/nad rnams gso ba'i phyir yang sman pa btsal/_/yang dang yang ni de yis btsal ba dang /_/sman pa mkhas shing rig pa des rnyed de/_/des kyang snying rje nye bar bzhag nas ni/_/sman 'di gtang bar gyis zhes smras pa dang /_/sman mang bzang zhing phangs pa des blangs 
[\[27b.6\]]nas/_/na ba 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i sman mi 'thung /_/sman pas ma lan sman gyis ma nyes te/_/nad pa de nyid kyis ni nyes pa yin/_/de bzhin bstan pa 'di la rab byung ste/_/stobs dang bsam gtan dbang po kun rig nas/_/sgom pa la ni mngon par brtson mi byed/_/rigs par mi brtson 
[\[27b.7\]]ga la mya ngan 'da'/_/rtag tu chos kun rang bzhin stong pa ste/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jig_/srid pa thams cad yong ye stong pa ste/_/nyi tshe'i stong pa mu stegs can dag gi/_/mkhas pa byis pa dag dang rtsod mi byed/_/byis pa dag ni ri mor byas nas spong /_/zhe 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]sdang sems kyis bdag gi drung 'ong zhes/_/byis pa'i chos la sten par yang mi byed/_/byis pa dag gi rang bzhin rgyud rig nas/_/mkhas pa byis pa dag dang mi 'grogs te/_/ji srid du ni byis pa legs bsnyen kyang /_/de dag phyir yang dgra dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/mkhas pa 
[\[28a.2\]]byis pa dag la yid mi rton/_/mkhas dang byis pa'i rang bzhin chos nyid ni/_/byis pa'i rang bzhin ngang tshul tha dad de/_/so so'i skye bo la ni mdza' ba med/_/chos dang ldan pa'i tshig tu smras na yang /_/yid mi ches dang zhe sdang khro ba dag_/mngon par ston pa 'di ni byis pa'i chos/_/don 
[\[28a.3\]]'di rnam par rig pas yid mi rton/_/byis pa dang ni byis par 'thun 'byor ba/_/ji ltar mi gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bzhin/_/mkhas pa dag ni mkhas pa'i skye bo dang /_/'thun zhing 'byor pa mar dang snying khu bzhin/_/'khor ba'i nyes la so sor ma brtags te/_/las kyi rnam par smin la mi 
[\[28a.4\]]'jug cing /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshig la ma dad pas/_/byis pa de dag bcad cing gtub par 'gyur/_/mi 'thob rab tu rnyed dka' thob nas ni/_/bzo yi gnas dag la ni mkhas ma gyur/_/dbul por gyur cing nor yang yong med de/_/de nas 'tsho ba med pas rab tu 'byung /_/
[\[28a.5\]]sangs rgyas bstan 'dir de dag rab byung nas/_/lhung bzed chos gos dag la chags par 'gyur/_/de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs zin pas/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bslab pa mi spyod de/_/de dag bdag gi tshul khrims ma mthong bas/_/byis pa dag ni sems gnas mi rnyed 
[\[28a.6\]]cing /_/nyin mtshan rnal 'byor la yang mi brtson pas/_/de dag sdig pa'i lam la smod mi byed/_/lus dang sems ni shin tu mi sdom pa/_/de ni tshig tu mi smra ci yang med/_/su yis nyes pa ci byas brgal lo zhes/_/rtag tu gzhan gyi nyes pa tshol zhing rtog_/byis pa dag ni zas la 
[\[28a.7\]]chags gyur nas/_/zas la tshod rig par ni mi byed de/_/sangs rgyas bsod nams kyis ni zas rnyed kyang /_/de la byis pa byas pa gzo mi 'gyur/_/de dag kha zas ro zhim bsod pa dag_/rnyed nas rnal 'byor mi brtson za zhing 'thung /_/de dag la ni zas de gdug par 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]'gyur/_/bal glang phru gus rtsa ba ma bkrus bzhin/_/mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa ni/_/kha zas bzang po gtsang ma za mod kyi/_/de dag la ni chags par mi 'gyur te/_/ma chags bzhin du za zhing rnal 'byor brtson/_/mkhas shing rtogs pa blo gros ldan pa dag_/byis pa 
[\[28b.2\]]gang nas legs par 'ongs zhes smra/_/de bzhin snyan pa'i tshig gis nyer bsdus nas/_/de dag la ni snying rje nye bar 'jog_/byis pa la ni gang phan snying brtse ba/_/de la gnod pa byung na byis pa dga'/_/de lta'i nyes phyir byis pa rnam spangs te/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du gcig pu 
[\[28b.3\]]dgon par gnas/_/mkhas pas 'di 'dra'i nyes pa rig nas ni/_/shes rab dman bsten bdag ni mtho ris nyams/_/byang chub thob par ga la 'gyur snyam ste/_/byis pa rnams dang nam yang yong mi sten/_/byams pa la ni mkhas pa gnas par 'gyur/_/snying rje dag la 
[\[28b.4\]]gnas shing dga' spyod dang /_/srid pa kun la rtag tu btang snyoms pa/_/ting nge 'dzin bsgoms byang chub reg par 'gyur/_/mya ngan med zhi byang chub des rtogs shing /_/sems can na rgas gzir bar rig nas ni/_/de la snying rje rab tu nyer bzhag ste/_/don dam ldan 
[\[28b.5\]]pa'i gtam rnams ston par byed/_/rgyal ba'i chos nyid brjod du med pa dang /_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bden pa sus shes pa/_/de dag 'di lta bu yi chos thos nas/_/'phags pa zang zing med pa'i bzod pa 'thob/_/chos zab mo la bzod pa'i le'u ste dgu 
[\[28b.6\]]pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na nan tan snying por bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[28b.7\]]dpa' chen po nan tan snying por byed pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par dka' ba ma yin na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos/_/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gdams pa dang /_/rjes su bstan pa 'di 
[\[29a.2\]]legs par bstan cing legs par bkod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad bstan te/_legs par bshad pa dang legs par bkod pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs 
[\[29a.3\]]rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma lags na mu stegs can gzhan gyi lta ci smos/_bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang nan tan snying por bgyis te lus dang srog la yang mi lta bar bgyis la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob bo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[29a.4\]]pa'i rjes su slob par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdud sdig can shin tu gzhig par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad 
[\[29a.5\]]'jigs pa thams cad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa bdag gi spyi bo la gzhag par gsol/_de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_nam mkha' 'dra zhing rdul bral gzugs bzang 'chang /_/shes rab sras po lus dang mtshan mi 
[\[29a.6\]]mnga'/_/yon tan rgya mtsho rab zab thugs rje can/_/mtshungs med phyag ni bdag gi spyi bor zhog_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las byung ba/_mtshan sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa/_lha'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu zla 
[\[29a.7\]]'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor bzhag go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pa bzhag ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha' mdzod dang rdo rje lta bu dang yid ltar mgyogs pa dang gzugs thams cad ston 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]pa dang sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ston pa dang stong pa nyid thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag mngon du gyur to/_/gzungs 
[\[29b.2\]]dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo du ma mngon du gyur to/_/dga' ba dang bde ba gang de 'phags pas brjod pa/_lha yul ba rgya che zhing dpe med pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul du rig pa rab tu thob bo/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dra bas mdzes 'brel bum 
[\[29b.3\]]pa lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' zhing /_/dpal be'u 'khor lo rgyal mtshan ba dan nya ris mnga'/_/bskal pa bye mang rin chen gtong la zhugs pa'i phyag_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nu'i spyi bor bzhag_/de nas lha yul pa rgya che zhing dpe med pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[29b.4\]]sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod yul du rig pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba dang ldan par gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 
[\[29b.5\]]'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/bla med mi 'jigs sbyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzhan phan sems can gnyen rtsa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/stobs bcu bden pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bde gshegs 
[\[29b.6\]]mi mnyam mnyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon po shin tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpa' bo dgra bzhi rnam par btul la phyag 'tshal lo/_/brtson pa dam pa'i don rnams mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kyi sku mchog mnga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/snying rje 
[\[29b.7\]]byams 'od rgyal ba'i nyi ma mun sel ba/_/shes rab shin tu yangs pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil du shar/_/don dam shin tu zab pa'i chos rnams ston mdzad pa/_/lha khyod la ni rtag tu bdag kyang skyabs su mchi/_/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sang bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol bar thugs la gnang bar 
[\[30a.2\]]mdzad du gsol/_de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_bdag gi sdum par gtsang ma'i bshos gsol bar/_/mi dbang sras dang bcas la gsol ba 'debs/_/thub pa'i dbang po bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/_/mgon po lha yi gtso bos gnang bar mdzod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs 
[\[30a.3\]]brtse ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du bshos gsol bar cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo /_/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar rig nas stan 
[\[30a.4\]]las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs nas de'i tshe 
[\[30a.5\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i bar du de'i bar gyi lam thams cad legs par brgyan te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lam yangs shing che la rtswa dang sdong du ma dang tsher ma dang rdo dang gyo mo dang gseg ma med par bsal te bye ma 
[\[30a.6\]]gtsang mas bdal nas/_ka tsa lin di ka ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde ba/_dbyangs dga' bar byas te/_lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_dri mchog dang /_a ti mug ta ka dang /_mA li ka dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_skya snar dang /_kun da 
[\[30a.7\]]dang /_ti la ka dang /_ke sa ra dang /_mya ngan 'tshang la sogs pa dus thams cad kyi me tog bzang pos ni kun tu khebs par byas/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang rin po che'i rta babs dang bla re ni bres/_rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod sna tshogs ni 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]ngos la spyangs/_rin po che'i bdug spos kyi snod de dag thams cad nas ni a ga ru nag pos gang ba'i du ba 'thul/_phyogs phyogs su ni bro mkhan dang gar mkhan lha'i glu gar dang rol mo shin tu 'byor cing legs par bslabs pa rnams bkod/_skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo 
[\[30b.2\]]shin tu brgyan pa khar rnga dang tu Na ba dang pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang pi bang dang gling bu dang rdza rnga dang rnga mu kun da dang rdza rnga chen po thogs pa rnams bkod/_lam gyi ngos gnyis su shing ta la mthon po lha'i rin po che sna tshogs dang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres shing sgra 'khrol 
[\[30b.3\]]bas brgyan pa rnams dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi mkha' rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing sna tshogs khrun dang sboms su ldan pa sna tshogs dang dus thams cad kyi lo ma dang /_me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dag btsugs so/_/de la 'di 
[\[30b.4\]]skad ces bya ste/_lam ni sna tshogs shin tu legs par brgyan/_/bla res dang ni gdugs dang ba dan sgreng /_/sil snyan dag gi sgra dag rab tu 'byin/_/glu sgra yid du 'ong ba'ang de bzhin te/_/bud med mang po bro rdung gar byed dang /_/gos bzang khrag khrig rnam mang sna tshogs dang /_/
[\[30b.5\]]me tog phreng ba bzang zhing mdzes pa yis/_/lam mchog yangs pa de ni rab tu brgyan/_/grong mchog gtsang ma 'dir ni thugs rje can/_/sangs rgyas thub pa'i zla ba gshegs so zhes/_/zla 'od gzhon nus dad pa rab bskyed nas/_/rgya che yangs pa'i lam ni shin tu brgyan/_/lha rdzas 
[\[30b.6\]]kyi ni bye ma gtsang ma bdal/_/rab tu yid 'ong me tog mchog rnams bkram/_/rin chen rta babs dag kyang legs par btsugs/_/lam ni lha yi grong khyer bzhin du mdzes/_/zla 'od gzhon nu shin tu yid dga' bas/_/de ltar lam rnams sna tshogs legs brgyan te/_lha dang 
[\[30b.7\]]lha min klu yis de mthong nas/_/ngo mtshar gyur cing a la la zhes smra/_/lam gyi g.yas g.yon 'dzam bu'i chu gser gyi/_/ta la mtho zhing bzang la zlum pa dag_/rin chen dril bu'i dra bas g.yogs shing dkris/_/sgra 'khrol rnam pa du ma mang po btsugs/_/de bzhin rin chen 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]sdong po khrag khrig ni/_/dus kun gyi yang me tog rgyas pa btsugs/_/de yis yangs pa'i lam brgyan mdzes gyur pa/_/mtho ris na ni dga' ba'i tshal bu bzhin/_/rin po che las byas pa'i mkha' rten ni/_/dra ba'i chun po 'od 'bar shin tu mdzes/_/dpe med mthong zhing che la rgyas 
[\[31a.2\]]pa dag_/lam gyi g.yas g.yon 'gram du btsugs shing bkod/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten gsum dbang gang nas ni/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong du gshegs pa yi/_/lam chen de ni de dag rab brgyan pas/_/rnam pa thams cad du yang mdzes par gyur/_/g.yas g.yos su ni rin chen 
[\[31a.3\]]pog phor dpyangs/_/de dag a ga ru yang nag pos bkang /_/pog phor kun nas du ba sprin bzhin 'khrigs/_/lha yi dri zhim rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung /_/ji srid grong khyer chu dron sgo bar dang /_/ri rgyal bya rgod phung po ji srid par/_/zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas rgyal ba'i phyir/_/lha rdzas 
[\[31a.4\]]dpe med yangs pas brgyan pa byas/_/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas lam de rin po che bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan pa byas nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las babs te/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po gang na ba dang rang gi lha'i khyim mtho zhing che 
[\[31a.5\]]la yangs pa gang na yod pa der song ste phyin nas rang gi khyim du zhugs so/_/zhugs nas bza' ba dang bca' ba dang myang ba mang zhing bzang ba g.yor bcug ste/_zhal zas ro sna brgya pa sbyar nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po chag chag legs par btab/_
[\[31a.6\]]byi dor legs par byas nas me tog sil ma ni bkram/_bdug spos kyis ni bdugs/_bla re ni bres/_dar gyi lda ldi dang chun po ni dpyangs/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni bsgreng ste/_de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i lam srang dang grong bar du bcas pa rdo dang gyo mo dang gseg 
[\[31a.7\]]ma med par byas/_me tog sna tshogs ni bkram/_tsan dan gyi phye mas ni gtor/_skar khung dang rta babs dang sgo gang dang ba gam dang skar khung dra ba ris dang zla ba kham pa lta bus ni brgyan cing tsan dan gyis byug pa byas te/_de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dpag tu med 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]pa'i bkod pas rab tu brgyan nas/_rang gi khyim yang rgyan sna tshogs pa rnam pa du mas brgyan te/_rin po che'i phreng ba rnam pa du ma ni rab tu dpyangs/_dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i gos kyis ni brgyan cing nye 'khor yang mdzes par byas/_phreng ba dang lda ldi rnam pa tha dad pa du mas ni brgyan pa byed 
[\[31b.2\]]du bcug_/rin po che'i stan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni 'ding du bcug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri lha'i dang mi'i las 'das pa bshams so/_/rin po che sna tshogs kyi pog phor ni phyogs bzhir 
[\[31b.3\]]dpyangs te/_de dag nas a ga ru 'ba' zhig gi du ba 'thul bar byas so/_/zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas khyim mchog de yang 'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir lha'i glu gar dang sil snyan ni bsgrags/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni bsgreng /_lha 
[\[31b.4\]]dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong gis ni gang zhing rnam par bltas/_rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs rnam pa du mas ni gang bar byas so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_zla 'od kyis ni khyim 
[\[31b.5\]]mchog yangs pa yang /_rgya cher thams cad shin tu brgyan par byas/_/gang la 'jig rten sgron ma bzhugs pa yi/_/lha rdzas seng ge'i khri ni dbus su btsugs/_/'jig rten sgron mdzad rgyal ba'i gtso bo yi/_/dge 'dun dag ni gang la 'dug 'gyur ba/_/rin chen shin tu rnam par 
[\[31b.6\]]bkra ba'i stan/_/bye ba stong phrag mtha' yas legs par bting /_/rin chen sna tshogs kun gyi bdug spos snod/_/a ga ru yis shin tu gang byas te/_/phyogs rnams thams cad du yang rnam par dpyangs/_/de dag nas ni yid 'ong dri rnams 'thul/_/zla 'od kyis ni stobs bcu 
[\[31b.7\]]gshegs pa'i phyir/_/rin chen me tog mdzes pa sna tshogs dang /_/me tog dri mchog bzang po rnam mang gis/_/khyim gyi sa gzhi bzang po kun du bkram/_/gar byed glu len sil snyan sgra dag gis/_/khyim mchog thams cad kun tu sgra yis gang /_/gdugs dang ba dan dag kyang 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]shin tu bsgreng /_/khyim kun lam mer mdzes pa lha yi bzhin/_/zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim mchog chen po yang /_/skyes bu na chung tshogs kyis rgyan gyur cing /_/klu dang gnod sbyin lha min mang pos gang /_/brgya phrag mang po'i lha yis rnam par bltas/_de nas zla 'od gzhon 
[\[32a.2\]]nur gyur pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po yang brgyan/_bdag gi khyim yang legs par brgyan nas de'i mtshan mo 'das pa dang /_nangs par snga rabs kyi dus kyi tshe sil snyan sna tshogs brgya dag ni rab tu dkrol/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bye ba du ma ni bsgreng ste/_
[\[32a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu thams cad kyang lha'i me tog man+dA ras snyim pa bkang ste/_de dag las la la ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_spos kyi 
[\[32a.4\]]glang po che dang /_rin po che'i tog dang /_mngon par 'byung dka' dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_dpa' bo'i sde dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_rin chen me tog dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing 
[\[32a.5\]]mdun du bdar te/_rta dang ba lang du ma shin tu brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa mang po dang 'dres pa/_gzhan yang yul gyi mi dpag tu med pa'i tshogs dang bdag nyid kyang lha'i me tog man+dA ras snyim pa bkang ste byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang 
[\[32a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i a la la zhes lha'i ga zha'i sgra yid du 'thad cing yid du 'ong ba yid 'phrog pa dag sgrog cing /_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i chu dron gyi sgo nas phyir byung ste/_ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[32a.7\]]ga la der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas lha'i me tog man+dA ra bas snyim pa gang bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/byams pa la sogs pa byang chub 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_so so'i snyim pa na me tog man+dA ra ba yod pa des bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/zla 'od gzhon 
[\[32b.2\]]nur gyur pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas gdugs tshod la bab pa/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gtsang sbyar lags te/_da de'i dus 
[\[32b.3\]]la bab par bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen na/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa dang dbang che ba dang /_dbang che bar grags pa rgya che zhing rlabs che ba'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang drang srong dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye 
[\[32b.4\]]chen po dang grul bum dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang srul po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dag dang yang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs shing bdag gi sdum par yang gdugs tshod gsol ba'i dus la bab bo/_/bde bar gshegs pa gdugs tshod la bab bo/_/de la 'di skad 
[\[32b.5\]]ces bya ste/_bdag gis grong khyer mchog kun legs par brgyan/_/mgon po bdag gi sdum pa'ang de bzhin te/_/lha yi zhal zas ro brgya bshams shing sbyar/_/gdugs tshod bab kyis bde gshegs bzhengs su gsol/_/drang srong mchog gis phyag bgyis stobs bcu yon tan 'chang /_/
[\[32b.6\]]sras kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing grong du gshegs/_/snang byed nyi ma mun pa'i tshogs sel bzhengs su gsol/_/bcom ldan bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol gdugs tshod bab/_/sras dang thabs cig bdag gi sdum par gshegs su gsol/_/'gro ba mang po'i tshogs 
[\[32b.7\]]kyi don kyang bgyis par 'gyur/_/ji ltar mar me mdzad kyis khyod la lung bstan pa/_/de bzhin bdag kyang 'jig rten mngon sum lung ston cig_/bdag 'dir lung bstan 'jig rten thos nas ni/_/sems kyang mchog tu rgya cher rab bskyed de/_/'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]'gyur/_/'di na snod min sems can gang yang med/_/bzhengs shig bzhengs shig stobs bcu mnga' ba'i lha/_/bdag la rjes su phan mdzod sdum par gshegs/_/ji ltar bdag gi sdum par khyod gshegs pa/_/de bzhin byang chub shing dbang drung bdag mchi/_/byang chub shing 
[\[33a.2\]]dbang de drung bdag mchis nas/_/mi g.yo mi 'gul bar ni gnas bcas te/_/byams pas sder bcas bdud rnams pham bgyis nas/_/khyod kyis brnyes bzhin byang chub thob par bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa mkhyen nas/_/zla 'od gzhon 
[\[33a.3\]]nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pas slar bka' stsal pa/_longs shig zla 'od rgyal ba'i sras/_/longs shig sbyin dga' sems can mchog_/longs shig snying rje tshul khrims brtan/_/bran la deng ni khyim du 'dod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[33a.4\]]gsungs nas sngar gdan las bzhengs te/_sham thabs gsol/_chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lha dang klu dang 
[\[33a.5\]]gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang drang srong dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang grul bum dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang srul po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong du mas mchod cing mngon par bstod nas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang sangs 
[\[33a.6\]]rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam gyis 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni rab tu gtong /_sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu dkrol/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni mngon par sgreng /_gzugs dang kha dog rags 
[\[33a.7\]]pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang ngur pa dang bzhad dang tsa ko ra dang rma bya dang tsa sha dang ri skegs dang khu byug dang ka la ping ka dang ku nal la sogs pa bya'i khyu mang po du ma sgra snyan cing 'jam la yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma 'byin pas ni bar snang la lha bzhin du so so'i nga ros rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]'byin/_lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi bdug spos kyi snod yangs shing che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang bai dUr+ya dang an da rnyil dang shel dang spug gi yu ba can dag gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gzugs bzang dang dbang po'i tog dang rad rod can dang ba ku la dang lngas rtsen dang shAkya 'phel la sogs 
[\[33b.2\]]pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gi lag pa gnyis na gtun 'dzin pa bzhin du thogs te/_spos sbrul gyi snying po dang go Shir Sha dang mri Na la dang ha ri dang ma la ya dang tsan dan dmar po dang a ga ru la sogs pas bkang ba'i du ba ni 'thul/_phyogs so so nas lhags pa'i rgyal po dbang che ba/_dbang 
[\[33b.3\]]che bar grags pa rnams rta dang ba lang rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan cing ma zhon par khrid pa'i tshogs du ma dang shing rta dang dpung bu chung gis yongs su bskor cing phreng ba dang lda ldi mang po dang rin po che'i phreng ba lag na thogs shing sngon logs nas rkang gis 'gro'o/_/rta dang glang po che legs par brgyan pa/_ma zhon 
[\[33b.4\]]par khrid pa dag kyang /_rang gi stabs kyis mngon par 'gro zhing skad yid du 'ong la snyan pa 'byin to/_/tshangs pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs nas mchod pa dang rim gro bsnyen bkur byed cing 'gro'o/_/g.yon phyogs nas ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu dbang che ba/_dbang che bar grags 
[\[33b.5\]]pa/_rgya che zhing rlabs che ba/_bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams lha'i cod pan bzang po dang gdu bu rgyan can dang rna cha dang gdu bu dang me tog rna rgyan dang rin po che'i tsong tsong dang me tog gi phreng bas lus brgyan cing /_gzugs mngon par snang bas lha'i me tog man dA ra dang mdog mdzes dang ko bi dA ra dang /_
[\[33b.6\]]s+thA la ka dang ku ra ba ka dang tsam pa ka dang dong ka'i me tog dang mya ngan 'tshang dang skya snar dang a ti mug ta ka dang ud pa la dang ba ku la dang mal li ka dang kun da dang ke sa ra dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang dri mchog dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang rin po che'i a ga ru dang shing rin po che'i 'bras 
[\[33b.7\]]bu can dag lag na thogs shing sil snyan sna tshogs brgya stong ni shin tu dkrol/_gos bye ba ni g.yob cing a la la zhes ga zha'i sgra dag ni 'byin/_me tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'bebs shing /_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i ngos thams cad bar mtshams 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]med par gang bar 'khod de/_me tog dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs shing /_bcom ldan 'das chu dron yod pa'i sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gdugs tshod la gshegs so/_/de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/_de la 'di 
[\[34a.2\]]skad ces bya'o/_/sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pas dus mkhyen nas/_/dpa' bo yon tan kun gyi rab brgyan pa/_/zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab snang mdzad cing /_/bcom ldan mi yi seng ge gshegs par gyur/_/spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen don yod dang /_/spos kyi bal 
[\[34a.3\]]glang rin chen lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/rin chen tog dang 'byung dka' dpa' bo dang /_/de dang gzhan dag rgyal ba'i zhabs 'bring byed/_/g.yas phyogs na ni mi pham 'dug gyur te/_/de ming byams pa yon tan mtha' yas phyug_/bar du ma chod sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/_/bsod nams 
[\[34a.4\]]ye shes tshogs kyang rab tu rdzogs/_/byams dang btang snyoms dga' bas lus bsgoms shing /_/chos kyi bdag nyid chen po snying rjes skyed/_/yon tan mtha' yas thub dbang yon tan sems/_/bde gshegs thugs rje can gyi zhabs 'bring byed/_/de yi rjes la bskal pa bzang 
[\[34a.5\]]po yi/_/blo gros chen po ldan pa ji snyed pa'i/_/sangs rgyas stong du bzhis ma tshang ba dag_/de dag gis kyang byams pa mdun du bdar/_/gang sngon rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/_/bskal pa dag la rgyal ba mtha' yas mchod/_/zla ba mdzes pa'i 'od 'dra lha yi lus/_/zla 'od 
[\[34a.6\]]dpa' bo yang ni mdun na 'dug_/snying rje mchog gi g.yon phyogs 'dug pa ni/_/'jam dpal bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang /_/dpa' bo rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mngon 'phags pa/_/brgya phrag mtha' yas zhing du 'gro ba'o/_/de yi 'og tu nyan thos dge 'dun te/_shA ri'i bu 'og maud gal nag 
[\[34a.7\]]po dang /_/'od srung rab 'byor dga' bo ka phi na/_/bzang ldan rgyal po de bzhin kauN+Di n+ya/_/kun dga' de bzhin gnas brtan sgra gcan zin/_/legs 'ongs kron tsi gang po 'char ba po/_/nam gru gsus chen nye 'khor ma 'gags pa/_/ral pa can ni stong du tshang ba dag_/nyan thos dge 'dun 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]'og tu thams cad kyang /_/dka' thub drag mchog rig byed cho ga shes/_/dmod pa 'dor dang phan 'dogs nus pa yi/_/drang srong dul ba thal sbyar 'dud pa byed/_/zhi ba'i yid dang dul ba'i yid rnams kyis/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten sgron ma mdun bdar te/_/thugs rjer ldan pa'i mi yi seng 
[\[34b.2\]]ge gshegs/_/sems can stong rnams rab tu thar bar mdzad/_/ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]zla ba nya ba ltar/_/skar tshogs dbang po yongs su dag pa bzhin/_/tshangs pa stong phrag dag ni brgya mang gis/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i ston pa yongs su bskor/_/grong khyer gyi ni sgo stengs zhabs bzhag tshe/_/nags 
[\[34b.3\]]tshal stug por bcas pa'i sa yang g.yos/_/lha dang lha min lto 'phye'i tshogs rnams kyang /_/me tog bzang po dri mchog 'thor bar byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa 'khor lo rin po ches brgyan pa/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa/_/sgo'i them pa la bzhag 
[\[34b.4\]]ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/_/chem chem rab tu chem 
[\[34b.5\]]chem kun tu rab tu chem chem/_'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur te/_shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/_nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/_byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/_/lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/_mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/_dbus dma' 
[\[34b.6\]]na mtha' mtho bar gyur nas 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/_/ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul grangs med dpag tu med pa gzhan dag kyang snang ngo //_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/_bam po bzhi pa/_de'i chos nyid ni 'di 
[\[34b.7\]]yin te/_de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/grong khyer mchog der 'dren pa gshegs pa na/_/sgo them la ni zhabs mchog bzhag pa'i tshe/_/de yi dpal gyis sa 'di rab tu g.yos/_/grong khyer mchog 'di'i sems can rab tu dga'/_/mi gang bkres shing skom par gyur pa dag_/de tshe de 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]dag bkres pa med par gyur/_/rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/_/bkres shing skom pa dag dang bral bar gyur/_/rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/_/dmus long gyur pa'i mi gang ci yod dang /_/rna bas mi thos mgon med bsod nams chung /_/de dag 
[\[35a.2\]]thams cad mig dang rna ba thob/_/rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/_/gshin rje'i yul gyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang yod pa/_/shin tu sdug bsngal ngar snabs mchil ma za/_/thams cad 'od kyis reg pas bde bar gyur/_/rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/_/brag gi rtse dang 
[\[35a.3\]]ri yi rtse mo dang /_/shing mchog sA la dang ni dong ka rnams/_/thams cad sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i phyogs su 'dud/_/rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/_/rgya mtsho mthar thug grong dang grong khyer rnams/_/sa kun rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/_/'dir ni gang la'ang gnod par 
[\[35a.4\]]gyur pa med/_/lha dang mi dang grul bum srin po dang /_/skyes bu gnas pa dga' mgu sems rangs te/_byang chub dam pa mchog la dad bskyed nas/_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa'i gdugs kyang 'dzin/_/rgyal bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/_/sil snyan stong dag ma 
[\[35a.5\]]brdungs sgra 'byin te/_/shin tu yid 'ong rol mo'i dbyangs thos pas/_/de tshe sems can thams cad rab tu dga'/_/sdong po stong phrag brgya dag 'dud par gyur/_/de tshe me tog kun kyang rab tu rgyas/_/bar snang las ni lha rnams brgya stong dag_/rgyal ba la yang mi min mchod pa byed/_/rgyal 
[\[35a.6\]]bas sgo yi them steng zhabs bzhag tshe/_/glang po brgya dag sems dga' sgra 'byin te/_/rta dang ba lang rgyal po lus kyang stod/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po seng ge sgra 'byin byed/_/sa dbang rgyal po gang su ji snyed cig_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag nas lhags pa rnams/_/rgyal ba'i dpal 
[\[35a.7\]]gzi de 'dra mthong nas ni/_/rab tu sems dga' sa la 'dug cing 'dud/_/kha cig 'jig rten mgon la mngon par stod/_/kha cig rgyal la me tog char 'bebs shing /_/kha cig sor bcu thal mo sbyar nas su/_/e ma rgyal ba thugs rje can zhes smra/_/kha cig mu tig do shal bzang po dang /_/
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]sna tshogs rgyan mang dga' skyed 'thor bar byed/_/byang chub sems mchog dpe med bskyed nas su/_/kha cig na bza' rin chen 'thor bar byed/_/kha cig gser gyi dra ba bzang po 'thor/_/kha cig spen tog rgyan bzang 'thor bar byed/_/la la gser gyi rgyan ni dam pa 'thor/_/kha cig 
[\[35b.2\]]de bzhin gdu bu 'thor bar byed/_/la la gdu bu bzang po de 'thor te/_/kha cig rin chen spras pa'i dpung rgyan 'thor/_/kha cig bdag cag sangs rgyas gyur cig ces/_/sems bskyed gos phran bzang po 'thor bar byed/_/'jig rten mgon po sgo na bzhugs pa'i tshe/_/mi dag kha cig 
[\[35b.3\]]gser gyi tsong tsong 'thor/_/sems dad gtsug gi nor bu mchog kyang 'thor/_/la la rin chen dra ba 'thor bar byed/_/sems can shin tu mi bzad sdug bsngal zhing /_/gtse ba rnam mang zug rngus zug pa yang /_/'dren pa skyes bu gtso bo'i dpal gyis ni/_/thams cad bde ba dang 
[\[35b.4\]]yang ldan par gyur/_/khu byug dang ni ri skegs rma bya dang /_/de bzhin khrung khrung dang ni mtsho bya dang /_/bya mang kun ni nam mkhar 'dug nas su/_/shin tu yid 'ong mchog gi sgra yang 'byin/_/de tshe bya tshogs mang po rab dga' bas/_/'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ste/_/gang 
[\[35b.5\]]gis snyan pa'i sgra skad de thos pa/_/de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi/_/sems can bye bas dga' ba'i sgra thos nas/_/thams cad rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod thob ste/_/ma 'ongs dus na rgyal bar khyed 'gyur zhes/_/de dag kun la bde gshegs lung yang ston/_/de yi dus na nyon 
[\[35b.6\]]mongs mi 'byung ste/_/chos kyi rgyal la thams cad ri mor bcas/_/de tshe 'dren pa'i sku byad mthong nas ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la mos bskyed de/_/bdag cag nam zhig 'di 'dra'i mkhyen thob snyam/_/bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung ston te/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i ba 
[\[35b.7\]]spu khung re nas/_/'od zer dag ni stong phrag brgya yang byung /_/de las lhag par gang gA'i bye snyed de/_/de dag gi yang mtshan ma gzung mi nus/_/de tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyang mi snang ste/_/me dang nor bu lha kun 'od kyang med/_/rgyal ba grong gshegs sangs rgyas rnam mdzes pa/_/de tshe 'od 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]rnams thams cad yong mi mngon/_/tshogs chen dang ni bde gshegs lam bzhud tshe/_/gang du stobs bcu yi ni zhabs 'jog par/_/sa las pad ma dag ni stong phrag brgya/_/'dab ma bye ba stong ldan gtsang ma byung /_/'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i tshe/_/de na nyal 
[\[36a.2\]]nyil mi gtsang med par gyur/_/grong khyer thams cad dri mchog bdug pa yi/_/spos ngad yid du 'ong ba kun nas ldang /_/grong dang srang rnams yongs su dag gyur te/_/rdo dang gseg ma med cing spos chus btab/_/stobs bcu ldan pa'i bsod nams de 'dra ste/_/rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[36a.3\]]me tog sil ma bkram/_/gnod sbyin brgya stong gtum por sems pa dag_/sangs rgyas mi dbang gser 'dra mthong nas ni/_/'dren la dga' ba rgya che rab bskyed nas/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun skyabs su 'gro/_/lha rnams bye ba dang ni brgya phrag stong /_/mi dbang lta bar 'ongs pa 
[\[36a.4\]]de dag kun/_/bde bar gshegs la me tog char phab ste/_/me tog gtor nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug_/rgyal la mi yis me tog gang gtor ba/_/nam mkha'i ngos la me tog gdugs su gyur/_/lha rnams kyis ni me tog gtor ba yang /_/sa steng lha yi me tog bkram par 
[\[36a.5\]]gyur/_/lha dang mi dang grul bum srin po rnams/_/de mthong nas ni nam yang ngoms mi myong /_/mgon po stobs bcu ldan pa mthong nas kyang /_/rab tu dga' zhing sems bde rangs par gyur/_/nam tshe skyes bu mchog gi sku mthong nas/_/sems can thams cad dga' mgu rangs 
[\[36a.6\]]gyur pas/_/lha yi me tog la yang yid mi sems/_/de dag la ni ngo mtshar 'dzin pa med/_/stobs bcu'i g.yas phyogs na ni tshangs pa ste/_/de bzhin g.yon na brgya byin lha yi rgyal/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na lha mang bye 'khod de/_/skyes bu mchog la shin tu gus pa skyed/_/
[\[36a.7\]]lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal bar bskor/_/lha dang mi yi dpal gzi kun phrogs nas/_/zhabs mthil sa la ri mo 'byin bzhin du/_/grong khyer du ni bcom ldan spyan drangs gshegs/_/sku lus dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa ni/_/nam mkha' skar ma dag gis gang ba 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]bzhin/_/nam mkha' la ni zla ba nya ba ltar/_/rgyal po'i lam na sangs rgyas lam me bzhugs/_/nor bu rin chen rnam dag bzang po ni/_/nyes pa'i skyon bral rab tu snang bar byed/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su yang 'od gtsang byung /_/de bzhin rgyal ba 'jig rten kun snang mdzad/_/
[\[36b.2\]]lha dang lha min dag gis rgyal ba bskor/_/mi yi gtso bo rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs/_/zhabs mthil sa la ri mo 'byin bzhin du/_/zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du sangs rgyas gshegs/_/grong khyer mchog ni kun tu legs brgyan te/_/rgyal mtshan bye ba phrag stong rab tu sgreng /_/de 
[\[36b.3\]]yi sa kun spos bzang rnam par byugs/_/yid 'ong de bzhin dbyar gyi me tog gtor/_/gang tshe bde gshegs gtam rnams ston pa na/_/mgon po srang bzhud mi la thugs brtse'i phyir/_/rgyal bas der ni 'phrul pa rnam sprul te/_/de dag la yang sangs rgyas chos bzang ston/_/srog chags brgya 
[\[36b.4\]]stong dag gis de thos nas/_/sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la smon lam 'debs/_/nam bdag 'di 'dra'i ye shes thob snyam ste/_/bsam pa mkhyen nas rgyal ba lung yang ston/_/gang gis rgyal ba mi dbang spyan drangs pa/_/sbyin pa de ni mu mtha' med gyur pa/_/rnyed mchog bsam gyis 
[\[36b.5\]]mi khyab des rnyed ces/_/la la dag ni de la mos pa skyed/_/'khor ba dag na shin tu mthong dka' ba/_/skye dgu dag la phan mdzad thugs kyang brtse/_/thugs rje can de bdag gis sang la yang /_/spyan drang snyam du la la sems kyang skyed/_/la la ba gam cog gi steng 'dug cing /_/lus 
[\[36b.6\]]ni shin tu sdug cing mdzes par brgyan/_/byang chub sems mchog dam pa bskyed nas ni/_/stobs bcu ldan la lha yi me tog 'thor/_/la las bla med sems mchog rab bskyed nas/_/me tog tsam pa mdzes pa'i phreng ba dang /_/a ti mug ta de bzhin dbyar gyi spos/_/dar gyi lda 
[\[36b.7\]]ldi dag kyang la la 'thor/_/kha cig gos kyis shin tu lus brgyan te/_/me tog bzang po dag kyang thogs shing 'greng /_/me tog sna tshogs dar gyi lda ldi thogs/_/rgyal ba thub chen de yi phyogs su 'thor/_/la la pad ma dang ni ku mu da/_/ud pal gser gyi me tog bzang 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]po 'thor/_/la la rin chen me tog der 'thor te/_/la la tsan dan phye ma 'thor bar byed/_/'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa'i tshe/_/ngo mtshar dpag tu med pa rnams kyang byung /_/mtshungs med de dag brjod par mi nus te/_/sangs rgyas ye shes skye bo bye mang bkod/_/
[\[37a.2\]]mi che mi gdung bden pa mthong ba dang /_/gzhan yang gya nom snang dang shin tu mthong /_/de bzhin 'og min 'dod chags bral ba rnams/_/thams cad mi dbang blta phyir nye bar lhags/_/de bzhin dge ba'i lha rnams dpag med dang /_/dge chung lha gzhan dag kyang sems dga' zhing /_/dge 
[\[37a.3\]]rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu med pa rnams/_/'dren pa drang srong chen po lta phyir lhags/_/tshad med 'od kyang de bzhin dpag med dang /_/'od chung gi ni lha rnams ci yod dang /_/'od gsal ba yang khrag khrig mang po der/_/'jig rten mgon po blta phyir de dag lhags/_/tshangs 'khor ba 
[\[37a.4\]]dag brgya stong mang po dang /_/tshangs pa'i 'dun 'don dad pa de bzhin te/_/tshangs ris kyang ni brgya phrag mang po rnams/_/thams cad 'dren pa blta phyir nye bar lhags/_/de bzhin gzhan 'phrul gyi yang lha rnams dang /_/gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i sems can dag pa dang /_/dga' 
[\[37a.5\]]ldan 'thab bral lha rnams rab dga' zhing /_/thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags/_/brgya byin lha rgyal sum cu rtsa gsum pa/_/lha yi bu mo bye ba brgya dag lhags/_/'dir ni me tog char kyang rab 'bebs shing /_/sangs rgyas thub dbang blta phyir nye bar lhags/_/
[\[37a.6\]]phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po yang /_/rnam thos bu dang klu dbang mig mi bzang /_/yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes sems dga' ste/_/de kun mi dbang bstod cing nye bar lhags/_/gnod sbyin rgyal po mthu ldan ir bir yang /_/dga' ba skyes shing gnod sbyin 
[\[37a.7\]]brgyas bskor te/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug cing sems dga' nas/_/me tog sna tshogs du ma'i char kyang 'bebs/_/rtag tu myos dang phreng 'dzin lha rnams kyang /_/spos dang phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs thogs/_/'khor dang bcas pa thams cad sems dga' zhing /_/de na 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]skyes bu mchog la mchod pa byed/_/gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs mang po yang /_/gnod sbyin bu mo de dag rab brgyan te/_/gnod sbyin rol mo rab tu snyan pa dang /_/shin tu yid 'ong brgyas ni sangs rgyas mchod/_/glu dbyangs sil snyan 'jam zhing snyan pa la/_/mkhas pa mi 'am 
[\[37b.2\]]ci yi bu mo stong /_/mi 'am ci yi rgyal po ljon pa yang /_/rgyal mchog mchod par spos ngad ldang las lhags/_/bde mchog stobs ldan sgra gcan thags bzang ris/_/lha min bu mo stong gi 'khor bcas dang /_/lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po gzhan mang yang /_/rin po che yi char phab nye bar 
[\[37b.3\]]lhags/_/srin po khrag khrig brgya phrag mtha' yas kyang /_/srin po bye ba brgya yis bsnyen bkur zhing /_/me tog sil ma sna tshogs mang po yang /_/skyes bu mchog la gus par rab tu 'thor/_/klu yi rgyal po ri bo legs pa yang /_/'khor mang de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags/_/
[\[37b.4\]]rin chen me tog rnam mang mchog thogs te/_/bde gshegs zhabs gnyis la ni rab tu 'dud/_/klu dbang pad ma dang ni pad ma che/_/de bzhin nor yod mtha' yas gdengs ka can/_/de dag khyu mchog drung du nyer lhags te/_/bde bar gshegs la gus pas rab tu 'dud/_/klu yi rgyal 
[\[37b.5\]]po nor bu yid dga' zhing /_/khyu mchog zhabs kyi drung du nye bar 'ongs/_/klu yi me tog dri zhim mchog thogs te/_/ha cang mi ring bde gshegs spyan sngar 'dug_/de bzhin ma dros klu yi rgyal po yang /_/klu yi bu mo shin tu bslabs pa'i mchog_/rnga dang sil snyan stong phrag brgya brdung 
[\[37b.6\]]zhing /_/'jig rten mgon po mchod phyir nye bar lhags/_/ma dros pa yi bu pho lnga brgya dag_/ye shes yangs pa bla med tshol ba'i phyir/_/gnyen 'dab dag gis bskor cing dgar gyur nas/_/rang gis rang byung mchod phyir nye bar lhags/_/de bzhin klu yi rgyal po sog med kyang /_/
[\[37b.7\]]skyes bu mchog la thar sbyar rab btud nas/_/klu yi mu tig mdzes shing bzang ba thogs/_/mkha' la 'dug nas thub rgyal mchod pa byed/_/de bzhin klu yi rgyal po btang bzung yang /_/rab tu yid bde dga' mgu skyes nas ni/_/rin chen mu tig sna tshogs thogs nas su/_/der 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]'ongs 'dren pa la yang mngon par 'thor/_/de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dus can yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nyer 'ongs te/_/dga' zhing rin chen phreng ba mdzes mchog thogs/_/skyes bu dam pa la yang mchod rab byas/_/de yang bde gshegs yon tan rjes dran zhing /_/gus pa chen po shin tu 
[\[38a.2\]]bskyed nas ni/_/gnyen 'dab klu mang dag gis de bskor cing /_/'dren pa'i bsngags pa rnam pa mang po brjod/_/de bzhin klu dbang dga' bo nye dga' dang /_/de bzhin 'jog po gau tam nag po yang /_/rgyal ba blta zhing der ni nye bar 'ongs/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i zhabs la 'dud pa byed/_/
[\[38a.3\]]klu yi rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma yang /_/thub mchog rgyal ba 'od srung dran pa dang /_/bdag nyid mi khom skyes pa mthong nas ni/_/klu brgyas yongs su bskor te ngu zhing 'ongs/_/kye ma bdag sngon the tshom byung gyur te/_/bdag gis e la'i 'dab sdong sngon bcad pas/_/des ni mi khom par 
[\[38a.4\]]yang bdag skyes te/_/rgyal ba'i chos ni rig par sla ba min/_/shin tu smad pa'i skye bo'i lus 'di dang /_/klu yi skye gnas bdag gis rab spangs la/_/chos gang byang chub snying por skyes mchog gis/_/rtogs pa bsil ba bdag gis rtogs par bya/_/klu yi rgyal po rgya mtsho 'khor 
[\[38a.5\]]los sgyur/_/bye ba gsum snyed klu yi 'khor gyis bskor/_/chu lha gzi can rin chen do shal thogs/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod phyir nye bar 'ongs/_/rgyal ba la ni rdo 'phangs des bzung ste/_/de tshe nam mkha' la yang 'dug gyur pa/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi gnod sbyin ci zhig 'dzin/_/
[\[38a.6\]]bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gus par 'dug_/lcang lo can gyi rgyal po'i gnas kun kyang /_/stong par gyur cing gnod sbyin gang yang med/_/thams cad kyis kyang phan tshun dam bcas te/_/'jig rten mgon po blta bar thams cad lhags/_/de bzhin bong rna dang ni khab spu 
[\[38a.7\]]dang /_/gnod sbyin 'brog gnas 'jigs byed de bzhin te/_/gangs gnas rir 'du gnod sbyin bong bu dag_/rgyal ba rang byung drung du nye bar lhags/_/dbang po'i tog dang gzugs bzang rad rod can/_/bak+ku la dang dus 'phel lnga po dang /_/gnod sbyin dbang po gzhan yang stong 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]rnams ni/_/bdug spos snod rnams thogs shing nye bar lhags/_/lus dbyibs ma legs mi sdug mang po rnams/_/gzugs kyi rnam pa mang zhing rgyan bor ba/_/de yi mdun na brgya stong mang po dag_/gnod sbyin gyi ni me tog thogs te lhags/_/gau tam ri byi phur bu rgyal byed dang /_/
[\[38b.2\]]kau shi ka dang 'od srung mArkaN+Da/_/thams cad bshes dang par sha gar gA dag_/thams cad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal nye bar lhags/_/mi sbyin yang ni de bzhin dga' mgu ste/_/drang srong rgyas pa kud tsa ang gi ra/_/shed can ngan spong bad tsa gnas 'jog rnams/_/de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 
[\[38b.3\]]nye bar lhags/_/'dza' man bA man be'i sham bA ya dang /_/'dza' mag nI dang grog mkhar drang srong mchog_/dkar bar gnas dang mi'u thung spen pa rnams/_/'dren pa blta zhing grong khyer mchog tu lhags/_/drang srong mthong nas de tshe drang srong dga'/_/thub rgyal zhabs mchog la ni phyag 'tshal 
[\[38b.4\]]zhing /_/'jig rten sgron la phyag byas mngon bstod de/_/thal mo sbyar nas dpa' bo'i spyan sngar 'greng /_/'jig rten ci yod drang srong mang po kun/_/de dag mi dbang blta bar nyer lhags te/_/mthong nas mchod pa rgya cher byas nas kyang /_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar thal mo rab sbyar 'dug_/
[\[38b.5\]]rgya mtsho dag na gnas pa'i nam mkha' lding /_/bram ze'i cha byad du yang sprul byas nas/_/cod pan sna tshogs blta na sdug pa thogs/_/bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal nam mkhar 'khod/_/grong brgya dang ni 'dzam gling nags tshal na/_/gnas shing rten pa'i lha rnams gang yod dang /_/
[\[38b.6\]]grong gi lha mo ma lus thams cad kyang /_/nye bar lhags shing gtso bo mchod par byed/_/nags tshal gyi yang lha rnams mtha' yas dang /_/ri yi lha rnams thams cad nye bar 'ongs/_/'bab chu'i lha kun mtha' dag de bzhin du/_/'dren pa mchod pa byed cing nye bar lhags/_/mya ngam 
[\[38b.7\]]dgon pa'i lha mo brgya rnams dang /_/ri rtse'i lha mo ji snyed ma lus dang /_/mtsho dang chu mig rdzing gi lha rnams dang /_/rgya mtsho'i lha yang sangs rgyas drung du lhags/_/lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs/_/mi 'am ci dang grul bum nam mkha' lding /_/de bzhin [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]srul po mang po dag_/skyes bu mchog la ri mor bya ba byed/_/'dren pa grong khyer mchog der gshegs pa na/_/rgyal ba mchog la de dag mchod pa byed/_/lha dang lha min klu dang gnod sbyin rgyal/_/blta bas rtag tu chog par yang mi 'gyur/_/sngon gyi srid par 'jig rten 
[\[39a.2\]]mgon po yis/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la mchod mchog byas/_/bsod nams 'bras bu smin pa de 'dra ste/_/skyes bu mi dbang blta bas ngoms mi myong /_/rgyal bas sangs rgyas zhing du 'od btang tshe/_/lhun po de bzhin rab lhun khor yug ri/_/kha ba can gyi ri dang spos ngad ldang /_/de dag rgyal ba'i 'od la 
[\[39a.3\]]sgrib pa med/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'di'i rgya mtsho ci yod pa/_/de dag de tshe sa dang 'dra bar gyur/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kun tu yang /_/me tog dag gis gtor cing mnyam par gyur/_/'od zer brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag_/chos kyi rgyal po'i zhabs kyi mthil nas byung /_/sems 
[\[39a.4\]]can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bar gyur/_/sdug bsngal med par byas nas bde ba myong /_/der ni stobs bcu ldan pas chos bshad pas/_/lha dang mi yi mig kyang rnam par dag_/srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa rnams/_/thams cad sangs rgyas ye shes nges par 
[\[39a.5\]]gyur/_/'dren pa grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pa na/_/bde gshegs cho 'phrul mang po dag gis ni/_/bskal pa bye bar brjod du mi sla ste/_/rgyal ba bde gshegs 'gro ba thams cad dga'/_/bde gshegs yon tan de dag dpag med de/_/mi mchog yon tan rab 
[\[39a.6\]]kyi pha rol phyin/_/yon tan khyad par kun gyi pha rol son/_/sangs rgyas bsod nams zhing la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/grong khyer du gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim gyi srang du byung ste/_/zla 
[\[39a.7\]]'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i khyim du gshegs so/_/gshegs nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang dge slong gi dge 'dun kyang so sor gar 'os pa'i stan la 'khod do/_/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_/dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas mchod yon chen po rim gyis gsol te/_/zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa bzang zhing mang ba'i bza' ba dang /_/bca' ba dang bldag pa dang gzhib pa dang btung ba rnams bdag nyid kyis gsol cing bdar te/_/bcom ldan 
[\[39b.2\]]'das bshos gsol nas lhung bzed bzhag ste phyag bcabs par rig nas ras bcos bu phrugs bye ba stong phrag brgya ri ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang so sor chos gos sum phrugs su phul nas stan las langs 
[\[39b.3\]]te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ras gtor te/_mchod cing mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do/_/skyes 
[\[39b.4\]]pa med cing 'gags med pa/_/sku lus mi mnga' bsam mi khyab/_/gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/_/yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpa' bo shes rab mchog gis bskyed/_/thabs dang stobs kyi rtsal kyang mnga'/_/sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra ba ste/_/bzod mthar 
[\[39b.5\]]phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhugs pa'i spyod yul te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal rab tu dga' dang bde/_/btung bar ting nge 'dzin te bshos su bsam gtan mchog_/stong nyid dgon par gnas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal bas 
[\[39b.6\]]thugs rje bsnyen pas na/_/gzugs kyi sku yang ston par mdzad/_/sems can dag la thugs brtse'i phyir/_/btung dang bshos kyang gsol bar gda'/_/e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/'jig rten kun gyi 'dren pa ste/_/'jig rten 'di ni khyod mchod nas/_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[39b.7\]]pa mchog tu mchi/_/mi mnyam mnyam pa'i mgon gcig po la de skad bstod/_/gzhon nu yid kyang rab tu dgar gyur tshig smras pa/_/sangs rgyas mtshungs med bsam yas sku mnga' bshos gsol bas/_/lha yi lha khyod bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas gyur/_/de ltar zla 'od gzhon 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya pa ni bzhes par gsol/_lha'i na bza' rin thang med pa phrugs kyis ni sku la gsol/_lha'i me tog man dA ras ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod/_tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pas ni mngon par bstod nas/_bcom 
[\[40a.2\]]ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa/_byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas ci spyad na/_/rtag tu chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu 'tshal/_/mkhas pa bgyi ba dag la ji ltar 'jug_/bgyi bar 'jug pa 'dren pas 
[\[40a.3\]]bstan du gsol/_/'dren pa skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur/_/ji ltar mngal dag tu yang yong mi skye/_/ji lta bur na 'khor rnams mi phyed 'gyur/_/'di la ji ltar spobs pa mtha' yas 'gyur/_/sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/_/chos rnams kun la mngon par mkhyen pa 
[\[40a.4\]]'jug_/rkang gnyis gtso bo zil gyis mi non pa/_/zhu ba zhu yis bdag la lung ston cig_/chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med rab mkhyen la/_/brjod du med pa tshig tu brjod par mdzad/_/seng ges wa rnams ji ltar pham bgyis pa/_/mu stegs gzhan la'ang sangs rgyas de 
[\[40a.5\]]bzhin te/_/sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen cing /_/chos rnams kun la'ang ye shes rjes su 'jug_/ye shes chags med spyod yul yongs su dag_/chos kyi mnga' bdag bdag la de lung ston/_/'das pa mkhyen cing ma 'ongs de bzhin te/_/da ltar 'di na ci mchis 
[\[40a.6\]]pa yang mkhyen/_/dus gsum la ni ye shes thogs med 'jug_/de phyir bdag zhu shAkya seng ge la/_/dus gsum ldan pa'i rgyal ba'i chos nyid ni/_/chos kyi rgyal pos chos nyid rab tu mkhyen/_/rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas/_/de phyir bdag zhu ye shes rgya mtsho la/_/khyod 
[\[40a.7\]]la 'khrul pa'i chos ni ci yang med/_/de bas khyod kyi sems pa ma lus spangs/_/mdud spangs tha ba gti mug rab tu bcad/_/mi dbang bdag la byang chub spyod pa ston/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid ci 'drar rgyal bas mkhyen/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'dra bdag la ston/_/bdag gis 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]mtshan nyid de 'dra'i chos rtogs nas/_/mtshan nyid de 'dra'i byang chub spyod pa spyad/_/sems can spyod pa mi 'thun mtha' yas pa/_/ji ltar spyod pa spyad par 'jug pa lags/_/gang thos sems can spyod pa 'tshal 'gyur ba/_/spyod la 'jug pa bdag la bshad du gsol/_/mtshan nyid mi 
[\[40b.2\]]'thun chos kyi rang bzhin mtshan/_/ngo bo nyid stong rang bzhin rnam dag pa/_/byang chub sems dpas ji ltar mngon sum 'gyur/_/chos kyi tshul rnams bdag la bstan du gsol/_/'di la chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin/_/bstan pa'i tshig kun la yang shin tu mkhas/_/the tshom mi mnga' nem 
[\[40b.3\]]nur the tshom chod/_/bdag la sangs rgyas byang chub bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtogs pa sems kyis mkhyen nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang 
[\[40b.4\]]ldan na yon tan 'di dag rab tu 'thob ste/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa yin no/_/gzhon 
[\[40b.5\]]nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ming med cing ming dang bral bar rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad sgra med pa/_tshig gi lam dang bral ba/_
[\[40b.6\]]yi ge dang bral ba/_skye ba dang bral ba/_'gog pa dang bral ba/_rgyu dang mtshan nyid mi 'thun pa/_rkyen dang mtshan nyid mi 'thun pa/_dben pa'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa/_mtshan nyid dang bral ba/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_bsam pa dang bral ba/_
[\[40b.7\]]yid dang bral bar rab tu shes so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/chos rnams bstan pa gcig po ni/_/chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med/_/yang dag ji bzhin rab mkhyen pas/_/shes rab mchog gis bshad pa yin/_/
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]de lta bur ni chos bstan rnams/_/byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa/_/mdo sde bye ba rab ston kyang /_/de la byang chub rgyun 'chad med/_/'dren pas byin gyis brlabs pas na/_/yang dag nyid kyi mtha' yang shes/_/yang dag mtha' de rab shes na/_/de la ci yang 
[\[41a.2\]]bshad pa med/_/gcig gis kyang ni thams cad shes/_/gcig gis kyang ni thams cad mthong /_/ji snyed mang por bshad na yang /_/de la dregs pa skye ba med/_/chos rnams thams cad bdag med par/_/de ltar sems kyis nges brtags shing /_/ming du bstan pa bslabs 
[\[41a.3\]]pas na/_/yang dag nyid du tshig kyang smra/_/sgra dbyangs gang dag ci thos pa/_/de yi sngon gyi mtha' shes te/_/sgra yi sngon gyi mtha' shes nas/_/sgra dag gis ni de mi 'phrogs/_/sgra yi sngon mtha' ji 'dra bar/_/chos rnams mtshan nyid de bzhin te/_/chos rnams de ltar rab shes na/_/
[\[41a.4\]]mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/chos rnams thams cad mi skye zhing /_/'byung ba med par rab tu shes/_/bstan pa 'di ni rab shes na/_/rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/_/nam zhig skye ba dran gyur na/_/de tshe bya ba dag la 'jug_/bya ba dag la zhugs pa yi/_/'khor rnams shin tu mi 
[\[41a.5\]]phyed 'gyur/_/de ltar chos rnams stong par ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' sus shes pa/_/des ni gang yang mi shes med/_/'di ni ci yang med pa'i mtha'/_/ci yang med pa'i mtha' la yang /_/byis pa dag gis ci dag brtags/_/bskal pa bye bar de dag des/_/yang dang
