[\[61b.2\]]nas nan tan dang /_/tshul dang gdams pa rjes su bstan pa bzang /_/rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/_/rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa sangs rgyas bsngags/_/bzod la gnas pas nyes pa rnam par spang /_/ye shes la yang gnas nas mi shes spang /_/rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan 
[\[61b.3\]]pa 'di 'dra'o/_/ye shes rten yin de bzhin rnal 'byor sa/_/byang chub zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug ste/_/skyes bu dam pa rtag par bsten pa ni/_/rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/_/mi rigs brtson pa khor mor rnam par spang /_/sangs rgyas sa ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[61b.4\]]pas bshad/_/mkhas pa kun gyis rjes su yi rang ba/_/rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/_/byis pa mi shes pas ni spangs pa ste/_/'di ni nyan thos mang po'i sa ma yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' dag gis rtag tu bzung /_/rgyal ba'i rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra'o/_/'di ni de 
[\[61b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'brang /_/lha rnams kyis kyang mchod cing ri mor byas/_/tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong yi rang ba/_/ting 'dzin de ni rgyal ba ston mdzad dam/_/nam mkha' lding dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci/_/klu yang stong gis rtag tu phyag byas pa/_/byang chub dam pa 
[\[61b.6\]]rgyal bas gsungs pa yi/_/ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/_/shin tu mkhas pas rtag tu yongs thob ste/_/nor mchog dam pa yang ni legs par rnyed/_/zang zing med pa'i ye shes gso ba mchog_/ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/_/ye shes mdzod 
[\[61b.7\]]yin spobs pa mi zad pa/_/'di ni mdo sde bye bar 'jug pa ste/_/khams gsum yongs shes yang dag shes pa yi/_/ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/_/gang la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/_/'di ni pha rol 'gro ba'i gzings su bstan/_/'di ni chu bo rgal ba'i 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]gru yin te/_/'di ni snyan grags bsngags phreng 'phel bar byed/_/gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bstod pa yin/_/skyes bu khyu mchog la yang bsngags pa ste/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mi zad yon tan tshul/_/gang 
[\[62a.2\]]dag la ni ting 'dzin 'di bshad pa/_/'di ni zhe sdang zhi bar byams pa bstan/_/'di ni snying rje can gyi btang snyoms sa/_/'di ni grags pa chen po'i dbugs 'byin pa/_/seng ge'i sgra sgrogs rnams kyi nan tan te/_/'di las sangs rgyas ye shes mchog kyang 'byung /_/chos rnams 
[\[62a.3\]]kun gyi rang bzhin phyag rgya ste/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dren pa dag gis bshad/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba rgyal bas bshad pa 'di/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed/_/'di ni byang chub rab zhugs spyod pa ste/_/bdud kyi sde rnams shin tu skrag par byed/_/rgyal bas ting 'dzin 
[\[62a.4\]]zhi ba 'di bshad pa/_/skyob pa chos la gnas pa'i rig sngags 'di/_/dgra yi nang du srung ba dam pa ste/_/phas kyi rgol ba chos kyis tshar gcod pa/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bsten byas na/_/'di ni spobs pa'i sar yang rab tu bstan/_/stobs dang rnam thar de bzhin dbang po 
[\[62a.5\]]dang /_/sangs rgyas chos rnams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bye brag 'phags/_/stobs bcu rnams kyang yongs su tshol ba ste/_/sangs rgyas ye shes kyi yang snga ltas so/_/skyes mchog 'jig rten phan zhing thugs brtse bas/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'ang yin/_/sangs 
[\[62a.6\]]rgyas dag gi sras kyis 'di bzung ste/_/'di ni rnam thar 'dod pa'i lam du bstan/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mthong dka' 'di thos nas/_/de la bde gshegs sras po dga' bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa tshol 
[\[62a.7\]]ba 'di/_/rnam dag sems gtsang nyon mongs med pa yis/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bsten par gyis/_/rgyal ba bzhin du de yi lus dag ste/_/rnam par thar dang ye shes rnam grol mthong /_/'dod chags 'ching bas rtag tu nyon mi mongs/_/ting 'dzin bzang po 'di 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]la bsten par gyis/_/zhe sdang sa min gti mug bral ba ste/_/bde ba 'dod pa'i ye shes 'byung ba yin/_/rig pa skye zhing ma rig 'jig pa ste/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bsten par gyis/_/rnam grol snying por byed pa ngoms par bshad/_/bsam gtan pa la ting 'dzin zhi 
[\[62b.2\]]'di bstan/_/sangs rgyas ma smad pa yi spyan yin te/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di la bsten par gyis/_/'di ni zhing mang ston pa'i mngon par shes/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas ston pa'i rdzu 'phrul te/_/ting 'dzin 'di nyid sgom par byed pa la/_/gzungs de rnams kyang rnyed par 
[\[62b.3\]]dka' mi 'gyur/_/byang chub phyir ni dbang po zhi ba'i gnas/_/'di ni byin rlabs mtha' yas ston pa ste/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni bsnyen par byed pa yi/_/ye shes phra zhing yangs pa rnam par dag_/gang gis ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ma thos/_/mi rigs brtson pas 'di ni rtogs mi 'gyur/_/
[\[62b.4\]]yi ge thams cad rnam par bzlog pa ste/_/dbyangs kyis rnam par go bar nus ma yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' rig pas 'di shes te/_/chos kyi bdag pos ji ltar gang bshad pa/_/ting 'dzin 'di la sten par byed pa yi/_/zhi ba dag dang smad pa med pas rtogs/_/
[\[62b.5\]]brtson 'grus brtsams pas rab tu 'di bzung ste/_/bsnyen bkur byas shing rtag tu legs par bcangs/_/ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen par byed pa ni/_/sdug bsngal zad cing skye ba 'gog pa shes/_/chos rnams kun gyi skye ba med pa bstan/_/de ltar sred pa'i 'gro ba thams 
[\[62b.6\]]cad na/_/sangs rgyas grags chen dag gi ye shes mchog_/ting 'dzin de ni rgyal bas bshad mdzad dam/_/gzhon nu de yis tshigs bcad 'di thos nas/_/khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad rnams/_/dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro bzod pa der thob ste/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 
[\[62b.7\]]las ni mi ldog gnas/_/brtan pa'i stobs kyis gzhon nu de la smras/_/da dung 'jig rten mgon po de bzhugs so/_/khye'u khyod la ni don 'di dri bar bya/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni khyod kyis su las thos/_/gzhon nus smras pa rgyal po gsan du gsol/_/bdag gis 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]bskal pa gcig la sangs rgyas ni/_/bye ba khrag khrig mthong ste ri mor bgyis/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di yang bdag gis dris/_/gzhan yang bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong du/_/de dang der bdag skye ba dran par gyur/_/nam yang 
[\[63a.2\]]mngal du skyes par ma gyur to/_/de nas bdag gis ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms te/_/rgyal ba de dag 'chad pa dag par thos/_/thos nas bshad pa la yang mos bskyed de/_/nem nur med pas byang chub reg par bgyi/_/dge slong su dag bdag la kun 'dri zhing /_/ting 'dzin 'di la 
[\[63a.3\]]yongs su chud bgyid pa/_/de la bdag ni gus par ri mor bgyid/_/'jig rten don mdzad dag la bgyi ba bzhin/_/su las bdag gis tshigs bcad gcig tsam yang /_/lung mnos rjes 'thun spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/de dag la yang bdag ni ston pa snyam/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[63a.4\]]bzhin du gus pas ri mo bgyid/_/ting 'dzin yongs su chub par bgyid pa 'di/_/su dag la la bdag la 'dri ba yang /_/'jig rten 'dren pa rgyal bar mi 'gyur bar/_/rmi lam na yang bdag la the tshom med/_/dge slong rgan rabs bar ma gzhon nu la/_/bdag ni ri mo 
[\[63a.5\]]gus dang ldan par bgyid/_/ri mor ldan pas bdag gi snyan pa dang /_/de bzhin bsod nams grags pa yon tan 'phel/_/'thab cing rtsod pa dag la brtson mi bgyid/_/de tshe bdag ni brtson pa chung bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa bgyis pas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gyur/_/dge ba bgyis 
[\[63a.6\]]pas 'gro ba gzhan du 'gyur/_/mi rigs brtson par sbyor zhing ma bsdams pa/_/de dag gi ni mi snyan tshig thos nas/_/de tshe bdag gir bgyi ba las su 'dzin/_/las rnams bgyis pa rnam par chud mi za/_/de la khro ba'i dbang du mi 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i 
[\[63a.7\]]bzod pa'i stobs 'dzin te/_/'dren pa dag gis rtag tu bzod pa bsngags/_/bzod pa bsgoms na byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/bdag kyang rtag tu tshul khrims ldan par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims la yang gzhan dag rab tu 'god/_/tshul khrims bsngags pa rtag tu bdag 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]brjod de/_/de na bdag gi tshig kyang btsun par gyur/_/dgon pa'i bsngags pa dag kyang rtag tu brjod/_/tshul khrims la ni rtag par rab gnas te/_/rtag tu gso sbyong dag kyang 'dzin du stsal/_/de dag byang chub la yang yang dag btsud/_/de dag tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag 
[\[63b.2\]]bstabs/_/chos dang don rnams la yang rab tu gnas/_/gang la mtha' dang chags pa 'di med pa/_/byang chub lam la de dag sad par bgyis/_/bdag dran bskal pa 'das pa'i dus shig na/_/rgyal ba sgra yi yan lag dbyangs byung ste/_/de yi spyan sngar bdag gis dam bcas 
[\[63b.3\]]pa/_/bdag ni rtag tu bzod pa'i stobs ldan bgyi/_/yi dam bcas pa de la gnas nas ni/_/lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu phrag bzhir yang /_/bdag la bdud kyis shin tu smad cing spyos/_/'on kyang bdag gi sems ni yong ma 'khrugs/_/der ni bdud kyis bgams shing sad 
[\[63b.4\]]na yang /_/bdag gi byams bzod brtan pa 'tshal nas ni/_/sems dang bdag gi rkang la phyag 'tshal te/_/lnga brgya byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs/_/bdag ni rtag tu ser sna med par gyur/_/gtong ba'i bsngags pa dag kyang khor mor 'chad/_/phyug cing nor 
[\[63b.5\]]ldan bdag nyid chen por gyur/_/mu ge'i tshe yang bdag nyid sbyin bdag gyur/_/dge slong su dag ting 'dzin 'di 'dzin cing /_/su dag klog cing su dag lung nod pa/_/de dag la ni bdag kyang bsnyen bkur bgyid/_/de dag thams cad mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/_/bdag ni 
[\[63b.6\]]bla na med pa'i las de yis/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po mang po mthong /_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang rab byung ste/_/rtag tu chos smra ba ni mkhas par gyur/_/sbyangs pa la yang rtag tu bdag brtson te/_/bas mtha' dgon pa la yang khor mor gnas/_/kha zas phyir ni 
[\[63b.7\]]tshul 'chos mi bgyid de/_/ngan ngon tsam dag gis kyang chog shes gyur/_/bdag ni rtag tu phrag dog ma mchis te/_/bdag ni khyim la'ang chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyim la chags pa dag ni phrag dog skye/_/phrag dog ma mchis nags dgon dga' bar bgyid/_/bdag 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]ni rtag tu byams la gnas par gyur/_/gshe zhing sdigs kyang khro ba mi skyed de/_/byams pa la yang gnas pa des pa yi/_/snyan pa'i phreng ba phyogs bzhir rab tu mched/_/rtag tu chog shes 'dod pa nyung bar gyur/_/dgon par gnas shing sbyangs pa'i yon 
[\[64a.2\]]tan brtson/_/bsod snyoms len pa dag kyang mi gtong ste/_/sbyangs pa la yang yi dam brtan par gyur/_/rtag tu dang bar bcas shing dad par gyur/_/khor mor sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa mang /_/dad pa mang ba'i phan yon 'di lags te/_/byad bzhin bzang zhing dbang po 
[\[64a.3\]]ma nyams gyur/_/gang dag 'chad pa de la bdag gnas te/_/bdag ni rtag tu nan tan snying por bgyid/_/nan tan snying por bgyid la lha klu yang /_/rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ri mor bgyid/_/yon tan ji snyed brjod pa 'di dag dang /_/gzhan yang rnam pa du ma mang po yod/_/
[\[64a.4\]]sangs rgyas byang chub rtogs par su 'dod pa/_/mkhas pa 'di dag rtag tu bslab par bgyi/_/'di bas ches mang dka' ba spyad pa ni/_/sngon gyi bskal pa du mar mang spyad dran/_/da ltar de dag brjod par mi nus kyis/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du da mchi'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[64a.5\]]dpa' shes rab rno mkhas des/_/de yi mod la mngon shes lnga thob nas/_/de yang srog chags bye ba brgyad cu dang /_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rgyal ba'i drung du song /_/brtan pa'i stobs kyang mchog tu dga' rangs nas/_/de tshe bye ba brgya phrag drug cu dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung 
[\[64a.6\]]du nyer lhags te/_/zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas ni spyan sngar 'dug_/rgyal po de yi lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas/_/rkang gnyis dbang pos ting 'dzin 'di bshad de/_/rgyal po des kyang ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/_/rgyal srid btang ste ma chags rab tu byung /_/rab tu byung nas ting 
[\[64a.7\]]'dzin 'di la sgom/_/klog cing 'chad de rab tu ston par byed/_/bskal pa drug cu 'das pa'i 'og tu de/_/pad ma bla ma zhes bya rgyal bar gyur/_/rgyal po lhan cig rgyal ba'i drung 'ongs pa/_/bye ba brgya phrag drug cu mi nyung ba/_/de dag kyang ni ting 'dzin 'di thos nas/_/de tshe 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]dga' zhing mgu bas rab tu byung /_/de dag rab tu byung nas ting 'dzin 'di/_/bzung zhing bklags te rab tu ston par byed/_/bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu 'das nas ni/_/bskal pa gcig la byang chub mchog reg ste/_/mtshan ni ye shes bla ma mtha' yas pa/_/lha mis mchod pa'i 
[\[64b.2\]]sangs rgyas rnams su gyur/_/de la rkang gnyis gtso bo re res kyang /_/sems can gang gA'i bye snyed grol bar byas/_/byang chub spyod pa mchog 'di spyod pa na/_/nga ni rgyal po dpal gyi stobs su gyur/_/nga yi bu dag lnga brgya yod pa yang /_/rjes su chos rnams skyong ba 'di dag yin/_/
[\[64b.3\]]de tshe gang su nga yi mar gyur pa/_/de ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul nyid yin te/_/bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhir tshang ba yi/_/nga yi bu mo de kun mya ngan 'das/_/stobs brtan zhes bya rgyal po gang byung ba/_/rab tu mdzod mang 'khor los sgyur ba'i mchog_/de tshe rgyal po zas gtsang de yin te/_/de 
[\[64b.4\]]dang der yang nga yi yab tu gyur/_/de ltar ngas ni bskal pa bye stong du/_/le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa yis/_/byang chub mchog 'di yang dag sgrub pa na/_/ting 'dzin yongs su tshol ba rnam par dag_/gzhon nu de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang /_/ting 'dzin 'di 
[\[64b.5\]]la sgom par 'dod pa dag_/brtson 'grus brtsams shing srog la mi lta bar/_/gzhon nu rtag par nga yi rjes su slobs/_/sangs rgyas mang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur 
[\[64b.6\]]pa la bka' stsal pa/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de la yon tan gyi phan yon 
[\[64b.7\]]bzhir rig par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsod nams zil gyis mi non par 'gyur/_phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/_ye shes dpag tu med par 'gyur/_spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]chen po gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang lung nod pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de la yon tan gyi phan yon 'di bzhi yod par rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[65a.2\]]'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/rtag pa'i dus su bsod nams kyang /_/shin tu zil gyis ma non 'gyur/_/byang chub spyod pa bye brag 'phags/_/mchog tu dag pa spyod pa na/_/dpa' 
[\[65a.3\]]bo rtag pa'i dus su yang /_/bsod nams dag gis bsrung bar 'gyur/_/de la phas kyi rgol ba dag_/su yang 'tshe bar yong mi byed/_/rtag pa'i dus su sangs rgyas kyis/_/yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rtag pa'i dus su ye shes kyang /_/dpag tu med par 'gyur ba yin/_/
[\[65a.4\]]zhi ba'i rten 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/spobs pa dag kyang mtha' yas 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/_/rtag tu bsod nams phung po zil mi non/_/byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod pa na/_/phas kyi rgol ba med cing mi tshugs 'gyur/_/de yi ye shes yangs shing rno bar 
[\[65a.5\]]'gyur/_/de bzhin spobs pa dag kyang mtha' yas 'gyur/_/mig kyang dag 'gyur rtag tu mkhas pa de/_/dran pa'i stobs dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang 'byung /_/don gyi tshig rnams rab tu ston byed na/_/mkhas pa dag gi shin tu yid 'ong 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin zhi mchog 'di ni 
[\[65a.6\]]rab bshad na/_/shes rab ldan pa skye bo mang pos rig_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/_/chos gos dam pa mchog dang mal cha dang /_/mgron du gnyer dang bza' zhing bca' ba'ang rnyed/_/shin tu gzhon zhing blta na sdug par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 
[\[65a.7\]]mchog 'di tshol ba na/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po mang po mthong /_/'dren pa dag la mtshungs med mchod pa byed/_/de la bar chad dag kyang 'byung mi 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/_/sems dga' tshigs bcad snyan pa brgya dag gis/_/'jig 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]rten mgon po'i spyan sngar bstod 'gyur te/_/de ni nyams par nam yang yong mi 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/_/de yi mdun du 'jig rten mgon po ni/_/mtshan dang dpe byad mdzes pa'i sku bzhugs te/_/de yi ye shes nyams par yong mi 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[65b.2\]]zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/_/nam yang zhum pa'i sems su mi 'gyur te/_/rtag tu phyug cing dbul po ma yin 'gyur/_/sems kyang 'dzin cing chags par yong mi 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di rab bzung na/_/mi khom par yang gnas par mi 'gyur te/_/sa bdag 
[\[65b.3\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/de yi rgyal srid rtag tu bde bar 'ong /_/bskal pa brgyar ni bshad kyang mi zad de/_/ye shes yangs pa de la the tshom med/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba'i sa 'di thos nas ni/_/brtan pa ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin gnas/_/bskal pa bye ba mtha' 
[\[65b.4\]]yas dpag med du/_/stobs bcus de yi phan yon brjod na yang /_/cha tsam du ni yongs su brjod mi 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs blangs pa bzhin/_/de tshe gzhon nu de yang rab dga' bas/_/langs nas rab tu thal sbyar phyag 'tshal te/_/mgu rangs stobs bcu 
[\[65b.5\]]yi ni mngon sum 'dug_/tshig rab mchog gis ched du rjod pa brjod/_/'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/_/mi gtsos 'di dag ji tsam du/_/phan yon legs par rab bshad pa/_/dpa' bo chen po bsam mi khyab/_/phyi ma'i dus na su dag ni/_/mdo sde 'di la 
[\[65b.6\]]nyan par 'gyur/_/phan par dgongs shing thugs brtse ba/_/dpa' bo chen po bdag la gsungs/_/ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs kyis/_/ston pas de la bshad mdzad de/_/bcom ldan chags med ye shes can/_/tshig kyang 'di skad rab tu gsung /_/su dag chos kyi 
[\[65b.7\]]rjes slob cing /_/mdo sde 'di ni nyan 'gyur ba/_/nan tan bla na med pa yang /_/gzhon nu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rab tshol bas/_/mi dbang dag la mchod byed cing /_/byams pa'i sems la snyen byed pa/_/mdo sde 'di ni nyan par 'gyur/_/
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs/_/yon tan mchog la bsnyen byas shing /_/nan tan la yang gnas nas su/_/mdo sde 'di ni nyan par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po'i bstan pa la/_/gang gis tshul khrims bshig pa dang /_/sdig pa byed pa'i 
[\[66a.2\]]lag nas ni/_/mdo sde 'di yang thos mi 'gyur/_/dpa' bo tshangs par spyod pa dang /_/gang gi sems kyang mi brkam zhing /_/sangs rgyas dag gis byin brlabs pa/_/de dag lag nas thos par 'gyur/_/gang gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag_/'jig rten mgon po ri mor 
[\[66a.3\]]byas/_/de dag la gnas mdo sde 'di/_/phyi ma'i dus na thos par 'gyur/_/gang dag tshe rabs snga ma la/_/mu stegs can du gyur pa ni/_/de dag mdo sde 'di thos na/_/yid ni dga' zhing bder mi 'gyur/_/nga yi bstan pa 'di la ni/_/'tsho ba 'dod phyir rab byung nas/_/
[\[66a.4\]]rnyed dang bkur stis zil gyis non/_/gcig la gcig kyang smod par byed/_/dge slong dbang po ma bsdams pa/_/gzhan gyi bud med rab snyegs shing /_/tshul khrims 'chal pa rnyed pa 'dod/_/mdo sde 'di la dad mi byed/_/sangs rgyas brnyes pa'i bsod nams dang /_/
[\[66a.5\]]bsam gtan thob par mi 'dod cing /_/bdag tu 'du shes gnas pa dag_/mdo sde 'di la dad mi byed/_/phyi ma'i dus na 'byung ba ni/_/'jig rten bsam gtan 'bras bur 'dzin/_/dgra bcom bsod snyoms zos nas kyang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub smod par byed/_/
[\[66a.6\]]'dzam bu yi ni gling 'di ni/_/mchod rten ci yod kun bshig pas/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs na/_/sdig pa 'di ni khyad par che/_/gang gis gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/dgra bcom dag ni bsad pa bas/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di spangs na/_/sdig pa 'di ni khyad par che/_/
[\[66a.7\]]mi bzad pa yi phyi dus la/_/dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab bshad par/_/khyed la su dag spro ba yod/_/de tshe gzhon nu langs nas ni/_/ngu zhing rgyal la 'di skad gsol/_/sangs rgyas thugs kyi sras po yis/_/'di skad seng ge'i sgra yang 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]bsgrags/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das/_/mi bzad pa yi phyi dus la/_/lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste/_/bdag gis mdo sde rgyas par bgyi/_/byis pa rnams kyi mi bden pa/_/brgyad cing spyos pa bzod par bgyi/_/gshe ba dang ni bsdigs pa yang /_/'dren 
[\[66b.2\]]pa dang du blang bar bgyi/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la/_/ngan sems dag ni bskyed pa 'am/_/gang sngon bdag gis sdig pa yi/_/las rnams bgyis pa byang bar bgyi/_/spyi bo la ni phyag bzhag ste/_/sangs rgyas gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[66b.3\]]pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/zla 'od la ni ston pa gsung /_/gzhon nu phyi ma'i dus dag la/_/khyod kyis tshangs par spyod pa dang /_/srog gi bar chad mi 'byung bar/_/khyod la byin gyis brlab par bya/_/chos smra ba ni gzhan dag kyang /_/brgyad brgya po dag langs nas ni/_/phyi ma'i 
[\[66b.4\]]dus la bdag cag kyang /_/mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa lags/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin yang /_/bye ba brgyad cu nyer lhags te/_/gzhan yang khrag khrig drug cu rnams/_/'jig rten mgon la 'di skad smra/_/dge slong dag ni 'di rnams las/_/de ring su dag langs pa rnams/_/phyi dus 
[\[66b.5\]]de tshe bdag cag gis/_/'dren pa rab tu bsrung bar bgyi/_/mdo sde 'di ni bshad pa'i tshe/_/ston pa yi ni byin rlabs kyis/_/gang gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yi/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/_/zhing rnams ji snyed rab g.yos pas/_/kun tu sangs rgyas sprul pa dag_/
[\[66b.6\]]'jig rten mgon pos rab bkye ste/_/de dag gis kyang chos rab bstan/_/zhing de so so re rer yang /_/sems can bye ba bsam mi khyab/_/de tshe de 'dra'i chos thos nas/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni ye shes bkod/_/sangs rgyas kyi yang zhing 'di nas/_/sems can bye ba dgu bcu 
[\[66b.7\]]rnams/_/byang chub kyi ni sems bskyed de/_/sangs rgyas la yang me tog 'thor/_/bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu na/_/bskal pa gcig la thams cad kyang /_/rnam par 'dren pa nyid 'gyur zhes/_/de dag mi gtsos lung bstan to/_/dge slong dang ni dge slong ma/_/dge bsnyen 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]pha dang dge bsnyen ma/_/srog chags bye ba bdun cu drug_/gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pa/_/de dag mi gtsos lung bstan te/_/byang chub spyod pa rab spyod cing /_/gang gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yi/_/'jig rten 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rab 
[\[67a.2\]]tshol bas/_/thams cad la yang mchod pa byed/_/mdo sde bla na med pa 'di/_/de dang der yang thos par 'gyur/_/byams pa yi ni sangs rgyas la/_/bla na med pa'i mchod byas te/_/dam pa'i chos mchog bzung nas ni/_/bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gang na sangs rgyas 
[\[67a.3\]]rdul bral ba/_/tshe dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs/_/de la byang chub mchog gi phyir/_/mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur/_/mdo sde dam pa 'di thos na/_/ma 'ongs pa yi bskal par ni/_/grangs med bdun cu rtsa gsum du/_/ngan 'gro rnams su yang mi 'gro/_/phyi ma'i 
[\[67a.4\]]dus la su dag ni/_/mdo sde dam pa nyan 'gyur zhing /_'chang ngam klog par byed pa yang /_/de dag kun gyis nga la mchod/_/ji snyed mdun na 'dug pa rnams/_/thams cad la yang bsgo bya ste/_/ngas ni dka' bas thos pa yi/_/byang chub 'di yang yongs su gtad/_/ting nge 
[\[67a.5\]]'dzin rjes su gtad pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 
[\[67a.6\]]'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa thos nas mi skrag par 'dod pa dang mi dngang bar 'dod pa dang dngang bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos 
[\[67a.7\]]par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su dri ba la mkhas par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su btsal ba la mkhas par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas mi skrag_/mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]stsal pa dang /_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ji lta bur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la 
[\[67b.2\]]mkhas pa lags/_sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[67b.3\]]'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang 
[\[67b.4\]]rab tu 'don pa dang nyon mongs pa med par bsgom pas sgom par byed pa dang /_mang du byed pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/sangs 
[\[67b.5\]]rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dri ba la mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos na mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting 
[\[67b.6\]]nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la nges par bstan pa na zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa 
[\[67b.7\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das las thos nas de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di rab tu thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa yang mngon par shes 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]pa chen po thob par gyur to/_/sems can dpag tu med pa yang snying rje chen por 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i sems skyes so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_/rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'gul 
[\[68a.2\]]rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/_chem chem rab tu chem chem kun tu rab tu chem chem/_'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/_shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/_nub 
[\[68a.3\]]phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/_byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/_lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/_mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/_dbus dma' na mtha' mtho zhing /_snang ba dpag tu med pa yang 'jig rten du byung /_lha'i spos kyi char chen po yang mngon par bab bo/_/
[\[68a.4\]]lha dang lha'i bu ji snyed chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus te lhags pa de dag nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las yon tan gyi phan yon gyi tshig dpag tu med pa 'di dag thos nas lha dang lha'i bu de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi 
[\[68a.5\]]rangs te/_rab tu dga' ba dang tshim pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas a la la zhes ga zha sgrogs pa'i sgra byed do/_/lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi char chen po 'bebs so/_/lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang rab tu rdung ngo /_brjod pa gcig pa'i dbyangs kyis tshig 
[\[68a.6\]]'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/a la la bdag cag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/_'di ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das las yon tan gyi phan yon bsgrub pa'i tshig dpag tu med pa 'di dag thos nas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyang cig char 'thun par byang chub sems 
[\[68a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas ji ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]thob par bgyi'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das 'khor rgya mtsho'i nang na chos ston pa la dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can zhes bya ba rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sil snyan lnga brgya dang bcas te nam mkha' las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de 
[\[68b.2\]]nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lha'i mdun sa chos bzang na ji lta ba bzhin du rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/glu dbyangs dag ji ltar len pa de bzhin du deng lha'i lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[68b.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yang mchod pa'i phyir glu dbyangs rab tu sbyar ro/_/de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can sil snyan thogs pa lnga brgya po de dag dang sgra gcig tu sbyar te/_pi bang gi khog pa bai dUr+ya las byas pa dag kyang thogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 
[\[68b.4\]]blangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par rtogs pa la mkhas pa 'thob pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid 
[\[68b.5\]]rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo ba dang /_dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can la yang rgyud kyi sgra dang glu'i sgra la mkhas pa bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ngas bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon 
[\[68b.6\]]par 'du mdzad de/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan lnga brgya po shin tu legs par sbyar ba/_legs par blangs pa de dag las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don dang ldan pa chos nyid dang ldan pa'i sgra byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par rtogs pa'i tshigs su 
[\[68b.7\]]bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo /_/skra gcig khyon la sangs rgyas mang po ni/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ci yod snyed/_/rgyal ba de dag zhing yang de snyed de/_/de dag mtshan nyid mi 'dra skal mi mnyam/_/skra yi khyon la 'gro ba lnga rnams te/_/sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]'gro ba dang /_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams zhugs/_/'dres pa med cing gnod par 'gyur ba'ang med/_/de yi gnas su mtsho dang rgya mtshor bcas/_/chu klung de bzhin mtshe'u dang lteng ka rnams/_/'dres pa med cing gnod par mi 'gyur te/_/de ltar rgyal 
[\[69a.2\]]ba'i chos ni bsam mi khyab/_/de yi gnas su ri bo du ma ste/_/khor yug dang ni lhun po rab lhun dang /_/btang bzung dang ni btang bzung chen po dang /_/'bigs byed bya rgod phung po gangs kyi ri/_/gnas der sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa/_/tsha dang rab tu tsha ba nyams mi dga'/_/
[\[69a.3\]]de na sems can dmyal skyes tshor ba yi/_/sdug bsngal de dag rjes su myong bar byed/_/de yi gnas na lha yi gzhal med khang /_/de dag dpag tshad bcu gnyis dbyangs dga' ba/_/lha rnams stong phrag mang po de dag kyang /_/lha yi dga' ba shin tu bde ba myong /_/de yi gnas su 
[\[69a.4\]]sangs rgyas rnams skye zhing /_/'jig rten rig pa'i bstan pa 'bar ba snang /_/gang gis rnam dag spyod pa ma sbyangs pa/_/ye shes bral ba dag gis de mi mthong /_/de yi gnas nyid na yang chos nub cing /_/'dren pa mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra yang thos/_/de yi gnas nyid na yang la la yis/_/
[\[69a.5\]]'dren pa bzhugs te chos kyang ston ces thos/_/de yi gnas nyid na yang la la dag_/tshe tshad lo ni bsam yas bzhugs snyam 'dzin/_/de yi gnas na'ang 'chi ba'i dus byed cing /_/ring du mi 'tsho zhes ni sgra yang thos/_/gnas der la la 'di snyam 'du shes te/_/yid kyi 'du shes dang ni 
[\[69a.6\]]'dzin pa yis/_/bde gshegs mthong mchod sangs rgyas mnyes byas snyam/_/skyes pa med cing mchod pa byas pa'ang med/_/mi dag bdag gi khyim na rmi lam bzhin/_/'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' myong nas/_/phyir sad nas kyang de yis gdod ma mthong /_/de ni rmi lam 
[\[69a.7\]]yin par de yis shes/_/de bzhin mthong thos rig dang bye brag phyed/_/'di dag thams cad mi bden rmi lam bzhin/_/gang gis ting 'dzin 'di yang thob gyur pa/_/des ni chos kyi rang bzhin 'di dag shes/_/su la'ang sdug dang mi sdug med pa ni/_/mi de 'jig rten na yang bde 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]skyid rtag_/su dag nags khrod mngon par dga' ba yi/_/dge sbyong de ni shin tu bde ba myong /_/su dag ci la'ang bdag gir bya ba med/_/yongs su 'dzin pa rnam pa kun tu spangs/_/bse ru bzhin du 'jig rten 'di na gnas/_/nam mkha' la ni rlung dag rgyu ba bzhin/_/lam 
[\[69b.2\]]rnams bsgoms shing ye shes rab tu zhugs/_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa bdag med par/_/chos rnams 'di dag gang gis rab bsgoms pa/_/de yi spobs pa dag ni mtha' yas 'gyur/_/su dag 'jig rten na ni yid chags med/_/de dag sems ni rtag tu rlung dang 'dra/_/sdug 
[\[69b.3\]]dang mi sdug la yang chags pa med/_/'jig rten na ni mi de shin tu skyid/_/mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa sdug bsngal te/_/sdug pa dang yang bral ba sdug bsngal yin/_/mthar byas 'di gnyis rab tu spangs nas ni/_/mi gang chos la dga' ba de dag skyid/_/gang zhig chos 'di 
[\[69b.4\]]thos nas chags byed cing /_/chos ma yin pa thos nas khong khro byed/_/nga rgyal rgyags pas bcom pa log pa de/_/nga rgyal dbang gis sdug bsngal rjes su myong /_/su dag mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas te/_/rtag tu khengs pa med cing 'dud pa med/_/sdug dang mi sdug pa 
[\[69b.5\]]las rab grol ba/_/de dag rtag tu grol yid legs par gnas/_/tshul khrims yongs su dag par rab gnas te/_/bsam gtan bsam mi khyab la rtag gnas shing /_/su dag nags khrod zhi bar dga' ba ni/_/de dag nam yang yid gnyis yong mi 'gyur/_/mi bden 
[\[69b.6\]]pa la su dag rab zhugs shing /_/byis pa 'dod pa'i yon tan rtag tu dga'/_/bya rgod dag ni ro la mos pa bzhin/_/de dag rtag par bdud kyi dbang du 'gro/_/yang pi bang gi sgra de las tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byung nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas 
[\[69b.7\]]kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa zab mo nges par rtogs pa la mkhas pa rjes su thob bo/_/dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga can yang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/lha dang mi yi skye dgu sems can dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]skyes so/_/sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi yang don byas par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[70a.2\]]gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dod pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslabs pa dang yon tan gyi tshogs 
[\[70a.3\]]thams cad gdon mi za zhing tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag par bya'o/_/'du 'dzi med pa mang zhing sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang chos tshol ba la brtson pa dang chos la don du gnyer ba dang chos 'dod pa dang 
[\[70a.4\]]chos la dga' ba dang chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzhon nu sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[70a.5\]]gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dod pa dang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas brtson 'grus brtsams shing lus dang srog la mi lta bar bya ste/_gang snying rje 
[\[70a.6\]]chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag rgyun mi chad par yongs su btsal bar bya/_g.yo med pas bsnyen par bya/_bsten par bya/_rim gror bya ste/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[70a.7\]]dag lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su btsal nas kyang de dag las snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_rab tu gdon par bya/_lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/_nyon mongs pa 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]med par bsgom pas bsgom par bya/_mang du bya gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/gang las snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la dga' ba dang gus pas ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/gzhon nu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[70b.2\]]dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su tshol ba dang sri zhu bya ba dang g.yog bya ba la yid mi skyo bar gyur pa de'i tshe gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/bde bar snying rje 
[\[70b.3\]]chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'thob bo/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du byas te rtag par dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal bar bya/_g.yo med pas bsten par bya/_bsnyen par bya/_rim gror bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[70b.4\]]gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi khar las na/_snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta ci smos/_gzhon nu de lta bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes 
[\[70b.5\]]gnyen yongs su btsal ba dang sri zhu bya ba dang g.yog bya ba la yid yongs su mi skyo bar bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis rtag tu de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis snying rje chen po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid shin tu brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od 
[\[70b.6\]]gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba bstan pa tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/'das pa'i bskal pa bye ba mang po ste/_/dpag tu med cing gzhal med bsam mi khyab/_/de tshe dbang tog rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes/_/'dren pa rkang gnyis 
[\[70b.7\]]gtso bo byung bar gyur/_/des ni ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad de/_/de la mi dang srog dang gang zag med/_/sgyu ma chu bur smig rgyu glog 'dra zhing /_/chos rnams thams cad chu yi zla ba bzhin/_/shi nas 'jig rten pha rol 'gro ba yi/_/sems can shed las skyes pa mi 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]dmigs kyang /_/las rnams byas pa med par mi 'gyur te/_/dkar gnag ji bzhin 'bras bu smin par byed/_/rigs pa'i tshul gyi sgo 'di bzang po ste/_/phra zhing mthong dka' rgyal ba'i spyod yul yin/_/gang la yi ge'i tshig kyang mi dmigs pa/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[71a.2\]]byang chub nyid ni bcom ldan mkhyen/_/yangs pa'i gzungs dang ye shes bsags pa ste/_/mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyang 'byung /_/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig spyod yul te/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni bcom ldan rab tu 'chad/_/'di ni na ba nad las thar byed pa/_/byang chub 
[\[71a.3\]]sems dpas bsgrubs pa'i nor yin te/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod cing rab tu bsngags/_/bye ba khrag khrig lha yis rab tu mchod/_/skye bo byis pa kun la yang dag ston/_/mu stegs can gyis rtag par yongs su spangs/_/tshul khrims nor ni mchog tu sangs rgyas 
[\[71a.4\]]gsungs/_/nam mkha' la ni glog bzhin chags mi 'gyur/_/gang gis rgyal ba bye ba rab mchod cing /_/sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad pa mkhas pa dang /_/sngan chad sdig pa'i grogs po spangs pa dag_/de dag gi ni bla med pha rol nor/_/de na dge slong chos smra 'dug pa dag_/
[\[71a.5\]]tshangs par spyod pa bde gshegs thugs kyi sras/_/rjes su 'thun pa'i chos 'di thos nas ni/_/'jig rten 'dren par sems kyang bskyed par gyur/_/'dren pa dbang tog rgyal mtshan rgyal po yis/_/chos smra de la yang ni tshig gsungs pa/_/dge slong dngos po mchog 
[\[71a.6\]]tu bya dka' yis/_/byang chub dam pa mchog la sems skyed cig_/nor bu rin chen 'dra bar tshul khrims srungs/_/rjes su 'thun pa'i grogs la rtag par sten/_/sdig pa'i grogs la nam yang ma bsten dang /_/sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs 'thob/_/dbang po tog 
[\[71a.7\]]gi rgyal mtshan rgyal ba'i drung /_/gang gis byang chub sems mchog bskyed pa ni/_/de dag thams cad chos smrar rab 'gyur te/_/tshangs par spyod pa bde gshegs thugs kyi sras/_/dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/_bam po bdun pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslab pa dang yon tan gyi chos thams 
[\[71b.2\]]cad la gdon mi za bar bya'o/_/'du 'dzi mang ba ma yin par bya'o/_/sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang yongs su dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa dang chos la don du gnyer ba dang chos 'dod pa dang chos la 
[\[71b.3\]]dga' ba dang chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang chos dang chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa la zhugs par bya'o/_/des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/gang las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la yang des dga' ba dang gus pas ston par 
[\[71b.4\]]'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslab pa dang yon tan gyi chos thams cad gdon mi za ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par blangs te gnas na de myur du spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa las nges par 'byung bar 
[\[71b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nem nur dang yid gnyis dang the tshom gyi mun pa sel ba'i phyir snang ba lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[71b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bslab pa dang yon tan gyi chos thams cad nges par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brjod pa'i phyir zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i gtam gyi rgyud tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan pa/_sngon 
[\[71b.7\]]byung 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya ba 'dir/_/g.yel ba med pa'i khye'u mchog gnyis byung ste/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la rab byung nas/_/bse ru bzhin du nags khrod stug por gnas/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing bsam gtan bzhi rnams thob/_/snyan dngags bstan 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]bcos mkhas shing rdzogs pa ste/_/bar snang gi ni rjes dang sa yang rig_/de dag nam mkha' la yang thogs med 'gro/_/de dag nags khrod stug po bsil ba der/_/me tog sna tshogs yid du 'ong bas gang /_/bya yang sna tshogs mang 
[\[72a.2\]]pos bsnyen pa der/_/phan tshun du ni gtam dag rab tu smra/_/rgyal po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'chor zhing song song na/_/sgra grags nas ni nags tshal der 'ongs te/_/rgyal pos chos smra de gnyis mthong nas ni/_/de la mchog tu dga' ba nye bar bzhag_/de dang rjes su 'thun pa'i 
[\[72a.3\]]gtam byas nas/_/de dag rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug pa dang /_/rgyal po de yi dmag mang mtha' yas pa/_/bye ba khrag khrig drug cu nye bar lhags/_/de nas chos smra de dag so so nas/_/rgyal po de la smras pa rgyal rigs nyon/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba mchog tu rnyed par dka'/_/
[\[72a.4\]]sa yi bdag po rtag tu bag yod gyis/_/tshe ni rtag tu 'gro zhing mi gnas te/_/ri yi chu bo bzhin du myur du 'gro/_/nad dang mya ngan rga bas gzir ba la/_/khyod la dge ba'i lam 'dra skyabs gzhan med/_/rgyal po'i glang po chos rnams bskyang bar gyis/_/stobs bcu ldan pa'i 
[\[72a.5\]]bstan pa 'di yang srungs/_/zad pa'i dus la shin tu 'jig pa'i tshe/_/rgyal po'i glang po chos kyi phyogs gnas gyis/_/de ltar de tshe mkhas pa de dag gis/_/rnam pa du mar mi dbang gdams pa byas/_/rgyal po khrag khrig drug cur bcas pa yis/_/de tshe byang chub tu ni 
[\[72a.6\]]sems bskyed do/_/de tshe rgyal po'i glang po chos thos nas/_/des shing dge ba'i chos rnams smra ba la/_/rangs shing yid bde dga' ba rab skyes nas/_/rkang pa la yang phyag 'tshal de nas song /_/rgyal po de yi dge slong mang po dag_/rnyed pa 'dod cing de yi khyim du 'jug_/
[\[72a.7\]]de dag de mi 'dra ba'i spyod mthong nas/_/de la rgyal po de ltar ri mo med/_/bstan pa de yang ston pa 'das pa yi/_/de tshe lo yi tha mar gyur pa ste/_/'dzam bu'i gling na snod gyur rab tu nyung /_/ma bsdams pa dag shin tu mang po byung /_/de nas dge slong mang po brkam zhing chags/_/
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]rnyed pa 'dod cing dmigs pa'i lta ba can/_bde gshegs bstan pa rab tu zhig pa'i tshe/_/rgyal po de yang bsgyur cing byed du bcug_/chos smra gnyis po 'di ni gsad par gyis/_/'di dag mu stegs chad par smra ba ste/_/yun ring spyod par yang dag 'dzud byed kyang /_/
[\[72b.2\]]de dag gang du'ang mya ngan 'da' mi ston/_/las kyang 'jig cing rnam par smin pa 'jig_/tshul 'chos 'di dag phung po med ces smra/_/rgyal po 'di dag yul nas spangs nas ni/_/'dir yang chos ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur/_/de dag gi ni tshig thos de yi tshe/_/rgyal po'i glang 
[\[72b.3\]]po the tshom byung bar gyur/_/chos smra gnyis po 'di ni gsad par bya/_/btang snyoms bzhag na gnod par 'gyur srid snyam/_/rgyal po de phyir 'brang ba lha mo zhig_/tshe rabs snga mar lhan cig spyod pa spyad/_/yun ring dus nas phan 'dod mkhas pa ste/_/de yis rgyal po de la 'di skad 
[\[72b.4\]]smras/_/rgyal rigs sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig dag gis/_/'di lta bu yi sems ni ma skyed cig_/dge slong chos smra mkhas pa gnyis po 'di/_/sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig gis ma spong shig_/de dag gis ni nags khrod ci bshad pa/_/shin tu 'jigs pa mi bzad dus 
[\[72b.5\]]kyi tshe/_/rgyal po'i glang po chos kyi phyogs gnas kyis/_/mi yi bdag po cung zad mi dran nam/_/rgyal po yang dag tshig gis bskul ba yis/_/de ni rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi gtong gyur/_/de tshe rgyal po'i nu bo ma rungs pa/_/nyen kor rgyal po byed pa des rbad de/_/rgyal po khyod 
[\[72b.6\]]kyi gcen ni sdig pa can/_/bdag gi srog kyang nam du 'dod mi byed/_/dge slong gnyis po rig sngags drag ldan pa/_/de dag nam mkha' la yang sngags kyis 'gro/_/de thos nas ni khyod kyi drung du 'ong /_/thams cad 'dus te gsol ba 'debs pa ni/_/rig sngags drag ldan 
[\[72b.7\]]'di gnyis myur du sod/_/phyis gdod 'gyod par gyur na ma legs so/_/de tshe rgyal po'i glang po go bgos nas/_/sdig pa'i grogs kyi tshig gis der chas te/_/rgyal po dmag sde kun gyis yongs bskor nas/_/nags nas dge slong gang na yod par lhags/_/rgyal po mi zad 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]drag shul sems rig nas/_/klu dang gnod sbyin nags der gnas pa yis/_/rdo dang so phag char phab phyir bskrad de/_/des ni rgyal po sde dang bcas pa btags/_/ltos shig sdig pa'i grogs kyi tshig gis ni/_/de tshe ma rungs rgyal po 'chi dus byas/_/chos 
[\[73a.2\]]smra dag la khro ba byas pas na/_/der ni tshe rabs drug cur mnar med song /_/rgyal rigs rgyal po gang gis rbad pa yi/_/dge slong dmigs lta mang po de dag kyang /_/tshe rabs bye ba brgya phrag bsam yas su/_/sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/_/lha mo 
[\[73a.3\]]gang gis rgyal po bskul bstan cing /_/gang gis chos smra de dag bsrungs pa ni/_/sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye ma mnyam pa mthong /_/spyad pa spyod cing de dag mchod pa byas/_/bye ba khrag khrig drug cu mtha' yas pas/_/rgyal po dang ni lhan cig chos thos shing /_/byang chub tu 
[\[73a.4\]]ni sems mchog bskyed pa dag_/'jig rten khams mang du yang sangs rgyas gyur/_/de dag tshe tshad bskal pa bye ba mang /_/de dag ye shes gzhal med bsam mi khyab/_/de dag kun gyis ting 'dzin bzang po 'di/_/bshad nas rkang gnyis gtso bo mya ngan 'das/_/
[\[73a.5\]]tshul khrims tshangs pa yon tan ye shes bsags/_/bla na med pa'i tshig 'di thos nas ni/_/g.yeng ba med par bag yod spyod cig dang /_/sangs rgyas ye shes ring por mi thogs 'thob/_/phyogs bcu dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/sems zhi snying rje byams 
[\[73a.6\]]pa'i spyan mnga' ba/_/'jig rten kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen mthong /_/'jig rten kun tu chos kyi char 'bebs 'gyur/_/gzhon nu khye'u mchog gnyis po byung ba yang /_/gzhan yin snyam na de ltar mi blta ste/_/mar me mdzad ni de na gcig tu gyur/_/de tshe 
[\[73a.7\]]chos smra gnyis pa nga yin no/_/gang gis rjes su 'thun pa'i chos thos pa/_/rgyal po der yang byams pa de tshe gyur/_/lha mo phan 'dod mkhas pa gang byung ba/_/gzhon nu khyod ni de tshe der gyur to/_/rgyal po de yi nu bo gang byung ba/_/dge slong chos smra 'di gnyis sod cig ces/_/
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]dge slong rnyed pa 'dod pas rbad pa ni/_/lha sbyin de yi tshe na der gyur to/_/sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[73b.2\]]po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas lus dang srog la ma chags par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu lus dang srog la chags pa'i phyir sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon 
[\[73b.3\]]par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang srog la ma chags pa rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par mi dka' na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos/_gzhon nu de lta bas na lus dang srog la yang ma chags par bya'o/_/
[\[73b.4\]]zhes de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_rtag tu khor mor rnag gi lus 'di la/_/byis pa rnams ni rab tu chags byed de/_/srog la 'ju zhing bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir/_/mi mkhas pa dag rtag tu sdig pa byed/_/su dag snying po med pa'i lus srog la/_/
[\[73b.5\]]lhag par chags pa yod pa ma yin pa/_/de dag gis ni bdud kyi sde bcom ste/_/byang chub shing drung byang chub rab tu rtogs/_/su dag bdag med stong pa'i lus rnams dang /_/srog kyang rmi lam g.yo ba zil pa 'dra/_/'di gnyis la ni chags par byed 'gyur ba/_/de dag shi 
[\[73b.6\]]'phos sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/lus nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang 
[\[73b.7\]]myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yin te/_gzugs kyi skus rab 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]tu phye ba ma yin no/_/gzhon nu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la smon par 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shes par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_
[\[74a.2\]]rab tu gdon par bya/_lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/_bsgom par bya bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par bya/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni bsod nams brgya pa las skyes pa'i blo dang don gcig tu bstan pa yin 
[\[74a.3\]]te/_chos las skyes pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba/_zab pa tshad med pa tshad med pa'i chos mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bshig pa/_mi g.yo ba mi gnas pa shin tu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/_mi snang ba mig gi lam las 
[\[74a.4\]]yang dag par 'das pa ni chos kyi skur rab tu shes par bya ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_bsam pa'i sa dang bral ba/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi skyod pa/_spros pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_gnas med pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la smon par 'dod pa 
[\[74a.5\]]rnams kyi sgra las shin tu 'das pa'i snying po ste 'dod chags las yang dag par 'das pa/_dbyer mi phyed pa ste zhe sdang las yang dag par 'das pa brtan pa ste/_gti mug las yang dag par 'das pa stong pa nyid du bstan pas nges par bstan pa ma skyes pa skye ba las yang dag par 'das 
[\[74a.6\]]pa/_tha snyad du brtags pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa bye brag med pa/_sgras mya ngan las 'das pa dbyangs kyis zhi ba/_brdas mtshungs par gyur pa/_don dam pas brdar gyur pa/_yang dag pa ji lta ba'i tshig gis don dam pa/_yongs su gdung ba med pas bsil ba/_
[\[74a.7\]]gnas med pa/_gzhal du med pa/_kha dog bstan pas mu med pa/_mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyang ba las byung ba ste/_gzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/'di 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]'dra'i 'jig rten mgon po'i sku/_/su dag shes par 'dod pa ni/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni sgom gyis dang /_/sangs rgyas sku ni shes par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas sku ni dag pa ste/_/bsod nams brgya skyes 'od kyang gsal/_/de ni bar snang mtshungs pa ste/_/de la tha dad bya ba med/_/
[\[74b.2\]]sangs rgyas byang chub ci 'dra ba/_/mtshan rnams kyang ni de 'dra ste/_/de yi mtshan rnams ci 'dra ba/_/de yi sku yang de 'dra'o/_/sku ni byang chub mtshan nyid de/_/sangs rgyas zhing yang de 'dra zhing /_/stobs dang rnam thar bsam gtan yang /_/de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig_/
[\[74b.3\]]de ltar sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur te/_/'jig rten mgon po'i de 'dra bas/_/sus kyang sha yi mig gis ni/_/nam yang mthong bar mi nus so/_/mang po dag kyang 'di skad smra/_/ngas ni 'jig rten 'dren pa mthong /_/sku yang gser gyi kha dog la/_/'jig rten thams cad snang 
[\[74b.4\]]bar mdzad/_/sangs rgyas dag gi byin rlabs dang /_/mthu dang rnam par sprul pa yis/_/de ltar mtshan gyis spras pa yi/_/sku dag shin tu snang ba yin/_/bongs tshod khrun dang sboms su yang /_/sangs rgyas sku ni bshad mod kyis/_/sku yi tshad ni ma rnyed de/_/de phyir bsam gyis mi 
[\[74b.5\]]khyab bo/_/sangs rgyas sku ni 'di tsam zhes/_/gal te tshad kyang rnyed gyur na/_/lha dag dang ni mi rnams dang /_/ston pa bye brag med par 'gyur/_/mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyi ni/_/rnam par smin pa'ang de yi mtshan/_/ming dang gzugs kyang de 'dra mtshan/_/rnam par 
[\[74b.6\]]dag cing 'od gsal 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis/_/bskal pa bye bar bsnyen pa ltar/_/sus kyang ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di/_/nam yang goms par ma byas so/_/dkar po'i chos ni mang po yis/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni bskyed pa ste/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni rgya che bas/_/
[\[74b.7\]]nga yi lus kyang mi snang ngo /_/gang gi sems ni ci 'dra ba/_/ming dang gzugs kyang de 'dra ste/_/rang bzhin med pa'i sems kyi ni/_/ming dang gzugs kyang mtshan de 'dra/_/ming dang gzugs la gang gi ni/_/'du shes rags pa 'jug pa yang /_/skal pa mi mnyam 'du shes 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]kyis/_/rags pa'i sems kyang skye bar 'gyur/_/ming dang gzugs la su dag gi/_/'du shes phra mo 'jug pa ni/_/ming dang gzugs la ma chags pas/_/sems ni rab tu 'od gsal 'gyur/_/ngas dran sngon gyi tshe rabs ni/_/grangs med pa dag bdun du yang /_/
[\[75a.2\]]sdig pa'i 'du shes gsum po dag_/nam yang skyes par ma gyur to/_/nga yi sems ni zag med de/_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang /_/nga yi lus ni mi snang ngo /_/ji ltar gang gi dngos po las/_/yid kyang rnam par grol gyur pa/_/de dag 
[\[75a.3\]]de yi dngos po dang /_/phyir yang phrad par mi 'gyur ro/_/dngos po kun las rnam pa kun/_/nga yi rnam shes rnam grol te/_/sems kyi rang bzhin shes pas na/_/phyir yang ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhing rnams bye ba phrag stong du/_/nga yi sprul pa dag kyang 'gro/_/sems can 
[\[75a.4\]]rnams kyi don kyang byed/_/de la lus kyang rnyed mi 'gyur/_/mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma med/_/ji ltar nam mkha' de bzhin du/_/nga yi sku yang brjod med cing /_/shes par dka' bar rab tu bstan/_/dpa' bo chen po chos kyi sku/_/sku ni chos las skyes pa ste/_/gzugs 
[\[75a.5\]]kyi skur ni nam du yang /_/rgyal ba gdags par yong mi nus/_/ji ltar bshad pa 'di dag kyang /_/thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ba ni/_/de la sdig can bdud kyis kyang /_/klan ka rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/zab mo yi ni chos thos nas/_/de la skrag pa mi 'byung ste/_/de ni srog 
[\[75a.6\]]gi phyir du yang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub spong mi byed/_/mdo sde bye ba phrag stong gi/_/yang dag bstan pa shes par 'gyur/_/gang dang gang du song bar yang /_/'jig rten dag la snang bar 'gyur/_/gzhon nu de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma dang las kyis kyang shes 
[\[75a.7\]]par sla ba ma yin te/_sngon po'am kha dog sngon po'am/_sngon po lta bur ston pa'am/_'od sngon po 'byung ba'am/_ser po'am/_kha dog ser po'am/_ser po lta bur ston pa'am/_'od ser po 'byung ba'am/_dmar po'am/_kha dog dmar po'am/_dmar po lta bur 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]ston pa'am/_'od dmar po 'byung ba'am/_dkar po'am/_kha dog dkar po'am/_dkar po lta bur ston pa'am/_'od dkar po 'byung ba'am/_le brgan nam/_kha dog le brgan nam/_le brgan lta bur ston pa'am/_'od le brgan 'byung ba'am/_shel lam/_shel gyi kha 
[\[75b.2\]]dog gam/_shel lta bur ston pa'am/_shel gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/_me'am/_me'i kha dog gam/_me lta bur ston pa'am/_me'i 'od 'byung ba'am/_mar gyi snying po'am/_mar gyi kha dog gam/_mar lta bur ston pa'am/_mar gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/_gser ram/_gser gyi 
[\[75b.3\]]kha dog gam/_gser lta bur ston pa'am/_gser gyi 'od 'byung ba'am/_bai dUr+ya'am/_bai dUr+ya'i kha dog gam/_bai dUr+ya lta bur ston pa'am/_bai dUr+ya'i 'od 'byung ba'am/_glog gam/_glog gi kha dog gam/_glog lta bur ston pa'am/_glog gi 'od 'byung ba'am/_tshangs 
[\[75b.4\]]pa'am/_tshangs pa'i kha dog gam/_tshangs pa lta bur ston pa'am/_tshangs pa'i 'od 'byung ba'am/_lha'am/_lha'i kha dog gam/_lha lta bur ston pa'am/_lha'i 'od 'byung ba'o/_/zhes shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/gzhon nu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dag pa ste/_mtshan 
[\[75b.5\]]ma dag gis bsam par bya ba ma yin pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa/_mtshan ma thams cad kyis kyang bstan par bya ba ma yin pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ma gtogs par lha dang bcas 
[\[75b.6\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang gzugs kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pas sku'i tshad gzung bar sla ba ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/'jig rten khams kyi rdul phran dang /_/rdul du ming yang ston pa dang /_/mtshe'u dang rdzing dang 
[\[75b.7\]]lting ka dang /_/rgya mtsho na yang ji snyed chu/_/'di snyed rdul phran yod do zhes/_/de dag la ni mtha' mi rnyed/_/rgya mtsho la ni skra rtse yis/_/chu thigs gzhal bar nus kyang ni/_/'jig rten mgon po'i dpe nyid du/_/yang dag bstan par mi rung ngo /_/chu yi thigs pa 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]dpag med cing /_/de bzhin rab tu phra ba'i rdul/_/de bas sems can gcig gi yang /_/shin tu mang du ngas mthong ste/_/mos pa dang ni sems bskyed pa/_/du ma dag ni shes mi sla/_/ngas ni sku yi yon tan dag_/yang dag pa ni gang bstan pa/_/sems 
[\[76a.2\]]can kun gyi mos pa yang /_/de dag dpe ru bzod mi 'gyur/_/mtshan ma dang ni las rnams dang /_/kha dog snang ba 'di 'dra zhes/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni shes mi nus/_/nga yi bye brag de 'dra'o/_/sangs rgyas mtshan ma bral ba ste/_/chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye/_/zab cing 
[\[76a.3\]]dpag tu med pa ste/_/de phyir sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas bsam du med pa yi/_/sangs rgyas sku yang bsam du med/_/sku de bsam du med pa yi/_/chos kyi sku yis rab tu phye/_/sangs rgyas sku ni sems kyis kyang /_/bsam par bzod pa ma yin te/_/
[\[76a.4\]]de ltar de yi sku la yang /_/tshad kyang nye bar mi dmigs so/_/chos rnams de dag dpag tu med/_/bskal pa bye bar bsnyen pas na/_/de phyir nga yi lus kyang ni/_/'od gsal bsam du med pa grub/_/sems can kun gyis gzung du med/_/tshad kyis gzung bya ma yin 
[\[76a.5\]]te/_/de lta sangs rgyas sku dag ni/_/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/tshad med pa yi chos dag gis/_/de la tshad ni brtag tu med/_/ma brtags pa yi chos dag gis/_/de ltar sangs rgyas ma brtags so/_/rtog pa dag ni tshad du bstan/_/rtog pa 
[\[76a.6\]]med pa tshad med yin/_/mi rtog rtog dang bral bas na/_/de phyir sangs rgyas bsam du med/_/ji ltar nam mkha' tshad med la/_/sus kyang gzhal du mi nus pa/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas sku dag kyang /_/nam mkha' nyid dang 'dra zhing mtshungs/_/sangs rgyas sku ni 
[\[76a.7\]]de lta bur/_/gang gis rig pa rgyal ba'i sras/_/de dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ci nas kyang bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon sum du bya bar 'dod de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang chos 
[\[76b.2\]]so so yang dag par rig pa dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa 'di bzhi mngon sum du bya'o snyam na/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag 
[\[76b.3\]]par bya/_rab tu gdon par bya/_lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/_nyon mongs pa med par bsgom pas bsgom par bya/_gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya/_bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson par bya'o/_/gzhon nu de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/_
[\[76b.4\]]gzhon nu gzugs su brjod pa ji snyed yod pa gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yang de snyed do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams ji snyed pa dang gzhon nu rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yang 
[\[76b.5\]]de snyed de/_gzhon nu de ltar gzugs su brjod pa mtha' yas mu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gzhon nu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i brjod pa 
[\[76b.6\]]mtha' yas mu med de/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/gzhon nu de ltar 'dus byas la 'ang nyes pa grangs med/_mya ngan las 'das pa la yang phan yon grangs med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[76b.7\]]bsngags pa yang grangs med do/_/gzhon nu 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i ming ji snyed yod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa yang de snyed do/_/gzhon nu 'di ltar mya ngan 'das pa'i ming grangs med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa yang grangs med do/_/
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]gzhon nu 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par brjod pa ste/_de dag mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ni ma yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'du byed brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang dbyangs 
[\[77a.2\]]brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_gzhon nu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod pa bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di bzhi ni 
[\[77a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa ste/_de dag ni mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_bzhi po de dag nyid de/_de bzhin du rgyas par bstan par bya'o/_/gzhon nu 'di 
[\[77a.4\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i tshul bsam gyis 
[\[77a.5\]]mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[77a.6\]]rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgo 
[\[77a.7\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges par bstan pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed nges 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba nges par bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 
[\[77b.2\]]'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgra bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[77b.3\]]dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i 
[\[77b.4\]]tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig gi lam bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas 
[\[77b.5\]]nyon mongs pa'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i tshig gi lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgongs te bshad pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis 
[\[77b.6\]]mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i dgongs te bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub 
[\[77b.7\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi lha la nges par rtog pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]lha la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi la rtog pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[78a.2\]]pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mi la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ming la rtog pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi 
[\[78a.3\]]khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i ming la rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[78a.4\]]kyi 'jug pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[78a.5\]]pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrol ba bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrol ba bsam 
[\[78a.6\]]gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i sgrol ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdo rje'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i 
[\[78a.7\]]rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rdo rje'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bzhi ste/_
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam gyis mi 
[\[78b.2\]]khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 
[\[78b.3\]]rnam par byang ba sgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[78b.4\]]dang kun nas nyon mongs pa mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mdo sde'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btags pa'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed btags pa'i tshig 
[\[78b.5\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba btags pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni 
[\[78b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par 
[\[78b.7\]]byang ba snang ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsal ba'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gsal ba'i tshig 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba gsal ba'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[79a.2\]]'du byed kyi spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba spyod pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang 
[\[79a.3\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyad pa'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa spyad pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba spyad pa'i tshig 
[\[79a.4\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 
[\[79a.5\]]tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtha' yas pa'i tshig bzhi 
[\[79a.6\]]ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mtha' yas pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi 
[\[79a.7\]]khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ba med 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba rgyu ba med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs 
[\[79b.2\]]su bshad pa mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal du med pa'i tshig 
[\[79b.3\]]bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa gzhal du med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba gzhal du med pa'i tshig 
[\[79b.4\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi grangs med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[79b.5\]]pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba grangs med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpag tu med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed 
[\[79b.6\]]dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba dpag tu med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/
[\[79b.7\]]gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshad med pa'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa tshad med pa'i tshig 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba tshad med pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i tshig bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs 
[\[80a.2\]]su bshad pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa'i tshig bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsags pa bzhi ste/_bzhi 
[\[80a.3\]]gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di 
[\[80a.4\]]bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i rigs bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa'i rigs 
[\[80a.5\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bsags pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du 
[\[80a.6\]]byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i spobs pa bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[80a.7\]]dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdo sde bsags pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_/'du byed kyi mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[80b.2\]]pa'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i mdo sde bsags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[80b.3\]]pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[80b.4\]]nor bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon 
[\[80b.5\]]nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam 
[\[80b.6\]]par byang ba'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_
[\[80b.7\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]byed yongs su bshad pa'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[81a.2\]]'du byed kyi spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[81a.3\]]rnams kyi lam bsgom pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i lam bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i lam 
[\[81a.4\]]bsgom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa kun nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[81a.5\]]shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi 
[\[81a.6\]]gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i 'bras bu yod pa'i shes 
[\[81a.7\]]pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma rig pa shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]nas nyon mongs pa'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i ma rig pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi sdug bsngal 
[\[81b.2\]]shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i sdug bsngal shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon 
[\[81b.3\]]nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yid mi bde ba shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yid mi 
[\[81b.4\]]bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i yid mi bde ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbul po shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi 
[\[81b.5\]]khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i dbul po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub 
[\[81b.6\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi skye ba shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par
