[\[81b.7\]]byang ba'i skye ba shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i nang shes pa bsam gyis 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i nang shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyi rol shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi phyi 
[\[82a.2\]]rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i phyi rol shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub 
[\[82a.3\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis 
[\[82a.4\]]mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i ngo tsha shes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad 
[\[82a.5\]]pa'i bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i bden pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi srid pa shes pa bzhi ste/_
[\[82a.6\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i srid pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di 
[\[82a.7\]]bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dngos po shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i dngos po shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gang zag shes pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed 
[\[82b.2\]]yongs su bshad pa'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i gang zag shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'di bzhi'o/_/gzhon nu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dmigs pa 
[\[82b.3\]]shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa bzhi ste/_mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'du byed kyi dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'du byed yongs su bshad pa'i dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis 
[\[82b.4\]]mi khyab pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rnam par byang ba'i dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmigs pa shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 
[\[82b.5\]]bstan pa bzhi ste/_de dag ni mthar phyin pa'i gnas su bstan par sla ba ma yin no/_/gzungs bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'du byed thams cad mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs dang po'o/_/dbyangs mtha' yas par 
[\[82b.6\]]bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs gnyis pa'o/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes pa 'di ni gzungs gsum pa'o/_/rnam par byang ba'i yon tan gyis phan yon mtha' yas par bshad pa brjod pa de la gang shes 
[\[82b.7\]]pa 'di ni gzungs bzhi pa ste/_gzungs bzhi po ni 'di dag go/_/gzhon nu 'di ltar gzungs gang yin pa de ni shes pa'o/_/de ni chos so/_/'di ltar chos shes pas chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/chos shes pa la don gang yin pa de ni don so so yang dag 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]par rig pa zhes bya'o/_/chos shes pa la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/_/chos shes pa la tha snyad du ston pa dang 'chad pa dang 'dogs pa dang rab tu ston pa dang rab tu 'god pa dang 'byed pa dang rnam par 'byed pa dang gsal 
[\[83a.2\]]bar byed pa dang tshig thogs pa med pa dang tshig mi 'dor zhing ma lkugs mi dig pa dang /_tshig zhum pa med pa 'di ni gzhon nu spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 
[\[83a.3\]]ji snyed pa/_/gzugs su brtags pa'ang de snyed de/_/gzugs su brtags pa ji snyed pa/_/gzugs su brjod pa 'ang de snyed do/_/gzugs su brjod pa ji snyed pa/_/tshul khrims ming yang de snyed do/_/tshul khrims ming yang ji snyed pa/_/sangs rgyas ming yang de snyed 
[\[83a.4\]]do/_/sangs rgyas ming ni ji snyed pa/_/sems can ming yang de snyed do/_/sems can gcig gi ming yang ni/_/de snyed du ni ngas bshad do/_/ming dang brjod pa mtha' yas pa/_/gang dag ngas ni sngar bshad rnams/_/tshul khrims ming dang sangs rgyas ming /_/sems 
[\[83a.5\]]can ming dang de dag mtshungs/_/'dus byas nyes pa ji snyed pa/_/mya ngan 'das bsngags de snyed de/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni bsngags pa dang /_/dpe yang de snyed ngas bshad do/_/ji snyed sems can thams cad kyi/_/sems rnams skye ba nges bstan pa/_/'jig rten mgon po'i 
[\[83a.6\]]spu gcig nas/_/'od zer dag kyang de snyed 'byung /_/sems can kun gyi mos pa dang /_/ming rnams ji snyed yod pa bas/_/de bas mi yi dbang po yi/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag bsngags pa mang /_/sems can kun gyis ming yod pa/_/de dag sems can gcig la bstan/_/
[\[83a.7\]]sems can gcig ming ji snyed pa/_/sems can kun gyi ming du bstan/_/so so yang dag rig 'jug pa/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa ste/_/byang chub sems dpa'i phyir yang ni/_/ming rnams mtha' yas nges par bstan/_/mdo sde bye ba bsam yas rnams/_/ji ltar 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]bshad snyam gang sems pa/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab brjod la/_/zhum pa med par bshad par gyis/_/'khor gyi nang du thogs med par/_/mdo sde bye ba rab tu 'chad/_/ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' med pa/_/de bzhin de la'ang chos rnams ston/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[83b.2\]]dag_/sems can dag pa skyob pa rnams/_/mdo sde 'di dag bzung nas ni/_/ye shes phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/dad pas ji lta ji lta bur/_/tshul 'di rab tu ston byed pa/_/de bzhin de yi ye shes 'phel/_/gangs ri la ni sdong po bzhin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[83b.3\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/_bam po brgyad pa/_gzhon nu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod na chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing bla na 
[\[83b.4\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta bas gzugs las gzhan du byang chub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_gzugs las gzhan du 
[\[83b.5\]]yang byang chub la mi spyod/_gzugs las gzhan du yang byang chub yongs su mi tshol/_gzugs las gzhan du yang byang chub yang dag par mi sgrub/_gzugs las gzhan du yang sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud/_gzugs las gzhan du yang 
[\[83b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ste/_gzugs kyi mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs par lta'o/_/gzugs kyang gzhan gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan no zhes de ltar mi lta'o/_/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan de bzhin gshegs 
[\[83b.7\]]pa yang gzhan no zhes de ltar yang mi lta'o/_/gzugs kyis ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar lta na chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod do/_/de bzhin du 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]tshor ba las gzhan du ma yin/_'du shes las gzhan du ma yin/_'du byed rnams las gzhan du ma yin te/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan du byang chub mi mthong /_rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang byang chub la mi spyod/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang 
[\[84a.2\]]byang chub yongs su mi tshol/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang byang chub yang dag par mi sgrub/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ste/_rnam 
[\[84a.3\]]par shes pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs par blta'o/_/rnam par shes pa yang gzhan/_rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan no zhes de ltar mi lta'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan 
[\[84a.4\]]no zhes de ltar yang mi lta'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar lta na chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[84a.5\]]kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gzugs kyis kyang ni byang chub bstan/_/byang chub kyis kyang gzugs bstan te/_/mi mtshungs pa yi sgra rnams kyis/_/chos kyi bla ma rab tu bstan/_/sgra yis gzugs kyi bla ma ste/_/ngo bo nyid kyis zab pa dag_/
[\[84a.6\]]gzugs dang byang chub mnyam pa ste/_/tha dad bya ba de mi rnyed/_/mya ngan 'das pa zab par yang /_/sgra yis rab tu bstan pa ltar/_/mya ngan 'das pa mi rnyed de/_/de yi sgra yang mi rnyed do/_/sgra dang mya ngan 'das pa ni/_/gnyi ga rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_/de bzhin stong pa'i 
[\[84a.7\]]chos rnams la/_/mya ngan 'das pa rab tu bstan/_/mya ngan 'das dang 'da' bar ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa mi rnyed de/_/'di ni chos rnams 'jug med pa/_/phyis ni ci 'dra de bzhin sngon/_/chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/_/mya ngan 'das dang mtshungs mnyam 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]par/_/sangs rgyas bstan la brtson pa yi/_/'byung ba lhur byed rnams kyis rig_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sku mthong nas/_/'dren pa mthong zhes smra mod kyi/_/nga ni gzugs kyi sku lus su/_/sus kyang blta bar mi nus so/_/gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar/_/gzugs kyi 
[\[84b.2\]]ngo bo nyid shes te/_/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes na/_/nga yi sku yang nges par bstan/_/de bzhin phung po lnga rnams kyi/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid ngas shes te/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shes nas ni/_/chos kyi sku la rab tu gnas/_/chos kyi sku la rab gnas nas/_/sems can rnams la 
[\[84b.3\]]chos ston to/_/chos kyi sku la mi rten par/_/sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas dag gi chos rnams ni/_/tshig gis bshad par mi nus te/_/'di 'dra'i tshul rnams mi shes pas/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sgra thos nas/_/tshig tsam gyis ni 'di skad smra/_/ngas ni 
[\[84b.4\]]'dren pa mthong zhes te/_/'du shes thams cad spangs pa la/_/srid par 'du shes med par 'gyur/_/sgrar ni 'du shes 'dzin pa la/_/nams kyang ston pa mthong ba med/_/'di lta bu yi gzugs kyi mtshan/_/stong pa nyid ni sus shes pa/_/gzugs kyi rang bzhin gzhan 
[\[84b.5\]]yin la/_/stong nyid gzhan du ma gsungs te/_/gang gis gzugs rnams rab shes pa/_/des ni stong nyid rab tu shes/_/gzugs kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra bar/_/stong pa gang gis rab shes pa/_/des ni bdud rnams bye ba snyed/_/zil gyis mnan te pham byed nus/_/
[\[84b.6\]]gang gis gzugs rnams rab shes pa/_/des ni stong pa nyid kyang shes/_/gang gis stong nyid rab shes pa/_/des ni mya ngan 'das pa shes/_/rnam pa 'di ni mi shes pas/_/dmigs pa can rnams rab tu brlag_/dngos po med la dngos 'dzin cing /_/dngos med 
[\[84b.7\]]la yang dngos su 'dzin/_/shes kyi khe yis bslus pa dag_/nga yi bstan las shin tu 'khyams/_/'bras bur 'du shes gnas pa la/_/dge sbyong nor ni gsog tu gyur/_/brtson 'grus nyams pa le lo can/_/tshul khrims phung por mi gnas pa/_/kun 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]nas langs pas smra ba ni/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bshad ma yin/_/la la dag ni 'di skad du/_/bdag cag byang chub zhugs zhes zer/_/ma dul zhing ni ma byang ba/_/gcig la gcig kyang ri mo med/_/chos dag la yang mi gnas shing /_/sgra 'dod pa dag 
[\[85a.2\]]'byung bar 'gyur/_/de lta bu ni de mos te/_/shes kyi khe ni tshol ba'i phyir/_/'dus pa dag la sems byed cing /_/rnyed pa 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyags dang bag med zil non pas/_/rnyed dang bkur sti don du gnyer/_/bkur sti rnyed la brten nas ni/_/shes kyi 
[\[85a.3\]]khe rnams tshol ba dag_/gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten byed/_/khyim mi mo la chags shing mos/_/dmigs pa dag la rten byed cing /_/'dod pa'i sred la shin tu gnas/_/bdud kyi yul du gnas nas ni/_/khyim pa dag gi las byed 'gyur/_/'dod pa me lce 'dra 
[\[85a.4\]]ba ni/_/khyim pa dag la ston par 'gyur/_/de dag gi yang khyim zhugs nas/_/de yi rigs kyang sun byed 'gyur/_/de dag la ni khyim pa rnams/_/ston pa nyid du 'du shes 'gyur/_/rab tu gnas bcas de dag gi/_/bu dang chung ma sun par byed/_/su dag de la zas skom 
[\[85a.5\]]gyis/_/phan 'dogs pa ni byed par 'gyur/_/de yi bu mo bud med la/_/chung ma nyid du 'du shes 'gyur/_/de dag 'dir ni rab byung nas/_/ji ltar gzhan gyi bud med chags/_/khyim pa bdag gi chung ma la/_/de ltar mos shing chags mi 'gyur/_/khyim pa skya bo'i 
[\[85a.6\]]gos gyon la/_/ngas ni bslab pa gang bshad pa/_/de tshe dge slong de dag la/_/bslab pa de yang med par 'gyur/_/de dag rnga dung rdza rnga yis/_/nga la mchod pa byed 'gyur te/_/mchod pa'i dam pa gang yin pa/_/nan tan 'di ni med par 'gyur/_/de dag bdag nyid 
[\[85a.7\]]tshul khrims 'chal/_/tshul khrims gnas pa mthong nas ni/_/phan tshun du yang 'di skad du/_/'di dag nged dang 'dra zhes smra/_/sdig pa'i spyod yul tshul khrims 'chal/_/de dag tshul khrims bsngags thos nas/_/kun nas langs pa 'di skad du/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]mkhyen pa 'di min smra/_/de dag la ni ngo tsha med/_/dge sbyong gi ni nor stor te/_/mi bden tshig gis rtsod byed cing /_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu spong /_/ngan sems ldan pa de dag ni/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di bor te/_/chos rnams rab tu spangs nas ni/_/mnar 
[\[85b.2\]]med par yang gnas par 'gyur/_/gang dag spyod pa de 'dra ba/_/ngas ni ma thos ma mthong ste/_/byis pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas ye shes thob mi 'gyur/_/de dag gi yang tshul 'chos dang /_/de la g.yo yang ci yod pa/_/thams cad de bzhin ngas shes 
[\[85b.3\]]te/_/de la nga yi ye shes 'jug_/de yi 'khrul pa mang po ni/_/gal te bskal par rab bshad kyang /_/byang chub sems dpar khas 'che yi/_/cung zad tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur/_/gzhon nur gyur pa de dag ni/_/sdig pa mi byed yong med de/_/phyi ma'i dus la 
[\[85b.4\]]de dag dang /_/khyod ni ston par ma byed cig_/smra ba dang ni gtam gyis la/_/de dag la ni ri mor gyis/_/byang chub dam pa'i don gyi phyir/_/zhum pa med par bkur sti gyis/_/lo grangs du lon kun dris la/_/de dag rgan par gyur na yang /_/de la ri mo legs 
[\[85b.5\]]gyis la/_/rkang pa la yang mgos phyag 'tshol/_/byang chub snying po rnams mthong na/_/de dag 'khrul pa mi blta'o/_/de la khong khro mi bskyed cing /_/rtag tu byams pa'i sems su bya/_/gang gi 'khrul pa ci mthong yang /_/de dag gi ni nyes mi brjod/_/ci 'dra 
[\[85b.6\]]ba yi las byas pa/_/'bras bu de 'dra thob par 'gyur/_/bzhin gyi zla ba 'dzum bzhin du/_/rgan rabs dang ni gsar bu la/_/rtag tu gsong por smra ba dang /_/des shing nga rgyal bcom par bya/_/chos gos dang ni bsod snyoms kyis/_/de dag la ni phan gdags 
[\[85b.7\]]shing /_/'di dag thams cad 'dren 'gyur zhes/_/de ltar khyod kyi sems zhog shig_/gal te chos kyi sbyin pa'i phyir/_/de dag khyod la gsol 'debs na/_/dang por tshig ni 'di skad smros/_/kho bos mtshungs med ma bslabs so/_/'di skad du ni tshig brjod de/_/
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa mkhas shing rig_/bdag nyid chen po'i mdun du ni/_/bdag gis ga la bshad nus smros/_/gya tshom du ni ma smra bar/_/de dag gi ni snod rtogs la/_/snod du rung bar rig na ni/_/ma gsol bar yang bshad par gyis/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa 
[\[86a.2\]]'khor nang na/_/mang du gnas par mthong na khyod/_/yo byad bsnyungs pa ma chad par/_/sbyin pa yi ni bsngags pa brjod/_/tshul khrims gtsang la rab gnas shing /_/ji ste 'dod pa nyung yod na/_/byams pa'i sems ni bskyed nas su/_/yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam gyis 
[\[86a.3\]]shig_/gal te sdig pa 'dod nyung zhing /_/tshul khrims ldan pa mang yod na/_/de tshe phyogs rnyed gyur pa'i phyir/_/tshul khrims kyi yang bsngags pa brjod/_/thog mar 'khor rnams shes bya ste/_/gal te gtsang yod de yi tshe/_/dge ba'i chos rnams ji snyed pa/_/thams 
[\[86a.4\]]cad der ni rab tu bstan/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang /_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan thos pa dang /_/de bzhin 'dod nyung yo byad bsnyungs/_/rtag tu bsngags shing brjod par bya/_/dgon gnas bsam gtan bsten pa dang /_/'du 'dzir gnas pa spangs pa ni/_/
[\[86a.5\]]de dag gzungs kyi sgo yin te/_/'di yi bsngags pa brjod par bya/_/dgon par gnas pa mi spong zhing /_/tshul khrims la yang lhur mi gzung /_/nang du 'jog la bsten bya zhing /_/sbyin pa la ni lhur mi bya/_/tshul khrims phung por gnas nas ni/_/mang du thos pa bsgrub par 
[\[86a.6\]]bya/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni yongs btsal zhing /_/ston pa'i ring bsrel mchod par bya/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba btsal ba'i phyir/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang /_/spos dang phreng ba byug pa yis/_/sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa bya/_/dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sil snyan 
[\[86a.7\]]dang /_/glu dbyangs sbyar cing blangs nas su/_/zhum pa med cing mi g.yel bar/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni ring bsrel mchod/_/byang chub mchog gi don gyi phyir/_/spos dang phreng ba bdug pa dang /_/gos dang phye ma ji snyed pa/_/de dag kun gyis mgon mchod kyis/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]zhi ba 'di tshol phyir/_/mchod pa ji snyed ci yod pa/_/dpag med bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/sangs rgyas kun la mchod par gyis/_/bla med sangs rgyas ye shes te/_/chags med ye shes rab tshol bas/_/sems can kun la skal ba'i shas/_/mi gnas par ni 
[\[86b.2\]]mnyam par sbyin/_/mi gnas par ni gyur nas su/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba tshol ba'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rnams la ngas kyang sngon/_/mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab byas/_/sangs rgyas skye ba rnyed par dka'/_/mir skye ba yang rnyed par dka'/_/bstan pa la yang dad pa 
[\[86b.3\]]dang /_/rab byung bsnyen rdzogs rnyed par dka'/_/gang gis byang chub sems bsngos pa/_/de dag ston pa mnyes par byas/_/dam bcas pa las ma g.yo bar/_/khyod ni nan tan gnas par gyis/_/zad pa'i dus su nyer gnas tshe/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di bzung ste/_/
[\[86b.4\]]rab tu brjod pa gzung byas na/_/myur du spobs pa thob par 'gyur/_/tshigs bcad gcig tsam bzung ba yang /_/bsod nams phung po bsam yas na/_/nyan par 'dod pas mdo sde yang /_/thams cad gzung ba ci zhig smos/_/sems can thams cad byang chub thob/_/
[\[86b.5\]]de dag mi g.yel mchod byas te/_/bskal pa sems can snyed du yang /_/rtag tu gus par mchod pa bas/_/ting 'dzin dam pa 'di las ni/_/gang gis tshigs bcad gcig bzung ba/_/bsod nams snga ma thams cad ni/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/ting 
[\[86b.6\]]'dzin 'di ni thos nas su/_/su dag nem nur mi byed pa/_/phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni mkhyen pas rig_/so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon 
[\[86b.7\]]nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang /_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas thabs mkhas par bya'o/_/gzhon 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la nye du'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_/bsod 
[\[87a.2\]]nams kyi phung po ci yod pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rjes su yi rang bar byas te/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po la rjes su yi rangs nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 
[\[87a.3\]]dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po de sems can thams cad la gtang bar bya'o/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de thabs mkhas pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pas myur du ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob 
[\[87a.4\]]cing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sems can 'di dag thams cad bdag gi gnyen/_/'di yi bsod nams mang po ci yod pa/_/nyin 
[\[87a.5\]]yang lan gsum mtshan yang lan gsum du/_/byang chub sems bskyed rjes su yi rang ngo /_/su dag srog gi phyir yang sdig mi byed/_/tshul khrims rnam par dag la yi rang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' mos pa phun sum tshogs/_/de dag bsod nams ci yod yi rang ngo /_/
[\[87a.6\]]gang dag sangs rgyas dad cing de bzhin du/_/chos dang dge 'dun dad la yi rang ngo /_/byang chub nyid ni rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir/_/bde gshegs mchod pa byed la yi rang ngo /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub gdung ni gnas bya'i phyir/_/sems can don du blo gros chen po yis/_/bla med 
[\[87a.7\]]byang chub dam pa mchog tu ni/_/gang gis sems bskyed de la yi rang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' snying rjes non pa yis/_/nor dang 'bru dang rin chen btsun mo dang /_/sras dang sras mo rgyal srid rgyas pa dang /_/bdag gi sha yang gtong la yi rang ngo /_/shes rab 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]yongs su bsgoms pas lus dul zhing /_/thabs la mkhas pa'i bslab pa rab bslabs pas/_/sems can don du rab tu dga' sems kyis/_/bdag gi lus kyang gtong la yi rang ngo /_/gcig pu gnyis su med par nags gnas shing /_/rtag tu bse ru ltar 
[\[87b.2\]]gyur 'tsho ba gtsang /_/khor mor bya ba nyung zhing su dag ni/_/khe phyir tshul 'chos med la yi rang ngo /_/su dag sten par mi byed phrag dog med/_/khyim la sred par mi byed rtag par yang /_/khams gsum dag la rab tu 'jigs skrag ste/_/'jig rten ma chags spyod la 
[\[87b.3\]]yi rang ngo /_/srid par skye ba kun la rab skyo zhing /_/su dag spros pa med la yi rang ngo /_/rtsod pa med cing nye bar zhi ba'i sems/_/de la ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/_/gang gis 'du 'dzi nyes pa mthong nas ni/_/rtsod pa thams cad yongs spangs dgon par gnas/_/shing 
[\[87b.4\]]drung gnas shing rnam grol lhur byed pa/_/bde gshegs sras la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bdag la mi stod gzhan la mi smod cing /_/dgon par gnas pa dag la yi rang ngo /_/su dag bstan pa 'di la bag yod cing /_/bag med spangs pa de la yi rang ngo /_/byang chub phyogs 
[\[87b.5\]]kyi chos rnams ji snyed pa/_/kun gyi rtsa ba bag yod 'di yin te/_/sangs rgyas sras gang rtag tu bag yod pa/_/de dag ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa gter rnyed yin/_/rab tu byung ba gter ni gnyis pa ste/_/dad pa rnyed pa gter 
[\[87b.6\]]ni gsum pa yin/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni gter rnyed bzhi pa'o/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul stong pa 'di thos nas/_/'di la mi spong ba yang gter rnyed yin/_/spobs pa mtha' yas pa yang gter rnyed pa/_/gzungs rnams gang yin de dag gter gyi mchog_/dge ba'i 
[\[87b.7\]]chos rnams ji snyed rjod pa dag_/tshul khrims thos gtong bzod pa de bzhin te/_/thams cad kyi yang rtsa ba bag yod 'di/_/gter rnyed yin par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la bag yod cing /_/su dag la ni yang dag smon lam yod/_/
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]de dag ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di la nye bar gyur/_/rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na bag yod 
[\[88a.2\]]par bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par mi dka' na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci smos/_gzhon nu ji ltar na byang 
[\[88a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bag yod pa yin zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin no/_/gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/_gzhon 
[\[88a.4\]]nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa yin te/_de'i phan yon 'di dag nyon cig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[88a.5\]]dpa' chen po sbyin pa la mos pa'i phan yon ni bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de'i ser sna'i nyon mongs pa tshar bcad pa yin/_de'i sems rtag tu gtong ba'i rjes su spel ba yin/_skye bo mang po dang thun mong pa'i longs spyod las snying po len pa yin/_longs spyod 
[\[88a.6\]]chen po'i rigs su skye zhing skyes ma thag tu de gtong ba'i sems mngon du 'gyur ba yin/_'khor bzhi rnams la phangs shing sdug pa yin/_/'jigs pa med cing zhum pa med par 'khor gyi nang du 'gro/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su de'i rgya cher brjod pa'i sgra tshigs su 
[\[88a.7\]]bcad pa mngon par 'byung /_rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon pa yin/_rkang mthil mnyam zhing rab tu gnas pa yin/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'bral ba yin te/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]pa la mos pa'i legs pa ni 'di bcu'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_des ni ser sna tshar bcad cing /_/gtong ba'i sems kyang rnam par spel/_/snying po dag ni blangs par 'gyur/_/shin tu 'byor pa'i rigs su skye/_/skyes ma thag tu de yi sems/_/gtong ba dag 
[\[88b.2\]]la shin tu 'jug_/rab tu byung dang khyim pa yi/_/sems can rnams la phangs par 'gyur/_/'jigs pa med cing 'khor du yang /_/ma zhum par ni nye bar 'gro/_/grong dang grong khyer rnams su yang /_/de yi sgra ni rgya cher 'gyur/_/rkang lag dag ni 'jam pa yang /_/
[\[88b.3\]]rnyed dka' bar ni yong mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dang ni nyan thos dang /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen thob par 'gyur/_/ser sna'i sems ni nam yang mi 'byung ste/_/de yi sems ni rtag tu gtong la dga'/_/sems can bye ba mang la phangs par 'gyur/_/ser sna med 
[\[88b.4\]]pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/_/de ni nor mang rigs su skye bar 'gyur/_/skyes nas de yi yid ni gtong la dga'/_/snying po blangs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur/_/ser sna med pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/_/'jigs pa med par 'khor gyi nang du 'gro/_/phyogs su 
[\[88b.5\]]rgya cher de yi sgra yang grags/_/de yi rkang lag rtag tu 'jam par 'gyur/_/ser sna med pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par mi dka' ste/_/des ni sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos mthong /_/mthong nas de dag dad pas mchod pa byed/_/ser sna 
[\[88b.6\]]med pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/_/sbyin pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//_//gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phan yon 'di bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ye shes kyis rjes su bskor cing 
[\[88b.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su slob pa dang /_mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pa dang /_dam bcas pa las mi g.yo ba dang /_nan tan la gnas pa dang 'khor ba las 'byor pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa dang kun nas ldang 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]ba med par gnas pa dang ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob pa dang /_mi dbul bar 'gyur te/_gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phan yon no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_ye shes yongs su rdzogs byed cing /_/
[\[89a.2\]]sangs rgyas dag gi rjes su slob/_/mkhas pa dag gis ma smad pa/_/rtag tu 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/dam bcas pa las mi g.yo zhing /_/nan tan la yang rab tu gnas/_/mya ngan 'das pa thob byed cing /_/'khor ba las kyang shin tu 'byor/_/kun nas ldang ba med gnas 
[\[89a.3\]]shing /_/ting nge 'dzin rnams myur du 'thob/_/dbul por yang ni mi 'gyur te/_/tshul khrims phung por rab tu gnas/_/de yi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rjes su slob/_/de ltar de yi tshul khrims yongs dag cing /_/de la mkhas 
[\[89a.4\]]pa dag ni smod mi byed/_/dam bcas pa las mkhas pa mi g.yo zhing /_/de ltar dpa' bo nan tan gnas par byed/_/'khor ba'i nyes pa mang po mthong nas ni/_/'byol zhing mya ngan 'da' bar de yis 'gro/_/de ltar tshul khrims stobs la gnas pas na/_/de yi sems ni kun 
[\[89a.5\]]nas ldang mi 'gyur/_/nyon mongs med pa'i ting 'dzin myur du 'thob/_/tshul khrims dag pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/_/tshul khrims nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//_//gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa la gnas shing 
[\[89a.6\]]byams pa la spyod pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mes mi tshig_/mtshon gyis mi sod/_dug gis mi tshugs/_chus mi 'chi/_lha rnams de la srung bar byed/_lus mtshan gyis brgyan pa thob par 'gyur/_de'i ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad bcad 
[\[89a.7\]]par 'gyur/_de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnyed pa mi dka' bar 'gyur/_de bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/de'i lus la dga' ba dang bde ba mi 'dor bar 'gyur te/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa la gnas pa/_byams pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]phan yon ni 'di bcu'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_/de ni mes kyang mi tshig ste/_/mtshon gyis kyang ni sod mi 'gyur/_/lus la dug gis mi tshugs te/_/chus kyang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la lha rnams srung byed de/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan kyang 'byung /_/de yi ngan 'gro kun bkag ste/_/
[\[89b.2\]]bzod la gnas pa'i phan yon 'di/_/tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin yang /_/de la rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/rtag tu bde bar gnas byed cing /_/dga' ba dag kyang bsam yas 'gyur/_/de ni me dang mtshon gyis yong mi sod/_/bye brag tu ni chu nang mi 'chi ste/_/lha dang de 
[\[89b.3\]]bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin srung /_/byams la gnas pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/de yi lus la sum cu gnyis mtshan 'byung /_/de ni phyir yang log ltung 'gro mi 'gyur/_/shi 'phos nas ni tshangs pa'i gnas su skye/_/bzod la gnas pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/de ni nyin mtshan 
[\[89b.4\]]dag kyang bde bar 'da'/_/lus ni dga' bas rtag tu khyab par 'gyur/_/bzod cing des pa'i stobs la de gnas pas/_/mkhas pa rtag tu dang ba'i sems su 'gyur/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_
[\[89b.5\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsnyen dka' bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba 'thob pa dang lhas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang /_des thos pa'i chos yongs su mi nyams pa dang sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams 'thob pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs 'thob 
[\[89b.6\]]pa dang nad nyung bar 'gyur ba dang de'i zas rnams kyang yang dag par bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur ba dang /_pad ma lta bur 'gyur zhing mda' ste'u kham ltar mi 'gyur ba ste/_gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i phan yon no/_/
[\[89b.7\]]de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_bsnyen dka' bar yang rtag tu 'gyur/_/de la le lo yod min te/_/lha rnams kyang ni srung bar byed/_/sangs rgyas dag ni myur du mthong /_/smon lam yongs su rdzogs byed de/_/ting 'dzin rigs ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/de la nad kyang mi 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]'byung ste/_brtson 'grus ldan pa'i yon tan 'di/_/de yi zas dang skom dag kyang /_/bde bar 'ju ste rmya ba med/_/chu yi nang na ud pal dag_/rim gyis skye bar 'gyur ba ltar/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yang /_/dkar po'i chos kyis rnam par 'phel/_/
[\[90a.2\]]de yi nyin dang mtshan mo yang /_/'bras bu yod par 'da' bar 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus brtsam pa de bzhin gshegs/_/bskal pa du mar bsgrubs pa yis/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ldan/_/de yi phan yon 'di dag bshad/_/des pa brtson 'grus brtsams 'gyur te/_/rgyal ba dag 
[\[90a.3\]]gis yongs su bzung /_/lha yang de la smon pa skyed/_/sangs rgyas byang chub myur 'tshang rgya/_/de yi thos pa yang mi 'bri/_/chos gzhan mang po smra bar byed/_/de yi spobs pa rgya cher 'phel/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i phan yon 'di/_/ting 'dzin rigs kyang myur du 'thob/_/
[\[90a.4\]]de la nam yang nad mi 'byung /_/des ni kha zas ci zos pa/_/bde bar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur/_/mi g.yel brtson 'grus brtsams pa yi/_/dkar po'i phyogs ni nyin mtshan 'phel/_/de ltar brtson 'grus stobs ldan pas/_/ring por mi thogs byang chub 'gyur/_/gzhon 
[\[90a.5\]]nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la mos pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spyod pa la gnas pa dang spyod yul la spyod pa dang yongs su gdung ba med par gnas pa dang dbang po sbas par 'gyur ba dang /_/dga' ba myong ba dang 
[\[90a.6\]]'dod pa las dben pa dang bsam gtan gsog gis tshim pa med pa ma yin pa dang bdud kyi yul las thar ba dang sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa dang /_rnam par grol ba rab tu smin par byed pa ste/_gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la 
[\[90a.7\]]mos pa'i phan yon no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_spyod pa dag la de gnas pas/_/de ni spyod pa med mi 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor pa ni spyod yul spyod/_/spyod yul ma yin rnam par spong /_/gdung ba med par de gnas te/_/dbang po bsdams shing sbas pa yin/_/de ni dga' 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]ba myong byed de/_/bsam gtan sgom pa'i spyod yul lo/_/'dod pa'i sred la 'dod chags bral/_/bsam gtan bde la sten byed de/_/bdud kyi yul las de thar cing /_/sangs rgyas yul la de gnas so/_/rnal 'byor bye brag 'di yin te/_/gcig pu nags khrod mos byed 
[\[90b.2\]]cing /_/rnam par grol ba yongs su skong /_/de ni bcu pa'i gnas yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni spyod la gnas/_/spyod pa ma yin thams cad rnam par spang /_/spyod yul ma yin spangs nas spyod yul gnas/_/ting 'dzin brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/de la gdung 
[\[90b.3\]]ba nam yang gdung mi 'gyur/_/'phags pa'i bde bar gnas pa reg nas su/_/lus dang sems rnams kyang ni bde bar 'gyur/_/bsam gtan brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/dgon pa'i gnas dag tu yang bsrungs shing gnas/_/de la g.yeng ba nam yang 'byung mi 
[\[90b.4\]]'gyur/_/de ltar lus ni dben par gyur pas na/_/zang zing med pa'i dga' ba der 'thob bo/_/'dod pa dag gis mi gos nyon mongs med/_/de ltar bdud kyi yul las thar bas na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rab gnas te/_/de yi rnam grol yongs su smin 
[\[90b.5\]]par 'gyur/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab spyod pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong la sbyin pas dag par rlom sems mi byed pa yin/_tshul khrims ma dral cing tshul khrims 
[\[90b.6\]]la mi gnas pa yin/_bzod pa'i stobs la gnas la sems can du 'du shes pa la mi gnas pa yin/_brtson 'grus brtsams la lus dang sems dben pa yin/_bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed cing mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa yin/_bdud rnams kyis 
[\[90b.7\]]thub par dka' ba yin/_pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis rab tu mi sgul ba yin/_'du byed 'jug pa thams cad la snang ba thob pa yin/_sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po rgya cher 'jug ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la re ba med pa yin/_sangs 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]rgyas kyi bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'jug pa yin te/_gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab spyod pa'i phan yon no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dpa' bo bdog pa thams cad gtong /_/
[\[91a.2\]]des ni dag par rlom sems med/_/tshul khrims ma dral srung mod kyi/_/de la gnas par byed pa med/_/shes rab can de bzod sgom yang /_/sems can 'du shes rnam par zlog_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin mod kyi/_/lus dang sems ni rnam par dben/_/bsam 
[\[91a.3\]]gtan la yang sgom mod kyi/_/gnas pa med cing rten pa med/_/bdud kyis thub par dka' bar 'gyur/_/shes rab ldan pa'i yon tan 'di/_/pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis/_/de ni bskyod par mi nus 'gyur/_/'khor ba na yang snang ba 'thob/_/shes rab yon tan 
[\[91a.4\]]'di 'dra'o/_/sems can dag ni thams cad la/_/de ni snying rje che bar 'gyur/_/nyan thos rang rgyal ye shes la/_/nam yang re ba skyed mi 'gyur/_/bdog pa thams cad gtong yang rlom sems med/_/tshul khrims ma dral tshul khrims mi gnas te/_/bzod pa sgom yang 
[\[91a.5\]]sems can 'du shes med/_/shes rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/brtson 'grus brtsams kyang rnam par dben pa yin/_/mi gnas bsam gtan byed cing rten pa med/_/mkhas pa de ni bdud kyis thub par dka'/_/shes rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/
[\[91a.6\]]pha rol rgol bas bskyod par mi 'gyur zhing /_/des ni 'dus byas 'di yi gting rnyed pas/_/sems can dag la snying rje rgya cher skyed/_/shes rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan de gnas pas/_/rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos rnams la ni/_/
[\[91a.7\]]de dag nam yang smon pa mi skyed de/_/shes rab mos pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du thos pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_kun nas nyon mongs par mi byed pa dang gnod sems mi skyed 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]pa dang the tshom rnam par 'byed pa dang lta ba drang por byed pa dang lam log pa spong ba dang lam la gnas pa dang mi 'chi ba'i sgor gnas pa dang byang chub tu bsnyen pa dang sems can thams cad la snang bar gyur pa dang ngan 'gro thams cad kyis mi 'jigs pa ste/_gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag 
[\[91b.2\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du thos pa'i phan yon no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_yang dag ji bzhin mkhyen pa yi/_/sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa yis/_/mang du thos pa'i phan yon ni/_/bcu po 'di dag rab tu bshad/_/nyon mongs rnam par 
[\[91b.3\]]byang ba yi/_/phyogs gnyis po ni des shes te/_/kun nas nyon mongs yongs spangs nas/_/rnam par byang ba'i lam la ston/_/nem nur rnam 'byed ye shes ldan/_/lta ba drang por rab srong zhing /_/log pa'i lam yang rnam spangs te/_/drang po'i lam la gnas par byed/_/
[\[91b.4\]]mi 'chi sgo la de gnas shing /_/byang chub tu yang nye bar 'gyur/_/sems can la yang snang 'gyur te/_/ngan song dag la 'jigs pa med/_/kun nas nyon mongs chos mang rab shes shing /_/rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyang de bzhin shes/_/kun nas nyon mongs yongs su 
[\[91b.5\]]spangs nas ni/_/rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi mchog la slob/_/srog chags kun gyi nem nur rnam 'byed cing /_/de yi lta ba rtag tu drang por 'gyur/_/de ni log pa'i lam yang rnam spangs te/_/zhi ba drang po'i lam la rtag tu gnas/_/mi 'chi lam la khor mor gnas 'gyur zhing /_/dri med byang chub 
[\[91b.6\]]la yang nye bar 'gyur/_/srog chags mang po kun la'ang snang bar 'gyur/_/de ni ngan 'gro dag la'ang 'jigs pa med/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sbyin pa lhur byed pa/_/gzhan la chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_bcu 
[\[91b.7\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bya ba ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang /_bya ba la 'jug pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa'i chos la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang byang chub kyi snying po thob par byed pa dang /_dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang nyon mongs pa tshar 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]gcod pa dang sems can thams cad la skal ba'i shas sbyin pa dang de la dmigs pa'i byams pa sgom pa dang tshe 'di la bde ba 'thob pa ste/_gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa lhur byed pa/_chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'i phan yon 
[\[92a.2\]]no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_su dag ser sna med par ni/_/chos kyi sbyin pa mchog sbyin byed/_/de yi legs pa rnam bcur ni/_/'jig rten mgon pos rab tu bshad/_/bya ba ma yin thams cad spong /_/mkhas pa bya ba rnams la 'jug_/skyes bu dam pa'i chos la dad/_/gtong 
[\[92a.3\]]ba'i sems la sten par byed/_/sangs rgyas zhing yang rnam sbyong ste/_/de yi zhing ni bsam mi khyab/_/byang chub snying por rtag tu 'dug_/chos kyi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'di/_/dngos po thams cad gtong byed cing /_/chos kyi rgyal po'i rjes su slob/_/nyon mongs pa yang tshar bcad pa/_/
[\[92a.4\]]de la byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/sems can kun na skal ba'i shas/_/byams pa'i sems kyis rab tu sbyin/_/de ni phrag dog med 'gyur te/_/mi ma yin pa'i skyid pa 'thob/_/mkhas pas bya ba ma yin rnam spangs te/_/rtogs par bya ba dag la gnas par byed/_/mkhas pa su 
[\[92a.5\]]dag chos kyi sbyin pa gtong /_/bdag nyid chen po'i chos la rtag tu gnas/_/de yi zhing yang rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams rnam par 'phel/_/byang chub snying por rtag tu nye bar 'gyur/_/chos rnams byin pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/nyon mongs med 
[\[92a.6\]]cing dngos po yongs su btang /_/dngos po'i rang gi mtshan nyid rab tu shes/_/yongs su 'dzin pa kun las rnam par grol/_/de la chags pa nam yang yong mi 'gyur/_/mkhas pa'i sems ni shin tu nyer gzhag pa/_/sems can thams cad bde bar gyur cig ces/_/de ni 
[\[92a.7\]]byams sems 'gyur zhing phrag dog med/_/tshe 'di dag la'ang bde ba mi nyung 'gyur/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la gnas pa dang mi gnas par 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]bsam gtan byed pa dang /_skye ba la mi smon pa dang tshul khrims la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa dang 'phags pa la mi skur ba dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa dang dngos po mi dmigs pa dang dben par gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang /_dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ste/_gzhon 
[\[92b.2\]]nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i phan yon no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_/mi dbang gnas pa gang yin pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te/_/des ni rnal 'byor gnas par byed/_/de la srog rnams dmigs pa 
[\[92b.3\]]med/_/'jig rten kun la mi gnas shing /_/'phags pa'i bsam gtan mi gtong ste/_/chos kyi rang bzhin mthong nas ni/_/skye ba la yang smon mi byed/_/tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin cing /_/tshul khrims la yang gnas mi byed/_/zag pa med pa'i lam gzhan 
[\[92b.4\]]la/_/cung zad skur par de mi byed/_/'gal ba med par de gnas shing /_/rtsod pa dag kyang yong med de/_/rnal 'byor dngos po mi dmigs shing /_/rtag tu dben par gnas par byed/_/de ni srog gi don phyir yang /_/sangs rgyas skur pa mi 'debs te/_/stong pa nyid 
[\[92b.5\]]la des gyur cing /_/lus kyi mngon sum 'jigs pa med/_/'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab/_/gus par byas nas chos 'dzin te/_/sangs rgyas chos la nem nur med/_/gang dag mu stegs mang po'i sa ma yin/_/skyes bu khyu 
[\[92b.6\]]mchog gi ni gnas pa de/_/gang la srog med gang zag sems can med/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' gnas par byed/_/de la gnas pa nam yang yod ma yin/_/mi gnas par ni bsam gtan bde ba sten/_/chos la sems can bdag med rnam rig pas/_/skye bar yang ni 'du 
[\[92b.7\]]shes yong mi 'byung /_/chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin rnam par rig_/tshul khrims la yang cung zad gnas pa med/_/tshul khrims kyis ni dag par yengs mi sems/_/sangs rgyas dag la rtag tu dad par byed/_/thams cad rang bzhin stong par rnam bsgoms pas/_/de la 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'gal ba nam yang 'byung mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam chos bzung nas ni/_/'dren pa dag la nam yang mi skur to/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang du yang dag par 'jog la mngon par brtson pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_bcu gang 
[\[93a.2\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems rnyog pa med pa dang /_bag yod par gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_spyod pa la dad pa dang ye shes la nem nur med pa dang sangs rgyas la byas pa gzo ba dang chos mi spong ba dang shin tu bsdams par gnas pa dang dul ba'i sa rjes su thob pa dang 
[\[93a.3\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon sum du byed pa ste/_gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang du yang dag par 'jog la mngon par brtson pa'i phan yon no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_de yi sems ni rnyog pa med/_/bag med thams cad rnam 
[\[93a.4\]]spangs te/_/bag yod la yang gnas byed cing /_/yang dag 'jog la spyod yul ba/_/'jig rten mgon gyi spyod thos nas/_/sangs rgyas la ni dad par byed/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/_/ye shes rnal 'byor the tshom med/_/sangs rgyas rnams la byas pa gzo/_/sangs 
[\[93a.5\]]rgyas chos la the tshom med/_/shin tu bsdams shing gnas byed de/_/dul ba'i sa la rab tu gnas/_/yang dag rig pa des thob ste/_/rnyed dang bkur sti spangs nas su/_/gcig pu nags khrod mos par byed/_/yang dag 'jog la spyod yul ba/_/de yi sems ni rnyog pa med par 
[\[93a.6\]]'gyur/_/bag med pa yang thams cad yongs spangs te/_/bdag nyid chen po rtag tu bag yod 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas dran nas ni/_/de yi spyod pa bla na med la dad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen la the tshom med/_/
[\[93a.7\]]bsam gtan brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/sangs rgyas dag la rtag tu byas pa gzo/_/de ni srog gi phyir yang chos mi spong /_/thams cad dus su shin tu bsdams par gnas/_/ting 'dzin brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/shin tu dul ba'i sa ni rjes thob cing /_/
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]yang dag rig pa myur du mngon sum byed/_/tshig gi rgyun mi 'chad cing spobs par ldan/_/mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig ston par byed/_/sangs rgyas byang chub myur du de 'dzin te/_/'dren pa dag gis bstan pa yongs su srung /_/des ni pha rol rgol ba kun bcom ste/_/sangs rgyas kyi yang byang chub 
[\[93b.2\]]rgyas par byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni shi 'phos nas/_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams su 'gro/_/tshe dpag med las chos bzang mchog thos nas/_/skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa 'thob//_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/_bam po dgu pa/_gzhon nu 
[\[93b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon par gnas pa lhur byed pa dag gi phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bya ba nyung bar gnas pa dang 'du 'dzi ring ba nas kyang ring du spong ba dang de la rtsod pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_gnod pa med par gnas pa dang zag pa 'phel bar 
[\[93b.4\]]mi byed pa dang rtsod pa'i gzhir mi byed pa dang shin tu zhi bar spyod pa dang shin tu bsdams par gnas pa dang thar pa dang 'thun pa'i sems kyi rgyud du 'gyur ba dang /_myur du rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed pa ste/_gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon par 
[\[93b.5\]]gnas pa lhur byed pa'i phan yon no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_rtag tu bya ba nyung bar 'gyur/_/'du 'dzi dag kyang ring du spong /_/nags khrod gcig pu gnas pa ni/_/rtsod pa dag kyang de la med/_/gnod pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/zag pa rnam par 'phel mi byed/_/de la rtsod gzhi mi 
[\[93b.6\]]'byung ste/_/dgon par gnas pa'i yon tan 'di/_/lus dang ngag yid rab bsdams te/_/de ni nye bar zhi bar spyod/_/thar pa dang ni 'thun gyur cing /_/rnam par grol ba myur du rig_/rnal 'byor pa ni rtag tu bya ba nyung /_/'du 'dzi mang po'i nyes pa kun spangs te/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[93b.7\]]pa dag nam yang rtsod mi byed/_/dgon par gnas pa'i phan yon 'di dag go/_/nam zhig de ni 'dus byas skyo gyur cing /_/'jig rten du ni gang la'ang 'dod pa med/_/zag pa dag kyang 'phel bar mi byed pa/_/nags khrod gnas pa de yi phan yon yin/_/de la rtsod gzhi nam yang mi 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]'byung ste/_/rtag tu zhi la dga' zhing dben par spyod/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyang bsdams pa ste/_/dgon par gnas pa de la yon tan mang /_/de ni thar pa dang yang 'thun gyur te/_/nags khrod gnas shing rnam grol de sten pas/_/rnam grol zhi ba myur du des rtogs 'gyur/_/
[\[94a.2\]]'di kun dgon par gnas pa'i yon tan yin/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod snyoms spyod pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa'i phan yon ni 'di bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de shes kyi khe 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /_de snyan pa 'dod pa 
[\[94a.3\]]ma yin pa dang /_de rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /_de 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la gnas pa dang /_de tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag_/med par 'gyur ba dang /_de bdag la mi stod gzhan la mi smod pa dang /_de rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs pas gzhan gyi khyim du spyod pa dang /_
[\[94a.4\]]zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang de sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas shing chos bstan pa gzung bar 'gyur ba yin te/_gzhon nu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod snyoms spyod pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa'i 
[\[94a.5\]]phan yon no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sbyangs pa dag la gang gnas pa/_/shes kyi khe yang mi 'dod cing /_/snyan pa la yang mi smon te/_/rnyed dang ma rnyed mtshungs pa'i yid/_/sbyangs pa dag la gang gnas pa/_/'phags pa'i rigs ni mi gtong zhing /_/tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag 
[\[94a.6\]]rnams/_/thams cad ring du rnam par spong /_/bdag nyid la ni mi stod cing /_/gzhan dag la yang smod mi byed/_/khong khro rjes su chags med cing /_/zang zing med par chos ston te/_/de yi tshig kyang gzung bar 'gyur/_/bsod snyoms yon tan 'di dag go/_/shes kyi khe dang snyan dang 
[\[94a.7\]]rnyed mi tshol/_/'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la ni gnas 'gyur te/_/mkhas pa tshul 'chos kha gsag med pa yin/_/sbyangs la brtson pa'i yon tan 'di 'dra'o/_/bdag la mi stod gzhan la mi smod cing /_/rtsub por smras kyang 'khrug par yong mi 'gyur/_/bsngags pa thos kyang dga' 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]ba mi skyed de/_/de ni bsod snyoms dag gis mgu bar 'gyur/_/chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med par sbyin/_/de ni rnyed dang bkur sti mi tshol te/_/de yis bshad pa dag kyang gzung bar 'gyur/_/sbyangs par brtson pa'i phan yon 'di dag yin/_/gzhon nu de lta bu'i chos kyi yon tan la gnas pa'i 
[\[94b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon pa la gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gter rnyed par 'gyur/_chos kyi gter rnyed par 'gyur/_ye shes kyi gter rnyed par 'gyur/_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba shes pa'i gter rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub 
[\[94b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi gter rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben pa na spyod cing dgon par gnas nas mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang pha rol gyi sems 
[\[94b.4\]]shes pa dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi yul te/_gzhon nu mngon par shes pa 'di lnga thob par 'gyur ro/_/de mi'i las 'das pa'i lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs kyi sangs 
[\[94b.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams mthong ste/_de sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi gter rnyed pa yin no/_/gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[94b.6\]]po chos kyi gter rnyed pa yin zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag phyogs bcu na chos ci ston pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis thos te/_de chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[94b.7\]]dpa' chen po chos kyi gter rnyed pa yin no/_/gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi gter rnyed pa yin zhe na/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de dang ldan pas chos thams cad 'dzin te/_kun bzung nas mi brjed cing 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]sems can rnams la chos ston te/_gang gi don gang yin pa de yang rab tu shes so/_/gzhon nu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi gter rnyed pa yin no/_/gzhon nu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[95a.2\]]dang /_da ltar byung ba shes pa'i gter rnyed pa yin zhe na/_de mngon par shes pas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa shes pa la 'jug ste/_gzhon nu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi 
[\[95a.3\]]ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba shes pa'i gter rnyed pa yin no/_/gzhon nu mdor na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur te/_de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa yang ma yin na pha rol rgol ba 
[\[95a.4\]]thams cad lta ci smos/_de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mkhas pa rtag tu dgon gnas te/_/sangs rgyas gter dang chos kyi gter/_/ye shes gter dang sngon mtha'i gter/_/mngon shes lnga yang myur du 'thob/_/phan yon bcu'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//_//de nas yang 
[\[95a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na lha'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba yang spangs te rab tu byung ngo zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/gzhon nu rab tu byung nas kyang sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la 
[\[95a.6\]]gnas shing dben par gnas pa dang /_bzod pa dang des pa phun sum tshogs par bya'o/_/gzhon nu mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams te chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_kun 
[\[95a.7\]]chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_rab tu gdon par bya/_lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas bsgom par bya/_mang du bya/_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/gzhon nu bse ru lta bur gyur pas 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]gnyis su med par dgon pa dang nags 'dab tu rtag tu gnas par bya'o/_/gzhon nu bdag nyid yongs su gtong bas kyang sems can de dag gi don bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe don de nyid brjod pa'i phyir/_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di tshigs su 
[\[95b.2\]]bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/'das pa'i bskal pa brgya mang rab dran te/_/grags pa mtha' yas 'dren pa gang byung ba/_/lha mi klu yi tshogs kyis mchod pa ste/_/mtshan ni gzi brjid tshogs rgyal rgyal ba yin/_/dge slong bye ba phrag bcu drug mngon shes/_/
[\[95b.3\]]yang dag rig dang dbang gi pha rol phyin/_/sbyangs tshul yo byad bsnyungs pa zhi ba'i yid/_/de yi dus na de yi tshogs rnams byung /_/grong khyer bye ba brgya phrag bdun cu drug_/dpag tshad lnga yi tshad dang mnyam pa ste/_/rin chen sna bdun bye brag 'phags pa'i mchog_/de tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 
[\[95b.4\]]byung bar gyur/_/de tshe grong mchog dam pa de kun kyang /_/skyed mos tshal brgya mang pos rab tu brgyan/_/skyed mos tshal kun stug pa'i sprin bzhin du/_/me tog 'bras bus brgyan cing shing rnams rgyas/_/bza' shing rigs kyang sna tshogs mdzes pa dag_/la ku a mra dzam bu pa nas dkrigs/_/
[\[95b.5\]]kar ni tsam pa pur na brgya yis kyang /_/skyed mos tshal mchog de dag rab tu brgyan/_/n+ya gro d+ha las bya mang sgra 'byin te/_/khu byug ka la ping ka rma bya brgya/_/shang shang te'u dang ku nal sgra 'byin pa/_/bya tshogs mang po de tshe snyan par sgrog_/ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang skya 'dra ba dang /_/
[\[95b.6\]]bung ba ku nal sgra dbyangs mchog sgrog ste/_/yan lag bkra zhing tshon che kha dog 'bar/_/shin tu yid 'ong sgra 'jam dga' ba 'byin/_/de'i dus bya mang de dag 'dus gyur te/_/ka la ping ka rma bya ne tso dang /_/khu byug ri skegs bya rnams sna tshogs pa/_/bya mang de dag sna tshogs 
[\[95b.7\]]sgra yang 'byin/_/skyed mos tshal brgya dag na de dag gnas/_/btang bzung mya ngan 'tshang dang bar sha ka/_/a ti mug ta me tog 'dab ma dang /_/pad ma ud pal ku mud pad ma dkar/_/pad ma 'dab stong brgya yis rab tu brgyan/_/me tog de dag rdzing bu mdzes par byed/_/dri zhim 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]spos mchog dam pas so sor brgyan/_/rdzing bu sdug cing shin tu mdzes par gyur/_/de tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po ni/_/mi dbang brtan pas byin zhes bya ba byung /_/de yi bu yang brgya phrag lnga yod de/_/byad bzhin bzang zhing shin tu blta na sdug_/de tshe rgyal srid 
[\[96a.2\]]zhi zhing bde bar gyur/_/gtse ba med cing dbyangs dga' rnal du bab/_/'dzam bu'i gling yang me tog mang pos brgyan/_/lha yi gnas dang mtshungs shing bye brag med/_/de tshe sdig med stobs bcu ldan pa yi/_/rgyal ba de ni ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'chad/_/srid pa'i 'gro ba rmi lam lta bu ste/_/
[\[96a.3\]]'di la su yang mi skye 'chi ba med/_/sems can ming dang srog kyang mi rnyed de/_/chos 'di rnams ni rmi lam chu shing 'dra/_/sgyu ma lta bu nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste/_/chu yi zla ba 'dra zhing smig rgyu bzhin/_/mi gang 'jig rten 'dir yang shi nas ni/_/'jig rten gzhan du 'pho zhing 'gro med 
[\[96a.4\]]kyang /_/las byas rnams ni nam yang med mi 'gyur/_/'khor ba na yang dkar gnag 'bras bu smin/_/rtag pa ma yin chad par mi 'gyur te/_/las bsags med cing gnas pa dag kyang med/_/de yang byas nas reg par mi 'gyur min/_/gzhan gyis byas pa tshor bar 'gyur ba'ang 
[\[96a.5\]]med/_/'pho ba med cing phyir yang 'ong ba med/_/thams cad yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang min/_/'di na lta gnas 'jug pa dag pa min/_/sems can spyod pa rab zhi 'jug pa med/_/bde gshegs spyod yul rgyal ba'i yon tan ni/_/skye med zhi ba mtshan ma med pa'i gnas/_/stobs 
[\[96a.6\]]dang gzungs rnams dang ni stobs bcu'i stobs/_/'di ni sangs rgyas khyu mchog gyur pa'i mchog_/dkar po'i chos mchog yon tan bsags pa ste/_/yon tan ye shes gzungs dang stobs rnams dang /_/rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bya ba'i mchog_/mngon shes mchog lnga 'thob pa 
[\[96a.7\]]dam pa'i tshul/_/'dir ni rang bzhin gang na'ang shes pa med/_/'gro dang 'jug med mkhas pa'i chos kyi 'gros/_/chos kyi dbyings ni gar yang mi 'gro ste/_/de 'dra'i 'gro ba 'gro med chos kyi 'gros/_/dbyangs kyi tshogs med ngo bo nyid kyi 'gros/_/'gro ba'i rang bzhin gang du'ang 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]mi gnas te/_/mi gnas mi rten rang bzhin 'jug pa ni/_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul rdul bral zhi ba'i gnas/_/zhi ba rab zhi nye bar zhi ba'i 'gros/_/'gro ba de ni gar yang mi gnas te/_/rtag tu dngos po'i rang bzhin rjes su song /_/mkhas shing mi g.yo mthong dka' shin tu gnas/_/de ni 
[\[96b.2\]]mi g.yo bdag nyid gnas pa ste/_/mi gnas ma 'ongs rang bzhin gnas pa yin/_/rang bzhin gnas pa bshad par mi nus te/_/de ni stong pa mi g.yo chos kyi gnas/_/dbyangs kyis bshad kyang dbyangs kyi 'jug pa med/_/dbyangs kyi rang bzhin 'jug pa chos kyi 'gros/_/dbyangs 
[\[96b.3\]]kyi tshogs gnas gang na'ang yod ma yin/_/de ltar rang bzhin 'jug pa chos kyi 'gros/_/'gros kyi sgrar gsungs sems can 'gro ba med/_/chos kyi rang bzhin mkhas don 'gro ba ste/_/dbyangs kyang brjod de sems can 'gro ba med/_/dbyangs rnams mi rnyed sems can 'gro ba 
[\[96b.4\]]med/_/mtha' dang mtha' med ma yin dbus 'gro med/_/yod med ma yin phyogs su 'gro ba med/_/rang bzhin 'gro ba ci 'dra shes pa ni/_/rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'di dag mnyam/_/rdul bral rnam par dag pa don dam gnas/_/zhi zhing rab zhi rdul med rdul bral ba/_/
[\[96b.5\]]rtog dang rlom sems med pa rab zhi gnas/_/rgyal ba thugs rje'i mchog ldan ston par mdzad/_/'di la yi ge spyod pa yod ma yin/_/'gro ba yangs shing yangs don 'gro ba ste/_/sangs rgyas dag gis bsnyen cing rgyal bas bstod/_/snang ba'i chos kyi tshul ni 'jug pa phra/_/
[\[96b.6\]]de la gnas nas bde gshegs mtshungs med pa/_/chos kyi gter ni rdul bral yangs pa dang /_/rin chen chos rnams rdul bral don dam stong /_/zhi ba'i don la 'jug pa ston par mdzad/_/rkang gnyis gtso bos ting 'dzin 'di bshad pa/_/rgyal po brten byin gyis ni de tshe thos/_/
[\[96b.7\]]de ni bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu dang /_/rgyal ba snying rje can drung rtag tu 'ongs/_/rgyal ba stobs ldan gus pa rab bskyed de/_/zhabs la mi yi bdag po phyag 'tshal nas/_/de tshe stobs bcu ldan pa'i spyan sngar 'dug_/rab tu dga' zhing sor bcu thal mo sbyar/_/de yi spyod 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]pa yongs su dag rig nas/_/dbang po dag la dbang gi pha rol phyin/_/mi mchog rgyal ba mos pa mkhyen pa yis/_/de la ting 'dzin dam pa 'di bshad do/_/rgyal po de ni don dam 'di thos tshe/_/'phags pa'i dga' ba mtshungs med skyes nas su/_/gling bzhi dag kyang thams 
[\[97a.2\]]cad rnams spangs te/_/'dod pa bor nas khyim nas mngon par byung /_/rgyal bar 'gyur zhes byang chub don du yang /_/nam tshe rgyal pos sa bor rab byung tshe/_/'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan 'di yi mi kun kyang /_/'dod pa'i yon tan rnam spangs rab tu byung /_/de tshe stobs bcu'i yon 
[\[97a.3\]]tan rgya che ste/_/brtson yid dge slong ma dang dge slong mang /_/de tshe ma rmos ma btab rtsi 'khrungs te/_/lha rnams kyang ni g.yog dang bsnyen bkur byed/_/ngur smrig chos gos gsum dag byung bar gyur/_/dra ba mnyam zhing drub legs dpe med la/_/dri ma med cing rdul bral gser 
[\[97a.4\]]brgyan pa/_/sangs rgyas yon tan bsod nams stobs las byung /_/gzhon nu ltos shig rgyal mchog de yang ni/_/sa rnams thams cad rnam spangs rab byung na/_/zad pa'i dus na sems can mang po dag_/shin tu longs spyod chung yang khyim mi gtong /_/shing sgrog dang ni bcing 
[\[97a.5\]]ba chad pa mang /_/gshe zhing spyo ba sdug bsngal mi dga' dang /_/bla ma yi chad pa mang po bzod par byed/_/longs spyod chung rab khyim na bza' ba med/_/shin tu tshe yang thung la nor yang med/_/rab tu bag chung bsod nams stobs kyang med/_/mi mkhas bzo yi gnas 
[\[97a.6\]]kyang mi shes te/_/dbul por gyur cing khyim na nor yang med/_/dri ma ma dag gzhan gyi bud med chags/_/phrag dog byed cing shin tu btsam pa med/_/nyon mongs chos ldan tshul la mi gnas kyang /_/nged ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhes smra/_/gsug gis slu zhing bab 
[\[97a.7\]]chol byed pa dag_/nga ni phyug po 'jig rten chos nor sbyin/_/gnod pa byed cing tshul 'chos sgyu ma dag_/nged ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhes smra/_/gzhan dag bsad cing bcing dang gtse la dga'/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa ma rungs zhe sdang yid/_/byas pa mi gzo dbyen 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]byed 'tshe bar gnas/_/btsun pa byang chub spyod pa ston ces smras/_/gang las des ni byang chub spyod thos pa/_/de nyid la ni khong khro rab bskyed nas/_/mkhas pas 'khrul pa'i tshig 'ga' thos na yang /_/de la mi snyan brgya dag sgrog par byed/_/gzhon nu nga yi tshig 'di thos nas ni/_/
[\[97b.2\]]de dag dang ni sten par ma byed cig_/byang chub dam pa reg par 'dod na ni/_/rmi lam du yang de la yid ma rton/_/sbyangs tshul bsnyungs pa yon tan du ma rjod/_/yon tan bskal pa mang po brgyar bshad kyang /_/de yi yon tan dag la mi gnas na/_/byang chub zhi ba mchog ni 
[\[97b.3\]]rtogs mi 'gyur/_/khor mor yang ni dge zhing 'jam par gyis/_/tshul khrims dag cing rtag tu dang ba'i yid/_/khor mor tshul khrims yongs su dag par gyis/_/ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog thob 'gyur/_/nga rgyal ma byed tha ba ma skyed par/_/rtag tu yid ni yongs su 
[\[97b.4\]]dag par gyis/_/nga rgyal rgyags dang 'chab pa kun spongs la/_/ting 'dzin mchog 'di rab tu thob par gyis/_/rtag tu yon tan las ni rgyal ba dran/_/gser mchog mdog 'dra shin tu 'od mdzad pa/_/mtshan mo gnam la skar mas gang ba ltar/_/thub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis 
[\[97b.5\]]yongs su rgyas/_/'chag cing 'dug dang 'greng zhing nyal ba na/_/mi gang thub pa'i zla ba dran byed pa/_/de yi mdun na rtag tu ston pa bzhugs/_/de ni rgya cher mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bla re ba dan mchog_/phye ma byug pa mang po kun thogs la/_/rtag tu 
[\[97b.6\]]bde bar gshegs la mchod pa gyis/_/ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob/_/spos mchog phreng ba me tog bdug pa dang /_/rol mo sil snyan mang po rab thogs la/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la mchod pa gyis/_/ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di thob/_/
[\[97b.7\]]glu gar bzang po sna tshogs mang po dang /_/yid gtsang bzhad gad rol mo bzang po dang /_/rtag par mar me'i phreng sdug bzang po yis/_/mtshungs pa med la mchod bzang rab tu gyis/_/'khar rnga dang ni sgra snyan rdza rnga brgya/_/rnga dang gling bu'i sgra mchog sna tshogs dang /_/
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]sgra snyan rol mo'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis/_/dang ba'i yid ldan 'dren pa mchod par gyis/_/sangs rgyas sku gzugs shin tu mdzes pa dag_/rin chen byi dor legs par byas pa yang /_/blta na sdug cing shin tu bzang po gyis/_/ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin 
[\[98a.2\]]mchog 'di 'thob/_/de bzhin gser dag dang ni dngul dag dang /_/tsan dan gyi ni sku gzugs bzang po dag_/mdzes shing shin tu blta na sdug pa gyis/_/ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob/_/'ji ba dang ni de bzhin rdo ba dang /_/shing dang ri mor bris pa'i sku gzugs 
[\[98a.3\]]dag_/mdzes shing shin tu blta na sdug pa gyis/_/ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'thob/_/rtag tu nags khrod dben par bsnyen par gyis/_/grong dang grong khyer dga' ba rnam spongs la/_/bse ru lta bur gnyis su med par gyis/_/ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog 
[\[98a.4\]]'di 'thob/_/nga ni chos rje khyod ni nga yi bu/_/nga yi ting 'dzin spyod pa rjes su slobs/_/nga ni de tshe phyogs su grags pa yi/_/mi dbang brtan pas byin zhes bya bar gyur/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/ngas sngon sangs rgyas mtha' yas mchod byas pa/_/rtag par ngas 
[\[98a.5\]]ni tshul khrims rnam dag bsrungs/_/nga yis stobs bcu dag la ri mor byas/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/ngas sngon bu dang chung ma yongs btang ste/_/mgo dang rkang lag mig mchog bzang po byin/_/zhum pa'i sems su nam yang yongs ma byas/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[98a.6\]]zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/nor 'bru bran pho bran mo brgya mang dang /_/rin chen mang po ngas ni yongs btang ste/_/slong ba mang po shin tu tshim par byas/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/ngas sngon gser dang mu tig shel mang dang /_/dung dang man shel dang ni 
[\[98a.7\]]bai dUr+ya/_/nor bu gzugs gtsang byi ru 'bru rnams btang /_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/ngas ni rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan rnams dang /_/mu tig phreng mchog de bzhin seng ge can/_/rin chen dra ba bzang zhing mang ba btang /_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]ba'i phyir/_/ngas sngon gos mchog phra mo bye ba dag_/yongs su gtsang ba ka shi du kul mchog_/gser gyis spras pa mang po yongs su btang /_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/rta dang bal glang shing rta sna tshogs dang /_/bu dang chung ma rab sdug ngas btang ste/_/
[\[98b.2\]]yid mi bde ba nam yang ma byung ngo /_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/tshol bas sdug bsngal nyon mongs gyur pa yi/_/shin tu dbul ba'i mi dag ngas mthong nas/_/de dag ngas ni dbul ba med par byas/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/rta dang bal 
[\[98b.3\]]glang shing rta khrag khrig dag_/nor bu rin chen brgyan pa'i dra bas g.yogs/_/ngas sngon slong ba dag la sbyin par byas/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/ngas sngon skyed mos tshal ni mang po dag_/bye ba khrag khrig legs par brgyan byas te/_/yid kyang dga' zhing snying 
[\[98b.4\]]rje bskyed nas byin/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/grong dang grong khyer yul 'khor grong 'dab kyang /_/ngas sngon legs par brgyan nas yongs su btang /_/byin nas rtag tu dga' ba myang bar byas/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/rin chen phung po 
[\[98b.5\]]ri rab mnyam pa dang /_/de bzhin gos dang rgyan rnams mang po yang /_/ngas sngon slong ba dag la sbyin pa byas/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/shin tu dbul ba ngas ni phyug por byas/_/rab tu nyon mongs gyur pa ngas bskyabs te/_/sdug bsngal gtses pa mang 
[\[98b.6\]]po bde bar byas/_/nga ni sa steng dbang phyug gyur pa'i tshe/_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/_/snying rje bskyed nas bde bar gyur cig ces/_/de dag la ni nga yis rgyal srid btang /_/gzhon nu ngas ni ngo mtshar byas pa dang /_/bskal pa brgya mang dka' ba ci spyad 
[\[98b.7\]]pa/_/ngas ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/_/de dag bshad kyang zad par mi nus so/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di tshol ba'i phyir/_/ngas ni ngo mtshar dka' ba spyad pa ni/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i spyod la ma dad pa/_/mi rnams sems ni myos shing bslad par 'gyur/_/gzhon nu khyod 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]la shin tu bsgo bar bya/_/dad par gyis shig nga la mi bden med/_/bde gshegs [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig ni mi gsung ste/_/thugs rje rgyal ba rtag tu bden par gsung /_/ji ltar ting 'dzin mchog kyang 'thob 'gyur zhing /_/sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal thar bya zhes/_/
[\[99a.2\]]bskal pa mang por spyod pa 'di dag dang /_/gzhan yang ngas ni rnam pa mang po sbyangs/_/skad cig gang la ting 'dzin 'di yang ni/_/nga yis rab tu thob par gyur pa'i tshe/_/ting 'dzin dam pa ye shes chen po'i lam/_/ngas thob sangs rgyas khrag khrig mang po mthong /_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[99a.3\]]dag kyang mtha' yas ngas thob ste/_/zhing brgya dag tu rnam par sprul pas 'gro/_/song nas ngas ni snying rje ldan pa la/_/dri ba bye ba khrag khrig mang po dris/_/bde gshegs dag gis nga la ci bstan pa/_/de tshe dri ba bye ba khrag khrig bzung /_/nga yis ma lus thams cad bzung byas te/_/
[\[99a.4\]]tshig gcig tsam yang nga la nyams pa med/_/dri ba bye ba khrag khrig mang po yi/_/yang dag pa yi tshul de ngas thos nas/_/rdul bral zhi ba'i gnas de ngas bshad de/_/sems can mang po ye shes lam la bkod/_/ngas ni ting 'dzin 'di la gnas nas su/_/bskal pa brgyar 
[\[99a.5\]]yang yang dag tshul bslabs te/_/ngas sngon sems can bye ba khrag khrig rnams/_/rdul dang bral ba'i lam mchog dam par bkod/_/gang gis sngon gyi bde bar gshegs pa dag_/rdul dang bral ba'i tshul 'di ston pa rnams/_/ma mthong bas ni don dam stong pa yi/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[99a.6\]]mchog la dad par mi nus so/_/mi gang dad cing mkhas la cho ga shes/_/yang dag tshul zab tshul rnams thos pa ni/_/de dag mi skrag dngang bar mi 'gyur te/_/thos nas rtag tu yid kyang rangs par 'gyur/_/de dang de dag byang chub 'di 'dzin te/_/de dag rjes su skyes pa'i nga yi bu/_/
[\[99a.7\]]de dag u dum bA ra'i me tog 'dra/_/de phyir bskal pa brgyar yang ngas spyad do/_/ting 'dzin mchog 'di mi gang 'dzin pa ni/_/de dag log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa med/_/rtag tu mi khom brgyad dang de bral te/_/sangs rgyas khrag khrig shin tu mang po mthong /_/gang gi lag na 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]ting 'dzin mchog yod pa/_/rgyal ba byams pa grags pa mtha' yas bzhin/_/sems can rnams kyi don mang byed 'gyur zhes/_/blo gros mtha' yas de ni ngas lung bstan/_/ting 'dzin mchog 'di mi gang 'dzin pa ni/_/de dag dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan/_/rtogs ldan ye shes 
[\[99b.2\]]'phags pa thos pa 'dzin/_/de yi spobs pa dag kyang rgya cher 'gyur/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/lha rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya ba yin/_/mis kyang rtag tu phyag byar 'os pa ste/_/khor mor 'byung ba'i tshogs kyis mngon par srung /_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 
[\[99b.3\]]'dzin pa ni/_/de dag me dang chur yang mi 'chi zhing /_/de la dug dang mtshon gyis mi tshugs te/_/dgra dag gis kyang brgal bar mi nus 'gyur/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/de dag nags khrod gshong gnas rtag par yang /_/lha dag khor mor bsnyen bkur 
[\[99b.4\]]byed par 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin mang po de yi g.yog kyang byed/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/ye shes dag kyang rgya mtsho 'dra bar 'gyur/_/thub pa'i yon tan brjod la thogs pa med/_/sangs rgyas yon tan yang dag rjod par byed/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/
[\[99b.5\]]de yi thos pa mtha' yas mu med de/_/tshad rnyed mi 'gyur ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin/_/ye shes sgron ma 'dzin cing rab rib sel/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/rtag par 'jam zhing rigs pa'i tshig smra ste/_/'khor gyi nang du dga' bar 'gyur ba ston/_/seng ge bzhin 
[\[99b.6\]]du de ni sgra rnams sgrog_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/de ni sman pa dpyad mkhan 'dra bar yang /_/mang po'i rten dang dpung gnyen skyabs su 'gyur/_/'jig rten dag na snang bar gyur cing spyod/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/'khrig pa dag la yid 
[\[99b.7\]]kyang dga' mi byed/_/zhi gnas dga' zhing bsam gtan bde ba reg_/rab tu zhi ba'i dbyings su zhi bar smra/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/de yid mtshan ma dag la mi dga' ste/_/mtshan ma mang po thams cad rnam par bshig_/mkhas pa rtag tu mnyam par 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]bzhag cing spyod/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/de yi mig kyang tha mal ma yin 'thob/_/des ni rgyal ba mtha' yas mthong bar 'gyur/_/mtha' yas mig ldan de ni khyu mchog 'gyur/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/khrung khrung sgra dbyangs 
[\[100a.2\]]'jam zhing mnyen dang ldan/_/ka la ping ka rnga yi dbyangs su 'gyur/_/glu dbyangs ldan zhing sgra skad 'jam par 'gyur/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/sprin gyi 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i skad rnams dang /_/ngang pa'i sgra dbyangs bzhin du 'jam par sgrog_/dbyangs kyi yan 
[\[100a.3\]]lag lnga brgyar ldan pa'i sgra/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba mang po khrag khrig tu/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag sna tshogs ldan pa yi/_/sgra dbyangs snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'byung /_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/zas la yid kyang chags par 
[\[100a.4\]]mi 'gyur te/_/lhung bzed chos gos dag la dga' ma yin/_/'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes yo byad bsnyungs/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/bdag nyid la yang stod par mi 'gyur zhing /_/gar yang gzhan la mi snyan mi rjod de/_/rtag tu bsam gtan dga' zhing phra ba'i 
[\[100a.5\]]sems/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/rtag tu bdag nyid la yang rtog 'gyur te/_/gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag ni de mi tshol/_/'jig rten kun dang de ni mi 'phrod med/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/spyod pa yongs dag sems la nyon mongs med/_/rtag 
[\[100a.6\]]tu g.yo yang med cing 'drid pa med/_/khor mor 'jam zhing rnam par thar la dga'/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/rtag tu gtong la shin tu mos par 'gyur/_/de ni ser sna'i sems la dga' mi byed/_/khor mor tshul khrims dang yang ldan par 'gyur/_/mi gang ting 
[\[100a.7\]]'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/byad bzhin bzang zhing blta sdug mdzes pa ste/_/mdog kyang gser mchog 'dra bar snang bar byed/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams 'chang bar 'gyur/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/de dag rtag par rab tu mdzes par 'gyur/_/khor 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]mor rtog cing skye bo mang po la/_/phangs shing sdug ste lta bas mi ngoms 'gyur/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/lha dang klu dang de bzhin gnod sbyin rnams/_/rtag tu yi rang dga' zhing mgu nas ni/_/grong du zhugs nas de yi bsngags pa smra/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 
[\[100b.2\]]'dzin pa ni/_/tshangs pa brgya byin dbang sgyur mang po dag_/rtag par de la rim gro rab tu byed/_/de yi yid kyang khengs par yong mi 'gyur/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/de la ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ste/_/mi khom med cing log ltung 'jigs pa med/_/log 
[\[100b.3\]]ltung 'jigs pa kun las yongs su grol/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/sangs rgyas chos mchog zhib mo thos nas kyang /_/de la nem nur yid gnyis mi 'byung ste/_/ye shes zab mo'i rjes su song ba yin/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/phra ba'i chos 
[\[100b.4\]]rnams gang dag ci thos kyang /_/thams cad la ni dbang gi pha rol song /_/gtan tshigs zhib cing stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/rgyal bas gsung ni de skad rab bshad de/_/rtag par bdag ni de ltar bya snyam na/_/gzungs ni bye brag 'phags 
[\[100b.5\]]pa mchog thob 'gyur/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/nam tshe de yang 'chi ba'i dus byed pa/_/'od dpag med pa thugs rjer ldan pa ni/_/dge slong tshogs bcas de yi mdun na bzhugs/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/de dag gzungs rnams rab 
[\[100b.6\]]tu thob par 'gyur/_/chos kyi gter la dbang ba'i pha rol phyin/_/spobs dang ldan zhing tshig kyang rgyun mi 'chad/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/chos 'dzin de dag gang du song bar yang /_/'gro ba dag la kun tu snang bar 'gyur/_/shin tu spyod pa zhi zhing yid rab 
[\[100b.7\]]zhi/_/rab tu dga' dang dri med 'od byed dang /_/'od 'phro shin tu sbyang dka' mngon gyur dang /_/ring du song dang mi g.yo legs pa'i blo/_/chos sprin sa bcu po yang 'thob par 'gyur/_/tshe dang las dang yo byad mos pa dang /_/smon lam rdzu 'phrul skye ba'i stobs rnams dang /_/chos 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]dang sems dang de bzhin ye shes che/_/dbang bcu 'di dag dpa' bos thob par 'gyur/_/mi gang ting 'dzin mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/mkhas pa chos kyi mdzod mchog rnam 'byed cing /_/chos kyi sku la dbang ba'i pha rol phyin/_/de ni 'gro ba kun gyi the tshom gcod/_/sems 
[\[101a.2\]]can thams cad bcom ldan snying rje can/_/srid pa'i mthar phyin bde gshegs gyur pa la/_/bskal pa mang po brgya 'am gang gA yi/_/bye ma snyed dam lhag par mchod byas pas/_/zad pa'i dus na mi gang la la yis/_/'dir yang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas su/_/yi rang zhes 
[\[101a.3\]]ni tshig gcig smras na yang /_/snga ma'i bsod nams phung pos char mi phod/_/gzhon nu su dag zhi ba'i spyod pa 'di/_/don dam stong pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog_/rab tu 'don dang de bzhin glegs bam byas/_/chos smra blo gros dam pa gnas pa yin/_/gzi brjid tshogs kyi rgyal 
[\[101a.4\]]po'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ci nas bdag sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang skad shes pa rtogs shing /_dbang po 
[\[101a.5\]]mchog dang mchog ma yin pa rnam par rig nas chos bstan to snyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par 
[\[101a.6\]]bya/_rab tu gdon par bya/_lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas bsgom par bya/_mang du bya/_gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/thar pa 'dod pa ting 
[\[101a.7\]]'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/_/des ni 'das pa'i 'dren pa tshad med rnams kyang mthong /_/sngon gyi srid par brtson byas 'jig rten mgon pos dris/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog la gnas/_/thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/_/lha dang mi yi bde ba 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]gya nom rnyed par 'gyur/_/lha dang mi yi mchod pa dam pa des 'thob ste/_/bsam gtan bde dang 'phags pa'i bde ba mchog kyang 'thob/_/thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/_/bsngags pa rgya cher thos kyang de ni dga' mi 'gyur/_/mi snyan pa dag thos kyang zhum par mi 
[\[101b.2\]]'gyur te/_/'jig rten chos brgyad dag gis mi rgul ri bo bzhin/_/thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/_/dge zhing mnyen par smra la 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan/_/khro gnyer med cing rtag tu gsong por smra bar 'gyur/_/bzhin yang 'dzum zhing 'dren pa dag gi rjes su slob/_/
[\[101b.3\]]thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/_/des shing 'grogs na bde la 'jam pa'i sems su 'gyur/_/rtag par rab tu dul zhing dul ba'i sa la gnas/_/'jam zhing dga' ba'i tshig smra shin tu bde bar zer/_/thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/_/de ni gtam byed 
[\[101b.4\]]'gyur yang rtsod cing 'thab pa med/_/zhe sdang tha ba de dag ma lus rnam spangs te/_/rtag par rab tu dga' zhing des la mnyen pa yin/_/thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/_/mkhas pa rtag tu gtong la mos par rab 'gyur te/_/shin tu sdug bsngal skye bo mthong nas kha zas 
[\[101b.5\]]sbyin/_/gtong la shin tu dga' zhing bdag nyid spyod mi dga'/_/thar pa 'dod pa ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di 'dzin na/_/lha yang brgya stong de la smon pa shin tu skyed/_/klu dang lha min gnod sbyin rtag tu g.yog byed de/_/nags dang nags 'dabs gnas pa de la srung bar byed/_/tshig ni 
[\[101b.6\]]thogs pa med cing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs te/_/ngang pa'i sgra skad mi'am ci yi glu yi dbyangs/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag lnga brgya dga' ba'i sgra skad de/_/sgra sgrags shin tu grags pa'i sgra yi mchog tu 'gyur/_/ji snyed zhing rnams de dag skyes bu la la yis/_/phra ba'i rdul du byas pa shes 
[\[101b.7\]]par nus kyang ni/_/ting 'dzin rdul bral mchog 'di mi gang 'dzin pa dag_/de yi dbyangs sgra de bas shin tu mang bar 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di yang mi gang 'dzin pa ni/_/dbang bcu 'thob cing sa yang brgyad dang gnyis 'thob ste/_/mkhas pas sangs rgyas chos rnams 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]bsam yas 'thob par 'gyur/_/bdud rnams thams cad btul nas byang chub dam pa rig_/phan yon gyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na 
[\[102a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin shes par bya snyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_kun chub par 
[\[102a.3\]]bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_rab tu gdon par bya/_lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas bsgom par bya/_mang du bya/_gzhan la yang yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs 
[\[102a.4\]]so/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/_/de la 'dod chags ldang ba med cing zhe sdang med/_/khyu mchog la ni nam yang gti mug ldang ba med/_/des ni nyon mongs ma lus thams cad spangs pa yin/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/_/de ni bde 
[\[102a.5\]]gshegs thugs sras bslabs pa yong mi 'dor/_/dpa' bo bud med dbang du nam yang mi 'gro ste/_/de dang der ni bde gshegs bstan pa'i dga' ba myong /_/chos kyi rang bzhin tshul gyi rigs pa gang shes pa/_/de ni mkhas pa blo ldan ye shes cho ga shes/_/de dang de ni sangs rgyas 
[\[102a.6\]]mtha' yas mu med mthong /_/de ni gzugs dang ye shes mtha' yas rab tu shes/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/_/de ni ring por mi thogs rkang gnyis gtso bor 'gyur/_/de dang de ni sman pa dpyad shes bde ba sbyin par 'gyur/_/de ni sdug bsngal zug rngu thams cad
