[\[102a.7\]]'byin par byed/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/_/de ni sems can 'di dag sdug bsngal na rig nas/_/de ni rtag tu bdud rtsi dag gi rnga dag rdung /_/de dang de ni ring por mi thogs 'dren par 'gyur/_/de ni sman gyi tshul la mkhas pa sman pa'i mchog_/thams cad 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]nad kyi gzhi dang gang gis 'thar pa shes/_/de ni yang dag tshul la bslabs pa blo gros ldan/_/bslabs nas shin tu 'khyams pa'i sems can mang po 'grol/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/_/de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul mkhas blo gros dpa'/_/de ni 'jig rten rtag tu 
[\[102b.2\]]ma chags bsod snyoms za/_/de ni sems can mang po byang chub mchog la 'god/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/_/de ni mi yi zla ba bzod pa'i stobs kyis 'phags/_/de ni rdo dang dbyug pas brdegs kyang mi khro ste/_/de ni lus dang yan lag bcad kyang 'khrug pa 
[\[102b.3\]]med/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/_/de ni bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa stobs ldan yin/_/de ni rab tu zhi ba'i bzod pa'i dngos mi gtong /_/de ni blo dpa' bzod pa'i stobs la rlom sems med/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/_/de ni bdag 
[\[102b.4\]]bcad snyam du nams kyang sems mi 'gyur/_/de yis srid pa thams cad rnam bshig rtag tu stong /_/de yi 'du shes thams cad ma lus rab tu spangs/_/de dang de dag chos kyi rang bzhin dam pa ston/_/de dag ring por mi thogs bla med byang chub reg_/gang dag chos kyi rang bzhin 
[\[102b.5\]]spyod yul nges rtogs pa/_/de dag gis ni sbyin pa mtha' yas mu med byin/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/_/de ni mdo sde bye ba mtha' yas 'chad par byed/_/de las lhag par gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/_/bshad kyang de yi spobs pa'i rgyun ni 'chad pa med/_/
[\[102b.6\]]chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/_/de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du yang /_/ye shes dag ni rtag tu 'phags pa ri rab bzhin/_/chos rnams ston pa dag ni zad par yong mi 'gyur/_/chos kyi rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba gang shes pa/_/spobs pa yangs shing rgya che 
[\[102b.7\]]bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/_/byang chub dam pa rtag tu khor mor tshol ba na/_/mdo sde dag kyang bye ba mtha' yas rab tu 'chad/_/chos 'di thams cad dngos po med par gang shes pa/_/rkang gnyis gtso bos chos gang ji snyed bshad pa yang /_/de dag thams cad thos nas 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'dzin/_/de ni tshig gcig la yang the tshom 'byung mi 'gyur/_/chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par gang shes pa/_/de ni rtag tu bye brag 'phags shing gtong ldan 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal dag la bde ba sbyin pa'i sbyin bdag yin/_/sems can sdug 
[\[103a.2\]]bsngal mthong nas rin chen tshim par byed/_/chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par gang shes pa/_/de ni rtag tu 'dzam bu rgyal mtshan rgyal por 'gyur/_/dus kun du yang srog chags rnams la byams ldan te/_/rtag tu mtha' yas pa yi bde ba byed par 'gyur/_/chos kyi rang bzhin 
[\[103a.3\]]rtag tu stong par gang shes pa/_/dpa' bo bu dang bu mo bran dag gtong bar byed/_/mgo dang lag pa de bzhin rgyal srid yongs su gtong /_/khyu mchog de yi yid ni zhum par yong mi 'gyur/_/chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par gang shes pa/_/de yi lus dang yan lag gal te bcad 
[\[103a.4\]]gyur kyang /_/rmi lam na yang de yi yid la khong khro med/_/des ni 'dren pa rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod pa yin/_/chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu stong par gang shes pa/_/des ni 'das pa'i 'dren pa thams cad mchod pa yin/_/de bzhin ma byon pa yi rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod/_/des ni 'dren 
[\[103a.5\]]pa bzhugs pa thams cad ri mor byas/_/gang dag mdo sde 'di thos zad pa'i dus la 'dzin/_/de ni mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mdzod 'chang yin/_/de ni gzungs mchog dag la rab tu gnas pa ste/_/de ni ring por mi thogs 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur/_/gang gis mdo sde 
[\[103a.6\]]'di dag rab bshad mi brjed pa/_/mkhas pa de ni long bar nams kyang mi 'gyur te/_/bskal pa mang por yan lag ma tshang yong mi 'gyur/_/des ni mi khom brgyad po dag kyang rtag tu spangs/_/de ni ngan 'gror nam yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/_/rtag tu mtshan rnams 'chang zhing 
[\[103a.7\]]byad bzhin bzang por 'gyur/_/mngon shes lnga po de dag rtag par des bsgoms te/_/dpa' bo de ni rtag tu bde gshegs spyan sngar gnas/_/ye shes can de 'phrul pa mang po sprul byas nas/_/zhing rnams bye ba mang por 'dul ba'i don phyir gtong /_/sangs rgyas sprul pa mang 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]po gang gis mthong gyur pa/_/de yis sems can mang po byang chub mchog tu btsud/_/gang dag mdo sde 'di thos zad pa'i dus la 'dzin/_/de ni dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing shes rab can/_/de ni rtag tu mthu dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan/_/gzi brjid chen po chos kyi pha rol phyin 
[\[103b.2\]]par 'gyur/_/zad pa'i dus la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'dzin pa ni/_/dpa' bo de yang tshangs pa'i gnas la shin tu gnas/_/de ni myur du sa yang brgyad dang gnyis dag 'thob/_/de ni myur zhing mgyogs par bdud rnams shin tu 'dul/_/gang gis mdo sde zhi ba 'di ni rtag bsgoms pa/_/
[\[103b.3\]]dbang dang ldan zhing mngon par 'phags pa stobs dang ldan/_/de ni sems can dam pa sems can don phyir brtson/_/de ni byang chub shing drung byang chub mchog rtogs 'gyur/_/gang gis chos 'di rnams ni stong par goms byas pa/_/de dag 'od zer bye ba stong rnams rtag tu 'gyed/_/
[\[103b.4\]]nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag kyang thams cad gzi med byas/_/dpa' bo de dag mi ring 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur/_/ngas sngon spyod yul zhi ba 'di ni rab tu bsgoms/_/bskal pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig stong du yang /_/lam 'dir ngas ni nam yang brtson 'grus rgyun ma bcad/_/de tshe 
[\[103b.5\]]mar me mdzad kyis rgyal bar lung yang bstan/_/mdo sde 'di la khyed kyang nga yi rjes su slobs/_/tshul 'di zab cing dam pa'i don rnams bstan pa ste/_/'di la mu stegs log pa mang po 'di dag 'khyams/_/byang chub la ni smad byas ngan song 'jigs par ltung /_/bskal pa 
[\[103b.6\]]mang po bye ba khrag khrig stong du yang /_/de dag sdug bsngal mi bzad tsha ba der myong nas/_/bskal pa khrag khrig mang po dag ni 'das nas kyang /_/de ni de dag mi 'chi 'thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/gang dag phyi dus 'jig la bde bar gshegs pa yi/_/mdo sde rab tu zhi ba 'di 
[\[103b.7\]]ni srung byed pa/_/de dag byang chub mchog rab 'di ni rnyed mi dka'/_/de dang de dag phyi dus chos 'dzin lung bstan yin/_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/_bam po bcu 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nu gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa chen po'i byi dor bya ba yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 
[\[104a.2\]]mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_rab tu gdon par bya/_lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/_nyon mongs pa med pas bsgom par bya/_mang du bya/_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par 
[\[104a.3\]]rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/gzhon nu chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa chen po'i byi dor bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing tshul khrims kyi phung po mchog tu mi 'dzin pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rlom sems med pa/_shes rab kyi 
[\[104a.4\]]phung po rgyu ba med pa/_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dben par mthong ba/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa de dag dang ldan pas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 
[\[104a.5\]]thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'di ni gzhon nu chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa chen po'i byi dor bya ba yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa chen po'i byi dor bya ba bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[104a.6\]]grangs 'di zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/mngon shes chen po yongs sbyangs pa/_/rtsod pa med par bstan pa ste/_/rtsod pa dag la gang spyod cing /_/'dzin par byed pa de mi thar/_/mngon shes de yi 
[\[104a.7\]]shes rab ste/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/_/'dzin pa la ni gang gnas pa/_/de la ye shes yong mi 'gyur/_/gang dag sgra yis bstan pa yi/_/chos rnams mang po bsam mi khyab/_/sgra de la yang gang chags pa/_/dgongs pa'i bshad pa mi shes so/_/
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]ci la dgongs te bshad pa yi/_/dgongs pa dag ni mi shes pa/_/chos nyid la ni ma bslabs pas/_/chos ma yin pa chos su 'chad/_/'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu/_/ngas ni mdo sde gang bshad pa/_/tshig 'bru tha dad don gcig ste/_/thams cad brjod par nus ma 
[\[104b.2\]]yin/_/tshig gcig rnam par bsgoms na ni/_/de dag thams cad bsgoms par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas ji snyed thams cad kyis/_/chos rnams mang po rab bshad pa/_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid/_/mi gang don la mkhas pa dag_/tshig 'di bslabs par gyur pa la/_/
[\[104b.3\]]sangs rgyas chos rnams dkon ma yin/_/chos kun sangs rgyas chos yin te/_/chos nyid la yang gang bslabs pa/_/chos nyid rab tu shes pa ni/_/chos nyid dang yang 'gal mi byed/_/tshig kun kyang ni sangs rgyas tshig_/sgra kun dngos po med pa ste/_/phyogs bcu dag tu btsal na yang /_/sangs 
[\[104b.4\]]rgyas tshig ni mi rnyed do/_/tshig 'di sangs rgyas tshig yin te/_/phyogs bcu dag tu rab btsal kyang /_/bla med 'di ni mi rnyed do/_/ma rnyed rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas tshig ni bla na med/_/ltag na med pa sangs rgyas tshig_/de la rdul tsam mi rnyed pas/_/de tshe bla na med ces brjod/_chos ni rdul tsam mi skye ste/_/
[\[104b.5\]]rdul tsam sgrar ni bshad pa yin/_/rdul tsam rnyed par ma gyur kyang /_/'jig rten du ni sgra yis bshad/_/chos rnams rnyed med rnyed pa ste/_/rnyed pa la yang rnyed pa med/_/de ltar chos rnams gang shes pa/_/byang chub dam pa rtogs par 'gyur/_/byang chub bla med nges rtogs nas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[104b.6\]]rab tu bskor/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams ston par byed/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bla med ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtogs par byed/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rtogs byed pas/_/sangs rgyas zhes kyang de phyir brjod/_/dngos med smon pa med 
[\[104b.7\]]pa dang /_/mtshan ma med dang stong pa nyid/_/rnam thar sgo ni 'di dag gis/_/sgo dag sangs rgyas rab tu ston/_/mig dang rna ba sna dag dang /_/lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid/_/de dag rang bzhin stong par ni/_/sangs rgyas dag gis rab tu bshad/_/de lta bu yi chos rnams 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]kyi/_/rang bzhin dag ni sus shes pa/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid shes pas na/_/de ni rtsod par mi byed do/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' dag_/dpa' bo skyob pa'i spyod yul te/_/chos rnams stong par shes pa ni/_/de dag nam yang nem nur med/_/chos kyi rang bzhin 
[\[105a.2\]]shes pas na/_/de phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_/sems can bsam gyis mi khyab cing /_/dpag tu med pa byang chub 'dul/_/sangs rgyas sgras ni gang byas pa/_/tshul khrims sgras kyang de byas te/_/sangs rgyas sgra dang tshul khrims sgra/_/de dag gnyi ga mtshan nyid gcig_/'jig 
[\[105a.3\]]rten sgra dag brjod pa ni/_/rab dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams/_/mnyam par gzhag pa'i sgra gcig la/_/sangs rgyas sgras ni bstan pa yin/_/sangs rgyas sgra ni yul mi gnas/_/phyogs la'ang gnas pa ma yin rjod/_/skyes dang 'gags pa ma yin te/_/de bzhin gcig dang 
[\[105a.4\]]tha dad min/_/de dag gsar ram rnying ma yin/_/de dag la ni rlom sems med/_/ser po ma yin sngon po min/_/dkar po ma yin dmar po min/_/brjod du med cing gzung med par/_/de ltar dbyangs kyis bstan mod kyi/_/de ni dbyangs kyi sa ma yin/_/thub pa dag gi cho 
[\[105a.5\]]'phrul 'di/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/sangs rgyas sku gzugs snang gyur te/_/de gnas yid la byas pa na/_/cho 'phrul rnams kyang de yis mthong /_/gang gis mya ngan 'das reg pa/_/sems can de ni mi rnyed de/_/de bzhin chos rnams rab bstan cing /_/sems 
[\[105a.6\]]can mang po grol bar byas/_/ji ltar nyi ma zla ba dag_/khar ba'i snod du snang ba yang /_/rang gi gzugs ni mi 'pho ltar/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'dra'o/_/chos rnams mig yor lta bur yang /_/gang gis ngo bo nyid shes pa/_/de dag gzugs kyi lus su ni/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[105a.7\]]sku la mi blta'o/_/chos 'di lus gzugs med pa ste/_/'di la lus gzugs gang yang med/_/chos gang lus gzugs med pa ni/_/de ni sangs rgyas sku lus so/_/su dag chos kyi skur lta ba/_/de dag gis ni 'dren pa mthong /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]chos kyi sku/_/de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong /_/rten cing so sor bstan pa ste/_/so so ma yin so sor bshad/_/dge sbyong nyid ni su 'dod pa/_/'jug pa 'di ni rig par gyis/_/gang dag bdag gis thob snyam pa/_/de phyir ma thob pa zhes bya/_/gang gis dge sbyong nyid 
[\[105b.2\]]ma thob/_/de phyir dge sbyong zhes kyang bya/_/su dag bslabs par ma gyur pa/_/zab mo'i chos 'di ga la smra/_/de dag zab mo'i ming du yang /_/yongs su brjod par mi nus so/_/phung po lnga ni dngos med de/_/med pa las ni 'di dag byung /_/su yi phung po byung ba yang /_/de la slong bar 
[\[105b.3\]]byed pa med/_/phung po'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa/_/chos kun de yi mtshan nyid yin/_/de yi mtshan nyid yod bshad de/_/mtshan nyid kyang ni yod ma yin/_/ji ltar bar snang nam mkha' bzhin/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid de 'dra bar/_/sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'/_/da ltar byung ba'ang 
[\[105b.4\]]mthong bar 'gyur/_/nam mkha' gzung ba med par bshad/_/de la gzung ba mi rnyed de/_/chos kyi rang bzhin 'di nyid yin/_/gzung ba med pa nam mkha' 'dra/_/de lta bur ni chos bstan te/_/de la gang yang mthong ba med/_/su dag chos 'di mi mthong ba/_/de yi chos 
[\[105b.5\]]rnams bsam mi khyab/_/chos 'di rnams ni rang bzhin med/_/'di dag rang bzhin mi rnyed de/_/sangs rgyas byang chub su brtson pa/_/rnal 'byor pa yi spyod yul 'di/_/de lta bur ni sus shes pa/_/de ni chos la mi chags te/_/chos rnams la yang mi chags pas/_/
[\[105b.6\]]chos kyi 'du shes rab tu rtogs/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yis/_/chos rnams thams cad rnam par bshig_/chos kyi 'du shes rnam bshig nas/_/sangs rgyas chos la rlom sems med/_/mtha' de rlom sems ma byas pa/_/brtags nas mthar ni bshad pa ste/_/
[\[105b.7\]]de ltar mtha' ni sus shes pa/_/bskal pa bye bar rlom sems med/_/byis pas sngon gyi mtha' brtags pas/_/'khor ba rnams su 'khor 'gyur te/_/phyogs bcu dag tu btsal na yang /_/de yi gnas ni mi rnyed do/_/'khor ba stong par rig nas ni/_/rgyal ba'i thugs 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]sras chags mi 'gyur/_/byang chub don phyir spyod mod kyi/_/de dag spyod pa mi rnyed do/_/nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/de dag rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_/de 'dra'i rang bzhin byang chub de/_/byang chub sems dpas rtogs par 'gyur/_/sgyu ma byed pa rab bslabs 
[\[106a.2\]]pa/_/sgyu ma dag ni ston pa ltar/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyang /_/gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnyed dang mi rnyed rlom sems med/_/rnyed pa la yang rnyed med de/_/ye shes de ni sgyu ma 'dra/_/sgyu ma de la gnas pa min/_/de bzhin chos rnams stong pa la/_/
[\[106a.3\]]byis pa'i blo yis rnam brtags nas/_/rnam par rtog la spyod pa dag_/'gro ba drug tu gzhol bar 'gyur/_/phung po skye rga nyer 'gro ste/_/de dag skye ba zad mi 'gyur/_/skye zhing 'chi ba'i phung po rnams/_/de dag sdug bsngal mtha' yas so/_/skye zhing 'khor ba sdug bsngal 
[\[106a.4\]]te/_/byis pa'i blo yis brtags pas na/_/de dag rtog pa mi zad de/_/de dag bskal pa bye bar 'khor/_/mi sbyor ba dang rab sbyor dang /_/las kyi sbyor la gang gnas dang /_/las rnams len pa gang dga' ba/_/de dag las las mi 'thar ro/_/las kyi chu bos khyer ba de/_/
[\[106a.5\]]las ni rtag tu zad mi 'gyur/_/bdud kyi phyogs la gang gnas pa/_/yang dang yang ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/bdud kyis zil non shes rab 'chal/_/nyon mongs pa yi las rnams kyis/_/skye ba de dang de dag tu/_/skye zhing 'chi ba myong bar 'gyur/_/so so'i skye bo long ba yi/_/
[\[106a.6\]]byis pa de dag 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de dag btag cing rnam par gzhom/_/de dag 'gro ba mi bzad 'gyur/_/byis pa'i blo can mtshon cha yis/_/gcig la gcig ni gsod pa byed/_/de lta bur ni sbyor ba dag_/de dag sbyor ba rab tu 'phel/_/nga'i bu nga yi nor snyam du/_/
[\[106a.7\]]byis pa'i blo yis rab brtags te/_/med pa'i chos rnams brtags pas na/_/'khor ba dag ni phyir zhing 'phel/_/'khor ba dag ni 'phel byed cing /_/so so'i skye bo de dag 'khor/_/so so tha dad 'gro bas na/_/so so'i skye bor brjod pa yin/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bor nas ni/_/chos rnams mang po rab tu 'chad/_/bdud kyi dbang du song bas na/_/de dag thar pa rnyed mi 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i phyir ni byis pa rnams/_/bud med rul la sten byed de/_/'gro ba rul bar 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/des ni ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur/_/'jigs pa chen 
[\[106b.2\]]po'i zhags pa ni/_/bud med zhags pa mi bzad pas/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'dod pa dang /_/bud med bsten pa'ang ma bsngags so/_/lam 'di byang chub mi 'gyur bas/_/bud med rnams la ma rton par/_/sbrul gdug shin tu khro bo ltar/_/mkhas pas de ni rnam par 
[\[106b.3\]]spong /_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa yi/_/byang chub lam la sgom par byed/_/lam de goms par bsgoms byas na/_/bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur/_/de dag bla na med 'gyur te/_/'jig rten gyi ni mchod rten 'gyur/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis/_/sangs 
[\[106b.4\]]rgyas bla na med par 'gyur/_/gso sbyong dag la snyen byed cing /_/tshul khrims phung por yang dag 'dzud/_/sems can bye ba bsam mi khyab/_/byang chub tu yang yang dag 'dzud/_/de dag sems can rnams kyi ni/_/bsam yas dpag med don byed de/_/dpa' bo shes rab 
[\[106b.5\]]chen po de/_/bdud rtsi yi ni rnga yang rdung /_/bdud kyi gnas rnams g.yo byed cing /_/bdud kyi ris kyang g.yo bar byas/_/bdud rnams bye ba bsam mi khyab/_/byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud/_/pha rol rgol ba tshar gcod cing /_/mu stegs can ni pham par byed/_/ri dang 
[\[106b.6\]]rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/_/sa yang rab tu g.yo bar byed/_/khyu mchog gyur pa du ma yis/_/lus kyi rnam par 'phrul byed cing /_/shes rab chen po de dag ni/_/cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ston/_/zhing rnams bye ba g.yo byed de/_/gang gA yi ni bye ma snyed/_/de dag 
[\[106b.7\]]bdud rnams pham byas nas/_/sangs rgyas grags pa chen por 'gyur/_/de dag zhing rnams sprul byed de/_/rin po che yis rnam par brgyan/_/me tog 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/_/dri dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong /_/khang pa dang ni gzhal med khang /_/khang pa brtsegs 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]pa pu shur bcas/_/dpa' bo de dag sprul pa byed/_/rdzing bu yid du 'ong ba dag_/yan lag brgyad ldan chu yis gang /_/dang zhing bsil la rnyog pa med/_/de las chu ni sus 'thungs pa/_/srid pa gsum yang spong bar 'gyur/_/bla na med pa'i chu 'thungs nas/_/
[\[107a.2\]]de dag phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis/_/sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur/_/bla med zhi ba'i 'jug par ni/_/'gro bar shin tu rig par gyis/_/'jug pa 'di ni mi shes pas/_/dmigs pa can dag shin tu brlag_/su dag de la rten gyur cing /_/de dag 
[\[107a.3\]]skal mnyam sems can de/_/mnar med par ni de 'gro ste/_/mi bzad pa ni chen por ltung /_/de yi sdug bsngal drag po ni/_/brjod par nus pa ma yin te/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa dang /_/ngas ni de dag rab tu shes/_/'di 'dra'i zab mo mthong dka' yi/_/chos la su 
[\[107a.4\]]dag nem nur byed/_/su dag dmigs la gnas pa yi/_/byis pa dag gi sa ma yin/_/bla med sangs rgyas zhing du ni/_/gang gis de dag 'gro 'gyur ba/_/gzugs ston pa ni du ma yi/_/bkod pa dag ni sprul par byed/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni ji snyed kyi/_/gzugs 'grub phun 
[\[107a.5\]]sum tshogs yod pa/_/de dag thams cad 'dir yang ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul che ston/_/chos chen gyi ni go bgos te/_/dpa' chen stobs kyang che ba dag_/stong pa'i don chen rdo rje yis/_/gdab pa dag kyang de dag 'debs/_/'od zer bye ba phrag stong dag_/gang 
[\[107a.6\]]gA yi ni bye ma snyed/_/de yi lus las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/des ni 'jig rten rab tu snang /_/de dag bud med mi chags te/_/de dag yid 'byung mi byed la/_/bud med 'du shes rang bzhin gyis/_/'du shes de dag rnam par bshig_/dpa' bo de dag gar gnas pa/_/
[\[107a.7\]]sangs rgyas zhing de mi stong ste/_/de dag la ni sdig can bdud/_/bar chad byed par ga la 'gyur/_/lta ba dag la de gnas pas/_/sangs rgyas mang po mnyes ma byas/_/gnod sems kyis ni nyer brtan cing /_/'dod dang chags la rab tu gnas/_/lta la gnas pa de dag kun/_/
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]bdud yin par ni rig par bya/_/de la sdig can bdud rnams kyang /_/bar chad byed par mi 'jug go/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/_/ye shes de ltar sus shes pa/_/'du shes thams cad rnam bshig nas/_/'du shes dag pa mi ldog gnas/_/sngon gyi mtha' dang 
[\[107b.2\]]phyi ma'i mtha'/_/da ltar mtha' yang mthong bar 'gyur/_/de ltar chos rnams bstan mod kyi/_/de la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]bstan pa med/_/ye shes kyis kyang shes pa med/_/mi shes pas kyang zhum mi 'gyur/_/ye shes mi shes rnam brtags nas/_/sangs rgyas ye shes brjod pa 
[\[107b.3\]]yin/_/rnam rig tshig dang brda rnams ni/_/byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes/_/de ni sems can don rnams kyang /_/dpag med bsam yas byed par 'gyur/_/'du shes kun tu shes pa'i phyir/_/'dzin par yang ni de bstan te/_/'du shes de ni mi 'dzin pa/_/dben pa'i 
[\[107b.4\]]don du rab tu bstan/_/dben pa gang yin 'du shes te/_/'du shes gang yin bstan pa de/_/'du shes rang bzhin ye shes te/_/de ltar 'du shes med par 'gyur/_/'du shes 'di ni spang snyam du/_/gang gi 'du shes 'byung ba ni/_/'du shes spros la spyod pa ste/_/'du 
[\[107b.5\]]shes las ni de mi 'thar/_/su yi 'du shes 'di dag byung /_/su yis 'du shes 'di bskyed byas/_/sus ni 'du shes reg par byas/_/sus ni 'du shes bkag par gyur/_/gang gi 'du shes 'byung ba ni/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang chos ma brnyes/_/'dir ni don de 
[\[107b.6\]]bsam par gyis/_/de nas 'du shes med par 'gyur/_/nam tshe 'du shes skyes pa na/_/su yi 'du shes yin zhes brjod/_/sems kyi rgyud kyi rnam thar yang /_/de la ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/gang tshe rnam thar reg pa na/_/bsam pa thams cad bsam pa med/_/gang tshe 
[\[107b.7\]]bsam pa bsam med pa/_/de tshe bsam du med par 'gyur/_/bsam pa'i sa la gnas nas ni/_/mthar gyis rnam par bsam byas te/_/bsam pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/_/de nas bsam du med par 'gyur/_/'di ni dkar chos rnam smin te/_/'du byed med 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]pas mthong bar 'gyur/_/sems can kun gyis rnam bsam pa/_/skad cig gcig la rab tu shes/_/sems can ci 'dra de bzhin bsam/_/bsam bzhin rgyal ba de 'dra ste/_/sangs rgyas bsam du med pa yis/_/bsam pa 'di ni rab tu bstan/_/gcig pu 
[\[108a.2\]]dben song gang sems pa/_/nam zhig sems pa med par 'gyur/_/bsam pa dag ni mi sems na/_/bsam pa thams cad med par 'gyur/_/shi 'phos dus byas shi ba'i tshe/_/gang gi bsam pa rab 'jug pa/_/bsam pa'i rjes su rnam shes 'brang /_/bsam las de ni mi thar to/_/
[\[108a.3\]]su dag bud med 'du shes gnas/_/de dag 'dod chags rab tu 'phel/_/'du shes dag ni rnam bshig na/_/'dod chags kyis ni gos mi 'gyur/_/bsam pa 'di ni bsam pa che/_/chos kyi bsam pa bla na med/_/chos kyi bsam pa 'di yis ni/_/yang dag bsam pa rab tu 'byung /_/tshul 
[\[108a.4\]]ma yin pa rnam bsams pas/_/bsam pa bsam yas mang po dag_/yun ring dus su rnam bsams kyang /_/bsam pa dag ni zad ma gyur/_/gang dag ming la sems pa yang /_/zad pa la ni ye shes med/_/sgra shes pa la zad pa med/_/zad pa'i chos nyid de yin no/_/sgra dang 
[\[108a.5\]]rnam rig tshig gi lam/_/zad pa'i sgrar ni bstan pa ste/_/chos de rnams ni bye brag med/_/shes bzhin zad pa de bzhin te/_/ma skyes shing ni ma 'gags pa/_/mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med/_/bskal pa bye bar bshad kyang ni/_/mtshan ma med par bstan pa yin/_/dngos 
[\[108a.6\]]po thams cad rnam bshig nas/_/dngos po med la rab gnas pa/_/dngos po gzhan du ma bstan te/_/dngos med pa yang gzhan mi bstan/_/dngos med sgrar ni rig byas te/_/dngos po med pa rab tu bstan/_/sangs rgyas dag ni kun gyis kyang /_/dngos po med pa bltar mi 
[\[108a.7\]]nus/_/dngos po kun gyi dngos po ni/_/dngos po med par de bstan te/_/de ltar dngos po rnam rig ni/_/dngos po med par 'gyur zhes bstan/_/dngos po med pa de yang ni/_/sus kyang nam du reg mi nus/_/dngos po med pa reg pa yis/_/kun rdzob tu ni de bstan to/_/
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur snyam/_/de ltar gang gi blo 'gyur ba/_/srid pa'i sred pas yong mi gzir/_/mkhas pa byang chub rtogs par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag pa/_/chos ni gang la'ang smon mi byed/_/ci yang med cing dmigs pa med/_/de ni byang 
[\[108b.2\]]chub brjod pa yin/_/byang chub tu ni nges zhugs shes/_/mang du de skad smra mod kyi/_/'jug pa 'di ni mi shes pas/_/de dag sangs rgyas byang chub ring /_/'du byed thams cad stong par ni/_/sgra yis chos rnams rab tu bshad/_/sgra yi rang bzhin gang yin pa/_/zab cing phra ste 
[\[108b.3\]]mthong bar dka'/_/mngon shes che la mdo sde 'di/_/nges par bstan zhes bya ba yin/_/byang chub sems dpa'i don phyir ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan mdzad do/_/kun nas nyon mongs ji snyed pa/_/gnyen po thams cad de yis bcom/_/mngon par shes la rab gnas shing /_/
[\[108b.4\]]de dag rdzu 'phrul shin tu bsgoms/_/bsams nas shes la de gnas te/_/shes pa de yang rnam par bshig_/bsam gyis mi khyab dpag med kyi/_/ye shes thob pas ngoms pa med/_/ting nge 'dzin dang rdzu 'phrul phyir/_/de dag mngon par 'du byed med/_/dpa' bo'i rnam 
[\[108b.5\]]smin de yin te/_/dus kun du yang mnyam par bzhag_/rnam smin skyes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/_/zhing ni bye bar de 'gro ste/_/'jig rten sgron ma mthong ba ni/_/gang gA dag gi bye ma snyed/_/de dag 'chi 'pho skye ba yang /_/sems gzhan du ni sgyur bar byed/_/sems la dbang 
[\[108b.6\]]yang thob pas na/_/de dag lus ni 'od gsal lo/_/sangs rgyas dag gi nyan thos gang /_/bsgoms pa'i rdzu 'phrul gnas pa ni/_/'du byed med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la/_/de dag bcu drug char mi phod/_/lha rnams kyis kyang de dag gi/_/bsam pa shes par mi nus te/_/'jig 
[\[108b.7\]]rten gyi ni mgon po dang /_/de dag mtshungs gnas ma gtogs so/_/de dag spyi cer mi 'gyur te/_/mgo la skra dkar mi 'byung zhing /_/rags pa'i rga ba mi 'byung ste/_/de bzhin sdug bsngal 'chi ba med/_/the tshom yid gnyis mi 'byung ste/_/de dag la ni nem nur med/_/
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]mdo sde bye ba brgya rnams ni/_/nyin mtshan du yang de dag tshol/_/ji snyed kun nas nyon mongs kyi/_/bag la nyal ni rab tu spangs/_/de dag sems can thams cad la/_/rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems su 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig rnams/_/phyogs bcu dag 
[\[109a.2\]]tu nges par ston/_/dris pa bye ba stong rnams kyang /_/mi gnas par ni lung ston to/_/pho dang mor ni 'du shes dang /_/'du shes thams cad rnam par bshig_/dngos med 'du shes gnas nas ni/_/yang dag nges par ston par byed/_/yongs su dag pa'i ye shes kyis/_/ji bzhin 
[\[109a.3\]]du ni chos ston to/_/chos rnams yang dag bstan la brtson/_/ting 'dzin ye shes spyod yul ldan/_/de yi ting 'dzin spyod pa yang /_/dngos po dag la mi gnas te/_/de yi tshig kyang don med min/_/chos bstan pa yang 'bras bu yod/_/mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba/_/des ni mir 
[\[109a.4\]]'gyur legs par 'thob/_/mi khom thams cad rab tu spangs/_/sangs rgyas kun la byas pa gzo/_/gang gis rin chen mdo 'di las/_/tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad bzung ba yang /_/des ni 'khor ba gang bor ba/_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba/_/
[\[109a.5\]]de dag sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs/_/de ni sangs rgyas ri mor byas/_/myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba/_/de dag chos rnams thams cad la/_/the tshom dang ni nem nur med/_/de dag mya ngan 'das dang nye/_/bya rgod phung por de bzhin gshegs/_/
[\[109a.6\]]dpa' bo chen po de yis mthong /_/thams cad sangs rgyas lung bstan te/_/rgyal ba byams pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas byams pa mthong nas ni/_/bzod pa bzang po thob par 'gyur/_/gang su zad pa'i dus la yang /_/mdo sde 'di la rab gnas pa/_/de dag yang dag 
[\[109a.7\]]mtha' la gnas/_/yang dag mtha' ni bsam mi khyab/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' la ni/_/de dag nem nur yod ma yin/_/rdul phran tsam yang rnam pa kun/_/de dag la yang the tshom med/_/rdul tsam rab tu spangs pa ni/_/de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/zad dus shin 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]tu 'jigs pa la/_/dka' ba dag ni spyad byas te/_/mdo sde rin chen 'di bslabs na/_/spobs pa dag kyang mi zad 'gyur/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab bton na/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod bsrungs te/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kun mchod pa/_/chos kyi mchod pa bsam mi khyab/_/
[\[109b.2\]]ma rungs zad pa'i dus la ni/_/mdo sde 'di dag gang 'dzin pa/_/de dag ye shes rnyed mi dka'/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/_/gang gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas las/_/mdo sde 'di dag bzung ba ni/_/de dag lus la 'chang gyur te/_/zad pa'i dus la rab tu 'don/_/sangs 
[\[109b.3\]]rgyas zhing ni bye bar yang /_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar yang /_/shAkya seng ge'i spyod pa rnams/_/de dag sgrar yang sgrog par 'gyur/_/de dag sangs rgyas spyan sngar ni/_/rtag tu seng ge'i sgra sgrog ste/_/mtha' yas pa yi spobs pa yis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'di yang 
[\[109b.4\]]smra/_/zad dus 'jigs pa chen po'i tshe/_/byang chub 'di ni gang srung ba/_/bu ram shing gi rigs skyes rnams/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan yin/_/de dag gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/_/mtshan rnams kyis kyang rnam par brgyan/_/sangs rgyas bye bar phyag 'tshal 
[\[109b.5\]]du/_/rnam par 'phrul pas 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sgyu ma yi ni me tog dag_/gser gyi mdog 'drar snang ba dang /_/bai dUr+ya dang shel dag dang /_/dngul gyi yang ni me tog rnams/_/rin chen rigs rnams thams cad kyang /_/de yi lag nas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/byang chub lam 
[\[109b.6\]]rnams tshol ba'i phyir/_/de dag sangs rgyas rnams la 'thor/_/mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/rol mo sgrub pa phun sum tshogs/_/gang gA yi ni bye ma snyed/_/ba spu'i khung nas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sems can bye ba bsam mi khyab/_/gang dag sgra 'di thos pa ni/_/sangs 
[\[109b.7\]]rgyas ye shes bla med las/_/de dag phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas bye ba de dag gi/_/bsngags pa bsam gyis mi khyab brjod/_/bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rnams su/_/de dag sgra yang thos par 'gyur/_/gang gis sgra de thos pa ni/_/de dag 'du shes 'gags 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]par 'gyur/_/'du shes dag ni 'gags nas su/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas mthong bar 'gyur/_/de 'dra ba yi ye shes kyis/_/byang chub spyod pa spyad nas ni/_/sems can kun gyi don byas nas/_/don byed pa yi rgyal bar 'gyur/_/gang gis ting 'dzin bzung 
[\[110a.2\]]ba yi/_/mkhas pas 'dir ni gang 'thob pa/_/yon tan phan yon 'di dag ste/_/gzhan yang dpag tu med par 'gyur/_/bud med kyis kyang mdo sde 'di/_/thos nas tshigs bcad gcig bzung na/_/bud med dngos po rnam bsgyur nas/_/chos smra ba yang de 'gyur ro/_/de ni 
[\[110a.3\]]phyis kyang bud med kyi/_/dngos po 'dzin par mi 'gyur te/_/mtshan rnams kyis ni legs brgyan cing /_/rtag tu byad bzhin bzang por 'gyur/_/mdo sde mchog rab 'di yi ni/_/yon tan dag kyang mchog bshad pa/_/de la de dag thams cad 'byung /_/byang chub nyid kyang myur 
[\[110a.4\]]du 'thob/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te/_/mdo sde 'di ni bzung nas su/_/de dag skye ba thams cad du/_/rtag tu 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba bshad pa ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyed pa ste/_/byang chub rtogs par su 'dod pa/_/mdo sde 'di 
[\[110a.5\]]ni brjod par gyis/_/de dag thub dbang bsnyen pa ste/_/sangs rgyas byang chub nye bar 'gyur/_/de dag ring por mi thogs par/_/mnyam gzhag zhi ba'i sa 'di thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dag_/byang chub de la rtag gnas nas/_/sangs rgyas dag ni bye ba rnams/_/
[\[110a.6\]]gang gA'i bye snyed mthong bar 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba 'di ni des thob nas/_/sa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por de 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas rdul bral shin tu sems zhi rnams mthong nas/_/'jig rten mgon po de dag tshigs bcad brgyas stod 'gyur/_/shin 
[\[110a.7\]]tu grags pa chen po lha dang mi yi mchog_/'dren pa dag la mchod pa mtshungs med des byas te/_/des ni rgyal srid mchil ma bzhin du yongs spangs nas/_/gtsang zhing rnam par dag pas tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod/_/de ni thub pa mchog gi bstan la rab byung nas/_/ting 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]'dzin rdul bral zhi ba 'di yang rab thob ste/_/de yang tshig dge dag kyang shin tu 'jam gyur nas/_/blo ldan byin gyis brlabs kyis mdo sde bye ba 'chad/_/stong pa mtshan med mchog tu gya nom zhi ba'i mchog_/rab tu zhi chos spyad pa zhib cing thogs pa med/_/shin tu zhi ba rtag tu rdul bral 
[\[110b.2\]]rang bzhin stong /_/ting 'dzin 'di thob skye bo mang la rab tu ston/_/blo ni rtag tu zab cing blo yang mtha' yas te/_/blo yang rgya che dpag tu med pa'i don ldan blo/_/zab cing zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas ni/_/'jig rten thams cad du yang snang ba thob par 'gyur/_/rdul dang bral 
[\[110b.3\]]ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di rnyed na/_/de ni tshangs par spyod pa rtag tu gtsang bar 'gyur/_/dri nga med cing rtag tu kun nas nyon mongs med/_/sems can bye ba gzhan yang de la 'god par 'gyur/_/rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/shes rab shin tu rno zhing shes rab 
[\[110b.4\]]mchog tu 'gyur/_/de thos rgya mtshor 'gyur zhing rtag tu blo mtha' yas/_/ngag dge blo gros mkhas shing cho ga shes par 'gyur/_/rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/las kyi gnas dang de bzhin bzo yi gnas rnams dang /_/sman gyi gnas rnams dang ni de bzhin rtsi yi 
[\[110b.5\]]gnas/_/brtan pa de ni thams cad kyi yang pha rol phyin/_/rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/snyan dngags bstan bcos bzhad gad rol mo dang /_/glu dang gar la shin tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin/_/'jig rten na yang rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/_/rdul 
[\[110b.6\]]dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/byang chub spyod pa zhi ba dam pa mchog spyod cing /_/de ni rtag par g.yog dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur/_/phyogs kyang rtag tu mi phyed 'thun zhing 'tsham par 'gyur/_/rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/mkhas pas 
[\[110b.7\]]de la mya ngan dag gi zug rngu dang /_/mkhas pa'i sems la nam yang gnod pa mi 'byung ste/_/thams cad dus su rtag par nad kyang med par 'gyur/_/rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/lus kyi nad dang de bzhin sems kyi nad rnams dang /_/so yi nad dang 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]de bzhin mgo yi nad rnams kyang /_/'tsho ba'i 'jig rten dag na de la nad mi 'byung /_/rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/mi yi 'jig rten nad rnams mang po ci yod pa/_/lus kyi nad dang de bzhin sems kyi nad rnams dang /_/de la nad kyang de dag rtag 
[\[111a.2\]]tu yong mi 'byung /_/rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa ni gang yod dang /_/lus la yang ni nad kyi rnam pa gang yod pa/_/kun nas nyon mongs mang po de dag de la med/_/rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/bar snang 
[\[111a.3\]]nam mkha' dag la gos pa med pa ltar/_/rnam par dag cing rgya che rab tu 'od gsal te/_/de bzhin de yi sems kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/zla ba'i 'od dang de bzhin nyi ma'i 'od rnams ni/_/dag cing gzung du med la rab 
[\[111a.4\]]tu 'od gsal ba/_/de bzhin de yi sems kyang shin tu 'od gsal 'gyur/_/ji ltar tshon rtsi thogs nas bar snang nam mkha' la/_/rnam pa mang po du ma'i gzugs rnams bri bar dka'/_/de bzhin rdul bral zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms na/_/de yi sems la ri mor bri ba sla 
[\[111a.5\]]ma yin/_/rlung ni ji ltar phyogs bzhi dag nas langs pa dang /_/thogs pa med par phyogs rnams kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de yi sems kyi rgyud kyang rlung dang 'drar 'gyur te/_/de ni 'jig rten dag na thogs med ma chags 'gro/_/rlung langs pa ni rgya mos gzung du rung yang 
[\[111a.6\]]srid/_/rlung ni zhags pa dag gis bcing bar nus gyur kyang /_/rdul dang bral ba zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms na/_/de yi sems ni rab tu shes par sla ma yin/_/gzugs brnyan dag ni chu yi nang du gzung bar rung /_/'bru mar gang ba'i snod dang chu yi nang du 'byung /_/
[\[111a.7\]]de bzhin rdul bral zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di bsgoms na/_/de yi sems ni rab tu shes par sla ma yin/_/sprin las 'brug zer glog gi 'khri shing byung ba dag_/mi dag gi ni lag pas gzung bar nus gyur kyang /_/rdul dang bral ba zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di thob na/_/de yi 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]sems kyi tshad ni shes par sla ma yin/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing na sems can ci yod pa/_/sems can de dag gi ni sgra skad gzung nus kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa' nam zhig ting 'dzin 'di thob na/_/de yi sems kyi mtha' ni shes par sla ma yin/_/des ni rdul 
[\[111b.2\]]bral zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di thob nas/_/kun nas nyon mongs med cing gos pa med par 'gyur/_/nam zhig des ni ting 'dzin zhi ba thob pa'i tshe/_/phyir yang sred pa gsum la nam yang chags mi byed/_/nam zhig rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin 'di thob na/_/'dod pa dag la mi sred 
[\[111b.3\]]gzugs la mi sred de/_/bud med dag la mi sred sems kyang 'khrul pa med/_/zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba gos pa med par 'gyur/_/nam zhig rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin 'di thob na/_/bu la mi sred bu mo dag la'ang sred mi 'gyur/_/chung ma dag la'ang mi sred g.yog la'ang sred pa med/_/rab 
[\[111b.4\]]tu zhi bar spyod cing gos pa med par 'gyur/_/gser la mi sred nor rnams la yang sred med de/_/mtho ris mi sred rin chen rdzas la chags mi 'gyur/_/sems kyang shin tu rnam par dag cing mi rtog pa/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa'i bye brag yin/_/rgyal srid 'dod phyir 
[\[111b.5\]]tshangs par spyod pa de mi spyod/_/mkhas pa mtho ris sred pas rtag tu sbyin mi byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas sbyin byed de/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag go/_/rgyal po'i srid phyir dka' thub brtul zhugs mi spyod do/_/srid pa gsum du dbang phyug 'dod 
[\[111b.6\]]pa'i phyir ma yin/_/skye bo mang la phan phyir byang chub sred pa yis/_/de ni rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin 'di sgrub bo/_/glu la mi sred gar la'ang sred pa ma yin te/_/spos la mi sred btung ba dag la'ang sred ma yin/_/zas la'ang mi sred gos la yang ni sred mi 'gyur/_/'di 
[\[111b.7\]]ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/_/mig la mi sred rna ba la yang sred ma yin/_/sna la mi sred lce la sred pa ma yin zhing /_/lus la mi sred sems la yang ni sred mi 'gyur/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/_/khyim la mi sred dgon par sred pa ma yin 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]te/_/gtsug lag khang la mi sred grong la'ang sred mi 'gyur/_/yul 'khor mi sred grong khyer la yang mi sred de/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/_/sbyin la mi sred tshul khrims dag la sred mi 'gyur/_/bzod la mi sred brtson 'grus la yang sred ma 
[\[112a.2\]]yin/_/bsam gtan mi sred shes rab la yang mi sred de/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/_/sems can la yang mi sred srog la mi sred cing /_/sangs rgyas dag la mi sred chos la sred mi byed/_/dge 'dun mi sred byang chub la yang sred mi 'gyur/_/'di ni ting 
[\[112a.3\]]nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/_/yod la mi sred med pa la yang sred ma yin/_/dbus la mi sred mtha' la'ang sred par mi 'gyur zhing /_/kun la mi sred sred pa med pa'ang ma yin te/_/'di ni ting nge 'dzin dag thob pa'i bye brag yin/_/rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di thob 
[\[112a.4\]]na/_/de la 'dod chags nam yang gnod pa mi skyed de/_/su dag bud med sred pa de ni sems 'khrul 'gyur/_/'di ltar des ni 'dod chags rang bzhin yongs su shes/_/rdul dang bral ba zhi ba'i ting 'dzin 'di thob na/_/de la nam yang zhe sdang gnod pa mi skyed de/_/mkhas pas 
[\[112a.5\]]'di ltar gnod sems rab tu bshig pa'i phyir/_/byams par byed cing zhe sdang thams cad shin tu bcom/_/de la nam yang gti mug gnod pa mi skyed de/_/shes rab kyis ni gti mug ma rig nges par bsal/_/ye shes rab rib med pa dpag tu med pa thob/_/ting 'dzin thob 
[\[112a.6\]]pa'i yon tan 'di dag dpag tu med/_/mi gtsang bas ni 'dod chags rtag tu tshar bcad de/_/byams pa yis kyang zhe sdang khor mor ma lus bcom/_/shes rab kyis ni gti mug nyon mongs dra ba bsal/_/ting 'dzin thob pa 'jig rten kun na rab tu mdzes/_/de la nam yang 
[\[112a.7\]]gnyid ni gnod pa mi bskyed de/_/des ni nye ba'i nyon mongs rnam mang rnam par bshig_/de ni gos pa med cing shin tu bral bar 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin thob pa'i yon tan 'di dag dpag tu med/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa/_/de la nam yang 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]chags pa gnod par mi 'gyur te/_/'di ltar de ni dus kun tu yang gtong la dga'/_/bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing bde ba sbyin par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ting 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa/_/de ni dpe med pa yi mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de ni rtag par stobs dang rjes 
[\[112b.2\]]su ldan 'gyur te/_/'jig rten na ni de dang mnyam pa su yang med/_/nam tshe 'jig rten du yang 'khor los sgyur ba yin/_/mi yi rgyal por de 'gyur 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs/_/de tshe skye bo mang pos shin tu mchod par 'gyur/_/khyad par thob pas rab rib med cing shes rab mchog_/
[\[112b.3\]]su dag gtso bor gyur cing rigs che rin chen mchog_/longs spyod che zhing g.yog bran mang la dbang yang che/_/gang la rta dang bal glang shing rta bzhon mchog yod/_/gser dang nor bu rin chen 'gron bu rab tu mang /_/sangs rgyas ye shes dam pa 'di la su dad pa/_/de dag 'dzam 
[\[112b.4\]]gling rin chen rigs zhes bya ba yin/_/de ni rin chen rigs mchog de ru skyes nas kyang /_/gnyen bshes shin tu mang po'i tshogs kyi don kyang byed/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di dag na ma dad gang yod pa/_/de dag bag yod pas ni dad pa skyed par byed/_/sems can tshogs rnams 
[\[112b.5\]]byang chub sems la gang bkod pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas rang byung rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur/_/de dag mtshungs pa med pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas/_/sangs rgyas zhing du mtshungs med 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/de tshe chos kyi 'khor lo 'di ni sus shes pa/_/de dag ma lus mi skye'i 
[\[112b.6\]]chos la gnas par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag shin tu mang byed de/_/de dag rtag tu sems can rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur/_/de dag dus kun du yang mtshungs med don byed de/_/de dag sems can mig ni rab rib med par byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 
[\[112b.7\]]rab dga' byams pa'i sems/_/gos pa med pa de dag de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/de tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gar gnas pa/_/sems can dag gi don kyang tshad med byed par 'gyur/_/tshangs spyod mtshungs med tshul khrims rnam dag rab tu bsrung /_/bskal pa mtha' 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]yas mang por ting 'dzin sgom par byed/_/rtag tu bsam gtan rnam par thar la shin tu nges/_/de tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas sras/_/de dag rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rtag tu snyen byed cing /_/zhing rnams mtha' yas rnam pa mang por de song nas/_/bde bar 
[\[113a.2\]]gshegs pas rab tu bshad pa'i chos nyan te/_/gzungs la rab tu gnas pas thams cad 'dzin par byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs la gnas pa ni/_/mdo sde dpag tu med pa mtha' yas rab tu ston/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs la gnas 
[\[113a.3\]]pa ni/_/sems can dag gi don kyang dpag tu med pa byed/_/sems can 'chi 'pho skye ba dang /_/'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba shes/_/des ni ci 'dra'i las byas pa/_/rnam par smin pa de 'drar 'gyur/_/las rnams 'pho bar 'gyur ba yang /_/rdul tsam yang ni mi rnyed do/_/byang chub 
[\[113a.4\]]sems dpa' grags chen ni/_/de dag gi yang de shes so/_/stong pa bdag nyid chen po yi/_/gnas pa dag gi dam pa yin/_/sems can bye ba bsam yas kyang /_/theg pa che la rab tu 'god/_/de la ston par byed pa na/_/sems can 'du shes mi 'jug ste/_/chos 
[\[113a.5\]]rnams 'jug pa med par ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab tu ston/_/chos rnams rab tu ston pa na/_/dmigs pa dag ni mi 'byung ste/_/ye shes brtan la rab gnas shing /_/stong pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur/_/ston pa kun gyi gnas pa yi/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni bstan 
[\[113a.6\]]byas nas/_/bud med 'du shes rang bzhin gyis/_/de la 'du shes mi 'byung ngo /_/bud med 'du shes rnam bshig nas/_/byang chub snying por 'dug par 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni/_/bdud kyi 'du shes rnam par ldog_/mkhas pa des ni bdud rnams 
[\[113a.7\]]dang /_/bdud kyi sde yang mi mthong ste/_/bdud kyi bu mo gsum po yang /_/des ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni/_/'du shes thams cad rab tu spong /_/'du shes thams cad rab spangs nas/_/sa 'di thams cad g.yos par gyur/_/
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]ri rab rgya mtshor bcas pa dag_/phyogs bcu na yang ci yod g.yos/_/phyogs bcu dag na sems can rnams/_/kun gyis de ni mi shes so/_/sa dag rab tu g.yos pa 'di/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul yin/_/byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya ba/_/de tshe sa yang lan drug g.yos/_/'dus 
[\[113b.2\]]byas chos ni ji snyed dang /_/chos gang 'dus ma byas pa yang /_/chos de thams cad rab rtogs te/_/chos kyi sgrar ni bstan pa yin/_/'di la rtogs byed gang yang med/_/seng ge'i sgra ni 'byung mod kyi/_/'byung ba dag kyang rnam rig nas/_/'od byed sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/_/rten 
[\[113b.3\]]cing chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rten cing chos rnams rab tu skye/_/chos rnams kyi ni rten pa yang /_/mkhas pa de dag thams cad shes/_/chos kun gyi ni cho ga shes/_/stong nyid rtogs par khong du chud/_/de dag 'gro ba rab shes te/_/chos kun rtogs par khong du chud/_/
[\[113b.4\]]de yi 'gro ba btsal na yang /_/byang chub sems dpas mi rnyed de/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/'gro ba bsam yas de yis rig_/'gro ba thams cad shes pa gang /_/de ni 'gro ba der 'gro ste/_/dam chos mtshan nyid rig pas na/_/ngan song thams cad chad pa yin/_/
[\[113b.5\]]dam chos mtshan nyid rig nas ni/_/zhing rnams thams cad rnam par lta/_/zhing kun la yang rnam bltas nas/_/byang chub snying por 'dug par 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por 'dug nas su/_/seng ge yi ni sgra sgrog ste/_/de bzhin zhing rnams bye ba snyed/_/bsam yas dpag 
[\[113b.6\]]med grags par byed/_/zhing de rnams kyang g.yo byed cing /_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo grags chen dag_/sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin/_/sems can kha lo sgyur zhing 'dul/_/byang chub dam pa reg nas ni/_/byang chub snying po de las langs/_/dpag med bsam 
[\[113b.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa/_/sems can 'dul ba'ang rnam par 'dul/_/de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_/sangs rgyas sprul pa mtha' yas sprul/_/zhing rnams bye ba stong du yang /_/sangs rgyas sprul pa 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sems can bye ba bsam yas rnams/_/byang chub 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]mchog la rab tu 'god/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/chos kyi mchog kyang ston par byed/_/ye shes chen po de 'dra ste/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bsam mi khyab/_/de phyir 'dun pa rab skyed cig_/byang chub 'dun pa bla na med/_/sangs rgyas dang ni 
[\[114a.2\]]chos rnams dang /_/'dus pa'i dam pa dge 'dun la/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo rnams/_/byang chub mchog tshol gus pa skyed/_/zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang /_/g.yel ba med par ri mo gyis/_/de nas 'od byed sangs rgyas su/_/ring por mi thogs 'gro bar 
[\[114a.3\]]'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kyang /_/zhing rnams stong nas lhags pa rnams/_/'jig rten sgron ma rab mthong ste/_/chos kyis mchog kyang 'chad par mdzad/_/dpa' bo chen po 'dren pa la/_/rin chen chen pos 'thor bar byed/_/man dA ra ba'i me tog dag_/
[\[114a.4\]]byang chub phyir ni 'thor bar byed/_/bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing /_/zhing 'di rab tu brgyan par byed/_/phyogs dang phyogs ni kun tu yang /_/rin po che yi dra bas g.yogs/_/ba dan dag kyang gdags byas shing /_/rgyal mtshan bye ba mngon par bsgreng /_/du ma yi ni rgyan rnams 
[\[114a.5\]]kyis/_/zhing 'di shin tu legs par brgyan/_/khang pa brtsegs pa byed par 'gyur/_/rin chen kun gyis rnam par spras/_/khang pa pu shu stegs bu dag_/yid du 'ong ba grangs med rnams/_/gzhal med khang dang zla gam dang /_/skar khung de bzhin bya rgya bres/_/rin chen 
[\[114a.6\]]sna tshogs brgyan pa yi/_/bdug pa'i snod du bdug pa bdugs/_/bdug pa dag ni bdugs pa yis/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'di rab tu gang /_/de yi dri ni yid 'ong ba/_/zhing yang bye ba stong du ldang /_/de dag kun tu khyab byas nas/_/spos kyi char yang rab tu 'bebs/_/gang 
[\[114a.7\]]gis dri de bsnams pa yang /_/de dag sangs rgyas 'dren par 'gyur/_/de dag 'dod chags zug rngu spangs/_/zhe sdang sred pa yong med de/_/rgya mo chen po rnam par dral/_/mun pa kun kyang med par 'gyur/_/der ni rdzu 'phrul thob gyur te/_/dbang stobs byang chub yan 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]lag dang /_/bsam gtan thar pa rnam par reg_/de dag sbyin par 'os par 'gyur/_/stan yang yid du 'ong ba rnams/_/bye ba phrag lnga rab bshams te/_/rin chen dra bas brgyan pa yi/_/gos rnams bye ba rab tu bting /_/de la dpa' bo grags pa che/_/byang chub sems 
[\[114b.2\]]dpa' de dag 'dug_/mtshan dang de bzhin dpe byad kyis/_/de dag shin tu rnam par 'bar/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kyang /_/rin chen shing gis legs brgyan te/_/yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang ba/_/rdzing bu dag ni rnam par sprul/_/rdzing bu'i 'gram na gnas pa 
[\[114b.3\]]rnams/_/de dag de las chu 'thungs nas/_/thams cad sred pa bsal nas ni/_/'jig rten gyi yang mchod rten 'gyur/_/tha dad pa yi zhing nas kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa' lhags pa rnams/_/shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi/_/sangs rgyas bsngags pa rjod par byed/_/sgra de 
[\[114b.4\]]su dag thos pa ni/_/de dag 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur/_/phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/mdo sde 'di ni ngas rab bshad/_/pad ma bye ba bsam mi khyab/_/'dab ma dag ni gser las byas/_/snying po sbrul gyi snying po ste/_/der ni de dag rab tu sprul/_/yal ga 
[\[114b.5\]]dag kyang bai dUr+ya/_/khog pa dag ni shel yin te/_/ze ba dpal gyi snying po can/_/der ni mdzes pa rnams kyang sprul/_/de dag dri yang bsam mi khyab/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba yis/_/zhing rnams bye ba kun tu gang /_/pad mo'i dri ni bsam mi khyab/_/yid du 'ong bar 'byung 
[\[114b.6\]]ba yi/_/dri de su yis bsnams pa yang /_/de dag rab tu sems dga' zhing /_/nad rnams thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/ma lus par ni zad 'gyur te/_/de dag nyes pa gsum zad nas/_/sangs rgyas bde ba sbyin par 'gyur/_/de 
[\[114b.7\]]dag las ni sgra 'byung ste/_/sangs rgyas sgra ni bsam mi khyab/_/dam pa'i chos dang dge 'dun sgra/_/rnam pa kun ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/stong pa nyid dang mtshan med dang /_/smon pa med pa'i sgra 'byung ste/_/de thos sems can bye ba mang /_/phyir mi ldog par rab tu 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]'gyur/_/sgra de dag ni byung ba yang /_/zhing rnams bye bar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sems can bye ba bsam yas rnams/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'god par byed/_/rma bya ka la ping ka dang /_/shang shang te'u dang bya rnams kyang /_/de dag rab tu sgra 'byin pa/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[115a.2\]]sgra ni bla na med/_/ku nal ri skegs khrung khrung dang /_/khu byug dang ni bya rnams te/_/de dag sgra ni 'byin pa yang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos sgra 'byin/_/ne tso ngang pa ka ran da/_/ngur pa dang ni sa ra sa/_/de dag sgra rnams 'byin pa ni/_/bla med dge 'dun sgra yang 'byin/_/lha dag gi 
[\[115a.3\]]dang mi yi ni/_/bya rnams ji snyed gang yod pa/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa rnams/_/de dag kun tu sgra yang 'byin/_/rin po che yi shing rnams ni/_/bye brag 'phags shing blta na sdug_/yid 'ong nor bu'i shing rnams kyang /_/zhing 'di nyid du rnam par sprul/_/shing 'di kun 
[\[115a.4\]]la rgyan rnams kyi/_/chun po thams cad rab tu 'phyang /_/sangs rgyas dag gi mthu yis ni/_/zhing 'di nyid du mngon par sprul/_/zhing 'di na ni mi snang ba/_/de lta bu yi bkod pa ni/_/zhing kun na yang yong med de/_/de tshe shin tu bye brag 'phags/_/gong ma bzhin du 'di dag rnams/_/
[\[115a.5\]]shAkya seng ge skyob pas bshad/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/_/ye shes de la nem nur med/_/gang gi mtha' 'di rtogs pa ni/_/de dag 'jug pa bsam yas te/_/ye shes kyis ni rnam par 'phel/_/'bab chu dag gis rgya mtsho bzhin/_/de dag la yang mtha' 
[\[115a.6\]]mi rnyed/_/rgya mtsho dag ni 'thung ba bzhin/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul/_/bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag bshad/_/dpa' bo mtha' 'dir gnas pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' grags ldan rnams/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam 'byin pa/_/gang gA yi ni bye ma 
[\[115a.7\]]snyed/_/de bas dbyangs kyang bsam yas te/_/byang chub sems dpa' rlom sems med/_/rlom sems rab tu spangs pa na/_/byang chub tu yang nye bar 'gyur/_/de dag srog gi phyir yang ni/_/tshul khrims 'dral bar mi byed de/_/byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]brtan/_/de ni mi 'dral spyod par byed/_/'dod pa yi ni 'du shes kyis/_/de kun phyir yang mi 'dral te/_/'du shes thams cad spangs pa la/_/ting 'dzin dag ni dpag tu med/_/mnyam par bzhag pas de spyod de/_/ting 'dzin la yang chags pa med/_/chags pa med cing bag 
[\[115b.2\]]yod pas/_/de ni 'jig rten chags mi byed/_/'jig rten khams ni 'das nas kyang /_/bde ba can du de 'gro ste/_/der song nas ni de yis kyang /_/sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa mthong /_/byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo gang /_/mtshan rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan/_/
[\[115b.3\]]mngon shes lnga ldan shes rab che/_/gzungs rnams spyod yul gyur pa dag_/zhing rnams bye bar rab 'gro zhing /_/sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni bsam yas su/_/snang bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur/_/skyon rnams thams cad rab spangs shing /_/nyon 
[\[115b.4\]]mongs thams cad rnam par sbyangs/_/nyon mongs thams cad rgyun bcad de/_/rgyal bar skye ba gcig gis gnas/_/zhing de nas ni mi rnams kyang /_/ngan song du yang mi 'gro ste/_/zhing der ngan song thams cad kyang /_/ma lus par ni chad par 'gyur/_/skyob pa 'od ni dpag 
[\[115b.5\]]med pa/_/'jig rten mgon pos bshad pa ste/_/de la nem nur ma byed cig_/bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/mdo sde rin chen 'di yi bsngags pa rnams/_/bud med gang thos sems kyang dad 'gyur ba/_/skyes bu mkhas pa mchog tu myur 'gyur te/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni zhing stong bye 
[\[115b.6\]]bar 'gro/_/mchod pa tshad med rnam mang ji snyed pa/_/zhing ni bye ba khrag khrig gtams snyed du/_/skyes bu mchog la mchod pa de byas pas/_/byams pa'i sems la grangs dang char mi phod/_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin rtag tu bsnyen byas te/_/bsam gtan rnam thar de bzhin tshad 
[\[115b.7\]]med dang /_/stong pa mtshan med rtag tu bsnyen byas na/_/ring por mi thogs 'jig rten bde gshegs 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims tshogs gnas pa/_/des ni nga la mchod pa rab mchog byas/_/zad dus tha mar byang chub sems gnas pa/_/des ni sangs rgyas 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]thams cad rtag tu mchod/_/zad dus mi bzad pa la byang chub sems dpa' gang /_/bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos mchog 'di srung ba/_/de dag nga yi sras te phyi dus chos skyong ba/_/de dag sangs rgyas bye ba stong gis yongs su gtad/_/mdo sde 'dzin pa'i phan yon 
[\[116a.2\]]gyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa 
[\[116a.3\]]dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas mtshan ma med pa la gnas te de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa rgya cher bya 
[\[116a.4\]]ba la mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang /_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[116a.5\]]'dod pas mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing las kyi rnam par smin pa la mi re bas rang gi lus dang srog gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi mchod rten la mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba rgya cher bya'o/_/chos thams cad kyi rang 
[\[116a.6\]]bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yang skad gsang mtho zhing yid du 'ong ba dang /_bye brag tu 'phags pa'i tshig dang yi ge rgyun chags pas snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'i sems dang /_yid la byed pas gzhan la rgya cher rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/rab tu 
[\[116a.7\]]gdon par bya'o/_/bshad par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang gzhi ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di yin no/_/gzhon nu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]chen po dang /_thabs kyis brtan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa rgya cher bya ba la brtson par gyur cing /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam 
[\[116b.2\]]par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de'i tshe gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la gnas par 'gyur te/_de chos gang la yang mi dmigs so/_/
[\[116b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor la gnas pa ni smon lam thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam thams cad la gnas pa ni bdag dang sems can kun gyi smon lam thams cad 
[\[116b.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_ting nge 'dzin 'di yang myur du thob cing /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gzhon nu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa 
[\[116b.5\]]bas ches grangs med pa/_yangs pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes 
[\[116b.6\]]bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbyangs byin zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs byin des sems can grangs med dpag tu med 
[\[116b.7\]]pa zag pa zad pa/_dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod de/_rab tu bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang rab tu bkod nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling na rgyal po dpal dbyangs zhes bya bas/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong byas te/_mchod 
[\[117a.2\]]rten re re la yang mar me'i yon bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong btsugs so/_/de bzhin du mchod rten re re la yang rol mo dang /_sil snyan dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[117a.3\]]dang /_ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong phul lo/_/gzhon nu 'di ltar rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyis mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can la mchod pa byas nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po 
[\[117a.4\]]bsogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa la brtson par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang chos smra ba yin te/_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/_ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/_
[\[117a.5\]]chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/_yang dag pa'i yon tan gyi chos ston pa/_yongs su dag pa'i chos ston pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go/_/gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na/_'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde 
[\[117a.6\]]bas byin zhes bya ba yod de/_byis pa gzhon nu skra nag pa/_dang po'i lang tsho dang ldan pa/_na tshod dar la bab pa/_'dod pa la rnam par ma rtses shing /_/gzhon nur tshangs par spyad pa/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo gcig lon pa zhig yod do/_/gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal 
[\[117a.7\]]dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag la gsol ba btab pa/_/'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa yang dag par sdud pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gzungs chen po dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_dbang dang 'dul ba chags pa med pa mngon 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]par bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la gsol ba btab nas/_de'i nub mo mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can rnams kyi mdun du mar me'i yon bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag rab tu 'bar bar byas te/_khyams kyi dkyil 'khor yang 
[\[117b.2\]]phyag dar byas shing chag chag btab nas rab tu byug pa byas/_me tog mngon par bkram zhing /_mal stan sna tshogs bting ste/_rgyal po dpal dbyangs de btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/_grong dang yul mi 'khor dang bcas/_grong mir bcas pa khyim gyi nang nas byung ste/_rol mo dang sil 
[\[117b.3\]]snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams thogs nas mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can rnams la 
[\[117b.4\]]mchod pa byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te khang thog tu dong ngo /_/lha dang mi'i 'khor kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir mang du tshogs te byang chub sems dpa' bde bas byin gyis de dag mthong ba dang /_mar me'i yon du phul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag rab tu 
[\[117b.5\]]'bar bar byas pas de'i 'od kyis gcig tu khyab ste/_lha dang mi'i skye bo mang po rnams chos nyan par tshogs par rig nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni theg pa chen po la zhugs pa yin na/_da bdag ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa zhig bya ste/_de 
[\[117b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa ji lta bus lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ngo mtshar du 'gyur ba dang /_yi rangs pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur zhing /_chos kyi snang ba thob pa dang /_rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyis de bzhin 
[\[117b.7\]]gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa thams cad dang ldan pa 'di'ang zil gyis mnan te/_rgyal po dpal dbyangs btsun mo'i 'khor dang zhabs 'bring bar bcas pa yang ngo mtshar du gyur cing yi rangs pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur bar mchod 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin de ltar sems dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes te/_chos nyan pa'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus par rig nas de'i nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du 'dug nas lag pa g.yas pa ras 
[\[118a.2\]]kyis dkris te 'bru mar gyi nang du bcug go/_/'bru mar gyi nang du bcug nas 'bar bar byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs shing /_byang 
[\[118a.3\]]chub yongs su tshol ba'i lag pa g.yas pa de ltar 'bar yang sems dang bzhin gyi mdog 'gyur ba med do/_/gzhon nu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyi lag pa g.yas pa bsregs nas rab tu 'bar zhing mer gyur te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar bar gyur ma thag 
[\[118a.4\]]tu de'i tshe sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/de'i lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar byas pa'i 'od des mar me yon du phul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rnams mog mog por byas par gyur te/_phyogs thams cad du'ang snang ba chen po byung ngo /_/'od des phyogs thams cad snang 
[\[118a.5\]]bar gyur te/_kun tu khyab par gyur pa dang /_de dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang skad 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba dang tshig bye brag tu 'phags pa dang /_tshig dang yi ge rgyun chags pas 'khor de dag thams cad la 
[\[118a.6\]]rgya cher go bar byed cing yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/der sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha khri nyis stong chos nyan par 'dus pa de dag dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas lha'i mchod pa sna tshogs byed par gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo rnams kyang lha'i rol mo dag byed do/_/rgyal po dpal dbyangs 
[\[118a.7\]]khang pa'i steng na 'dug pa bdag gi mi mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa/_gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yang dag par bzung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyi lag pa 'bar bar byas te/_'od de 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing lha'i 'od mi'i las 'das pas snang bar byas pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa chen po thob pa yin no zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin la shin tu 
[\[118b.2\]]dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang gus pa nye bar bzhag ste/_ri mor bcas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po chen pos brtan pas btsun mo'i 'khor brgyad cu dang lhan cig khang pa'i steng de nas bdag nyid mchongs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin 
[\[118b.3\]]blta ba dang rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir mchongs te song ngo /_/de gus pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas tshe de nyid la 'khor dang bcas pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis yongs su 
[\[118b.4\]]bzung ba thob bo/_/de lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dag gis yongs su bzung bas rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyang 'khor dang bcas pa khru stong phrag brgyar tshang ba'i khang pa'i steng nas mchongs na 
[\[118b.5\]]de'i lus la gnod pa'am/_sems la gnod pa'am/_sems zhum par gyur pa med do/_/de nas rgyal po dpal dbyangs lag pa gnyis bsgreng ste/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyi lag pa bsregs shing 
[\[118b.6\]]rab tu 'bar ba mthong nas skad chen po phyung ste cho nges btab bo/_/de nas rgyal po de skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig ngu zhing mchi ma phyung nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin gyi mdun du 'dug go/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin 
[\[118b.7\]]gyis rgyal po dpal dbyangs mthong ste/_mthong nas de la smras pa/_ci'i slad du rgyal po chen po khyod skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di dag dang bdag gi mdun na bzhugs shing skad chen po phyung ste/_cho nges btab nas bshums shing mchi ma 'byin pa mdzad/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]dpal dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bas byin la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa/_shes rab chen po bde bas byin/_/chos smra ba ni mkhas pa yi/_/yan lag ma tshang rig nas ni/_/skye bo 'di dag de phyir du/_/gzi brjid 
[\[119a.2\]]phung pos 'phags pa yi/_/'di lta bu yi gzugs 'di yang /_/lag pa nyams par shes nas ni/_/bdag kyang shin tu sdug bsngal lo/_/khyod kyi lag pa 'bar byas pa/_/de yi 'od ni phyogs bcur btang /_/khyod las byung ba'i lha rdzas kyis/_/mar me 'di dag mi gsal byas/_/
[\[119a.3\]]sa 'di rab tu g.yos gyur te/_/khyod kyi sems ni zhum pa med/_/de nas bdag gi sems skyes pa/_/mkhas pa tha mal ma yin snyam/_/bdag ni btsun mo'i 'khor bcas pa/_/khru ni stong phrag brgya pa yi/_/khang pa'i steng nas mchongs gyur na/_/bdag gi lus la gnod pa med/_/legs 
[\[119a.4\]]so ye shes ngo mtshar khyod/_/legs so sems kyang bla na med/_/brtson 'grus rab brtsams legs pa ste/_/bsam pa che ba legs pa yin/_/gang gi lag pa 'bar byas kyang /_/khyod la nam yang g.yo ba med/_/dga' zhing rangs pa skyes nas su/_/phyir yang chos ni rab tu 'chad/_/
[\[119a.5\]]ji ltar zla ba nya ba dang /_/nam mkha'i dkyil na nyi ma bzhin/_/ri rab ri yi rgyal po ltar/_/grogs po de ltar shin tu mdzes/_/bdag kyang de bzhin mkhas pa yi/_/smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/_/lus la phangs pa rab spangs te/_/bdag gis srog chags don rnams 
[\[119a.6\]]bgyid/_/chos kyi dga' bas rangs gyur te/_/bdag gi dga' ba bsam mi khyab/_/'di ltar yan lag ma tshang ba/_/des ni rab tu sdug bsngal lo/_/lha dang klu yi mchod pa yis/_/bde bas byin gyis rgyal po la/_/mtha' yas pa yi spobs pa yis/_/tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[119a.7\]]'di dag smras/_/gang la lag pa med pa yang /_/de ni yan lag ma tshang min/_/su la tshul khrims med pa dag_/de ni yan lag ma tshang yin/_/rus pa yi ni lus 'di yis/_/bsam gyis mi khyab sbyin pa'i gnas/_/'jig rten kun gyi mchod pa'i rten/_/de bzhin 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]gshegs pa bdag gis mchod/_/stong gsum dag ni mtha' yas pa/_/rin po che yis yongs bkang ste/_/sangs rgyas ye shes tshol ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten mgon la rab tu sbyin/_/'jig rten pa yi mchod yod kyang /_/su dag chos rnams stong rig nas/_/lus dang srog kyang gtong ba 
[\[119b.2\]]yi/_/mchod pa de dag bsam mi khyab/_/bden pa'i tshig ni brjod par bgyi/_/rgyal po chen po bdag la gson/_/skye bo'i tshogs 'di thams cad kyang /_/tshigs bcad 'di yi don rig bgyi/_/bden pa gang gis sangs rgyas su/_/'jig rten mchod rten bdag 'gyur na/_/bden pa 
[\[119b.3\]]de yis sa 'di yang /_/rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur cig_/tshig 'di dag ni smras pa dang /_/sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/_/ngo mtshar gyur cing rmad byung ste/_/lha rnams bye ba rab tu dga'/_/lha dang mi dag dga' nas ni/_/byang chub tu yang sems bskyed de/_/dpag med bsam 
[\[119b.4\]]gyis mi khyab pa/_/theg pa mchog la gnas par gyur/_/dge slong bde bas byin pa yis/_/ji snyed kyi ni don byas pa/_/de ni mi zad bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas dag gi ye shes 'jug_/bden pa gang gis chos de ni/_/lag pa zhes kyang bya med na/_/bden pa de yis sngon ltar 
[\[119b.5\]]bdag_/lag pa myur du byung bar shog_/bden pa gang gis chos de ni/_/bde bas byin pa yod ma yin/_/phyogs bcu rnams su btsal na yang /_/stong pa yin pas mi dmigs so/_/sgra gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang /_/de ni stong par rig par gyis/_/sgra ni brag ca lta bu ste/_/
[\[119b.6\]]chos rnams de ltar shes par gyis/_/nam zhig 'jigs pa med 'gyur zhing /_/stong pa rtogs par khong du chud/_/bden pa yi ni tshig de yis/_/'jig rten thams cad 'tshig mi 'gyur/_/srid gsum sems can ji snyed pa/_/lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyang /_/thams cad 
[\[119b.7\]]mkhyen pa'i gzi brjid kyis/_/thams cad mnyam par bzhag par shog_/ji snyed lha dang mi dag gis/_/'tshe bar gyur pa ci yod pa/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i gzi brjid kyis/_/de dag thams cad zhi bar shog_/tshigs bcad 'di dag bshad pa dang /_/lag pa yang ni slar skyes te/_/
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]bde bas byin pa de yi lus/_/mtshan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/lha yang bye ba phrag stong rnams/_/bar snang la ni 'dug nas su/_/de tshe me tog man dA ras/_/dge slong de la 'thor bar byed/_/mi ma yin pa'i me tog gis/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di gang bar gyur/_/
[\[120a.2\]]lha mo bye ba khrag khrig rnams/_/glu dbyangs rol mo rab tu byed/_/de tshe bde bas byin pa yis/_/sgra 'di dag ni phyung ba na/_/rnam 'phrul 'di ni sangs rgyas dag_/bye ba stong gis gzigs par 'gyur/_/rang rang gi ni zhing dag tu/_/dge slong pha dang dge slong ma/_/dge bsnyen ma dang dge 
[\[120a.3\]]bsnyen la/_/grags pa chen po go bar mdzad/_/dge slong bde bas byin pa de/_/mkhas shing stobs kyang che ba ste/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni ye shes phyir/_/des ni lag pa 'bar bar byas/_/de yis zhing rnams stong dag dang /_/gang gA yi ni bye ma snyed/_/mar me des ni snang byas te/_/sreg 
[\[120a.4\]]pa'i bskal pa byung ba bzhin/_/me tog dang ni phye ma yis/_/zhing rnams thams cad gang bar gyur/_/sa gzhi dag nas yan chad du/_/pus nub tsam du gang bar gyur/_/rin chen me tog thams cad kyis/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni gang bar gyur/_/bde bas byin la mchod pa'i 
[\[120a.5\]]phyir/_/klu rnams mu tig char pa 'bebs/_/rin chen bkod pa thams cad kyis/_/zhing 'di rab tu brgyan par gyur/_/bde bas byin la mchod pa'i phyir/_/mu tig rin chen shin tu bkram/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/mi 'am ci dang lto 'phyer bcas/_/gang gA yi ni bye ma snyed/_/
[\[120a.6\]]byang chub mchog la zhugs par gyur/_/bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la yang /_/sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge ni/_/dge slong dag gi dge 'dun mdun/_/rgyal ba seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa/_/bskal pa bye ba stong du ni/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/_/nga ni bde bas byin par gyur/_/ma pham pa ni 
[\[120a.7\]]dpal dbyangs yin/_/dge slong bde bas byin pa ni/_/mthong ma thag tu de yi tshe/_/bud med dag kyang mtha' yas pa/_/bud med dngos po rnam par log_/mi dbang gis ni lung bstan te/_/de dag phyir yang ldog pa med/_/'jig rten kun gyi 'dren pa ste/_/rang 'byung 'gyur zhes 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]lung yang bstan/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan bstan pa yi/_/mkhas pas mdo sde 'di thos nas/_/lus la phangs par ma byed par/_/chos 'di rjes su bslab par gyis/_/bde bas byin gyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur 
[\[120b.2\]]gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la nye bar gnas na chos kyi sbyin pa'am zang zing 
[\[120b.3\]]gi sbyin pa la brtson par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sbyin pa de yang bsngo ba bzhis yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thabs la mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[120b.4\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i thabs mkhas pa de dag thob par 'gyur bar sbyin pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bsngo ba dang po'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag las thabs mkhas pa thos shing 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang 'chang ba dang klog par 'gyur ba 
[\[120b.5\]]dang /_gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag dang bdag rtag tu 'grogs par gyur cig ces de ltar sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bsngo ba gnyis pa'o/_/longs spyod thob pa gang 'jig 
[\[120b.6\]]rten thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i longs spyod thob pa de dag dang bdag phrad par gyur cig ces de ltar sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bsngo ba gsum pa'o/_/bdag gi lus grub pas sems can rnams la chos kyi phan gdags pa dang /_zang zing gi phan gdags 
[\[120b.7\]]pa dang phan gdags pa gnyis kyis phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba'i bdag gi lus grub par gyur cig ces sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bsngo ba bzhi pa ste/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsngo ba 'di bzhis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bsngo bar bya'o/_/
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung ba yang rung khyim pa yang rung ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 
[\[121a.2\]]la g.yo med pas bsten par bya/_bsnyen par bya/_rim gro bya'o/_/de la g.yo med pa de ni ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na bar gyur cing nad mi bzad pas btab par gyur pa la rang gi sha dang khrag gis kyang dge slong de na ba de las bslang bar 
[\[121a.3\]]spro bar bya'o/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas g.yo ba med cing 'jigs pa med pas rang gi sha 
[\[121a.4\]]dang khrag kyang yongs su btang ste/_dge slong chos smra ba na ba las bslang bar bya'o/_/gzhon nu rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/_yangs pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_
[\[121a.5\]]dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[121a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_gzhon nu smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gang gi 
[\[121a.7\]]nyin par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i nyi ma ma 'das par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprul nas sems can tshad med pa 'dul ba byas te/_zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod nas sems 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]can tshad med pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod nas nyi ma de ma 'das par yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i dam pa'i chos lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas par gyur to/_/gzhon nu bcom 
[\[121b.2\]]ldan 'das smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus kyi tshe lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na dge slong dmigs pa'i lta ba can mang po byung ste/_de dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde la mi sred 
[\[121b.3\]]mi mos shing phyir zlog par byed/_spong bar byed de/_mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong dag la yang gnod par byed cing srog kyang gcod par byed de/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa de dag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong stong srog bcad par gyur to/_/gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[121b.4\]]na rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/_sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung ste/_gzhon nu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dge slong yang dag blo gros zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin pa/_chos smra 
[\[121b.5\]]ba rgyal po de'i pho brang du 'gro zhing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/_phan par 'dod pa/_snying brtse ba don du 'dod pa zhig byung ste/_rgyal po de yang de la rgyun mi chad par blta bas mi ngoms te rtag tu 'dod par gyur to/_/de yang bstan pa dang chos kyi gtam bya ba dang nye bar 'gro ba dang /_
[\[121b.6\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba dang yongs su dri ba dang /_gzung ba dang tshig gis go bar byed nus shing dge slong chos smra ba de/_sems can dag gi g.yo ba dang spyod lam dang mos pa dang khams dang bag chags la mkhas te/_sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa shes shing 
[\[121b.7\]]khams dang bag chags la yang mkhas/_bden pa dang mtshams sbyar ba la yang mkhas/_mtshams dbral ba dang tshig gi lan gtan la dbab pa la yang mkhas/_spobs pa zab cing sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho ga la yang mkhas/_gsong por smra zhing bzhin la khro gnyer med pa/_
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]sems chen por gyur pa la gnas pa/_snying rje chen po la brtson pa/_pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis ma non pa yin no/_/gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs kyi bu mo skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa/_byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/_
[\[122a.2\]]kha dog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa ye shes ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_de'i slob dpon ni dge slong yang dag blo gros zhes bya ba yin te/_dge ba'i chos rnams la yang dag par ston pa/_yang dag par gzengs stod pa/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/_yang 
[\[122a.3\]]dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no/_/gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba de'i brla gnyis la 'brum bu me dbal nag po chen po gso dka' zhing sman dkon pa zhig byung ste/_na ba de sman pa dag gis spangs par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs btsun mo'i 'khor 
[\[122a.4\]]dang bcas pa sras dang sras mo dang zhabs 'bring bar bcas pa dge slong de na bar rig nas rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma byung ngo /_/bud med brgyad khrir bcas pa dang grong dang grong khyer gyi mi rnams su bcas pa dang yul 'khor ba dang grong 'dab pa dang yul gyi mi dang rtsis pa dang blon po dang blon po chen po dang 
[\[122a.5\]]sgo ba dang 'khor rnams su bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang dge slong de na bar thos nas rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma 'byin te/_dge slong 'di 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ta re zhes skad 'dzer to/_/gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po ye shes stobs la lha mo sngon snag gi gnyen mtshams su gyur pa 
[\[122a.6\]]zhig yod de/_de rgyal po de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bas rmi lam du bstan pa/_rgyal po chen po gal te dge slong 'di la mi'i sha dang khrag sar pa ma rul pas 'brum bu me dbal nag po 'di la byugs te/_mi'i sha sar pa ma rul pa las ro sna tshogs su g.yos byas te byin na dge slong 'di 
[\[122a.7\]]nad 'di las 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/de nas rgyal po ye shes kyi stobs mtshan mo de 'das pa dang gnyid kyis log pa las sad de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs nas rmi lam gyi rnam pa de dag btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la bzlas te/_nga'i rmi lam 'di lta bu zhig mthong ngo 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]zhes bzlas nas go bar byas na/_gzhon nu de ltar bud med kyi khyim de dang rgyal po'i pho brang de nas dge slong de la rtsi de sbyin par su yang spro ba med do/_/rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan yang rmi lam de lta bu zhig rmis nas sad pa dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ste/_rmi lam gyi rnam pa de 
[\[122b.2\]]dag ma dang zhabs 'bring ba rnams la gtam byas kyang dge slong de la rtsi de sbyin par su yang spro ba med do/_/de nas rgyal po'i sras mo ye shes ldan de dga' zhing mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang mos pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas 'di lta bur brtson par byas te/_'di ltar bdag gis rtsi
