[\[122b.3\]]'di dag bdag gi lus las bcad de ji skad bstan pa bzhin du khrag sar pa dang sha sar pa sbyin par bya'o/_/rgyal po'i pho brang na bdag ni thams cad kyi nang na gzhon zhing chung ste/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin la/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ye shes 
[\[122b.4\]]btsal bar 'dod pas chos smra ba kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la bdag gi lus kyi sha dang khrag phul te/_dge slong 'di ci nas nad 'di las sos par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan de rang gi gnas su song nas mtshon rnon po thogs te chos la zhugs pa'i yid kyis 
[\[122b.5\]]bdag gi brla las sha bcad nas/_ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa gya nom par g.yos byas nas/_khrag kyang thogs te 'phags pa de'i drung du song nas rgyal po ye shes stobs kyi mdun du 'dug ste/_khrag gis 'brum bu me dbal nag po de byugs nas/_g.yos legs par byas pa'i zas de 
[\[122b.6\]]dge slong de zar bcug ste/_'drangs par byed cing legs par bstabs so/_/de nas dge slong de mi shes ma rig ma dogs pas zas de zos so/_/zas de zos ma thag tu dge slong de'i na tsha thams cad med par gyur te nad de thams cad kyang sos so/_/de yongs su gdung ba dang bral zhing bde ba 
[\[122b.7\]]dang ldan pas de lta de lta bur chos bstan te/_btsun mo'i 'khor de dang grong pa dang yul mi dang yul 'khor ba 'dus pa de dag las srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/de nas rgyal po ye shes stobs kyis bdag gi bu mo la tshigs 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bu mo khyod kyis khrag 'di ga las rnyed/_/mi yi sha 'di dag kyang gang nas blangs/_/bu mo khyod kyis kha zas 'di byas pas/_/chos smra 'di yang 'di ltar bde bar gyur/_/sna tshogs bro dang ldan pa'i g.yos byas pa/_/bsad pa yin nam 
[\[123a.2\]]de ste shi ba rnyed/_/bu mo khyod kyis khrag 'di ga las rnyed/_/des ni sdig pa'i nad las 'di thar byas/_/bu mo des ni pha yi tshig thos nas/_/bu mo ye shes ldan gyis 'di skad smras/_/zhum sems med par tshig kyang rab smras te/_/bdag ni ci mchi yab khyod gsan du gsol/_/lha 
[\[123a.3\]]yis bstan pa'i rmi lam dag_/bdag gis mthong bar gyur to yab/_/sa yi bdag po bdag la gson/_/yang dag don ni mkhyen par mdzod/_/lha des bdag la 'di skad ston/_/mi yi sha dang khrag rnams ni/_/dge slong 'di la sus byin na/_/sdig pa'i nad las thar bar 'gyur/_/
[\[123a.4\]]bdag ni mal nas langs nas su/_/btsun mo'i 'khor du mchis nas ni/_/bdag gis de tshe rmi lam rnams/_/ma yi gtso la bzlas shing smras/_/bran mo rnams la bdag gis bsgo/_/'di lta bu dag su byed nus/_/mi yi khrag dang sha rnams ni/_/khu bar btsos pa 
[\[123a.5\]]g.yos byas te/_/zas su rab tu sbyin bya zhing /_/khrag dag gis kyang byugs nas su/_/me dbal nag po 'di las kyang /_/dge slong ji ltar thar bar bya/_/cho ga myur du ma byas na/_/rtsi sman dag ni ma byas pas/_/dge slong 'di ni nad 'di yis/_/myur du 'chi ba'i dus 
[\[123a.6\]]byed 'gyur/_/rang gi sha dang khrag gtong ba/_/srid pa gsum na sems can gang /_/mkhas pa su zhig 'di mthong nas/_/lus la yang ni gnas par byed/_/btsun mo'i 'khor du bdag gis go bar bgyis/_/bud med gcig kyang sbyin zhes mi mchi nas/_/bdag la dge 
[\[123a.7\]]slong de phangs bdag phangs kyang /_/byang chub phyir ni bdag gis sha khrag btang /_/byang chub zhi ba mya ngan med tshol ba/_/de dag lus la mos shing rten pa min/_/bdag nyid la yang rdul tsam phangs pa med/_/bdag nyid btang yang yid ni mi dga' med/_/btsun mo'i 'khor 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]rnams de thos nas/_/thams cad rmugs pa bzhin du gyur/_/bya ba de dag sbyar bar ni/_/su yang spro bar ma gyur to/_/de nas bdag gi sems skyes pa/_/dge slong 'di ni zas byin te/_/bdag gi sha yang bcad nas ni/_/khrag rnams kyis kyang bsku bar bya/_/bdag gi 
[\[123b.2\]]brla las sha bcad de/_/sha rnams dang ni khrag blangs nas/_/sha yi sna gu bdag gis bskal/_/bro ba sna tshogs g.yos legs bgyis/_/dge slong na ba de la ni/_/mi sha yi ni kha zas dang /_/khrag rnams kyis kyang byug pa dag_/bdag gis yab kyi spyan sngar stsal/_/mi yi bdag 
[\[123b.3\]]po bdag gi tshig la gson/_/sa bdag mi sha dag ni ma rnyed nas/_/bdag gi brla las sha dag bcad nas su/_/de bsgrubs chos smra 'di la stsal pa lags/_/bdag gis bla med byang chub don phyir du/_/rang gi lus kyis don chen 'di dag bgyis/_/dge slong 'di yang thar 
[\[123b.4\]]bgyis mi bde med/_/bdag gi bsod nams dag ni tshad med bgyis/_/bu mo de la rgyal pos 'di skad smras/_/bu mo khyod kyis rtsir ni bya ba'i phyir/_/ji ltar lus las rang gi sha bcad na/_/khyod kyi lus la na tshar ma gyur tam/_/rgyal po'i bu mo blo ldan 'jigs med pas/_/de tshe 
[\[123b.5\]]smras pa rgyal po sa bdag gson/_/las kyi rnam smin bsam yas de 'dra bas/_/de dag gsan nas tshul bzhin mkhyen par mdzod/_/yab cig sdig pa'i las rnams bgyis pa yis/_/sems can sems dmyal mi bzad ltung gyur te/_/sha med gyur nas phyir yang sha dag skye/_/
[\[123b.6\]]las kyi 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab gzigs/_/sdig pa'i las kyis sha khrag med gyur cing /_/skad cig tu yang sha khrag 'byung 'gyur na/_/dge ba'i las dang mos pa de dag las/_/sha dang khrag rnams skye ba smos ci 'tshal/_/sha bcad bdag la na tsha ma mchis te/_/khrag 
[\[123b.7\]]phyung bdag la g.yo ba yong ma mchis/_/bdag gi sha rnams thams cad bcad na yang /_/chos kyi lus la rma dang skyon ma mchis/_/bdag gis chos la dga' ba mchog bskyed nas/_/rang gi brla las sha bcad rab tu stsal/_/rma dang sdug bsngal bdag la ma mchis te/_/bdag 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]gi lus kyang sngon gyi bzhin du gyur/_/'di 'dra ba yi chos smra 'di lta bu/_/brgya lam na yang 'dzam bu'i gling du 'byung /_/yab cig u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin/_/bskal pa bye ba mang la res 'ga' gda'/_/ji ltar 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser 'bar ba/_/sems can lta bas 
[\[124a.2\]]ngoms par mi 'gyur te/_/de bzhin du ni chos smra de 'dra ba/_/lha dang mi dag mthong bas chog mi shes/_/skye bo skom pa dang ba'i chu 'thungs nas/_/skom pas gdungs pa skom pa med par 'gyur/_/de bzhin chos smra mkhas pa 'di dag kyang /_/chos kyi bdud rtsis srog chags sred pa 
[\[124a.3\]]sel/_/dge slong mi bzad na ba 'di la yang /_/sha dang khrag ni bdag gis rab tu btang /_/chos smra ba ni me dbal rab zhi ste/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i rim gro bgyis/_/mang du thos shing spyod dang ldan pa ste/_/ting 'dzin dam pa 'di ni 'dzin pa la/_/'di ltar bdag 
[\[124a.4\]]gis rang gi sha btang bas/_/chos 'di rnams kyang bdag gis thob par shog_/ji ltar spos rab dri zhim yid 'ong ba/_/dus 'brang dang ni tsan dan dmar po yi/_/dri dag phyogs bcu rnams su ldang ba ltar/_/chos smra de yi dri yang de bzhin no/_/ji ltar ri rab phyogs su rab snang 
[\[124a.5\]]zhing /_/kun nas mdzes pa mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/_/phyogs su rab tu snang zhing gsal bar bgyid/_/de bzhin chos smra 'di yang ri rab 'dra/_/ji ltar mchod rten la la zhig pa ni/_/skyes bu mkhas pas bcos shing slar bslang ste/_/mchod rten de la dad par bgyid pa ni/_/
[\[124a.6\]]de ltar bslang ba de yang de yi rgyu/_/de bzhin chos kyi mchod rten na ba yang /_/chos la gus par rang gi sha dang ni/_/khrag gis byug pa dag gis thar bar bgyis/_/'dzam bu'i gling du bdag gis mar me bltam/_/dge slong 'di ni 'chi ba'i dus bgyis na/_/'dzam bu'i gling du 
[\[124a.7\]]ting 'dzin sgra yang ni/_/sems can rnams la rtag tu nub par 'gyur/_/'di gsos pas ni ting 'dzin rnams kyang 'thob/_/dge slong 'di ni 'jig rten kun gyi skyabs/_/'jig rten ldongs pa dag la mig sbyin pa/_/'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang gti mug la/_/sman 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]pa'i rgyal po chen po gso bar bgyid/_/chen por gyur par rtag tu sems gnas te/_/de yi spyod pa dag ni tshad mi rnyed/_/nges pa'i don dang tshig la shin tu bslabs/_/pha rol rgol ba kun gyis zil mi non/_/chos smra ba la rim gro mchog bgyis pas/_/bskal pa bye ba phrag ni stong du 
[\[124b.2\]]yang /_/bdag la phyir yang log ltung 'jigs ma mchis/_/bud med dngos por bdag ni phyis mi 'gyur/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na shin tu dka' ba spyad pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos 
[\[124b.3\]]'di thos nas chos smra ba na ba la sman shin tu dkon pas rim gro bya ba la brtson zhing bdag gi sha dang khrag gis kyang rim gror byas te/_tha na sor mo gcig tsam sbyin pas kyang 'gro ba'i chos kyi mchod rten la rim gror bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la sngon byung 
[\[124b.4\]]ba'i gtam nges par bstan pa 'di rgya cher tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/gang gis gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing /_/rin chen bkang nas 'dren la phul ba bas/_/gang gis rkang pa'i sor mo gcig byin na/_/de bas bsod nams mchog 'di bye 
[\[124b.5\]]brag 'phags/_/bu mo de ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_/sangs rgyas bye ba stong dag mthong bar gyur/_/kun gyi bstan pa la yang rab byung nas/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba'i mchog 'di rab tu bzung /_/rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag thams cad ni/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das pa phyi dus na/_/de ni 
[\[124b.6\]]rtag par rab tu byung gyur te/_/bde gshegs sras mo kun nas nyon mongs med/_/mar me mdzad pa de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/bstan pa la yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad/_/der yang bud med dngos po bsgyur nas su/_/de tshe de ni dge slong chos smrar gyur/_/rtag tu dam pa'i chos 
[\[124b.7\]]ni yongs 'dzin pa/_/mi dbang ye shes stobs ni byams pa yin/_/mar me mdzad ni chos smra der gyur te/_/de tshe nga ni rgyal po'i bu mor gyur/_/lha mo sngon gyi snag gi gnyen gyur pa/_/mi dbang ye shes stobs kyi phyir 'brang zhing /_/rgyal po'i rmi lam du yang ston pa ni/_/
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]mi 'khrugs spyad pa spyod tshe der gyur to/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir/_/g.yo sgyu thams cad yongs su spangs nas su/_/bdag gi sha dag dang ni khrag gis kyang /_/chos smra ba la ngas kyang rim gror byas/_/dge slong na ba na tshas gzir ba de/_/
[\[125a.2\]]gang dag mthong nas de tshe ngus pa yang /_/phyir mi ldog par de dag rab gyur te/_/log par ltung ba'i sar ni yong ma song /_/de dag rtag tu mig kyang na ba med/_/klad pa'i nad med rna ba'i nad med de/_/sna yi nad med lce yi nad kyang med/_/so yang na bar nams kyang ma gyur to/_/
[\[125a.3\]]dge slong na ba de tshe sus bsnyen pa/_/de dag rtag tu kun nas mdzes par gyur/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan/_/dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis lus kyang 'bar/_/de dag nga yi bstan la rab byung nas/_/rab tu 'jig dus byang chub dam pa 'di/_/de bzhin 
[\[125a.4\]]gshegs pa'i mdzod kyang bzung nas ni/_/sangs rgyas bye ba stong dag mthong bar 'gyur/_/byang chub mchog 'di legs par bzung nas su/_/rtag tu ri mo byas shing bcang byas na/_/de dag skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni/_/mi yi gtso bo mi 'khrugs mthong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[125a.5\]]de dag spyod pa bla med 'di thos nas/_/dga' ba zang zing med pa 'phags pa 'thob/_/de dag bdag gi sngon spyad thos nas ni/_/sangs rgyas dag la mchod pa rgya cher byed/_/dge slong mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan mthong nas/_/g.yo med par ni rtag tu bsnyen par bya/_/zhe sdang 
[\[125a.6\]]tha ba dag kyang rnam spangs te/_/dge slong chos smra rtag tu bsnyen par gyis/_/gnod sems khro ba dag kyang rnam spangs la/_/nga yi sras po chos skyong mchod par gyis/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por long ba dang /_/log par ltung zhing sdug bsngal gyur ta re/_/gcig la gcig 
[\[125a.7\]]kyang gnod sems byas na ni/_/de la tshul khrims thos pa skyob mi nus/_/bsam gtan mi skyob dgon gnas skyob mi nus/_/sbyin pa mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pa min/_/ye shes ldan gyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 
[\[125b.2\]]la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de'i phyir kun dga' 
[\[125b.3\]]bo bdag gi stan la 'dug la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 
[\[125b.4\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs phye'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag la skabs phye'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar stan la 'dug 
[\[125b.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi rgyu gang gi rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa dag lag pa bcad pa dang /_rkang pa bcad pa dang /_rna ba bcad pa dang /_sna 
[\[125b.6\]]bcad pa dang /_mig dbyung ba dang /_mgo bcad pa dang lus bcad pa dang yan lag bcad par gyur/_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang myong bar gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/_
[\[125b.7\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yang dag par sgrub pa na/_ngas sdug bsngal ji snyed myong bar gyur pa khyod kyis shes shing de dag dran na ci'i phyir de 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa la 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na 'di la skyes bu la la zhig rkang pa nas spyi bo'i bar du 'bar bar gyur te/_rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa de la skyes bu la la zhig der nye bar 'ongs te/_'di skad du kye skyes bu tshur 
[\[126a.2\]]shog_/lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par rtses shig_/dga' bar gyis shig_/yongs su spyod cig ces zer na/_kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur 
[\[126a.3\]]te/_rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_yongs su spyod par byed dam/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/_skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i 
[\[126a.4\]]yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par gyur te rtse ba dang dga' ba dang yongs su spyod pa byed du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can rnams ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal bar gyur cing dbul ba dag mthong nas yid bde ba'am sems dga' ba ma byung ngo /_/
[\[126a.5\]]kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang /_tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin pa dang /_tshul khrims sra srer ma gyur pa dang /_tshul khrims ma 'bags pa dang tshul 
[\[126a.6\]]khrims ma g.yos pa dang tshul khrims ma blangs pa dang /_tshul khrims ma 'khrugs pa dang /_tshul khrims mi yang ba dang /_tshul khrims gzhan la ston pa ma yin pa dang /_tshul khrims mi slu ba dang /_tshul khrims drang ba dang /_tshul khrims dam bcas pa bzhin du byed pa dang /_
[\[126a.7\]]tshul khrims sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin te/_de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad pa mtha' yas pa spyod pa de dag ni lag pa bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/_rkang pa bcad pas yongs 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]su nyams par mi 'gyur/_rna ba bcad pa dang sna bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/_mig phyung ba dang mgo bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/_lus dang yan lag bcad pas yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang mi myong la bla na med pa yang 
[\[126b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 
[\[126b.3\]]bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_gzhal du med pa/_mtshungs pa med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[126b.4\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/yang de'i tshe 
[\[126b.5\]]de'i dus na rin po che'i pad ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur gyur to/_/nyi ma thams cad la nyin re zhing yang sems can 
[\[126b.6\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do/_/rab tu bkod cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams zag pa zad pa dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod do/_/rab tu bkod cing yongs su 
[\[126b.7\]]mya ngan las 'das na sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i pad ma'i zla ba rnam par dag pa mngon par 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba na/_kun dga' bo rgyal po dpa' 
[\[127a.2\]]bas byin zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_rgyal po dpa' bas byin de la btsun mo'i 'khor ni bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/_/bu ni stong yod do/_/bu mo ni lnga brgya yod do/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yangs shing rgya che la 
[\[127a.3\]]sgo bzhi yod pa/_stegs bu dang sgo khang dang rta babs dang skar khung dang pu shu dang khang pa dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_skyed mos tshal gyis brgyan cing rnam par bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_lha'i gnas bzhin snang ba/_sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i gnas su gyur pa zhig yod 
[\[127a.4\]]do/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na mdo sde 'di lta bu dag ni skye bo mang pos smad cing skye bo mang pos spangs te/_skye bo mang po dang mi 'phrod cing skye bo mang pos bor bar gyur te/_'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i dus su gyur pa/_gtse ba mang zhing char ches pa'i dus kyi tshe char mi 'bab pa'i 
[\[127a.5\]]dus kyi tshe/_dus ma yin par char 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/_sbrul 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/_lce 'bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/_mu ge 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/_log par lta ba'i dus kyi tshe/_yang dag pa ma yin par lta ba'i dus kyi tshe/_mu stegs can gyi gsang sngags yongs su tshol ba'i 
[\[127a.6\]]dus kyi tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong grong dang grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang ljongs nas bskrad nas de dag chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes dang lhan cig kun 
[\[127a.7\]]du bzang po zhes bya ba'i nags khrod der rten cing gnas te dge slong de dag la gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to/_/kun dga' bo nags khrod de yang dus thams cad du snang ba'i me tog sna tshogs dang /_snye ma dang /_'khri shing dang /_'bras bu dag dang ldan pa/_dpag bsam gyi shing 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]dang 'dra ba/_shing sna tshogs kyis gang zhing sa'i gzhi yang gzugs dang kha dog du ma dang sa bon dang myu gu thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_brag dang rdo ba sna tshogs mdzes shing dri ma med pa/_yangs shing mtho ba dang gser gyi ri dag gis mdzes par byas shing sdug pa/_grub pa'i rig 
[\[127b.2\]]sngags 'chang dang dri za'am skyes bu'am drang srong dang mi'am ci dag gnas pa/_byad gzugs dang kha dog che zhing rnam pa sna tshogs mang po gnas pa/_sangs rgyas du ma bzhugs bzhugs pa/_dga' tshal dang 'dra ba kun tu bzang zhing rnal 'byor dang 'thun pa'i nags tshal dam pa kun 
[\[127b.3\]]tu bzang po de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson zhing gnas par gyur to/_/yang kun dga' bo chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de gcig pu dben par song nas/_nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs te/_lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas bltas na/_
[\[127b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dir skyes te/_de dag gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa rnyed na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_gal te gzungs kyi 
[\[127b.5\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa ma rnyed na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa dag mthong ngo /_/de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po ga la yod pa der song ste phyin 
[\[127b.6\]]nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag kho bo ni 'gro'o/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 'dab dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du song la sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[127b.7\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag gis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod nags khrod 'di nas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 'dab dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'gro ba 'di ni kho bo cag 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]'dod pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mang po dam pa'i chos spong ba dag byung ba'i dus la bab kyis/_de dag tshe dang ldan pa'i srog gcod par gyur na ma legs so/_/tshe dang 
[\[128a.2\]]ldan pa ni shin tu mdzes shing byad bzhin bzang la blta na sdug ste/_dang po'i lang tsho dang ldan zhing /_na tshod dar la bab ste/_mdog ni gser btso ma bzang po 'dra/_dpral ba ni dung dang zla ba dang me tog kun da'i kha dog lta bu'i mdzod spus brgyan/_skra dang gtsug tor ni mthon mthing la 
[\[128a.3\]]lcang lor 'khyil pa yin pas rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po'am/_de dang 'dra ba gzhan dag kyang phrag dog dang 'jungs pas non pa'i sems kyis khyod kyi srog bcad na ma legs so/_/de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad du gal te kho 
[\[128a.4\]]bos bdag nyid bsrung ba byas na kho bos 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes zer nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bdag tu 'du shes 'di la gnas nas su/_/bstan pa 'di la bsrung bar yong 
[\[128a.5\]]mi nus/_/mi bzad phyi dus bde bar gshegs pa yi/_/byang chub bstan pa bkod pa chen po yin/_/gang gis bdag tu 'du shes kun spangs shing /_/sems can 'di dang gang zag smra gnas dang /_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams dang /_/reg bya spong ba de ni bstan pa bsrung /_/
[\[128a.6\]]bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/dang ba'i sems kyis zas dang skom rnams dang /_/gdugs dang ba dan mar me'i phreng ba yis/_/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rim gro byas/_/gang gis dam chos rab tu 'jig pa dang /_/bde gshegs bstan pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i tshe/_/
[\[128a.7\]]nyin mtshan du ni bslab pa gcig spyod pa/_/bsod nams 'di ni de bas bye brag 'phags/_/skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni dam pa'i chos/_/'jig par 'gyur tshe gang dag btang snyoms sgom/_/de yis rgyal ba bkur sti byas ma yin/_/'dren pa dag la ri mor des ma byas/_/khyed 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]bde rang gi don gyis la/_/bdag nyid rab tu bsrung bar gyis/_/khyed ni rtag tu byams gnas shing /_/'dul ba 'di la bag yod gyis/_/ma 'dres dag gtsang dri med pa/_/tshul khrims drang por bsrung bar gyis/_/gang gis tshul khrims dri ma med/_/sangs rgyas bsngags pa 
[\[128b.2\]]bsrungs pa ni/_/de yis ji snyed sngon byung ba/_/bde gshegs thams cad ri mor byas/_/de yis thams cad bskyabs pa yin/_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams byang chub bkod/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis bstod pa yi/_/tshul khrims dri ma med pa sus bsrungs pa/_/de 
[\[128b.3\]]dag gis ni sems can mang po yang /_/sems can dmyal ba dang ni sdig las drangs/_/chos mchog rin chen sbyin pa sbyin par gyis/_/bzod pa dag kyang rtag tu bsrung gyis la/_/dgon par gnas shing ting 'dzin mkhas pa dang /_/'jam zhing mnyen pa dag kyang bsgom par 
[\[128b.4\]]gyis/_/rnam pa kun tu rtsod pa ma byed par/_/spyad pa zhi mchog 'di la rnam par spyod/_/bdag ni sems can rnams kyang bskyab pa'i phyir/_/grong dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro bar bya/_/blo gros che 'chang sems can dam pa'i mchog_/drang srong de ni 'gro bar byas pa dang /_/
[\[128b.5\]]kha cig rkang pa la yang 'ju bar byed/_/snying rje bar yang ngu zhing mchi ma zag_/mkhas pa blo gros chen po ma bzhud par/_/sgra 'jam yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa yi/_/shing 'di rnams la gzigs shing rtogs pa mdzod/_/bdag nyid bsrung ba mdzod la ma bzhud cig_/sngon gyi stobs bcu 
[\[128b.6\]]'dren pa de dag kyang /_/dbang po zhi zhing shin tu des pa rnams/_/nags tshal brag dang ri yi rtser gshegs nas/_/byang chub dam pa dag ni thugs su chud/_/byang chub rgyur yang spyod pa dam pa spyad/_/de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan/_/de dag rjes slobs nags khrod 
[\[128b.7\]]gnas par mdzod/_/brtul zhugs bzang po 'di nas ma bzhud cig_/lus ni shin tu mdzes pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan/_/khyod kyi skra yang mthon mthing kha dog ste/_/gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra 'od byed pa/_/sa 'di kun kyang rab tu snang bar gyur/_/khyod kyi mdzod spu bzhin gyi smin mtshams 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]na/_/shin tu mdzes pa dung dang 'dra ba'i 'od/_/rgyal po dag kyang de bzhin srid kyi phyir/_/phrag dog bskyed nas khyod kyi lus bshig 'gyur/_/de nas chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_ji snyed sngon 
[\[129a.2\]]gyi bde gshegs byung ba ni/_/thams cad mkhyen cing zag pa zad pa rnams/_/de dag thams cad 'jig rten don mdzad de/_/srid pa gsum du byang chub dam pa rtogs/_/spyad pa'i dam pa byang chub rgyu spyad de/_/de dag bsod nams ye shes mchog dang ldan/_/de yi rjes bslabs byang 
[\[129a.3\]]chub sems dpa' yang /_/sems can khrag khrig rnams kyi skyabs byed 'dod/_/drang srong mkhas la kun gyis bskor byas te/_/rkang pa la yang phyag 'tshal shugs phyung nas/_/mi bzad snying rje bar ni sgra 'byin cing /_/nyam thag mi bde cho nges 'bebs par byed/_/kha cig rab tu 
[\[129a.4\]]'gyel cing brgyal nas su/_/sa la lhung ba sA la bcad 'gyel bzhin/_/'on kyang drang srong sems can don 'dod pa/_/bsod nams bsags pas de las phyir mi ldog_/drang srong chos gos lhung bzed thogs nas chas/_/ji ltar seng ge ral pa can dag bzhin/_/de ni chos kyi 
[\[129a.5\]]rang bzhin gnas pas na/_/de la yon tan nyes par bya ba med/_/'jig rten 'dir na nags khrod bdag gnas pas/_/sems can ngan song song na ma legs shes/_/de ni sems can bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir/_/grong khyer pho brang mchog tu song bar gyur/_/de nas chos smra ba me 
[\[129a.6\]]tog zla mdzes grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas sems can rnams la chos bstan te/_de'i snga dro der 'ongs nas srog chags khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[129a.7\]]las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do/_/da dung rgyal po'i pho brang der ma phyin pas de mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der phyin pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan pa der nye bar song ste/_shing blag sha dang sA la'i drung du 'dug go/_/de de'i nub mo 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]'das pa dang [(]rgyas [,]rgyal [)]po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs par gyur te/_zhugs nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod kyang da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/_/de zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen 
[\[129b.2\]]ldan nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste/_'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/_/de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro gnyis pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gsum sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[129b.3\]]chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/_/de zas gnyis pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song ste/_'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/_/de de'i 
[\[129b.4\]]nub mo 'das nas de snga dro gsum pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/_/de zas gsum pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin 
[\[129b.5\]]chen ldan nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/_/de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro bzhi pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu 
[\[129b.6\]]rtsa dgu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/_/de zas bzhi pa gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin 
[\[129b.7\]]du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/_/de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro lnga pa la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song nas bud med brgyad khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod do/_/grong khyer de nas kyang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/_/de nyi ma lnga zas gcad pa bcad nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng 
[\[130a.2\]]bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/_/de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro drug pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs nas rgyal po'i bu stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod de da dung zas kyi bya ba ma byas so/_/de nyi ma drug zas gcad 
[\[130a.3\]]pa bcad nas/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sen mo'i mchod rten gang na yod pa der song nas 'greng bzhin du nyin mtshan 'das par byas so/_/de de'i nub mo 'das nas de snga dro bdun pa la rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa 
[\[130a.4\]]dang rgyal po dpa' bas byin skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba mthong ste/_gser gyi shing rta la ngos ni dngul mda' ni sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan/_'khor lo ni bai dUr+ya/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba dang /_rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_shing rta'i 
[\[130a.5\]]mda' la dar gyis dkris shing ras bcos bu phrugs kyis g.yogs pa de bu mo gzhon nu brgyad brgyas rin po che'i tha gus btags shing 'dren te/_de dag byad bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa/_byis pa rnams dga' bar byed 
[\[130a.6\]]cing tshim par byed pa ste/_mkhas pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mthon dman du 'gro'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mthon dman du 'gro'o/_/khyim bdag shing sA la 
[\[130a.7\]]chen po lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong yang zhabs 'bring mthon dman du 'gro'o/_/rgyal po'i bu mo lnga brgya yang rin po che'i khyogs kyi nang du zhugs nas mdun thog thag tu 'gro ste/_de dag gis dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]gyur to/_/btsun mo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyang dge slong de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu rnams bkrol te lham rnams bzhag nas bla gos phrag pa gcig 
[\[130b.2\]]tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod do/_/de nas bu mo gzhon nu de dag kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul bas khyogs de dag las babs nas nor bu dang gdu bu dag bkrol te lham 
[\[130b.3\]]rnams bzhag nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas dge slong de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/dge slong 'di ni byon pa'i tshe/_/nyi ma lta bur thams cad du/_/'di dag rab tu snang bar 
[\[130b.4\]]bgyis/_/skye bo'i tshogs kyang 'dun par gyur/_/'dod chags zhe sdang rgyun bcad cing /_/gti mug dag kyang bsal bar gyur/_/de tshe zhe sdang khro ba dang /_/phrag dog thams cad bcad par gyur/_/rgyal po dpa' bas byin pa yi/_/zhabs 'bring sras la sogs pa yang /_/su 
[\[130b.5\]]yang rgyal po mi lta ste/_/su yang zhabs 'bring mi bgyid do/_/ji ltar zla ba nya ba ni/_/skar ma dag gis bskor ba bzhin/_/rgyal po'i bu yi mdun bdar bas/_/dge slong 'di yang mdzes par gyur/_/ji ltar gser gzugs ri mo dag_/mkhas pas ri mor bris pa dang /_/
[\[130b.6\]]sA la'i rgyal po rgyas pa ltar/_/de bzhin dge slong mdzes par gyur/_/mthu chen brgya byin lha yi dbang po ni/_/grong khyer 'jig pa bdag po mig stong ldan/_/ri rab spyi la sum cu rtsa gsum dbang /_/de bzhin dge slong byon pa 'di yang mdzes/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs 
[\[130b.7\]]pa gnas pa 'dra/_/rab 'phrul lha yi bu ni lha dbang bzhin/_/'dod khams 'thab bral mchog gi lha bzhin du/_/dge slong byon pa 'di yang de bzhin mdzes/_/nyi ma bzhin du bar snang lhan ner bgyis/_/'od zer stong ldan mun nag rab tu sel/_/phyogs rnams kun tu 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]snang bar bgyid pa ltar/_/de bzhin dge slong byon pa mdzes par gyur/_/bskal pa mtha' yas rgya cher sbyin pa byin/_/tshul khrims ma 'dres rtag tu bsrung ba bgyis/_/bzod pa mtshungs med 'jig rten kun tu bsgoms/_/de ni mtshan gyis brgyan cing 'di ltar mdzes/_/
[\[131a.2\]]'phags pa'i skye bos rab bstod brtson 'grus bskyed/_/bsam gtan bzhi yang zhum med sems kyis bsnyen/_/nyon mongs dra ba bsal cing shes rab bskyed/_/de phyir dge slong 'jig rten kun tu gda'/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa mtshungs med sems can snying po ste/_/dpa' bo 'das 
[\[131a.3\]]pas chos mchog dag kyang rab tu bshad/_/ma 'ongs dus dang de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi/_/chos kyi rgyal po dbang brnyes rnams kyi sras de lags/_/dge slong khyod ni mi rtag nam yang ma gyur cig_/gzugs ni 'di ltar 'jig rten kun na rab tu lhan/_/gzi brjid che zhing dbyangs 
[\[131a.4\]]sgra shin tu snyan par gda'/_/rgyal po'i gzi brjid shin tu lham me snang mi bgyid/_/chos 'di ji ltar khyod bdag nyid kyis rab rtogs shing /_/sangs rgyas dag gis bka' stsal 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/_/de bzhin bdag cag bud med dngos po kun spangs te/_/bdag cag thams 
[\[131a.5\]]cad dge slong 'di bzhin 'gyur bar bgyi/_/de dag thams cad sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/tshigs bcad 'di dag smras te gos rnams 'thor bar byed/_/gser gyi phreng ba dang ni rin chen do shal dang /_/rna ba'i rgyan dang mgul gyi rgyan dag rnam mang 'thor/_/ji ltar 'khor 
[\[131a.6\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag_/stobs ldan sa 'di kun la rnam par lta/_/sras su 'du shes dag ni nye bar 'jog_/gling rnams bzhi po 'di dag kun tu 'gro/_/rgyal rigs dang ni tshong dpon bram ze dang /_/khyim bdag mkhar gyi rgyal po bdag gi mi/_/de dag gcig la lhag par 
[\[131a.7\]]sdug pa med/_/thams cad la yang byams pa mnyam par bskyed/_/de bzhin dge slong des pa 'di yang ni/_/gzungs dang dbang rnams la ni shin tu bslabs/_/byang chub yan lag stobs dang dbang po dang /_/yan lag brgyad ldan lam yang rnam par 'byed/_/mtshan 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]mo zla ba skar tshogs dbus na yang /_/ji ltar rab tu mdzes par snang ba bzhin/_/ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba'i tshe/_/gzi brjid ldan zhing rnam par snang bgyid bzhin/_/dbang po zhi zhing stobs bcu ldan pa yi/_/sangs rgyas nges pa kun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag gis ni 
[\[131b.2\]]bsngags pa bskal pa brgyas/_/zad par byed nus skyes bu su yang med/_/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por ni/_/yon tan brjod kyang zad pa yong med de/_/'jig rten rab mchog gi ni spu gcig kyang /_/bsngags pa dag ni zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/des ni mtshungs med 'khor lo rab 
[\[131b.3\]]tu bskor/_/ye shes dag gi gnas kyang shin tu bstan/_/zhib cing rdul bral chos rnams bshad pa mdzad/_/de ni gang na'ang snang bar 'gyur ba med/_/dge sbyong dang ni bram ze lha dang klu/_/lha min bdud dang tshangs par bcas la sogs/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[131b.4\]]yon tan gyis/_/rgya mtsho dag ni zad par yong mi nus/_/gang gis thugs sras 'di 'dra mnga' ba yi/_/sman rgyal mtshungs med rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshigs bcad 'di dag smras nas de yi tshe/_/rgyal po'i bu mo gzhon nu thams cad dga'/_/gser dang gser phye 
[\[131b.5\]]dag kyang 'thor bar byed/_/gos rnams kyang ni rab tu 'ding bar byed/_/gtsug gi nor bu do shal mdzes pa dag_/rin thang bye ba phrag ni brgya ri bas/_/dge slong de la mngon par g.yogs nas ni/_/dga' nas byang chub phyir yang rab tu zhugs/_/de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin 
[\[131b.6\]]'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma btsun mo'i 'khor 'di dag ni log par zhugs te skye bo'i tshogs kyang log go snyam mo/_/skye bo de dag kyang nor bu dang gdu bu bkrol lham bzhag nas gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas dge slong de 
[\[131b.7\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge slong de byad gzugs bzang ba tsam du rgyal po dpa' bas byin byad bzhin mi bzang /_de tsam du blta na sdug pa ma yin/_de tsam du mdzes pa ma yin te/_de rgyal po'i srid kyi phyir shin tu sdangs par gyur to/_/dge slong 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]de'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa mthong nas shin tu khros so/_/dge slong de rgyal po'i lam na 'dug pa'i mig tu rdul song ba dang de 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong 'dis chags pa'i sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas te/_'dis mig gis kyang brda byas so/_/de 'di 
[\[132a.2\]]snyam du sems te/_da dge slong 'di la srog gcod par byed pa su yod snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyi zhabs 'bring du bu stong 'brang ba de dag bos nas gzhon nu dag dge slong 'di srog dang phrol cig ces byas na/_gzhon nu de dag rgyal po dpa' bas byin la slar zlog go/_/dge slong 
[\[132a.3\]]de'i phyir de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi bu dag kyang bka' mi nyan te/_bdag gcig pu gnyis su med par bzhag na da dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar byed pa su yod snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin la gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed ces bya ba gtum po btsam pa med pa ma rungs 
[\[132a.4\]]pa zhig yod pa de rgyal po'i lam na rgyal po dpa' bas byin dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go/_/rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis de mthong nas dga' mgu yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' ba dang mos pa dang yid bde ba skyes nas de sems 'di snyam du sems te/_dga' byed 'dis dge slong 'di 
[\[132a.5\]]srog dang dbral bar byed snyam mo/_/de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed rgyal po dpa' bas byin gang na 'dug pa der 'ongs pa dang dga' byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod bya dga' cher sbyin na dga' byed khyod dge slong 'di srog dang bral bar byed nus sam/_dga' byed kyis smras pa/_lha shin 
[\[132a.6\]]tu rngo thogs so/_/bka' bzhin 'tshal/_da dge slong 'di srog dang dbral bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_dga' byed de'i phyir de'i dus la dbab par shes na mtshon rnon po thogs la dge slong 'di'i lag pa dang rkang pa chod cig_/rna ba dang sna yang chod cig_/'dis chags pa'i 
[\[132a.7\]]sems kyis nga'i btsun mo'i 'khor la bltas kyis de'i phyir 'di'i mig kyang skam pas phyung shig ces byas so/_/de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma dga' byed kyis de'i tshe ral gri rnon po thogs nas dge slong de'i lag pa dang rkang pa bcad do/_/rna ba dang sna yang bcad do/_/mig gnyis kyang phyung 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]ngo /_/de nas dge slong de'i mgo dang rna ba dang rkang lag bcad pa las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang byung /_'o ma'i rgyun du ma yang byung ste/_phyogs bcur bskor nas slar yang dge slong de'i lus kyi nang du nub bo/_/bcad cing gtubs pa'i 'phro nas dpal be'u dang bkra shis dang 'khor lo la sogs 
[\[132b.2\]]pa nang nas byung ste skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kun tu snang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po de skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang dong nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po des dge slong de lam na bcad gtubs shing 'dug pa mthong nas/_de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/_ngo mtshar du gyur nas ngu zhing cho nges 
[\[132b.3\]]btab ste smre sngags bton nas phyir yang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan par song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po dpal bas byin zhag bdun 'das pa dang skyed mos tshal mchog na 'dug pa mi dga'/_mi rtse yongs su mi spyod de/_skyed mos tshal nas de logs nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang rgyal po'i 
[\[132b.4\]]pho brang 'khor rin chen ldan du zhugs pa dang des dge slong de rgyal po'i lam du bor ba shi nas zhag bdun lon yang lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong 'di'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur pa las bltas na dge slong 'di ni gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[132b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/_bdag gis sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa'i las byas kyis bdag ni myur du sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes de de ltar sems pa na/_steng gi bar snang las lha'i bu brgyad khris sgra skad 
[\[132b.6\]]dbyangs gcig tu smras pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ni de bzhin te/_khyod ji skad zer ba ltar dge slong 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/bar snang las lha dag gi sgra thos nas de shin tu 'jigs shing skrag nas bag tsha zhing spu zing 
[\[132b.7\]]zhes byed de 'gyod par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste 'gyod par gyur pas de'i tshe cho nge cher btab nas tshig 'di skad zer ro/_/rgyal po'i srid dang rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_/nor bu rin chen mu tig gser dbyig spang /_/bdag nyid mtshon thogs 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]bdag nyid 'chi bar bya/_/bdag ni byis pa'i blo can las ngan ldan/_/dge slong me tog zla mdzes 'dir byung ba/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te/_/snang bar byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang 'ongs/_/zla ba nya tshe skar ma'i rgyal po bzhin/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod ngan pas 
[\[133a.2\]]bdag dkrugs te/_/rab tu dga' bar bud med tshogs rnams dang /_/shing rta'i nang du zhugs te de nas dong /_/rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su 'khor bar bskor/_/dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'di nyid ni/_/'dir byon dge slong de yang mthong nas su/_/bud med tshogs rnams rab tu 
[\[133a.3\]]dgar gyur cing /_/mos pa skyes nas gser gyi phreng ba gtor/_/thams cad sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis dge slong de la bstod/_/rgyal po yi ni klu yi dbyangs sgra rnams/_/de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur/_/de yang shing rta'i nang du zhugs nas 
[\[133a.4\]]ni/_/rgyal rigs rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sras mchog mthu che ba/_/dge slong dri mchog mig bzang 'dir byon na/_/bdag gi sems ni rab tu ngan gyur te/_/dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug pa'i tshe/_/bud med tshogs chen dga' bar lta mthong nas/_/
[\[133a.5\]]rmongs pas de la phrag dog khro ba bskyed/_/phyogs bzhi kun tu snang bar bgyis pa ni/_/zla ba sgra gcan zin thar mdzes pa bzhin/_/dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug mthong nas/_/bud med tshogs rnams dga' zhing sgra yang 'byin/_/bdag gis der ni gtum po'i tshig smras te/_/bu 
[\[133a.6\]]stong dag la nga nyid khyod song la/_/dge slong 'di ni dum bu dum bur gyis/_/'di ni nga yi dgra mchog ma rungs pa/_/gzhon nu thams cad mnyen zhing tshul ldan te/_/bdag la phan sems dge slong de la 'dud/_/rgyal po 'di 'dra'i bka' bzhin bgyir mi rung /_/de tshe bdag ni mya ngan 
[\[133a.7\]]non par gyur/_/dge slong shin tu tshul khrims mchog ldan pa/_/byams ldan pha bzhin zhugs pa mthong nas ni/_/shin tu gtum pa'i sems kyis gsod du btang /_/phyi dus bdag ni lhung nas mnar med sreg_/dga' byed de ni rgyal po'i lam 'dir gnas/_/ma rungs las bgyid 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]mi la sdug bsngal skyed/_/bdag gi bka' bzhin de 'drar des bgyis te/_/me tog phreng brgyus 'dra ba'i dge slong gtubs/_/nags mchog kun tu bzang po dga' ba na/_/bya yis gang zhing me tog dri zhim rgyas/_/de na dge slong tshogs gzhan rab mang ba/_/bu gcig pa ni ma dang bral 
[\[133b.2\]]ba bzhin/_/dge slong bzhengs la nags su gnas par mdzod/_/mi yi don kyang shin tu rgya cher bgyis/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir byon pa'i tshe/_/dge slong shin tu snying rjer ngu zhing tshol/_/lag pa g.yas pas me tog rgyal mtshan thogs/_/g.yon pa yis kyang blta sdug mdzes 
[\[133b.3\]]pa gzhan/_/lam yang sbyangs shing gos kyis khebs par g.yogs/_/dge slong bzhengs la chos mchog bshad pa mdzod/_/rgyal po'i khab 'dir khyod zhugs ring lon kyang /_/dge slong rab tu snying rjer ngu zhing tshol/_/rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig pa'i tshe/_/khyod kyi srog gi 
[\[133b.4\]]bar chad 'gyur du dogs/_/ji ltar skyes bu mthu chen la la dag_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rtag tu sgra grags pa/_/srid gsum 'di kun thams cad zil mnan nas/_/g.yangs chen por mchongs te sar lhung ltar/_/de bzhin dge slong mtshan mchog rab brgyan pa/_/byad 
[\[133b.5\]]bzhin bzang po sa 'dir 'gyel bar gyur/_/me tog zla mdzes zhe sdang gtum med pa/_/bdag gi sdig pa'i sems kyis dum bur rlags/_/me tog zla mdzes bkrongs nas sar lhung ba/_/chos smra 'di ni mthong nas myur bar yang /_/dge slong thams cad sdug bsngal gzir gyur te/_/
[\[133b.6\]]mi dga' skyes 'gyur de bzhin sems mi bde/_/me tog zla mdzes ri yi rgyal po ltar/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos te/_/phreng ba brgyus pa bud med thogs pa 'dra/_/'dir ni dum bu dum bur rnam par bcad/_/bdag gis dngos sdig shin tu mi bzad bgyis/_/mgon 
[\[133b.7\]]med mnar med gshin rje'i yul du mchi/_/'dir yang dge slong dum bur rlags pa yis/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams dang ring bas ring /_/bdag gis shin tu las ngan bgyis pas na/_/bu dang gnyen bshes tshogs rnams skyabs mi 'gyur/_/blon po dang ni zhabs 'bring bkrabs 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]pa yang /_/de dag dmyal bar bdag song skyabs mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang /_/phyogs bcu dag na gang su bzhugs pa yi/_/ded dpon stobs bcu nyon mongs med pa rnams/_/rdo rje stug sra sku mnga'i skyabs su mchi/_/der ni dge slong dum 
[\[134a.2\]]bur byas mthong nas/_/lha rnams rab tu snying rje cho nges 'debs/_/de dag der song dge 'dun go bar byas/_/me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/_/chos smra ba ni mkhas shing rtogs pa de/_/mthu chen phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab tu grags/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[134a.3\]]gzungs la gnas pa de/_/me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/_/bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin pa sna tshogs byin/_/tshul khrims mi g.yo skyon med gang srung zhing /_/'jig rten kun tu mtshungs med bzod sgom pa/_/me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/_/bskal 
[\[134a.4\]]pa mtha' yas rtag tu brtson ldan zhing /_/zhum med sems kyis bsam gtan bzhi la sgom/_/nyon mongs 'joms pa'i shes rab gang bsten pa/_/me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/_/lus la phangs pa thams cad rab spangs shing /_/de bzhin srog la ma chags gyur nas ni/_/kun 
[\[134a.5\]]tu bzang po'i nags nas babs nas su/_/me tog zla mdzes rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsad/_/lha yi cho nge'i snying rje thos nas ni/_/dge slong de kun shin tu sdug bsngal nas/_/me tog zla mdzes nyes med bsad pa la/_/lta ba'i phyir yang thams cad grong du lhags/_/des pa de dag rgyal po'i khab 
[\[134a.6\]]'ongs nas/_/dge slong dum bu dum bur byas mthong ste/_/nyam thag skad kyis mi bzad cho nges 'debs/_/de dag thams cad brgyal nas sa la 'gyel/_/dge slong dge 'dun rgyal po de la smra/_/tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams pa yi/_/dge slong 'dis ni nyes pa ci zhig byas/_/
[\[134a.7\]]'di ni sngon gyi skye ba bsam yas dran/_/'di ni ye shes gzungs dbang pha rol phyin/_/'di ni 'dus byas 'di dag stong par shes/_/'di ni 'gro ba dag la mtshan med ston/_/'di ni smon lam 'du shes thams cad spangs/_/'di ni yid 'ong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byin/_/'di ni nges shing 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]dbang po rab tu zhi/_/'di ni sngon gyi gnas kyi pha rol phyin/_/'jig rten thams cad las kyang mngon par 'phags/_/'di ni sangs rgyas rang byung ye shes kyis/_/khyu mchog gyur cing 'jig rten ri mor byas/_/dag cing rab rib med pa'i mig gis lta/_/byams pa dang ni snying rje shin tu che/_/
[\[134b.2\]]'dod pa ngan cing btsog la sdug bsngal skyed/_/mtho ris rnam par ma rung byed pa ste/_/'dod pa bsnyen na rna ba med par 'gyur/_/mi dag shes rab dang yang bral bar 'gyur/_/mi rnams 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na/_/long bar 'gyur zhing pha dang ma yang gsod/_/'dod pa bsnyen byas 
[\[134b.3\]]tshul khrims ldan pa gsod/_/de bas mi yis 'dod pa rnam par spang /_/rgyal pos 'dod pa dag ni bsnyen byas na/_/sa bdag dam pa 'byor pa 'di bor nas/_/mi bzad sdug bsngal rtsub byed sems dmyal nas/_/sems can dmyal ba 'jigs pa chen por 'gro/_/'di 'dra'i dge 
[\[134b.4\]]slong mkhas pa gsod byed de/_/sdig pa'i las rnams rtag tu byed par 'gyur/_/de phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa/_/sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs spang bar bya/_/lus ni sgyu ma gsog dang 'dra ba dang /_/de bzhin rna mig sna lce rig nas ni/_/gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri mchog dang /_/reg bya 
[\[134b.5\]]chos rnams zhum med sems kyis gtong /_/sbyin la bslabs shing tshul khrims mnyam pa med/_/bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus de bzhin te/_/bsam gtan sten cing shes rab pha rol song /_/sems can dag gi don kyang rab tu byed/_/'jig rten lha dang mir bcas thams cad kyang /_/byams 
[\[134b.6\]]pas rgyal ba la ni rab tu lta/_/de phyir mig ni mun gnag gtibs gyur kyang /_/byang chub zhi ba nyid ni 'tshang rgya 'gyur/_/rta dang bal glang yang thogs khri rnams dang /_/khyogs dang sngas rnams kyang ni de bzhin te/_/glang po dag dang bzhon dang dgal ba dang /_/grong dang yul 'khor dga' ba 
[\[134b.7\]]gtong bar byed/_/grong khyer dang ni rgyal srid yongs gtong zhing /_/gser dang dngul dang shel dang byi ru dang /_/de bzhin gnas dang bu dang bu mo dang /_/rang gi mgo yang gtong zhing byang chub zhugs/_/me tog dang ni spos dang bdug pa dang /_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan lha yi ba dan dang /_/rol 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]mo'i cha spyad sna tshogs thogs nas ni/_/dga' nas mchod pa mtshungs pa med pa byed/_/srid pa dag ni stong par shes nas kyang /_/srid pa'i 'gro ba dag la dga' mi byed/_/de phyir stobs bcu mtshan gyis rnam brgyan cing /_/phyogs bcu thams cad du yang snang bar 
[\[135a.2\]]byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/_/'dod pa'i khams rnams dang ni gzugs kyi khams/_/gzugs med khams la de dag mi chags te/_/khams gsum dag la snga nas chags pa med/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/_/bdag tu 
[\[135a.3\]]'du shes sems can 'du shes med/_/srog tu 'du shes gang zag 'du shes med/_/tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dres rtag tu spyad/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/_/dngos por 'du shes dngos med 'du shes med/_/bde bar 'du shes mi bder 'du shes med/_/grangs su 
[\[135a.4\]]'du shes grangs med 'du shes med/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/_/yod par 'du shes med par 'du shes med/_/bud med 'du shes skyes par 'du shes med/_/grong gi 'du shes grong khyer 'du shes med/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/_/
[\[135a.5\]]yul 'khor 'du shes grong 'dab 'du shes med/_/'dod chags 'du shes 'dod bral 'du shes med/_/zhe sdang 'du shes sdang bral 'du shes med/_/gti mug 'du shes rmongs bral 'du shes med/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/_/nga rgyal nga rgyal bral ba'i 'du 
[\[135a.6\]]shes med/_/ma rig ma rig ma yin 'du shes med/_/lta dang lta ba ma yin 'du shes med/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas pa/_/de dag dbang po stobs la mi chags te/_/byang chub yan lag bsam gtan chags pa med/_/khams gsum nyes pa thams cad rab tu 
[\[135a.7\]]spong /_/'dod chags chags med zhe sdang gtum pa med/_/gti mug rmongs med rtag tu g.yo med 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas stobs bcu mthong nas bkur sti byed/_/blo gros ldan pa mtho ris smon mi byed/_/su dag gzhan las chos mchog thos nas ni/_/de la nam yang nem nur mi byed pa/_/
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]'bru mar gang ba'i snod bzhin dang zhing dag_/bcad dang ma bcad gzhan gyi blo yang shes/_/mdza' ba byas na rjes su chags pa skye/_/de yang nyon mongs pa ni chen po yin/_/zhe sdang byas na khong khro skye bar 'gyur/_/dgra dang 'jigs pa sdig pa rnams kyang 'byung /_/'di gnyis rab tu rnam par 
[\[135b.2\]]spang byas te/_/blo gros ldan pa dag ni byang chub zhugs/_/de dag mi yi khyu mchog stobs bcur ni/_/'jig rten du yang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nang dang phyi rol dag kyang rnam spangs te/_/chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rab gnas shing /_/tshul khrims phung po dag kyang rnam par sbyangs/_/
[\[135b.3\]]ral ba med cing ma 'dres skyon yang med/_/nam yang de dag gi ni tshul khrims dag_/'phags shing 'dres pa dag tu mi 'gyur te/_/mtha' 'di dag ni gnyis po yongs spangs nas/_/blo gros 'chang ba byang chub zhi rtogs 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis dge slong gi dge 
[\[135b.4\]]'dun las chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes kyi yon tan bye brag chen po yangs shing rgya che ba thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/_nags khrod stug po kun tu bzang po ni/_/sdong po chen pos gang zhing 'bras 
[\[135b.5\]]bus mdzes/_/dus kun skye ba me tog sdug pas brgyan/_/sna tshogs tha dad bya rnams sgra yang 'byin/_/gser gyi ri yang mdzes shing mtho bas brgyan/_/mi 'am ci yi glu dbyangs snyan pa dang /_/rol mo shin tu thabs ldan yid 'ong grag_/grub pa'i bu mo rtag tu gar yang byed/_/
[\[135b.6\]]nags de lha yi dga' ba'i tshal bzhin te/_/gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar ba yi shing gis dkrigs/_/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad bkram/_/ud pal pad mos brgyan cing chu yang 'bab/_/'di 'dra ba yi nags mchog nyams dga' ba/_/drang srong rtag tu gnas par 'thun 
[\[135b.7\]]pa dag_/bor nas sems can don dang phan bzhed pas/_/sdig pa'i phung po bdag drung grong du byon/_/de ltar chos smra yon tan 'chang ba 'di/_/me tog zla mdzes grong khyer 'dir byon te/_/byon nas sdig pa bgyid pa bdag gis bkrongs/_/'di bkrongs pas ni bdag kyang dmyal 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]bar ltung /_/byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rje'i stobs ldan gang /_/dpa' bo sems can phan phyir 'jig rten spyod/_/de dag sdig bgyid bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig_/byang chub sems dpa' de skyabs bdag mchi'o/_/gang yang rang rgyal dag ni gnyis pa dang /_/
[\[136a.2\]]gang gzhan nyan thos rdzu 'phrul ldan pa ste/_/zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa/_/bdag ni sdug bsngal mnar med mchi ba skyobs/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na kun dga' bo/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[136a.3\]]dpa' chen pos lus dang srog la ma chags par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo lus dang srog la chags pa'i sems can rnams mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_rtag tu rul ba'i lus 'di dang /_/srog kyang g.yo zhing dbang med de/_/
[\[136a.4\]]rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra ba la/_/sems can gang dag chags pa ni/_/shin tu ma rungs las byas nas/_/gti mug dbang song de dag ni/_/sems can dmyal ba mi bzad par/_/mi mkhas bdud kyi gzhol bas song /_/dbu ba rdos 'dra'i lus dang ni/_/chu yi chu bur 'dra srog la/_/mi 
[\[136a.5\]]gang chags par mi byed pa/_/de dag 'gro ba mchog tu 'gro/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[136a.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas lus dang srog la mi lta bar byas te/_mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed de dper na dben pa na bde bar gnas pa dang dgon pa dang /_nags 
[\[136a.7\]]khrod spangs te grong dang grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang ljongs dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang ri khrod rnams su zhugs te/_ci nas sems can de dag nyan thos kyi byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di nyid rgya cher tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rgyas par rab tu bstan to/_/ngas sngon 
[\[136b.2\]]spyad pa dag ni spyod pa na/_/de tshe rgyal po dpa' bas byin par gyur/_/rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen ldan zhes bya/_/skyed mos tshal gyi sar ni byung bar gyur/_/shing rtar zhugs pas de tshe dge slong mthong /_/kun nas mdzes shing blta na sdug pa ste/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos 
[\[136b.3\]]pa/_/phyogs rnams thams cad du yang snang bar byed/_/me tog zla mdzes phyogs su grags pa ste/_/snying rje gnas pa phan zhing snying brtse ba/_/dpal dang gzi brjid dag gis mdzes pa ni/_/sems can rnams la brtse phyir grong du 'ongs/_/nga ni gzugs kyang de tsam mi phod pas/_/
[\[136b.4\]]de la nga yang 'jungs pa ma rungs skyes/_/'dod la chags shing srid la bcings pas na/_/'di ni bdag gi srid las skyod snyam ste/_/nga yi bu rnams stong du tshang ba yang /_/shing rtar zhugs shing zhabs 'bring mthon dman 'gro/_/cod pan dang ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/_/sum cu dbang 
[\[136b.5\]]phyir lha yi bu 'brang bzhin/_/de na nga yi bu mo lnga brgya dag_/nor bu thogs shing lham gyon blta na sdug_/mgo rgyan dang ni lhab lhub rgyan gyis spud/_/de dag gser gyi dra bas shing rta 'dren/_/nga yi bud med dag ni brgyad khri yang /_/gzugs mdzes shin tu blta na sdug pa dag_/
[\[136b.6\]]shing rtar zhugs pas dge slong de mthong ste/_/ri rab bzhin du gzugs bzang dpal 'bar ba/_/mthong nas de dag phar yang 'du shes bskyed/_/byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skyes te/_/de tshe tshangs pa'i spyod par yang dag btsud/_/yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan rnams de la gtor/_/
[\[136b.7\]]de tshe nga ni phrag dog skyes par gyur/_/gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba mi bzad de/_/dbang phyug rgyags pas bu la 'di skad smras/_/mdun na 'dug pa'i dge slong bsad par gyis/_/gzhon nu de dag nga yi tshig thos nas/_/shin tu sdug bsngal yid kyang mi dgar gyur/_/yab cig de 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]skad kyi ni tshig ma gsung /_/dge slong 'di 'dra bdag cag mi 'gums so/_/bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/bdag cag lus dang yan lag bcad gtubs kyang /_/dge slong 'di ni 'gums par mi bgyid de/_/'di ltar bdag cag byang chub sems skyes so/_/rgyal po de 
[\[137a.2\]]tshe bu yi tshig thos nas/_/khros te gsod pa'i gshed ma 'bangs la smras/_/nga yi btsun mo'i mdun na 'dug pa yi/_/dge slong 'di ni myur du sod de phul/_/de nas gsod pa'i gshed ma phyi bzhin 'ongs/_/shin tu gtum sems dga' byed snying rje med/_/'bru mar ngar btags ral 
[\[137a.3\]]gri thogs nas su/_/de yis dge slong dum bu brgyad du byas/_/de yi lus dang yan lag bcad pa las/_/khrag kyang mi zag 'od zer stong byung ste/_/bcad pa'i 'phro na dpal be'u 'khor lo dag_/mtshan rnams de yi lus kyi nang na yod/_/shin tu ma rungs las ni byas nas su/_/skyed 
[\[137a.4\]]mos tshal du de yi mod la byung /_/dge slong me tog zla mdzes dran nas ni/_/de yi rtsed mo dga' bar ma gyur to/_/rings pa'i gzugs su myur zhing mgyogs par ni/_/de nas bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang song /_/gang du dge slong dum bu brgyad byas pa/_/sa phyogs der ni shing rtar zhugs 
[\[137a.5\]]nas phyin/_/lha rnams khrag khrig mang po bar snang la/_/cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra dag des thos te/_/rgyal po khyod kyis mi dge sdig mang bgyis/_/shi 'phos nas ni mnar med mi bder 'gro/_/rgyal po des ni lha yi sgra thos nas/_/shin tu sdug bsngal mi dga' sems skrag gyur/_/
[\[137a.6\]]bdag gis me tog zla mdzes bkrongs pa ni/_/bdag gis sdig pa mi bzad mang po bgyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas ldan/_/sangs rgyas mi yi khyu mchog sras po gang /_/dbang po bsrungs shing des pa zhi ba'i yid/_/de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/_/
[\[137a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams gang 'dzin cing /_/zad pa'i dus la dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod/_/'jig rten kun tu chos kyi sgron ma mdzad/_/de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/_/'jig rten kun na sman pa'i rgyal po gang /_/sems can na ba rtag tu gso byed cing /_/
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]bdud rtsi dag gis bkru sman gtong ba yi/_/dge slong bdag gis 'dod pa'i don phyir bkrongs/_/zhib cing zab la zhi ba blta dka' ba'i/_/chos rnams skye dgu dag la gang 'chad cing /_/byang chub snying po mchog kyang gang ston pa/_/de ni 'dod pa'i don phyir bdag gis bkrongs/_/'dren pa 
[\[137b.2\]]rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin cing /_/'jig rten ldongs pa'i sgron mar gyur pa ste/_/gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po gang 'dzin pa/_/de ni ci slad bdag gis 'dod phyir bkrongs/_/nyon mongs med cing rnam dag ye shes can/_/zhi ba rab zhi rtag tu mnyam gzhag pa/_/'dod pas ldongs 
[\[137b.3\]]pas bdag gis deng bkrongs te/_/des ni shin tu ma rungs dmyal bar ltung /_/sangs rgyas gang dag 'das dang de bzhin ma byon dang /_/mi yi dam pa rgyal ba gang yang bzhugs pa ni/_/bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa rnams/_/de dag kun la thal mo sbyar te 
[\[137b.4\]]skyabs su mchi//_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_de nas rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes bsad de shi ba'i lus kyi mdog ma gyur par sa la 'gyel cing 'dug pa mthong nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde 
[\[137b.5\]]ste 'gyod cing myos par gyur nas de'i tshe cho nges rab tu cher btab po/_/chos smra ba me tog zla mdzes de la yang 'di lta bur yang dag pa'i yon tan gyis bstod pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/kun tu bzang por 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis/_/khyod la 
[\[137b.6\]]rnam pa mang po bsgo ba bgyis/_/khyod kyi srog gi bar chad byung nga re/_/rin chen ldan par rgyal po'i khab ma bzhud/_/khyod kyis dge slong dge 'dun tshig ma bzung /_/mgon po grong khyer du ni ci slad byon/_/khyod ni gang gi don du byon pa yi/_/don de sgron ma mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/_/lha 
[\[137b.7\]]rdzas myu gu sna tshogs brgyan pa'i sa/_/gzugs bzang gzugs 'bar shing ljon mang pos dkrigs/_/grub pa'i rig 'dzin gnod sbyin mchog gis bsrungs/_/lha rnams zhugs shing bya rgyal sgra yang sgrog_/kun tu bzang po sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs pa/_/nags tshal dam pa dga' ba 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]bor nas ni/_/bgyi ba gang phyir khyod ni 'dir byon pa/_/des pa bgyi ba de deng bdag la gsungs/_/khyod kyi tshig thos nas ni bka' bzhin bgyi/_/sangs rgyas sras po bzhengs la bka' stsol cig_/kye ma da ni ci bgyi lha yi lha/_/bdag ni mgon med khyod kyi skyabs su mchi/_/
[\[138a.2\]]gcig pu seng ge [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po ltar/_/dge slong dge 'dun mchog gi khyu bor nas/_/sems can mtha' yas pa la thugs brtse'i phyir/_/rang gi srog kyang btang ste 'dir byon na/_/'dod chags zil non shin tu 'jungs pa yis/_/bdag gis dpa' bo dum bu dum bur bcad/_/
[\[138a.3\]]'di ni dge slong dge 'dun mtha' dag kyang /_/khyod la lta bar pho brang ma lhags par/_/bdag ni 'jigs skrag khyod la ci gsol pa/_/bde bar gsol ba gcig ni mdzad par 'os/_/me tog zla mdzes mi 'jigs bdag stsol la/_/nya dus zla ba nya 'drar bzhengs su gsol/_/sems 
[\[138a.4\]]can gtso bo bdag la gnang bar mdzod/_/chos smra khyod ni zhe sdang rnam par grol/_/de ring bdag la sna gcig gnang bar mdzod/_/nyi ma bzhin du snang mdzad bzhengs su gsol/_/chos smra mchog ni bdag gis bkrongs bgyis te/_/sdig pa ma legs bdag gis deng bgyis pa/_/'di nas 
[\[138a.5\]]'chi 'phos mi bzad dmyal bar skye/_/bdag la de yi skyabs su 'gyur ba med/_/nyon mongs byed pa sdig sems ci ru rung /_/rgyags pas khengs pa'i rgyal srid ci ru rung /_/thams cad spangs te gcig pu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'di nas bdag gis snying po ci ma blangs/_/'dod chags zhe sdang bcom pa rnam 
[\[138a.6\]]dag chos/_/snyan par gsung ba bdag thul thugs rje can/_/'gro ba'i gnyen gcig sun 'byin mi mdzad pa/_/me tog zla mdzes bdag gis ci phyir bkrongs/_/kye ma bzod dang dka' thub nor phyug brtul zhugs bzang /_/kye ma gzugs dang des pa dag gi yon tan ldan/_/kye ma g.yo med dpal stug spros pa 
[\[138a.7\]]mi mnga' ba/_/bdag cag bor nas khyod ni gang du bzhud par mdzad/_/'phags pa khyod kyi lus dang yan lag bcad pa na/_/'o ma rab tu zag cing 'od zer stong dag byung /_/'jig rten 'di dag thams cad shin tu ngo mtshar gyur/_/ngo mtshar che ba'i rang bzhin 'dren pa bzhengs 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]su gsol/_/kye ma me tog zla ba dul ba thugs rje can/_/kye ma byams dang snying rje'i phung po ri bo tshur/_/kye ma chos rnams zab mo shin tu ston pa'i mchog_/lha khyod bzhengs shig bdag la thugs brtser mdzad du gsol/_/kye ma zla ba nya zhal tshur spyon cig_/kye ma sa bcu legs 
[\[138b.2\]]gnas tshur spyon cig_/kye ma dpa' bo stobs bcu mngon 'phags pa/_/tshe la khyod dbang bdag po gang du bzhud/_/kye ma dpa' bo tshur spyon bdag la gsungs/_/khyod kyis yun ring bzod pa bsgoms pa dang /_/brtson 'grus thugs rje de dag gang du mchis/_/byams pa chen po 
[\[138b.3\]]bzhengs la gsung phyung zhig_/kye ma shin tu mchod 'os lha yi lha/_/chos smra cang mi gsung bar ci slad bzhugs/_/mkhas pa bzhengs la bdag gi khyim du bzhud/_/bud med tshogs la khyod kyis chos ston cig_/lha khyod lus ni gcad par mi nus te/_/lha dang lha min gnod sbyin srin pos 
[\[138b.4\]]kyang /_/khyod kyi lha yi lus 'di mi shigs kyis/_/mkhas pa khyod deng sgyu dag ma mdzad cig_/lha khyod sgyu mdzad bzhugs pa ga la gda'/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgyu ma mi mdzes so/_/sgyu ma thams cad spongs la bzhengs su gsol/_/rin chen ldan pa'i grong du chos shod 
[\[138b.5\]]cig_/kye ma 'phags pa me tog zla mdzes tshur/_/kye ma khams gsum 'dod chags bral ba tshur/_/kye ma pha ma lta bu 'dren pa tshur/_/bdag gi sems dmyal sgo ni bcad du gsol/_/ngan song skyes pa rnams kyi rten dang dpung /_/srog chags mnar med chen por lhung 
[\[138b.6\]]ba yi/_/skyabs mdzad me tog zla mdzes tshur spyon cig_/bdag gi bde 'gro'i sgo yang dbye bar gsol/_/mgon po khyod ni dgung bdun bshos ma gsol/_/re shig deng bzhengs bdag gi bshos gsol cig_/bdag gis bshos gsol rin chen ldan pa 'dir/_/
[\[138b.7\]]sems can du ma chos la dgod pa mdzod/_/kye ma chos mchog rtogs pa bdag gi yab/_/kye ma sems can rnams la khon med sems/_/kye ma tshur spyon bdag mdun chos ston cig_/kye ma tshur spyon khyod smon myur grub shog_/dge slong dge 'dun de ni mgon med 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]gyur/_/kye ma mdongs shing mi dran mya ngan bgyid/_/sems can snying po khyod ni myur bzhengs la/_/dge slong dge 'dun dbugs kyang dbyung bar mdzod/_/kye ma 'jig rten gsum na sgron gyur pa/_/kye ma tshur spyon kun tu bzang por bzhud/_/kun tu bzang po'i 
[\[139a.2\]]nags khrod bzhud nas ni/_/dge slong dag la phan phyir khyod ston cig_/kye kye chos 'dzin yon tan rmad byung che/_/a shwad me tog bzhin du rnyed par dka'/_/shes rab thugs rje'i spyan ni dri med pa/_/kye kye dge slong dge 'dun gzigs su gsol/_/tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i 
[\[139a.3\]]gzugs de yang /_/kye kye dge slong dag la bstan du gsol/_/kye kye zla ba shar ba bzhin du 'dir/_/me tog zla ba de ring bzhengs su gsol/_/kye kye rgyal sras bdag la thugs brtse ba/_/dbugs 'byin mdzad pa ston pa bla na med/_/kye kye mtshon dang dbyug pas 
[\[139a.4\]]btab pa bzod/_/bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing rab tu des/_/kye kye me tog zla mdzes thugs rje can/_/rab sbyin 'dren pa khyod ni bzhengs su gsol/_/kye kye khyod ni bzhengs la bdag la yang /_/mthong bar dka' ba'i gzungs rnams bshad du gsol/_/kye kye 
[\[139a.5\]]'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa/_/shes rab kyi ni sgron ma dam pa'i mchog_/kye kye sems can dag gi phan don la/_/brtson mdzad 'dren pa thugs rje'i stobs bcu ldan/_/kye kye me tog zla mdzes bzhengs su gsol/_/dpa' bo sems can dag gi don mdzad pa/_/kye 
[\[139a.6\]]kye sems can dag ni bye ba dang /_/khrag khrig rnams kyang zhi ba'i grong du khod/_/kye kye tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros che/_/mkhas pa bslabs pa'i nor gyis shin tu phyug_/kye kye tshul khrims brtul zhugs rab gnas shing /_/chos kyi shing gi myu gu mngon par dga'/_/
[\[139a.7\]]kye kye chos gos ngur smrig kha bsgyur 'chang /_/rtag tu mngon par byung la dga' bar mdzad/_/kye kye me tog zla ba brtul zhugs mchog_/rab sbyin dka' thub bzang po khyod bzhengs shig_/kye kye dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul/_/rtag par dul ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan/_/
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]kye kye dul ba rab dul rjes su bzhud/_/zhi ba dbang po rab zhi khong nas des/_/kye kye sems can nyal zhing gnyid log pa/_/chos kyi sgra yis rtag tu sad par mdzod/_/kye kye sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag_/sad par bgyis nas theg pa mchog la khod/_/kye kye sbyin pa yi ni spang 
[\[139b.2\]]leb la/_/brtson 'grus thag gus sbrel ba'i gru sbyor te/_/kye kye sems can rgya mtsho chen por ni/_/rab tu lhung zhing srid pas ded pa rnams/_/kye kye stobs bcu ldan pa me tog mchog_/mnyan pa gdos 'dzin mkhas pa bzhengs su gsol/_/kye kye shin tu sra ba'i grur yang 
[\[139b.3\]]ni/_/zhugs nas bdag dang de dag bsgral bar mdzod/_/kye kye sman pa'i dam pa brtul zhugs la/_/shin tu spyad cing rig mdzad sman pa'i mchog_/kye kye ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin/_/dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi dag sbyin mdzad pa/_/kye kye nad ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/btab 
[\[139b.4\]]pa'i sems can na ba rnams gzigs nas/_/kye kye myur du bzhengs la de dag la/_/chos kyi sman rnams shin tu stsal bar mdzod/_/kye kye ye shes sman pa'i rgyal po mchog_/mtshungs med ye shes 'phags shing pha rol phyin/_/kye kye nad rnams shin tu gso mdzad cing /_/thugs 
[\[139b.5\]]rjes sems can dag gi don kyang mdzad/_/kye kye na bar gyur pa'i sems can khams/_/'dod chags nad kyis ma lus bcom pa rnams/_/des ni sems can thams cad bde ba dang /_/nad rnams med cing mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/_/kye kye mkhas pa ye shes rgya chen bslabs/_/
[\[139b.6\]]chos kyi rnga dag shin tu brdung bar mdzod/_/kye kye 'jig rten gyi ni the tsom gyi/_/'khri shing thams cad ye shes rgya mtshos chod/_/kye kye legs thos chos rnams 'dzin mdzad pa/_/rdul bral mdo sde bye ba brgya dag kyang /_/'khor gyi nang du gdan la rab bzhugs la/_/mi mchog 
[\[139b.7\]]mkhas pa brjod pa mdzad du gsol/_/me tog zla ba mtshan mchog brgyan pa kye/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu tshang ba kye/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus lus brgyan kye/_/srid pa'i mtsho rgal spros med tshur spyon kye/_/srid pa'i btson rar chud khrol bzhengs shig kye/_/ye 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]shes mchog rig tshangs pa 'dra ba kye/_/me tog zla ba thugs rje chen po kye/_/byams dang snying rje skyed la bzhengs shig kye/_/me tog zla ba khyod la gsol ba 'debs/_/dge slong dge 'dun khyod kyis ma dor bar/_/tshur gshegs dge 'dun yongs su bsdu ba 
[\[140a.2\]]mdzod/_/bzhengs la nags khrod der yang gshegs sam kye/_/me tog zla ba bsam gtan dgyes pa mchog_/mdza' dang mi mdza' mtshungs par byams shing phan/_/gzungs la rab tu gnas pa tshur spyon kye/_/ye shes sdong po mtshungs med khyod bzhengs shig_/ri rab bzhin 
[\[140a.3\]]du mi g.yo brtan pa kye/_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sems can mnyam yid kye/_/me tog zla ba brtul zhugs rdzogs pa kye/_/bzhengs la shing gi drung du 'tshang rgya mdzod/_/lha yi rna ba chos kyi mchog 'chang kye/_/lha yi mig mkhas ye shes rtogs pa kye/_/bzhengs te bdag la gzigs shig 
[\[140a.4\]]thugs rje can/_/grags pa mtha' yas bdag gi tshig gson kye/_/'jig rten kun la phan dang don mdzad kye/_/me tog zla ba shin tu sbyin dgyes kye/_/bzhengs la myur du bdag gi re rdzogs mdzod/_/khyod 'dir dum bu dum bur ma bzhugs shig_/grong 'dir skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams kyang /_/khyod 
[\[140a.5\]]mthong thams cad shing bzhin sa la 'gyel/_/snying skams 'gyur ba'i mya ngan rnams kyang bgyid/_/thugs rje mchog gi spyan gyis de la gzigs/_/gang gi slad du byams pa bsgoms pa dang /_/ye shes shes rab thabs kyi stobs rnams dang /_/khyod kyi thugs rje btang snyoms 
[\[140a.6\]]dga' ba yangs/_/de dag rdzogs mdzod bzhengs shig me tog mdzes/_/lha klu lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po mi dang mi 'am ci/_/snyim pa me tog bdug pas bkang nas ni/_/thams cad mthong bar dga' nas lhags shing 'khod/_/drang srong chen po'i tshig 
[\[140a.7\]]ni deng rtogs te/_/skye dgu'i 'dod pa gnod byed gsod pa yin/_/yid kyi nad du 'gyur ba ngan 'gro'i rgyu/_/de phyir 'dod pa'i spyod pa spang bar bya/_/dge slong bdag gis bsad pa sdig gi las/_/shin tu ma legs mi bde byas pas na/_/bdag ni mi bzad dmyal ba mnar med 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]'gro/_/bdag la de yi mgon skyabs byed pa med/_/bdag ni rgyal po'i srid btang tshangs spyod gzhol/_/spos dang me tog byug pa rnams kyis ni/_/mchod pa dam pa rnams kyang rab tu bya/_/shin tu mdzes par mchod rten bdag gis bya/_/bu dang bu mo bud med khyim bdag dang /_/blon po 
[\[140b.2\]]dang ni tshong dpon de dag dang /_/grong pa dang ni rgyal rigs mang po rnams/_/de dag thams cad la ni ngas bsgo ba/_/a ga ru dang tsan dan shug pa dang /_/shin tu zhim pa'i spos mchog ci yod pas/_/myur du sgrom gyi snying po'i khyogs chos la/_/dge slong 'di ni bsregs pa'i cho ga gyis/_/
[\[140b.3\]]grong khyer mi kun rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/_/spos mchog dag kyang thogs nas khyogs bcas te/_/spos rab bzang po yid du 'ong las byas/_/der ni dge slong der yang bcug nas su/_/a ga ru dang tsan dan tsam pa ka/_/rgya spos spri ka de bzhin pa ta la/_/me tog dang ni phreng ba 
[\[140b.4\]]byug pa dag_/shin tu bzang dang 'bru mar dag gis bsregs/_/de yi rus pa sgrom ni byas par gyur/_/dge slong dag gis de yang der bsregs te/_/rgyal pos de yi mchod rten byas nas su/_/'di la ngas ni mchod pa bya zhes zer/_/me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dang /_/gdugs 
[\[140b.5\]]dang ba dan rgyal mtshan thogs nas su/_/rgyal pos der ni sil snyan stong dag dang /_/bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyang len du btsud/_/nyi ma gcig la rgyal po dus gsum du/_/dge slong de yi mchod rten de drung du/_/sdig pa sngan cad cung zad ci byas pa/_/de tshe dus gsum du yang shin 
[\[140b.6\]]tu 'chags/_/lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar/_/nyes pa byas pa dag kyang rab bshags te/_/phyis kyang tshul khrims dam pa ma ral bsrungs/_/rnam par dag cing gtsang la dri ma med/_/lo stong bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lngar/_/gso sbyong dag kyang de tshe rab gsos te/_/de ni 
[\[140b.7\]]de tshe bdag gi lus zhig nas/_/mnar med mi bzad par ni de lhung gyur/_/'dod phyir snying rje med pa'i las byas pas/_/sdug bsngal mang po dag kyang myong bar gyur/_/sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu lnga/_/de tshe de dag bdag gis ma mnyes byas/_/lo stong bye ba khrag ni 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]dgu bcu lngar/_/de yi tshe na nga ni long bar gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig drug cu gnyis/_/sngan chad nga yi mig kyang bcar bar gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong dang /_/shin tu mang bar nga yi mig phyung phrogs/_/mgo dang rna ba dang ni rkang lag kyang /_/
[\[141a.2\]]bskal pa mtha' yas khrag khrig bcad par gyur/_/bskal pa dag ni bye ba khrag khrig tu/_/mir gyur pa dang skye ba gzhan du yang /_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis rab gtses shing /_/sdug bsngal tshor ba yun ring myong bar gyur/_/sdig pa'i las rnams byas pas 'khor ba na/_/yun 
[\[141a.3\]]ring shin tu sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/_/de phyir byang chub zhi ba su 'dod pa/_/srid pa gsum du sdig pa mi bya'o/_/rgyal po mchog gis sngon gyi las bshags kyang /_/snga ma'i nyes byas rnams las de ma thar/_/mi bzad gzugs kyi las rnams sngar byas pas/_/de shi dmyal ba mi 
[\[141a.4\]]bzad mnar med song /_/nga yi rna ba de bzhin rkang lag bcad/_/bskal pa mtha' yas mang por sna yang bcad/_/spyod pa spyod tshe mtshon cha dbyug thogs nas/_/'debs byed nan gyis nga yi mig kyang phyung /_/byang chub phyir ni mgo lag lus bcad dang /_/bu dang chung ma mig dang rang 
[\[141a.5\]]gi sha/_/rkang lag dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs btang yang /_/sngon gyi sdig pa'i las ni zad ma gyur/_/kun dga' de ltar bskal pa mtha' yas spyod/_/sangs rgyas dpal stug dpag tu med pa mthong /_/byang chub spyod mchog 'di ni spyod pa na/_/de tshe sdug bsngal 'di dag 
[\[141a.6\]]sngon myong gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la gang gnas shing /_/byams spyod rtag tu mi g.yo mi 'gul ba/_/sangs rgyas rdul sbyangs lha yi lha mchod nas/_/de dag nam yang ngan song sar mi 'gro/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go bgos pa/_/chos rje sangs 
[\[141a.7\]]rgyas bdag 'gyur su 'dod pa/_/tshul khrims ma 'dres g.yo ba med par srungs/_/gzungs la rab gnas chos kyang bstan par gyis/_/nga ni de tshe rgyal po dpes byin yin/_/nga yi bu rnams phyi dus chos skyong ba/_/me tog zla mdzes pad ma bla ma yin/_/dga' byed de ni zhi ba'i rgyal 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]bar gyur/_/'jig rten gsum dpa' 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rkang gnyis gtso bor gyur/_/skye dgu dag gi don chen mdzad nas ni/_/mar me bzhin du 'dren pa mya ngan 'das/_/bud med tshogs dang rgyal rigs mang po dang /_/khyim bdag dang ni blon 
[\[141b.2\]]po stobs chen dang /_/tshong dpon de bzhin grong ba'i mkhar gyi rgyal/_/thams cad stobs bcu nyon mongs med par gyur/_/me tog zla mdzes kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta 
[\[141b.3\]]bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/_gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros 
[\[141b.4\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_rab tu gdon par bya/_lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i bsgom pas mang du bsgom par bya/_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par 
[\[141b.5\]]bya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi phung po la yang rab tu gnas par bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims tshogs gnas shing /_/bdag la phan sems spyad pa gang spyod pa/_/mngon dga'i 
[\[141b.6\]]sangs rgyas zhing du myur song nas/_/bzod pa des thob chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/_/de phyir gnod sems med cing kun 'thun gyis/_/thams cad rtag tu yid du 'ong bar bgyis/_/dpal stug sangs rgyas dpag med mthong nas ni/_/byang chub reg nas chos kyi bdag por 
[\[141b.7\]]'gyur/_/de phyir phan yon mchog 'di thos nas ni/_/dge slong tshul khrims mchog dang ldan mthong na/_/mkhas pas g.yo med rtag tu bstan par bya/_/ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin 'di 'thob 'gyur/_/gal te gter rnams dpag med tshad kyang med/_/rin chen sna bdun nor bus 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]gang gyur pa/_/de bzhin zhing rnams gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/nor bu rin po che yis gang ba rnams/_/byang chub sems dpa' sbyin la mos pa yis/_/nyin mtshan re rer sbyin pa 'di dag byin/_/de bzhin bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/rgyun mi 'chad par sbyin pa byin 
[\[142a.2\]]pa bas/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis ting 'dzin 'di/_/thos nas bde gshegs mdzod mchog 'dzin byed pa/_/bsod nams phung po des ni gang bzung ba/_/sbyin pa de kun de yi char mi phod/_/mi gang rjes su 'thun la dad pa dag_/ting 'dzin rdul bral mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/
[\[142a.3\]]bsod nams phung po dpe med mchog 'di yin/_/ye shes mdzod de dpag med 'byung gnas so/_/ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba 'di bzung na/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni nor chen 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du thos pa'i gter/_/de la bsod nams tshad yod yong mi 'gyur/_/chos 
[\[142a.4\]]kyi mchog rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/shin tu rgyas byas byang chub sems dpar brjod/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni su dag ston byed pa/_/de ni nam yang byang chub the tshom med/_/bsod nams phung po mchog dang gang ldan zhing /_/gang la tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/'jig 
[\[142a.5\]]rten slob dpon sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren/_/rang byung thugs rje chen po ma gtogs par/_/de yi 'og tu sems can su dag kyang /_/stong chen 'di ni bsod nams phung po dang /_/mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes kyis/_/mnyam par gyur pa nam yang yong med do/_/
[\[142a.6\]]ting 'dzin 'di ni thos nas 'dzin pa dang /_/klog cing yongs su chub par byed pa dang /_/mtshungs med sangs rgyas byang chub tshol ma gtogs/_/de yi ye shes mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni bzung zhing bklags pa yis/_/bsod nams phung po ji snyed bsags 
[\[142a.7\]]pa yang /_/gzhon nu ji ste chos de gzugs yod na/_/'jig rten khams mang 'dir yang shong mi 'gyur/_/gzhon nu de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang /_/'das dang 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'dod pa yis/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]'di ni gzung zhing bklag par gyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yin te/_/gzhon nu nga yi tshig la dad par gyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig mi gsung /_/'di 'dra'i sems can [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba med/_/sngon gyi bskal pa brgya phrag bsam yas su/_/byang chub
