[\[142b.2\]]spyad pa mchog 'di rab spyod cing /_/ting 'dzin 'di ni yongs su tshol ba'i phyir/_/ngas ni bdag tu lta ba 'dir sbyangs so/_/de phyir chos kyi mdzod 'di mnyan par gyis/_/'di las mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig 'byung /_/'di ni bsod nams phung po bsam yas yangs/_/'dis ni 
[\[142b.3\]]sangs rgyas ye shes myur du 'thob/_/mkhas pa 'jigs med de dag gang ston pa/_/'di ni mdo sde kun gyi dam pa'i mdo/_/dge ba bsam gyis mi khyab 'byung gnas te/_/chos de rnams la mtha' thug rnyed mi 'gyur/_/stong chen dag ni bcad cing bshig nas su/_/rdul gyi tshogs 
[\[142b.4\]]rnams bgrang bar nus na yang /_/mdo sde brgya phrag bsam yas tshad med pa/_/rgyun mi chad par de stong bgrang mi nus/_/sangs rgyas zhing gi sems can thams cad kyi/_/phyi nang rgyu ba'i dbugs ni bgrang nus kyang /_/ting 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang ston pa/_/mdo 
[\[142b.5\]]sde de dag mthar thug nus mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/'gro ba der yang sems can gang skyes pa/_/de dag sems ni bgrang bar nus kyang srid/_/rtag ston mdo sde de dag bgrang mi nus/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma ci yod dang /_/klung dang mtshe'u 
[\[142b.6\]]dang gshong gi bye ma dag_/bskal pa bye ba dag gis bgrang nus kyang /_/de dag 'chad pa'i mdo sde mtha' yas so/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni bye ba mang po na/_/chu yi phung po rtag 'dug ci yod pa/_/brgya tshal skra yi rtse mos bgrang nus kyang /_/de yi dbyangs kyi yan lag kun mi 'grangs/_/
[\[142b.7\]]gang sngon 'dir ni sems can ci 'byung ba/_/rang gi lus la snying por 'dogs pa rnams/_/bskal pa bye ba mang pos bgrang nus kyang /_/de dag mdo sde sgrub pa shes mi nus/_/phyogs bcu dag na sems can ci yod pa/_/srog chags kun gyi sgra skad bgrang nus kyang /_/de dag rtag tu mi 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]'chad ston pa yi/_/mdo sde de dag bgrang bar yong mi nus/_/chos rnams thams cad bstan par rab shes shing /_/nges pa'i tshig dang bstan pa tshig don mkhas/_/gtan la bab pa'i yang dag tshul la bslabs/_/blo gros yangs shing rtag dga' shes rab can/_/yangs 
[\[143a.2\]]pa'i don sems rab tu phye ba'i blo/_/bsam dang mi bsam pa yang rtag tu shes/_/dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rgya chen thams cad rig_/sgra dbyangs de dag ston kyang chags mi 'gyur/_/thogs med de ni chos smrar brjod pa ste/_/'gro ba kun la ston kyang chags mi 'gyur/_/dri ba nges par bstan 
[\[143a.3\]]pa brgya la mkhas/_/de ltar de yis don dam rab tu rtogs/_/mdo sde gcig gis phyogs kyang bye ba snyed/_/bsam gyis mi khyab des ston chags pa med/_/chags med ston pa tshig gi don la mkhas/_/'khor gyi nang du de 'chad chags mi 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin 'di la legs par gang gnas 
[\[143a.4\]]pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ni g.yo ba med/_/chos la stobs bskyed bye brag thob pas ni/_/srog chags bye ba mang po'i don de byed/_/ji ltar ri rab mi g.yo mi 'gul te/_/rlung rnams kun gyis 'gul bar mi nus pa/_/de bzhin dge slong chos smra mkhas pa yang /_/pha rol rgol 
[\[143a.5\]]ba kun gyis bskyod mi nus/_/stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams 'di na/_/ri gang mi g.yo bar ni brjod pa rnams/_/de dag rlung gis rab tu bskyod nus kyang /_/stong pa'i chos gnas dge slong bskyod mi nus/_/su dag stong pa nyid la rtag brtson pa/_/sangs rgyas gnas su nges pa de yin te/_/
[\[143a.6\]]gtan la bab pa stong pa'i chos rab shes/_/de ni rgol ba kun gyis dkrug mi nus/_/phas kyi rgol ba dag gis mi bskyod cing /_/smra ba thams cad kyis kyang zil mi non/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni bstan byas na/_/zil gyis mi non smad pa med par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni bshad 
[\[143a.7\]]byas na/_/de yis stong nyid rtogs par khong du chud/_/de ni chos rnams kun la nem nur med/_/ye shes mtha' yas dag la khor mor gnas/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni bzung zhing bklags pa na/_/stobs dang byang chub yan lag rnyed mi dka'/_/yang dag rig dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]de la mngon par shes pa rnyed mi dka'/_/mtha' yas ye shes rgyal ba mthong ba yang /_/srid par grub pa dag ni rnyed mi dka'/_/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab/_/ting 'dzin 'di 'chang de yis mthong bar 'gyur/_/de ni rgyal ba de dag thams cad las/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 
[\[143b.2\]]'di yang thos 'gyur te/_/yang dag rig dang dbang gi pha rol phyin/_/sangs rgyas ye shes mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/_/stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten khams 'di dag_/lha rdzas nor bu rin chen bzang mchog gis/_/'og nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/_/nor bu rin chen dag gis 
[\[143b.3\]]gang gyur dang /_/zhing yang mtha' yas rnam mang ji snyed pa/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser bkram gang ba kun/_/sa yi 'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/_/thams cad rgyal ba'i mchog la sbyin pa byin/_/sems can rnam pa mang po ji snyed pa/_/bskal pa mtha' yas mang por sbyin pa byin/_/
[\[143b.4\]]sangs rgyas rnams la khor mor mi chad byin/_/byang chub 'dod phyir byin pa'i sbyin tshogs la/_/dge slong gang dag stong nyid mngon dga' zhing /_/stobs bcu la ni thal sbyar phyag 'tshal na/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid mngon dga' la/_/sbyin pa'i phung po snga mas char mi 'phod/_/
[\[143b.5\]]bsod nams ldan pa'i mi des de rnyed nas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs med tshol ba'i phyir/_/dad pa rgya cher bskyed nas sbyin pa byin/_/de yi dpe 'di skyes bu dam pas bstan/_/su dag ting 'dzin dam pa'i mchog 'di las/_/tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad sems dga' 'dzin pa yang /_/
[\[143b.6\]]de yi bsod nams phung po bsags pa la/_/sbyin pa de kun brgya yi char mi phod/_/ting 'dzin rdul bral zhi ba ma thos par/_/phan byed byang chub sems dpas sbyin byin kyang /_/thos pas sangs rgyas ye shes myur thob ltar/_/de tsam sangs rgyas ye shes myur mi 'thob/_/gang gis zhing 
[\[143b.7\]]mchog sa 'di thob nas su/_/rdul bral ting 'dzin stong pa'i rigs 'di ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas rtogs byed pa/_/des ni sangs rgyas ye shes myur du 'thob/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi gter rnyed pa/_/zhing rnams mtha' yas gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/de dag lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyi/_/nor bu 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]rin po che yis gang bar gyur/_/byang chub sems dpas ting 'dzin 'di thob ste/_/rtag tu chub par byed cing mi ngoms pa/_/thul bar dka' zhing mdzod rnams shin tu mang /_/nor yang mang zhing rin chen nor dang ldan/_/ji ltar ting 'dzin rdul bral 'di thob nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' dga' zhing rangs pa 
[\[144a.2\]]ltar/_/rgyal srid shin tu 'byor cing rgyas thob kyang /_/mkhas pa de dag nam yang dgar mi 'gyur/_/de dang de dag sangs rgyas kun mkhyen gyi/_/chos rnams rtag tu 'dzin par byed pa yin/_/zad pa'i mthar thug dus su gyur pa'i tshe/_/chos kyi tshul mchog rgya cher 'dzin par 'gyur/_/chos kyi mdzod 'chang 
[\[144a.3\]]blo gros chen po 'chang /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyang 'chang ba yin/_/de dang de dag sems can bye stong dang /_/khrag khrig chos kyi dbyangs kyis mgu bar byed/_/de dag tshul khrims nor ldan blo gros can/_/skyes bu de dag bslabs pa'i nor gyis phyug_/de dang de dag tshul khrims brtul zhugs 
[\[144a.4\]]gnas/_/mngon dga' chos kyi sdong po'i myu gu yin/_/de dag chos gos ngur smrig rin chen 'chang /_/khyim nas 'byung la rtag tu dga' bar byed/_/de dag sems can phan phyir mnyam pa med/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu zhugs/_/de dag dul ba sems can ma dul 'dul/_/rtag par dul 
[\[144a.5\]]ba'i gnas dang rjes su ldan/_/de dag dul zhing rab dul rjes su song /_/zhi ba'i dbang po rab tu zhi ba yin/_/de dag sems can nyal ba gnyid log pa/_/rtag tu chos kyi skad kyis sad par byed/_/sems can dag ni sad par byas nas su/_/rin chen chos bzang mchog la 'god par byed/_/de 
[\[144a.6\]]dang de dag sbyin pa'i bdag po yin/_/khor mor rtag tu gtong la brkyang ba ste/_/mkhas pa de dag 'jungs dang 'grogs mi byed/_/gtong ba chen po dag la rtag tu dga'/_/de dag sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal rnams/_/mthong nas longs spyod kyis kyang tshim par byed/_/de dag sems can bde 
[\[144a.7\]]zhing phan pa'i phyir/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtag par zhugs/_/de dag ye shes rtag tu bslabs pa ste/_/chos kyi rnga yang rgya cher shin tu rdung /_/skye bo kun gyi the tshom 'khri shing gcod/_/rtag par ye shes la yang rab tu zhugs/_/de dag legs thos chos 'dzin rdul bral ba/_/'khor gyi 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]nang du stan la 'dug nas su/_/mkhas pa blo gros 'chang ba de dag ni/_/mdo sde bye ba brgya dag rab tu ston/_/de dang de dag mang du thos pa yin/_/thos pa 'dzin pa sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin/_/chos kyi mdzod rnams shin tu 'dzin byed de/_/thub pa'i chos kyi gter la dga' ba yin/_/de dang de dag shes rab 
[\[144b.2\]]yangs pa yin/_/dga' ba dag kyang rgya cher rtag tu skyed/_/zhib cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba blta dka' ba/_/zhi ba'i chos mchog rnams kyang rab tu ston/_/de dag chos dang chos min shes pa ste/_/des shing blo gros ldan pa chos la gnas/_/chos kyi rgyal srid rab tu ston byed cing /_/mtshungs med chos kyi 
[\[144b.3\]]mchog la rtag tu spyod/_/de dag chos kyi mchog la lhur byed de/_/bla ma la yang ri mo byed par gnas/_/chos kyi grong khyer mchog la gnas pa ste/_/blo gros ldan pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng /_/de dag dregs shing rgyags pa'i sems can rnams/_/rtag tu bag med pa la gnas pa mthong /_/rab tu ma 
[\[144b.4\]]rungs log pa'i lam song zhing /_/'khor ba'i lam la gnas pa mthong nas ni/_/de la byams dang snying rje rgya cher bskyed/_/dga' dang btang snyoms dag la'ang rab gnas te/_/de dag la ni yan lag brgyad ldan pa/_/lam mchog zhi ba blta dka' rab tu ston/_/de dang de dag legs byas chos kyi gru/_/
[\[144b.5\]]bshams nas 'khor ba'i rgyun tu song ba dag_/rgya mtsho chen por lhung zhing khyer ba yi/_/sems can mang po dag ni sgrol bar byed/_/byang chub yan lag stobs dang dbang po yis/_/go bgos dam pa'i chos kyi grur zhugs nas/_/pha rol 'gram bde rtag tu 'jigs med par/_/khor mor sems 
[\[144b.6\]]can rnams kyang 'god par byed/_/de dag sman pa'i gtso bo dka' thub la/_/shin tu spyad pa rig byed sman pa'i mchog_/rig pa ye shes rnam grol pha rol phyin/_/dam pa'i chos kyi rtsi yang sbyin par byed/_/nad ni rnam pa mang pos btab pa yi/_/sems can na ba dag kyang mthong nas su/_/de dag la ni 
[\[144b.7\]]chos kyi bkru sman gtong /_/chos rnams kyis ni de dag gso ba byed/_/de dag smra ba pha rol rgol ba 'joms/_/'jig rten dbang po tshig gi dbang phyug ldan/_/shes bya kun la 'od byed blo gros 'chang /_/ye shes dam pa'i sa la rab tu gnas/_/dpa' bo ye shes stobs ldan stobs 'joms pa/_/ye shes 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]ldan pa dag gis yang dag bsngags/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag_/chos la gnas nas shes pas mgu bar byed/_/de dang de dag bdag po ded dpon te/_/gsal ba sems can rnams kyi skyabs 'dod pa/_/sems can rin chen lam la rmongs gyur cing /_/rtag tu bdud kyi snying 
[\[145a.2\]]zhugs mthong nas ni/_/de dag la yang lam mchog zhi zhing bde/_/rtag par mya ngan 'das pa rab tu ston/_/mkhas pa dag ni ye shes lam de yis/_/sems can mang po bye brgya 'dren par byed/_/de dang de dag gnas dang rten du 'gyur/_/skyabs dang mig dang sgron ma byed pa yin/_/'jigs pa rnams 
[\[145a.3\]]la mi 'jigs rab tu sbyin/_/skrag pa rnams kyang rtag tu dbugs 'byin byed/_/de dag sems can shin tu sdug bsngal dang /_/dmus long gyur pa 'di dag rig nas ni/_/yang dag tshul bslabs rin chen chos rnams kyis/_/chos kyi snang ba dag kyang byed par 'gyur/_/'jig rten na ni bzo mchog ci yod 
[\[145a.4\]]pa/_/bzo bo byed pas sems can phan 'gyur zhing /_/gang gis sems can rtag tu bder 'gyur ba/_/bzo yi rnam pa de dag shin tu bslabs/_/su dag byang chub tu ni mngon zhugs te/_/blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten mig sbyin pa/_/bslabs pa rnams la mchog gi pha rol phyin/_/mkhas rab 'jig rten 
[\[145a.5\]]na yang ngo mtshar thob/_/sangs rgyas dag gi chos mchog thos pa yis/_/mtshungs pa med pa ngoms par yong mi 'gyur/_/tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin pha rol phyin/_/zab mo yi ni chos rnams shin tu thos/_/de dag zhi ba rin chen chos rnams ni/_/gzhan la ston pas ngoms par mi 'gyur te/_/
[\[145a.6\]]thar ba'i thabs kyi char yang rab 'bebs shing /_/chos kyis skyes bu dag ni tshim par byed/_/de yi drung du sems can mang po ni/_/chos 'dod mkhas pa ji snyed lhags nas su/_/chos mchog bzang po dam pa rin po che/_/drang zhing gsal ba'i lam rnams mnyan snyam pa/_/de dag blo gros 'chang bas 
[\[145a.7\]]the tshom bcad/_/chos kyis de dag shin tu mgu bar byed/_/tshul khrims bzod dang ting 'dzin pha rol phyin/_/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rab tu shes/_/ye shes ldan zhing ye shes mchog rab kyi/_/pha rol phyin pa sems can bsam la mkhas/_/sems can pha rol sems dang spyod pa dang /_/gang 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]dag gtam ni ci 'dra'i chos brjod pa/_/ye shes gtam ni brjod la gang dag gis/_/sems can khrag khrig chos mchog mig thob 'gyur/_/de dag ye shes bye brag pha rol phyin/_/lam rnams kyang ni nye bar ston par byed/_/mkhas pa de dag gi ni sems rnams kyang /_/bdud rnams bye ba stong gis yong mi 
[\[145b.2\]]shes/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la ni bya song ba/_/de yi rjes ni gang du'ang shes mi nus/_/ye shes stobs ldan dul zhing rab tu zhi/_/zhi ba 'phags pa'i ye shes dag la gnas/_/dpa' bo khyu mchog bdud rnams thams cad bcom/_/byang chub zhi ba mngon par 'tshang yang rgya/_/rtag tu rdzu 'phrul dag gi pha 
[\[145b.3\]]rol phyin/_/zhing yang brgya phrag mang por 'gro bar byed/_/sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig mthong /_/ji bzhin gang gA yi ni bye ma snyed/_/de yi mig kyang thogs par mi 'gyur te/_/phyogs bcu dag gi gzugs mang mthong bar 'gyur/_/ji snyed phyogs bcu yi ni srid pa na/_/sems can yod 
[\[145b.4\]]dgu de dag 'dren par gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag mang por ni/_/de dag de yi phan yon kun brjod cing /_/spobs pa yi ni rab tu bshad mdzad kyang /_/sngon gyi spyod pa'i bsngags pa zad mi nus/_/ting 'dzin mtshungs med rdul dang bral ba 'di/_/skyes bu su gang 'dzin par byed pa ni/_/
[\[145b.5\]]sangs rgyas dag gi nor rnams mi zad de/_/shin tu rgya che ye shes rgya mtsho bzhin/_/tshul khrims kyi phung po nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na byang chub 
[\[145b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo mtshar dang /_/rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'di dag dang /_gzhan yang tshad med pa 'dod pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 
[\[145b.7\]]mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_rab tu gdon par bya/_lung mnod cing kha ton du bya/_nyon mongs pa med par bsgom pas bsgom par bya/_gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]par bya/_des bzod pa'i stobs bsgom par bya/_bzod pa bsten par bya/_mang du bya/_chos la don du gnyer ba dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_chos dang rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas mchod pa la mngon par 
[\[146a.2\]]brtson par bya'o/_/des gnas gsum la brtson par bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyon mongs pa zad pa dang /_bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba la reg par 
[\[146a.3\]]'dod pa'i phyir ni ma yin te/_gnas gsum po de dag la mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la don 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir sngon byung ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di dag tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par 
[\[146a.4\]]rab tu bstan to/_/bskal pa stong du ji ltar ngas spyad pa/_/gzhon nur gyur pa nga las mnyan par gyis/_/ting 'dzin bzang po dam pa 'di tshol phyir/_/sangs rgyas dag ni stong phrag brgya yang mchod/_/de ltar bskal pa 'das pa bsam yas su/_/zhing brgya yi ni bye ma ci yod pa/_/dper 
[\[146a.5\]]bsten de snyed 'das par gyur pa na/_/tshogs kyi dbang phyug ces bya rgyal ba byung /_/bye ba stong phrag drug cu mi nyung ba/_/rgyal ba de yi tshogs ni byung gyur te/_/thams cad zag pa med cing nyon mongs zad/_/rnam thar brgyad la gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa/_/de yi dus na sa 'di thams 
[\[146a.6\]]cad kyang /_/bde zhing lo legs 'khrug pa med par gyur/_/mi rnams thams cad skyid cing bde dang ldan/_/mi yi bde ba dag gis rgyas par gyur/_/thams cad bsod nams stobs dang ldan pa ste/_/blta na sdug cing de bzhin dga' bar gyur/_/thams cad phyug cing nor mang 
[\[146a.7\]]'byor ba ste/_/lus ni lha yi bde dang ldan par gyur/_/des shing brtul zhugs bzang la nyon mongs chung /_/bzod pa'i stobs la dpa' zhing byad gzugs bzang /_/lha yi gnas na lha yi sras po bzhin/_/tshul khrims yon tan 'chang zhing blo gros ldan/_/de yi dus na sa 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]bdag byung ba ni/_/rgyal po me tog mchog ces bya ba yin/_/de yi bu yang lnga brgyar tshang bar byung /_/dran dang ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan par gyur/_/rgyal po'i bu de yis kyang rgyal ba yi/_/skyed mos tshal brgya stong phrag drug cu dag_/thams cad me tog 'bras bus brgyan pa yang /_/
[\[146b.2\]]thugs rje ldan pa de la rab tu phul/_/skyed mos tshal ni brgya stong sna tshogs dang /_/'chag sa mal stan bzhugs gnas stong rnams dang /_/chos gos kyang ni bye ba brgya stong gis/_/'chag sa bzhugs gnas rnams su gding ba byas/_/de ltar rnam pa du ma stong dag dang /_/dge 
[\[146b.3\]]sbyong dag gi longs spyod ji snyed pa/_/rgyal ba'i bu ni shin tu yid dad pas/_/bde gshegs de la thams cad nye bar phul/_/rgyal po de yang dge ba'i las bcu yi/_/lam la rab tu gnas par gyur nas su/_/skye bo srog chags khrag khrig brgya stong gis/_/mdun du bdar te 
[\[146b.4\]]'dren pa lta bar song /_/me tog dang ni byug pa bdug pa dang /_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sil snyan thogs nas su/_/rgyal ba de la de yis mchod byas te/_/thal mo sbyar nas spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/_/lha dang mi dang lha min gnod sbyin dang /_/dge slong stong yang de tshe dga' bar gyur/_/
[\[146b.5\]]rgyal ba mchod pa 'di ni lung ston tam/_/mi yi dbang po legs par chos gsung ngam/_/rgyal po'i bu de yi ni bsam pa dang /_/bla med sems kyang rang byung mkhyen nas ni/_/mos pa'i gnas la pha rol phyin pa yis/_/de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad do/_/gang tshe bde bar gshegs pas 
[\[146b.6\]]gsung phyung ba/_/de tshe nags tshal bcas pa'i sa yang g.yos/_/nam mkha' las ni me tog char kyang bab/_/sa las pad ma brgya dag byung bar gyur/_/ston pa don gyi tshig la rab bslabs pas/_/bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dren pas lung bstan te/_/mi yi dbang pos ting 'dzin zhi ba 
[\[146b.7\]]bshad/_/de yi don tshig rnams kyang mnyan par gyis/_/srid pa thams cad srid pa med pa ste/_/kun brtags gsog dang smig rgyu 'dra ba yin/_/sgyu ma ji bzhin glog dang sprin 'dra ste/_/stong g.yo bdag dang sems can srog kun med/_/gzod ma nas ni stong zhing ma 'ongs chos/_/song ba 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]med cing gnas med gnas kyis dben/_/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtag tu snying po med/_/thams cad dag cing rnam dag nam mkha' bzhin/_/mi sngo mi ser dkar po ma yin te/_/ming ni gsog gyur sgra yi rang bzhin yin/_/sems ni dben zhing sems med rang bzhin te/_/skad cig yin pas thams cad sgra dang bral/_/
[\[147a.2\]]bshad pa na yang yi ge 'pho ba med/_/ma bshad na yang yi ge 'grib mi 'gyur/_/yi ge dag ni phyogs su'ang mi 'gro ste/_/yi ge gang nas kyang ni 'ongs ma yin/_/yi ge mi zad zad cing 'gags pa ste/_/bshad par byas sam bshad par ma byas kyang /_/yi ge 'di dag rtag par 
[\[147a.3\]]mi zad brjod/_/gang gis yongs shes de yang zad mi 'gyur/_/chos ni stong phrag brgya dag rab brjod nas/_/sangs rgyas brgya stong dag ni gang 'das pa/_/chos kyang ma zad yi ge'ang zad ma gyur/_/skye ba yang med de phyir mi zad pa/_/gang gis mi zad chos rnams rab shes pa/_/rtag 
[\[147a.4\]]tu mi zad pa yi chos shes pas/_/mdo sde brgya stong dag ni bshad byas kyang /_/chos rnams thams cad yi ge med par shes/_/rgyal ba'i chos ni gang dag rab ston pa/_/de yang mi zad pas na mi mthong ste/_/chos 'di snga nas bdag med sems can med/_/de dag rab tu ston kyang zad mi 
[\[147a.5\]]'gyur/_/mkhas pa de ni tshig kun smra byed kyang /_/tshig gis sems ni 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te/_/tshig rnams thams cad ri yi brag ca bzhin/_/de phyir nam yang tshig la chags mi 'gyur/_/de ni sgyu ma'i tshig gis chos ston te/_/tshig de thams cad de yi mod la 'gags/_/
[\[147a.6\]]tshig de yi ni mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba/_/chos rnams kun kyang mtshan nyid de 'drar gyur/_/chos kun mtshan gzhi med cing mtshan gzhi bral/_/thams cad mtshan med mtshan nyid rnam par dag_/rtag tu dben zhing gtsang ba nam mkha' bzhin/_/mdor na de dag bgrang bar nyer mi 'gyur/_/
[\[147a.7\]]'dus byas 'dus ma byas kun dben pa ste/_/drang srong de dag la ni rnam rtog med/_/'gro ba kun tu 'dus ma byas thob pas/_/lta ba dag las khor mor rnam par dben/_/gang dag 'di 'dra'i chos rnams shes pa ni/_/rtag tu ma chags mi gtum ma rmongs te/_/de yi sems ni rang 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]bzhin mnyam par bzhag_/de ni ting 'dzin stobs can stobs dang ldan/_/brag phug ri dang gcong rong klung rnams su/_/rkyen gyis ji ltar brag ca 'byung ba ltar/_/de bzhin 'dus byas 'di kun rig par gyis/_/'jig rten thams cad sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin/_/gang du ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di 
[\[147b.2\]]bshad pa/_/yon tan chos su gyur pa shes rab stobs/_/drang srong ye shes stobs kyis mngon par shes/_/tshig ni thabs mkhas pa yi nges pa'i tshig_/brtags pa tsam du brtags nas brjod pa yin/_/'khor ba la ni mtha' ma mi rnyed de/_/gang dag sngon byung mtha' ni mtshan 
[\[147b.3\]]nyid med/_/ma 'ongs dus kyang shes par bya ba'i phyir/_/las dang bya bas de ltar zhugs gyur te/_/rab dang tha ma dag tu'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/chos rnams rtag tu dben zhing rang bzhin stong /_/thams cad bdag med par yang shes par gyis/_/kun rdzob tu ni rgyal bas 
[\[147b.4\]]chos bshad de/_/'dus byas 'dus byas ma yin de ltar ltos/_/yang dag nyid du bdag dang mi med de/_/'gro ba kun gyi mtshan nyid de 'dra'o/_/dge dang nag po'i las rnams mi 'jig ste/_/bdag gis byas pa dag ni myong bar 'gyur/_/las kyi 'bras bu 'pho bar 
[\[147b.5\]]mi 'gyur te/_/rgyu med par yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/srid pa thams cad sgyu ma dbang med pa/_/gsog dang gsob tu gyur pa dbu ba bzhin/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur rtag tu stong /_/sgra yis de bshad de dag dben pa yin/_/de ltar rnam par rig pa rlom sems med/_/tshul 
[\[147b.6\]]khrims la yang chags pa med pa'i sems/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis cung zad mi rtog ste/_/de ltar spyod pa mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur/_/rgyal po des ni ji tsam chos rig pa/_/de tsam du ni rgyal ba des bshad de/_/rgyal pos rgyal ba'i chos 'di thos nas ni/_/'khor 
[\[147b.7\]]dang bcas pas bslab pa yang dag bzung /_/rgyal po'i bu des ting 'dzin 'di mnyan nas/_/dga' zhing yi rangs tshig kyang 'di skad smra/_/shin tu legs par ting 'dzin 'di bshad de/_/khyod kyi zhabs la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/_/der yang srog chags stong phrag brgyad cu dag_/
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]yang dag don dam nges par bstan pa 'di/_/chos kyi rang bzhin bzang po 'di thos nas/_/de dag mi skye ba yi bzod pa thob/_/skyes bu la ni skye dang 'gag pa med/_/de bzhin chos 'di rtag tu snga nas dben/_/de ltar rab shes yongs su mi 'bri ste/_/rgyal pos mi skye bzod 
[\[148a.2\]]pa thob par gyur/_/de tshe rgyal pos rgyal srid rnam spangs te/_/rgyal ba de yi bstan la rab tu byung /_/rgyal po'i sras kyang lnga brgya mi nyung ba/_/de dag kun kyang rjes su rab tu byung /_/rgyal po sras dang bcas pa rab byung nas/_/de tshe srog chags mang po stong gzhan yang /_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[148a.3\]]pa'i drung du rab tu byung /_/rgyal ba de la chos rnams tshol bar byed/_/lo ni brgya phrag nyi shur yongs tshang bar/_/rgyal ba des ni chos rnams rab tu bshad/_/rgyal po bur bcas skye bor bcas pa yis/_/lo yang brgya phrag nyi shur chos rnams spyad/_/de nas dus kyang gzhan du gyur 
[\[148a.4\]]pa'i tshe/_/rgyal ba de yang yongs su mya ngan 'das/_/rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'das par gyur/_/de yi chos rnams kyang ni nyung bar gyur/_/de tshe rgyal po de yi bu yod pa/_/bsod nams blo gros dad cing dang ba ste/_/de yi khyim du nyer 'gro dge slong yod/_/des ni ting 'dzin zhi ba 
[\[148a.5\]]'di yang bshad/_/de ni 'jam zhing mnyen par gyur pa ste/_/srog chags brgya stong dag gis bkur sti byas/_/lha yang bye ba brgya dag phyir 'brang zhing /_/grong du 'ongs nas bsngags pa rjod par byed/_/de ni dran dang ldan zhing rtogs par ldan/_/brtul zhugs bzang zhing des pa tshul khrims 
[\[148a.6\]]dga'/_/dbyangs kyang snyan cing mi rtsub 'jam pa ste/_/khams rnams shes pa'i dbang mchog rab tu thob/_/dge slong de ni snyan pa'i 'od ces bya/_/chos gos bye ba brgya yang rab tu rnyed/_/de yi bsod nams stobs ni mi bzod pas/_/de tshe dge slong stong dag phrag dog skyes/_/bsod nams stobs dang 
[\[148a.7\]]gzugs kyi stobs rnams dang /_/ye shes stobs dang rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang /_/tshul khrims stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs rnams dang /_/chos kyi stobs kyis dge slong yang dag 'phags/_/skye bo'i yid du 'ong zhing phangs pa ste/_/dge slong dge bsnyen dang ni dge slong ma/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la sems 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]can gang dad pa/_/de dag gis ni mchod cing bkur ba yin/_/rgyal po'i bu ni der yang gang byung ba/_/bsod nams blo gros rtag tu dad mos te/_/dge slong mang po yid 'khrug rig nas ni/_/slob dpon de la srung ba byed du btsud/_/srog chags dag ni stong phrag lnga brgya rnams/_/go bgos mtshon cha 
[\[148b.2\]]ral gri dbyug thogs pa/_/de dag gis ni dge slong rtag tu bskor/_/yang dag spyod pa mu med 'chad cing smra/_/de ni 'khor la chos rnams rab ston te/_/chos 'di bdag med stong pa srog med 'chad/_/dmigs par lta ba bdag la chags pa rnams/_/de dag dge slong ci smra mos mi byed/_/su dag 
[\[148b.3\]]stong pa zhi ba mi 'dod pa/_/dge slong 'di ni chos min rab ston gyis/_/'di bsad na ni bsod nams 'gyur zhes nas/_/dge slong dag ni lag na mtshon thogs 'ongs/_/mthong nas dge slong mtshon gyis mi 'jigs te/_/'di la sems can skyes bu gsod pa med/_/chos 'di rnams ni gsog ste rtsig pa 'dra/_/
[\[148b.4\]]stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams rjes su dran/_/dge slong des ni spyi bor thal sbyar te/_/tshig smras rgyal ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bden pa gang gis chos 'di stong pa na/_/mtshon cha 'di rnams me tog man dAr gyur/_/thub pa tshul khrims brtul zhugs ldan pa yis/_/gzhan du mi 'gyur tshig 'di smras ma 
[\[148b.5\]]thag_/nags tshal bcas pa'i sa yang rab tu g.yos/_/mtshon cha de dag me tog man dAr gyur/_/dmigs pa can dag mtshon cha thogs pa yi/_/dge slong de tshe lus ni zhum gyur nas/_/tshur yang de nas nye bar 'ong ma nus/_/skrag cing shin tu ngo mtshar chen por gyur/_/su dag thub dbang la ni dad mos shing /_/gang 
[\[148b.6\]]dag stong pa zhi ba 'dod pa rnams/_/de dag a la la stong brjod nas su/_/ras bcos brgya yis dge slong mngon par g.yogs/_/dge slong de ni de la byams bskyed nas/_/sems can su dag nga la sdang byed pa/_/de dag phyir ni byang chub bdag spyod ces/_/skye bo thams cad kyi yang mdun du smra/_/des ni 
[\[148b.7\]]lo yang brgyad cu mi nyung bar/_/stong pa rgyal ba rnams kyi mdzod bshad de/_/phyir rgol ba yang dge slong stong dag byung /_/de dag rgyal po'i bu yis phyir bzlog byas/_/de yang de tshe yongs su brnyas gyur te/_/de yi dge slong dag kyang nyung bar gyur/_/de tshe mi snyan pa yi tshig thos kyang /_/
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]bzod pa'i stobs las nam yang nyams ma gyur/_/de ni gzhan gyi dus su gyur pa'i tshe/_/srog chags brgya dag gi yang don chen byas/_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyang rjes su dran/_/bsod nams blo gros dga' ba chen po skyes/_/der yang ri mo rgya 
[\[149a.2\]]cher byas nas ni/_/dge slong de la bsod nams blo gros smras/_/bdag gi slob dpon la ni su yis kyang /_/sems la mi 'thad ci zhig ma bgyis sam/_/des smras rgyal sras gzhon nu gsan du gsol/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag byung /_/
[\[149a.3\]]su yis bdag la mi snyan tshig smras pa/_/de la bdag ni byams pa rgya yang che/_/gang gis bskal pa stong phrag brgya dag tu/_/sngon gyi srid pa la ni bzod bsgoms pa/_/dge slong snyan 'od de ni nga yin zhes/_/bcom ldan shAkya thub pas tshig brjod do/_/gang gis 
[\[149a.4\]]dge slong snyan 'od bsrungs pa yi/_/bsod nams blo gros rgyal po'i bu de ni/_/tshe rabs stong du nga yi grogs gyur te/_/sangs rgyas byams par ngas ni lung bstan to/_/gang gis ston pa tshogs kyi dbang phyug mchod/_/gang gis gnas khang bzang po mchog byas pa/_/gang sngon 
[\[149a.5\]]me tog bzang zhes bya ba de/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo mi yi dbang por gyur/_/de ltar bskal pa mang po mtha' yas par/_/rgyal ba dag gi dam chos ngas bzung ste/_/ngas sngon bzod pa'i stobs kyang yang dag bsgrubs/_/gzhon nu thos nas nga yi rjes su slobs/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das 
[\[149a.6\]]gyur phyi ma'i tshe/_/dam pa'i chos ni rnam par 'jig pa na/_/dge slong mu stegs blo la brtson pa dag_/de dag nga yi zhi ba'i chos la spong /_/khengs shing rgod la gtum zhing spyi brtol che/_/sdig pa'i grogs po'i zas la chags pa dag_/chos gos lhung bzed dag la chags 
[\[149a.7\]]shing brkam/_/rnyed la gnas shing de dag chos la spong /_/de dag yid gtum zhe sdang byas mi gzo/_/dma' ba'i rigs dang dbul ba'i rigs las ni/_/nga yi bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas/_/de dag zhi ba'i chos 'di spong bar byed/_/bdud kyi blo yis sems can mun gtibs shing /_/'dod 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]chags dbang du song bas mngon par chags/_/gti mug dbang gis byis pa rmongs pas na/_/de dag stong pa zhi ba'i chos mi 'dod/_/dge slong dge slong ma dang khyim pa rnams/_/sdig pa'i blo yis 'dzin bcug rmongs byas te/_/de dag dbang du rtag par song gyur pas/_/phyi ma'i 
[\[149b.2\]]dus la byang chub spong bar byed/_/nga yi tshig 'di gzhon nu thos nas su/_/dge slong dgon pa pa dag rtag tu sten/_/su dag stong pa zhi la dga' ba ni/_/de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di bzung ba yin/_/su dag ting 'dzin 'di ni 'dzin gyur pa/_/de dag nga yi bstan la rab byung zhing /_/
[\[149b.3\]]dge slong bsnyen rdzogs gso sbyong las rnams byas/_/zas la mi chags mi brkam za ba yin/_/lus dang srog la lta ba rab spangs la/_/stong pa shin tu zhi ba sgom par gyis/_/brtson zhing rab tu brtson pa'i yid kyis kyang /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du dgon par gnas par gyis/_/
[\[149b.4\]]rgyal ba dag la rtag tu mchod pa gyis/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba gnas khang gis/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod par gyis/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni myur du thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub phyir ni sems kyang skyed gyis la/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi mchod 
[\[149b.5\]]rten dag_/gser gyis brgyan cing dngul gyis bskus pa dang /_/rin chen sna tshogs gzugs legs byed du chug_/byang chub phyir ni yi dam bca' gyis la/_/'jig rten mchod pa bzang po ji snyed pa/_/lha dang mi yi dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams/_thams cad tshol la sangs rgyas 
[\[149b.6\]]mchod pa gyis/_/chos nyid du yang mi dbang thams cad ltos/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs dang /_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa kun snang ste/_/chos nyid kyis ni sangs rgyas mngon sum bzhugs/_/gtong ba kun la shin tu mos par gyis/_/tshul khrims dag par gyur 
[\[149b.7\]]cing brtan pa'i sems/_/bzod la dga' zhing rtag tu byams la dga'/_/chos rnams thams cad stong par shes par gyis/_/ma zhum ma 'gong brtson 'grus rab skyed la/_/bsam gtan dga' zhing rab tu dben la mos/_/shes rab rnam dag shes rab rab shes kyis/_/ring por 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]mi thogs snying rje ldan par 'gyur/_/mi gtsang bas ni 'dod chags rtag zhi gyis/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis zhe sdang tshar chod cig_/shes rab stobs kyis gti mug bsal bar gyis/_/rgyal bas bsngags pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/lus ni snying po med 
[\[150a.2\]]cing dbu ba 'dra/_/sdug bsngal rul ba dri nga bsgom par gyis/_/phung po thams cad gsog tu shes par gyis/_/ye shes bla med myur du thob par 'gyur/_/bdag dang skyes bu dang ni srog rnams su/_/sdig pa'i lta ba nam yang ma 'dzin cig_/chos rnams thams cad stong par 
[\[150a.3\]]shes par gyis/_/bla med byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur/_/rnyed la chags par nam yang ma byed cig_/zas rnams ma rnyed na yang gdung ma byed/_/bstod dang smad pa dag gis ma g.yo bar/_/ri rab bzhin du rab tu mi 'gul gyis/_/gus pa skyed la chos rnams btsal bar 
[\[150a.4\]]gyis/_/thos nas de tshe de yang myong bar gyis/_/rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul gnas gyis dang /_/bde ba can gyi zhing du myur du 'gro/_/'gro ba kun la sems kyang mnyam gyis la/_/sdug dang mi sdug pa yi sems ma byed/_/rnyed dang snyan pa dag ni ma tshol cig_/myur du sangs 
[\[150a.5\]]rgyas thub pa'i dbang por 'gyur/_/yon tan gang thos sems can dad 'gyur zhing /_/sangs rgyas yon tan dag la mos skyed pa/_/yang dag yon tan nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu bshad par gyis/_/rtag tu slob dpon dang ni pha dang ma/_/de bzhin 
[\[150a.6\]]'gro ba kun la gus par gyis/_/nga rgyal dag gi dbang du ma 'gro shig_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams thob par 'gyur/_/'du 'dzi dag ni ma lus rnam spangs nas/_/rtag tu dben pa la yang dga' bar gyis/_/des shing brtul zhugs bzang la rtag tu zhi/_/bdag la phan zhing 
[\[150a.7\]]sems can gzhan la phan/_/byams pa dang ni snying rje bsgom par gyis/_/dga' dang btang snyoms la yang rtag mos gyis/_/rtag tu rgyal ba'i bstan pa rjes su ltos/_/'jig rten du yang myur du phan byed 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i grogs po nam yang ma sten par/_/grogs po gang dag 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]rgya cher sten par gyis/_/su dag stong pa zhi ba 'di 'dod pa/_/de dag byang chub mchog la zhugs pa yin/_/nyan thos sar ni nam yang ma slob shig_/de yi spyod la'ang dga' bar ma byed cig_/sangs rgyas yon tan dag las sems ma btang /_/myur du sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i 
[\[150b.2\]]dbang por 'gyur/_/bden tshig dam pa rtag tu smra bar gyis/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]rnams dang ni rtsub po'i tshig ma smra/_/rtag tu 'jam zhing dga' ba smra bar gyis/_/'jig rten slob dpon dag gi gsung thob 'gyur/_/lus dang srog la chags par ma byed cig_/gzhan la smod cing bdag 
[\[150b.3\]]la stod ma byed/_/bdag gi yon tan yang dag sgrub gyis la/_/gzhan gyi spyod pa dag la btang snyoms gyis/_/rnam thar stong la rtag tu dga' bar gyis/_/'gro ba rnams su smon par ma byed cig_/mtshan ma thams cad ma lus rnam par spongs/_/rtag tu mtshan ma med la gnas 
[\[150b.4\]]par gyis/_/dus kun tu ni mtha' yang rnam par spongs/_/rtag dang chad la gnas par ma gyur cig_/thams cad rkyen las gyur par rtag rig gyis/_/de ltar byas na ston pa ji bzhin 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i dga' ba rnams la dga' ba spongs/_/zhe sdang tha ba dri ma rnam spangs 
[\[150b.5\]]shing /_/gti mug mun pa thams cad rnam bsal na/_/zhi bar dga' ba'i mi yi seng ger 'gyur/_/rtag pa mi rtag par yang rtag tu ltos/_/srid pa kun gyi sdug bsngal bde grol zhing /_/bdag dang gtsang la mi gtsang bdag med par/_/bsgom par byas na mi yi dbang por 
[\[150b.6\]]'gyur/_/'jig rten sgron mdzad rgyal ba rnams kyis ni/_/gang la tshul bzhin chos rnams rab bstan pa/_/de yis bdud kyi stobs rnams bcom nas su/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub yangs pa thob/_/yon tan ji snyed ngas bshad thob byas te/_/nyes pa brgya dag ngas ni gang bstan 
[\[150b.7\]]pa/_/rnam par spangs nas slob par byed pa ni/_/gzhon nu de tshe 'dir yang sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/snyan pa'i 'od kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gzhon nu lus kyi sdom pas bsdam par bya'o zhes gzhon nu de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/gzhon nu de la lus kyi sdom pa gang zhe na/_/lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[151a.2\]]dpa' chen po chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'gyur ba de ni lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhon nu lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/lus 
[\[151a.3\]]kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bcu 'thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_
[\[151a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni/_gzhon nu lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'thob ste/_/gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[151a.5\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum 'thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni gzhon nu lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi 'thob ste/_bzhi 
[\[151a.6\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po 'di bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang 
[\[151a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]rig pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 'di bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'thob ste/_sum cu rtsa bdun gang zhe na/_
[\[151b.2\]]'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum 
[\[151b.3\]]cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la gnas pa thob pa dang /_btang snyoms chen po la gnas pa 'thob pa dang /_bde ba'i rnam par rtog pa 'thob pa 
[\[151b.4\]]dang /_rab tu dben pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang gzhon nu lus kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs 
[\[151b.5\]]par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma'i tshig dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_khyal par smra ba dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba dang /_srang la g.yo byed pa dang /_tshad la g.yo byed pa dang /_nor la g.yo byed pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_
[\[151b.6\]]bcing ba dang /_gtse ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_gcad pa dang /_dbug pa dang /_zhe la gnon pa dang /_chags pa dang /_ser sna ma spangs par 'gyur ba dang /_lag pa rgod pa dang /_rkang pa rgod pa dang /_rkang lag ma bsdams pa dang /_de'i lus 
[\[151b.7\]]dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len spangs shing ta la'i mgo bcad pa bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu de'i lus kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhon nu de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_gzhon nu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/_yangs pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs 
[\[152a.2\]]pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das ye shes snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[152a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cur gyur to/_/dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag drug cu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang dpag tu med pa byung ngo /_/gzhon nu de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[152a.4\]]rgyal po khyad par sems zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_rgyal po khyad par sems de srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'ongs so/_/'ongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum 
[\[152a.5\]]bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/rgyal po khyad par sems phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de nas ye shes snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rgyal po khyad par sems 'khor 
[\[152a.6\]]dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las lus kyi sdom pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor 'jug pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/ji ltar bar snang nam mkha' rnam dag ste/_/shin tu dag cing rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/
[\[152a.7\]]de bzhin lus kyi sdom pa dag pa yang /_/dbyangs kyis bstan par nam yang nus mi 'gyur/_/lus kyi sdom pa 'di ni dben zhing stong /_/'di 'dra gnyis po lus kyi mtshan nyid de/_/de dag mtshan nyid med pa bar snang bzhin/_/lus kyi sdom pa de yi mtshan nyid bshad/_/sdom pa'i 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]mtshan nyid de 'drar sus shes pa/_/de la sdom pa nam yang med mi 'gyur/_/mi 'jug de yi spyod yul ga la yin/_/zag pa med pa la ni skye ba med/_/gzugs dang longs spyod la ni srid bskyed nas/_/'dod pa dag la sten pas mi nus te/_/srid pa dag gi nyes pa mi shes 
[\[152b.2\]]pas/_/lus kyi sdom pa 'di ni shes mi nus/_/zag med sdom pa gang gis rab shes pa/_/de la skye ba nam yang yod mi 'gyur/_/dgra bcom pa yi chos ni de 'dra ste/_/mu stegs can gyis shes par sla ma yin/_/gang dag khams gsum kun la yid skrag cing /_/'dod 
[\[152b.3\]]pa'i longs spyod la yang 'dod mi skyed/_/rgyal po'i srid dang longs spyod yong mi 'dod/_/de dag lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra shes/_/lus kyi sdom pa 'di ni don ces bya/_/don ni sgra yis bstan par mi nus te/_/'di 'dra'i chos kyi tshul ni gang shes pa/_/de ni sdom pa 'di la gnas 
[\[152b.4\]]pa yin/_/don la zhugs la ngas ni don bstan te/_/mkhas pa su dag don gyi tshul la mos/_/don med rnam spangs don la gnas pa rnams/_/de dag sdom la rtag tu gnas pa yin/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la don du gang brjod dang /_/ji lta bur ni don yin rnam rig ste/_/don tshul rang 
[\[152b.5\]]bzhin gang gis shes pa ni/_/lus kyi sdom pa la yang gnas zhes bya/_/gang gis bdag med gsog dang stong nyid dang /_/mtshan ma med par rnam par rig gyur pa/_/de la nam yang sdom pa med mi 'gyur/_/'di ltar des ni yang dag nges la bslabs/_/dngos po dag ni dngos med gang rig pa/_/
[\[152b.6\]]de ni dngos po dag la yong mi chags/_/dngos po kun la nam yang mi chags pa/_/de ni mtshan med ting 'dzin reg par 'gyur/_/ngo bo nyid stong rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/bdag med chos rnams de yis rnam rig na/_/de la nam yang sdom pa med mi 'gyur/_/'di ltar des ni yang dag 
[\[152b.7\]]nges par rtogs/_/gang gis phung po lnga rnams stong par shes/_/rang bzhin stong zhing bdag med rig na ni/_/lus kyis las gang yang dag spyod byed pa/_/de la nam yang sdom pa med mi 'gyur/_/mtshan ma dag la 'dzin cing ma bsdams te/_/khor mor bdag tu 'du shes rab gnas pa/_/
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]gzugs la chags par gyur pa'i skye bo dag_/ma bsdams pa yi 'dod chags rab tu ldang /_/gang rnams yang dag mtha' la bslabs gyur cing /_/stong pa rtogs par rig pa des pa dag_/sdom med gang gis ngan 'gror 'gro ba yis/_/'dod chags de la nam 
[\[153a.2\]]yang ldang ba med/_/ji ltar ri rab dag ni chen po la/_/grog ma kun gyis g.yos shing 'gul mi nus/_/de bzhin mkhas pa yang dag tshul bslabs pas/_/lha yi gzugs kyis kyang ni de mi g.yos/_/nam mkha' la ni ri mor bri nus shing /_/lag pas nam mkha' gzung du rung 
[\[153a.3\]]gyur kyang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang bdud rnams bye ba yis/_/de la rnam par bskyod par yong mi nus/_/la las brag ca dag ni gzung nus shing /_/chu yi steng na rdo yang 'phyo gyur kyang /_/lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra sus bslabs pa/_/de yi bsam pa dag kyang bltar mi nus/_/
[\[153a.4\]]'jig rten kun na sgra mang ji snyed pa/_/gzung ste sgrom du gzhug par nus gyur kyang /_/lus kyi sdom pa'i gnas dang mi gnas pa/_/sus kyang rnam par rig par byed mi nus/_/sprin las sgra bsgrags glog rnams rgyu ba dang /_/nyi ma'i 'khor los 'od zer gzung nus kyang /_/lus kyi 
[\[153a.5\]]sdom pa 'di la sus bslabs pa/_/de yi rang bzhin shes par nus mi 'gyur/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir ldang ba ni/_/rgya dang snyi yis gzung bar nus gyur kyang /_/lus kyi sdom pa 'di la gang gnas pa/_/de yi lus ni nams kyang shes mi nus/_/srog chags kun gyi 
[\[153a.6\]]spyod yul de ma yin/_/sems sdom gang la mkhas pa de gnas shing /_/spyod yul gang gnas lus kyi sdom pa ni/_/'jig rten chos kyis mi gos nam mkha' bzhin/_/phyogs bzhir nam mkha' la ni rgyu ba yis/_/srog chags kun rjes so sor blta nus kyang /_/de yi lus 
[\[153a.7\]]dang sems kyi spyod yul la/_/tshad gzung bar ni su yang nus pa med/_/lus kyi sdom pa 'di la gang gnas pa'i/_/nyon mongs rnam mang thams cad med par 'gyur/_/de yi nyon mongs nye ba rab tu spangs/_/'di ltar des ni lus kyi sdom pa bslabs/_/de la mtshon cha dang ni 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]mes mi tshugs/_/de ltar de yi lus ni gzung du med/_/de ni zhi ba rab zhi ting 'dzin gnas/_/'di ltar des ni lus kyi sdom pa bslabs/_/de ltar gnas pa 'jigs med skrag pa med/_/de la 'khrug sems mi skye phrag dog med/_/lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra sus bslabs pa/_/
[\[153b.2\]]de ni gtse ba kun las thar ba yin/_dug dang mtshon gyis nam yang mi 'jigs shing /_/me dang chu yi nang na'ang 'jigs pa med/_/lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra sus bslabs pa/_/de ni gtse ba kun las thar ba yin/_/chom rkun g.yon can sdig pa byed pa dang /_/sbrul gdug 
[\[153b.3\]]nang du song yang 'jigs med de/_/'di ltar de ni bdag tu 'du shes med/_/'du shes rnam par grol la 'jigs mi 'byung /_/'jigs las rnam par grol ba skrag mi skye/_/skrag pa med la g.yo ba mi 'byung ste/_/mi g.yo ba la skrag pa ga la yod/_/de ni bdud rnams 
[\[153b.4\]]bye bas bskyod mi nus/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/sdom pa gang spyod bshad cing rab bstan pa/_/'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom pa sus bslabs pa/_/de ni bdud rnams bye bas bskyod mi nus/_/chos rnams kun la ye shes thogs pa med/_/dpe byad 
[\[153b.5\]]bzang po brgyad cu yongs su tshang /_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi ri mo dag_/sdom par gnas la rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab cing /_/tshad kyang med par rtogs par su 'dod pa/_/'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom pa des slobs shig_/
[\[153b.6\]]'jig rten thams cad kyi yang mchod rten 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas stobs bcu mnga' ba bsam mi khyab/_/drang srong chen po'i chos 'di gang 'dod pa/_/des ni lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra slobs/_/gang slob de la stobs rnams rnyed mi dka'/_/'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom la gang slob pa/_/
[\[153b.7\]]sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po/_/rgyal ba gang la rab tu gnas pa yang /_/de dag de la rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/'di 'dra'i lus kyi sdom pa gang slob pa/_/drang srong chen po'i byang chub yan lag bdun/_/so so yang dag rig dang rdzu 'phrul rkang /_/de la de 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]dag rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang ni bsam gtan dang /_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams gang bshad dang /_/bde ba'i rnam rtog rab tu dben pa yang /_/sdom par gnas pa la ni rnyed mi dka'/_/lus kyi sdom pa la ni gang gnas pa/_/
[\[154a.2\]]snying rje'i gnas dang btang snyoms thob par 'gyur/_/de bzhin spyod pa 'jug pa byams pa'i mchog_/'gro ba kun la'ang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur/_/dran pa nyer gzhag yang dag spong ba dang /_/drang srong chen po'i dbang lnga stobs lnga dang /_/'phags pa'i lam mchog 
[\[154a.3\]]yan lag brgyad po yang /_/lus kyi sdom par gnas la rnyed mi dka'/_/gzhan yang dam pa sangs rgyas chos rnams ni/_/bsam gyis mi khyab gang la tshad med pa/_/lus kyi sdom pa 'di 'dra sus bslabs pa/_/de la thams cad rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur/_/'di 
[\[154a.4\]]'dra'i lus kyi sdom pa thos nas ni/_/rgyal po glang mchog khyad par thob gyur te/_/dga' ba mtshungs med rangs shing mgu ba skyes/_/rgyal ba de yi bstan la rab tu byung /_/rab tu de byung lo yang bye phrag bcur/_/tshangs par spyod mchog gtsang ma spyad par gyur/_/lha 
[\[154a.5\]]dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten phan pa'i phyir/_/tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la yang bsgom pa byas/_/tshangs pa'i gnas la shin tu bsgom byas pas/_/sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu mthong bar gyur/_/de las lhag par gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/des ni tshangs spyod mchog 'di rab 
[\[154a.6\]]tu spyad/_/thams cad kyi yang bstan par rab byung ste/_/tshangs par spyod pa bzang zhing dag par spyad/_/mang du thos shing spobs par ldan pa yi/_/dge slong chos smra ba yang mchog tu gyur/_/lus kyi sdom pa 'di ni rab shes na/_/tshul khrims ma dral tshul khrims skyon med 
[\[154a.7\]]'gyur/_/tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims 'dres pa med/_/'phags pa'i tshul khrims zag pa med la gnas/_/de tshe rgyal po glang mchog khyad par sems/_/gzhon nu gzhan zhig yin par sems gyur na/_/de ni gzhan zhig yin par mi blta ste/_/nga ni spyad pa spyod 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]tshe der gyur to/_/de phyir gzhon nu nga yi rjes slobs la/_/lus kyi sdom pa 'di la gnas par gyis/_/srog chags bye ba gzhan la'ang rab ston dang /_/ring por mi thogs ji bzhin nga 'drar 'gyur/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[154b.2\]]gzhon nu de lta bas na lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dmyal ba dag la mi 'jigs/_dud 'gro'i skye 
[\[154b.3\]]gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_ngan song dag gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/chus mi 'jigs/_mes mi 'jigs/_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang dred dang bal glang dang glang khyu ba dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis 'jigs 
[\[154b.4\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil du bzhag ste/_ta la gcig tsama'am/_ta la gnyis tsama'am/_ta la gsum tsama'am/_
[\[154b.5\]]ta la bzhi tsama'am/_ta la lnga tsama'am/_ta la drug tsama'am/_ta la bdun tsam du steng du 'phen to/_/ji tsam du 'dod pa de tsam du'ang 'phen to/_/gzhan yang gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mchog 
[\[154b.6\]]gi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/_de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams yongs su gzung zhing dben par gyur te/_thams cad du rjes su song zhing /_de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas zag pa med pa'i bsod nams yongs su rdzogs pa/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[154b.7\]]khams thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i mig tu gyur pas de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de la rdzu 'phrul gang zhe na/_gang 'grub pa dang /_smon pa dang /_'byor pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul zhes bya'o/_/de la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]zhe na/_rdzu 'phrul gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa mang po myong bar byed pa yin te/_gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur/_mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur/_snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar yang 'gyur/_rtsig pa la 
[\[155a.2\]]yang thad kar 'gro/_ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro/_ri la yang mi thogs par 'gro/_nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang /_byi'u zul byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang mi nub par 'gro ste/_dper na sa'i 
[\[155a.3\]]phung po chen po la bya ba bzhin no/_/du ba 'thul bar yang byed 'bar bar yang byed de/_dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/_/bdag gi lus las chu'i rgyun chen po khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'byin te/_dper na sprin chen po bzhin no/_/chu'i rgyun de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[155a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di bsregs shing rab tu tshig ste/_mes rab tu 'bar zhing 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa zhi bar byed do/_/zla ba dang nyi ma 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar gzi brjid che ba yang lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do/_/tshangs pa'i 
[\[155a.5\]]'jig rten gyi bar du sems can rnams la lus kyis dbang sgyur ro/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sa la byi'u zul byed cing steng byung byed/_/chu dag la yang thogs pa med par 'gro/_/bya bzhin nam mkha'i ngos la 'gro bar byed/_/
[\[155a.6\]]rdzu 'phrul gyis ni dud 'thul 'bar bar byed/_/ji ltar bar snang la ni rlung mi thogs/_/sprin gyi phung po mang po 'gro ba ltar/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor pa yang nam mkha' la/_/rlung dang sprin bzhin du ni thogs med 'gro/_/zhing rnams me yis tshig cing 'bar ba dag_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[155a.7\]]mkhas pas de mthong nas/_/des ni rang gi lus las chu phyung ste/_/bye ba snyed kyi zhing de zhi bar byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa 'dug bzhin du/_/nyi zla la ni lag pas yongs su 'dzin/_/des ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nyer rig nas/_/tshangs pa bye ba dag la chos ston byed/_/
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gang tshe de ni chos ston 'dod gyur na/_/stong gsum chen po des ni go bar byed/_/'dod na de ni zhing mang bye bar yang /_/srog chags bye ba mang la chos rnams ston/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na lus kyi spyod 
[\[155b.2\]]pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis sgra rnams lha'i dang /_mi'i dang /_sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi dang /_
[\[155b.3\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams kyi dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sgra nye ba'am rgyang ring po yang thos so/_/gzhan yang gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs 
[\[155b.4\]]su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stan la 'dug bzhin du lha'i sna'i dbang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dri ji snyed yod pa nye'ang rung /_rgyang ring po'ang rung ste de dag thams cad tshor ro/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[155b.5\]]kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 
[\[155b.6\]]pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_spyod pa sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i 
[\[155b.7\]]sems kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bral ba dang /_sred pa dang bcas pa dang /_sred pa dang bral ba dang /_
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]len pa dang bcas pa dang /_len pa dang bral ba dang /_bsdus pa dang /_g.yengs pa dang /_log pa dang /_ma log pa dang /_chen por gyur pa dang /_chen por gyur pa ma yin pa dang /_'od gsal ba dang /_'od gsal ba ma yin pa dang /_tshad dang bcas pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[156a.2\]]bla na yod pa dang /_bla na med pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa ma yin pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba ma yin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[156a.3\]]nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems kyang nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/_skye ba gcig kyang rjes su dran/_gnyis dang /_
[\[156a.4\]]gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu dang /_skye ba brgya yang rjes su dran no/_/skye ba stong dang /_skye ba brgya stong dang /_skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/sdud pa'i bskal pa dang /_'byung ba'i bskal 
[\[156a.5\]]pa yang rjes su dran no/_/srud pa dang /_'byung ba'i bskal pa du ma'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa yang rjes su dran no/_/bskal pa brgya dang /_bskal pa stong dang /_bskal pa brgya stong dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/sngon gyi mtha' bye ba'i 
[\[156a.6\]]bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/bdag sngon che ge mo zhig tu skyes te/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_kha dog ni 'di 'dra/_zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_'tsho ba ni 'di 'dra/_tshe ni 'di tsam zhig tu thub/_yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 
[\[156a.7\]]'di lta bu zhig myong /_de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes te/_de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so/_/zhes rnam pa dang bcas pa dang /_yul phyogs dang bcas pa dang /_gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma yang dag par rjes su dran no/_/gzhon nu lus 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog bzang ba dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_bde 'gror song ba dang /_ngan 'gror song ba dang /_ngan pa dang /_bzang po dang /_
[\[156b.2\]]bzang 'gror 'gro ba dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can las bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/_yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan te/_
[\[156b.3\]]'phags pa rnams la skur pa log par lta ba dag log par lta ba yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes so/_/sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/_
[\[156b.4\]]yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/_'phags pa rnams la mi skur pa yang dag par lta ba dag_/yang dag par lta ba yang dag par bzung ba'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skyes so zhes de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 
[\[156b.5\]]'das pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog bzang ba dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_bde 'gror song ba dang /_ngan 'gror song ba dang /_ngan pa dang /_bzang po dang /_bzang 'gror 'gro ba dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can las bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba dag 
[\[156b.6\]]kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/gzhon nu lus kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis gang cung zad shes par bya ba dang /_blta bar bya ba dang /_mnyan par bya ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[156b.7\]]bar bya ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul bar bya ba de thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/thos so/_/mthong ngo /_/rtogs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi/_/mngon par 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]shes pa'i rim pa bstan/_/ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas na/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/de dag rna ba rnam sbyong ste/_/lha yi rna ba bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad pa yi/_/chos rnams de yis thos par 'gyur/_/stong gsum chen po'i 
[\[157a.2\]]'jig rten khams dag na/_/lha yi dri rnams ji snyed yod pa kun/_/lha yi sna yis ji ltar 'dug bzhin du/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de snom byed/_/'dod chags bcas dang 'dod chags med pa dang /_/zhe sdang bcas dang zhe sdang bral ba dang /_/gti mug bcas dang 
[\[157a.3\]]gti mug bral ba yi/_/sems rnams srog chags kun gyi rab tu shes/_/bskal pa bye ba stong du ni/_/gang du de dag sngon gnas pa/_/sngon gyi gnas rnams rab tu shes/_/de dag la ni thogs pa med/_/de dag mig kyang rnam sbyong ste/_/bla na med pa'i lha yi mig_/des ni sems can skye 
[\[157a.4\]]ba dang /_/'chi 'pho de dag rab tu mthong /_/skad cig gcig dang ldan pa yi/_/shes rab kyis ni tshe rabs kun/_/chos rnams la ni shes bya ba/_/ci yod pa yang yang dag shes/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas 
[\[157a.5\]]na ngag gi sdom pas bsdam par bya'o zhes khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/gzhon nu de la ngag gi sdom pa gang zhe na/_ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs thogs pa med pa/_bsam gyis mi 
[\[157a.6\]]khyab pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig btsun pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[157a.7\]]chen po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/ngag gi sdom 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas 
[\[157b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'thob ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[157b.3\]]ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen 
[\[157b.4\]]po 'di bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'thob ste/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang 
[\[157b.5\]]dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa 'di bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[157b.6\]]chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'thob ste/_sum cu rtsa bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_
[\[157b.7\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la gnas pa 'thob pa dang /_
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]btang snyoms chen po la gnas pa 'thob pa dang /_bde ba'i rnam par rtog pa 'thob pa dang /_rab tu dben pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang gzhon nu ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems 
[\[158a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma'i tshig dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_khyal par smra ba spangs par 'gyur ba dang /_pha ma dang slob dpon dag la mi bden pa'i tshig 
[\[158a.3\]]mi 'byin pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mi smod pa dang /_tshig gzhan la yang gang nyes pa dang ldan pa'i tshig de dag byang chub sems dpas spangs pa yin te/_tshig de dag kyang brag ca lta bur shes so/_/sprul pa lta bu dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bu 
[\[158a.4\]]dang /_sgyu ma lta bur 'jug par byed do/_/de lta bur gyur pas tshig de la mi dmigs/_mi rtog_/rlom sems su mi byed/_mi lta/_mngon par chags par mi byed de/_gzhon nu de ni ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' 
[\[158a.5\]]stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na ngag gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu de ltar khyod kyis bslab par bya'o/_/gzhon nu ngag gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngan song thams cad kyis mi 'jigs shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams 
[\[158a.6\]]cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang /_mngon par shes pa thams cad kyang thob par gyur te/_gzhon nu de ni ngag gi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_ngag gi sdom pa gang dang ldan pa yis/_/byang chub sems dpa' de yang chos 
[\[158a.7\]]kun la/_/thogs pa med par gdon mi za bar 'gyur/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/_/de ni yan lag drug cu mtshungs ldan pa/_/thogs med bsam yas sangs rgyas dbyangs thob pa/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/_/stobs bcu dang ni ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams thob 'gyur ba/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/_/gang sngar 'di las ngas ni brjod pa yi/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[158b.2\]]chos kyang thams cad thob 'gyur ba/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/_/gnas pa dang ni so so yang dag rig_/shin tu rmad byung chos ni bsam yas 'thob/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan 
[\[158b.3\]]rnams/_/dran pa nyer gzhag yang dag spong ba dang /_/de bzhin rdzu 'phrul rkang dang dbang stobs 'thob/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/_/btang snyoms chen po 'jigs pa med pa dang /_/snying rje chen po dag pa'i gnas pa 'thob/_/
[\[158b.4\]]de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/_/bde ba'i rnam rtog rnam par dag pa dang /_/de bzhin rnam rtog rab dben zhi ba 'thob/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dag dang ni phra ma'i 
[\[158b.5\]]tshig mi smra/_/khyal pa'i tshig dang tshig rtsub mi smra ba/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/_/nam yang dam pa'i chos la spong mi byed/_/sangs rgyas dge 'dun dag kyang mi spong ba/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi 
[\[158b.6\]]sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/_/pha dang ma dang slob dpon dag gi yang /_/mdun du mi bden tshig rnams mi smra ba/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/_/tshig gzhan gang dag skyon dang ldan pa rnams/_/de dag ma lus 
[\[158b.7\]]par yang spong bar 'gyur/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/ngag gi sdom pa gang gis blo ldan rnams/_/tshig rnams kyang ni brag ca 'dra ba dang /_/rmi lam lta bur 'jigs pa med par 'jug_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/bdag med srog med g.yo ba med pa dang /_/
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]rkyen las skyes pa rmi lam slu ba bzhin/_/tshig la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'jug pa/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/'gog pa rtag tu rmi lam ji bzhin te/_/mya ngan 'das pa'ang rmi lam ji bzhin du/_/tshig la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'jug pa/_/
[\[159a.2\]]de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/tshig ni gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_/rtog par mi byed rlom sems de mi byed/_/nam yang mi lta chags par mi byed de/_/de ni ngag gi sdom pa de zhes bya/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[159a.3\]]gzhon nu de lta bas na yid kyi sdom pas bsdam par bya'o zhes khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos 'jigs pa med pa rnams dang /_mi 'khrugs pa'i sems rnam par grol ba 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[159a.4\]]ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[159a.5\]]'bar ba'i bye brag dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 
[\[159a.6\]]'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig btsun pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[159a.7\]]chen po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[159b.2\]]yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'thob ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum 'thob 
[\[159b.3\]]par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba 
[\[159b.4\]]chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po 'di bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'thob ste/_bzhi 
[\[159b.5\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 'di bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu 
[\[159b.6\]]yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'thob pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[159b.7\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la gnas pa 'thob pa dang /_btang snyoms chen po la gnas pa 'thob pa dang /_bde ba'i rnam 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]par rtog pa 'thob pa dang /_rab tu dben pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phan par 'dod pa dang /_spyod pa dang /_'jug pa 'thob par 
[\[160a.2\]]'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya ba de ni/_yid kyi sdom pa gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po log par lta ba spangs pa'i phyir log par lta ba dang 'grogs par mi byed/_brnab sems spangs pa'i 
[\[160a.3\]]phyir brnab sems dang 'grogs par mi byed/_gnod sems spangs pa'i phyir gnod sems dang 'grogs par mi byed/_le lo spangs pa'i phyir le lo'i sems dang 'grogs par mi byed/_bla ma rnams dang /_pha ma dang slob dpon dag la g.yo'i sems mi skyed/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti 
[\[160a.4\]]mug gi sems mi skyed cing de dag dang 'grogs par mi byed/_byang chub kyi sems kyang mi gtong /_lhag pa'i sems kyang 'khrugs par mi byed cing gzhan yang nyes pa dang ldan pa'i yid kyi rtogs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rab tu spong zhing de dag dang mi 'grogs te/_de ni 
[\[160a.5\]]gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/yid de yang sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes bya ba la 'jug go/_/rmi lam lta bu'o zhes bya ba dang /_smig rgyu lta bu'o zhes bya ba dang /_sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba dang /_mig yor lta bu'o zhes bya ba la 'jug ste/_gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa dang gang du yang mi 
[\[160a.6\]]'gro bar 'jug go/_/bde ba la rmi lam lta bur 'jug go/_/rmi lam lta bur mi rtag par 'jug go/_/rmi lam lta bur bdag med par 'jug go/_/rmi lam lta bur srog med par 'jug go/_/rmi lam lta bur stong par 'jug ste/_yid de yang mi dmigs/_mi rtog_/rlom sems su mi byed/_
[\[160a.7\]]mi lta/_mngon par mi chags te/_gzhon nu de ni yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu de lta bas na yid kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya'o zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu yid kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi khom pa thams cad rnam par spong zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa 
[\[160b.2\]]thams cad dang /_mi 'khrugs pa'i sems rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba de ni gzhon nu yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/yid kyi sdom pa dag ni ngas bshad kyis/_/g.yeng ba med pa'i yid kyis 
[\[160b.3\]]thams cad nyon/_/ji ste myur du 'tshang rgya 'dod na yang /_/nga las thos nas de la nan tan byos/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag_/mchog tu rab zhi rgya che mi g.yo ba/_/rgyal chos bsam yas rmad du byung ba 'thob/_/'di ni yid kyi sdom pa dag par brjod/_/yid kyi 
[\[160b.4\]]sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag_/sems kyang rnam grol rtag tu mi g.yo 'thob/_/de bzhin rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin mchog_/'di ni yid kyi sdom pa dag par brjod/_/mkhas pa gang gis nye bar spyod pa yi/_/'od zer don chen byed pa sgrub par byed/_/gang gis yan 
[\[160b.5\]]lag drug cu'i dbyangs thob pa/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa rnam dag brjod/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams myur thob 'gyur/_/stobs bcu sangs rgyas yon tan ma lus 'thob/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod/_/yid kyi sdom 
[\[160b.6\]]pa gang gis mkhas pa dag_/so so yang dag rig dang mi 'jigs dang /_/yon tan mchog tu rmad byung bsam yas 'thob/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag_/dran pa nye bar gzhag dang rdzu 'phrul rkang /_/yang dag spong dang dbang 
[\[160b.7\]]stobs lnga 'thob pa/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag_/tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi ma lus de bzhin te/_/stong nyid mtshan med smon med sgo 'thob pa/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod/_/yid kyi sdom pa dag dang gang 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]ldan pa/_/snying rje gnas dang btang snyoms chen po dang /_/spyod 'jug byams pa chen po zhi ba 'thob/_/srid pa kun la de ni phan sems 'gyur/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag_/byang chub yan lag bdun yang myur 'thob cing /_/lam mchog 
[\[161a.2\]]yan lag brgyad pa de bzhin te/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang gis mkhas pa dag_/btang snyoms che la gnas pa dam pa dang /_/snying rje gnas mchog dri ma med pa 'thob/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang gis 
[\[161a.3\]]mkhas pa dag_/bde ba'i rnam rtog zhi ba dag pa'i yid/_/yon tan phyug pas rab tu dben thob pa/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang ldan mkhas pa dag_/log pa'i lta ba phan dang mi 'grogs shing /_/gnod sems brnab sems skyed par mi byed 
[\[161a.4\]]pa/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang ldan mkhas pa dag_/skad cig tsam yang tshul 'chos mi byed cing /_/bla ma la yang g.yo sgyu mi byed de/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang ldan mkhas pa dag_/'dod chags zhe 
[\[161a.5\]]sdang yid ni skyed mi byed/_/de bzhin gang du'ang gti mug mi skyed de/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang ldan mkhas pa dag_/byang chub las ni sems kyang mi gtong zhing /_/lhag pa'i bsam pa dag kyang 'khrug mi byed/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchog 
[\[161a.6\]]tu brjod/_/yid kyi sdom pa gang ldan mkhas pa dag_/yid kyi nyes pa mang po ji snyed gzhan/_/kun dang lhan cig gnas par mi byed pa/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa mchog tu brjod/_/yid la sgyu ma lta bur 'jug byed de/_/rmi lam 'dra zhing de bzhin smig rgyu 'dra/_/rtag tu mig yor 
[\[161a.7\]]gyi ni mtshan nyid de/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod/_/bde ba rmi lam lta bur 'jug byed de/_/de bzhin mi rtag stong pa ther zug mun/_/yid la de ltar mkhas pa 'jug par byed/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod/_/yid la srog dang sems can med par 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]'jug_/rkyen las byung ba mgal me bskor ba bzhin/_/ga las ma 'ongs gang du mi 'gro ste/_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod/_/yid de gang na'ang nye bar mi dmigs shing /_/rtog pa med par rlom sems mi byed de/_/de yang mi lta mngon par zhen mi byed/_/
[\[161b.2\]]de ni yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod/_/don dam bden pa rmi lam 'dra ba dang /_/mya ngan 'das pa rmi lam mtshungs par 'jug_/gang gis mkhas pa de ltar 'jug pa yang /_/de ni yid kyi sdom pa'i mchog tu brjod//_//'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[161b.3\]]rgyal po'i mdo/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa ste tha ma/_gzhon nu de la las yongs su dag pa ni 'di lta ste/_srid pa gsum rmi lam lta bur mthong nas de la 'dod chags dang bral ba skyed de/_gzhon nu 'di ni las yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhon nu de la dmigs pa las 
[\[161b.4\]]yang dag par 'da' ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams sgyu ma lta bur rig nas de dag 'dor ba ste/_'di ni dmigs pa las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya'o/_/de la phung po yongs su shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po rnams la smig rgyu 
[\[161b.5\]]lta bur 'jug pa'o/_/de la khams mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khams rnams sprul pa lta bur nges par spong ba'o/_/de la skye mched sel ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skye mched mig yor lta bur nges par spong ba'o/_/de la sred pa spong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams 
[\[161b.6\]]cad la mi lta ba'o/_/de la skye ba med pa mngon sum du byed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/_/de la bya ba la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_brtson 'grus las byung ba'i sdug bsngal chud mi za ba'o/_/de la rgyu bstan pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[161b.7\]]phung po brag ca lta bur mngon par sgrub pa'o/_/de la 'bras bu chud mi za ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_las kyi 'bras bu rmi lam lta bur chud mi za ba'o/_/de la chos mthong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mi mthong ba'o/_/de la lam bsgom pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]thams cad mi dmigs par sgom pa'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bslab pa sgrub pa'o/_/de la shes rab rno ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad skye ba med par bzod pa'o/_/de la sems can 
[\[162a.2\]]gyi rjes su 'jug pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i ye shes so/_/de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/_/de la so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi 
[\[162a.3\]]tshul yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'o/_/de la yi ge rab tu dbye ba shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gsang sngags gsum sbyor bar shes pa dang /_rnam pa dang rnam pa ma yin pa shes pa'o/_/de la dngos po las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dngos po 
[\[162a.4\]]med par rtogs pa'o/_/de la dbyangs shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_brag ca lta bur shes pa'o/_/de la mchog tu dga' ba 'thob pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mi dmigs shing /_'byung ba dang sdug bsngal spangs pa dang /_khur bor ba'o/_/de la chos kyi dga' 
[\[162a.5\]]ba myong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gdams par bya ba dang /_mgu bar bya ba mi gtong ba dang /_rang gi theg pa'i legs pa mthong ba'o/_/de la gnas pa po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa rtogs pa'o/_/de la drang po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spyod lam bcos 
[\[162a.6\]]pa med pa'o/_/de la bzhin khro gnyer med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zhe sdang med pa'o/_/de la dge ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'grogs na bde ba'o/_/de la mnyen pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol la phan pa'i dngos po'o/_/de la gsong por smra ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshur
