[\[162a.7\]]shog legs par 'ongs so/_/zhes byas pa dang myur du ldang ba'o/_/de la bla ma la gus pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bla ma la 'jigs shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa'o/_/de la bla ma la sri zhu byed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bla ma la rim gro dang g.yog bya ba'o/_/de la skye bas chog shes 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skye ba thams cad la chags pa med pa'o/_/de la dkar po'i chos kyis mi ngoms pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dkar po'i chos thams cad yongs su tshol zhing dge ba gang yin zhes tshol ba'o/_/de la 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ngan ngon gyis 
[\[162b.2\]]chog shes pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa med pa dang /_kha gsag med pa dang /_thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang /_rnyed pas rnyed pa la 'dod pa med pa'o/_/de la dgon par gnas pa mi gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson pa mi 'dor zhing bas mtha'i 
[\[162b.3\]]gnas mal la mngon par dga' ba dang /_nags stug po dang /_gcong rong dang /_phug dang sman shong du mngon par dga' ba dang /_chos kyi dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang /_khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dri ba dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la 
[\[162b.4\]]ma chags pa dang /_sred pa spong ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi dga' ba myong ba ste/_'di ni dgon pa la gnas pa mi gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/de la sa la gnas pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa shes pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par gzhag 
[\[162b.5\]]pa shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par gzhag pa shes pa'o/_/de la dran pa mi nyams pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med par yid la byed pa'o/_/de la phung po la mkhas pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po 
[\[162b.6\]]dang khams dang skye mched rab tu dbye ba yang shes shing de la mi dmigs pa'o/_/de la mngon par shes pa mngon sum du byed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'o/_/de la nyon mongs pa sel ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe 
[\[162b.7\]]sdang dang /_gti mug spong ba'o/_/de la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba legs par 'joms pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sngon gyi byis pa'i spyod pa la smad pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mi 'dod pa'o/_/de la khyad par du 'gro ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa'o/_/de la sgom pa'i rgyu 'thun pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spangs pa'o/_/de la ltung ba las 'byin pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_so sor thar pa dang /_'dul ba sdom pa'o/_/
[\[163a.2\]]de la yongs su dkris pa gnon pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyes pa bshags pa dang /_phyis sdom pa'i las dge ba'o/_/de la rjes su chags pa spong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khams gsum gyi sred pa'i 'khri shing thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa dang /_dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa 
[\[163a.3\]]dang /_dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams chud mi za bar bya'o/_/de la srid pa las yang dag par 'da' ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khams gsum la mi dmigs shing yid la mi byed pa'o/_/de la skye ba dran pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sngon gyi gnas shes pa'o/_/de la las kyi rnam par smin pa la nem nur 
[\[163a.4\]]med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chad pa dang rtag pa rnam par spong ba'o/_/de la chos sems pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems pa'o/_/de la thos pa yongs su tshol ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sde snod dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sde snod dang /_byang chub 
[\[163a.5\]]sems dpa'i sde snod kun 'dzin cing sgom pa'o/_/de la ye shes rno ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rmi lam lta bur ma skyes pa shes pa'o/_/de la ye shes la sred pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ye shes yongs su tshol ba'o/_/de la ye shes khong du chud pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bla na 
[\[163a.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sgrub pa'o/_/de la cang shes kyi sa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas so/_/de la ri lta bu'i sems gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'o/_/de la mi g.yo ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[163a.7\]]nyon mongs pa dag gis mi 'phrogs pa'o/_/de la mi sgul ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa'o/_/de la phyir mi ldog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug mi 'jig pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rgyun mi 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]'chad par mthong ba'o/_/de la dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa'o/_/de la sdig pa'i las la smod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdom pa dang sdig pa rnams gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'o/_/de la nyon mongs pa 
[\[163b.2\]]mi 'byung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa dang /_srid pa'i sred pa dang /_khro ba mi skyed pa'o/_/de la bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang /_sangs rgyas la ri mor byed pa'o/_/de la ting nge 'dzin rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_
[\[163b.3\]]'di lta ste/_sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams skye ba dang /_'jig pa med pa la mkhas pa dang /_sems rtse gcig pa'o/_/de la sems can gyi bsam pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i ye shes so/_/de la skye ba'i khyad par 
[\[163b.4\]]shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'gro ba lnga rnam par gzhag pa shes pa'o/_/de la ye shes mtha' yas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzo lhun gyis grub pa shes pa'o/_/de la tshig gi mtshams sbyar ba shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin 
[\[163b.5\]]gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag shes pa'o/_/de la khyim gyi gnas yongs su spangs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus dang sems dben zhing mngon par byung ba'o/_/de la khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khams gsum yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'o/_/
[\[163b.6\]]de la sems ma god pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o/_/de la chos rnams la mngon par ma chags pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdug pa thams cad spong ba'o/_/de la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[163b.7\]]ste/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su srung ba dang /_mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'o/_/de la chos srung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la smod pa rnams chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod pa'o/_/de la las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khrel yod pas 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]sdig pa'i las rnams spong ba dang /_dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'o/_/de la 'dul ba la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gyis ltung ba dang /_ltung ba ma yin pa shes pa dang /_bcas pa'i ltung ba dang /_ltung ba ma yin pa shes pa'o/_/de la rtsod 
[\[164a.2\]]pa rnam par zhi ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dus pa rnam par spangs pa'o/_/de la 'thab pa med pa dang /_rtsod pa med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten pa'i gtam mi 'dod pa'o/_/de la bzod pa'i sa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus dang sems la gnod pa bzod par byed pa'o/_/de la bzod pa yang dag 
[\[164a.3\]]par 'dzin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol gyis ngan du smras pa dang /_ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam rnams btang snyoms su 'jog cing bzod pa mi 'dral ba'o/_/de la chos rab tu 'byed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams rab tu dbye ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[164a.4\]]dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs rab tu dbye ba dang /_de dag mi dmigs pa'o/_/de la rnam par gtan la dbab pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad brjod du med pa'o/_/de la rab tu dbye ba shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad rnam par gzhag pa gang la nges par rtog 
[\[164a.5\]]pa'o/_/de la chos kyi tshig bsgrub pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa'o/_/de la don dang don ma yin pa 'dres pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos rnams rang bzhin gyis blang ba dang /_gzhag pa med pa'o/_/
[\[164a.6\]]de la sngon gyi mtha' shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyu shes pa'o/_/de la phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rkyen shes pa'o/_/de la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad la tha dad du bya ba med pa'i dngos po'i lugs kyi chos nyid do/_/de la 'khor gsum 
[\[164a.7\]]yongs su dag pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing yid la mi byed pa'o/_/de la sems gnas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems mi dmigs pa'o/_/de la lus rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus la zhugs pa'i rjes su 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]dran pa'o/_/de la spyod lam srung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang 'di bslad pa med pa'o/_/de la spyod lam mi 'khrugs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba mi spyoms pa'o/_/de la spyod lam rnam par mi rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sdig pa 'dod pa dang bral ba'o/_/de la dbang po dang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[164b.2\]]chos la zhugs pa'i yid la byed pa dang /_rigs par smra ba dang /_dus shes pa dang /_yang dag pa ji lta ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rab tu ston pa'o/_/de la 'jig rten shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phar 'gro ba dang /_phyir 'ong ba rab tu shes pa'o/_/de la lhug par gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dngos po rnams 
[\[164b.3\]]mi sbed pa dang /_ser sna med pa'o/_/de la lag brkyang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'ged pa'i ngang tshul can no/_/de la sems 'dzin pa med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa rnyog pa med pa'o/_/de la khrel yod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mu cor mi smra ba'o/_/de la ngo tsha shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mngon 
[\[164b.4\]]du gyur pa'o/_/de la mi dge ba'i sems smad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byis pa'i chos rtogs pa dang /_de dag dang mi 'grogs pa'o/_/de la sbyangs pa mi gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yi dam la brtan pa'o/_/de la spyod pa yang dag par 'dzin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spyod pa la brtul ba bskyed pa'o/_/de 
[\[164b.5\]]la dga' ba yang dag par spyod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i las kyi phan yon la sems pa'o/_/de la bla ma dag gi stan 'ding zhing ldang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nga rgyal bcom zhing snyom las med pa'o/_/de la nga rgyal tshar gcod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag nyid rjes su mi dmigs shing rtsom pa med pa'o/_/de 
[\[164b.6\]]la sems rab tu gzung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dkar po'i chos chud mi za bar shes pa'o/_/de la sems spro bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_brtson 'grus chud mi za bar shes pa'o/_/de la don so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bden pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i ye 
[\[164b.7\]]shes so/_/de la ye shes khong du chud pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams khong du chud pa'o/_/de la mi shes pa dang bral ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin la sgro 'dogs pa dang bral ba'o/_/de la sems kyi 'jug pa shes pa gang zhe na/_
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]'di lta ste/_skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa shes pa'o/_/de la zas sgrub pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab rno ba'o/_/de la sgra brjod pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan pa'o/_/de la rnam par gzhag pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[165a.2\]]lta ste/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa shes pa'o/_/de la don rnam par gtan la dbab pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'du byed kyi phung po chad pa'o/_/de la gnod pa rnam par spong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_srid pa las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_gzhan dag kyang srid pa las yang dag par 'da' ba 
[\[165a.3\]]la 'dzud pa'o/_/de la skyes bu dam pa la sten pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral ba'o/_/de la skyes bu dam pa dang 'grogs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos la sten pa'o/_/de la skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa rnam par spong ba gang 
[\[165a.4\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dmigs pa can dang /_le lo can rnams rnam par spong ba'o/_/de la bsam gtan mi 'dor ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i tsher ma rnam par spong ba dang /_bsam gtan mi gtong zhing dga' ba mi 'dor ba'o/_/de la bsam gtan la ma chags pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khams 
[\[165a.5\]]gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar mos pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mos pa dang /_gong du shes rab kyi snang ba la mos pa'o/_/de la mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi chos shes par dka' ba rnams 
[\[165a.6\]]gzhan la yang dag par rab tu ston pa'o/_/de la ming gi brda gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yongs su ma grub pa rnams ming gis khong du chud pa'o/_/de la brtags pa'i tha snyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi tha snyad do/_/de la btags pa 'joms pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_brjod par shes pa'o/_/de la 
[\[165a.7\]]'khor ba las ldog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor ba'i nyes pa la so sor rtog pa'o/_/de la rnyed pa mi 'dod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag par 'dod pa nyung ba'o/_/de la rnyed pa dang bkur sti mi len pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gdung ba med pa dang /_sdig pa 'dod pa dang bral ba'o/_/de la 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]bsngags pa ma yin pas zhum par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po dang /_khams la yongs su rtog pa shes pa'o/_/de la yang dag par bsngags pa mi len pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba mi spyoms pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la bar chad du rig pa'o/_/de la bkur sti la btang snyoms su 
[\[165b.2\]]byed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_las kyi rnam par smin pa rtogs pa'o/_/de la bsti stang med pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnal 'byor mi gtong ba'o/_/de la smad pas mi 'khrugs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi chos la so sor rtog pa'o/_/de la stod pa la btang snyoms 
[\[165b.3\]]su byed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos tshol zhing 'byung ba'o/_/de la rnyed pa med kyang sems 'gong ba med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag gis byas pa'i chos rnams la so sor rtog pa'o/_/de la khyim pa dang mi sten pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zang zing ci yang rnam par spong ba'o/_/de la rab tu 
[\[165b.4\]]byung ba dang mi sten pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi rigs pa yongs su spong ba dang /_rigs pa yongs su tshol ba'o/_/de la spyod yul ma yin pa rnam par spong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgrib pa lnga rnam par spong ba'o/_/de la spyod yul la rab tu spyod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[165b.5\]]bzhi sgom pa'o/_/de la cho ga phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol rjes su srung ba'o/_/de la cho ga ma yin pa rnam par spong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag gi dge ba'i chos rjes su srung ba'o/_/de la rigs sun par mi byed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes kyi khe rnam par spang ba'o/_/
[\[165b.6\]]de la bstan pa srung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos yongs su btsal ba sgrub pa dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyi nan tan no/_/de la smra ba nyung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zhi gnas thob pa'o/_/de la mnyen pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lhag mthong thob pa'o/_/de la tshig gi lan la mkhas pa 
[\[165b.7\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lan dang /_yang lan shes pa'o/_/de la phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang /_rnam par gzhag par byed pa dang /_klan ka tshol ba tshar gcod pa'o/_/de la dus su 'gro ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dus shes pa'o/_/
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]de la so so'i skye bo la yid mi rton pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byis pa'i chos la skyon du lta ba'o/_/de la sdug bsngal ba rnams la brnyas pa med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o/_/de la sdug bsngal ba rnams la nor rab tu sbyin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[166a.2\]]'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pa'o/_/de la dbul po rnams la mi smod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol la snying brtse ba'i blo'o/_/de la tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la snying brtse ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol ltung ba las byung zhing tshul khrims la rab tu 'god pa'o/_/de la phan pa'i dngos po gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[166a.3\]]lta ste/_gzhan la phan par byed pa'o/_/de la snying rje ba'i blo gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can gyi ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal la lta ba'o/_/de la chos kyis phan gdags pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzhan dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos la gzud pa'o/_/de la zang zing yongs su gtong ba gang zhe na/_
[\[166a.4\]]'di lta ste/_phung po yongs su gtong ba dang /_gzhan la zang zing gis phan 'dogs pa'o/_/de la sogs pa'i gnas med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zang zing la smod pa dang /_srung ba'i nyes pa mthong ba'o/_/de la tshul khrims bsngags pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims yongs su rig pa'o/_/de la 
[\[166a.5\]]'chal pa'i tshul khrims la smad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa khong du chud pa'o/_/de la tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dag la g.yo med par sten pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rnyed par dka' ba'i 'du shes su shes pa'o/_/de la yod pa thams cad 
[\[166a.6\]]gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam pa dge ba'o/_/de la lhag pa'i bsam pas mgron du gnyer ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol la bde ba 'dod pa'o/_/de la smras pa bzhin byed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam pa dge ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la rgyun mi chad par bsnyen bkur byed pa gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[166a.7\]]lta ste/_dge ba gang yin zhes tshol zhing 'dri ba'o/_/de la dga' ba myong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khong du chud pa'i shes pa dang lung gi shes pa'o/_/de la dpe shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dra ba shes pa dang /_gdams pa shes pa'o/_/de la sngon byung ba la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skye ba 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]dran pa dang /_thos pa mang ba'o/_/de la dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon du 'gro ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub la shin tu 'dun pa dang /_gzhan dag kyang spro bar byed pa'o/_/de la thabs mkhas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_so sor 'chags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang /_gsol ba 'debs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[166b.2\]]ba yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'o/_/de la mtshan ma spong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos rnams rmi lam lta bur rtogs nas dngos po rnam par 'jig pa'o/_/de la 'du shes zlog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyin ci log 'dor ba'o/_/de la dngos po'i mtshan nyid 'dor ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mtshan 
[\[166b.3\]]nyid med par shes pa'o/_/de la mdo sde mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba rnams dpe dang rtogs pa brjod pas yang dag par rab tu ston pa'o/_/de la bden pa rnam par gtan la dbab pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par shes pa 'gog pa dang /_
[\[166b.4\]]ming dang gzugs mi skye ba'o/_/de la rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo ba dang /_mi 'khrug pa'o/_/de la gcig tu brjod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mu stegs can gyi gnas smad pa dang /_mi skye bar shes pa'o/_/de la mi 'jigs pa thob 
[\[166b.5\]]pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rtogs shing stobs bskyed pa'o/_/de la tshul khrims kyi gnas gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus kyi sdom pa dang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'o/_/de la snyoms par 'jug pa la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khams gsum la 'dod chags dang 
[\[166b.6\]]bral ba'o/_/de la shes rab thob pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nus pa shes pa dang /_mi dmigs pa'o/_/de la gcig pur dga' ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'du 'dzi'i nyes pa rnam par spong ba dang /_chos dkar po mi gtong ba'o/_/de la shes kyi khe chung ngus chog shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ngan ngon 
[\[166b.7\]]gyis mgu ba'o/_/de la sems la rnyog pa med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgrib pa rnams rnam par gnon pa'o/_/de la blta bar byas pa rnam par spong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dmigs pa'i lta ba rnam par spong ba'o/_/de la gzungs thob pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos ji ltar mthong ba rnams 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chags pa med par rab tu ston pa'o/_/de la ye shes snang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rang bzhin la 'jug pa'o/_/de la gnas gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi gnas so/_/de la gzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems kyi gzhi'o/_/de la rten gang 
[\[167a.2\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa la rten pa'o/_/de la nan tan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lam gyi nan tan no/_/de la rgyu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa 'khor ba'i rgyu'o/_/de la rigs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rigs pa ni thar pa'i rigs pa'o/_/de la tshul gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sred pa rab tu spangs 
[\[167a.3\]]pa'o/_/de la sgo gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyes pa spangs pa'o/_/de la lam gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med par shes pa'o/_/de la sa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_smon pa med pa'i sa bcu'o/_/de la skye ba dang bral ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skye ba bcad 
[\[167a.4\]]pa'o/_/de la ye shes kyi sa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rmongs pa med pa'o/_/de la mi shes pa spangs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gti mug spangs pa'o/_/de la ye shes gnas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi gnas pa'o/_/de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum 
[\[167a.5\]]cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams sgom pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la skyes bu dam pa sten pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas la sten pa'o/_/de la skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa spangs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mu stegs can 
[\[167a.6\]]dmigs par lta ba rnams rnam par spong ba'o/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi stobs la gnas pa nas rang bzhin shes pas thar pa'o/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi sa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos thams cad thob pa'o/_/de la mkhas pas 
[\[167a.7\]]rjes su yi rang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos dag gis rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/de la byis pa dag gis spangs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byis pa thams cad kyis rig par dka' ba'o/_/de la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]kyis shes par dka' ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/de la mu stegs can gyis ma yin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnal 'byor pa dag gi log pa'i nga rgyal lo/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' dag gis yongs su gzung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnyed par 
[\[167b.2\]]dka' ba dang rtsi chen por gyur pa'o/_/de la stobs bcu dag gis khong du chud pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dka' ba'i tshul gyis so/_/de la lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bde ba thams cad thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la tshangs pa dag gis phyag bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[167b.3\]]thar pa thams cad thob par byed pa'i tshul gyis so/_/de la klu rnams kyis phyag bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bag chags thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro/_/de la gnod sbyin dag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ngan 'gro thams cad kyi lam gcod pa'i phyir ro/_/de la mi'am ci 
[\[167b.4\]]dag gis phyag bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thar pa'i rab tu bde ba thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de la lto 'phye chen po dag gis rab tu bsngags pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor ba gcod pa'i phyir ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' dag gis bsgom par bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[167b.5\]]ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la mkhas pa dag gis kun chub par bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la nor bla na med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lha dang mi'i skye dgu phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed pa 
[\[167b.6\]]dang /_thar pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la sbyin pa zang zing med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro/_/de la na ba rnams kyi rtsi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la mdzod shes 
[\[167b.7\]]pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsgom pa'i phyir ro/_/de la spobs pa mi zad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de la mya ngan dang bral ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnod pa dang /_sdug bsngal don med par rtogs shing 'byung ba dang /_
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]sdug bsngal bdag med par shes pa'i phyir ro/_/de la khams gsum yongs su shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgyu ma dang rmi lam lta bur rtogs pa'o/_/de la pha rol tu 'gro ba dag gi gzings gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[168a.2\]]'da' bar 'dod pa dag mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa nyid du sgom pa'i phyir ro/_/de la chu bo'i nang du song ba dag gi gru gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mya ngan las 'da' ba thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la snyan pa 'dod pa dag gi grags pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos rgya chen po thob 
[\[168a.3\]]par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsngags pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rtsi'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snyan pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_yon tan dang bde ba thams cad dang thar pa'i sbyin bdag tu gyur 
[\[168a.4\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de la stobs bcu dag gis bstod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos rin po che [(]snyed [,]rnyed [)]par dka' ba'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos 'di la bslabs pa'i phyir ro/_/de la snying rje can dag gi 
[\[168a.5\]]btang snyoms gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas pa'i phyir ro/_/de la byams pas zhe sdang zhi ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de la theg pa chen po pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam 
[\[168a.6\]]pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro/_/de la seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa dag gi nan tan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi mchog dang chos kyi dam pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos thams cad thob par byed 
[\[168a.7\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de la chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol nas tshu rol rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/de la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi 'phrogs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa dang /_thar 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag gi bde ba dang dga' ba dang /_mgu ba thams cad kyis sems can thams cad kyi bde ba sgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de la bdud kyi sde rnams 'jig par byed pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[168b.2\]]stobs thams cad yongs su sgrub pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la bde bar 'gro ba'i rig pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gtse ba thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'o/_/de la don grub pa rnams kyi don gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su sgrub 
[\[168b.3\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de la dgra'i nang du song ba'i skyabs gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dmigs pa can thams cad dang log par lta ba rnams pham par byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de la chos dang ldan pas mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos dang ldan pas mu stegs can tshar gcod 
[\[168b.4\]]pa'o/_/de la mi 'jigs pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad yongs su brtag pa dang /_phyir brtag pa bzod pa'i phyir ro/_/de la stobs rnams yang dag par btsal ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ma log pa'i tshul gyis so/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[168b.5\]]brgyad kyi snga ltas gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dkar po'i chos thams cad thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la rgyan gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la thar pa 'dod pa dag gi dga' ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thog ma dang dbus dang tha 
[\[168b.6\]]mar dge ba'i phyir ro/_/de la bu'i thu bo dag gi dga' ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha'i nor sangs rgyas kyi nor myong ba thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rdzogs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dkar po'i chos thams cad rjes su srung ba dang /_dkar po'i chos thams cad 
[\[168b.7\]]gzhan ma yin par gso ba thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rgya chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de la sems rnam par dag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dri ma thams cad spong 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]bar 'gyur ba'o/_/de la lus yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i phyir ro/_/de la rnam par thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi bar so sor 
[\[169a.2\]]rtog pa yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de la 'dod chags kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi 'chi ba'i gnas yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de la zhe sdang dang bral ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa chen po yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de la gti mug gis ma yin pa 
[\[169a.3\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos yang dag pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de la ye shes 'byung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa shes pa thams cad skye ba'i phyir ro/_/de la rig pa skye ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa thams 
[\[169a.4\]]cad yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de la ma rig pa spong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de la rnam par grol ba'i snying pos ngoms pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i che ba nyid yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de la ting nge 
[\[169a.5\]]'dzin gyi snying por byed pa dag gi mgu ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bde ba dang dga' ba'i bde ba thams cad dang /_sems rtse gcig pa yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de la mthong bar 'dod pa rnams kyi mig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag nyid lta ba'i phyir ro/_/de la rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa rnams kyi mngon 
[\[169a.6\]]par shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgrib pa med pa dang /_'dod par 'gyur ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro/_/de la mngon par sgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad la mi rtog pa'i shes pa sgrib pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de la thos par 'dod pa rnams kyi gzungs gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos 
[\[169a.7\]]thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir ro/_/de la dran pa mi nyams pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mya ngan las 'das par dmigs pa rang bzhin gyis rnam par zhi ba'i phyir ro/_/de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mtha' yas pa yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de la 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]mgon po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thams cad bde ba dang legs par 'gro ba'i phyir ro/_/de la phra mo gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa la dmigs pa rnam par zhi ba'i phyir ro/_/de la shes par dka' ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_so sor rig par dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[169b.2\]]de la mi brtson pa rnams kyis rig par dka' ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sngon ma thos pa'i phyir ro/_/de la yi ge rnams ldog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshig gi lam thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de la sgras shes par dka' ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[169b.3\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de la mkhas pa dag gis yongs su shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rin po che don che ba'i phyir ro/_/de la nges pa dag gis shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bkur sti kun shes pa'i phyir ro/_/de la 'dod pa nyung bas rtogs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bkur sti mi skyed pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[169b.4\]]de la brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyis gzung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir ro/_/de la dran pa can gyis bcangs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byas pa chud mi za ba'i phyir ro/_/de la sdug bsngal zad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti 
[\[169b.5\]]mug spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de la chos mi skye ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam par shes pa thams cad 'gog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de la bstan pa gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_srid pa'i 'gro ba dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba'i gnas thams cad kyi chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o 
[\[169b.6\]]zhes chos thams cad mi skyed pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ni tshig sum brgya po 'di rnams rgyas par bstan par rig par bya ste/_gzhon nu 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[169b.7\]]gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas chos ni rgya che ste/_/tshul yang rgya cher bstan pa yin/_/chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na/_/yon tan rgya chen thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid de bzhin te/_/rin chen 'od zer rgya chen gang /_/de phyir shin tu rgyas zhes bya/_/
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]sems can spyod pa rgya che ste/_/de dag bstan pa'ang rgya che'o/_/lung gi don yang rgya che bas/_/de phyir shin tu rgyas zhes bya/_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin nges par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 
[\[170a.2\]]'das kyis bshad pa na sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/sems can dpag tu med pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/sems can dpag tu med pa 
[\[170a.3\]]dag rang byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/sems can dpag tu med pa dag dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba la sems skyes so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 
[\[170a.4\]]'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/_chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem chem/_'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/_shar phyogs dma' 
[\[170a.5\]]na nub phyogs mtho/_nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/_byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/_lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/_mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/_dbus dma' na mtha' mtho ste/_'jig rten kun tu snang ba dpag tu med pa dag byung bar gyur to/_/
[\[170a.6\]]lha'i spos kyi char chen po yang mngon par bab bo/_/lha dag kyang me tog gi char chen po 'bebs so/_/lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dag kyang steng gi bar snang la rdung ngo /_/lha'i na bza' dag kyang steng gi nam mkha' la g.yogs shing tshig 'di skad ces zer ro/_/gang gis snying rje chen 
[\[170a.7\]]po la 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin te/_sems can de dag sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med par sgom pas bsgom pa dang /_mang du byed pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[170b.2\]]la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis zung shig_/lhogs 
[\[170b.3\]]shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom 
[\[170b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo mdo sde 'di snying rje chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[170b.5\]]'di bdag gis bzung lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi 
[\[170b.6\]]lha'i bu du ma dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin ji snyed 
[\[170b.7\]]pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de d+harma tA shI las bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]{D128}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya d+harma tA swa b+hA wa shU n+ya tA a tsa la pra ti sarba A lo ka sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa chos nyid rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid las mi g.yo bar tha dad par thams cad la snang ba'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[171a.2\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi khang pa na ye shes kyi khyad par las grub pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri chen po bshams pa la/_chos nyid rang gi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba las 
[\[171a.3\]]mi g.yo bar bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe gnas der byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dag kyang 'dus/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa 'khor phal po che thams cad kyang 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 
[\[171a.4\]]'das la yang dang yang du bskor ba byed cing phyag 'tshal te rang rang gi phyogs phyogs su 'dug ste mchod pa'i mchog thams cad kyis mchod par byed/_bsti stang du byed/_ri mor byed pa la yid skyo bar mi byed de/_chos nyan par brtsams te mgo btud nas 'dug par 
[\[171a.5\]]gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ni rnam grangs dang dbye ba'i chos la rtog par mi mdzad kyang smon lam dang thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor rnams kyi so sor so so'i mos pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gsung sgrog par snang ste/_bcom ldan 'das ni bdag la chos 
[\[171a.6\]]ston te/_gzhan dag la ni ma yin no snyam mo/_/de yang 'khor phal po che de dag las kyang kha cig gis ni ji ltar snang ba bzhin du yod pa'i chos ston to snyam ste/_de la nges par 'dzin cing rtog par byed do/_/kha cig gis ni chos thams cad sems tsam las ma 
[\[171a.7\]]gtogs par gzhan med pa'i chos ston to snyam ste/_de la nges par 'dzin cing rtog par byed do/_/kha cig gis ni sems nyid kyang ma skyes pa yin par bdag cag la chos ston to snyam ste/_de la nges par 'dzin cing rtog par byed do/_/kha cig gis ni chos thams 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]cad sgyu ma bzhin du snang zhing sgyu ma bzhin du ma grub pa'i chos ston to snyam ste/_de la nges par 'dzin cing rtog par byed do/_/kha cig gis ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa/_ngo bo nyid kyis mi gnas pa/_las dang bya ba'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba rtog pa dang rtog pa'i 
[\[171b.2\]]yul las 'das pa/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas spros pa rnam par dag pa'i chos ston to snyam ste/_de la nges par 'dzin cing rtog par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das chos nyid rang gi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba las mi g.yo bar bzhugs pa de las snying rje dang ldan pa'i skur byas nas 'khor 'dus pa de 
[\[171b.3\]]dag gi lta ba tha dad par gyur pa'i rtog pa'i mun pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer ljags kyi dbang po las spros te/_'od zer des phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal 'dug par gyur pa la bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam 
[\[171b.4\]]dpal gyis 'khor phal mo che'i rtog pa lnga po tha dad par gyur pa sems kyis shes nas/_ci'i phyir chos thams cad kyi gzhi gcig la lta ba dang mos pa tha dad par gyur snyam ste/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar bya'o snyam pa dang 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[171b.5\]]ljags kyi dbang po la slar 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das ni rnam grangs dang dbye ba'i chos la rtog par mi mdzad kyang 'khor 'dus pa 'di dag mos pa dang 
[\[171b.6\]]rtog pa tha dad pa 'di ci las gyur/_bcom ldan 'das chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag kun yang dag pa lags sam/_'on te kha cig ni yang dag pa lags la kha cig ni yang dag pa ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di 
[\[171b.7\]]dag gis rnam par grol ba thob par mtshungs lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag la gang zag gi rigs ni mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag la tha dad par snang ba'i 'thun pa'i dpe 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]ni ji ltar lags/_bcom ldan 'das chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag ltar so sor rtog pa'i gang zag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag la slob pa'i gang zag 
[\[172a.2\]]rnams don lags pa dang ma lags par rtsod par mi 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'dus pa 'di dag gi the tshom gyi dra ba bcad pa'i slad du bdag la bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[172a.3\]]khyod 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das ni rnam grangs dang dbye ba'i chos la rtog par mi mdzad kyang 'khor 'dus pa 'di dag 'di ltar mos pa dang rtog pa tha dad pa ci las gyur zhes zer ba ni sbyangs pa dang ma sbyangs pa'i dbang las shes pa dang /_mos pa che chung las gyur te/_sangs rgyas 
[\[172a.4\]]rnams ni sbyangs pa dang bsags pa dpag tu med pas rtsol ba med par chos nyid rang gi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba las mi g.yo ba gcig pu yin te/_'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul yin no/_/cher sbyangs pa dang cung zad sbyangs pa rnams kyi ni yang dag pa yin pa dang ma 
[\[172a.5\]]yin pa brgyud pa las thob pa ste/_de'i phyir na mos pa dang rtog pa tha dad par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal khyod 'di skad du chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag kun yang dag pa lags sam/_'on te kha cig ni yang dag pa lags la kha cig ni yang dag pa ma lags sam zhes 
[\[172a.6\]]zer ba ni chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag thams cad kyang yang dag pa yin par gzung ste/_kha cig gis ni chos thams cad ji ltar snang ba bzhin du yod pa'i chos ston to snyam pa yang yin te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_'byung ba bzhi dang des byas pa rnams ni tha dad du sgyu 
[\[172a.7\]]ma bzhin du yod pa'i phyir ro/_kha cig gis ni chos thams cad ni sems tsam las ma gtogs pa gzhan med pa'i chos ston to snyam pa yang yin te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos sna tshogs su 'dogs pa rnams rtag pa ther zug tu brtags pa'i bag chags sems la 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]bzhag pa'i mthus dus thams cad du bdag dang chos rnams su snang ba tha snyad tsam du snang yang don du rang bzhin med de/_sems tsam las med pa'i phyir ro/_/kha cig gis ni sems nyid kyang ma skyes pa yin par bdag cag la chos ston to snyam pa yang yin te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[172b.2\]]'di la dbyibs sam/_kha dog gam/_dus gsum 'am/_mtha' dbus med pa'i phyir ro/_/kha cig gis ni chos thams cad sgyu ma bzhin du snang zhing sgyu ma bzhin du ma grub pa'i chos ston to snyam pa yang yin te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni rgyu rkyen las skye zhing 'byung 
[\[172b.3\]]ba'i phyir ro/_/kha cig gis ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi ma skyes pa/_ngo bo nyid kyis mi gnas pa/_las dang bya ba'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba/_rtog pa dang rtog pa'i yul las 'das pa/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas spros pa rnam par dag pa'i chos ston to snyam 
[\[172b.4\]]pa yang yin te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid phyin ci ma log pa de yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal yang kha cig yang dag pa ma yin par yang bzung ste/_sbyangs pa chung ba/_mos pa dman pa/_shes rab zhan pa dag gis rtog pa'o/_/kha cig sbyangs 
[\[172b.5\]]pa dang mos pa dang shes rab 'bring ba rnams kyis rtogs pa'o/_/lhag ma ni yang dag pa ste mchog tu gyur pa'i rtogs pa'o/_/'jam dpal khyod 'di skad du chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag gis rnam par grol ba thob par mtshungs sam zer ba ni shes rab mchog tu gyur 
[\[172b.6\]]pa'i rtogs pa yang dag pa las lhag ma bzhi po gcig la gcig brgyud pa'i khyad par gyis nye ring yod kyang rnam par grol ba 'thob par mtshungs par blta'o/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis 'di skad du chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag la gang zag gi rigs ni mchis lags 
[\[172b.7\]]sam zhes zer ba ni theg pa chung ngu'i rigs dang theg pa chen po'i rigs gnyis kas chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga las bzhi las brgyud nas lhag ma gcig tu yang dag pa phyin ci ma log pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul rtogs par bya'o/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis 'di skad du 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag la tha dad par snang ba'i 'thun pa'i dpe ni ji ltar lags zhes zer ba ni chos kyi gzhi gcig la tha dad par rtog pa'i dpe ni 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma 'char bas bstan te/_'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma 'char ba dpag tshad bzhi khri'i 
[\[173a.2\]]nam mkha' las 'char ba'i tshe mi rnams kyis rang gi grong khyer dang ri 'di las shar bar so so nas rtog go/_/de bzhin du da ltar gyi 'khor 'dus pa 'di dag gis chos kyi gzhi gcig la so sor rtog go/_/so sor mthong ngo /_/so sor 'dzin to/_/'jam dpal rnam par 
[\[173a.3\]]ma brtags pa'i tshe rang gi grong khyer gyi ri las mi 'char ba ma yin pa bzhin du chos la brtag pa'i mtha' 'di dag kyang yang dag pa phyin ci ma log pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul las ma ltos pa gzhan bzhi po de bzhin du snang ngo /_/'jam dpal rang gi grong khyer gyi ri de 
[\[173a.4\]]las yang dag par 'char ba ma yin pa de bzhin du bzhi po ni rtogs pa'i thabs blo'i rim pa la de ltar snang ste/_don yang dag pa nyid ma yin no/_/'jam dpal brtag pa lnga po 'di dag las rnam par grol ba mtshungs pa thob pa'i dpe ni nor bu rin po ches bstan te/_
[\[173a.5\]]rin po che de yang sems can rnams kyis bsten pa'i las byas pa dang ma byas pa yod de/_gang zag rtog pa med pa dang log par rtog pa rnams ni chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga la mi brten pa ste/_rin po che bsten pa'i las ma byas pa'i gang zag gis rin po che ma 
[\[173a.6\]]rnyed pa dang dgos pa mi 'byung ba bzhin du de dag la mi dpyod mi sems pas khams gsum las mi thar ba yin no/_/bsten pa'i las byas pa ni khyad par du bsags pa dang cher bsags pa dang cung zad bsags pa rnams la rin po che'i dgos pa yang rim pa gsum 
[\[173a.7\]]du 'byung ba bzhin du yang dag pa phyin ci ma log pa dang lhag ma bzhi po brgyud par brtag pa theg pa che chung rim pa gsum yang dpe rim pa bzhin no/_/ngas bshad pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis dang chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga ji lta bu yin pa'i dpe ni rgya mtsho la phyogs bzhi nas 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]chu 'bab pas bstan te/_phyogs bzhi nas chu bo bzhi yan lag mang po dang bcas pa phyogs bzhi nas bab kyang gzhi rgya mtsho chen po las bab par 'dra bas rgya mtsho ni phyogs bzhi nas 'bab pa'i chu thams cad kyi gzhi yin no/_/spyi yin no/_/de bzhin du chos la brtag pa'i 
[\[173b.2\]]mtha' lnga tha dad kyang ngas mdo sde bcu gnyis bshad pa la rten pa yin pas mdo sde bcu gnyis ni gzhi yin no/_/spyi yin no/_/'jam dpal khyod 'di skad du chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag ltar so sor rtog pa'i gang zag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags 
[\[173b.3\]]sam zhes zer ba ni da ltar ngas chos rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa na yang 'khor 'dus pa rnams la rtog pa 'di lta bur tha dad par gyur na nga mya ngan las 'das nas tha dad par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te ches mang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal nga mya ngan las 'das nas 
[\[173b.4\]]lo lnga brgya dang dgu brgya dang stong dgu brgya dang nyis stong dang nyis stong lnga brgya'i bar du chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag la so sor rtog pa'i gang zag rim par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal khyod 'di skad du chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag la slob pa'i gang zag 
[\[173b.5\]]rnams don lags pa dang ma lags par rtsod par mi 'gyur lags sam zhes zer ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo lnga brgya nas rtsod par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe gang zag rnams mos pa dang shes rab che chung gi dbang gis don ma nor bar rtogs ma rtogs kyi bye brag 
[\[173b.6\]]med par bdag nyid kyi don ma yin pa la yin nges par byas te/_gzhan gyi don yin pa yang ma yin par bsgrubs nas rtsod par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan drung na 'khod cing nyan pa rnams kyis kyang don bzhin du phyogs 'dzin par mi byed kyi/_yul gyis bsdus pa dang gnyen gyi phyogs 
[\[173b.7\]]'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/don ma nor bar shes pa rnams kyis kyang mi shes pa rnams la bstan par bya ba'i phyir mi rtsod kyi/_sma dbab pa dang shed gcad pa'i phyir rtsod de/_khyod kyi don gyi ngo bo ji ltar mthong ba smros zhes dris nas/_des smras pa dang /_don ma nor yang mdo sde gzhan 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]la brtsams nas smra bar 'gyur ro/_/khyod 'di skad zer zhes nor ba gzhan la sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis ma shes na ci ma rung snyam par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyir ma yin gyi zang zing gi phyir sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/de skad 
[\[174a.2\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos la brtag pa'i mtha' lnga po 'di dag chos kyi gzhi gcig la tha dad par gyur na chos kyi gzhi de ni gang lags/_de la ji ltar brtags na ni 'khrul pa lags/_de'i ma nor ba'i rang gi ngo bo 
[\[174a.3\]]ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gzhi ni phung po rnams so/_/'byung ba rnams so/_/khams dang skye mched rnams so/_/de dag sgyu ma bzhin tha snyad tsam du snang ba las rtag pa dang ther zug tu bzung na 'khrul pa yin no/_/rang bzhin skye ba med pa 
[\[174a.4\]]la dngos po tha snyad du snang ba bsal nas med par brtags na yang 'khrul pa yin no/_/de'i gzhi ma nor ba'i rang gis ngo bo ni chos de dag gi rang bzhin skye ba med pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_'o na yul 'khrul pa'i gzhi ma mchis na yul 'khrul pa snang zhes bya ba ji lta bu lags/_bka' 
[\[174a.5\]]stsal pa/_chos sgyu ma bzhin tha snyad tsam du snang zhing yod pa de sems 'khrul pas snang bar ni mi bzung gi_/chos de dag gi rang bzhin skye ba med par ma shes nas rtag pa ther zug tu bzung ba'i 'khrul pa'i snang ba la sems 'khrul pa yul du snang bar zung shig_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[174a.6\]]zhe na/_chos rnams la gang gis rtag pa dang ther zug tu bzung na 'khor bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor bar gyur na phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams yod par 'gyur ro/_/de yod na bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnams myong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis chos rnams kyi rang bzhin skye ba 
[\[174a.7\]]med pa shes nas chos rnams kyi dngos po rtag pa ther zug dang /_med pa dang chad pa'i mtha' gnyis po bsal na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro/_/de thob pa dang mtshan dang dpe byad dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]'jam dpal mdor na chos kyi rang bzhin skye ba med par ma shes nas chos rnams la rtag pa dang ther zug tu bzung bas 'khor bar gyur nas/_chos rnams snang ba la sems 'khrul pa snang zhes bya'i/_thog ma nam mkha' lta bu med pa las sems 'khrul pa'i mthus chos rnams 
[\[174b.2\]]snang ba ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal mthong ba dag pa dang ma dag pa gnyis kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par snang ba la yang yul ni sems snang ba yin zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[174b.3\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//chos nyid rang gi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo bar tha dad par thams cad snang ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/dA na shI la'i zhal nas sde snod kyi bstan 
[\[174b.4\]]bcos dang dbu ma'i lta ba tha dad rnams 'di las 'phros pa yin gsung skad//[ {D129}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pra shAn ta bi nish+tsa ya prA ti hAr+ya nA ma sa mA d+hi ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_
[\[174b.5\]]'phags pa rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_
[\[174b.6\]]bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[174b.7\]]pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_sman gyi rgyal po dang /_sman yang dag byung dang /_sman mngon bsgrags dbyangs rgyal po dang /_lag na pad ma dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang /_rdul med rnam par gnon dang /_ngan song spong dang /_ye shes bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang /_
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]rin chen bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang /_sems can gyi skad ye shes ldan dang /_me tog bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang /_zla ba'i bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang /_dri ma med pa'i bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang /_rdo rje bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang /_rdul med bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang /_
[\[175a.2\]]rnam par snang byed bla ma'i ye shes ldan dang /_skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_chags med rgyal mtshan dang /_me tog rgyal mtshan dang /_dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang /_mdzes pa'i 
[\[175a.3\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_rdul bral rgyal mtshan dang /_rnam par snang byed rgyal mtshan dang /_sa'i gzi brjid dang /_rin chen gzi brjid dang /_blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang /_ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang /_dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid dang /_nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang /_bsod nams ri 
[\[175a.4\]]bo'i gzi brjid dang /_ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang /_mtshungs med dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_sa'i snying po dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_rin po che'i snying po dang /_pad ma'i snying po dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_yon tan rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang /_chos kyi phyag rgya'i snying po dang /_
[\[175a.5\]]rnam par snang byed kyi snying po dang /_lte ba'i snying po dang /_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po dang /_nyi ma'i mig dang /_rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa'i mig dang /_rnam par sangs pa'i mig dang /_chags pa med pa'i mig dang /_kun tu lta ba'i mig dang /_shin tu rno ba'i mig dang /_rdo rje'i mig 
[\[175a.6\]]dang /_rin po che'i mig dang /_nam mkha'i mig dang /_kun nas mig dang /_lha'i cod pan dang /_chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i nor bu'i cod pan dang /_byang chub kyi snying po'i cod pan dang /_rnam par snang byed cod pan dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang /_'jig 
[\[175a.7\]]rten gyi khams thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang /_dus thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang /_kun tu rnam par snang byed cod pan dang /_zil gyis mi non pa'i cod pan dang /_chos thams cad kyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]cod pan dang /_kun nas chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' snang ba'i cod pan dang /_tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug pud dang /_klu'i dbang po'i gtsug pud dang /_sangs rgyas 'phrul pa thams cad snang ba'i gtsug pud dang /_byang chub kyi snying po'i gtsug pud dang /_smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 
[\[175b.2\]]dbyangs nor bu rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug pud dang /_dus gsum thams cad kun nas dbyangs kyi gtsug pud dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i snang ba'i rgyal mtshan nor bu'i rgyal po nor bu rin po che'i dra bas bres pa'i gtsug pud dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[175b.3\]]pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dbyangs kyi gtsug pud dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba nor bu rin po che mngon par bsgrags pa'i gtsug pud dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad dbyer med pa rnam par shes pa'i nor bu rin po ches brgyan 
[\[175b.4\]]pa'i gtsug pud dang /_'od chen dang dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /_rin po che'i 'od dang /_rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang /_snang ba'i 'od dang /_chos kyi 'od dang /_zhi ba'i 'od dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od dang /_lha'i 'od dang /_bsod nams 'od dang /_bsod nams 
[\[175b.5\]]kyi tog dang /_ye shes kyi tog dang /_chos kyi tog dang /_mngon par shes pa'i tog dang /_'od kyi tog dang /_me tog gi tog dang /_nor bu'i tog dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tog dang /_tshangs pa'i tog dang /_kun nas snang ba'i tog dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_sa'i sgra dbyangs 
[\[175b.6\]]dang /_rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang /_'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang /_ri dbang rgyal po rdob pa'i dbyangs dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dbyangs dang /_chos rgya mtsho thams cad bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang /_rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 
[\[175b.7\]{]klongs [,]klong [}]pa'i dbyangs dang /_snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang /_'gro ba sdug bsngal ba thams cad dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang chos 'phags dang /_khyad par 'phags dang ye shes 'phags dang /_bsod nams ri rab 'phags dang /_yon tan 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]bsod nams 'phags dang /_grags pa 'phags dang /_kun nas snang ba 'phags dang /_byams pa chen po 'phags dang /_ye shes 'byung ba 'phags dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rus rigs 'phags dang /_snang ba'i dpal dang /_mchog gi dpal dang /_
[\[176a.2\]]yang dag 'phags pa'i dpal dang /_rnam par snang byed dpal dang /_zla ba'i dpal dang /_tshogs kyi dpal dang /_nam mkha'i dpal dang /_rin po che'i dpal dang /_tog gi dpal dang /_ye shes dpal dang /_sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_
[\[176a.3\]]tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_ri bo'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_mi g.yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_khyu mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_blo mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_rab tu zhi ba'i nga ro dang /_chags med nga ro dang /_sa dbyangs nga ro dang /_rgya mtsho 'brug bsgrags 
[\[176a.4\]]nga ro dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyis bskur ba'i nga ro dang /_rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor sgra'i nga ro dang /_ye shes lhun po'i blo dang /_nam mkha'i blo dang /_dri ma med pa'i blo dang /_chags pa med pa'i blo dang /_rnam par sangs pa'i blo dang /_dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang /_rlabs po che'i 
[\[176a.5\]]blo dang /_rin po che'i blo dang /_yangs pa'i blo dang /_kun tu lta ba'i blo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul snang ba'i blo dang /_de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[176a.6\]]dpa' chen po thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa mnyam par gnas pa dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/_las las kun tu 'byung ba'i rnam par smin 
[\[176a.7\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du mos pa/_rgyu las kun tu 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du mos pa/_rgya'i 'bur 'byung ba lta bu'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang ldan pa/_mig yor dang gzugs brnyan ltar snang ba'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/_sgra skad rnam par rig pa/_
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]brag ca dang mtshungs pa'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog mtha' yas pa/_yongs su grub pa sgrub pa'i gzungs la rab tu 
[\[176b.2\]]gnas pa/_skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/_skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang tshe dang mngon par 'byung ba dang dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub 
[\[176b.3\]]pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/_zhing thams cad kyi rgyan zhing gcig tu kun tu ston pa'i ye 
[\[176b.4\]]shes dang ldan pa/_zhing gcig cig gi rgyan bkod pa zhing thams cad du ston pa dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor du ston pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 
[\[176b.5\]]'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du ston pa/_chos thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par ston pa la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad mtha' yas pa'i mthar gyur pa/_mtha' dang dbus med pa sgyu ma'i dra ba lta bur rab tu ston pa/_bskal pa mtha' yas mu 
[\[176b.6\]]med par sems can thams cad tha dad pa med par kun tu ston pa/_sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob pa'i mos pa'i 'jug pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku sku gcig tu mos pa 'jug pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas gcig gi 
[\[176b.7\]]sku sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad kyi skur 'jug par sems can gzhan la kun tu ston par mkhas pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rang gi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/_dus gsum thams cad chos kyi sku gcig gis khyab par sems can 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]la kun tu ston pa lus gcig gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la lus mtha' yas pa las ldang bar sems can la kun tu ston pa/_lus gcig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub la sems can thams cad snyed kyi lus kun tu ston pa/_sems can thams 
[\[177a.2\]]cad kyi lus sems can gcig gi lus su kun tu ston pa/_sems can gcig gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus su kun tu ston pa/_sems can gyi lus chos kyi skur kun tu ston pa/_chos kyi sku sems can gyi lus su ston pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam 
[\[177a.3\]]rang gi smon lam du byin gyis rlob pa la mkhas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang smon lam dang /_stobs dang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa/_yongs su smin pa'i sems can la 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[177a.4\]]du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu ston pa/_bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du smon lam gyi rgyun mi gcod pa/_rnam par shes pa'i lus las bskyod nas ye shes kyi sku la 'jog par dbang byed par sems can gyi tshogs thams cad la kun tu ston pa/_rang gi 
[\[177a.5\]]lus kyi rgyun bcad nas sems can gyi tshogs gzhan gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par kun tu ston pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'i smon lam la 'jug pa/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du byang chub sems 
[\[177a.6\]]dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par smon lam btab pa'i stobs kyis skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa kun tu ston pa/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu lus du ma 
[\[177a.7\]]kun tu ston pa/_chos kyi tshig gcig brjod pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sprin chen po las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i char pa 'bebs la/_rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i glog byung zhing yang dag pa de kho na'i 'brug bsgrags pas sems can 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]gyi khams thams cad tshim par byed cing smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed par kun tu ston pa/_bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang mngon par shes pa dang rig pa dang ye shes la 'jug pa'i spyod yul ba/_sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam 
[\[177b.2\]]thams cad du 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lus kun tu ston pa/_rang gi sems shes pa dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa chags pa med pas/_sems can gcig dang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang g.yo ba shes pa la mkhas pa/_de bzhin 
[\[177b.3\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la skad cig gcig gis 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi grangs la chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/_sems can gzhan gyi rgyud la yang dag par thob par byed pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_sems kyi skad cig 
[\[177b.4\]]sems kyi skad cig la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du sems can thams cad la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/_sems can gcig gi 'du shes kyis sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las kyi bya ba la mngon sum du 'jug pa'i 
[\[177b.5\]]ye shes la mkhas pa/_sems can gcig gi sgra skad kyis sems can thams cad kyi skad la 'jug par ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_lus gcig la dmigs la sems can thams cad kyi lus la dmigs par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 
[\[177b.6\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na chos ston pa kun tu 'dzin pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang gzungs thams cad thob pa/_shin tu rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa ston cing sems can gyi khams thams cad 
[\[177b.7\]]kyi dbang po 'dzin par 'jug pa la mkhas pa/_sems can gcig gi sems la dmigs pas brjod du med pa'i rgyud du byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]go bar byed cing sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rim pa shes la sems can gzhan gyi rgyud la yang dag par thob par byed pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_sngon gyi mtha'i mu'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su 
[\[178a.2\]]dran pa la 'jug pas las dang bya ba dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du sems can la ston cing sems can la shes par byed pa la mkhas pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brgyan pa la mkhas pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu 'jug pa la mkhas pa/_sangs 
[\[178a.3\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang bdag gi spyod pa dang smon lam yang dag par skyed cing chos kyi snang ba rab tu gtong ba la mkhas pa/_rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig la bskal pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa/_rdul phra 
[\[178a.4\]]rab kyi rdul gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshad tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/_mtsho chen po rgya mtsho'i chu'i phung po thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig tu bcug ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad tsam gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 
[\[178a.5\]]'gro yang sems can rnams la gnod pa med pa la mkhas pa/_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa rang gi lus su 'jug cing sems can gyi bya ba thams cad kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/_khor yug dang khor yug chen po dang ri chen po gzhan grangs med cing bsam gyis mi khyab la 
[\[178a.6\]]mtshungs pa med cing gzhal du med de tshad med la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag spu'i khung bu gcig tu bcug ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro yang sems can rnams skrag par mi 'gyur ba la mkhas pa/_bskal pa brjod 
[\[178a.7\]]du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskal pa gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing bskal pa gcig kyang 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/_'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]chus 'jig pa dang mes 'jig pa dang rlung gis 'jig par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa rkang pa'i mthe bos mnan kyang sems can la gnod pa med par mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang chos kyi sprin gyis thob pa phyogs 
[\[178b.2\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can rnams la 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'tshe ba dang bcas pa dang /_gnod pa dang bcas pa dang mu ge'i mya ngan chen po byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa/_sems can gzhan la rnam par 'tshe ba med pa mngon par shes 
[\[178b.3\]]pa sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung bar kun tu ston pa sha stag ste/_bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/_/yang de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po nas lits+tsha bI gzhon nu dkon 
[\[178b.4\]]mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba lits+tsha bI gzhon nu nyi khri chig stong gis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po ri ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_g.yas phyogs logs su 'dug nas 
[\[178b.5\]]thams cad kyang mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/_/ga yA'i grong khyer chen po nas khyim bdag sngo sangs can zhes bya ba dge bsnyen lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[178b.6\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/khyim bdag bzang skyong yang khyim bdag lnga stong gis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[178b.7\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas thams cad kyang mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/_/khyim bdag legs sbyin yang khyim bdag lnga stong gis yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas thams cad mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/_/khyim bdag ded dpon bzang po yang g.yog mang po dang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[179a.2\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 'dug go/_/tsam pa'i grong khyer chen po nas kyang tshong dpon gyi bu lag bzang tshong dpon gyi bu brgyad khri bzhi stong 
[\[179a.3\]]gis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 'dug go/_/bram ze'i khye'u mis byin yang bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[179a.4\]]lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/_/bram 
[\[179a.5\]]ze'i khye'u dga' ba'i zla ba yang g.yog bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 'dug go/_/lus 'phags 
[\[179a.6\]]mo'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang srog chags lnga stong gis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas glang po'i dbang po nor skyong la zhon te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas de bzhon du rung ba'i sa ji tsam pa de tsam du nor skyong la zhon te/_khang bu brtsegs mas 
[\[179a.7\]]song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang gis bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzegs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_srog chags lnga stong dang lhan cig tu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 'dug go/_/grong khyer chen po bA rA Na sI nas tshong dpon gyi bu yul 'khor bzang po zhes bya ba yang tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[179b.2\]]phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 'dug go/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang lha'i bu zla ba dang /_lha'i bu shin tu rnam par gnon 
[\[179b.3\]]sems dang /_lha'i bu mtshan bzang dang /_lha'i bu gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med gzhal du med dpag tu med/_tshad med pa dag lha'i bu re re la yang g.yog lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/_lha'i bu 
[\[179b.4\]]re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das spu'i khung bu re re dang dpe byad 
[\[179b.5\]]bzang po dang mtshan re re nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'od phyung ste/_'od zer de re res kyang phyog bcu'i phyogs re rer sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/'jig 
[\[179b.6\]]rten gyi khams re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa 'ongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' re re yang rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po nang rgyar dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong yod pa/_rin po che'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba'i nor bu dang mu tig 
[\[179b.7\]]dang rin po che'i lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba'i nang na gnas shing lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_lha'i me tog gi sprin dang 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]rin po che'i sprin dang na bza'i sprin dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang a ga ru dang spos kyi sprin dang lha'i rol mo dang /_pheg rdob pa dang glu'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam gtor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 
[\[180a.2\]]'khod par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi phyogs tsam yang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong 
[\[180a.3\]]ba dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya che ba rgya che ba dag gis ma khebs par gyur pa med do yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong zhes bya ba stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom 
[\[180a.4\]]ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[180a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi 
[\[180a.6\]]sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas gang dang spyod pa ji lta bu dang tshul ji lta bu dang khyad par ji lta bu dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu 
[\[180a.7\]]dang brtson 'grus ji lta bu dang rab tu zhi ba ji lta bu dang /_ye shes la mkhas pa ji lta bu dang dran pa ji lta bu dang rtogs pa ji lta bu dang blo gros ji lta bu dang /_khrel mchis pa ji lta bu dang mos pa ji lta bu dang /_go cha ji lta bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi nyams shing yongs su mi nyams pa lags/_ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pas byung ba lags/_ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la brtson 
[\[180b.2\]]'grus sbyangs pa lags/_ji ltar na shes rab che ba lags/_ji ltar na ye shes chen po la mkhas pa lags/_ji ltar na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa lags/_ji ltar na ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams mi bskyud pas dran pa dang ldan pa lags/_ji ltar na dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar 
[\[180b.3\]]bgyis pa bzhin du skyes pas tshe rabs dran pa lags/_ji ltar na sems can gzhan la skul bas sngon gyi gnas pa la mkhas pa lags/_ji ltar na dbang po'i khyad par la mkhas pas blo dang ldan pa lags/_ji ltar na mtshan dang ldan pa lags/_ji ltar na sangs rgyas la 
[\[180b.4\]]lta ba dang chos nyan pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi 'bral ba lags/_ji ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis par de dag gi chos kyang thos la thams 
[\[180b.5\]]cad kyang kun tu 'dzin kun chub par bgyid/_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lags/_ji ltar na mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sreg pas me lce lta bu lags/_ji ltar na chos dkar po thams cad khong du chud pas zla ba lta bu lags/_ji ltar na ma rig pa'i mun pa 
[\[180b.6\]]thams cad sel bas nyi ma lta bu lags/_ji ltar na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis 'phags pas ri bo'i dbang po'i rgyal po lta bu lags/_ji ltar na zab mo la bzod pa mi phyed pas rdo rje lta bu lags/_ji ltar na lhun po brtsegs pa dang mtshungs shing 'dra bas mi 'jigs pa thob pa 
[\[180b.7\]]lags/_ji ltar na spobs pa thogs pa ma mchis pas dbyangs shin tu yongs su dag pa lags/_ji ltar na tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba rnam par nges pa la mkhas pas thos pa mang ba lags/_ji ltar na khro gnyer ma mchis la bzhin 'dzum zhing shin tu gsal ba lags/_
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]ji ltar na 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa lags/_ji ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dbyangs kyis go bar bgyid/_ji ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu stsal kyang sems can rnams kyis 
[\[181a.2\]]bdag cag gang du mchis pa yang ma 'tshal la/_bgyid pa de yang ma 'tshal/_ji ltar na sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams na yang kun tu gda' la/_gnas nas kyang mi g.yo/_
[\[181a.3\]]ji ltar na skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa dang 'chi 'pho ba dang mngal du 'jug pa dang btsas pa dang mngon par 'byung ba dang dka' ba spyod pa la spyod pa dang byang chub kyi snying por mchi ba dang bdud las rgyal ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /_yongs 
[\[181a.4\]]su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston cing bstan pa gnas par kun tu bstan pa yang ston/_ji ltar na sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang 
[\[181a.5\]]chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang skyong legs so legs so bzang skyong khyod 'di ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir 'di ltar khyod 
[\[181a.6\]]snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing /_bzang skyong khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni bzang skyong khyod yang legs so/_/bzang skyong de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong gis bcom 
[\[181a.7\]]ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sangs rgyas kyis rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/de la 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang gzhan rnams kyang 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa 
[\[181b.2\]]dang mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang phyin ci log gi mtshan nyid yang dag par 'joms pa dang /_bdag gi bag chags kyi sa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_gzhan mi dmigs pa dang /_srog la rlom sems med pa dang /_'khor ba la mi 'jug pa dang /_dngos po yongs su shes 
[\[181b.3\]]pa dang zhi gnas bsgom pa dang lhag mthong mngon sum du byed pa dang /_sems gnas pa dang dran pa mi g.yeng ba dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa nye bar zhi ba dang /_dge ba'i phyogs la yang dag par sten pa dang mi dge ba'i phyogs sel ba dang /_chags pa dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rab tu 
[\[181b.4\]]zhi ba dang ma rig pa sel ba dang rig pa la yang dag par sten pa dang /_rgyu yongs su shes pa dang lta ba yang dag par 'joms pa dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang /_ye shes 'byung ba dang srid pa zad pa dang dga' ba'i 'dod chags spong ba dang sangs rgyas la gcig tu nges pa dang 
[\[181b.5\]]chos la nem nur med pa dang /_dge 'dun la rnam par mi rtog pa dang mi 'byed pa'i tshig dang 'thun par sdums byed pa dang /_dben pa la gzhol ba dang bka' blo bde ba dang mu cor du mi smra ba dang zang zing med pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba spong ba dang sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang 'brel pa
