[\[181b.6\]]mdun du byed pa dang /_'phub mi byed pa dang 'jig rten gyi ya mtshan la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /_'khor ba la nyes dmigs su lta ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings 'dod pa dang /_g.yo med 
[\[181b.7\]]pa dang gya gyu med pa dang sgyu med pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa med pa dang kha gsag med pa dang /_gzhogs slong med pa dang /_thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti yongs su spong ba dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang shin tu bzod pa dang /_le lo med pa dang sgrib pa spong ba 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dang tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po las mi g.yo ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas mi ngoms pa dang /_
[\[182a.2\]]bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rtsen pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang sgyur ba dang /_blo tha dad pa med pa dang bems po ma yin pa dang mi 
[\[182a.3\]]'on mi lkugs pa dang /_gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po rnam par spong ba dang /_skyes bu dam pa'i gnas thob pa dang skyes bu ngan pa la mi lta ba dang byis pa rnams rnam par spong ba dang mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa dang /_dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa 
[\[182a.4\]]dang /_ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa dang /_khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dri ba dang /_dben pa la gnas pa dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /_chos rnams la bzod pa dang chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa ste/_'di ni bzang 
[\[182a.5\]]skyong rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pas shes pa 'thob bo/_/bzang skyong gzhan yang rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 
[\[182a.6\]]ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /_tshig thams cad la mtshams sbyar bar shes pa dang khyim gyi dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang /_khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' ba dang sems ma zhum pa dang /_chos thams cad la mngon par 
[\[182a.7\]]ma zhen pa dang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_chos sbed pa dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang /_rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba dang 'thab pa med pa dang /_'gyed pa med pa dang /_bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_rtogs pa yang 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]dag par 'dzin pa dang /_rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos nyid rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang /_chos gtan la dbab pa la mkhas pa dang /_chos kyi tshig la mkhas pa dang /_chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' shes pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa 
[\[182b.2\]]dang /_da ltar byung ba shes pa dang /_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa shes pa dang /_lus kyi gnas shes pa dang /_sems kyi gnas shes pa dang /_spyod lam srung ba shes pa dang /_las rnam par dag pa dang /_sgrib pa las shin tu 
[\[182b.3\]]'da' ba dang /_phung po yongs su shes pa dang /_khams mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /_skye mched sel ba dang /_srid pa spong ba dang /_mi skye ba'i bzod pa'i bya ba 'jug pa dang /_rgyu ston pa dang /_las dang 'bras bu chud mi gzon pa dang /_chos mthong ba dang lam sgom pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[182b.4\]]gshegs pa rnams dang phrad pa dang /_shes rab rno ba dang /_tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa dang /_sgra yongs su shes pa dang /_mchog tu dga' ba thob pa dang /_chos kyi dga' ba rjes su myong ba dang /_dran pa dang /_mnyen pa dang /_ngang bde ba dang khro gnyer med pa dang /_des pa dang 'grogs na 
[\[182b.5\]]bde ba dang tshig 'jam pa dang /_gsong por smra ba dang tshur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes smra ba dang /_snyom las med pa dang bla ma la gus pa dang /_bla ma la sri zhu che ba dang skye ba la mi dga' ba dang /_chos dkar pos mi ngoms pa dang 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang /_dgon pa'i gnas 
[\[182b.6\]]mi gtong ba dang /_sa rnam par 'jog pa dang /_dran pa chud mi gzon pa dang phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_mngon par shes pa mngon du bya ba la 'jug pa dang /_nyon mongs pa sel ba dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 
[\[182b.7\]]'joms pa dang /_khyad par du 'gro ba dang sgom pa'i rgyu 'thun pa dang /_ltung ba las 'byin pa la mkhas pa dang /_kun nas dkris pa rnam par gnon pa dang /_bag la nyal ba spong ba dang /_srid pa las shin tu 'da' ba dang /_tshe rabs dran pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]the tshom med pa dang /_las la sems pa dang skye ba la yid mi rton pa dang /_las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang nang gi skye mched yid la mi byed pa dang /_phyi'i skye mched rnams la kun tu mi rgyu ba dang /_bdag la mi stod pa dang gzhan la mi smod pa dang /_mi dga' ba la 
[\[183a.2\]]mi zhen pa dang so so'i skye bo la yid mi rton pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_gzi brjid che ba dang bdag shes pa dang nyams pa med pa dang /_spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la gnas pa dang gnod sems med pa dang tshig mi brlang ba dang gzhan la mi gnod pa dang /_
[\[183a.3\]]mdza' bo rjes su srung ba dang rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa dang /_sems can la gnod pa mi byed pa dang tshig 'jam pa dang /_khams gsum pa la mi gnas pa dang gsang ba'i tshig rnams srung ba dang /_chos thams cad la stong pa nyid dang 'thun par bzod pa dang thams cad 
[\[183a.4\]]mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu 'dun pa dang ye shes gsal ba dang /_tshul khrims brtan pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa la 'jug pa dang /_gcig pur dga' ba dang cung zad shes pas chog par mi 'dzin pa dang /_sems zhum pa med pa dang lta bar gyur pa rnam par spong ba dang /_gzungs 
[\[183a.5\]]thob pa dang ye shes thob pa dang gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la nan tan byed pa dang /_gtan tshigs dang rigs pa dang tshul gyi sgor gyur pa dang /_'doms pa dang rjes su ston pa dang spyod pa 'thun par bzod pa dang bzod pa'i sa dang ldan pa dang /_mi bzod pa med pa dang ye shes kyi 
[\[183a.6\]]sa dang ldan pa dang /_mi shes pa spong ba dang /_ye shes la gnas pa dang /_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud cing rab tu rtogs pa shes pa dang sems nges par sems pa dang /_skye bar nying mtshams mi sbyor 
[\[183a.7\]]ba dang nying mtshams mi sbyor ba shes pa dang khur bor ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang 'dod chags spong ba dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang gti mug spong ba dang rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang /_mi rigs pa dang bral ba dang /_dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]pa la nan tan byed pa dang mtshan mo mi nyal ba dang /_spong ba mi gtong ba dang chos dkar po rnams kun du srung ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_thabs la mkhas pa shes pa dang mtshan ma spong ba dang 'du shes las ldog pa dang /_mdo sde mngon par sgrub pa dang 'dul ba la mkhas 
[\[183b.2\]]pa dang /_bden pa la rnam par nges pa dang rnam par grol ba la mngon sum du bya ba la 'jug pa dang /_tshig gcig tu nges pa dang /_gtsigs par smra ba dang ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba dang /_thos pa yongs su tshol ba dang ye shes kyis mi ngoms pa dang /_sems yongs su dag 
[\[183b.3\]]pa dang /_lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_dogs pa med pa'i tshig dang stong pa nyid la kun tu sten pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa la sten pa dang smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs par shes pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pa dang sdug bsngal ba rnams la 
[\[183b.4\]]mi brnyas pa dang /_de dag la nor sbyin pa dang dbul po rnams la khyad du mi gsod pa dang tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la snying brtse zhing snying rje ba'i blo dang ldan pa dang /_phan pa'i dngos po dang ldan pa dang chos kyis phan 'dogs pa dang /_zang zing yongs su gtong ba dang tshul khrims dang 
[\[183b.5\]]ldan pa la g.yo med par sten pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas mgron du gnyer ba dang ji skad smras pa bzhin du byed pa dang /_phyir zhing brtson pa dang bsti stang byas pas dga' ba myong ba dang /_dpe shes pa dang sngon byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_
[\[183b.6\]]ming dang brdar brtags pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang btags pa kun tu 'joms pa dang /_bkur sti byed pa la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang bkur sti mi byed pa la btang snyoms su byed pa dang /_rnyed pa don du mi gnyer ba dang ma rnyed pas sro shi bar mi 'gyur ba dang grags pa la mngon par 
[\[183b.7\]]'dod pa med pa dang /_ma grags pa la khong khro ba med pa dang bsngags pa la rjes su chags pa med pa dang /_smad pa la spa gong bar mi 'gyur ba dang bde ba la mngon par mi chags pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyis mi skyo ba dang 'du byed kun tu mi 'dzin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i bsngags 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]pa la mi chags pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i brjod pa dang du len pa dang /_spyod yul ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang spyod yul la 'jug pa dang /_cho ga phun sum tshogs pa dang mi tshul ba rnam par spong ba dang /_sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la mi smod 
[\[184a.2\]]pa dang bstan pa kun tu srung ba dang /_smra ba nyung ba dang mnyen pa dang skabs kyi tshig la mkhas pa dang /_phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa dang dus su 'gro ba dang spyod lam brtags pa ma yin pa dang /_spyod lam mdzes pa dang don dang don ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_'jig 
[\[184a.3\]]rten shes pa dang bstan bcos shes pa dang /_gsal bar smra ba dang lag rkyong ba dang sems shin tu 'dzin pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang mi dge ba'i sems la smod pa dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan mi gtong ba dang spyod pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_mdzes par kun tu rgyu ba 
[\[184a.4\]]dang bla ma la ldang ba dang stan gding ba dang /_nga rgyal tshar gcod pa dang sems yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_don rab tu rtogs pa shes pa dang ye shes bskyed pa dang mi shes pa dang bral ba dang sems la 'jug shes pa dang /_sems kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud cing shes pa dang /_sgrub pa dang 
[\[184a.5\]]mi bsgrub pa sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi skad shes pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig rnam par gzhag pa shes pa dang don rnam par nges pa shes pa dang /_don ma yin pa rnam par spong ba dang /_bsam gtan rnams sgrub pa dang /_de dag 
[\[184a.6\]]gi ro myong bar mi byed pa dang sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta zhing so sor rtog pa dang /_sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la rnam par lta ba dang /_las thams cad 'byed pa dang /_las dang 
[\[184a.7\]]rnam par smin pa med pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_mos pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang brjed ngas pa med pa dang khams sna tshogs dang /_khams du ma mngon sum du gyur pa dang rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu mthong ba dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ting nge 'dzin la rnam par rtsen 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad gcig pa dang /_ming med pa dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /_kun tu 'gro ba'i lam shes pas lta ba dang /_zag pa zad pa dang /_spong ba dus gcig tu thob pa shes pa dang /_lha'i mig thogs pa med pas lta ba 
[\[184b.2\]]dang gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pas rnam par rtsen pa dang /_gzugs dang gzugs med pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa shes pa dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag gi tshul gyi gzungs la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_skad thams cad brag ca'i skad dang mtshungs pa nyid du shes pa dang /_ci rigs par 
[\[184b.3\]]chos ston pa dang sems can thams cad la legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa dang /_dbang po rje ba shes pa dang dus dang dus ma yin par rnam par lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang /_'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 
[\[184b.4\]]yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_tshar gcod pa mkhas par shes pa dang brtags pa ma yin pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med par yang dag par 'du ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog 
[\[184b.5\]]pa dang yongs su rtog pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa dang /_skad cig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du lus ston pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mig yor lta bu'i lus rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[184b.6\]]chos thams cad bstan pa kun tu 'dzin cing brjed pa med pa dang /_theg pa chen po las mi nyams pa dang theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba ston pa la mkhas pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_skye ba'i gnas thams cad du bya ba ci 
[\[184b.7\]]rigs par kun tu ston pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar go cha gyon kyang yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la mkhas par shes pa dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa shes pa dang /_bskal pa gcig 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]bskal pa grangs med pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_chos thams cad la mngon par 'byung ba'i gnas shes pa dang zhing thams cad yang dag par 'du ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_bskal pa grangs med pa bskal pa gcig la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_zhing 
[\[185a.2\]]gcig zhing thams cad du ston pa shes pa dang sems can gcig gi lus la sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par 'du ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jug pa shes pa dang /_rang gi lus kyi spu'i khung bu'i 
[\[185a.3\]]phyogs gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med pa 'jug pa shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud cing shes pa dang /_rang gi lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 
[\[185a.4\]]dgang ba shes pa dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par rtogs par shes pa la mkhas par shes pa dang /_lus thams cad la lus 'jug pa shes pa dang /_skad gcig brjod pas skad thams cad nges par sgrog pa shes pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa thams cad kyi tshul rtogs 
[\[185a.5\]]par shes pa dang /_tshig gcig las brtsams te bskal pa bye ba grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med pa ston pa shes pa dang /_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang sgrub pa dang mi sgrub pa shes pa la rnam par dpyod pa dang /_phrugs dang cha dang snrel zhi'i 'byed pa bstan pa shes pa 
[\[185a.6\]]dang /_thabs dang shes rab chen po'i 'od zer rab tu gtong ba shes pa dang /_bdud kyi lam thams cad las shin tu 'da' ba shes pa dang /_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi sngon du ye shes 'gro ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis sems can gyi khams thams cad 
[\[185a.7\]]tshim par byed cing /_bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi brjod pa khong du chud pa dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i chos sgrub pa la the tshom med pa dang /_yo byad la dbang thob pa dang skye ba thams cad la dbang thob pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan 
[\[185b.2\]]pa mtshungs pa sbyin pa'i gnas su sems pa shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa chos dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra bas khebs par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[185b.3\]]dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba thob pa dang /_mtsho chen po rgya mtsho'i gting tshod yangs pa shes pa dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer chen po'i dra ba rab tu gtong ba shes pa dang /_sems sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang mnyam pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[185b.4\]]gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_tshig dang nges pa'i tshig bstan pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang ma bstan par rang gis bzod pa thob pa shes pa dang /_spu'i khung bu gcig nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgya mtsho'i chu'i phung po 
[\[185b.5\]]rab tu 'thor ba shes shing sems can la chus gnod pa yang med pa dang /_sems rin po che lta bu dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad sel ba shes pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams tshad med pa sogs pa dus gsum du yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i cho ga shes 
[\[185b.6\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul thams cad la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_rang gi 
[\[185b.7\]]smon lam rgyun mi gcod cing sems can nye bar 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i byin gyis brlab pa kun tu ston pa shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rnam par lta ba mngon sum du shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_sems zhi zhing rab tu 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang longs spyod thams cad kun tu bstan pa shes pa dang /_thos pa tshad med pa 'dzin pa yang dag par rdzogs pa dang thos pa thams cad kyis mi ngoms shing mi chog la rgyun mi 
[\[186a.2\]]gcod pa dang /_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang /_tshul sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_lkugs pa/_rna mi gsang ba/_grum po/_blun 
[\[186a.3\]]po/_'on pa/_long ba thams cad la spyod lam kun tu ston pa dang /_bskal pa grangs med pa se gol gcig gtogs pa srid du byin gyis rlob cing chos ston pa shes pa dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir lag na rdo rje brgya stong grangs med bsam 
[\[186a.4\]]gyis mi khyab gzhal du med dpag tu med tshad med pa phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dbul po dang sdug phongs pa byin gyis rlob pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rang 'byung gi ye shes la lta ba la mngon sum du shes pa dang /_nyan thos dang 
[\[186a.5\]]rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod lam kun tu ston pa dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byin gyis rlob pa shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med cing bsam 
[\[186a.6\]]gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med gzhal du med de/_tshad med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag sems kyi skad cig gcig la bstan pa thogs pa med pa shes pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang spyod lam 
[\[186a.7\]]bskal par kun tu ston pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan byed pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor lha'i bu mo glu len 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]cing rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs dang pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs len pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba shes pa dang /_gnas gang 
[\[186b.2\]]nas kyang g.yo ba med la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la blta zhing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_mchod pa'i las rgyun mi gcad pa shes pa dang sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mthong ba dang thos pa don yod pa 'dod cing gnas pa dang /_sems can yongs su 
[\[186b.3\]]smin pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gdul ba'i phyir sems kyis skad cig la dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa dang 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyod pa kun tu ston pa dang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba kun tu ston pa dang mngon par 
[\[186b.4\]]rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa nas ji tsam du dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang /_nub pa'i bar phyogs bcu thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag kun tu ston pa yang shes la/_shin tu 
[\[186b.5\]]mngon par rdzogs par yang 'tshang mi rgya ba ste/_bzang skyong 'di ni rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yongs su sbyangs pa bya ba gang zhe na/_bzang skyong gang yang kun tu mi 'dzin pa/_
[\[186b.6\]]mi 'dor ba/_mi 'jog pa/_'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi ba/_chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa/_chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/_chos thams cad la mi rtog pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa/_rnam par mi sgrub pa/_kun nas mi slong ba/_mi skyed pa/_
[\[186b.7\]]rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang kun tu rtog pa yang dag par gcod pa/_sems kyi dmigs pa yid la mi byed pa/_rnam par shes pa yang dag par gcod pa/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug yang dag par gcod pa/_mtha' dang mtha' med pa yid la mi byed pa/_
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]yid la byed pa yang dag par gcod pa/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin shes pa/_dran pa dang blo gros dang mos pa dang rtog pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang spyod pa dang cho ga dang /_spyod yul la nan tan du byed cing gnas pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i sa dang 
[\[187a.2\]]ldan pa/_zhi ba'i sa dang ldan pa/_spros pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul thams cad dang /_yon tan thams cad yongs su 'grub pa 'di ni bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yongs su sbyang ba 
[\[187a.3\]]bya'o/_/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' ni chos la sems shing chos dpyod pa yin te/_des ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skur yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na chos kyi sku las gzhan du'ang dmigs pa lta ci smos/_bzang skyong 'di la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar 
[\[187a.4\]]so sor brtag par bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i don ji lta bu/_ci gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/_'on te gzugs las gzhan zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yin snyam du de ltar dpyod pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_
[\[187a.5\]]gzugs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin la/_gzugs las gzhan pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs ni bems po g.yo ba med pa/_dpyod pa med pa/_rtswa dang /_rtsig pa dang /_shing dang /_bong ba dang /_mig yor lta bur ngan pa/_dbu ba rdos pa lta bu 
[\[187a.6\]]yin zhing /_'byung ba chen po bzhi phan tshun nas bsdus pa ni gzugs zhes bya'o/_/gzugs ni rten cing 'brel pa las 'byung ngo /_/gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de mi rtag pa'o/_/gang mi rtag pa de sdug bsngal ba'o/_/gang sdug bsngal ba de bdag med pa'o/_/gang bdag 
[\[187a.7\]]med pa de rang bzhin med pa'o/_/gang rang bzhin med pa de snang ba med pa'o/_/gang snang ba med pa de yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/_/gang yang dag pa ma yin pa de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos so/_/gang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos de mi bden pa'o/_/gang mi bden pa de de bzhin nyid ma yin no/_/
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]gang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bden pa/_yang dag pa/_de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/_ma log pa bden pa smra ba/_yang dag pa smra ba/_shes pa smra ba/_ye shes kyi mtshon cha can/_ye 
[\[187b.2\]]shes mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_stobs bcu dang ldan pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa/_mi rtog pa rnam par mi rtog pa/_mi gos pa/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_grangs kyi chos rnams kyis mi 'grangs pa/_
[\[187b.3\]]ma byas pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_'jug pa med pa/_mtha' yas pa/_gnas med pa/_rnam par mi rig pa/_rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/_kun tu rgyu ba med pa/_shin tu dag pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_ma byung ba/_spyod pa med pa/_gnas med pa'o snyam mo/_/de 'di 
[\[187b.4\]]ltar so sor rtog ste/_gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_gzugs las gzhan pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te gzugs las gzhan pa zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yin na ni nam mkha' yang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam 
[\[187b.5\]]mkha' ni gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_rnam par mi rig pa/_gnas pa med pa/_gzung du med pa/_gnas med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa'o snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_gal te gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_gzugs las 
[\[187b.6\]]gzhan pa yang ma yin na/_ci tshor ba de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ram/_'on te tshor ba las gzhan pa zhig snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_tshor ba de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_tshor ba las gzhan pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin 
[\[187b.7\]]gshegs pas ni gang ci tshor yang rung ste de thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o/_/gang sdug bsngal ba de rtog pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/rtog pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o/_/ngan pa'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]reg pa 'dus pa las byung ba'o/_/reg pa las skyes pa ni tshor ba'o zhes gsungs na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni chu'i chu bur lta bu ma yin/_ngan pa ma yin/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni reg pa las skyes pa ma yin/_rig pa 
[\[188a.2\]]'dus pa las byung ba ma yin/_tshor ba ji lta ba bzhin du reg pa las skyes pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ste/_tshor ba dang bral ba/_tshor ba thams cad kyi mchog brnyes pa/_
[\[188a.3\]]gdung ba thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa/_nyon mongs pa dang gtse ba dang gnod pa thams cad spangs pa/_ma bcings pa/_ma grol ba/_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rnyog pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa 
[\[188a.4\]]mi mthong ba/_mi thos pa bsnam du med pa/_myang du med pa/_rig par byar med pa/_mtshan mar med pa/_rnam par mi reg pa/_rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o snyam mo/_/des de ltar so sor brtags na tshor ba de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_tshor ba las gzhan pa yang ma yin 
[\[188a.5\]]no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te tshor ba las gzhan zhig de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur na ni/_rtswa dang shing gel pa dang /_sman dang 'khri shing dang /_nags tshal thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rtswa dang shing gel pa dang /_sman dang 'khri shing 
[\[188a.6\]]'dzings pa dang /_nags tshal thams cad ni tshor ba med pa'o snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_gal te tshor ba de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_tshor ba las gzhan pa yang ma yin na/_ci 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_'on te 'du shes las gzhan pa zhig gam snyam 
[\[188a.7\]]mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_'du shes las gzhan pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu/_mig dang gzugs dang snang ba dang /_yid la byed pa 'dus pa las nges par byung ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]pa ni 'du shes ma yin te/_smig rgyu lta bu ma yin/_mig dang gzugs dang /_snang ba dang yid la byed pa las nges par 'byung ba ma yin/_'du shes ji lta ba bzhin du mig dang gzugs dang /_snang ba dang yid la byed pa 'dus pa las byung ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin 
[\[188b.2\]]gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_bsam par bya ba ma yin pa/_sems pa med pa/_sems pa dang bral ba/_sems mtshungs pa med pa/_'gro bar 'jug pa med pa/_'ong bar 'jug pa med pa/_'gro ba med pa/_'gro ba yang dag par gcod pa/_dpags pa ma yin pa/_
[\[188b.3\]]gcad du med pa/_bu ga med pa/_rdzas ma yin pa/_tha dad pa ma yin pa/_dbyer med pa yang dag pa/_rtsom pa med pa/_bzhugs pa med pa/_reg par byar med pa'o snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_'du shes las gzhan pa 
[\[188b.4\]]yang ma yin no/_/gal te 'du shes las gzhan pa zhig de bzhin gshegs par gyur na ni shing dang bong ba thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shing dang bong ba thams cad ni 'du shes med pa'o snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_gal te 'du 
[\[188b.5\]]shes de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_'du shes las gzhan pa yang ma yin na ci 'du byed rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_'on te 'du byed rnams las gzhan pa zhig gam snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_'du byed rnams de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_'du byed 
[\[188b.6\]]rnams las gzhan pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'du byed rnams ni dngos po med pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos can/_ma rig pa 'dus pa las byung ba'o/_/'du byed rnams ni ma rig pa 'dus pa las skyed pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni dngos po med pa ma yin/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]
[\[188b.7\]]pa ma yin/_slu ba'i chos ma yin/_'du byed rnams ji lta ba bzhin du ma rig pa 'dus pa las skyes pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma rig pa 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ste/_gzugs na spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma dang 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]bcas pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las shin tu 'das nas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhi ba'o/_/mi snang ba'o/_/bltar mi mthong ba'o/_/mtha' yas pa'o/_/sprin dang mtshungs pa'o/_/rab tu ma zhi ba'o/_/
[\[189a.2\]]rab tu zhi ba ma yin pa'o/_/zhi ba dang bral ba'o/_/zhi ba med pa'o/_/dag pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/len pa med pa'o/_/byams pa med pa'o/_/'khor byed med pa'o/_/'khor byed dang bral ba'o/_/mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o/_/mdud pa med pa'o/_/'chi 'pho med pa'o/_/
[\[189a.3\]]'chi 'pho bar mi 'gyur ba'o/_/chos ma yin pa'o/_/chos ma yin pa yang ma yin pa'o/_/zhing ma yin pa'o/_/zhing ma yin pa yang ma yin pa'o/_/mi zad pa'o/_/mi zad pa yang ma yin pa'o/_/zad pa dang bral ba'o/_/skad cig pa'o/_/mi 'khrugs pa'o snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor 
[\[189a.4\]]rtog ste/_'du byed rnams de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_'du byed rnams las gzhan pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te 'du byed rnams las gzhan pa zhig de bzhin gshegs par gyur na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dngos po med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos 
[\[189a.5\]]po med pa ni 'du byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_gal te 'du byed rnams de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_'du byed rnams las gzhan pa yang ma yin na/_ci rnam par shes pa de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ram/_'on te rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa 
[\[189a.6\]]zhig gam snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_rnam par shes pa de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu/_gsob gsog yang dag pa ma yin pa/_'du byed 'dus pa las skyes 
[\[189a.7\]]pa/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa/_'dus pa las byung ba yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsob ma yin/_yang dag pa ma yin pa ma yin/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'dus pa las nges par skyes pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshul 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'dus pa las byung ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/_yi ge med pa/_sgra med pa/_yul med pa/_dngos po med pa/_sems med pa/_ldan pa ma yin pa/_mi ldan pa yang ma 
[\[189b.2\]]yin pa/_blo gros med pa/_blo gros med pa yang ma yin pa/_rtogs pa med pa/_rtogs pa med pa yang ma yin pa/_'gro ba med pa/_'gro ba med pa yang ma yin pa/_gnyis su med pa/_gnyis lta bur bya ba ma yin pa/_mi 'da' ba/_mtshan nyid med pa/_mtshan nyid dang bral ba/_
[\[189b.3\]]mtshan nyid ma yin pa/_ma spros pa/_sgo ma yin pa/_chags pa med pa/_chags pa dang bral ba/_'thun par byed pa/_de bzhin nyid kyis rab tu phye ba/_de kho na ma yin pa/_de kho na ma yin pa yang ma yin pa'o snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_rnam par shes pa de bzhin 
[\[189b.4\]]gshegs pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa yang ma yin no/_/gal te rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa zhig de bzhin gshegs par gyur na ni mig yor yang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig yor ni rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[189b.5\]]de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa las mi dmigs/_ma 'ongs pa las ma yin/_da ltar byung ba las mi dmigs so/_/mi dmigs pas mi rtog go/_/rnam par mi rtog go/_/mi rtog na so sor mi gnas so/_/so sor mi gnas na 'phro bar 
[\[189b.6\]]mi byed do/_/mi 'phro na zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhum pa med na yongs su gdung ba med do/_/yongs su gdung ba med na kun tu gdung ba med do/_/kun tu gdung ba med na rjes su gdung ba med do/_/gang rjes su gdung ba med na de mi gdung ba'o/_/gang mi gdung ba de kun tu 
[\[189b.7\]]mi rgyug go/_/rnam par mi rgyug go/_/gang mi rgyug pa de rnam par mi rgyug go/_/rnam par mi rgyug pa de mi nyams so/_/gang mi nyams pa de rnam par mi 'khyam mo/_/gang rnam par mi 'khyam pa de 'khyam pa med do/_/gang 'khyam pa med pa de 'khyam pa ma yin pa'o/_/
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]gang 'khyam pa ma yin pa de rlom sems med pa'o/_/gang rlom sems med pa de bag yod pa'o/_/gang bag yod pa de 'phags pa'o/_/gang 'phags pa de dgra bcom pa'o/_/gang dgra bcom pa gang yin pa de la bdag gi rdul med do/_/sems can gyi rdul 
[\[190a.2\]]med do/_/srog gi rdul med do/_/gang zag gi rdul med do/_/phung po'i rdul med do/_/khams kyi rdul med do/_/skye mched kyi rdul med do/_/dngos po'i rdul med do/_/rgyu'i rdul med do/_/rkyen gyi rdul med do/_/dmigs pa'i rdul med do/_/kun 'byung ba'i rdul med do/_/nga rgyal 
[\[190a.3\]]gyis lhag par byed pa'i rdul med do/_/tshor ba'i rdul med do/_/'dod chags kyi rdul med do/_/zhe sdang gi rdul med do/_/gti mug gi rdul med do/_/khro ba'i rdul med do/_/khon du 'dzin pa'i rdul med do/_/nga rgyal gyi rdul med do/_/nga rgyal dang 'chab pa dang yongs su gdung ba'i rdul med 
[\[190a.4\]]do/_/nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi rdul med do/_/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi rdul med do/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rdul med do/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi rdul med do/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi rdul med do/_/gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rdul med 
[\[190a.5\]]do/_/'khor ba'i rdul med do/_/rnam pa de lta bur rdul mi dmigs te/_gang 'dod chags dang bral zhing rdul med pa de dag 'phags pa zhes bya/_dgra bcom pa zhes bya/_grol ba zhes bya/_rnam par grol ba zhes bya/_lha'i dam pa zhes bya/_rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya/_
[\[190a.6\]]sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_de chos gang la yang rlom sems med do/_/rlom sems med pa kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa med na kun tu gdung ba med do/_/kun tu gdung ba med na rang bzhin thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin thob na chos gang la yang 
[\[190a.7\]]mi spyod do/_/mi spyod na 'di ltar ci gzugs byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_'on te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_su zhig byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_ci 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]phung po lnga chos ston tam/_phung po lnga ni yang dag pa ma yin pa/_sgyu ma lta bu/_gsob gsog dngos po med pa/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'dus pa las byung ba'o/_/chos kyi dbyings ni gsob ma yin/_gsog ma yin/_yang dag pa ma yin pa ma yin/_tshul 
[\[190b.2\]]bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa las byung ba ma yin/_sgyu ma lta bu ma yin/_smig rgyu lta bu ma yin/_chu zla lta bu ma yin/_brag ca lta bu ma yin na su zhig chos 'di ston/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzang skyong chos kyi dbyings ni dag pa/_bden pa/_yang dag pa/_gzhan ma yin pa/_de 
[\[190b.3\]]bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid yin na/_de ston pa su yin/_phung po lnga rnams ni mi rtag pa/_sdug bsngal ba/_stong pa/_bdag med pa/_rten cing 'brel par byung ba/_ngan pa 'jig pa'i chos can no/_/byang chub ni ji lta ba bzhin du spros pa med de/_gzung du med pa/_sgra med pa/_mi 
[\[190b.4\]]snang ba/_bltar med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_mtha' yas pa/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_mnyam pa med pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_sems dang yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/_sgra skad thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa/_yul na mi gnas pa/_phyogs na mi 
[\[190b.5\]]gnas pa/_brtag tu med pa/_bstan du med pa zhi ba zhi ba dang bral ba/_bsil bar gyur pa/_kun gzhi med pa/_gnas med pa/_'dus ma byas pa/_mi skye ba/_mi 'gog pa/_mi gnyis pa la gnas pa/_de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/_mi 'gyur ba de bzhin 
[\[190b.6\]]nyid/_ma 'ongs pa de bzhin nyid/_'gro ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa'o/_/bzang skyong de bzhin nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_rnam par dag pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin nyid ni 'khor ba ma yin yongs 
[\[190b.7\]]su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin nyid ni skye ba ma yin/_'gag pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin nyid ni tha ma ma yin/_'bring ma yin/_mchog ma yin no/_/de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings te/_chos kyi dbyings ni bdag dang chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]gnas ma yin/_chos kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas ma yin/_chos thams cad kyi gnas ma yin te/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi gnas/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gnas/_chen po stong pa nyid kyi gnas/_mchog gi stong pa nyid kyi gnas/_shin tu gnas pa'i gnas so/_/
[\[191a.2\]]chos kyi dbyings ni mi g.yo ba/_mi gnas pa/_gnas med pa/_rang bzhin med pa/_rgyu ba med pa/_blang ba med pa/_dor ba med pa/_khas len pa med pa/_'dzin pa med pa'o/_/gang chos 'di shes shing shes pa la yang rlom sems med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi 
[\[191a.3\]]dbyings ni sangs rgyas te/_sangs rgyas ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o/_/rdul med pa'o/_/zhi ba'o/_/bsil bar gyur pa'o/_/ma skyes pa'o/_ma 'gags pa'o/_/phung po ni spros pa dang bcas pa ste/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_spros pa dang bcas pa'i 
[\[191a.4\]]phung po lnga ji ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya snyam nas/_de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_ci gzugs byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_'on te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_gzugs 
[\[191a.5\]]ni bems po/_g.yo ba med pa/_sems pa med pa/_rtswa dang /_rtsig pa dang /_shing dang /_mig yor lta bu ste/_de ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu ngan pa/_reg pa 'dus pa las byung ba ste/_de yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[191a.6\]]par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/_mig dang gzugs dang snang ba dang /_yid la byed pa 'dus pa las byung ba ste/_de yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/'du byed rnams ni dngos po med pa [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos can/_ma rig pa 
[\[191a.7\]]'dus pa las byung ba ste de dag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu/_gsob/_gsog_/yang dag pa ma yin pa/_'du byed 'dus pa las nges par skyes pa/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'dus pa las byung ba 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]ste/_de yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o snyam mo/_/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_gal te phung po lnga byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya na/_mtshan gyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_ci chos kyis 
[\[191b.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_'on te dge ba'i rtsa bas sam/_de ji lta bu zhig snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_mtshan gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/gal te mtshan gyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur na ni 
[\[191b.3\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'khor los sgyur ba yang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_gal te mtshan gyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[191b.4\]]mi rgya na ci chos kyi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_chos kyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos ni gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa/_
[\[191b.5\]]gnas med pa/_snang ba med pa/_bstan du med pa/_bltar mi mthong ba/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/_de yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/_gal te chos kyis byang chub mngon 
[\[191b.6\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya na dge ba'i rtsa bas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_de ji lta bu zhig snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_dge ba'i rtsa bas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[191b.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba bsdus nas byang chub kyi snying po la mi 'dug la/_sangs rgyas nyid bzung nas kyang mi ldang ste/_de rgyu gzhan dang gzhan la so sor brtags na ma dmigs pa dang /_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de su zhig snyam mo/_/des de ltar so sor 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]brtags na dge ba'i rtsa ba yang ma dmigs nas/_ci dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gzugs kyis bsags pa zhig gam/_'on te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pas sam/_gzugs ni bems po/_g.yo ba med pa/_sems pa med pa ste/_
[\[192a.2\]]des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags/_tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu ngan pa/_rten cing 'brel par byung ba/_reg pa 'dus pa las byung ba ste/_des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags/_'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu/_mig dang gzugs dang /_snang ba dang /_yid la byed pa 'dus pa 
[\[192a.3\]]las byung ba ste/_des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags/_'du byed ni dngos po med pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa/_slu ba'i chos can ma rig pa 'dus pa las byung ba ste/_de dag gis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags/_rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu/_gsob gsog yang dag pa ma yin pa/_'du 
[\[192a.4\]]byed 'dus pa las nges par skyes pa/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'dus pa las byung ba ste/_des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags so snyam nas des de ltar brtags pa dang /_gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa de mi dmigs so/_/des de ltar brtags na mi dmigs te/_mi 
[\[192a.5\]]dmigs so snyam pa'i rlom sems kyang med do/_/gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de yang mi dmigs te/_mi dmigs so snyam pa'i rlom sems kyang med do/_/des byang chub kyang mi dmigs te/_mi dmigs so snyam pa'i rlom sems kyang med do/_/'di la su zhig mngon par 
[\[192a.6\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de yang mi dmigs te/_mi dmigs so snyam pa'i rlom sems kyang med do/_/des de ltar so sor brtags nas byang chub kyi rlom sems kyang med/_sems can gyi rlom sems kyang med/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rlom sems kyang med pa de bzang skyong 
[\[192a.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/_de chos gang la yang rlom sems med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de chos gang yang skye ba yang mi mthong /_'gag pa yang mi mthong ste/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhi ba'i gnas khong du chud pas de'i phyir sangs 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]rgyas zhes bya ste/_de ni rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_kun tu rtog pa thams cad la mi 'jug ste/_de ni zhi ba'o/_/bsil bar gyur pa'o sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_bzang skyong 'di ni rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya 
[\[192b.2\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'byung ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[192b.3\]]'das rnams ma skyes/_ma 'gags kyang skye zhing 'gag par kun tu gda' ba dang yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod la/_'khor bye ba grangs ma mchis pa la chos ston par yang kun tu gda' ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[192b.4\]]kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal gang yon tan gyi snying po bcu gnyis kyis mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la bskal pa snyigs ma yang 
[\[192b.5\]]kun tu ston pa dang dus snyigs ma dang /_sems can snyigs ma dang /_nyon mongs pa snyigs ma dang /_tshe snyigs ma dang /_theg pa tha dad pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar ston pa dang /_chos ston pa sna tshogs dang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sna 
[\[192b.6\]]tshogs dang /_gzhan mu stegs can gyis dkrugs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_bdud dang bdud kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_bdud kyi las dang pha rol gyi dmags tshogs kyis gtse ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_yul 'khrug pa dang khrag khrug dang /_chom po'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_
[\[192b.7\]]kla klos dkrugs pa dang /_rkun pos dkrugs pa dang /_mu ges dkrugs pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_lus srul po'i 'khrug pa yang kun tu ston cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa de dag kyang med la/_de bzhin 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_spyod pa dang smon lam dang thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can yongs su smin par byed pas sems can rnams kyi bya ba de dag shes kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams 
[\[193a.2\]]cad du btang snyoms pa ste/_rnam par mi rtog pa 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas par blta'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yon tan gyi snying po gang dag 
[\[193a.3\]]dang ldan pa dang /_yon tan gang dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i yon tan gyi snying po bcu gnyis po de bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[193a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bskal pa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/_dus kyi snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sems can gyi snying po dang ldan pa yin/_zhing gi snying po dang ldan pa yin/_theg pa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sa'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bstan pa'i 
[\[193a.5\]]snying po dang ldan pa yin sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu dang gcer bu pa rnams mi rgyu ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rang bzhin gyis dkar po'i chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[193a.6\]]sems can rnams gnas pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'phags pa'i skye bo'i snying po dang ldan pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa yin te/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni yon tan gyi snying po bcu 
[\[193a.7\]]gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa yin no/_/der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa tha dad pa rnam par 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]gzhag pa med par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal gal te de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kha cig la ni theg pa chen po ston/_kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_sems can kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ston tam/_
[\[193b.2\]]de ltar gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa sems yongs su ma dag par 'gyur/_sems mi snyoms par 'gyur/_mngon par chags par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyi tshe ba'i snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs kyi 'du shes kyi skyon du ltung bar 'gyur/_de bzhin 
[\[193b.3\]]gshegs pa slob dpon chos kyi dpe mkhyud byed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa chos gang ci ston kyang rung /_chos de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la gzhol ba/_theg pa chen po la 'bab pa/_theg pa chen po la bab pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob 
[\[193b.4\]]par byed pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa ste/_'jam dpal de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa tha dad pa rnam par gzhag pa med do/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te theg pa tha dad pa rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na/_'di ni nyan 
[\[193b.5\]]thos kyi theg pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/'di ni theg pa chen po'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la theg pa gsum bstan pa de ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal theg pa tha dad pa zhes bya ba de ni sa rnam par 
[\[193b.6\]]gzhag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/'jam dpal rab 'bring tha ma'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag par bstan to/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag rnam par gzhag par gzhag go/_/tshogs chung ngu bsags pa'i 
[\[193b.7\]]sems can rnams dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir theg pa tha dad par gzhag gis theg pa ni tha dad du dbyer med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/_'jam dpal 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]theg pa bstan pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas sgrib pa med par gsungs so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_'phong gi slob dpon mkhas pa 'phong shes pa'i mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa/_thabs dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang 'bad pa dang spyod lam 
[\[194a.2\]]sna tshogs ston cing slob ma la 'phong slob kyang 'phong shes pa de gcig yin pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'phong gi slob dpon mkhas pa yang chos kyi tshul sna tshogs la 'jug pas khams dang /_bsam pa dang mos pa tha dad par sems can rnams la 
[\[194a.3\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gcig las theg pa gsum du ston to/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_me stag chung ngu yar ba yang rtswa'i rgyu dang ldan zhing mched na sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me lta bur tshig par nus par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du phyir mi ldog 
[\[194a.4\]]pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba'i me stag gcig po de yang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyir mthar gyis mched cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i snang ba'i bar du byed nus par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]phra mo thams cad [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge 
[\[194a.5\]]ral pa can gyis mdun na 'dug par nus pa med do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu pa dang /_'tsho ba can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun na 'dug par ram tshig smra bar nus pa med de/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang /_
[\[194a.6\]]mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa'i skyes bu chen po'i seng ge'i mdun na sgra sgrog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med de/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa ni ma gtogs so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i 
[\[194a.7\]]dkyil 'khor shar ba 'od zer gyi dra ba brgya stong grangs med pa rab tu 'byed pas/_srin bu me khyer thams cad 'od med cing /_lam me ma yin lhang nge ma yin te/_mdzes pa ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i ye shes chen po'i 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar nas/_ye shes chen po'i 'od zer brgya stong grangs med pa rab tu bkye bas/_gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu pa la sogs pa thams cad 'od med par 'gyur te/_lam me ma yin/_lhang nge ma yin zhing /_mdzes pa ma yin pa 'di 
[\[194b.2\]]ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i yul de ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu pa rnams kun tu snang ngo /_/de ci'i 
[\[194b.3\]]phyir zhe na/_gzhan mu stegs can gyi sgo de dag thams cad ni rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba/_thabs mkhas pa chen pos rnam par rtsen pa/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun yid la byed 
[\[194b.4\]]pa dang ma bral ba/_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i mchog gi pha rol tu son pa ste/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[194b.5\]]khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can de dag sems can re re nas/_'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyis tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis theg pa chen po gang len pa 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa de'i sha las nyi ma re re 
[\[194b.6\]]zhing yang srang lnga lnga sen mos gcad par bya ste/_de tshul de lta bus srog dang dbral lo zhes smra ba la/_'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' de skad smra bas mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur te/_tha na skrag pa'i sems kyang mi skyed/_zhum pa med/_god pa med/_the tshom med la/_
[\[194b.7\]]phyir zhing chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson te/_klog pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/_'jam dpal/_sems dpa' ba/_sbyin pa la dpa' ba/_tshul khrims la dpa' ba/_bzod pa la dpa' ba/_brtson 'grus la dpa' ba/_bsam 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]gtan la dpa' ba/_shes rab la dpa' ba/_ting nge 'dzin la dpa' ba zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' de gsod pa'i mi de dag la mi khro zhing /_tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed na/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa/_
[\[195a.2\]]dbang po dang mtshungs pa/_lhun po dang mtshungs pa/_mi g.yo ba/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_byams pa la gnas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa gso ba la mos pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod yul ba/_sems sa dang mtshungs pa/_sems chu dang mtshungs pa/_sems me dang 
[\[195a.3\]]mtshungs pa/_sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ste/_sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_tha ba sel ba'i phyir zhugs pa'o/_/'jam dpal gang gis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams las sangs rgyas re re la yang 
[\[195a.4\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos rab tu bkang ste/_dbul ba phul la/_de ltar dbul bas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par dbul ba phul ba bas/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang gis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 
[\[195a.5\]]chos 'di thos nas/_phyogs gcig tu song ste/_'di ltar sems kyis mngon par rtog cing 'di lta bu'i chos la bslab par bya'o zhes slob par 'dod na/_des ma bslabs su zin kyang bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/_byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po sbyin 
[\[195a.6\]]pa'i bsod nams ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i sems bskyed ma thag pa des chos bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byams pa yongs su bzung ba yin/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[195a.7\]]kyi bka' dang mi 'gal bar byas pa yin/_de nan tan snying por byed pa yin/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin te/_chos bzhi po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/_/gzhan yang chos bzhi yongs su 'dzin te/_
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i blo'i rnam par thar pa yongs su 'dzin pa ste bzhi po de dag go/_/'jam dpal chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[195b.2\]]chen po zhes bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dus su sbyin pa dang /_g.yo med cing sgyu med pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang shin tu gus pa ste chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/_byang 
[\[195b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po gang zhig 'di skad ces gal te khyod sems can gcig gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig yang dag par bsgrubs te/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba 
[\[195b.4\]]la zan chang gcig tsam sbyin zhing bsgrub na yang de'i phyir ngas khyod kyi sha sen mos btogs te med par bya'o zhes zer la/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' de skad zer ba la mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing 'jigs pa med kyi/_'di ltar sems skyed de/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[195b.5\]]kyi lus kyi sha sen mos bcad de bor yang bdag spro bar bya'i bdag sems can gcig gi phyir yang ji tsam du chung ngu na yang dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig yang dag par mi bsgrub tu mi gtang ngo snyam nas sems bskyed pa gcig po des byang chub sems dpa' des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[195b.6\]]thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin zil gyis gnon to/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang zil gyis gnon te/_bla na med pa 
[\[195b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brgya byin dang tshangs pa 'thob cing myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]zhe na/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can rnams la snying rje bskyed na de snying rje dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos bzhi yongs su 'dzin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_brtan pa'i sems yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /_snying 
[\[196a.2\]]rje chen po yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_phyin ci log gi shes pa spangs nas phyin ci ma log pa'i ye shes 'thob pa'o/_/gzhan yang chos bzhi yongs su 'dzin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa mchog yongs su 'dzin te/_tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa mchog de dang 
[\[196a.3\]]ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' lha gzhan la rton par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dran pa phun sum tshogs pa mchog 'thob ste/_dran pa phun sum tshogs pa mchog de dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' skye bar skye na/_tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[196a.4\]]mchog yongs su 'dzin te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa mchog de dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/_gal te sangs rgyas ni ma byung la 'dzam bu'i 
[\[196a.5\]]gling du skyes na yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur/_'dzam bu'i gling na sbyin pa'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas dang gzhan mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba de dag mgu bar byed par 'gyur/_de dag mgu bar byas nas/_bsod snyoms 'bul bar 
[\[196a.6\]]'gyur ba dang /_lha rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/_nam bag med par gyur pa de'i tshe yang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis skul bar 'gyur/_bskul nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur/_de'i dran 
[\[196a.7\]]pa chud mi za bar 'gyur/_byang chub yang dag par 'grub pa'i rgyur brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de sems bskyed pa des rnam par dag par byed pa'i chos lnga yongs su 'dzin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_lus rnam par dag pa dang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa rnam par dag pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas la rten/_chos la rten/_dge 'dun la rten/_byang chub sems dpa' la rten/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 
[\[196b.2\]]la rten pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/_'jam dpal rnam par dag par byed pa'i chos de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad kyi srog bcad de/_de dag gi bdog pa thams cad 
[\[196b.3\]]phrogs pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gi sems bskyed pa/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la zan chang gcig byin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byas na/_de de bas ches sdig 
[\[196b.4\]]pa grangs med par skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed par gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mdo sde dkon mchog sangs rgyas kyi ye shes skyed pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la mos pa'i byang 
[\[196b.5\]]chub sems dpa' la smod cing bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod/_'dum par mi byed/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral bar byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba la mos pa dang bral bar byed cing bar chad byed na/_de mi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa des sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[196b.6\]]de der skyes nas lus dpag tshad lnga brgya pa 'grub bo/_/lus de la yang mgo lnga brgyar 'gyur ro/_/mgo bo re re la yang lce lnga brgya lnga brgyar 'gyur ro/_/lce re re la yang thong gshol lnga brgya lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur te/_bskal pa ji snyed cig gis byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub 
[\[196b.7\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de snyed kyi bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skyes nas sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i bar chad bya bar zhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/gang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i bar chad bya ba'i 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]phyir zhugs pa de sangs rgyas kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o/_/chos kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o/_/de lha'i rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o/_/de tshangs pa thams cad kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir 
[\[197a.2\]]zhugs pa'o/_/de mi'i 'jig rten gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o/_/de sems can thams cad kyi bde bar sbyar ba thams cad gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'o/_/'jam dpal gang la la byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i phyir 'jug pa de la rnam pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen 
[\[197a.3\]]po skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro/_/chos thos 
[\[197a.4\]]nas kyang rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom par 'gyur/_rang rgyal bar 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po bzhir 'gyur/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang 'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 
[\[197a.5\]]lhar 'gyur/_zla ba dang nyi mar 'gyur/_skar ma dang rgyu skar dang /_tshogs dang tshogs kyi bdag po chen por 'gyur/_drag po dang drag po chen por 'gyur/_sangs rgyas las brten te/_tshangs par 'gyur/_tshangs pa chen por 'gyur/_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don du 'gyur/_
[\[197a.6\]]'od chung dang tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_mi che dang mi gdung dang /_gya nom snang dang shin tu mthong dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams su 'gyur/_sangs rgyas 
[\[197a.7\]]las brten te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_rgyal phran du 'gyur/_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas las brten te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyur/_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]sangs rgyas las brten te mi'i 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas las brten te skyid pa dang /_nor che ba dang mdzod mang ba dang /_lus shin tu 'jam par 'gyur/_glang po ches 'gro bar 'gyur/_rtas 'gro ba dang /_dpung bu chung gis 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems 
[\[197b.2\]]dpa' gang la la gzhan gyi khyim rnams su byang chub sems dpa' la phrag dog dang /_ser sna byed na des de'i tshe gzhi de las 'jigs pa chen po gsum shes par bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_dmus long gi 'jigs pa dang /_yul mtha' 
[\[197b.3\]]'khob tu skye ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_'jigs pa gsum mo/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpas bsod snyoms blangs te/_rid pa dang phongs pa dang sprang po dang /_slong ba rnams la bgos te byin na de dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshe brjes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen po 
[\[197b.4\]]dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa la chos ston cing snying rje bas don du 'dod/_phan par 'dod/_sems can de dag la bde ba dang /_grub par 'dod kyi rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti don du mi gnyer na de dge ba'i rtsa ba des shes rab rno bar 'gyur 
[\[197b.5\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/_brgya byin rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/_tshangs pa rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/_mi'i dam pa sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal ba'i sems 
[\[197b.6\]]can mthong na snying rje skyed cing /_bde ba'i sems can mthong na mchog tu dga' ba skyed na de tshe brjes nas dge ba'i rtsa ba des lus gser gyi mdog can du 'gyur ro//_//bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[197b.7\]]pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang du 'phags pa'i lam brjod par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'du byed yod pa la 'phags pa'i lam brjod par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yang gnas pa med pa'o/_/gnas med pa la 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]rnam par shes pa gnas pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa gnas pa med na 'phags pa'i lam la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/'phags pa'i lam gyi gnas gang yin pa de ni mig gi gnas/_rna ba'i gnas/_sna'i gnas/_lce'i gnas/_lus kyi gnas/_yid kyi 
[\[198a.2\]]gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig ni mig gis dben no/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni yid kyis dben no/_/cis dben zhe na 'das pas dben no/_/ma 'ongs pas dben no/_/da ltar byung bas dben no/_/mig gi dben pa la mig gi dben pa 
[\[198a.3\]]yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi dben pa la yid kyi dben pa yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin no/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang /_chos kyi dben pa la chos kyi dben pa yod pa 
[\[198a.4\]]yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag dang bdag gi dang /_rtag pa dang brtan pa dang /_ther zug dang mi 'gyur ba'i chos can shin tu dben pa'i phyir te/_stong pa zhes kyang mi brjod/_mi stong pa zhes kyang mi brjod kyi de ni 'das pa zhes kyang mi brjod la/_
[\[198a.5\]]'das pa ma yin pa zhes kyang mi brjod do/_/ma 'ongs pa zhes kyang mi brjod la/_ma 'ongs pa ma yin pa zhes kyang mi brjod do/_/da ltar byung ba zhes kyang mi brjod la/_da ltar byung ba ma yin pa zhes kyang mi brjod do/_/'di ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes kyang mi 
[\[198a.6\]]brjod la/_brjod pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni 'das pas stong ngo /_/ma 'ongs pas stong ngo /_/da ltar byung bas stong ngo /_/gang 'das pas stong pa dang ma 'ongs pas stong pa dang da ltar byung bas stong pa de ni 'das pas dag pa'o/_/ma 'ongs pas dag go/_/
[\[198a.7\]]da ltar byung bas dag go/_/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang gzhom pa ma yin pa de gzhom par nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni mnyam pa lags te/_nam du yang mi mnyam par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas mi mnyam pa med par chos bstan to/_/'jam dpal gang mi mnyam pa med na mi gzhom pa'o/_/gang gzhom pa ma yin zhing mnyam pa de ni mi mnyam pa med pa'o/_/ltos pa med pa'o/_/'jug pa med pa'o/_/'gro ba med pa'o/_/'gro 
[\[198b.2\]]ba yang dag par chad pa'o/_/shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/gang dag gis shes par bya ba ma yin zhe na/_mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid rnams kyis shes par bya ba ma yin no/_/'du byed du gyur pa thams cad kyis shes par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ni lus kyi 'du byed dang ngag gi 'du 
[\[198b.3\]]byed dang /_yid kyi 'du byed 'gags pa'o/_/ci'i rgyus 'gag_/ci sngon byung ba la de dag phyis 'gags pa zhig gam/_'on te 'das pa na zhig pas 'gags sam/_gang zhig pas 'gags/_de sngon mi shes pa la rab tu gnas pas mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed do/_/de shes nas 
[\[198b.4\]]mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/gang sngon 'phags pa'i chos la ma brten te/_mi shes pa la rab tu gnas pas mi dge ba'i las byed pa de 'phags pa'i lam la brten te/_ye shes kyis rtogs nas mngon par 'du byed do/_/gang ye shes kyis stong pa de stong pa nyid de/_mig ni ye shes 
[\[198b.5\]]kyis stong ngo /_/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyang de bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ye shes ni ye shes kyis stong ste/_stong pa nyid mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid do/_/yid mi dmigs pas mig mig la mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shin tu ma 
[\[198b.6\]]skyes pa'i phyir mig mi gnas te/_rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyang de bzhin no/_/yid mi dmigs pas mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyang yid la mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir te/_mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang 
[\[198b.7\]]lus dang yid kyang mi gnas so/_/de mi gnas pas bsil bar gyur pa/_dben pa'i sems kyis gnas so/_/dben pa ci zhe na/_'jam dpal gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' dang /_gnyis su med pa'i mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_shin tu 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]'byung ba med pa'i mtha' de ni dben pa zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal dben pa la ni skye ba dang rga ba dang /_'chi ba med do/_/gang la skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba med pa de la sdug bsngal med do/_/gang la sdug bsngal med pa de la sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo /_/gang la sdug 
[\[199a.2\]]bsngal mi 'byung ba de 'jigs pa med do/_/gang 'jigs pa med pa de sems dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o/_/gang sems dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba de ni ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o/_/gang ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa de dben pa ste/_de dang des gnas pas de bzhin 
[\[199a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dben par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs par brtags pa ni brtags pa med pa'o/_/chos thams cad mi mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong 
[\[199a.4\]]ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig ni tshig thams cad las 'das pa ste/_bstan du med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal ngas ni chos thams cad kyi yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis bstan pa 'gag pa'i phyir chos ston gyi 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni yi ge gcig kyang 
[\[199a.5\]]mi brjod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la sems kyi 'jug pa med do/_/sems kyi las med do/_/sems las nges par sems pa med do/_/sems kyi rgyu ba med do/_/sems yongs su rtogs pa med do/_/sems kyi zhi gnas med do/_/sems kyi rjes su 
[\[199a.6\]]'brang ba rnam par shes pa med do/_/rang gi sems kyi gnas med do/_/gzhan gyi sems kyi gnas med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'i sems med do/_/mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la gnas 
[\[199a.7\]]pa'i sems med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos la gnas pa'i sems med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhi ba'o/_/bsil bar gyur pa'o/_/rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'o/_/mi snang ba'o/_/bltar 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]med pa'o/_/mtha' yas pa'o/_/sprin dang mtshungs pa'o/_/de lta mod kyi 'on kyang sems can rnams sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang /_spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/nges par 
[\[199b.2\]]sems so/_/kun tu 'dri'o/_/gang dag ji ltar dbang po yongs su smin pa'i sems can rnams dang /_gang dag ji ltar 'dul ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar gsung 'byin par shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes ma 'gags pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[199b.3\]]gang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mi mthong ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/_/gang chos gang yang mi mthong ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad spangs pa ste/_chos gang gis kyang brjod pa yang ma yin/_
[\[199b.4\]]mi brjod pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gang chos thams cad dang chos ma yin pa rnams dang 'dus byas rnams dang 'dus ma byas pa rnams mi dmigs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal 
[\[199b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad spangs pa ste/_chos gang yang khas mi len to/_/nye bar mi len to/_/chos su btags pa yang mi 'gro'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad shin tu 'gag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_
[\[199b.6\]]chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gang gis kyang mthong bar mi 'gro ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar mthong na chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes 'jug 
[\[199b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'o zhes 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/yul med pa yul dang bral ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo zhes 'jug par 'gyur 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]ro/_/'jam dpal ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes so/_/de rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par 
[\[200a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems sgyu ma lta bu'i phyir ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro/_/de rang gi lus chos nyid kyi 
[\[200a.3\]]phyir sems can thams cad kyi lus chos nyid du khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi lus chos nyid kyi phyir rang gi lus chos nyid du khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir rang gi lus la sems can thams 
[\[200a.4\]]cad kyi lus 'jug cing yang dag par 'du'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi lus la yang rang gi lus rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par 'du'o/_/'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi lus la sangs rgyas kyi sku byin gyis rlob ste/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg 
[\[200a.5\]]pa yang de bzhin no/_/rang gi lus dang rang gi lus ma yin pa dang zhing gi tshogs byin gyis rlob bo/_/de bzhin du sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du byin gyis rlob ste/_chu'i khams dang sa'i khams dang me'i khams dang 
[\[200a.6\]]rlung gi khams su byin gyis rlob bo/_/me'i khams dang sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang rlung gi khams su byin gyis rlob bo/_/rlung gi khams dang sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang me'i khams su byin gyis rlob bo/_/de'i byin gyis brlabs de ni brgya byin nam/_tshangs pa'am/_
[\[200a.7\]]bdud dam/_gzhan gang gis kyang 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par bskul pa'am/_/spyod par nus pa'i de lta bu'i gnas med do/_/'jam dpal spyod pa 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mngon 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]par shes pa drug dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang byin gyi rlabs bzhi yang dag par 'jug go/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mngon par shes pa drug dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu 
[\[200b.2\]]rtsa bdun dang byin gyi rlabs bzhi ji ltar yang dag par 'jug ce na/_'jam dpal gang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i shes pa de ni don so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/gang don ji lta ba bzhin du rton pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/gang chos mi skye mi 'byung mi 'gag par 
[\[200b.3\]]rtogs pa de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/gang nges pa'i tshig gis nges par rtogs pa 'di ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/gang gzugs rnam par mthong ba na khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams la mig chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa de ni/_
[\[200b.4\]]de'i mig gi mngon par shes pa nyams pa med pa'o/_/gang gzugs la yi ge gcig brjod pas gzugs kyi don thams cad thos pa de ni de'i rna ba mngon par shes pa nyams pa med cing chags pa med de sgrib pa med pa'o/_/gang gzugs la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_
[\[200b.5\]]sems las byung ba rnams la chags pa med cing dbyer med par sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa de ni de'i pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa nyams pa med cing chags pa med de sgrib pa med pa'o/_/gang gzugs la sems can thams cad kyi sems snang ba la 
[\[200b.6\]]gcig tu mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa shes pa de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa nyams pa med cing chags pa med de sgrib pa med pa'o/_/gang gzugs kyi sngon dang phyi ma'i ming dang nges pa'i tshig mtha' yas pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul khrims kyis 
[\[200b.7\]]lhag pa'i bsam pas 'jug pa de ni de'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa nyams pa med cing lhun gyis grub ste/_chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'o/_/gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'dod chags med cing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]tshul gyis gzugs la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang gti mug gis mi gos par shes pa de ni de'i zag pa zad pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa nyams pa med cing chags pa med de sgrib pa med pa'o/_/gang mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[201a.2\]]gzugs la mi skye mi 'gag mi gnas par shes pa de ni de'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/gang mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs la myong ba skye ba med par shes pa de ni de'i tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes 
[\[201a.3\]]bya'o/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis gang gzugs la dmigs pa de dang de la sems med cing sems yod pa ma yin te/_sems dang bral ba de ni sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'i tshul gyis gang skye mched bcu gnyis 
[\[201a.4\]]la 'du shes phyin ci log med pa dang /_sems phyin ci log med pa dang lta ba phyin ci log med pa dang /_gdeg pa med pa dang /_gzhag pa med pa de ni chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis gang gzugs la mi skye ba dang mi 
[\[201a.5\]]'gag pa dang gnas pa med par shes shing /_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'du shes dang yang mi 'du ba de ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o/_/yid la byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis gang gzugs la mi skye ba 
[\[201a.6\]]dang mi 'gag pa dang gnas pa med par shes shing /_sdug bsngal las shin tu mi 'da' ba'i tshul gyis gdeg pa med cing gzhag pa med la/_sdig pa la gnas pa med de spong ba de ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o/_/yid la 
[\[201a.7\]]byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis gang gzugs mthong nas khams dang skye mched mi skye ba dang mi 'gag pa dang gnas pa med par shes shing chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid mi skye ba'i tshul gyis gdeg pa med cing gzhag pa med la/_mi dge ba mi dmigs shing /_dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]rnams skyed pa de ni dge ba'i chos ma skyed pa rnams skyed pa'i yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o/_/yid la byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis gang gzugs la skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang gnas pa med par shes shing /_gnas med pa dang skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang gnas pa 
[\[201b.2\]]med pa'i tshul gyis gdeg pa med cing gzhag pa med la/_dge ba mi dmigs par dge ba sbyor ba de ni dge ba'i chos rnams gnas par bya ba yang dag par spong ba zhes bya'o/_/nyams pa med pa'i tshul gyis gang gzugs la gnas med cing sgrib pa med par 'dun la chos kyi dbyings 
[\[201b.3\]]mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis kha dog gi snang ba thams cad kyis gzugs khyab la/_ji ltar yongs su smin pa bzhin du 'dul bar 'dun pa de ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bya'o/_/rgyun mi chad pa'i tshul dang phyi ma'i mtha'i mur rgyun mi gcod pa'i tshul dang /_gzhag 
[\[201b.4\]]pa med pa'i tshul gyis gang gzugs la blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba yongs su smin pa bzhin du 'dul bar spro ba 'di ni chos nyid dbyer med pas brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 
[\[201b.5\]]thob pa med pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la sems mi 'dzin cing sbyor ba med pas mnyam pa nyid dang dmigs pa las shin tu 'da' ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya la gnas pa dang /_bsam gtan mkha' khyab la snyoms par
