[\[201b.6\]]'jug pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob par byed pa'i sems rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bya'o/_/dpyod pa med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis gzugs la skye ba med par shes pa la gcig tu nges pa dang /_dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis mtshan nyid thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs 
[\[201b.7\]]par dpyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dpyod pas rnam par 'phrul pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems tshim par byed pas dpyod pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bya'o/_/chos thams cad thob pa med pa'i tshul gyis gang gzugs la dmigs pa thams cad gnas med 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]par dad pa dang dbang po la rtog pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i chos rnams la dad pa dang /_dbang po zhum pa med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la dad pa de ni dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/gdeg pa med pa dang gzhag pa med 
[\[202a.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis gang gzugs la dmigs pa thams cad mgo gcig tu gyur pa dang /_rnal 'byor gyi rgyun mi gcod pa de ni brtson 'grus zhes bya ste/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgyun mi gcod pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[202a.3\]]gshegs pa'i gnas la dbang po 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gang gzugs la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis dmigs pa las shin tu 'das nas gcig dran te/_dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig tu dran pa de ni dran pa zhes bya ste/_sems can thams cad kyi sems sems su 
[\[202a.4\]]mtshungs pas/_dmigs pa gcig gis sems can gyi khams thams cad khyab pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i byin gyi rlabs de ni dran pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang g.yeng ba med pa'i tshul gyis gang gzugs la yid la byed pa 
[\[202a.5\]]thams cad gcig pa dang /_gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa gcig pa dang mtshan nyid thams cad mtshan nyid gcig ste/_g.yeng ba med pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thun mong ma yin pa de ni 
[\[202a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshul dang /_g.yeng ba med cing mi thul bas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la gnas med pa'i shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /_skye ba med pa'i mthar yang dag 
[\[202a.7\]]par 'dus pa'i spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad skye ba med pa la 'jug pa'i shes rab kyis 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gnyis las shin tu 'da' ba dang /_gnyen po med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs de la gang mtshan nyid gcig tu 'jug pa de ni shes rab ces bya ste/_nyi tshe ba'i shes 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]pas mi thul ba'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi dbang po zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la chags pa med cing dmigs pa med la mi thul ba'i don dang /_dad pas 'phrogs pa med pa'i don de ni dad pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la kun tu 'gro ba'i byin gyi rlabs la spro ba dang /_stobs dang /_
[\[202b.2\]]stobs ma yin pa'i 'du shes las shin tu 'da' ba dang /_khams la de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su sgrub pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_rnam par mi sgrub pa dang lhun gyis grub pa'i dran pa'i shes pa dang /_shin tu mthar 
[\[202b.3\]]thug pa la 'jug pa'i mchog dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mtshungs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku la dran pa nye bar gzhog pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi thul ba'i shes pa de ni dran pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 
[\[202b.4\]]kyi mthar thug pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi las yang dag par sgrub pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin lhun gyis grub pa'i thob pa dang /_phyin ci log thams cad la g.yeng ba med pa shes pa de ni mi thul ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la chos kyi dbyings 'khrugs 
[\[202b.5\]]pa med par rtog pa dang /_mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa gnyis su med par rab tu shes pa dang /_rnam par gzhag pa'i mtha' la lhun gyis grub pa'i dran pa shes pa dang gnas pa med pa'i dngos po rab tu shes pa de ni shes rab kyi stobs zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la gnas med pa'i dran pa 
[\[202b.6\]]mngon du yang dag par rtog pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul dang 'thun pa dang skye ba med pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi dran pa yid la byed pa med pa'i tshul du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/gang gzugs la chos kyi dbyings su rab tu 
[\[202b.7\]]shes pa dang /_mi dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi shes pas rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang /_chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis khong du chud pa de ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/gang gzugs la rang bzhin gyis chos kyi sku yin pas mi 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]thul bar mngon du yang dag par rtog pa dang /_chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba de ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/gang gzugs la dbyer med par rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang /_
[\[203a.2\]]dpyod pa'i shes pa dang lhun gyis grub pa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa bya ba gnas med pa'i shes pa'i yang dag par 'grub pa dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms dang ye shes kyi dga' ba myong ba'i shes pa de ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/gang 
[\[203a.3\]]gzugs la dmigs pa thams cad yid la byed pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa'i shes pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i skye mched thams cad la dngos po dang dngos po med pa mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/gang gzugs la rnam par bltas nas 
[\[203a.4\]]chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag sgrib pa med pa'i rkyen dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad gcig tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/gang gzugs la dngos po 
[\[203a.5\]]med pa'i rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du mngon du yang dag par rtog pa dang /_gzugs dang gzugs med pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_rtsod pa dang rnam par 'byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang lhun gyis grub pa dang /_'du shes dang ye shes la mnyam pa nyid dang thob 
[\[203a.6\]]pa'i chos thams cad mi skyed pa dang /_rgyu ba med pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms shes pa dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam rnams skye ba med pa'i mtha' dang thob pa rnams mi tshol ba de ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/gang gzugs mthong 
[\[203a.7\]]nas khams dang skye mched rnams la dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du mthong zhing yan lag dang yan lag med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang /_'phags pa'i lam rnams lam med pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang mi 'grogs pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam rnams dang 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]lta bar gyur pa thams cad mtshan nyid med par gcig pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang mi 'grogs pa dang /_mi 'khrugs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang /_chos thams cad mthong ba'i tshul gyis lta ba zhes bya ba dang /_mi skye ba thob pa'i tshul gyis lam zhes bya ba'am/_mnyam 
[\[203b.2\]]pa nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis lta ba zhes bya ba dang /_lam dang lam ma yin pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i tshul gyis lam zhes bya ba de ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa thams cad 
[\[203b.3\]]gcig pa ste/_'di lta ste dngos por mi rtog pa dang dngos po med par mi rtog pa dang chad par mi rtog pa dang /_rtag par mi rtog pa dang skye bar mi rtog pa dang mi skye bar mi rtog pa dang /_rtog pa dang mi rtog pa la mi rtog pa dang rtog pa med pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lam la 
[\[203b.4\]]mi rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la chos thams cad brjod du med pa dang brjod pa med pa dang /_dbyangs dang dbyangs med pa mnyam pa nyid dang ming med pa dang ming du brjod pa med pa dang /_tshol ba med pa dang lam gyi yan lag ma yin pa dang yang dag pa zhes 
[\[203b.5\]]bya ba ngag gi lam thams cad la kun tu mi rgyu zhing mi rjod pa dang /_lam zhes bya ba'i chos ma lus pa brjod pa de ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o/_/gang gzugs la las thams cad kyi rang bzhin la las med par mngon par zhen pa 'di lta ste/_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mngon par 
[\[203b.6\]]zhen pa dang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa thob pa rnams la tshol ba med pa dang yang dag pa tshol ba'am/_log pa tshol ba'am/_log pa ma yin pa tshol ba'am/_las tshol ba'am/_las ma yin pa tshol ba'am/_las dang las ma yin pa thams cad khas mi len pa de ni nges 
[\[203b.7\]]pa dang ma nges pa dang /_yang dag pa nyid dang log pa nyid dang dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang lung du mi ston pa dang /_mi g.yo ba mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang lam dang lam ma yin pa mtha' yas pa skye ba med par bsdus pa dang /_mig yor lta bu'i tshul gyis las kyi mtha' 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]thams cad mi byed pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la kun tu longs spyod pa dang kun tu longs spyod pa ma yin pa shes pa dang /_de la gnas pa chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag pa dang /_log pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa 
[\[204a.2\]]dang mi dmigs pas 'tsho ba dang /_las 'jig pa de ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya ste/_yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go/_/'tsho ba zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i tshig go/_/lam zhes bya ba dang lam ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni mi tshol ba'i don gyis lam 
[\[204a.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/'tsho ba dang 'tsho ba ma yin pa'i 'du shes la rnam par mi rtog pa'i don gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don te/_de ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis gang gzugs la 
[\[204a.4\]]lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rtsol ba med pa ni chos kyi dbyings la rtsol ba med pa ste/_yang dag pa zhes bya ba de ni mi skye ba la gnas pa'i chos rnams blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni lus dang ngag dang yid mi dmigs pa'i tshig go/_/
[\[204a.5\]]lam zhes bya ba de ni blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa'i tshul dang /_mi tshol ba'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i don tshol ba ste/_de ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la dran pas mi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid ni dran pa med pa dran pa med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa la sbyor ba ste/_yang 
[\[204a.6\]]dag pa zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid sgro btags pa med pa'i tshig go/_/dran pa zhes bya ba de ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rjes su dran pa'i tshig go/_/stong pa nyid rjes su dran pa'i tshig dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rjes su dran pa'i tshig dang /_de ltar de bzhin 
[\[204a.7\]]gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin lhun gyis grub pa'i rjes su dran pa'i tshig de ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la dbyer med pa shes pa ni mnyam pa nyid dang ting nge 'dzin gyi las yang dag par bsgrubs pa ste/_gzugs gang dang mnyam pa tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]rnam par shes pa yang de dang mnyam zhing /_phung po gang dang mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting 
[\[204b.2\]]nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gang dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su 
[\[204b.3\]]mthong ngo /_/byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad gang dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa 'das pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de dang mnyam par yang 
[\[204b.4\]]dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams ji lta ba bzhin du las dang rnam par smin pa yang de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/_dus 
[\[204b.5\]]gsum mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs la zhugs pa de ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/gang gzugs la de kho na shes pa dang de bzhin nyid shes pa de ni bden pa shes pa ste/_chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyi rang bzhin no/_/
[\[204b.6\]]chos nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin med par bden pa nyid du mos so/_/byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba de ni slu ba med pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi slu ba gang yin pa de ni bden pa'i phyir ro/_/de la gnas pa ni yang 
[\[204b.7\]]dag pa'i smon lam brjod pa dang las yang dag par spyod pa mngon sum du 'gyur te/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston par byin gyis rlob bo/_/sa'i bden pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa chu dang me dang rlung gi bden pa nyid kyang 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]de dang mnyam mo/_/nam mkha' dang chos dang sgra dang mig yor dang gzugs brnyan dang /_mtshan nyid dang bcas pa dang mtshan nyid med pa dang chags pa dang bcas pa dang /_chags pa ma yin pa dang bsdus pa'i bskal pa dang /_rgya che ba'i bskal pa dang grangs yod pa'i bskal 
[\[205a.2\]]pa dang grangs med pa'i bskal pa dang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa dang /_sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i bskal pa dang 'das pa'i bskal pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa'i bskal pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa'i bskal pa dang 'das 
[\[205a.3\]]pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa yang de dang mnyam ste/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bskal pa la rnam par byang ba'i bskal pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i bskal pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bskal pa dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyi bskal pa la mnyam pa nyid kyi bskal pa 'jug 
[\[205a.4\]]ste/_'jug pa shes pa de la mngon par zhen pa med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings bden pa nyid kyi phyir bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ste/_gzugs nyid bden pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa nyid bden pa'o/_/de la gnas pa'i bden pa'i ngag 
[\[205a.5\]]gang yin pa de byin gyis brlabs te/_de ni bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/_/gang mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyis gang gzugs la 'dzin pa med pa dang /_mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang gtong ba dang dor ba de ni gtong ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/_/gang gzugs la blang ba med pa dang 
[\[205a.6\]]dor ba med pa shes pa de ni g.yo ba dang 'gul ba thams cad zhi ba'o/_/byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba ni zhi ba de la gnas nas kun nas nyon mongs pa ni rnam par byang bar byin gyis rlob pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ni kun nas nyon mongs par byin gyis rlob pa dang zhi ba de la gnas nas spyod lam kun tu 
[\[205a.7\]]bstan pas tshangs pa nye bar zhi ba'i spyod lam can rnams kyang 'dod pa skyed pa dang lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun tu bstan pas ma zhi ba'i spyod lam can rnams sam/_bdud thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs la mos par byed pa'o/_/nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs ni byis pa 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]so so'i skye bo thams cad shin tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba ste/_nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de ni nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/_/gang gdeg pa med pa dang gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs la chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer 
[\[205b.2\]]med par shes shing spros pa dang bral ba'i shes rab kyis shin tu zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba dang /_spros pa med pa'i chos thams cad phung po dang khams dang skye mched thams cad la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa de ni shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/_/yang na byin gyi rlabs zhes 
[\[205b.3\]]bya ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi gnas te/_de'i phyir bdag gis lus 'dom gang tsam po 'di la 'jig rten gdags par bya'o/_/'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang 'jig rten 'gog pa dang 'jig rten 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye 
[\[205b.4\]]shes kyi bar yang gdags par bya'o snyam pa ste/_de ni shes rab kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi 
[\[205b.5\]]stobs du zhig dang ldan na rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 
[\[205b.6\]]dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs sum cu rtsa drug dang ldan na rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob ste/_sum cu rtsa drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_smon lam rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_
[\[205b.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_yongs su bsngo ba rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_thos pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_cho ga dang spyod yul rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]ye shes kyi stobs dang /_dran pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_thabs la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_sems can la dmigs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_mtshan ma la dmigs pa'i rnam par dag 
[\[206a.2\]]pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_gtong ba rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_sems can rjes su 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_byams pa chen po yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_snying rje chen po rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[206a.3\]]ye shes kyi stobs dang /_dga' ba dang btang snyoms chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_tshul khrims kyis rjes su 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi 
[\[206a.4\]]stobs dang /_bzod pas rjes su 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag par len pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_khams la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[206a.5\]]ye shes kyi stobs dang /_bsam gtan la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_zhi gnas la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_shes rab rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_thos pa rnam par nges pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi 
[\[206a.6\]]stobs dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par nges pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_shes pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_lhag mthong la mkhas pa 
[\[206a.7\]]rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_rig pa dang rnam par grol ba rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_mi skye ba la bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_don dam pa 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]dang kun rdzob rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang /_'dun pa dang brtson 'grus tshad med pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs te/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs sum cu rtsa drug po de dag dang ldan na rab tu zhi ba rnam 
[\[206b.2\]]par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/'jam dpal yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[206b.3\]]re rer yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams la lha'i zas dang /_lha'i ras bcos bu'i na bza' rnams phul ba dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra 
[\[206b.4\]]rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos rab tu bkang ste/_dbul ba phul ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i phyir yang nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i mchod rten tshad 'dzam bu'i gling tsam du yod pa/_srid pa'i 
[\[206b.5\]]rtse mor thug pa/_nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra ba bres pa/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sgreng ba/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas bskus pas/_'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag 
[\[206b.6\]]byas te/_mchod rten re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis bskal par lha'i mchod pa mtshungs pa med par byas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang gis dad pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la mos nas/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems 
[\[206b.7\]]can la zan chang gcig tsam byin na bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang brgya stong gi cha dang bye ba brgya'i cha dang bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di la dad de/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyi bsnyen bkur byas pa bas byang chub 
[\[207a.2\]]sems dpa' gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin 'di la mchog tu 'jug na de de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis bskal pa khrir dkon mchog gsum la dbul ba phul ba bas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang gis rab tu zhi ba 
[\[207a.3\]]rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming thos te/_thos nas kyang tha na yud tsam zhig nyan 'dod par gyur na de de bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par byed pa'i bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[207a.4\]]dag bka' stsal to/_/dran pa ldan zhing blo gros ldan/_/shes rab ldan pa mi 'jigs pa/_/de ni tshe rabs thams cad du/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes pa/_/skad cig gcig la mnyes byed na/_/gang dag ngas ni sngon bshad pa/_/mi khom 
[\[207a.5\]]brgyad rnams rnam par spong /_/gzugs dang kha dog phun sum tshogs/_/mtshan rnams kyis kyang legs par brgyan/_/mthu stobs dang yang rab tu ldan/_/le lo 'dod par yod mi 'gyur/_/skyid cing nor yang chen por 'gyur/_/bsod nams ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/_/'jig rten 
[\[207a.6\]]snang byed mthong nas kyang /_/phyi phyir zhing ni mchod pa byed/_/bdag med stong pa thos nas kyang /_/de ni chos la mi rmongs te/_/chos rnams ji bzhin mkhas pa ni/_/dad pa myur du rab tu thob/_/rigs kyi mchog dang mod pa dang /_/skyid pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_/sbyin pa'i 
[\[207a.7\]]bdag po dpa' bor 'gyur/_/ser sna med cing lhug par gtong /_/gang dag la la 'dzam gling du/_/khyad par 'phags pa mdzes par rigs/_/der ni brten pa skyes pa dang /_/smad pa'i 'gro bar ma yin dang /_/skye ba kun tu 'di lta bur/_/khyim bdag dbang cher 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]grags pa dang /_/dpal dang gzi brjid 'phags pa yang /_/tshul 'dir yi rang spyad par 'gyur/_/bram ze sA la che 'dra ba/_/tshul khrims ldan dang mang thos 'gyur/_/rgyal rigs sA la che 'dra ba/_/skyid cing nor yang chen por 'gyur/_/bsod nams mdzod kyis 'phags pa yi/_/
[\[207b.2\]]rgyal po rdzu 'phrul cher 'gyur te/_/rgya mtshor bcas dang rir bcas kyi/_/sa la chos kyi ston par 'gyur/_/rin chen bdun gyi dbang phyug che/_/'khor los sgyur ba rgyal dbang 'gyur/_/rgyal por gnas nas sangs rgyas la/_/phyi phyir bsti stang byed par 'gyur/_/shi 'phos nas ni 
[\[207b.3\]]mtho ris 'gro/_/sangs rgyas bstan la dad par 'gyur/_/ri rab rtse mo'i dbang phyug po/_/lha yi dbang po brgya byin 'gyur/_/lha dbang 'thab bral rab tu 'gyur/_/de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan 'gyur/_/lha dbang rab tu 'phrul pa dang /_/dbang byed 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/
[\[207b.4\]]tshul 'dir yi rang byas pa ni/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa'i mchog_/mkhas pa lha rnams bye ba yis/_/mchod pa bya ba'i dbang phyug 'gyur/_/gang zhig mdo sde dkon mchog 'dir/_/phyi phyir rjes su yi rang na/_/sus kyang de yi yon tan mtha'/_/brjod par nus pa ma 
[\[207b.5\]]yin no/_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na/_/bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang /_/nam du'ang long theng mi 'gyur te/_/ston pa bla na med par 'gyur/_/rtswa shing ri dang sdong po dang /_/'khri shing sman yang de bzhin te/_/me tog 'bras ldan ljon shing yang /_/gang du 'gro bar 'dud par 
[\[207b.6\]]'gyur/_/mar me mdzad nas bzung nas su/_/brtul zhugs bzang po gang 'gro bar/_/phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten khams/_/mtha' yas 'od kyis snang bar byed/_/gang dag 'das pa'i bar de dang /_/gang dag ma 'ongs shing rnams kyi/_/me tog 'bras bu lo ma 
[\[207b.7\]]dag/_/de dag rnam par shes par nus/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang /_/khrag khrig phrag brgya rnams kyis kyang /_/de dag gi ni yon tan mtha'/_/brjod par nus pa ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ni/_/mdo 'di phyir zhing mos byed pa/_/de yi 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]bsngags pa'i phreng ba yi/_/mtha' ma brjod par mi nus so/_/mdo sde yon tan gang brjod pa/_/de dag thams cad de dang ldan/_/de bas rab tu lhag yod de/_/de yi yon tan mtha' thug med/_/mi gang de la dga' bar mi byed cing /_/yod pa min dang 
[\[208a.2\]]bsngags pa mi smra dang /_/mi gang khros nas mi snyan smra ba 'am/_/yang na de la 'khrugs pa byed pa dag_/sems can dmyal bar skye 'gyur te/_/lus ni chen por gyur nas su/_/de ni sdug bsngal myong 'gyur te/_/yid rab mi bde ma rung 'gyur/_/dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad 
[\[208a.3\]]tsam du/_/de yi lus ni skye bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i las kyis rtag tu yang /_/bye bas bskor nas za bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa dag ni du mar yang /_/lus ni dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'gyur/_/de la mgo yang lnga brgya ste/_/de las nyung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mgo rnams re re dag la yang /_/lnga 
[\[208a.4\]]brgya'i lce las mi nyung ste/_/lce gcig la yang thong gshol ni/_/lnga brgyar tshang ste mi nyung ba/_/'bar bas de la rmo byed de/_/skur 'debs sdig pa'i las kyis so/_/tshig rtsub dag ni smras pas na/_/shin tu tsha bar sreg par 'gyur/_/gang dag sdom par mi byed cing /_/byang chub sems 
[\[208a.5\]]dpa' gnod byed pa/_/de ni sems can dmyal skye ste/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas 'gro bar 'gyur/_/tshul 'di spong bar byed pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang /_/brgya dang khrag khrig rnams su yang /_/mnar med par ni sdug bsngal rnyed/_/de nas shi 'phos rab gdug cing /_/shin 
[\[208a.6\]]tu mi bzad sbrul du 'gyur/_/bkres shing skom pas mngon gzir kyang /_/shin tu mi bzad las rnams byed/_/bza' ba rnyed kyang sdig pa yis/_/nam yang tshim par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te de nas shi 'phos nas/_/mi yi nang du skye na yang /_/yid mi gzhungs shing dmus long 'gyur/_/
[\[208a.7\]]gnod par sems shing sdom pa med/_/nyes pa'i tshig rnams smras nas ni/_/'phags pa mnyes par mi byed pa/_/mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas/_/slar yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/_/nam yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' la/_/gnod par mi byed rab bsdams dang /_/gang zhig chos dang ldan pa yi/_/chos smra de dag srung byed pa/_/ngan 'gro rnams ni kun spangs nas/_/brgya byin rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur/_/tshangs pa 'thab bral dga' ldan dang /_/dbang byed par yang de 'gyur ro/_/
[\[208b.2\]]gal te mir ni gyur na yang /_/rtag tu 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_/tshong dpon dang ni khyim bdag 'gyur/_/rtag tu skyid cing nor cher 'gyur/_/ji ltar gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/bskal pa de snyed rtag tu yang /_/'jigs med dran pa phun sum tshogs/_/bde dang ldan zhing gnod pa 
[\[208b.3\]]med/_/tshe rabs tshe rabs phyi phyir zhing /_/rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod par 'gyur/_/blo ldan gang zhig sangs rgyas la/_/bskal pa de snyed mchod pa bas/_/phyi dus chos ni 'jig pa na/_/gang dag mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/_/chos gang 'jig rten mgon po yis/_/bstan pa'i mdo sde 
[\[208b.4\]]'di la des/_/nyin zhag gcig tu bzung ba yi/_/de ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa/_/de dag kun la mchod par 'gyur/_/mdo sde 'di 'dra 'dzin pa ni/_/gang dag ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dang /_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 
[\[208b.5\]]dang /_/de dag de yis mchod par 'gyur/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang khro ba skyed dam/_'dum par mi byed dam/_brnyas 
[\[208b.6\]]thabs gang yang rung bas brnyas te/_ngan pa'i rigs su skyes pa zhe'am/_rnyed pa chung ba zhe'am/_yid gzhungs pa chung ba zhe'am/_shes rab chung ba zhes brnyas sam ci yang rung ste/_tshul khrims kyi yan lag nyams pa zhe'am/_mdog ngan pa zhe'am/_gzugs dang mi 
[\[208b.7\]]ldan pa zhe'am/_gzi brjid chung ba zhes brnyas sam/_tha na yud tsam zhig khros te lta na yang de mi dge ba'i las des bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa tshang bar ngan song rnams su sreg par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal ngas ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i sems 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]gcig bskyed pa las kha na ma tho ba che ba'i chos de lta bu gcig kyang ma mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la mtshon gyis btab bam/_dbyug 
[\[209a.2\]]pas brdegs pa bas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la tha na gnod sems sam/_tha ba'am/_zhe sdang gi sems gcig bskyed dam/_khros te brnyas pa'i sems bskyed na de de bas sdig pa ches mang du 
[\[209a.3\]]skyed do/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa'am/_brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa ji tsam pa de snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' des sems can dmyal ba rnams su gnas par go cha bgo bar bya'o/_/'jam 
[\[209a.4\]]dpal byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa btab pa ma gtogs par/_byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan gang gis kyang log par ltung bar byed mi nus so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che rdo rje ni rdo rje nyid ma gtogs par shing ngam/_bong ba'am/_dbyug pa'am/_
[\[209a.5\]]rdo ba'am/_mtshon chas gcag par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa btab pa ma gtogs par las gzhan gyis log par ltung bar byed mi nus so/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la 
[\[209a.6\]]las lha'i bskal pa bye bar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'khor bzhi la ci 'dod pa sbyin pa byin pa bas rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan gyis/_'thun par bya ba'i don du g.yos de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 
[\[209a.7\]]g.yung drung ngo zhes tshig tu smra na yang de de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las lha'i lo stong du dkon mchog gsum la ci dgos pa byin pa bas/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gzhan zhig tha na se gol 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]gtogs pa srid du 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni stong pa'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/snyam du dpyod na de de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed do/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad 
[\[209b.2\]]pa na lha'i bu brgyad stong ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/dge slong ma lnga brgya ni theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang 
[\[209b.3\]]rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po rnams kyi char chen po yang rab tu bab bo/_/tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i 
[\[209b.4\]]spos kyi char chen po yang mngon par rab tu bab bo/_/gos kyi char dang rin po che'i char dang rgyan gyi char chen po yang rab tu bab bo/_/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de'i tshe/_byang 
[\[209b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lag pa mngon par sprul te/_lag pa re res kyang lha'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med pa'i 
[\[209b.6\]]gdugs kyi sprin dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang /_ba dan gyi sprin dang /_me tog gi sprin dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i sprin dang /_rgyan gyi sprin dang /_seng ge'i rgyal mtshan zla ba'i sprin dang /_nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad bsags pa'i sprin dang /_nor bu rin po che dbang 
[\[209b.7\]]gi rgyal po'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod do/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la yang gtor cing mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so/_/bde bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]rten du yun ring du gnas par gyur cig ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang /_lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/_gzhal du med brjod du 
[\[210a.2\]]med pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen po dang /_many+dzu Sha ka dang yid dga' dang pa ru Sha ka dang ta ra Ni dang ba la la ki dang /_ko ta ra Ni dang dri mchog dang d+ha nu ska ri de ba dang ud pal dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po dang /_me tog 'khor lo dang 
[\[210a.3\]]'khor lo chen po la sogs pa lha'i me tog gi char chen po rab tu phab bo/_/lha'i gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi char rab tu phab bo/_/lha'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char dang rin po che'i sprin gyi char dang rgyan gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab bo/_/brgya byin dang tshangs pa 
[\[210a.4\]]dang 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa grangs med pas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad tsam gyi me tog gi sprin dang /_gos kyi sprin dang rin po che'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab bo/_/de bzhin du klu 
[\[210a.5\]]dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du med/_tshad med pa dag gis kyang lha'i me tog gi char dang /_spos dang gos dang rin po che'i char mngon par phab ste/_
[\[210a.6\]]lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa byas nas tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so/_/bde bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs te/_kye ma'o bdag cag gis sngon ma thos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/_/kye ma'o chos kyi 
[\[210a.7\]]rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par gyur cig ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dag dang /_bzang skyong la sogs pa 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]dge bsnyen stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag dang /_nyan thos chen po dag dang /_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po brgya phrag grangs med pa dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 
[\[210b.2\]]bstod do/_/'phags pa rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis 
[\[210b.3\]]kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//[ {D130}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya mA yo pa ma sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i 
[\[210b.4\]]mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong lhung ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na/_dgra bcom pa nyi khri'i dge slong gi 
[\[210b.5\]]dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i seng ge dang /_seng ge'i blo gros dang /_legs par gnas pa'i blo gros dang /_dpe med blo gros dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_mes byin dang /_chu 
[\[210b.6\]]lha dang /_dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /_phug sbas dang bzang skyong dang glog lha dang /_rnam par snang byed dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_ye shes 'byung gnas dang /_brtson pa mi gtong dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[210b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/lha'i bu mtshams bzang dang legs par gnas pa'i blo gros la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa nyi khri dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
[\[211a.2\]]btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[211a.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[211a.4\]]dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir/_rtag tu skabs phyes pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[211a.5\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang mngon par 
[\[211a.6\]]shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob cing /_ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston 
[\[211a.7\]]pa dang /_ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/_de skad ces gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]stsal to/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po legs so legs so/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod ni 'di ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa ste/_khyod 'di ltar sems 
[\[211b.2\]]can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang /_snying rje bar zhugs pas pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la 
[\[211b.3\]]yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/pad 
[\[211b.4\]]ma'i dpal gyi snying po chos gcig dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob cing ting nge 'dzin de thob ma 
[\[211b.5\]]thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas/_sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang /_ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[211b.6\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum pa thams cad la mi gnas pa yin te/_nang ngam phyi rol la gnas par mi byed do/_/de gnas pa med pas yang dag pa mthong bar 'gyur 
[\[211b.7\]]ro/_/yang dag pa mthong bas yang dag pa la sbyor bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa la sbyor bas ci la yang blo thogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de blo thogs pa med pas yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod do/_/yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod pa de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/_chos gang yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin no/_/chos thams cad ni rkyen las 'byung ba ste/_rkyen med par 'byung ba'i chos ni gang yang med do/_/chos gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ni ma skyes pa'o/_/de ltar 
[\[212a.2\]]na chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa ste/_chos thams cad ma skyes par rtogs par gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa rtogs pa 'thob bo/_/'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po dang /_snying rje'i sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa rab tu 'thob 
[\[212a.3\]]bo/_/de de ltar mos pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad ni yongs su brtags pas sprul pa ste/_yongs su brtags pa de yang shin tu stong pa'o/_/chos thams cad stong par rtogs pa de ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/_ting nge 
[\[212a.4\]]'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang /_ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[212a.5\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgyu ma 
[\[212a.6\]]lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa gang la la dag 'khor 'dir 'dus pa lta mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'khor 'di na bsams bzhin du go cha bgos pa gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa skyes bu dam pa drug cu yod de/_
[\[212a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa drug cu po dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa lags sam/_'on te 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na yang gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag kyang mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 
[\[212b.2\]]nas nub kyi phyogs cha logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 
[\[212b.3\]]chos kyang ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob ces bya ba dang gnyis ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin te/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes 
[\[212b.4\]]bu dam pa de gnyis las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzhan dag nub bdun du 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa de dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i 
[\[212b.5\]]dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mang du mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i 
[\[212b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sgrim mi 'tshal bar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ji skad zer ba de de bzhin te/_de na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[212b.7\]]dpa' chen po gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dag ni tshad med grangs med do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji lta bu'i sems kyi mtshan ma bstan pas/_skyes bu dam pa de gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /_bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dang de bzhin 
[\[213a.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gda' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa legs par mdzad du gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de gnyis 
[\[213a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mchis na/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba'i lan thos pas/_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 
[\[213a.4\]]'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de yang mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[213a.5\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang /_der skyes ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[213a.6\]]po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/_mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/_'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[213a.7\]]'di na/_ri'i tshogs dang shing ljon pa dang ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /_ri btang bzung dang btang bzung chen po dang khor yug dang khor yug chen po gang dag yod pa dang /_gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba des khyab 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]par gyur to/_/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag kyang mig gi dbang po la snang bar ma gyur to/_/nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong las thal nas/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can 
[\[213b.2\]]de thams cad gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas 'od de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[213b.3\]]de'i spyan sngar mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[213b.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bltas pa de yang mthong ste/_dper na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa ltar mthong nas/_de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' 
[\[213b.5\]]ba rgya cher skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[213b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gang dag 'dus pa dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang /_mi ma yin 
[\[213b.7\]]pa dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/_ri'i rgyal po bzhin du 'bar ba de dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang sa ler mthong ste/_'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu mig dang ldan pas/_'dom gang tsam 
[\[214a.2\]]gyi phyogs na skyes bu cig shos kyi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sgrim mi dgos par mthong ba de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[214a.3\]]khams bde ba can yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas gang ba yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa de yang snang ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[214a.4\]]rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par bstan par mdzad pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/
[\[214a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang nyan thos chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis/_
[\[214a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong nas/_ngo mtshar du gyur te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[214a.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes kyang brjod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i tshe/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam pa drug tu

[\[214b.1\]]'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul/_g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/_'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/_chem chem/_rab tu

[\[214b.3\]]rgyas 'od dpag med ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_zhe sa dang bcas par phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/skyes bu dam pa de gnyis phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das

[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bzhi bcu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan

[\[215a.3\]]to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis 'di skad ces 
[\[215a.4\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i 'od 'di btang ba rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'di ltar 
[\[215a.5\]]yid du mchi ba dang /_'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi gtong na gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des 'di ltar yid du mchi ba dang /_'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od bkye ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni ci lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[215a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/_rgyu med rkyen med par bcom ldan 'das des 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang /_'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od mi bkye'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[215a.7\]]phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de deng byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]shAkya thub pa des chos bstan pa de'i snga ltas su 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba dang /_'di ltar blta na sdug pa'i 'od 'di bkye'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[215b.2\]]dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur 
[\[215b.3\]]bgyi ba dang chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de khyod nyid las brtsams te/_chos ston par 'gyur gyis de'i 
[\[215b.4\]]dus la dbab par shes pa/_khyed deng shig ces skabs phye bas de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i nyin
