[\[215b.6\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 
[\[215b.7\]]gzhan dang gzhan dag na yod pa spangs nas/_smon lam dang thugs rje chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can der byung ste/_sems can dman pa la mos pa 'dod chags kyi shas che ba/_zhe sdang gi shas che ba/_gti mug gi shas che ba rnams kyi nang du/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni dka' ba mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis/_tshig 'di smras ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad 
[\[216a.2\]]lhan cig 'dus nas/_mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/_gang dag gis sha'i mig gis de mngon sum du mthong 
[\[216a.3\]]la mthong nas kyang dad pa rnyed pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_chos 
[\[216a.4\]]bstan pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed de'i dus la dbab par shes na deng shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_
[\[216a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te/_mdun du bdar nas/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nas dong ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon 
[\[216a.6\]]par 'du byas pas/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag thams cad re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sprul pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas so/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang gru bzhi lham 
[\[216a.7\]]pa ka ba bzhi zug pa/_cha mnyam par legs par rnam par phye ba legs par zin pa sha stag go/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re re yang 'phang du ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis/_rgyar ni dpag tshad brgyad do/_/khang pa brtsegs pa dag gser las byas pa dag kyang yod/_dngul 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]las byas pa dag kyang yod/_bai dUr+ya las byas pa dag kyang yod/_shel las byas pa dag kyang yod/_mu tig dmar po dang rdo'i snying po dang /_spug las byas pa dag kyang yod do/_/rin po che gser dang dngul dang sna gnyis pa dag kyang yod/_rin po che gser dang dngul 
[\[216b.2\]]dang bai dUr+ya dang sna gsum pa dag kyang yod/_rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang sna bzhi pa dag kyang yod/_rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang mu tig dmar po dang sna lnga pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/_rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang 
[\[216b.3\]]shel dang mu tig dmar po dang spug dang sna drug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/_rin po che gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang mu tig dmar po dang spug dang rdo'i snying po dang sna bdun pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/_tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i khang pa 
[\[216b.4\]]brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas pa dag kyang yod/_a ka ru dang tsan dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/_a ga ru nag po dang tsan dan las byas pa dag kyang yod/_tsan dan thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/_me tog 
[\[216b.5\]]ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/_sna ma'i me tog dang bar sha ka dang tsam pa ka dang /_skya snar dang a ti mug ta ka dang ta ra ni dang go ta ra ni las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/_me tog da nu ska 
[\[216b.6\]]ri las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/_me tog man dA ra dang man dA ra chen po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/_me tog pa ru Sha ka dang pa ru Sha ka chen po dang many+dzu Sha ka dang many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_mdog mdzes dang mdog mdzes chen po dang /_me 
[\[216b.7\]]tog 'khor lo dang 'khor lo chen po dang kun tu 'khor lo dang /_shin tu mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang me tog zla ba dang zla ba chen po dang /_shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang zla ba mchog dang /_s+tha la dang s+tha la chen po dang /_shin tu mdzes pa'i s+tha la las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]dag kyang yod/_me tog thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kyang yod/_kha dog du ma pa kha dog sna tshogs kha dog brgya stong du ma pa bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa yongs su dag pa/_'od gsal ba dag kyang yod do/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang 
[\[217a.2\]]lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul te/_de na lha'i bu mo kha cig gi lag na dung dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang khar rnga dang pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang /_glu dbyangs sgra snyan pa dang gling bu dang rgyud can pi bang dang pi bang rgyud gsum pa rnams thogs te/_sil snyan dang glu dbyangs dang 
[\[217a.3\]]rol mo'i sgra skad rnam pa mang po de lta bu len cing 'khod do/_/lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/_/lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/_/lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru dang tsan dan gyi phye ma'i 
[\[217a.4\]]phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/_/lha'i bu mo kha cig ni a ga ru nag po dang tsan dan gyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/_/lha'i bu mo kha cig ni tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/_/lha'i bu mo kha cig ni ud pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar 
[\[217a.5\]]po'i me tog gi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/_/lha'i bu mo kha cig ni me tog man dA ra dang man dA ra chen po dang pa ru Sha ka dang pa ru Sha ka chen po dang many+dzu Sha ka dang many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_me tog mdog mdzes dang mdog mdzes chen po dang /_me tog 'khor lo dang 'khor lo chen 
[\[217a.6\]]po dang /_kun tu 'khor lo dang shin tu mdzes pa'i 'khor lo dang /_me tog zla ba dang zla ba chen po dang /_shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang zla ba mchog dang /_s+tha la dang s+tha la chen po dang shin tu mdzes pa'i s+tha la'i me tog gi phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/_/lha'i bu mo kha cig ni 
[\[217a.7\]]me tog thams cad dang bdug pa dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang phye ma'i phur ma thogs shing 'khod do/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]pa'i sku mngon par sprul to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang mu tig dkar po dang mu tig dmar po dang mu tig mthon ka'i mu tig gi phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang lha'i ras bcos bu'i rgyal mtshan gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas 
[\[217b.2\]]g.yogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang spos kyi phur ma brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang gdugs kha dog du ma pa kha dog sna tshogs pa/_kha dog brgya stong du ma bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_
[\[217b.3\]]legs par las su byas pa/_dbyibs shin tu legs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang shing ta la'i phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par 
[\[217b.4\]]sprul to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba gang dag rlung gis bskyod pa na 'di lta bu'i sgra dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste dper na/_lha'i sil snyan yan lag bye ba brgya stong dang ldan pa mkhas pa dag gis legs par blangs nas sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba 
[\[217b.5\]]de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba brgyad khri bzhi stong mngon par sprul to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rdzing bu gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/_bai dUr+ya dang shel gyis spras pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi kha khyer gyis bskor ba/_me tog ud 
[\[217b.6\]]pa la dang pad ma dang ku mu da dang pad ma dkar pos gang ba/_ngur pa sgra 'byin pa/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/_bya rog gis btung du rung bar mu dang kha da chad du gang ba dag sprul to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i phreng ba rim pa 
[\[217b.7\]]bdun gyis bskor to/_/rin po che'i skud pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kun nas dkris so/_/rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa re re'i 'od kyis kyang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du snang bar gyur to/_/de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa dag so sor byas so/_/
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa ji snyed yod pa/_khang pa 
[\[218a.2\]]brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na bkod pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad khang pa brtsegs pa re rer mngon par sprul to/_/snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_khang pa brtsegs pa re rer yang de ltar bkod pa rnams mngon par sprul nas/_bkod pa de lta bu des byang chub 
[\[218a.3\]]sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las rkyong ba dang /_brkyang ba las skum pa tsam gyis de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nas mi snang bar 
[\[218a.4\]]gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa/_de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul 
[\[218a.5\]]mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas/_yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pas shin tu lhag ge'o/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi 'od kyis kyang 
[\[218a.6\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom 
[\[218a.7\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/gzi brjid mtshungs med yon tan phung po gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/drang srong chen po kun mkhyen yon tan kun gyi pha rol gshegs/_/thams cad zil 
[\[218b.2\]]gnon srid pa gsum gyi chags pa'i lam las 'das/_/shAkya khyu mchog dri bral zla ba'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyi ma dri med lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa rnam par mdzes/_/mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gi go cha mnabs gyur cing /_/dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa 
[\[218b.3\]]'jig rten kun tu gsal/_/mi mchog khyod mtshungs 'jig rten gsum na gang yang yod ma mchis/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sku yi 'od kyis gang tshe reg gyur pa/_/de tshe 'jig rten nyi ma zla ba nor bu zhugs rnams dang /_/brgya byin tshangs pa lha dang de bzhin mi ci rnams kyi 'od/_/
[\[218b.4\]]snag tsha'i phung po bzhin du mog mog mi snang gsal ma mchis/_/rgyal ba zhing gcig na ni yang dag bzhugs par gda' bzhin du/_/'gro ba'i don du skad cig gcig gis mtha' yas zhing du gshegs/_/ston pa'i bzhud dang byon pa 'tshal ba su yang yod ma mchis/_/mdzad 
[\[218b.5\]]pa dag dang 'dul ba sna tshogs dag gis sems can 'dul/_/spu yi khung gcig nang du mtha' yas zhing rnams ston mdzad kyang /_/'phel ba dang ni bri bar gyur pa gang yang yod ma mchis/_/'di ni ji bzhin las dang byed pa rgyu dang 'bras gda' la/_/sems can rnams la 
[\[218b.6\]]gnod pa ma mchis 'dres par gyur ma mchis/_/gang na sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma mchis shing /_/rgyal ba'i sras po grags pa chen po dag gis yongs gang la/_/mi khom brgyad po dag dang bral te mchog tu nyams dga' ba'i/_/yongs dag zhing de dag kyang 
[\[218b.7\]]mi mchog la lar ston pa mdzad/_/lha mi gang dag mi 'jigs bag ma mchis pa bkang slad du/_/sems dmyal dud 'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'gro ba shin tu mi bzad pa'i/_/kun nas nyon mongs zhing rnams la la dag kyang bstan mdzad nas/_/de dag thams cad bde bar gshegs la 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/zhing gzhan la la dag kyang nam mkha' lta bur ston par mdzad/_/de bzhin gzhan yang zhugs kyis gtam zhing me lce 'khrugs pa dang /_/zhing gzhan dag kyang chab kyis yongs su gtams par ston pa mdzad/_/rnam 'phrul 'di ni thams cad 
[\[219a.2\]]mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul lags so/_/'dul ba'i don du gzugs kyi rnam pa mtha' yas ston mdzad pa/_/la lar 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'od chags gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/tshangs pa'i bdag po mchog tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnyed pa dang /_/sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug mig 
[\[219a.3\]]stong rdo rje 'bar ba dang /_/srog chags brgya phrag mang po rab tu dga' bas mchod bgyid cing /_/dge ba bcu po dag gis sems can mtha' yas 'dul bgyid pa/_/blon po tshong dpon dag dang bka' la gtogs pa'i gtsor gyur cing /_/shin tu 'jigs med dgra tshogs phab nas chad pas 
[\[219a.4\]]mi gcod la/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pos sems can rnams ni sdud bgyid cing /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la sems can rab tu 'jog bgyid pa/_/bsod nams las kyis rin chen bdun dang ldan par gyur pa yi/_/gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba dag tu gyur/_/
[\[219a.5\]]'jig rten 'di na la lar bltam pa lta bur ston mdzad de/_/dog sa la ni gom pa bdun dag bor zhing gshegs nas kyang /_/nga ni skyes nas skye dang 'chi ba'i tha mar dbyung ngo zhes/_/yid 'ong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung mchog brjod pa mdzad/_/mar me mdzad pa tshun chad dri 
[\[219a.6\]]ma thams cad spang lags kyang /_/'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la yongs smin mdzad slad du/_/la lar sems can dag pa btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs par gda'/_/mi yi dbang po btsun mo dag dang sras kyang ston pa mdzad/_/yab yum dag dang gnyen gyi rtsa lag 
[\[219a.7\]]sdug pa'i 'khor rnams dang /_/yul 'khor 'byor dang rin chen gter mdzod mang po btang mdzad nas/_/brgya byin tshangs pa dag dang lha min rnams kyis phyag bgyis shing /_/drang srong chen po mngon par byung ste nags na bzhugs par gda'/_/'gro la sman slad dgung lo drug tu 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]dka' ba spyad nas ni/_/bsam gtan mkha' khyab rin chen mchog la bsam gtan mdzad par gda'/_/mu stegs can gyi tshogs rnams thams cad tshar gcad mdzad slad du/_/sems can dag pa byang chub shing drung du yang gshegs par gda'/_/'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye 
[\[219b.2\]]shes mchog tu yongs smin mdzad slad du/_/mi dbang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin mchog la bzhugs mdzad nas/_/sku yi tshul ni gang gis 'jig rten rnam par 'dul 'gyur ba/_/rgyal ba de 'dra nyid kyi sku yi cha lugs 'dzin par mdzad/_/ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'gro ba rmongs par 
[\[219b.3\]]bgyi slad du/_/sgyu ma mang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston bgyid pa/_/de bzhin 'gro ba sgron mas sems can 'dul bar mdzad slad du/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mang po rnams kyang ston/_/thub pa dpa' bo la lar dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul ston/_/gang 
[\[219b.4\]]la pha rol mu stegs tshogs kyi 'gro ba ma mchis shing /_/rdul bral mya ngan ma mchis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa/_/bla na med pa 'gyur ba ma mchis 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas byang chub brnyes/_/phyogs kyi lam rnams thams 
[\[219b.5\]]cad du yang 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad/_/mi yi dbang po kun nas zhal ldan chu zla bzhin du bzhugs/_/bde gshegs rang byung mtha' yas yul la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/_/la la dag la sangs rgyas chos kyi sku ni ston mdzad pa/_/rtag pa brtan pa ther zug 'gyur ba ma 
[\[219b.6\]]mchis gyur pa dang /_/ma bgyis ma skyes dri ma ma mchis 'gog pa ma mchis chos/_/mig yor 'dra bas phyogs bcu dag ni shin tu rgyas par 'gengs/_/ring por mi thogs par ni sdug pa dag dang 'bral 'gyur gyis/_/'dus byas 'di la khyed cag yid brtan bya ba'i mi rigs 
[\[219b.7\]]zhes/_/'gro ba thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang /_/mi rtag mi brtan skad cig par yang la la dag la ston/_/bde gshegs sku yi phrin las mtha' dang pha rol yod ma mchis/_/gsung dang thugs kyi 'jug pa'i spyod yul dag kyang dpag mi lang /_/nam mkha' 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]lta bur rgya che tshad ma mchis pa ston mdzad de/_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul sems can rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags/_/phyogs bcu dag na mchis pa'i sems can ma lus ji snyed pa/_/de dag shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar shes rab ldan gyur kyang /_/rgyal ba chos kyi 
[\[220a.2\]]rgyal po'i dngos po'i yul tshad ma mchis pa/_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad de dag rnams kyis rig mi nus/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mkha' 'dra pha rol mtha' ma mchis/_/de ltar rgyal ba'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ma lus pa/_/'di na rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[220a.3\]]rnams kun dang nyan thos rnams dang ni/_/rkyen gyi rgyal ba 'dus pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags/_/de ltar 'di dag la sogs mtha' yas thabs dang ldan pa yi/_/'dul ba'i don du sku yi mdzad pa mtha' yas ston par mdzad/_/nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par 
[\[220a.4\]]mtha' yas sku dang ldan gyur pa/_/mgon po rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu rgal gyur pa/_/nyon mongs thul ba rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso la bstod pa yi/_/bsod nams ci mchis des ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus pa/_/
[\[220a.5\]]byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la reg par shog_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[220a.6\]]'das la mngon par bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol lo/_/nyam nga ba nyung 
[\[220a.7\]]ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snyun gsol lo/_/'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag 'jig rten gyi khams nyams dga' ba la bltar stsol cig ces kyang gsung ngo /_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po des yongs su khyab pa dang /_rin po che sna tshogs dag kyang mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba 
[\[220b.2\]]can nas 'dir lhags pa 'di dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'am/_'on te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi mthu yin snyam mo/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/_bcom ldan 
[\[220b.3\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par gda' ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to/_/gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 
[\[220b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu lags sam/_'on te byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi mthu lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 
[\[220b.5\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par snang ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma yin gyi/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[220b.6\]]po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyi mthu yin no/_/gsol pa 'di ltar 'di dag gis mthus 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par 
[\[220b.7\]]gda' ba ni skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam dag dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pad ma'i dpal gyi 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]snying po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/_skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa yin no/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa yin te/_
[\[221a.2\]]'di gnyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ston to/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod shar gyi phyogs cha logs su de na ci snang ltos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos byang 
[\[221a.3\]]chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig sgrib pa med pas bltas na shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi zhabs la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[221a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob gnyis phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'di skad ces/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[221a.5\]]la gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol lo/_/nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snyun gsol lo zhes smra'o/_/de bzhin du lho'i phyogs cha dang /_de bzhin du nub dang /_de bzhin du byang dang /_de bzhin du 'og dang /_
[\[221a.6\]]de bzhin du steng dang /_de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[221a.7\]]'das dag kyang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na skyes bu dam pa de gnyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar yang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo 
[\[221b.2\]]mtshar to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gda' ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/_byang chub 
[\[221b.3\]]sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[221b.4\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang /_skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang /_mthong 
[\[221b.5\]]nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor srog chags sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying 
[\[221b.6\]]pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid cig lags/_de'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[221b.7\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang de'i bya ba dang /_de'i spyod pa dang /_de'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]'gyur te/_de lta bas na pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom 
[\[222a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong gi rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de snyed du tshad med pa/_de 
[\[222a.3\]]snyed du bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji tsam yod pa de bas kyang ches mang ba'i bskal pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[222a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od seng ge'i rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 
[\[222a.5\]]byung ste/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de dag dpe cung zad tsam gyis cung zad cig 
[\[222a.6\]]brjod par bya yis nyon cig_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mang ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[222a.7\]]'das mang lags so/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_tshad ma mchis te/_ngag gi las kyis lan gdab par sla ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di lta ste/_dper na mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i rtse 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]mos rgya mtsho chen po las chu thigs pa gcig blangs na pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/_chu blangs pa dang /_lhag ma lus pa de gang mang /_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das blangs pa ni nyung /_lhag ma lus pa ni tshad ma mchis so/_/bka' stsal pa/_pad ma'i dpal 
[\[222b.2\]]gyi snying po khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o/_/mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i rtse mo des rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa ji snyed pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[222b.3\]]kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po ji snyed pa de tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag 
[\[222b.4\]]tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan bkod par blta'o/_/de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dpag tu med de/_ji ltar da ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med do zhes bya na/_de las brgya stong du bsgres pa bas kyang 
[\[222b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ches mang ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang de snyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 
[\[222b.6\]]theg pa gsum kho na las brtsams te chos ston to/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas 
[\[222b.7\]]kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang /_bde ba'i rgyu las brtsams te chos bstan par 'dod kyang /_nga'i spobs pa yang zad par mi 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de'i mthar phyin par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]po de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i gsung rab la 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi dbang phyug chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'i rgyal po zhig byung ste/_pad ma'i dpal 
[\[223a.2\]]gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la bu bye ba phrag brgya yod de/_rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par gyur to/_/de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/_/
[\[223a.3\]]pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi yongs su longs spyod pa'i skyed mos tshal ni bdun khri drug stong yod do/_/rgyal bu re re la yang longs spyod kyi skyed mos tshal khri khri yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad 
[\[223a.4\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ni med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med ming yang mi grag ste/_rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang tshangs 
[\[223a.5\]]par spyod pa las gyur pa/_brdzus te byung ba sha stag go/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang /_chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na kha zas rags pa med par gyur to/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de ni las 
[\[223a.6\]]gzhan med de bu de rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das de la lo bye ba stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bsnyen bkur byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa yang 
[\[223a.7\]]dag par rab tu bstan to/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spyod pa tshad med pa dag don tu gnyer bar mi bya ba de gang yang med do/_/
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]rtul ba tshad med pa gang dag brtsam par mi bya ba de gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ni tshad med do/_/tshul khrims ni tshad med/_bzod pa ni tshad med/_brtson 'grus ni tshad med/_bsam gtan ni tshad med/_shes rab ni tshad med/_'khor ba 
[\[223b.2\]]yongs su 'dzin pa ni tshad med/_sems can dag la byams pa ni tshad med/_zhing gi bkod pa dag ni tshad med/_nyan thos dag ni tshad med/_gzugs yongs su grub pa dag ni tshad med/_dbyangs ni tshad med/_spobs pa ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po byang chub sems 
[\[223b.3\]]dpa' ni tha na sems bskyed pa gcig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad tshad med pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar yongs su bsngos pas tshad med par 'gyur zhe na/_gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la yongs su sngo bar byed pa de'i tshe sems can 'di dag 
[\[223b.4\]]thams cad skye ba med par mngon sum du byed/_sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu yongs su bsngo ba tshad med pa zhes bya'o/_/stong pa nyid tshad med pa'o/_/mtshan ma med pa tshad med pa'o/_/smon pa med pa tshad med 
[\[223b.5\]]pa'o/_/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa tshad med pa'o/_/de ltar na 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag pa'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings rnam par grol ba/_ma skyes pa/_dben pa/_bral ba/_mya ngan las 'das pa/_tshad med pa ste/_rigs kyi bu mdor na chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'o/_/de'i 
[\[223b.6\]]phyir chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa zhes bya'o/_/gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de ni tshad med pa'o/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal pos de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi 
[\[223b.7\]]gzi brjid de la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/des kyang chos tshad med pa dag la nges par sems par byas par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis bcom ldan 'das de las chos dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'di 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/_yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bu de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_'dren pa chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba/_/smra ba'i tshogs rnams yang 
[\[224a.2\]]dag rab tu 'joms/_/bdud kyi rtsod dang nyon mongs kun sel ba/_/mtshungs med ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyi zla dag dang me yi 'od rnams dang /_/brgya byin tshangs pa nor bu glog 'od rnams/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid kyis ni mog mog gyur/_/mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la 
[\[224a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/thub pa bskal pa rgya mtsho 'das par yang /_/dka' ba rnam pa du ma spyod par mdzad/_/phrin las de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong ste/_/des na 'gro bas bltas na ngoms mi 'gyur/_/skye dang rga dang na dang 'chis gtses shing /_/sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir gzigs 
[\[224a.4\]]nas/_/de dag rnams la thub chen thugs rje ste/_/rtag tu mi 'pho zhi ba'i chos kyang ston/_/srid gsum srog chags kun gyi sman pa 'dra/_/'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa thams cad sbyong /_/thugs rje bskyed pa mdzad nas chos kyi sman/_/zhi ba bla na med par rab tu ston/_/sems can kun 
[\[224a.5\]]gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/_/rab 'byam zhing rnams kun na srog chags kyi/_/mkhyen nas gang gis mya ngan 'das mchog la/_/reg par 'gyur ba de 'dra'i chos kyang ston/_/mi mchog khyod kyi thugs rje ci 'dra ba/_/ji snyed rab 'byam zhing gi nyan thos dang /_/rkyen byung thub pa ma lus 
[\[224a.6\]]de dag la/_/de 'dra ba yi snying rje yong ma mchis/_/bsod nams phung po mtshan mchog rnams dang ldan/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi ri bo 'dra/_/bye ba'i nyi las lhag pa'i gzi mnga' ba/_/mi mchog mtshungs ma mchis la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos sprin rgya las chos char 'bebs 
[\[224a.7\]]pa na/_/gang dag rgya chen mos pa spyod yul ba/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas spyod la 'jigs ma mchis/_/de dag rtag tu bde gshegs mdun na mchis/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su/_/mi mchog mthong ba rnyed par shin tu dka'/_/bsod nams las kyis bsam pa yongs 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]sbyangs pa/_/de dag mig lam rnam par 'dren rnams gda'/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni chos dbyings rgyas par 'gengs/_/zhing rnams rab 'byam thams cad na yang gda'/_/bzhud dang byon par mngon pa yod ma mchis/_/'on kyang 'jig rten dag na snod bzhin gda'/_/bden pa gzigs 
[\[224b.2\]]shing don dam ston pa po/_/chos kyi sbyin bdag zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa/_/rgal nas srog chags bcings gyur gzhan sgrol ba/_/bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis skye ba'i shing ljon rtsa nas bton/_/nga rgyal ri bo sra ba rdul du brlags/_/rgod pa mi mnga' g.yo 
[\[224b.3\]]dang sgyu dang bral/_/rab zhi thugs dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi mchog chags pa thams cad yong mi mnga'/_/dgongs pa sa dang chu dang me dang 'dra/_/rgyal ba sems can kun la snyoms thugs ldan/_/rlung dang nam mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thub pa chen po yon tan 'di 
[\[224b.4\]]'dra'i gter/_/bsod nams rgya mtsho las byung sku dang ldan/_/bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu de brjod kyang /_/yon tan rgya mtsho zad par nus ma lags/_/yon tan rgya mtsho lha mis mchod pa la/_/bdag ni bu dang bcas te mchod pa bgyid/_/rgyal ba mchod pa'i bsod nams ci mchis 
[\[224b.5\]]pa/_/des ni thub pa chen po khyod 'drar shog_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dus gzhan zhig na/_skyed mos tshal na bsam gtan gyi gnas pas gnas shing 'dug pa'i blo g.yas g.yon nas/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i pad ma bkra ba blta na 
[\[224b.6\]]sdug pa dag pa gnyis byung ngo /_/pad ma de gnyis las khye'u ming rin chen sems dang /_rin chen mchog ces bya ba gnyis rdzus te byung nas/_skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas khye'u 
[\[224b.7\]]gnyis skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/khyed gnyis lha 'am klu yin nam/_/gnod sbyin dri za mi ci 'am/_/mi 'am mi ma yin nam ci/_/dris pa smros shig grogs po dag_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi g.yas phyogs su byung ba'i khye'u gang yin pa des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_grogs po chos kun stong pa yi/_/ming ni 'dri bar byed dam ci/_/chos rnams thams cad ming med na/_/gang gi ming ni 'dri 
[\[225a.2\]]bar byed/_/stong nyid gang la'ang lha med cing /_/klu med srin po yong ma yin/_/mi'am mi ma yin yang rung /_/thams cad de na yong med do/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas khye'u cig shos des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ming ni ming gis stong 
[\[225a.3\]]pa ste/_/ming la ming ni yod ma yin/_/chos rnams thams cad ming med de/_/'on kyang ming gis yongs su brjod/_/ming gi rang bzhin gang yin pa/_/de ni ma mthong ma thos so/_/las kyis 'gags pa ma yin na/_/'di na gang gi ming zhig 'dri/_/tha snyad du ni ming byas nas/_/
[\[225a.4\]]ming btags byas te bstan pa ni/_/kho bo'i ming ni rin chen sems/_/cig shos rin chen mchog ces bya/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u gnyis kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras te mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas/_rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 
[\[225a.5\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te 
[\[225a.6\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_pad ma dag dang dri bda' dang /_/me tog phreng dang na bza' dang /_/'on te zas dang skom gyis sam/_/rgyal ba ji ltar mchod par 
[\[225a.7\]]bgyi/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso/_/ji ltar mchod par 'gyur ba lags/_/don 'di legs par bstan du gsol/_/'dren pa thos nas 'tshal bar bgyi/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]rgyas des khye'u de gnyis la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na/_/mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i/_/sangs rgyas dag la mchod par 'gyur/_/mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas zhing /_/gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed dag_/me 
[\[225b.2\]]tog rnams kyis bkang byas te/_/'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas/_/gang gis 'dir ni thal sbyar nas/_/byang chub tu ni sems btud na/_/'di ni bsod nams ches mang ste/_/de la tshad ni yod ma yin/_/byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba/_/de ltar blo mchog gis bstan pa/_/de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang med/_/de 'dra ba yi 
[\[225b.3\]]dpal yang med/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis slar yang bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/_/bdag cag yi dam yang dag 'cha'/_/bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra/_/lha dang mi dag gsan mdzod cig_/ji srid 
[\[225b.4\]]du ni 'khor ba yi/_/sngon gyi mtha' ni mi dmigs pa/_/de srid bskal pa du mar yang /_/sems can phyir ni spyad par bgyi/_/ji tsam sngon gyi mtha' dran pa/_/rnam grangs 'di yi tshul dag gis/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/de srid bskal par spyad par bgyi/_/gal te de ring 
[\[225b.5\]]slan chad du/_/'dod chags kyi ni sems 'byung na/_/phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni bslus par 'gyur/_/de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/phrag dog ser sna'ang de bzhin no/_/rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smra zhing /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig ni spang bar bgyi/_/gal te de 
[\[225b.6\]]ring slan chad du/_/rdul med byang chub ma thob par/_/bdag cag nyan thos sems gyur pa/_/des ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bar 'gyur/_/nams kyang rang sangs rgyas su ni/_/bdag cag dga' bar mi bgyid de/_/sems can rnams la snying rje zhing /_/bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi/_/ji ltar 
[\[225b.7\]]'dren pa khyod kyi zhing /_/grub pa rnam pa 'di dag las/_/gzhan du yon tan bye ba snyed/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing du bgyi/_/de na nyan thos gang yang med/_/rang rgyal 'dren pa dag kyang med/_/de tshe bye ba tshad med pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gnas/_/bde ba 'di dang 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]ldan pa yi/_/skye bo dri ma med par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mdzod ni bzung bas na/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams tshar phyin to/_/gal te 'di dag gzhan min par/_/de bzhin du ni 'gyur nges na/_/rgya mtshor bcas dang rir bcas pa'i/_/sa 'di thams cad g.yos par shog_/
[\[226a.2\]]tshig 'di smras pa'i mod la ni/_/sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/_/sil snyan dag ni ma dkrol bar/_/de na thams cad sgra yang 'byin/_/stong phrag bye ba'i lha rnams kyis/_/me tog char dang phye ma'i char/_/spos kyi char ni yid 'ong dang /_/na bza' bye ba rab tu phab/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi 
[\[226a.3\]]snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs sam yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[226a.4\]]rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur to/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u rin chen sems dang /_rin chen mchog ces bya ba de gnyis gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de yang de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[226a.5\]]chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khye'u rin chen mchog ces bya bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob 'di ni khye'u rin chen sems zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa ni de yin 
[\[226a.6\]]no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ji tsam du zab mo la mos pa gyur pa dang /_gang gi ming yang ma dmigs pa de 
[\[226a.7\]]srid du 'di gnyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das la skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la rim gro bgyis par gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]ni bgrang bas mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/_skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni de lta ma yin te/_de srid du 'di gnyis kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/skyes bu dam pa 
[\[226b.2\]]'di gnyis ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos shing yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan te/_'di gnyis kyi yon tan dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[226b.3\]]khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi ba de dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de 'di nas phyogs gang logs na mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[226b.4\]]rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs na ste/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i 
[\[226b.5\]]dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang bde bar 
[\[226b.6\]]bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /_tshe ji tsam pa dang /_longs spyod ci 'dra ba dang /_'od ci 'dra ba dang /_skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[226b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba de dag legs par bstan du gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam chen po bshad pa thos nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]dag kyang smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid 
[\[227a.2\]]la zung shig dang bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi tshe'i tshad ni 
[\[227a.3\]]dpag tu med de/_de'i mtha' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du bshad kyang rtogs par sla ba ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi tshe dpag tu med du zin kyang 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_ther zug ma yin pa/_yun du gnas pa ma yin pa ste/_
[\[227a.4\]]rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du 
[\[227a.5\]]de'i dam pa'i chos gnas te/_ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub ste/_lhag chad med par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du na sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ba med par zad do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[227a.6\]]dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur/_de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'od dpag med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma dag dang shing ljon pa dag gis 
[\[227a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du pad ma dag dang shing ljon pa de dag las kyang chos kyi sgo brgya phrag du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos nub ma thag pa'i mtshan mo skya 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]rengs 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rin po che du ma'i bkod pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 
[\[227b.2\]]'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[227b.3\]]ma snyed du bstan kyang mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i bde ba'i rgyu dang yon tan gyi rgyu ni de snyed du 'gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang rigs kyi bu dpe tsam du cung zad cig bshad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po 
[\[227b.4\]]de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa yon tan gyi bkod pa snga ma dag ni yon tan bkod pa 'di dag gi brgya'i char yang mi chog_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[227b.5\]]rgyas rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis gang bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus kyang 
[\[227b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi brgya'i char yang mi chog ste/_stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de'i tshe tshad ni bskal pa bye ba 
[\[227b.7\]]khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro/_/de'i dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bye ba drug cu rtsa gsum du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming yang bde ba can zhes bgyi bar 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/_'jig rten gyi khams de ni rin chen kun nas bsags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 
[\[228a.2\]]zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i tshe ji srid gnas pa nas bzung ste/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de srid du byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur te/_dam pa'i chos 
[\[228a.3\]]yun ring por gnas par bya ba'i phyir spro bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi ma'i dus su der dam pa'i chos nub nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[228a.4\]]rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan shin tu gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[228a.5\]]ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa dang /_snang ba phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba de ltar/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[228a.6\]]gshegs pa yon tan shin tu gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/_lhag chad med cing shin tu lhag pa med par 'gyur ro/_/tshe'i yun dang dam pa'i chos gnas pa yang de srid du 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag bcom ldan 
[\[228a.7\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]ldog par 'gyur ro/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po bud med gang la las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dang /_ma 'ongs pa de gnyis kyi mtshan thos na de bud med kyi rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa 
[\[228b.2\]]bye ba phrag bzhi bcur 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_chos nyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_tshe rjes nas kyang rab tu 'byung ba 'thob par 
[\[228b.3\]]'gyur/_tshe rabs dran pa dang /_spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi dang skye dgu'i srog chags bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_gang dag ma byon pa de dag dang /_gang dag da 
[\[228b.4\]]ltar bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag dang /_phyogs bcu na gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag gi mtshan gang lags pa de dag la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/tshig 'di skad ces kyang smra ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[228b.5\]]cag lhan cig tshogs pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/zhes smras so/_/de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/srog chags khrag khrig brgya phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni 
[\[228b.6\]]chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/dge slong bdun stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[228b.7\]]dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis phyogs bcu na bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa mthong ba de lta bu'i 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/_/mthong nas kyang tshig 'di skad 'dzer to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis legs par yongs su bzung ba lags te/_'di ltar 
[\[229a.2\]]skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed cig lung ston pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i 
[\[229a.3\]]mdo sde zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs 
[\[229a.4\]]su 'dri ba'i gtam 'dis ci zhig bya/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu sems can dman pa la mos pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la yid mi ches par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_de ltar 'di dag yun ring por gnod pa dang /_phan pa med pa dang /_bde ba med pa dang /_log par ltung bar 
[\[229a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dag rgya chen po la mos pa dang /_mos pa mang ba dag kyang mchis/_slad ma'i skye bo rnams la yang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur na de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la 
[\[229a.6\]]bde ba'i slad du bshad par gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/_bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom 
[\[229a.7\]]ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di la mi gang la la stobs dang ldan pa/_mthu dang ldan pa/_bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_ji tsam sems can gyi khams su gdags pas btags pa'i sems can 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]gyi khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ches mang bar gsungs kyi/_sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin te/_sems can de dag thams cad bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas mu med par mgo bo'am/_phrag pa'am/_lag pa na thogs te/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de dag la gos dang zas dag byin te/_bde ba'i 
[\[229b.2\]]yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byed/_bla mar byed na pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po mi de gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel lam/_gsol pa/_sems can gcig la yang se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig byams pa'i sems kyis khyab par bgyis na de tsam gyis kyang bsod nams 
[\[229b.3\]]mang du skyed na/_bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas mu ma mchis par sems can thams cad bzung ste/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro bgyis pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bka' stsal pa/_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o/_/gang de 
[\[229b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di byang chub kyi sems la gnas te/_len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa la zhugs pa/_mos pa mang 
[\[229b.5\]]ba dag gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du skyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan 
[\[229b.6\]]las 'das nas kyang bdag gis blang bar bgyi/_bzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_bklag par bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying pos tshig de skad ces smras pa 
[\[229b.7\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis dbyangs gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di blang bar bgyi/_bzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_bklag par bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi/_gzhan 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bud med kyis thos ma thag tu bud med kyi dngos 
[\[230a.2\]]po las 'gyur te/_rgyu gnyis ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/_phrag dog dang /_ser sna'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag gis lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang 
[\[230a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la mngon par gtor to/_/lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gsil nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang 'dzer to/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa dag legs par bton nas 'dzin pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher 
[\[230a.4\]]yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa dang /_gang dag thos nas mos par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[230a.5\]]sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/_de nas sring mo rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba/_'khor der 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa de/_stan las langs nas lhag pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad ces/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang lhag pa'i 
[\[230a.6\]]bsam pas phrag dog dang /_ser sna spangs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni mad pa gsung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhing 
[\[230a.7\]]bud med gzhan gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na thos pa'i mod la bud med kyi dngos po las 'gyur ba lta na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/_phung po 'di nyid la bud med kyi dbang po mi gda' bar 'gyur te/_skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur cig ces smras so/_/
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]de nas sring mo de de nyid du bud med kyi dbang po mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur to/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[230b.2\]]cad zlog pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri 
[\[230b.3\]]zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus 
[\[230b.4\]]te gtan la phab pa//_//[{D131}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na mu drA sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 
[\[230b.5\]]theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi 
[\[230b.6\]]dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sum cu thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/_mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul pa/_smon lam bcos ma ma yin pa/_smon pa med pa la 
[\[230b.7\]]gnas pa/_spyod lam bcos pa med pa/_sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa/_mnyam pa nyid du bzod pa thob pa/_mnyam pa nyid thob pa/_thogs pa med pa'i gzungs thob pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /_bsam pa dang /_
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]spyod pa'i tshul shin tu shes pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_gzung ba med pa/_thogs pa 
[\[231a.2\]]med pa/_snang ba med pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa/_rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa/_sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/_rtsa ba med pa/_rten pa med pa/_dmigs su med pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_mnyam pa med pa/_zla med pa/_nga yi ba med pa/_
[\[231a.3\]]yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/_mi bya ba med pa/_ma byas pa/_ma song ba/_ma 'ongs pa/_'gro ba med pa/_mi gnas pa/_rgyun chad pa med pa/_gnas med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba/_blang ba med pa/_dor ba med pa/_'dus ma byas pa/_mngon par 'du mi byed pa/_
[\[231a.4\]]'du ba med pa/_bral ba med pa/_sems med pa/_sems dang bral ba/_kun tu 'byung ba med pa/_rtsom pa med pa/_yongs su grub pa med pa/_ma byung ba/_kun tu ma byung ba/_rab tu rgyu ba med pa/_yang dag par rgyu ba med pa/_shin tu stong pa/_'dre ba med pa/_chos thams cad la sgro btags pa med pa 
[\[231a.5\]]'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku yang mi snang sku'i mtshan ma yang mi snang /_
[\[231a.6\]]sems dang sems kyi mtshan ma yang mi snang /_na bza' dang na bza'i mtshan ma yang mi snang /_gdan dang gdan gyi mtshan ma yang mi snang /_gzims pa dang gzims pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang /_'chag pa dang 'chag pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang /_bzhengs pa dang bzhengs pa'i 
[\[231a.7\]]mtshan ma yang mi snang /_gnas pa dang gnas pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang /_grib ma'i dbyibs dang grib ma'i dbyibs kyi mtshan ma yang mi snang /_bzhugs pa dang bzhugs pa'i mtshan ma yang mi snang zhing sgra dang sgra'i mtshan ma yang mi grag go/_/de nas ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu dang /_sangs 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/_'di lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas te/_'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang /_nyi ma dang /_skar ma dang /_me dang /_nor 
[\[231b.2\]]bu dang /_glog gi 'od rnams kyang mi snang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /_skar ma rnams dang /_lha'i gzhal med khang gi 'od kyang mi snang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi 
[\[231b.3\]]'od kyang mi snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus gang lha kha cig kyang lha'i dri mi tshor te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad lha'i dri las shin tu 'das pa'i dris dri rab tu zhim par byas so/_/'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang 
[\[231b.4\]]snang bar gyur/_khor yug gi ri dang khor yug gi ri chen po yang snang bar byas/_ri rab dang /_de ma yin pa ri'i rgyal po gzhan dag dang /_ri nag po dag kyang snang bar gyur te/_phyis ni sems can gang gi mig gi dbang po la yang snang bar ma gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[231b.5\]]gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rin po che'i dra bas kun nas bskor bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad du yang dar gyi lda ldis bres shing pog snod nas spos kyis bdugs la me tog sna tshogs bkram par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i 
[\[231b.6\]]gnas kyang bya rgod phung po'i ri dang bcas te/_de dag thams cad lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing /_shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad ma chen po 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa/_dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong bas kun gang bar gyur to/_/steng gi bar snang 
[\[231b.7\]]las kyang rin po che'i dra ba'i gdugs kyis g.yogs shing brgyan to/_/yul ma ga d+hA thams cad kyang gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur to/_/de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa brgya stong rnams kyang so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bskul te/_rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du deng shig_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[232a.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[232a.3\]]zhugs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin de thos pa tsam gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gces spras byed par 'gyur te/_thabs mkhas pa med par bskal pa brgya stong du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa ni de lta ma yin gyis ting nge 'dzin de nyan du deng shig_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[232a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal te/_skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas mi snang bar gyur nas rang rang gi mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas 
[\[232a.5\]]mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ga la ba dang /_dbus kyi gling bzhi pa ga la ba dang /_'dzam bu'i gling ga la ba dang /_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[232a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 
[\[232a.7\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas de dag thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad ma chen po la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_'og gi phyogs dang /_steng gi phyogs dang /_
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]de bzhin du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang /_phyogs mtshams dang nye ba dang /_phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_tshad med/_
[\[232b.2\]]grangs med/_dpag tu med pa brgya stong de dag so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bkye ste/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du deng shig_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs 
[\[232b.3\]]te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin de'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang /_byang chub sems 
[\[232b.4\]]dpa' rnams kyis gces spras byed par gyur te/_thabs mkhas pa med par bskal pa brgya stong du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa ni de lta ma yin gyis ting nge 'dzin de nyan du deng shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 
[\[232b.5\]]ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal te/_skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas mi snang bar gyur nas rang rang gi mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ga la ba dang /_dbus kyi gling 
[\[232b.6\]]bzhi pa ga la ba dang /_'dzam bu'i gling ga la ba dang /_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der 
[\[232b.7\]]'ongs te lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas de dag thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]pad ma chen po la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na dge slong gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas pa yul so sor rgyu zhing dong ba 
[\[233a.2\]]de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang du yang ma mthong ngo /_/ma mthong nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di ltar de 
[\[233a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu 'dus par gyur te 'khod do/_/nyan 
[\[233a.4\]]thos 'bum phrag gsum yang 'dus par gyur te 'khod do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha thams cad dang /_lha'i

[\[233a.7\]]dag thams cad so so'i g.yog srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dang /_'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka'i gnas ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang du yang ma mthong ngo /_/ma mthong nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]lo/_/de'i tshe dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_nyan thos chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_
[\[233b.2\]]dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di steng du srid pa'i rtse mo man chad sa phyogs gang yang ma gang ba med de/_tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha bzhag pa tsam yang ma gang ba med par gyur to/_/de nas gnas brtan

[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]pa'i sku yang ma mthong /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa yang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas nyan thos chen po de dag gis de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad du brtags na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang ma mthong /_de bzhin gshegs

[\[234a.5\]]'di rnam pa drug dang ltas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul to/_/ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/_/'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 
[\[234a.6\]]'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/_/shin tu lam me/_shin tu thal le/_shin tu lhang nge'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/_lha'i me tog gi char mngon par bab cing /_lha'i sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs kyang 
[\[234a.7\]]len to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gang la bzhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de nyan thos chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi mig gis mi mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ci 'dra/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa de ci 'dra/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[234b.2\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin gyi/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul chen po 'di ni 
[\[234b.3\]]bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/'on kyang sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyogs tsam zhig ngas khyod la bshad de bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar 
[\[234b.4\]]nyan pa dang /_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag pa nyid de ni mig thams cad kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/_de ni lus med pa/_ma byas pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 
[\[234b.5\]]'gags pa/_ma byung ba/_yang dag par ma byung ba/_rab tu ma byung ba/_thob pa med pa/_gdags pa med pa/_ma zhugs pa/_mngon par ma grub pa/_mtha' med pa/_mu med pa/_zhi ba/_rab tu zhi ba/_nye bar zhi ba/_gnas med pa/_skye ba med pa/_tshig gi lam ma 
[\[234b.6\]]yin pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa/_kun tu 'byung ba med pa/_rgyu ba med pa/_rab tu rgyu ba med pa/_rgyu ba dang bral ba/_shin tu rnam par dag pa/_ci yang ma yin pa/_ci yang med pa/_len pa med pa/_blang ba med pa/_g.yo ba med pa/_spyod pa med pa/_rten pa med pa/_
[\[234b.7\]]ma skyes pa/_ma byung ba/_las med pa/_rnam par smin pa med pa/_ma mthong ba/_ma thos pa/_rnam par ma shes pa/_ma chags pa/_ma bcings pa/_ma grol ba/_yod pa ma yin pa/_dran pa ma yin pa/_ma bsnams pa/_ma myangs pa/_ma mthong ba/_rnam 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]par rig pa med pa/_rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid sems med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_bsam par bya ba ma yin pa/_sems ma yin pa/_sems pa dang bral ba/_sems mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/_mnyam pa med pa/_
[\[235a.2\]]sems kyi 'jug pas mi chud pa/_'gro bar ma song ba/_'gro ba med pa/_'gro ba dang bral ba/_'gro ba thams cad chad pa/_mi chod pa/_dpags pa med pa/_gcad du med pa/_phrag med pa/_bltar med pa/_rmad du byung ba/_rdzas med pa/_rdzas ma yin pa/_dngos po med pa/_tha dad pa 
[\[235a.3\]]ma yin pa/_tha dad pa med pa/_ma byung ba/_yang dag par ma byung ba/_mi 'khrugs pa/_mi rtog pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa/_rtsom pa med pa/_ma grub pa/_kun tu ma grub pa/_ma bsgrubs pa/_khyab pa med pa/_mi g.yo ba/_mi gsal ba/_ma reg pa/_'dod par bya ba ma yin pa/_'od med 
[\[235a.4\]]pa mi snang ba/_gzung ba med pa/_snang ba med pa/_mun pa med pa/_mun pa ma yin pa/_mun pa dang bral ba/_gsal ba ma yin pa/_gnas med pa/_gnas dang bral ba/_ma zhi ba/_rab tu ma zhi ba/_zhi ba med pa/_zhi ba dang bral ba/_zhi ba mnyam pa/_dag pa/_rnam par dag pa/_yongs su 
[\[235a.5\]]dag pa/_ci yang med pa/_len pa med pa/_nye bar len pa med pa/_mdza' ba med pa/_'thab pa med pa/_'thab pa dang bral ba/_mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa/_mdud pa med pa/_mdud pa dang bral ba/_dang ba/_rnyog pa med pa/_shi 'pho med pa/_shi 'phor gyur pa med pa/_chos med 
[\[235a.6\]]pa/_chos ma yin pa med pa/_zhing med pa/_zhing ma yin pa med pa/_mi zad pa/_zad par bya ba ma yin pa/_zad pa dang bral ba/_rdul med pa/_skad cig pa/_mi 'khrugs pa/_yi ge yongs su spangs pa/_sgra yongs su spangs pa/_dbyangs yongs su spangs pa/_bshad pa yongs 
[\[235a.7\]]su spangs pa/_bsgom pa yongs su spangs pa/_sems pa yongs su spangs pa/_sems yongs su spangs pa/_rigs pa med pa/_rigs pa med pa ma yin pa/_rigs pa dang bral ba ma yin pa/_ldan pa ma yin pa/_ldan pa med pa ma yin pa/_mi ldan pa ma yin pa/_zad pa 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]med pa/_zad pa med pa ma yin pa/_'chi ba med pa/_'chi ba med pa ma yin pa/_zhi bar bya ba ma yin pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_mtshan ma med pa ma yin pa/_dpag tu med pa/_dpag tu med pa ma yin pa/_dpag par bya ba ma yin pa/_ma song ba/_ma 'ongs pa/_gnyis su med pa/_
[\[235b.2\]]gnyis su med pa ma yin pa/_dmigs pa med pa/_tshu rol ma yin pa/_pha rol ma yin pa/_gzhi med pa/_gnas med pa/_mi 'byung ba/_mi 'jig pa/_ma 'phos pa/_mnyan du med pa/_pha rol gnon pa med pa/_len pa med pa/_'dor ba med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_mtshan 
[\[235b.3\]]nyid dang bral ba/_mtshan nyid ma yin pa/_mtshan nyid yongs su spangs pa/_las med pa/_las med pa ma yin pa/_mtshan med pa/_mtshan med pa ma yin pa/_mtshan gyis brgyan pa/_sgo med pa/_mi chags pa/_chags pa dang bral ba/_dad par byed pa/_sbyar ba med pa/_
[\[235b.4\]]sbyar ba dang bral ba/_bde bar byed pa/_mchog tu bde bar byed pa/_skye mched drug las grol ba/_mi snang ba/_de bzhin nyid kyis rab tu phye ba de kho na nyid/_de bzhin nyid sems can rnams mi sgrol ba'i tshul gyis sgrol ba/_sems can rnams mi 'grol ba'i tshul gyis 
[\[235b.5\]]'grol ba/_sems can rnams yongs su mi sbyong ba'i tshul gyis sbyong ba/_sems can rnams la mi skyob pa'i tshul gyis skyob pa/_gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa/_mnyam pa med pa/_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa/_'dra ba med pa/_
[\[235b.6\]]zla med pa/_mi mchi ba dang mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/_gnas med pa dang mnyam pa/_shin tu mnyam pa/_ma skyes pa/_skye ba med pa dang mnyam pa/_mi dmigs pa/_dmigs pa med pa dang mnyam pa/_ma zhi ba/_zhi ba dang bral ba/_zhi ba 
[\[235b.7\]]nyams pa/_zhi ba rab tu zhi ba/_nye bar zhi ba/_'jam pa/_mnyen pa/_shin tu dri ma med pa/_shin tu dul ba/_rtag pa ma yin pa/_chad pa ma yin pa/_spyod pa las ldog pa/_ldog pa med pa des pa/_'jigs pa las ldog pa/_phyir mi ldog pa/_'dzin pa thams 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]cad gcod pa/_mdud pa thams cad gcod pa/_gsal ba/_tha dad pa med pa/_gnyis su med pa/_gnyis dang bral ba/_gnyis su med par yongs su bstan pa/_ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba shin tu kun tu 'byung ba med pa/_rnam par 
[\[236a.2\]]ma grol ba'i tshul gyis spyod pa las rnam par grol ba/_'du ba med pa/_bral ba med pa/_ring po ma yin pa/_thung ngu ma yin pa/_zlum po ma yin pa/_gru bzhi ma yin pa/_kun tu dkyil 'khor ma yin pa/_sbom po ma yin pa/_phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin pa/_khams kyis 
[\[236a.3\]]rab tu phye ba ma yin pa/_skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa/_'dus byas su rnam par brtag pa ma yin pa/_'dus ma byas las byung ba ma yin pa/_'phel ba med pa/_'bri ba med pa/_sogs pa med pa/_ma skyes pa/_sus kyang ma mthong ba/_ma thos pa/_rnam par ma shes pa/_
[\[236a.4\]]yang dag pa ma yin pa/_yang dag pa ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa/_ma skyes pa/_'chi 'pho ma yin pa/_'jig rten dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa/_lhan cig pa ma yin pa 'ang ma yin pa ste/_lus de ni g.yo ba med pa/_'khrul pa med pa/_rgod pa med pa/_rgyu ba med pa/_rnam par 
[\[236a.5\]]rgyu ba med pa/_bsgom pa med pa/_bsgom pa dang bral ba ma yin pa/_'byung ba ma yin pa/_'jig pa ma yin pa/_ngo bo nyid ma yin pa/_ngo bo nyid med pa'ang ma yin pa/_sems pa med pa/_ston pa med pa/_sbyor ba med pa/_mi sbyor ba/_mi sbyor ba'ang ma yin pa/_'dod pa la 'dod 
[\[236a.6\]]chags pa ma yin pa/_'dod pa la 'dod chags med pa ma yin pa/_med pa med pa ma yin pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa ma yin pa/_mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa/_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa/_gnas pa med pa/_gnas pa med pa ma yin pa ste/_sha ra
