[\[236a.7\]]dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gnas pa de lta bu ni mtshan ma la gnas pa'i sems can lta ba gnyis su lhung ba gang gis kyang shes par nus sam/_sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma lags te/_skabs ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma dang /_mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma dang /_mtshan ma thams cad dang bral 
[\[236b.2\]]ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgyas par bstan pa dang /_shin tu rgyas pa yang rgya cher yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/lus de lus ma yin zhing lus las 
[\[236b.3\]]yongs su grol/_/sus kyang ma byas ma bshig rnyed par gyur pa'ang med/_/chos rnams gang na'ang kun tu ldan med mi ldan med/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku de de ltar gdags/_/'du med 'bral ba med cing gnas med rdzas kyang med/_/ma bzung ma grol mnyam pa med cing ring 
[\[236b.4\]]ba med/_/rtsom pa med cing thogs med ci la'ang gnas pa med/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ni de 'drar bstan/_/gzung ba med cing ma byas gnas med ci yang med/_/gzugs med sems med gnyis ma yin zhing gcig kyang min/_/dngos med dngos med ma yin ma byung med pa 
[\[236b.5\]]ste/_/yang dag nyid du rgyal ba'i sku ni 'di 'dra'o/_/snying po med cing nyam chung ma yin bcad pa'ang med/_/ma bcad ma byung kun tu ma byung zhig pa'ang med/_/thob pa med cing rdul tsam dag kyang bshig med de/_/rdul med rnams kyi sku de de 'drar shes par bya/_/ma mthong ma thos ma 
[\[236b.6\]]bsnams reg par gyur pa med/_/rnam par rig med ma brtags mig yor 'dra ba ste/_/srog chags mthong nas rang gi 'dzin pas sems kyang rangs/_/'di ni sangs rgyas dag gi sku 'grub bstan pa'o/_/phung po ma yin khams min mi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi bden te/_/dag med rnam par dag med 
[\[236b.7\]]dbang pos mi reg pa/_/rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog chu zla 'dra/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bar su 'dod pa/_/sku ni rgyu dang rkyen las gyur te rang bzhin med/_/ma skyes ma 'gags song ba med cing 'phos pa'ang med/_/brtags na 'jig rten gsum ni sgyu ma bzhin du snang /_/
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni mi rtog de 'drar ltos/_/zhi med rab zhi ma yin zhi bral sbyor ba'ang med/_/chags med rigs med 'di na chad pa stong pa bzhin/_/yang na ngo bo nyid kyis nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/de ltar mthong na nyin mtshan sangs rgyas mchod pa yin/_/zhing rnams 
[\[237a.2\]]bye ba stong phrag ji tsam phyogs rnams su/_/srid pa'i rtse mo bar du rin chen gang ba dag_/sangs rgyas rnams la bskal mang phye ma'i mthar 'bul ba/_/sbyin pa de ni mdo sde 'di bris char mi phod/_/gang gA'i bye ma snyed pas mang ba'i bskal par yang /_/'gro la snyoms pa'i sems 
[\[237a.3\]]kyis byams pa bsgoms pa bas/_/gang zhig ye shes phyag rgya ting 'dzin mchog mos pa/_/tshul khrims de ni bzod pa 'di yi char mi phod/_/ji tsam sngon gyi 'khor ba dag ni mtha' yas pa/_/de srid bskal par srog chags kun la rtag bzod pa/_/rgyal ba'i phyag rgya 'di la dad pa 
[\[237a.4\]]gcig bskyed na/_/'dir dad bsod nams dang ni ri rab yungs 'bru bzhin/_/ji tsam 'jig rten gsum gyi sems can rnam mang skyes/_/de dag mi gang bskal pa mang por mgor thogs shing /_/lus kyang mi ngal nam du'ang g.yo ba mi skyed pa/_/brtson 'grus de ni bzod pa 'di yi 
[\[237a.5\]]char mi phod/_/zhing brgya'i bye ma ji snyed de bas lhag pa yi/_/bskal pa mang por gang rnams bsam gtan byed pa bas/_/mdo sde 'di la nyin zhag gcig tsam sbyor ba yang /_/bsod nams de ni bzod pa 'di yi dper mi rung /_/rdul khams ji snyed pa yi bskal pa grangs med par/_/
[\[237a.6\]]shes rab mtha' gnyis spangs la mngon par brtson pa bas/_/gang gis ji skad bshad pa'i ye shes 'di rtogs pa/_/bsod nams de yang rgya mtsho dang ni chu thigs bzhin/_/rgyal ba la ni gzugs dang mtshan mar ma lta shig_/byis pa lta bus bde bar gshegs la sems ma ltar/_/
[\[237a.7\]]gang gis rab 'byor lta bur nga ni mthong gyur pa/_/des ni stong gsum kun gyi sbyin pa thams cad sbyangs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas/_yang gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'dod na lhag pa'i 
[\[237b.2\]]bsam pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba ni nyin zhag gcig kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[237b.3\]]ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'dod pa des ting nge 'dzin 'di la nyin mtshan du sbyar bar bya ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pas 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[237b.4\]]ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi tshul sgrub par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi gnas so/_/'di las gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[237b.5\]]kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la rab tu sbyor ba ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/_/bdud kyi las thams 
[\[237b.6\]]cad las kyang yang dag par 'da'o/_/'gro ba dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa ma yin/_spyod pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyor ba ni gang ci smra ba de dag thams cad 'khrul pa med do/_/de'i lus kyi las gang ci yin pa de dag thams 
[\[237b.7\]]cad kyang skyon med do/_/ngag gi las gang ci yin pa de dag thams cad kyang kun tu 'byung ba med do/_/yid kyi las gang ci yin pa de dag thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ldem po ngag khong du chud 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/chos bstan par khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba ston par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bden pa'i tshul khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 
[\[238a.2\]]'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la 
[\[238a.3\]]sbyar bar bya'o/_/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/'od phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/'khor phun sum tshogs 
[\[238a.4\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bstan pa phun 
[\[238a.5\]]sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag dang gzhan gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/yongs su tshol ba dang /_mos pa 
[\[238a.6\]]dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_bsgom pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag thams cad de la dka' bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin 
[\[238a.7\]]po che chen po 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'am/_'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i shing gis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]bsam pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ye shes mtha' yas phyag rgya mdo sde 'di/_/ye shes phung po ye shes khyad 'phags mchog_/ye shes 'od dang ye shes 'byor 
[\[238b.2\]]pa'i mdzod/_/ye shes 'byung gnas ye shes sgor 'jug pa/_/shes dbang shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab sa/_/shes rab sgron ma shes rab 'od mun sel/_/shes rab mi zad shes rab tshul rab bshad/_/nyi ma bzhin du 'jig rten gsum na lhan/_/mnyam pa 'byor pa mnyam pa nyid la 
[\[238b.3\]]gnas/_/'dzin pa thams cad gcod dang bden pa'i tshul/_/ting 'dzin kun sgo ye shes phyag rgya ni/_/sangs rgyas so so yang dag rig pa'i rig_/zad mi shes pa'i nor mdzod pha rol 'gro/_/shes rab rdzu 'phrul shes rab 'byung gnas gter/_/bsam pa ji bzhin dga' bde'i rtsa ba ste/_/ting 
[\[238b.4\]]'dzin phyag rgya 'di ni bde gshegs nor/_/rin chen ldan pa'i yul 'khor rgyal pos bsten/_/rin chen dam pa rin chen mchog 'byung gnas/_/'dod chags rdul dang zhe sdang dri ma sel/_/mdo bshad 'di ni rin chen rtsa ba'o/_/zhi zhing zhi la yid ni zhi byed pa/_/mdzes pa byed dang bdag tu 
[\[238b.5\]]lta ba sbyong /_/sangs rgyas gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di rnyed pas/_/dpa' bo'i mtshon gyis bdud ni rab tu 'joms/_/shes bya'i srog chags ye shes shes byed pa/_/ye shes 'byung gnas ye shes 'byor shes rab/_/ye shes snang ba pha rol mtha' yas te/_/mdo sde 'di ni ye shes 
[\[238b.6\]]sgo 'byung gnas/_/dul ba 'dul ba mdud pa gnyis gcod de/_/lta byas drug cu gnyis kyi lta ba sbyong /_/rgyal ba'i sgo ste bdud rtsi 'thob par 'gyur/_/'di ni sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'byung gnas/_/byang chub shin tu byang chub rang bzhin 'thun/_/mu stegs shes byed byang chub rgyu 
[\[238b.7\]]shes byed/_/byang chub 'di ni gnyid log sad byed pa/_/byang chub tshul 'dir mtha' yas zad mi shes/_/chos kyi tshul dang rigs pa rnam par sgom/_/mtha' yas pa yi gzungs rnams rab tu sgrub/_/stobs bcu rnams kyi chos la 'jug pa ste/_/gzungs 'di nyid ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o/_/
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa sgrub/_/'di ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin dang bzod/_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab mi zad de/_/'dir gnas pha rol phyin pa phun sum tshogs/_/las dang nyon mongs pa la 'jigs ma byed/_/blo gros ngan pa'i bdud kyis ma 'jigs 
[\[239a.2\]]shig_/'di la sbyor la rab tu mchod med de/_/ji ltar bsam bzhin byang chub de 'tshang rgya/_/mdo sde 'di ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/_/phyogs bcu gang lhags byang chub mi phyed snod/_/sras rnams dag ni bskal pa bzang 'di la/_/'dug pa de dag dbang du gyur pa yin/_/'di ni 'das 
[\[239a.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/_/mdo sde 'di ni ma byon rnams kyi yum/_/da ltar byung ba thams cad 'di las byung /_/de phyir rgyal ba'i spun rnams 'dir sbyor cig_/gang dag mdo 'di tshul la rab gnas pa/_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nor 'thob cing /_/las kyang rnam dag 
[\[239a.4\]]spyod pa rdzogs par 'gyur/_/mi ldog sa 'thob 'dam las rgal bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gang gA'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag 
[\[239a.5\]]drug cu rtsa brgyad ni bskal pa brgya stong nas bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyis skad cig mi zad pa bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo/_/lha dang mi'i skye 
[\[239a.6\]]dgu dkrigs pa phrag drug cu po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_thams cad ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de dag ting nge 'dzin 'di la 
[\[239a.7\]]rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur nas/_de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa 'bum phrag sum cu na 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan to/_/de dag las kha cig yun ring po nas smon lam btab pa dang ldan pa dag ni bzod pa thob bo/_/kha cig smon lam myur du 'debs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[239b.2\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/_'jigs pa med pa zhes bya bar ming 'thun par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal 
[\[239b.3\]]pa/_'jam dpal de lta bas na/_khyod mi dmigs pa'i tshul du gnas shing spros pa med pa la dga' bas mi gnas par spyad par bya'o/_/chos thams cad la mi gnas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du 
[\[239b.4\]]bsgrubs pa 'di kun tu bsrung bar bya'o/_/gzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/spros pa med pa la dga' bar bya'o/_/gnas med par spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_phrag dog med 
[\[239b.5\]]par bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[239b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun tu bsrung zhing rab tu bsrung bar spro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub gang lags pa de ni gang gi yang ma lags/_gang nas kyang ma lags/_gang na yang ma 
[\[239b.7\]]lags/_gang gis kyang ma lags/_ci yang ma lags te/_mi snang ba/_gzung du ma mchis pa thob pa ma lags pa/_chud zos pa ma lags pa'o/_/de nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag sum cu stan las langs nas/_thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa/_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di bsrung ba dang /_gzung ba dang /_bstan pa dang /_
[\[240a.2\]]gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par spro'o zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de la mngon par gsol te/_smon lam yang btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[240a.3\]]dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i bsam pas soms shig_/'di khyod kyi las yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs nas bla gos phrag 
[\[240a.4\]]pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i bsam pas bsams lags so/_/
[\[240a.5\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag sum cu po 'di dag gi nang na brgyad stong ni dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[240a.6\]]'dzin par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma ni dmu rgod dmigs par 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa/_dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ma yin par 'gyur te/_de dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i tshe/_nga yi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[240a.7\]]bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di spong bar 'gyur/_'gal bar byed par 'gyur/_mi ston par 'gyur/_mi 'dzin par 'gyur te/_rab tu 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa rnam pa bdun gyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]sems bskyed do/_/bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 
[\[240b.2\]]dang /_sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can gyi khams mthong nas snying rje chen po skyes te byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_bsti stang du byas te sbyin pa bzang 
[\[240b.3\]]po yid du 'ong ba byin nas/_byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_gzhan yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi 
[\[240b.4\]]yon tan bsngags pa yongs su rdzogs pa thos nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/_byams pa rnam pa bdun po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byams pa de la gang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[240b.5\]]kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang /_gang dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang /_gang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems 
[\[240b.6\]]can gyi khams mthong nas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po skyes te/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang /_byams pa sems bskyed pa 'di gsum ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bsrung ba yin te/_myur du bla na med pa 
[\[240b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa sems bskyed pa de dag las lhag ma bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ma yin par 'gyur ba'o/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na phyir mi ldog 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]pa'i chos su rig par bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin/_pha rol gyi rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la phrag dog med pa yin/_srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa mi smra 
[\[241a.2\]]ba yin/_shes kyi khe dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la mi chags pa yin/_chos zab mo la mos pa yin te/_'jig rten gyi bya ba sna tshogs la mos pa ma yin gyi chos thams cad la chos zab mo dang ldan pa yin te/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos 
[\[241a.3\]]lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na/_phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su rig par bya'o/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod du rig par bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzi brjid chung zhing bka' blo mi bde ba yin/_dman pa la mos shing thams cad 
[\[241a.4\]]la dman pa'i chos ston pa yin/_shes kyi khe dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la chags shing slong ba ster ba'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yin/_sgyu dang ldan zhing g.yo byed pa yin/_stong pa nyid la ngag gi_/las lhur len pas mi drang ba yin te/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos 
[\[241a.5\]]lnga po de dag dang ldan na de dmu rgod du rig par bya'o/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su rig par bya'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag mi dmigs shing bdag la mi stod pa dang /_sems can mi dmigs pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[241a.6\]]rnam par rtog pas mi ston pa dang /_byang chub mi dmigs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi lta ba ste/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su 
[\[241a.7\]]rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/phrag dog can dang shes kyi khe 'dod dang /_/gnod pa byed dang 'chos dang zur za dang /_/smra ba tsam dang dman pa'i tshul can gyis/_/bde gshegs byang chub 'di ni bsrung mi nus/_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]bas mthar dga' zhing dgon dben spyod yul ba/_/tshig tsam ma yin zab mo bzod pa dang /_/bse lta bu dang shes khe bde bsrings pa/_/de ni byang chub 'jig par 'gyur ba srung /_/tshogs las bsrings shing rab tu zhi la mos/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lta bur 'jigs shing gnas med rgyu/_/nam mkha' rlung bzhin 
[\[241b.2\]]rnyed la mi chags pa/_/de 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin/_/lus la mi lta srog don mi gnyer na/_/shes kyi khe 'dod par lta ga la 'gyur/_/brtson brtsams bdag gi ma yin ci yang min/_/de ni ma 'ongs dus na byang chub snod/_/phyi ma'i dus na sems can 'byung ba ni/_/bdag cag byang chub 
[\[241b.3\]]la ni spyod ces 'dzer/_/de dag sems rgod tshul 'chos nyon mongs bcas/_/de dag rnams kyis chos 'di bsrung mi nus/_/'dren pa mar me mdzad kyi pha rol gyi/_/bskal pa dag ni stong phrag bye ba na/_/sangs rgyas zla ba'i tog ces bya ba byung /_/'gro ba rnams la ting 'dzin 'di bshad dran/_/rgyal 
[\[241b.4\]]ba de yi 'dus pa dang po ni/_/phyir mi ldog pa khrag khrig brgyad cu ste/_/'dus pa gnyis pa khrag khrig bdun cu yin/_/'dus pa gsum pa bdun cu rtsa gsum mo/_/rgyal ba'i tshe ni bskal pa bye ba mang /_/'od kyang dpag tshad drug cu rtsa gsum pa/_/dge 'dun bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu ste/_/
[\[241b.5\]]thams cad dgra bcom dbang ldan gyur pa'o/_/de yi tshe na rgyal po byung ba ni/_/'khor los sgyur ba bsod nams 'phags zhes bya/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad du gyur pa ni/_/mtshungs par dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu'o/_/gling bzhi rnams kyi tshad kyang de bzhin no/_/rgyal po'i slas ni bye ba drug cu 
[\[241b.6\]]tham/_/bu ni stong tham pa ste nyung ma yin/_/rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba'i 'od ces bya/_/grong khyer dag ni bye ba brgyad cur gyur/_/thams cad skyed mos tshal rgyas mdzes par gnas/_/thams cad lo legs bde zhing dga' ba ste/_/sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khang gnas 'dra/_/rgyal pos rmi 
[\[241b.7\]]lam du ni zla ba'i tog_/sangs rgyas byung ngo zhes ni thos gyur nas/_/g.yog 'khor bye ba brgya phrag drug cu dang /_/rgyal ba de yi drung du nyer song nas/_/des ni ting 'dzin zab mo rgyal ba'i sku/_/mdo sde bshad pa 'di ni thos nas su/_/ston pa ji ltar bzhed bzhin spyad gsol zhes/_/rgyal 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]srid thams cad sangs rgyas de la phul/_/grong khyer kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa yis/_/gtsug lag khang ni tsan dan rgyus bsgrubs byas/_/des ni thams cad rtse rgod bcas par phul/_/'chag pa'i sa ni gser gyi gyim bag g.yogs/_/lo ni stong phrag brgyad cur tshang bar yang /_/
[\[242a.2\]]rgyal po las gzhan mi byed mchod pa byed/_/rgyal po nam du'ang rmugs dang gnyid mi bskyed/_/'dod la mi 'dun rgyal srid srid ma yin/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di rab tu 'dod pa'i phyir/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma re re zhing /_/bkod pa gang dag phul bar gyur pa ni/_/thams cad tshig gis bshad par mi 
[\[242a.3\]]nus so/_/lkog tu song nas rtog pa skyed gyur pa/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni mchog tu zab pa ste/_/zang zing 'dzin pas ye shes phyag rgya yi/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni bsgrub par mi nus snyam/_/de ni rab byung rgyal srid thams cad spangs/_/sha na ka yi ras gyon bsod snyoms spyod/_/lo ni stong phrag brgyad 
[\[242a.4\]]cu tshang bar yang /_/gnyid kyis ma non ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/_/skabs der sangs rgyas kyis ni ji tsam gang /_/rab tu bshad pa'i chos rnams des bzung nas/_/bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das 'og des/_/mchod rten bye ba drug cu rtsa bzhi byas/_/rin chen bdun gyis spras shing 
[\[242a.5\]]mdzes byas pa'i/_/gdugs ni lnga brgya kun la rab tu phul/_/kun la sil snyan khrol ba brgya rnams dang /_/mar me stong phrag brgya yang rab tu phul/_/yo byad bsnyungs pa'i tshul la gnas nas su/_/lo ni bye ba stong phrag bdun cu gsum/_/zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gnas nas ni/_/
[\[242a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di 'khor la rab tu bshad/_/legs shes bya ba'ang 'dod pa ma yin na/_/shes kyi khe 'dod par lta ga la 'gyur/_/de'i tshe chos bsrung ba yi bsam pa yis/_/mgron du bos pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba brgyad cu dang /_/khrag khrig bdun cu des 
[\[242a.7\]]ni mnyes par byas/_/de dag kun la de 'dra'i bkod pa byas/_/thams cad las kyang ting 'dzin 'di thob bo/_/gang dag byang chub 'di ni bsrung 'dod pa/_/de dag 'dod pa med cing mos pa dang /_/g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pas sgom pa yis/_/rgyal po de 'dra bar ni bslab par gyis/_/
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]chos 'dod ma yin rnyed pa don gnyer la/_/bsdams pa min dag byang chub slob bo zhes/_/smra 'gyur kha cig phyi ma'i dus 'byung ste/_/smra la dga' zhing thams cad stong zhes smra/_/stong nyid ji bzhin stong pa mi shes te/_/'tsho chags tha bar bcas shing nyon mongs bcas/_/tshig gis 'di dag 
[\[242b.2\]]stong nyid 'dzin 'jug cing /_/bdag ni byang chub the tsom med ces smra/_/de tshe rgyal mchog tshe ni dpag med gyur/_/bu stong dag ni bskal pa bzang 'di pa/_/mdun na 'dug pa'i 'khor rnams ji snyed pa/_/de dag thams cad de tshe rab tu byung /_/rgyal ba bye ba khrag khrig rnams dran te/_/de las 
[\[242b.3\]]rab tu byung ste de dag gis/_/gang ci bshad pa ngas kun sgra tsam bshad/_/ngas ni gnas pas stong pa nyid kyang bsgoms/_/de lta'i thabs kyis bskal pa mtha' yas par/_/ngas ni gnas pas sangs rgyas gang dag mchod/_/nga ni de yi byang chub ma thob kyi/_/gzhan du 'di la gnas te 
[\[242b.4\]]bsgrubs pas na/_/mar me mdzad pa mthong ma thag tu ni/_/som nyi spangs nas mnyam pa nyid mthong bas/_/de nas khyod ni shAkya seng ge yi/_/sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes 'dren pas bdag lung bstan/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[242b.5\]]ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/_de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa ma skyes dgra'i ma dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa bye ba ldan gyi bu mo gser mchog snang ba zhes bya ba yang 'khor de nyid 
[\[242b.6\]]du 'dus par gyur te 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_gser mchog snang gnyis stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der nye bar song ste phyin pa dang /_gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_
[\[242b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_gus pa dang bcas/_zhes dang bcas par so so nas ras bcos ma brgya stong ri ba phrugs res bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol to/_/rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi skon bu lnga brgyas kyang /_bcom ldan 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]'das la mngon par gtor nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'di la mos par bgyi/_yid ches par bgyi/_gzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_bklag par bgyi/_kun 
[\[243a.2\]]chub par bgyi/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag la yang bdag cag gis gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur dang /_rim gro bgyi bar 
[\[243a.3\]]spro'o/_/sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yongs su smin par bgyi'o/_/stong pa nyid spang bar mi bgyi'o/_/tshig lhur blang bar mi bgyi'i nan tan gyis bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das lus dang srog la yang blta bar mi bgyi na/_slad rol gyi 
[\[243a.4\]]dngos po rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_btsun mo dam pa de gnyis 'di lta bur rjes su slob pa na/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo'i 'khor bud med brgya stong stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/_gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de 
[\[243a.5\]]dag ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rangs nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang slad ma'i tshe/_slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar spro'o/_/yul ma ga d+hA'i dge bsnyen ma yul ma ga d+hA na 'khod pa drug 
[\[243a.6\]]khri las gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rangs nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos gzung bar spro'o zhes gsol to/_/de nas de'i tshe 
[\[243a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/_gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma kha dog tha dad pa kha dog brgya stong dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ngo /_/de dag zhal gyi sgo nas byung nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byas te/_bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 
[\[243b.2\]]mngon par 'phags te/_nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil du brlag par byas nas/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad zhi bar byas te/_slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan 
[\[243b.3\]]brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/de nas dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_bye ba ldan pa'i bu mo gser mchog snang ba gnyis stan las langs te/_gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[243b.4\]]'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/_mi mchog yon tan mnga' ba srid pa gsum na mtshungs ma mchis/_/nam mkha' zla ba 'dra ba yon tan brgya rnams 
[\[243b.5\]]shin tu rgyas/_/rab tu bzhad pa legs par mdzes pa mchog tu snyan pa'i gsung /_/stobs bcu ji slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di ni bka' stsal gsol/_/sems can dam pa zla ba 'dra ba'i zhal ni rab 'dzum 'jig rten mig sbyin pa/_/shin tu mdzes shing mchog tu dri med tshangs pa'i dbyangs 
[\[243b.6\]]dang 'jam pa'i sgra dang dbyangs/_/sems la snum zhing lus la sim pa bde bas sems ni rab tu tshim mdzad pa/_/mi yi dam pa seng ge'i 'dzum mdzad de yi rgyu ni 'dren pa lung bstan gsol/_/'khrugs pa mi mnga' ba dang ma rnyogs ma tshang mi mnga' gsung /_/shin tu ldan zhing rab tu mnyam 
[\[243b.7\]]la mchog tu mdzes par snyan/_/pha rol spyod pa'i tshul ni khrag khrig brgya dag rnam par 'byed/_/ci yi slad du yon tan mnga' ba 'dzum mdzad bka' stsal gsol/_/gsung ni brgyad dang ldan zhing yan lag drug cu rnams dang ldan/_/skad ni bdun brgya dag dang yi ge bye ba drug cu ldan/_/
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]sangs rgyas gsung gi rigs pa bye ba khrag khrig bcu dang brgyad cu ste/_/'dzum mdzad don gyi gling bzhi dpag tu ma mchis bka' stsal gsol/_/ri bo mchog dang mtshungs 'dra pha rol tshogs kyis mi g.yos pa/_/tshul brgya rnam par 'byed cing yid gnyis rnam par 'thor mdzad 
[\[244a.2\]]pa/_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad pa 'gro la bde sbyin pa/_/'di ltar sdug pa 'dzum mdzad spyod pa ji bzhin dbye bar gsol/_/gser gyi ri ltar dga' zhing rin chen mchod sdong 'dra ba'i sku/_/zhal ras pad ma 'dab ma brgya pa rgyas 'dra blta ba'i ngos/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dbang po'i sgra sgrog seng 
[\[244a.3\]]ge'i rnam gnon stobs ldan pa/_/rab tu bzhad pa bzhad pa'i don gyi rigs pa lung bstan gsol/_/srid pa gsum na mtshungs pa ma mchis dri gsum dri mi mnga'/_/mdzes par spyod pas srid pa brgya dag nye bar zhi mdzad dgyes/_/khyod kyi 'dzum pa mdzad pa phyogs bcu dag tu rgya cher gsal/_/
[\[244a.4\]]bdud rtsi mun pa sel ba rnam par dbye ba myur du gsungs/_/pi bang rdza rnga rgyud gcig rgyud gsum dung dang gling bu dang /_/mi 'am ci dang ka la ping ka dag dang khu byug dang /_/ngang pa khrung khrung dag dang rnga dang rdza rnga pheg rdob rnams/_/dus gcig sbyar ba bgyis kyang sangs rgyas gsung gi brgya char mi 'gyur 
[\[244a.5\]]ro/_/phyogs bcu dag nas lhags par gyur pa'i 'khor yangs 'di dag ni/_/mang 'dzin blo gros mang zhing blo gros ngan par lhung ba ste/_/ci nas 'bras bcas brtul zhugs grub nas phyogs phyogs mchi 'gyur bar/_/ji ltar 'di dag sred pa'i 'khri shing btsal ba de 'dra gsungs/_/bye ba'i 
[\[244a.6\]]zhing gnas lhags pa 'khor gyi dam pa mtha' yas pa/_/phyogs bcu'i mi mchog dag gis chos 'dod pa dag rab bkye ba/_/de dag ci nas dngos grub thob nas rga ste 'chi 'gyur bar/_/de dag la ni 'dzum pa'i gleng gzhi chos char dbab tu gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i 
[\[244a.7\]]btsun mo dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_gser mchog snang la slar tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_dran pa bskal pa dpag tu med pa gang gA'i bye snyed na/_/gang tshe bsod nams 'od zer zhes bya 'jig rten 'dren pa byung /_/ston pa de yi tshe lo bye ba phrag ni bdun cu ste/_/chos kyi rgyal po de yi 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]nyan thos dge 'dun mtha' yas gyur/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po shes rab kha lo sgyur ba byung /_/de yi chung ma tog gi rgyal po dang yang gnyis pa ni/_/'od 'phro zhes bya dngos po kun la ma chags mngon par byung /_/chos 'dod rab tu byung nas lo ni bye bar chos tshul bsrungs/_/des ni 
[\[244b.2\]]'dren pa bye ba drug cu dag dang gzhan yang ni/_/dkrigs phrag sum cu'i chos tshul 'thun par mtha' dus der bsrungs te/_/ma 'ongs 'jig rten mgon po gang gA sum cu'i bye snyed kyi/_/chos tshul nyams par 'gyur tshe 'thun par der ni srung bar 'gyur/_/tshe rabs de dang der ni khyed 'thun sems 
[\[244b.3\]]can dag gyur pa/_/rgyal po 'khrugs med shes rab kha lo sgyur ba'i chung mar 'gyur/_/chos bsrungs pas na phyi ma'i dus na bud med dngos spangs te/_/bde ba can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od mthong 'gyur/_/phyi bzhin 'brang ba gzhan yang ji snyed de dag 'thun par ni/_/zad 'gyur 
[\[244b.4\]]dus na byang chub bsrung bar bsam pa thag pas zhugs/_/bde ba can du pad ma 'dab ma rgyas par 'dug pa yi/_/rgyal ba'i sras po mtshan rnams sum cu dag gis brgyan par 'gyur/_/de dag der dong nas ni gus par ston pa mchod byas nas/_/bskal pa bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya dgra rnams 
[\[244b.5\]]med pa la/_/de dag thams cad der ni byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/_/lha mi'i skye dgu dag kyang chos sgrub phyir ni gnas par 'gyur/_/zhing de na ni bdud kyi las rnams thams cad yongs med cing /_/de yi dus na nyan thos rnams kyang grag par mi 'gyur te/_/las skyon med cing 
[\[244b.6\]]ngan song med la srog chags mngal gnas med/_/der ni rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas 'du bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub bsrung phyir lus bor te/_/shes kyi khe 'dod med cing srog la'ang lta bar mi 'gyur ba/_/de ni myur du byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya 'dir gnas 
[\[244b.7\]]nas/_/bsam pa ji bzhin 'dod par sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu 'gro_/de lta bas na thab mo chen po'i tshe yang phan tshun du/_/'thun byos sangs rgyas dga' skyed gus bcas phrag dog med par ni/_/nga yi byang chub srungs shig dbye 'gyur phyi ma'i dus na yang /_/gang dag rnyed la 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]brkam pa de dag rjes su ma slob shig_/gang don sangs rgyas chos tshol ba ni bskal pa bye bar ni/_/nga yis chung ma bu pho bu mo rgyal srid mgo mig btang /_/nga yi chos de rigs pa mi ldan de dag rnyed rgyus 'jig_/shes kyi khe dang rnyed phyir phan tshun zhe sdang byed par 'gyur/_/zad 'gyur 
[\[245a.2\]]dus na bsam pa thag pas byang chub bsrung ba'i phyir/_/srog chags bye ba brgyad cu mchi ma'i shugs kyis zhugs par 'gyur/_/stong gsum g.yos nas lha yis me tog char yang rab tu phab/_/gang dag mdo 'dir dga' ba de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/_/phyogs bcu'i 'dren pa ji snyed pa la'ang 
[\[245a.3\]]dga' bar gyur pa yin/_/lha rnams kyis kyang de dag bsngags phreng dam pa rjod par 'gyur/_/gang dag phyi dus ye shes phyag rgya'i mdo thos sgom byed pa/_/de dag rnams la lha yang mchod byed gnod sbyin srung bar byed/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas zhing ni gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi rnams/_/gser bkang 
[\[245a.4\]]bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed 'dren pa phul ba ni/_/gang zhig ye shes phyag rgya'i mdo sde 'di la bzod gyur na/_/'di la gang sbyor byed pa'i bsod nams de yi grangs mi 'gro_/mi 'dod pa la nan gyis byang chub su la'ang sbyin mi bya/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni rmad byung thos nas byang chub sems bskyed cing /_/
[\[245a.5\]]ji ltar mdo sde dam pa 'di las rjes su bstan bshad pa/_/de ltar sbyor ba ring por mi thogs 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa rgya chen reg 'dod pa/_/dgon par gnas nas gus dang bcas par so sor thar bsdams te/_/sdom pa gsum gyis sems 
[\[245a.6\]]can kun la ma bur 'du shes nas/_/yang dag dga' ba mdun byas dpa' dang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed/_/gang zhig ye shes phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin 'di ni yi ger bris/_/'chang zhing ston la klog cing gang zhig gzhan la rab 'chad pa/_/de yi bsod nams phung po dpag tu med cing bsam mi 
[\[245a.7\]]lang /_/rgyal ba'i sras po bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams su 'gro_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la/_de 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang len par 'gyur ba de dag ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[245b.2\]]byams pa phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/_sdug bsngal ba/_mchog tu sdug bsngal ba/_gzu lums can/_mchog tu gzu lums can/_bzod par dka' ba/_mos par dka' ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa gal te ma 'ongs pa'i tshe ma 
[\[245b.3\]]'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba ci 'dra ba 'byung ba/_de thams cad khyod la bstan kyang de dag byams pa khyod la snang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad 
[\[245b.4\]]ces gsol to/_/bdag cag thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yang dag par slob par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag ni thos nas de bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur 
[\[245b.5\]]zhing de bzhin nyid du bslabs nas kyang de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur te/_ji nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[245b.6\]]chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa sems can gang dag sngon sangs rgyas brgya la byang chub tu sems bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub kyi sems nyams par 'gyur te/_shin tu rgyas pa la yang mi mos shing 
[\[245b.7\]]spong bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa sems can gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas stong la byang chub tu sems bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub kyi sems skye yang shin tu rgyas pa spong bar 'gyur gyis mos par mi 'gyur/_yi ger 'dri bar mi 'gyur/_
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]'dzin par mi 'gyur/_'chang bar mi 'gyur/_lung nod par mi 'gyur/_dad par mi 'gyur ro/_/byams pa sems can gang dag sangs rgyas 'bum la byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub kyi 
[\[246a.2\]]sems skye bar 'gyur/_shin tu rgyas pa la yang mos par 'gyur zhing mi spong yang lung nod par mi 'gyur/_don go bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byams pa sems can gang dag sangs rgyas bye ba la byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i 
[\[246a.3\]]dus na byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur/_shin tu rgyas pa'ang thos par 'gyur/_yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur/_'chang bar 'gyur/_mos par 'gyur/_lung nod par 'gyur/_don go bar 'gyur yang byang chub la bzod par mi 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par mi 'gyur/_spobs par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[246a.4\]]byams pa sems can gang dag sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la byang chub tu sems bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur/_shin tu rgyas pa yang thos par 'gyur/_mos par 'gyur la/_yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur/_
[\[246a.5\]]'dzin par 'gyur/_lung nod par 'gyur/_bzod par 'gyur yang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par mi 'gyur/_spobs par mi 'gyur ro/_/byams pa sems can gang dag sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu la byang chub tu sems bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bskyed par gyur pa de dag ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i 
[\[246a.6\]]dus na byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur/_shin tu rgyas pa yang thos par 'gyur/_mos par 'gyur zhing spong bar mi 'gyur la/_yid ches par 'gyur/_'don par 'gyur/_yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_kha ton byed par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_'dzin par 
[\[246a.7\]]'gyur/_kun 'dzin par 'gyur/_don yang rtogs par 'gyur/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur/_bsgom par 'gyur/_byang chub la bzod pa yang thob par 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par mi 'gyur/_
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]spobs par mi 'gyur ro/_/byams pa sems can gang dag sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu la byang chub tu sems bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bskyed par gyur pa de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu las de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par 'gyur/_bzung kun 
[\[246b.2\]]tu bzung bar gyur pa de dag ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur/_shin tu rgyas pa'ang thos par 'gyur/_mos par 'gyur/_yid ches par 'gyur zhing spong bar mi 'gyur la/_'don par 'gyur/_dad par 'gyur/_kha ton byed par 'gyur/_yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur/_
[\[246b.3\]]klog par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_'dzin par 'gyur/_kun 'dzin par 'gyur/_don kyang rtogs par 'gyur/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur/_sgom par 'gyur/_byang chub la bzod pa'ang thob par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 
[\[246b.4\]]phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yang thob par 'gyur/_chos thams cad dbyer med cing dmigs su med pas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ston par 'gyur/_bdud kyi las kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur/_chos kyi sgrib pas mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis bskal pa grangs med par gang sdig pa'i las 
[\[246b.5\]]mngon par 'dus byas par gyur pa de dag gi de yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na klad pa na ba tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_sems nyam nga ba tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_skur pa btab pa tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_brnyas pa tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_thing 
[\[246b.6\]]slad byas pa tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_co dris byas pa tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_rnyed pa chung bas thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_skye ba gcig kho nas thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa gang dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub kyi sems la sgyid lug 
[\[246b.7\]]par mi 'gyur zhing yang dag par blangs pa bstan la/_bsam pa thag pa nas byang chub la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sangs rgyas grangs med pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]las gang 'dus byas pa de dag gi de yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mdog ngan par gyur pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur/_gdul dka' ba tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur/_nad mang ba tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur/_gzi brjid chung bas byang bar 'gyur/_dma' ba'i rigs 
[\[247a.2\]]su skyes pas byang bar 'gyur/_ma grags pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang bar 'gyur/_khyad du bsad pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang bar 'gyur/_dbul po'i rigs su skyes pas byang bar 'gyur/_mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo'i rigs su skyes pas byang bar 'gyur/_ngan pa'i rigs su skyes 
[\[247a.3\]]pas byang bar 'gyur/_phongs pa'i rigs su skyes pas byang bar 'gyur/_log par lta ba'i rigs su skyes pas byang bar 'gyur/_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_kla klo'i rigs su skyes pas byang bar 'gyur/_sems can skal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad pas byang bar 'gyur/_'phags 
[\[247a.4\]]pa ma yin pa'i sems can dang phrad pas byang bar 'gyur/_sems la mya ngan mang bas byang bar 'gyur/_rgyal srid 'khrugs pa dang /_yul 'khrugs pa dang /_ljongs 'khrugs pa dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'khrugs pa dang /_
[\[247a.5\]]khyim 'khrugs pa dang /_sdug pa dang bral bas 'khrugs pa dang /_mu ges 'khrugs pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba dang /_rgyun tu chos mnyan pa mi thob pa dang /_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams yun ring pos rnyed pa dang /_ngan 
[\[247a.6\]]pa rnyed pa dang /_chung ngu rnyed pa dang /_skye bo phal pa dga' ba dang /_skye bo ya rabs la ma mos pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson pa'i bar chad 'byung ba dang /_rtog pa chung ba dang /_bsam gtan la sems g.yeng ba dang /_sems kyi gnas ma rnyed pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[247a.7\]]ma rnyed pa dang /_chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba khong du ma chud pas kyang las kyi sgrib pa de byang bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na rmi lam na sdig pa mthong ba rmis pas kyang las kyi sgrib pa de dag byang bar 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa des nyen par gyur na ni bdud sdig can gyi zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/de dag 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]bdud sdig can gyi zil gyis non par gyur na ni bdud kyi skyon rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag bdud kyi skyon khong du ma chud pas de la gang dag rnyed pa dang ldan pa de dag ni ma rnyed pa dag la brnyas so/_/gang dag mdzes par gyur pa de dag ni mdzes pa ma yin pa dag la brnyas so/_/gang dag blta na sdug 
[\[247b.2\]]par gyur pa de dag ni blta na mi sdug pa dag la brnyas so/_/gang dag mthong na dga' bar gyur pa de dag ni mthong na dga' ba ma yin pa dag la brnyas so/_/gang dag mang du thos par gyur pa de dag ni mang du thos pa ma yin pa dag la brnyas so/_/gang dag spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni 
[\[247b.3\]]spobs pa dang mi ldan pa dag la brnyas so/_/gang dag stong pa la mos par gyur pa de dag ni ser sna can dag la brnyas so/_/gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni ngang tshul ngan pa can dag la brnyas so/_/gang dag bzod pa tsam rnyed par gyur pa de dag ni gnod sems can dag la brnyas 
[\[247b.4\]]so/_/gang dag brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni le lo can dag la brnyas so/_/gang dag bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed par gyur pa de dag ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa dag la brnyas so/_/gang dag shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni 'chal pa'i shes rab can dag la brnyas so/_/
[\[247b.5\]]gang dag thabs la mkhas par gyur pa de dag ni thabs la mi mkhas pa dag la brnyas so/_/de dag chos yid du 'ong ba gang dang gang rnyed par gyur pa de yang de dag nyid kyis gzhan la brnyas so/_/byams pa gang dag 'thun par gyur nas lag gcig ste/_dbyer med pas sngon sangs rgyas brgya la 
[\[247b.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa de dag kyang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dbye bar 'gyur na/_de las gzhan pa'i sems can bsam pa ma nges pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/_blo rgod pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_byams pa de ltar phyis 'jig rten mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 
[\[247b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' khyod kyis go cha chen po sra ba shin tu bgo bar bya/_lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa dang /_bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan par bya/_chos zab mo la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas par bya/_dmigs pa med pa'i lta ba can du 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]'gyur bar bya/_sems brtan par bya/_brtson 'grus brtan par bya/_rtul ba brtan pa dang /_sbyor ba brtan par bya/_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su blang ba dang /_dam pa'i chos gzung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yun 
[\[248a.2\]]ring du gnas par bya ba la spro bar bya/_brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/_brtson par bya/_gzhan yang gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang /_byams pa dang /_seng ge rab snang la sogs pa/_bskal 
[\[248a.3\]]pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa 'di thos nas/_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus de na dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar spro bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[248a.4\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lhan cig tu 'thun par g.yo dang /_sgyu thams cad spangs shing /_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa thams cad spangs la dga' ba dang /_mi dga' ba dang /_srid pa thams cad bsal te/_zab mo mi dmigs pa la mos shing de bzhin gshegs 
[\[248a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su gzung bar bgyi/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi zhing /_bdag cag lus dang srog la mi blta bar sangs rgyas 
[\[248a.6\]]kyi byang chub 'di kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang /_byams pa dang /_seng ge rab snang la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[248a.7\]]dpa' chen po de dag la rjes su bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/g.yo med sgyu med nga med tha ba med/_/dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing gnas med gnas/_/zab mo bzod la mi g.yeng legs gnas te/_/stobs bcu nor 'di rab tu bsrung bar gyis/_/sgyu 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]med gcam med 'dod med nga med dang /_/gzung med dga' dang rnam par 'dzin bral dang /_/nam mkha'i lam ltar mnyam nyid rab ldan par/_/de ltar sbyor ba ting 'dzin 'di 'thob bo/_/rtag tu byang chub 'dun pa brtan par gyis/_/zab mo rgyal ba dag gi tshul yang bsgoms/_/dga' 
[\[248b.2\]]ba kun la 'dris la mi lta na/_/des ni ting 'dzin dkon mchog 'di 'thob bo/_/rtag tu dga' dang mi dga' sems snyoms shing /_/skyes bu mchog la ston pa lta bu yi/_/'du shes skyed cing dga' bya rtag dga' ba/_/des ni myur du ting 'dzin 'di rtogs so/_/snang ba zad mi shes pa mchog 
[\[248b.3\]]gi gter/_/spobs pa phyag rgya tshul ni bye ba brgyas/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer rab rib sel lta bu/_/ye shes 'jug pa'i tshul ni 'dir brjod do/_/nyi ma zla ba dang ni skar ma dang /_/ji ltar sa dang gangs kyi ri bo dang /_/gling bzhi'i bdag po brgya byin tshangs pa dang /_/sman pa lta bu'i mdo sde 'di zung 
[\[248b.4\]]shig_/'di ni sems dag 'di ni las zad byed/_/'di ni bdud rtsi 'di ni bdud 'dul ba/_/'di ni pha rol sems spyod rdzu 'phrul mig_/'di ni sems can thams cad rtogs byed sgra/_/'di ni bskal pa khrag khrig dran par byed/_/'di ni dra ba thams cad ma lus zad/_/sangs rgyas phyag 
[\[248b.5\]]rgya 'di ni bde gshegs bstod/_/'di dang ldan pa'i lag tu byang chub gnas/_/ji ltar stong nyid rang bzhin 'dir gnas pa/_/de ltar de yis stong nyid 'di rtogs te/_/rtog dang rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa 'di/_/gnyi ga yongs su spangs na chos 'dzin yin/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das phyi la la zhig_/
[\[248b.6\]]chos 'di rmi lam lta bur blta zhes 'dzer/_/gang chos ma byung sus kyang byas ma yin/_/rang gi shes pas de dag de la rtog_/stong nyid ma skyes sus kyang byas ma yin/_/ma mthong 'ongs pa ma yin 'pho min na/_/dmigs gnas bdag cag stong nyid legs bslab shes/_/'dzer pa de 
[\[248b.7\]]dag chos kyi rkun po yin/_/gang dag las ni chos 'di thos nas su/_/mchi ma 'byung zhing ba spu rab g.yos nas/_/de ni byang chub phyir mi ldog ces 'dzer/_/phyi nas bsngags pa ma yin brgya dag smra/_/ma rabs khyim du nor mang zad nas ni/_/bde ba'i ched du de dag rab 'byung ste/_/bstan 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]pa 'di la bde ba kun rnyed nas/_/nga yi sras rnams la ni sdang bar byed/_/byang chub don gnyer kha cig 'dir rab 'byung /_/byang chub smra ste byang chub gnas ma yin/_/rgya mtsho chu mtha' phyi mtha' ring ba ltar/_/'dir yang ma bsdams byang chub de bzhin no/_/rnyed dang mdza' bo'i 
[\[249a.2\]]khyim la sten pa'i phyir/_/bdag cag yang dag rab tu byung ba ste/_/spyod lam dang ni dgon par rnam dag cing /_/mkhan po dang ni mdza' bos dag ces 'dzer/_/gang dag nga yi bstan 'dir rab byung nas/_/pad ma chu ltar 'jig rten chos gnas te/_/tshul 'di ji bzhin mdo sde 'dir brtson pa/_/
[\[249a.3\]]de dag nga yi byang chub yang dag srung /_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po khyod bstan gyis/_/blo ngan de dag lta bur bslab mi bya/_/nan tan gyis ni sangs rgyas yon tan thob/_/de phyir rtog pa med par rab tu sbyor/_/khrag khrig zhing gi mi rnams ji snyed pas/_/gang gA'i bye snyed blangs nas btab 
[\[249a.4\]]pa dag_/de la bye snyed sa bon ji tsam par/_/'bras bu re re byung bar gyur pa yi/_/de lta'i thabs kyis bye ma rgya che ba/_/stong 'gyur du ni yongs su bsgyur byas nas/_/ji snyed zhing rnams mtha' yas rab 'das shing /_/gcig ces bya bar mtshan ma bzhag gyur la/_/de lta'i tshul gyis snga na 
[\[249a.5\]]yod pa yi/_/bye ma dag ni thams cad zad gyur pa/_/de tsam tshad kyi phyogs bcu ji snyed pa/_/zhing rnams rgyal ba rnams kyis yongs gang la/_/sangs rgyas re re'ang de snyed dbur gyur te/_/dbu kun la yang de snyed ljags gyur la/_/de dag bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/mdo sde 
[\[249a.6\]]'dir gnas de yi bsngags brjod kyang /_/ri rab yungs 'bru nam mkha' rtswa tsam dang /_/rgya mtsho las ni thigs gcig blangs pa bzhin/_/de ltar de yi yon tan brjod gyur pa/_/de phyir rtog med tshul du rab tu sbyor/_/de nas mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[249a.7\]]gyur pa la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang /_byams pa dang /_seng ge rab snang la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos chos zhes bgyi ba'i chos de chos 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang /_byams pa dang /_seng ge rab snang la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[249b.2\]]chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag chos chos zhes bya ba'i chos de ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'gyur ba ma mchis shing /_rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_
[\[249b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ma mchis pa de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[249b.4\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu dag dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni mi zad pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi zad pa de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag mi zad pa zhes bya ba de ni mi skye ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/
[\[249b.5\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag mi skye ba zhes bya ba de ni mi 'gog pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi 'gog pa de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_
[\[249b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba de ni sdud pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sdud pa ma mchis pa de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 
[\[249b.7\]]sdud pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni yongs su gzung ba med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag yongs su gzung ba med pa zhes bya ba 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]de ni gnas med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnas ma mchis pa de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag gnas med pa zhes bya ba de ni 'gyur ba med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol 
[\[250a.2\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'gyur ba ma mchis pa de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni 'dus ma byas kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis pa de yang gang gi tshig 
[\[250a.3\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba de ni grangs dang bral ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das grangs dang bral ba de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[250a.4\]]rigs kyi bu dag grangs dang bral ba zhes bya ba de ni sems med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems ma mchis pa de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag sems med pa zhes bya ba de ni rnam par 
[\[250a.5\]]rig pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag rnam par rig pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni 'du ba med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol 
[\[250a.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'du ba ma mchis pa de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'du ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni bral ba med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bral ba ma mchis pa de yang gang gi 
[\[250a.7\]]tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag bral ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu dag mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba de ni mi mnyam pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa ma mchis zhes bgyi ba de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag mi mnyam pa med pa 
[\[250b.2\]]zhes bya ba de ni gnas pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnas pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba de ni dngos po med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]
[\[250b.3\]]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag dngos po med pa zhes bya ba de ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid 
[\[250b.4\]]ma mchis zhes bgyi ba de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya ba de ni kun gzhi med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kun gzhi ma mchis zhes bgyi ba de yang gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]
[\[250b.5\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag kun gzhi med pa zhes bya ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de nas mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang /_byams pa dang /_seng ge rab 
[\[250b.6\]]snang la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag mtshan nyid de lta bu lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la chos nub par gyur pa ni gang lags/_bdag 
[\[250b.7\]]cag gis ni gang bsrung bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang /_byams pa dang /_seng ge rab snang la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni chos su 'du shes shing chos su rtog ste/_chos spros par byed do/_/de dag chos su brtags/_chos su spros pas gnyis su ston to/_/gang dag gnyis su 
[\[251a.2\]]ston pa de dag chos dang 'gal bar zhugs pa yin mod kyi/_rigs kyi bu gang don dam par na 'di la chos sam/_chos dang 'gal ba gang yang mi dmigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag bka' stsal nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/kha cig 
[\[251a.3\]]byas pa de nyid 'dus byas te/_/gzhan ni 'dus ma byas 'dzer kha cig gzhan/_/chos la dmigs pas gnyi ga'ang rnam rtog ste/_/spros pa de ni dag pa ma yin smra/_/chos ni gang gis ma byas bshig pa med/_/ma mthong ma shes su dang nye ba'ang min/_/yongs rtog spyod yul mi rigs 
[\[251a.4\]]ldan de dag_/de dag thams cad stong zhes tshig tu smra/_/gang zhig stong sems de ni rigs min te/_/'di ltar de yis skye med brtags phyir ro/_/rnam rtog thams cad bdud kyi zhags pa ste/_/'gyur med chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o/_/med pa'i chos la yongs su rtog pas na/_/byis pa gang 
[\[251a.5\]]yin g.yo ba de yis bcings/_/rnam par rtog pa thams cad brag ca 'dra/_/byis pa de dag gnyis su 'dzin pas rtog_/shes ldan rnams kyis shes pa gzhar mi rnyed/_/shes ldan las kyang shes pa byung ba med/_/kun rdzob dag la brten nas 'di bstan te/_/'di la shes dang shes ldan 
[\[251a.6\]]mi dmigs so/_/gal te chos kyi ngo bo 'ga' yod na/_/de ni 'jig phyir chad pa mya ngan 'da'/_/gal te chos rnams gnas par gyur na ni/_/de tshe mya ngan 'das kun rtag par 'gyur/_/byis pa dag gis spangs dang de bzhin thob/_/byis pas mya ngan 'da' byas mtshan nyid med/_/bdag tu dmigs 
[\[251a.7\]]pa dag ni 'dus byas thob/_/mkhas pa yod dang med par 'du shes med/_/rig dang ma rig gnyi ga gnyis su med/_/tha snyad tsam ste de la snying po med/_/spros pa mtshan ma spyod yul de dag ni/_/dngos po gzhig phyir mya ngan 'das pa smra/_/sems kyis sems kyi ngo bo nyid mi shes/_/
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]ngo bo nyid kyis sems kyang mi shes te/_/chos rnams thams cad rmi lam ngo bo nyid/_/de ni gnyis su bden zhes kha cig smra/_/skye ba'i chos de bden pa ma yin te/_/'gog pa yang ni cung zad bden ma yin/_/sangs rgyas thams cad skye ba'i chos min te/_/de lta'i thabs kyis bden par 
[\[251b.2\]]'gyur ba yin/_/sangs rgyas ye shes cung zad ma rnyed de/_/bstan pa'i chos kyang cung zad bstan pa med/_/sus kyang sems can gang yang bkrol ba med/_/de ltar sangs rgyas mi skye sangs rgyas so/_/gal te 'di ni rang bzhin mya ngan 'das/_/rgyal ba nyan thos bcas pa de nyid 'gro/_/ther 
[\[251b.3\]]zug chos ni mya ngan 'da' ma yin/_/spros pa med pa nams kyang mkhas mi 'gyur/_/gang gis sems can sems can don mi mthong /_/de ltar 'jig rten kun rdzob sems can bstan/_/sems can yang dag ngo bo nyid mthong na/_/de ni mya ngan 'da' ba gzhi med gnas/_/gang dag 
[\[251b.4\]]'di la phung po bden smra dang /_/kha cig srid 'gog lam ni bden zhes 'dzer/_/skye ba med pa bden pa gcig yin na/_/de la kha cig bden pa bzhi zhes 'dzer/_/byang chub snying por 'dug nas bden gcig kyang /_/grub par ma mthong bzhi lta ga la zhig_/de ltar blo gros ngan mang rab 
[\[251b.5\]]byung nas/_/nga yi bstan pa rnam par 'jig par byed/_/dge sbyong yon tan tshol bar 'dod pa dag_/ting 'dzin 'di la rab tu sbyar ba'i phyir/_/ma bsdams rnams dang 'dris pa med byas te/_/bse ru lta bur dgon par gnas par bya/_/rkang gnyis dam pa bye ba brgyad cu yis/_/'di la rab 
[\[251b.6\]]tu sbyor la dgongs pa mdzad/_/gang dag bden pa mthong ba'i lha mang po/_/de dag nyin dang mtshan du de la srung /_/gang dag ting 'dzin blta dka' 'di sgom la/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni de yi rmi lam du/_/snang ba gsal ba mtha' yas mi zad pa/_/bsgrub pa 'jug pa'i sgor 'jug sbyin par 
[\[251b.7\]]'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]dpa' mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su sgrub par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[252a.2\]]dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang /_rang byung nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang /_tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'dod 
[\[252a.3\]]pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/_/byang 
[\[252a.4\]]chub sems dpa' snang ba dang /_ye shes dang /_gzungs dang /_sems can gyi skad kyi brda dang /_rigs pa dang /_tshul dang /_sgo thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lam la 'jug pa dang /_'od phun sum tshogs pa dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[252a.5\]]par rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_rnam par gdon mi za ba'i stobs bskyed pa la mkhas pa thob par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_lta ba phyin ci ma log pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid rtogs par khong du chud par 'dod 
[\[252a.6\]]pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson pa ni yon tan gyi phan yon 'di thams cad 'thob bo/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi phan yon dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/'dren pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam 
[\[252a.7\]]par 'dren pa zhes bya'o/_/yongs su 'dren pa zhes bya'o/_/ston pa zhes bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/_/rgyal ba zhes bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi mgon po zhes bya'o/_/rang byung zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar smra ba de bzhin byed pa zhes bya'o/_/mnyam 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa dang /_mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/mchog tu smra ba/_yang dag par smra ba/_bden pa smra ba/_dus su smra ba zhes bya'o/_/'dul ba smra ba zhes bya'o/_/bla na med pa zhes bya'o/_/mi'i dam pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam 
[\[252b.2\]]dpal ngas ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu byang chub thob bo/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_gal te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad gzigs ma thag tu byang chub brnyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[252b.3\]]ci'i slad du slar bskal pa grangs ma mchis par 'khor ba na 'khor/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed cing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa grangs med par 'khor ba na 
[\[252b.4\]]'khor mod kyi/_'on kyang 'jam dpal der ngas byang chub dang /_de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bzung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'di dang ldan pa 'dren par 'gyur te blo gros mtha' yas 
[\[252b.5\]]blo gros mchog_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya mang po dag gis dgongs par 'gyur/_/mdo sde brgya yi tshul dag shin tu rab 'byed bsam yas dpag med de/_/mdo sde 'di la rab tu sbyor ba mi zad gzungs 'thob rnyed par 'gyur/_/'di ni ye shes ting 'dzin rnam par gdon mi za ba 
[\[252b.6\]]skad kun sgo/_/rab tu rtogs dang rnam par grol dang chags med 'dzin pa thams cad zhi/_/mi skye ba dang 'gog dang gzhi med mya ngan 'das dang rims nad med/_/stobs dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang dang rgyal ba'i yon tan kun sgrub pa/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag kun dang sna tshogs mtha' yas 
[\[252b.7\]]skad rnams yongs su sbyong /_/rjes su rtogs dang tshim pa dang ni spyod dang 'dzin pa thams cad bral/_/shin tu rnam par shes dang gdon mi za mchog nyon mongs thams cad zad/_/mdo sde 'di la rab tu sbyor ba byang chub drung du song ba yin/_/rtse gcig yid kyis mngon sum du ni 'di la tshul 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]bzhin rab sbyor la/_/gnyid dang le lo ma byed shes kyi khe bde mngon par dga' ma byed/_/rtag tu tshul khrims gnyen dang phrag dog med dang byams pa'i yid du byos/_/dga' ba'i ngang tshul gus dang bcas pas ting 'dzin mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur/_/mnyam sems 
[\[253a.2\]]shin tu bsdams pa drang po rtag tu rnam par dga' ba dang /_gnas med 'dris med shes kyi khe dang bde la pad ma chu bzhin byos/_/ji ltar bya bzhin nga med mos pa brtan zhing sred dang g.yo med pa/_/de ni phyi ma'i dus na gzungs mchog rgyal po 'di ni 'thob par 'gyur/_/stong gsum dag ni 
[\[253a.3\]]rab tu g.yos nas lha brgya sil snyan dkrol bar byed/_/nam mkha' las ni byug pa gos dang phye ma dag dang rgyal mtshan brgya/_/mdzes phreng mgul rgyan rna cha zla gam dung dang rkang gdub do shal brgya/_/nor bu mu tig dpung rgyan gtsug rgyan sor gdub sna tshogs 'thor bar byed/_/lha dang lha yi 
[\[253a.4\]]bu mo klu dang dri za 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshogs mang po/_/nam mkha' lding dang lha min dbang po dge bsnyen dge slong brgya mang dang /_/de bzhin dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen ma ni mang po dga' 'gyur langs/_/rang gi gos dag dang ni rgyan rnams phul nas byang chub sems bskyed do/_/chos 'di shin tu bstan 
[\[253a.5\]]tshe sems can mang po byang chub zhugs pa dang /_/kha cig phyir mi ldog par gyur pa bstan cing tshad gzung nus ma yin/_/dgra bcom nyid du btul bar gyur pa mtha' yas gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/'dren pa blta phyir zhing ni brgya nas lhags pa de dag dga' nas dong /_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 
[\[253a.6\]]rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_sems can grangs med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[253a.7\]]bye ba phrag drug cu dang /_'bum phrag gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dpag tu med pa dang /_sems can tshad med pa dag gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/_/phyogs 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_'jam dpal 
[\[253b.2\]]la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang /_byams pa dang /_seng ge rab snang dang snang byed la thug pa'i bar la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[253b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po dang /_rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_gser mchog snang dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[253b.4\]]'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_mu ni warma dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas 
[\[253b.5\]]gtan la phab pa//[ {D132}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya shU rang ga ma sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_
[\[253b.6\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong sum khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa sha stag 
[\[253b.7\]]dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig ste/_thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa'i ye shes thob pa/_gzungs kyis mi brjed pa'i chos dang ldan pa/_spobs pa mi zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa/_ting nge 'dzin la shin tu gnas 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]pas mi g.yo ba/_shes rab kyi mig sgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_bzod pa thob pa/_gzungs kyi tshul thob pa/_chos zab mo'i tshul la zhugs pa/_bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba tshar phyin pa/_smon lam phun sum tshogs pa/_bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/_
[\[254a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa yongs su bzung ba/_byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa/_snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba/_brtson 'grus chen po la rtul ba/_tshig thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig ston pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_spyod pa yongs su dag pa/_rnam par thar 
[\[254a.3\]]pa'i sgo gsum la gnas pa/_ye shes dus gsum la ma chags pa thob pa/_khams gsum las mngon par byung ba/_sangs rgyas dang chos la mos pa mang ba/_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/_sgra thogs pa med pa/_sgra yid du 'ong bas go bar byed pa/_spyod lam thams cad yongs su 
[\[254a.4\]]brtags pa ma yin pa/_dkris pa dang bral ba/_mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i go cha bgos pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang ldan pa/_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_brtan pa dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[254a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[254a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gtsang zhing dri ma med par yongs su sbyong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba dang dad pa'i spyod lam ston pa dang /_byang 
[\[254a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan dam pa bkod pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad mi slu ba'i blo dang ldan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes ldog pa shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul ba rtag tu legs par brtsams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu mnyam par gzhag cing dbang po mi g.yeng ba dang /_
[\[254b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha thams cad kyis bstod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[254b.3\]]dpa' chen po spobs pa'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[254b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po'i rtse 'dzin brtsegs pa'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che bkod pa rgya mtsho'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[254b.5\]]bkod pa chen po'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che chen po'i tog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi tog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod 
[\[254b.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad ldan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu brtan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa dang /_de dag la 
[\[254b.7\]]sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang thabs cig go/_/gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa/_gzi brjid che ba/_gzi brjid che ba che zhing che ba 'ongs shing lhags pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_rgya chen po la mos pa de dag thams cad kyang 'khor der tshogs shing 'khod 
[\[255a.2\]]par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ji lta bu'i zhu ba zhus pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyang 
[\[255a.3\]]yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi rigs kyang yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi rigs kyang shin tu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang mog mog por byas par 'gyur ba dang /_gang zag lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyang shin tu tshar 
[\[255a.4\]]chod par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub tu 
[\[255a.5\]]sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag phyir mi ldog pa de dag kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can 
[\[255a.6\]]dmigs pa can thams cad dang /_bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams kyang lta ba de dag las bskyod par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la mos par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rgya chen po la mos pa rnams kyang mgu zhing mchog tu 
[\[255a.7\]]dga' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba kun zhu bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/
[\[255b.2\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros brtan pa dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes/_blo gros brtan pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[255b.3\]]zhus shig dang /_zhu ba zhus pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[255b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_phyogs bcur snang ba'i phyir snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[255b.5\]]bdud thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir shes rab rgya chen po grags pas rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur ba dang /_rang byung gi chos thob pa'i phyir ye shes la dbang du 'gyur ba dang /_ma bstan pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par mi 'gyur ba dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa
