[\[255b.6\]]bye bar ston pa'i phyir spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang /_tshe bskal pa dpag tu med par 'dzin pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos la mos pa rnams la nyan thos kyi theg pa ston par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rang sangs 
[\[255b.7\]]rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos la mos pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ston par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can theg pa chen po'i chos la mos pa rnams la/_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ston par 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang 'tshal cing 'chad la nyan thos kyi nges 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]par gyur pa la yang mi 'jug pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang 'tshal cing 'chad la rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa la yang mi 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang 'tshal cing 'chad la shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang thob par mi bgyid 
[\[256a.2\]]pa dang /_nyan thos kyi kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_rtags dang /_cha byad rnams kyang ston la byang chub kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_rtags dang /_cha byad rnams kyang ston la sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po dang yang mi 'bral ba 
[\[256a.3\]]dang /_sa bcu'i stobs bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_cha byad kyang ston pa dang /_srid pa tha ma dang ldan pas dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas par yang gda' ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs 
[\[256a.4\]]bskyed pa'i phyir mngal du 'jug pa dang /_btsas pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyod pa dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_byang chub kyi snying po yang ston pa dang /_shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir byang chub kyang rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_gsol ba gdab pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[256a.5\]]bskor ba yang ston pa nas ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du yang yongs su ston pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir lus 'jig par yang ston pa dang /_smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir/_dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par 
[\[256a.6\]]'gyur ba yang ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de gang yang mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rnam par sprul pa yang ston cing gzugs su mthong ba thams cad kyang ston la/_shin 
[\[256a.7\]]tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros brtan pa legs so legs 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]so/_/yang blo gros brtan pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su 
[\[256b.2\]]gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/_blo gros brtan pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu bar sems pa legs so/_/legs so/_/'di ltar blo gros brtan pa khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_
[\[256b.3\]]theg pa chen po 'di la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/_theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnams su nges par byung ba/_bdud dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_phyir rgol ba bcom pa/_chos la phan gdags pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos la rang dbang yod pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/_byang chub 
[\[256b.4\]]sems dpa'i ye shes yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sdud pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o/_/'di ltar blo gros brtan pa khyod ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zhu ba zhus pa'i lung bstan pa tshar 
[\[256b.5\]]phyin pa'o/_/blo gros brtan pa ngas ni skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa go cha chen po bgos pa ma gtogs par 'khor 'di na/_lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dri za'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_mi'am ci'am/_lto 'phye 
[\[256b.6\]]chen po'am/_mi'am mi ma yin pa'am/_nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yang rung ste/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri nus pa de ma mthong ngo /_/blo gros brtan pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la 
[\[256b.7\]]yid la zung shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan na yon tan gyi bye brag de dag dang de bas kyang shin tu ches khyad par du 'phags pa gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin de ngas khyod la bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/_
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ting nge 'dzin de la 
[\[257a.2\]]gnas na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rnam par sprul pa yang ston la shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi 'gyur/_gzugs su ston pa thams cad kyang ston la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las chos rnams 'khrugs par yang mi byed/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[257a.3\]]zhing thams cad du yang 'gro la sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su 'du shes pa yang med/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad par yang 'gyur la chos kyi dbyings tha dad par yang mi byed/_spyod pa thams cad du yang snang la de dag la spyod pa yongs su dag pa yang shes/_lha dang mi thams cad kyi bdag 
[\[257a.4\]]po yang yongs su 'dzin la de dag rgyags shing bag med par 'gyur ba'ang mi skyed/_bdud kyi yul thams cad kyang ston la bdud kyi las la gnas pa yang ma yin/_khams gsum thams cad du yang spyod la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin shes pa las kyang mi g.yo/_'chi bar yang mi 'gyur/_
[\[257a.5\]]skye bar yang mi 'gyur/_'gro ba thams cad du yang skye la 'gro ba sna tshogs su 'du shes pa yang ma yin/_chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyang ston la yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos kyi tshul rtogs pa las kyang mi g.yo/_gcig tu mnyam par yang bzhag la sems can yongs su smin 
[\[257a.6\]]par byed par spyod par yang snang la mi zad pa dang mi skye ba la bzod pa dang yang ldan pa chos rnams kyi skye ba dang /_'gog pa yang rnam par 'jog_/thams cad du ma zhum pa'i phyir seng ge'i rtsal gyis kyang 'gro zhing 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba thams cad na yang snang la pad ma bzhin 
[\[257a.7\]]du mi chags pa'i phyir rtag tu chos kyi kun dga' mchog la dga' zhing mos par yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dag dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dag dang /_lha'i bu dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]cag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming tsam yang sngon ma thos na/_rgya cher rnam par phye zhing bshad pa lta ci smos te/_gang bdag cag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming thos pas na bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bdag cag 'khor 'dir legs par 'ongs so/_/bdag 
[\[257b.2\]]cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ste bshad pa 'di thos nas mos shing yid ches la dad pa de dag the tshom med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[257b.3\]]pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur na/_gang dag thos nas len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta ci smos snyam mo/_/de nas brgya byin dag dang /_tshangs pa dag dang /_
[\[257b.4\]]'jig rten skyong ba dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khri gang la bzhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa'i chos kyi khri/_skyes bu dam pa'i khri/_bkod pa chen 
[\[257b.5\]]po'i khri/_chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i khri'i seng ge'i khri nges par bsham par bya'o snyam mo/_/khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu re re zhing yang bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng 
[\[257b.6\]]ge'i khri shom gyi gzhan ni ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu dag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rang rang gis seng ge'i khri sna tshogs pa/_blta na sdug pa/_'phang mtho ba/_rgya che ba/_yangs 
[\[257b.7\]]pa/_ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba/_steng gi bar snang las rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_dra bas g.yogs pa/_kho ra khor yug tu rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba/_g.yas g.yon du rin po che'i shing ljon pa du mas brgyan pa/_dar gyi lda ldi bres pa/_
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]mu tig gi phreng ba dpyangs pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sgreng ba/_bla re bres pa/_gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas g.yogs pa/_me tog sna tshogs bkram pa/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_mu tig dang /_nor bus brgyan pa/_rnam pa thams 
[\[258a.2\]]cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i rgyan gyi bkod pas legs par brgyan pa/_gser phye bkram pa/_lha'i tsan dan dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_spos thams cad kyis bsgos pa/_me tog sna tshogs gtor ba/_snying po dam pa dang ldan pa'i pog phor nas bdug pa 
[\[258a.3\]]bshams par gyur te/_de ltar de'i skad cig thang cig yud tsam la de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bshams par gyur kyang 'khor dang sa chen po la sgrib par yang mi byed/_lha'i bu gcig gis lha'i bu cig shos kyi 
[\[258a.4\]]khri bshams pa yang ma mthong ste/_lha'i bu re re zhing yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bshams pas bdag gi seng ge'i khri la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad par shes so/_/de nas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[258a.5\]]'jig rten skyong ba dag dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri bshams nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi seng ge'i khri 'di nyid la bzhugs te/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad du 
[\[258a.6\]]gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas/_seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul nas/_seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad 
[\[258a.7\]]la de bzhin gshegs pa dag bzhugs par snang ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad nas/_de na lha'i bu re re zhing bdag bdag gi seng ge'i khri de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par mthong gi phan tshun du gcig gis gcig gi khri ni ma mthong ste/_de ni brgya byin re re 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]zhing brgya byin gnyis pa la kye grogs po de bzhin gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyis ltos shig ces ston to/_/gnyis pa yang gsum pa la kye grogs po de bzhin gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyis ltos shig ces smra'o/_/de bzhin du brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[258b.2\]]'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang /_lha de dag thams cad kyang phan tshun gcig la gcig kye grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyis ltos shig ces ston to/_/de na re re zhing yang re re dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'chad pa 
[\[258b.3\]]kho bo'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs kyi khyod kyi la ni ma yin no zhes de skad ces smra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang dang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yang brtsam pa tsam bstan pa dang /_theg 
[\[258b.4\]]pa chen po yang yongs su bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe ci nas kyang brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /_lha'i bu de dag gis seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzhugs 
[\[258b.5\]]par mthong ba de lta bu'i ltas bstan to/_/de na 'khor de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas bdag bdag gi stan de dag las langs te/_thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te/_tshig 'di skad ces legs so legs so/_/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[258b.6\]]pas lha'i bu 'di dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes smras so/_/de ltar lha'i bu ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri bshams pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[258b.7\]]rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas/_thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sdug 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar da ltar na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[259a.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas te/_rnam par 'phrul par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so/_/
[\[259a.3\]]legs so/_/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/lha'i bu dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_gang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[259a.4\]]sems bskyed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i dam pa yin no/_/de nas tshangs pa'i 'khor de'i nang nas tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa gang bdag gi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa 
[\[259a.5\]]lags sam/_gang gzhan gyi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs pa chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bur byung ba/_rnam par sgrub 
[\[259a.6\]]pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid byed pa med pa yongs su rtogs pa las byung ba ste/_de dag ni ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar rnam par sgrub bo/_/tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin no/_/tshangs pa ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams 
[\[259a.7\]]cad yang dag pa ma yin zhe na/_'di dag ni bden pa ma yin te/_'di dag ni mi bden pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no/_/byung ba ma yin/_'byung bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin pas na/_de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no/_/'di dag ni 'byung ba chen pos ma 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]bsdus pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no/_/'di dag ni phung pos ma bsdus/_khams kyis ma bsdus/_skye mched kyis ma bsdus pas na/_de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no/_/'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin/_skyes pa ma yin/_byung ba ma yin pas na/_de'i 
[\[259b.2\]]phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no/_/'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin te/_thog ma ji lta bar tha mar yang de bzhin/_bar du yang de bzhin pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin no/_/tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad ni mnyam pa ste khyad par med do/_/gsol 
[\[259b.3\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad mnyam ste khyad par ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[259b.4\]]byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo/_/tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad ni thog ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/_tha ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam mo/_/
[\[259b.5\]]tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni sgyu ma'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/_mig yor gyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pas na/_de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo/_/tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam/_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin 
[\[259b.6\]]nyid kyis mnyam/_ma chags pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pas na de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam pa zhes bya'o/_/chos thams cad gang dang mnyam pa 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam/_sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam/_sangs rgyas thams cad gang dang mnyam 
[\[259b.7\]]pa 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gang dang mnyam pa 'di dag kyang de dang mnyam pas na tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ste/_de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo/_/tshangs pa de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag ni mnyam 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]pa nyid las ma 'das te/_de'i phyir 'di dag ni mnyam mo/_/tshangs pa de lta bas na de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[260a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/_gzugs kyi sku yongs su grub pa yang sems can rnams la ston pa 
[\[260a.3\]]ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa de ni sngon dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sbyangs pa'i khyad par yin te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_gzugs kyi sku yongs su 
[\[260a.4\]]grub pa yang sems can rnams la ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/_tshangs pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas chos la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob bo/_/lha'i bu khris kyang chos la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[260a.5\]]'das kyis de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad mi snang bar byas pa dang /_'khor de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la bka' stsal 
[\[260a.6\]]pa/_blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po la gnas pas mi 'thob/_sa gnyis pa la gnas pas ma yin/_sa gsum pa la gnas pas ma yin/_sa bzhi pa la gnas pas ma yin/_sa lnga pa la gnas pas ma yin/_sa 
[\[260a.7\]]drug pa la gnas pas ma yin/_sa bdun pa la gnas pas ma yin/_sa brgyad pa la gnas pas ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pas mi 'thob kyi/_blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pas 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]'thob bo/_/blo gros brtan pa de la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nam mkha'i khams bzhin du sems bskyed pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems la rtog pa mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po 
[\[260b.2\]]mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la rnam par lta ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_las rnam par 'byed pa thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_mos pa sna tshogs la 'jug pa mi brjed pa dang /_khams sna tshogs 
[\[260b.3\]]dang /_khams du ma dag mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mthong zhing shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad gcig tu gyur pa dang /_thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam 
[\[260b.4\]]shes pas rnam par lta ba dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa la sgrib pa med pa dang /_lha'i mig thogs pa med pas mthong ba dang /_zag pa zad par bya ba dang /_spang bar bya ba'i phyir dus gcig tu 'thob pa shes pa dang /_gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mnyam pa nyid la 
[\[260b.5\]]'jug pa shes pa dang /_gzugs thams cad ston cing rnam par 'phrul pas rnam par rtse ba dang /_sgra skad thams cad brag ca'i sgra dang mnyam pa dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang /_gzungs la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas 
[\[260b.6\]]tshim par byed pa dang /_so so ci rigs par chos 'chad pa dang /_dus dang dus ma yin pa la rnam par lta ba dang /_dbang po 'gyur ba shes pa dang /_chos 'chad pa don med pa ma yin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad rab tu gzung 
[\[260b.7\]]ba dang /_tshar gcad pa la mkhas pa shes pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_spyod lam ma brtags pa dang /_rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]pa mnyam pa'i ngos la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du skad cig gis lus ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bshad pa 'dzin cing mi brjed pa dang /_mig yor lta bu'i lus 'jig rten gyi khams thams 
[\[261a.2\]]cad du rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba ston pa la mkhas pa dang /_theg pa chen po las mi nyams pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 'dzin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par go cha sra zhing yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_skye ba'i gnas 
[\[261a.3\]]thams cad du ci rigs par byed par ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyis gting dpag dka' ba dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad mngon par sgrub pa bstan pa shes 
[\[261a.4\]]pa dang /_chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i gnas shes pa dang /_bskal pa gcig tu bskal pa grangs med pa 'jug pa dang /_bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa gcig 'jug pa dang /_zhing thams cad du zhing gcig yang dag par 'du zhing 'jug pa dang /_zhing 
[\[261a.5\]]gcig la zhing thams cad ston pa shes pa dang /_skra'i khyon gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa 'jug pa shes pa dang /_sems can gcig gi lus la sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par 'du zhing 'jug pa shes pa dang /_sangs 
[\[261a.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /_rang gi lus la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_rang gi lus lus thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par rtogs pa la mkhas pa 
[\[261a.7\]]dang /_thabs thams cad la mkhas pa dang /_thabs thams cad la mkhas pa'i bya ba shes pa dang /_sgra skad gcig phyung bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags pa dang /_tshig gcig la brtsams nas bskal pa grangs med par 'chad pa dang /_chos thams cad sangs 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos su rtogs pa dang /_chos kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad bstan pa la mkhas pa shes pa dang /_'gre ba dang 'gre ba ma yin pa la mkhas pa shes pas rnam par dpyod pa dang /_zung gi rim pa dang /_snrel zhi'i rgyud bstan pa shes pa dang /_bdud kyi las thams cad las yang 
[\[261b.2\]]dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang /_thabs chen po la mkhas pas shes rab dang /_ye shes kyi 'od zer gtong ba dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon du gyur cing thob pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa 
[\[261b.3\]]bzhis sems can gyi khams thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas par rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can gyi tha snyad 
[\[261b.4\]]thams cad rtogs pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i chos sgrub pa la the tshom med pa dang /_skye ba thams cad la dbang thob pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_yo byad la dbang thob pa dang /_sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin du tshim par byed pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[261b.5\]]dang ldan pa la sbyin gnas su sems mnyam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba thams cad thob pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer gtong ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dug can pa gting dpag dka' ba shes pa dang /_sems sa dang /_chu dang /_
[\[261b.6\]]me dang /_rlung dang /_mnyam pa dang /_tshig bstan pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug pa dang /_ma bstan par rang gis bzod pa dang /_ye shes thob pa dang /_rin po che lta bu'i sems bskyed pas kun nas nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[261b.7\]]cad kyi dri mas mi gos pa dang /_spu gcig gi khung bur chu'i phung po thams cad chud par byed la/_chu na gnas pa'i sems can la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa'i bsod nams [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i snying po yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i bya ba shes pa dang /_
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /_'phrul pa la ye shes thogs pa med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbugs 'byin pa thob pa dang /_rang gi lus kyi smon lam gyis sems can 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i gnas rgyun ma 
[\[262a.2\]]bcad pa kun tu ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul la 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rnam par lta ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la 'jug pa dang /_rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_longs spyod thams cad kun tu ston 
[\[262a.3\]]pa dang /_sems zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang /_thos pa tshad med pa 'dzin pa rdzogs pa dang /_thos pa thams cad kyi nan tan rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa dang /_bskal 
[\[262a.4\]]pa grangs med pa snga dro gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing chos 'chad pa dang /_spyod lam thams cad du lkugs pa dang /_grum po dang /_rna ba mi gsang ba dang /_glen pa dang /_'on pa dang /_long ba ston cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_lce'i dbang pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 
[\[262a.5\]]thams cad khebs par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa dang /_lag na rdo rje 'bum rtag tu phyi bzhin du 'brang ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rang byung gi ye shes la rnam par lta ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_rtag par 'du 
[\[262a.6\]]shes pa'i sems can rnams la sreg pa'i bskal pa ston pa dang /_tshe'i tshad bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du byin gyis rlob pa dang /_sems kyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston cing 'gro ba shes pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[262a.7\]]rgyas thams cad kyi spyod lam ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang /_mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]thams cad la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_thos pa dang /_mthong ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_'dod pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_bsten pa dang /_rjes su dran par byas te/_sems can mtha' yas pa/_tshad med pa/_yongs su smin 
[\[262b.2\]]par byed pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la gdul ba'i sems can ji ltar yongs su smin pa la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_rnam par grol ba ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dag mngal du 'jug pa dang /_btsas pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_
[\[262b.3\]]dka' ba spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po dang /_lus 'jig pa yang ston la byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid de yang mi gtong 
[\[262b.4\]]zhing shin tu phung po med par yang mya ngan las mi 'da' ba 'di ni blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/_'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul lo/_/gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yod do/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_ji ltar nam mkha' dag gyur 
[\[262b.5\]]cing /_/rdul gyis gos par mi 'gyur bzhin/_/dpa' 'gro ting 'dzin gnas pa yang /_/yid ni de ltar sgom par byed/_/gang phyir lus can thams cad kyi/_/rnam par bcas pa'i sems shes pa/_/des na 'di ni bdag nyid che/_/de yi mtshan mar rab tu shes/_/dpa' 'gro 
[\[262b.6\]]rtogs par khong chud pas/_/sems can dag gi dbang po rnams/_/rno ba dag dang rtul ba dang /_/gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes/_/lus kun rnam par phye ba dang /_/rnam par smin pa sna tshogs dang /_/sems can rnams kyi mos pa yang /_/bde gshegs sras des shes 
[\[262b.7\]]par 'gyur/_/sems can khams ni mkhas pa la/_/de ni chags par 'gyur ba med/_/gang phyir de yis mi rmongs pas/_/tshangs dbyangs ting 'dzin shes par 'gyur/_/rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin/_/sra ba des ni shes gyur nas/_/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam bzhag ste/_/lag na 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]'dug bzhin mthong bar 'gyur/_/chos rnams kun gyi lam gyur pa/_/thams cad du ni gang 'gro ba'i/_/dam pa thub pas bshad pa ste/_/de dag 'dis ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/de nas de yi sngon gyi gnas/_/shes pa la ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/lha mig dri ma med pa yis/_/
[\[263a.2\]]'gro ba dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/zag pa dag ni zad byas kyang /_/mkhas de mya ngan 'da' mi byed/_/gzugs yod pa dang gzugs med pa'i/_/mtshan nyid gcig pa mnyam pa shes/_/ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po dag_/sna tshogs rnam par rtse ba ltar/_/dpa' bo des ni gzugs 
[\[263a.3\]]kun kyang /_/ting nge 'dzin gyis rim gyis ston/_/sgra kun gyi ni mnyam pa nyid/_/brag ca lta bu rnam dag dang /_/sems can kun gyi skad rnams kyang /_/skad cig tsam gyis des shes so/_/gzungs dang ye shes ldan pas na/_/skad kyi byed la myur du 'jug_/sgra dbyangs kyi ni thog ma'i 
[\[263a.4\]]mtha'/_/ji lta bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur/_/rdul med dran dang blo gros kyis/_/thub pa gshegs par myur du 'jug_/legs bshad pas ni sems can la/_/sdig pa med pa yid dga' byed/_/sems can rnams la ci rigs par/_/dgra bcom pa ni chos 'chad de/_/mi yi dus 
[\[263a.5\]]dang dus ma yin/_/blos ni rnam par rtog par byed/_/ji ltar dbang po rnams 'byung ba/_/de lta nyid du phyi phyir zhing /_/cho ga bzhin du shes gyur nas/_/brtan pa dam pa don yod ston/_/yang dag mtha' ni phra ba nyid/_/nad dang bral bas rtogs par 'gyur/_/sems can bsdu dang tshar gcad 
[\[263a.6\]]la/_/dus rnams kun tu mkhas par 'gyur/_/rtog dang rnam par rtog kun bcom/_/kun tu rtog pas ma bsgribs pa/_/pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol thob/_/spyod lam la ni mi rtog go/_/chos dbyings 'dres pa med pa yang /_/ye shes kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas gang dag 
[\[263a.7\]]phyogs bzhugs pa/_/skad cig tu yang kun tu snang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/chos bstan gang dag ci yod pa/_/de kun shes rab ldan pas len/_/rmongs pa dag tu 'gyur ba med/_/mig yor lta bu'i lus rnams kyis/_/zhing kun du yang snang bar 'gyur/_/
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]nad med theg pa thams cad pa/_/blo ldan sangs rgyas bzhin du 'chad/_/brtul zhugs brtan par gyur pa de/_/theg chen de las mi nyams te/_/dkon mchog gsum rigs gnas bya'i phyir/_/de ltar rnam pa gsum du 'chad/_/phyi ma'i mthar ni go bgos kyang /_/de ni skyo bar mi 'gyur te/_/
[\[263b.2\]]snying rje las ni byung ba ste/_/sems can ris ni kun na snang /_/shin tu blo dang ldan pa yis/_/skye ba'i mtshan nyid kun bstan te/_/mkhas pas sems can thams cad ni/_/myur du yongs su smin par byed/_/sems can kun gyi bsam pa dang /_/sems kyi spyod yul shes pas na/_/
[\[263b.3\]]de bas de ni nyan thos dang /_/lus can kun gyis rtogs par dka'/_/gang du gnyis ni med pa der/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag kun sgrub sgrub/_/chos rnams kun las 'phags zhi ba/_/gzhal yas chos ni ston par byed/_/rnam grol shes pa bskal gcig tu/_/bskal pa du ma ston par 
[\[263b.4\]]byed/_/bskal pa rnam pa du ma dag_/bskal pa gcig tu ston par byed/_/zhing ni rnam pa du ma dag_/zhing gcig tu ni ston par byed/_/zhing gcig rnam pa du ma yi/_/zhing rnams su ni ston par byed/_/skra yi rtse mo gcig tu yang /_/zhing rnams thams cad ston par byed/_/de bzhin du ni 
[\[263b.5\]]lus gcig la/_/sdig med lus kun ston par byed/_/zhing kun dper na nam mkha' bzhin/_/dag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur/_/de ni bdag gi lus kyis kyang /_/zhing rnams thams cad khyab par byed/_/bdag gi lus dang chos kyi dbyings/_/de gnyis mnyam par rab tu shes/_/chos 
[\[263b.6\]]kyi dbyings ni mtshan ma med/_/snang ba med pa nyid du rtogs/_/sna tshogs kyi ni thabs la mkhas/_/sgra bsam mi khyab nam mkha' bzhin/_/don rig tshig gcig brtsams byas nas/_/bskal pa'i bar du 'chad par byed/_/sems can chen po chos kun la/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni chos 
[\[263b.7\]]su rtogs/_/tshig gi rab tu dbye bstan la/_/de yi mkhas pa 'jug par 'gyur/_/rgyud kyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_/zung dang snrel zhi sgrub par byed/_/bdud kyi lam ni mnan gyur nas/_/lus las 'od zer gtong bar byed/_/de yi lus dang ngag yid kyi/_/las ni ye shes sngon du 'gro/_/
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]de ni tshe rabs tshe rabs su/_/rdzu 'phrul mngon par thob par 'gyur/_/so sor rig pa'i stobs bskyed pas/_/dbang ldan chos kyi dbyings su ni/_/rnam par 'phrul pa du ma byed/_/g.yo ba med pa'i gnas 'chad do/_/bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po yis/_/sems can bu gcig bzhin du 
[\[264a.2\]]sdud/_/de dag gi ni smra ba dang /_/sgra dang skad kyang shes par 'gyur/_/des ni sgyu ma 'dra ba'i chos/_/byin gyis brlabs nas rnam par 'phrul/_/sems can thams cad skye bar gnas/_/nam mkha' lta bur snang bar 'gyur/_/rnam thos bu ni ji bzhin du/_/yo byad kun ldan phyug thob nas/_/
[\[264a.3\]]sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa yi/_/bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed/_/tshul khrims 'chal dang khrims ldan la/_/de yi sems ni de tshe mnyam/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba yang /_/gang zag dam pas shes par 'gyur/_/'od zer dra ba byas nas kyang /_/'jig rten khams rnams 
[\[264a.4\]]khyab byed de/_/shes rab ldan pas gting dpag dka'/_/rgya mtsho chen po chu ldan bzhin/_/sa chu me dang mtshungs pa dang /_/rlung dang nam mkha' 'dra ba'i yid/_/de ni rtag par sems can la/_/snying brtse ba yi phyir 'jug go/_/srid pa sel ba de yis ni/_/mi skye dam pa'i bzod thob nas/_/
[\[264a.5\]]nor bu rin chen dag pa ltar/_/de bzhin nyon mongs mi gos so/_/spu yi khung bu gcig tu ni/_/chu yi phung po kun 'jug cing /_/bskal pa chen po rnam par rtse/_/dge ba phun sum tshogs par byed/_/yongs su bsngo bar bya ba la/_/de yi shes pa mi rmongs te/_/sems can rnams kyi spyod 
[\[264a.6\]]shes nas/_/'phrul pa chen po byed par 'gyur/_/chos kun rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/de yi sems ni rtag par 'jug_/lus ni sbyangs shing rdul med de/_/mya ngan bral ba ser sna med/_/sems can rnams ni gang las skye/_/de ni smad pa med pas shes/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi 
[\[264a.7\]]spyod yul yang /_/smra ba'i mchog gis rab tu shes/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gang mkhyen pa/_/de kun la ni rtog par byed/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba kun/_/des ni rjes su rtogs par 'gyur/_/gang yang rtse dang dga' ba dag_/de dag thams cad des ston te/_/
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]thos pa dag ni tshad med pas/_/thos pa rgya mtsho thob par 'gyur/_/thos pa tshol bas ngoms pa med/_/'jig rten chos dang 'thun 'jug pa/_/'jig rten gyis ni mi gos te/_/mtshe'u'i pad ma ji bzhin no/_/de ni snga dro gcig tu yang /_/bskal pa mang po ston par byed/_/bdag ni glen pa 
[\[264b.2\]]lkugs pa yi/_/dbyibs dag tu ni ston par byed/_/lag na rdo rje stong dag dang /_/'grogs shing sems can smin par byed/_/rang byung ba ni rtag tu shes/_/de nyid la ni rtog par byed/_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/tshe ni skad cig gcig la ston/_/de ni nyan thos rang rgyal gyi/_/
[\[264b.3\]]byed pa dag kyang ston par byed/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la/_/rtag pa kho nar rjes su 'jug_/sems kyis rtag tu zhi ba dang /_/nye bar zhi zhing phung po med/_/sems can dga' bar byed pa yi/_/sil snyan dkrol ba kun kyang shes/_/sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal dang /_/
[\[264b.4\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba gtong mi byed/_/mthong ba dang ni thos pa yis/_/sems can mang po smin par byed/_/skad cig tu ni sna tshogs pa'i/_/sems can dag ni ston par byed/_/dpa' bo la lar btsas pa dang /_/mngon par 'byung dang 'chi ba ston/_/la lar yongs su mya ngan 'da'/_/la lar 
[\[264b.5\]]'khor lo bskor ba'o/_/la lar bdud rnams rab tu 'joms/_/la lar dka' ba spyod byed kyang /_/sems can thar par bya ba'i phyir/_/shin tu mya ngan mi 'da'o/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin gyi/_/yul ni 'di 'dra 'di yin te/_/gang gis ting 'dzin de thob pa/_/dri med de ltar 
[\[264b.6\]]rnam par rtse/_/blo gros brtan pa de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/_de yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul yin no/_/gzhan dag kyang dpag tu med pa yod do/_/blo gros brtan pa de ltar na dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshad med pa bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams 
[\[264b.7\]]cad kyi spyod yul dang yul bkod pa ston pa'o/_/sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'o/_/'gro ba thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'o/_/blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa gcig tu mi blta/_spyod yul gcig tu ma yin/_rnam pa gcig tu ma yin/_dmigs pa 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]gcig tu ma yin/_don gcig las byung bar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros brtan pa ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /_rnam par thar pa thams cad dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig 
[\[265a.2\]]pa'i shes pa de dag thams cad ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nang du 'dus shing chud par blta'o/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_dper na chu mig dang /_mtshe'u dang /_rdzing dang /_lteng ka dang /_chu bran dang /_'bab chu dang /_'bab chu chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rgya mtsho chen por 
[\[265a.3\]]'dus par blta'o/_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa gang ji snyed pa dag dang /_rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa de dag thams cad ni 
[\[265a.4\]]dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nang du 'dus par blta'o/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_dper na rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad ni dpa' bo g.yul du 'jug pa'i lag tu song zhing dbang du gyur pa yin te/_dpa' bo g.yul du 'jug pa gang dang gang du 
[\[265a.5\]]'gro ba de dang der dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang 'gro'o/_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'am/_snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo'am/_chos la gnas pa'i sgo'am/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo'am/_gzungs kyi sgo'am/_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_
[\[265a.6\]]rnam par grol ba'i sgo gang ji snyed pa chos la gnas pa'i sgo de dag thams cad ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lag tu song ba yin/_dbang du gyur pa yin/_mngon du gyur pa yin te/_blo gros brtan pa byang chub sems dpa'i dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang 
[\[265a.7\]]de nyid du chos la gnas pa'i sgo thams cad 'gro'o/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gar 'gro ba der rin po che sna bdun yang 'gro'o/_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gar 'gro ba der byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyang 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]'gro zhing rjes su 'brang ste/_de bas na dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni longs spyod btsal te/_sbyin pa bged par byed par mi blta yi/_blo gros 
[\[265b.2\]]brtan pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rin po che gang ji snyed pa rgya mtsho chen po na yod pa'am/_lha'i gnas na yod pa'am/_klu'i gnas na yod pa'am/_sa chen po'i steng na yod pa'am/_gnod sbyin gyi lag na yod pa'am/_mi'i 'jig rten na yod pa'i rin po che yang 
[\[265b.3\]]rung /_zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_bzhon pa yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad la de dbang phyug tu gyur pa yin/_dbang du gyur pa yin no/_/gang la sbyin par 'dod pa de la sbyin par byed de/_de yang sngon gyi bsod nams kyis thob pa yin na/_yid kyis rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa lta ji smos te/_blo 
[\[265b.4\]]gros brtan pa de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i bye brag tu blta'o/_/blo gros brtan pa gzhan yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims len 
[\[265b.5\]]par mi byed de/_de ni tshul khrims kyi chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la sems can gzhan gdul ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyang len par byed/_bslab pa yang yongs su 'dzin par byed/_cho ga dang spyod pa yang ston la ltung ba las byung bar yang shes/_'thol ba dang /_'chags par 
[\[265b.6\]]yang byed la de thams cad du ltung ba med pa'i chos dang yang ldan pa yin/_de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/_bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdun du bdar cing /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gnas 
[\[265b.7\]]te/_'dod pa la longs spyod par yang snang zhing /_bu pho dang /_bu mo dang /_chung mas gzir ba'i khyim na yang gnas la/_de yang 'dod chags dang bral ba/_ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid la gnas pa/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/_legs par mthong bas srid pa la 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]skyon du lta ba yin te/_blo gros brtan pa de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i bye brag tu blta'o/_/blo gros brtan pa gzhan yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas 
[\[266a.2\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni shin tu skad cig pas bzod pa la gnas pa yin/_sems can thams cad ma skyes pas bzod pa sgom par byed/_chos thams cad ma byung bas bzod pa sgom par byed/_sems la gzugs med pas bzod pa sgom par byed/_bdag kun nas mi slong bas 
[\[266a.3\]]bzod pa sgom par byed/_gzhan mi dmigs pas bzod pa sgom par byed/_'khor ba la rlom sems med pas bzod pa sgom par byed/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gyis bzod pa sgom par byed/_rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pas bzod pa sgom par byed de/_de bzod pa yang sgom la 
[\[266a.4\]]chos gang la yang sgom par mi byed/_sgom pa dang bral bar yang mi byed do/_/de de ltar bzod pa la gnas nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ste/_gshe ba'i dbang por yang snang la chos nyid kyis gshe bar yang mi byed/_gnod sems dang ldan pa'i dbang 
[\[266a.5\]]por yang snang la ngo bo nyid bsgoms pas gnod sems su yang mi byed/_bsnyen par dka' bar yang snang la chos gang la yang nye ba'am/_ring bar yang mi gnas/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam thams cad rnam par 'khrugs par yang byed la/_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[266a.6\]]'khrugs par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ni bzod pa smra ba yang rjod la rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug dang mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yang mi bzod do/_/de de ltar bzod pa dang ldan pas gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_khro ba mang ba'i sems 
[\[266a.7\]]can rnams la gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_khro ba spang ba'i phyir bzod pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la gnod sems dang /_bzod pa yang mi dmigs shing /_de dus thams cad du ma snang ma nyams so/_/blo gros brtan pa de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i bye brag tu blta'o/_/blo gros brtan pa gzhan yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i chos thams cad btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la lus kyis rtul ba yang ma 
[\[266b.2\]]yin/_ngag dang sems kyis rtul ba yang ma yin te/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa de yang ji ltar na bdag la bltas te de bzhin nyid du slob cing de bzhin du nan tan byed par 'gyur snyam nas/_sems can le lo can rnams kyi phyir ston to/_/de brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la thams cad du rtsom pa 
[\[266b.3\]]yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' des chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid ma 'ongs ma song ba rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/de de ltar gnas pas lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus kyang ston la chos gang yang yongs su grub par yang mi mthong 
[\[266b.4\]]ngo /_/de brtson 'grus brtsams par yang snang la de phyi 'am nang gi lus rtul ba yang med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med par 'gro zhing 'ong yang lus kyi chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/_/de dge ba thams cad rtsom par yang ston la des dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'i chos gang yang mi 
[\[266b.5\]]dmigs so/_/thos pa yongs su tshol bar yang snang la de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa yang yin no/_/mkhan po dang slob dpon yang tshol la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi slob dpon yang yin no/_/thal mo sbyar te chos kun chub par byed par 
[\[266b.6\]]yang snang la de thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa yang thob bo/_/gus par byed par yang snang la de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang gus par byed do/_/de mngal na nyal bar yang ston la de mngal gyi dri ma thams cad kyis kyang mi gos so/_/de btsas par yang ston la des chos gang yang 
[\[266b.7\]]skye ba'am/_'gags par yang mi mthong ngo /_/khye'u'i gzugs su yang ston la de dbang po thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs so/_/bzo'i gnas dang /_lus kyi gnas dang /_rig pa dang /_sngags kyi gnas dang /_rtsi dang /_sman dang /_yi ge dang /_lag rtsis dang /_grangs 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]dang /_rtsis slob par yang snang la de bzo thams cad kyang rtogs par khong du chud do/_/na bar yang ston la de nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad dang yang bral lo/_/rga bar yang ston la de dbang po thams cad nyams pa yang med do/_/'chi ba yang ston la de skye ba yang ma yin/_'chi 
[\[267a.2\]]ba yang ma yin/_'chi 'pho ba yang ma yin/_'byung ba yang ma yin no/_/blo gros brtan pa de ltar na dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de 'dra ba'i brtson 'grus spyod pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/blo gros brtan pa gzhan yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 
[\[267a.3\]]'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par yang shes la ting nge 'dzin dang /_bsam gtan gyi spyod pa rnam par 'byed pa yang ston to/_/de sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams ting nge 'dzin la gzud pa'i phyir/_
[\[267a.4\]]bdag bsam gtan la gnas par yang ston la chos kyi dbyings la rnam par g.yengs pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam par yid la nges par sems shing gnas la de ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems rtse gcig pa las kyang mi 
[\[267a.5\]]g.yo'o/_/mnyam par yang gzhog la 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_'greng ba dang /_'chag pa dang /_nyal bar yang byed do/_/de spyod lam thams cad kyang ston la gcig tu snyoms par zhugs pa yang yin no/_/de smra bar yang snang la ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid 
[\[267a.6\]]de yang mi gtong ngo /_/blo gros brtan pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe na sems can gzhan rnams dang /_gang zag gzhan dag la phan gdags pa'i phyir/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'gro 
[\[267a.7\]]zhing 'jug pa de'i tshe yang mnyam par gzhag pa nyid yin no/_/gang gi tshe na sems can gzhan rnams dang /_gang zag gzhan dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za ba de'i tshe yang mnyam par bzhag bzhin du zas za'o/_/de zas za bar yang snang la byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]gcig tu mkhrags pa/_sra ba/_snying por gyur pa/_rdo rje lta bu/_khong stong ma yin pa/_mi phyed pa yang yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i khong na long ka dang pho ba yang med/_bshang ba dang gci ba yang med/_snabs dang mchil ma yang med/_mi gtsang ba yang med/_dri mi zhim pa yang 
[\[267b.2\]]med do/_/de za bar yang mi byed la mid par yang mi byed/_za ba yang med do/_/sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir de za bar yang snang la de thams cad du kha na ma tho ba yang med pa yin te/_blo gros brtan pa de ltar na dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 
[\[267b.3\]]byis pa so so'i skye bo'i spyad pa thams cad spyod par yang snang la gang du yang spyod pa yang med/_rab tu spyod par yang med/_kun spyod pa yang med de/_spyod pa thams cad las kyang log pa yin no/_/blo gros brtan pa de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[267b.4\]]dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i lam yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i bye brag tu blta'o/_/blo gros brtan pa gzhan yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dgon pa na gnas par yang snang la de la dgon pa ji lta bar de la 
[\[267b.5\]]grong yang de bzhin no/_/de gos dkar po gyon zhing khyim gyi gnas na gnas par yang snang la de la khyim ji lta bar rab tu byung ba yang de bzhin no/_/blo gros brtan pa byang chub sems dpa' ni khyim gyi chos kyis kyang mi gos la rab tu byung ba'i chos kyis kyang rlom sems med do/_/de ni 
[\[267b.6\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ya mtshan can thams cad kyi nang du rab tu byung bar yang snang la de gang du yang ya mtshan can gyi lta bar 'gyur ba yang med/_des dag par yid ches pa yang med do/_/de ya mtshan can thams cad kyi kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_rtags kyang ston 
[\[267b.7\]]la de la zhugs pa yang ma yin/_de la gzhol ba yang ma yin/_de la 'bab pa yang ma yin/_de la bab par yang ma yin no/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_dper na 'dron pa phal po che'i lam mtshon pa yongs su 'dren pa de ni lam yang ston la lam de nyid du yang 'gro zhing 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]slar yang log nas 'dron pa phal po che gzhan dag kyang sgrol lo/_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang ji lta bu'i theg pa'i lam la gnas pa'i sems can dpag tu med pa dag la lam ston 
[\[268a.2\]]te/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam la gnas pa'i sems can dag la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam ston/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i lam la gnas pa'i sems can dag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i lam ston/_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i lam la gnas pa'i sems can 
[\[268a.3\]]dag la ni theg pa chen po'i lam ston te/_nges par 'byung ba de dag la so so ci rigs par lam bstan nas slar log ste/_sems can gzhan dag kyang sgrol bar byed pas de'i phyir skyes bu dam pa de ni lam mtshon pa lta bu zhes bya'o/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_dper na gru legs 
[\[268a.4\]]par sbyar ba byas pa ni sems can tshad med pa bsgral ba'i phyir/_tshu rol gyi 'gram nas pha rol gyi 'gram du 'gro zhing bsgral nas/_sems can gzhan bsgral ba'i phyir slar yang pha rol gyi 'gram nas tshu rol gyi 'gram du 'ong ngo /_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro 
[\[268a.5\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i rgyun la gnas pa'i chu bo bzhis ded pa'i sems can dag mthong nas de dag 'khor ba'i rgyun las bsgral ba'i phyir sems can de dag ji ltar mos pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'da' ba ston par byed de/_dpa' bar 
[\[268a.6\]]'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de gal te nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i sems can dag mthong na/_de dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/_de yang de dag dang lhan cig tu yongs su mya ngan las kyang 'da' la/_de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 
[\[268a.7\]]'dzin 'di nyid kyi stobs bskyed pas slar skye bar yang ston to/_/de gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i sems can dag mthong na/_de dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir de yang de dag dang lhan cig tu yongs su mya ngan las kyang 'da' la/_de dpa' bar 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi stobs bskyed pas slar yang skye bar ston to/_/de 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das par yang 'gro la sems can gzhan bsgral ba'i phyir slar yang 'khor ba na yang snang ste/_skyes bu de dag ni mnyan pa lta bu zhes bya'o/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_
[\[268b.2\]]dper na sgyu ma mkhan ni skye bo phal po che tshogs pa'i mdun du bdag shi bar ston te/_bdag tshig pa'am/_zos pa'am/_rnyis pa'am/_skams pa'am/_rnam par 'thor ba bstan nas/_des sems can de dag las nor blangs te/_slar 'dug par byed do/_/blo gros brtan pa de 
[\[268b.3\]]bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba yang ston la/_de skye ba yang med/_rga ba yang med/_na ba yang med/_'chi ba yang med do/_/blo gros brtan pa 
[\[268b.4\]]de yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i bye brag tu blta'o/_/blo gros brtan pa gzhan yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/_shes rab 
[\[268b.5\]]rno bas de sems can gyi rang bzhin yang mi dmigs la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can sems can zhes tha snyad kyang 'dogs so/_/srog dang gang zag gi rang bzhin yang mi dmigs la srog dang gang zag du tha snyad gdags pa yang tha snyad du 'dogs 
[\[268b.6\]]so/_/las dang rnam par smin pa'i rang bzhin yang mi dmigs la las dang rnam par smin pa yang ston to/_/'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin yang mi dmigs la 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa yang ston to/_/mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba yang mi gtong la mya 
[\[268b.7\]]ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyang ston to/_/chos gdags pa yang mi dmigs la dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos rnam par gzhag pa yang ston to/_/de shes rab thogs pa med pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'dod pa'i khams la yang mi chags la de na 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]yang snang ngo /_/gzugs kyi khams la yang mi chags la de na yang snang ngo /_/de gzugs kyi khams kyi bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs par yang snang la 'dod pa'i khams su yang skye'o/_/gzugs med pa'i khams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[269a.2\]]par yang snang la gzugs kyi khams su yang skye'o/_/de ni 'dod pa'i khams na spyod par yang snang la 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang snyoms par 'jug cing 'dod pa'i khams su yang skye'o/_/de bsam gtan dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag 
[\[269a.3\]]rnams kyang shes shing mnyam par gzhog pa dang ldang bar yang byed la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye bar yang byed do/_/de thabs dang shes rab kyi yongs su bzung bas spyod pa thams cad las ldog pa la yang gnas la sems can yongs 
[\[269a.4\]]su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang spyod do/_/chos gang la yang nye bar mi spyod la spyod pa thams cad las kyang ma log pa yin no/_/de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa dag dang yang bral ba yin la len pa dang gtong bar yang snang ngo /_/de shes rab dang ye shes dang ldan pas 
[\[269a.5\]]ye shes kyis byas pa'i las thams cad byed kyi/_nga rgyal gyis byed pa yang ma yin la las dang rnam par smin par brjod pa yang ma yin no/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_de lug ltar lkugs pa dang /_blun pa dang /_glen pa dang /_'on par yang ston la de tshangs pa'i 
[\[269a.6\]]sgra dang /_skad dang /_dbyangs kyi sgra 'byin pa dang ldan pa yang yin no/_/de bzo thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ci zhig bshad ces mi rtog_/ci zhig smra zhes mi sems/_ji ltar bstan par bya zhes tshol bar yang mi byed la/_'khor gang dang 
[\[269a.7\]]gang du 'gro ba de dang de dag tu lhun gyis grub cing /_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'khor thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i phyir chos la spobs par byed de/_de'i ye shes bri ba'am/_gang bar yang mi 'gyur zhing /_'khor thams cad kyang 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]legs par bshad pas tshim par byed do/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_dper na bud med dam/_skyes pa'am/_khye'u'am/_bu mos snod chung ngu yang rung /_chen po yang rung ste/_ji tsam pa de khyer nas/_chu mig gam/_mtshe'u'am/_rdzing ngam/_lteng ka'am/_'bab chu'am/_rgya mtsho 
[\[269b.2\]]chen por song ste/_snod de dag thams cad yongs su bkang nas song yang chu mig gam/_mtshe'u'am/_rdzing ngam/_lteng ka'am/_'bab chu'am/_rgya mtsho chen po de yang cung zad kyang bri ba yang med la sems can de dag kyang tshim par byed do/_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i 
[\[269b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro yang rung ste/_gal te rgyal rigs kyi 'khor tam/_gal te bram ze'i 'khor tam/_gal te khyim bdag gi 'khor tam/_gal te dge sbyong gi 'khor tam/_gal te brgya byin gyi 'khor tam/_gal 
[\[269b.4\]]te tshangs pa'i 'khor du 'gro na yang /_de dag thams cad la lhun gyis grub cing legs par bshad pas tshim par byed de/_ji lta bur rigs dang /_dbang po dang /_mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos 'chad pa byung yang /_byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang /_ye shes dang /_
[\[269b.5\]]spobs pa dang /_ston pa yongs su 'bri ba yang med la 'khor thams cad kyang legs par bshad pas tshim par byed do/_/blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mthong ma thag tu yang sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/_/thos 
[\[269b.6\]]pa dang /_spyod lam dang /_bshad pa dang /_mi smra bar 'dug pas kyang sems can dag 'dul bar byed do/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_dper na sman gyi rgyal po chen po blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba ni mthong ma thag tu sems can dag gi nad sel bar byed do/_/blo gros brtan pa de 
[\[269b.7\]]bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong ma thag tu sems can de dag gi nad 'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nad rnams sel bar byed do/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_dper na sman gyi 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]rgyal po chen po 'bral ba zhes bya ba des bskus pa'i rnga chen po g.yul gyi ngogs su brdungs na/_rnga'i sgra de thos ma thag tu sems can rnams zug rngu rnams ltung bar 'gyur/_dug thams cad kyang mi dug par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[270a.2\]]'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ming thos ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nyon mongs pa'i zug rngu rnams ltung bar 'gyur/_lta bar gyur pa'i dug thams cad kyang mi dug par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_dper na sman gyi shing 
[\[270a.3\]]ljon pa ni rtsa ba nas byung yang sems can rnams kyi nad sel bar byed do/_/sdong po'am/_yal ga'am/_'dab ma'am/_me tog gam/_'bras bu'am/_shun pa'am/_gsog gam/_snying po las blangs kyang sems can rnams kyi nad sel bar byed do/_/bsgreng ngam/_'gyel 
[\[270a.4\]]tam/_dum bu dum bur bcad pa las blangs kyang sems can rnams kyi nad sel bar byed do/_/blo gros brtan pa de ltar na sman gyi shing ljon pa ni sems can rnams kyi nad zhi bar bya ba'i 'tsho bar nam yang mi 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[270a.5\]]'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i 'tsho bar nam yang mi 'gyur ba ma yin te/_gang dag de la phan pa dang /_gnod par byed pa de dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar yang 'gyur/_gang de la bkur sti byed pa dang /_bkur sti mi byed pa 
[\[270a.6\]]de dag nye bar 'tsho bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de shi zhing shi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa'i sha la gang dag za ba dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang bzhi pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya'i tshogs de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam dang /_tshul khrims kyi stobs 
[\[270a.7\]]bskyed pas de'i 'chi ba'i dus byas te/_shi 'phos ma thag tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag ngan song dang /_nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa de ltar na sman gyi shing ljon pa zhes bya ba de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag ma bstan par tshe rabs thams cad du rtag tu 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/gom pa 'dor ba thams cad la yang 
[\[270b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba thams cad la yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/sems bskyed cing sems bskyed pa thams cad la yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i 
[\[270b.3\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar blo gros brtan pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus ni chos kyi rang bzhin no/_/gnas pa ni chos kyi rang bzhin no/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_dper na rgyal po 'am/_blon pos yan lag gi tshogs 'bum dang ldan pa'i spos kyi phye ma btags pa rdul lta bu zhib mor 
[\[270b.4\]]byas pa sbyar ba las mi la la zhig 'ongs te/_kye lha spos kyi phye ma'i tshogs sbyar ba 'di las spos gzhan dang ma 'bags pa/_spos gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i yan lag gcig cig blang bar 'tshal lo zhes de skad zer na/_blo gros brtan pa de ji snyam du sems/_spos kyi phye ma sbyar 
[\[270b.5\]]ba de las spos gzhan dang ma 'bags pa/_spos gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i yan lag gcig blang bar nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus yun ring 
[\[270b.6\]]po nas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis bsgos pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis bsgos pa'i sems dang /_sems las byung ba thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i sems bskyed cing sems bskyed pa thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[270b.7\]]blo gros brtan pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems bskyed pa thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/_blo gros brtan pa 'di ltar gang sems kyis btang ba dang /_spangs pa dang /_mngon par ma zhen pa de ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]gang sems zhi ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_shin tu zhi gnas su gyur pa de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang sems kyi mi zad pa'i chos nyid dang /_yul thams cad kyis smas par mi 'gyur ba de ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[271a.2\]]gang sems kyi rnam par sgrub pa dang /_dbye ba dang /_dben pa dang /_rnam par shes pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang sems kyi nges par sems pa dang /_nye bar rtog pa dang /_gang yang de'i shin tu sems pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang sems 
[\[271a.3\]]rab tu shes pa dang /_so sor rtog pa dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_mngon sum du shes pa de ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/blo gros brtan pa de ltar na dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni 'jug pa 'dis sems bskyed 
[\[271a.4\]]pa thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'jug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di shin tu yongs su grub 
[\[271a.5\]]pa de'i gnas pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pas gnas par 'tshal bas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ltar de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo 
[\[271a.6\]]thams cad kyi gnas pa rnams na yang gda' la/_gang la yang chags par mi 'gyur/_zhe sdang bar mi 'gyur/_gti mug par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa byams pa mchog ces bya ba des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[271a.7\]]dpa' byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis gnas pas gnas par 'tshal bas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bslab par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ltar de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi gnas pa rnams na yang gda' la/_gang la yang mi chags/_mi 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]'ching /_chags par mi 'gyur/_zhe sdang bar mi 'gyur/_gti mug par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa byams pa mchog la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so legs so/_/tshangs pa de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[271b.2\]]byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi gnas pas gnas par 'dod pas bslab pa thams cad la rlom sems med par dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[271b.3\]]ji ltar slob na byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis par dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la slob pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[271b.4\]]to/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slob dpon nam/_'phong gi slob ma ni thog mar ba lang gi ko ba la phog par byed do/_/gang gi tshe na ba lang gi ko ba la lobs pa de'i tshe shing leb la phog par byed do/_/gang gi tshe shing leb la lobs pa de'i tshe 'ben la phog par byed do/_/
[\[271b.5\]]gang gi tshe 'ben la lobs pa de'i tshe dbyug gu la phog par byed do/_/gang gi tshe dbyug gu la lobs pa de'i tshe skra brgya la phog par byed do/_/gang gi tshe skra brgya la lobs pa de'i tshe skra bcu la phog par byed do/_/gang gi tshe skra bcu la lobs pa de'i tshe skra gcig la phog par byed do/_/gang gi 
[\[271b.6\]]tshe skra gcig la lobs pa de'i tshe sgras mtshon pa la phog pa la slob par byed do/_/gang gi tshe sgras mtshon pa la lobs pa de'i tshe mi 'chor bar phog par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe mi 'chor bar phog pa de'i tshe 'phong slob pa tshar phyin pa yin te/_de 'dod na nub mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na 
[\[271b.7\]]yang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dang gang dag gi sgra bsgrags pa de dag der lhun gyis grub cing mi 'chor ba nyid du mda' 'gro'o/_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la slob pa na thog ma nyid du bsam pa la slob bo/_/gang gi tshe bsam pa la 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]lobs par gyur pa de'i tshe sbyor ba la 'jug go/_/gang gi tshe sbyor ba la bslabs par gyur pa de'i tshe lhag pa'i bsam pa la 'jug go/_/gang gi tshe lhag pa'i bsam pa la bslabs par gyur pa de'i tshe byams pa chen po la 'jug go/_/gang gi tshe byams pa chen po la bslabs par 
[\[272a.2\]]gyur pa de'i tshe snying rje chen po la 'jug go/_/gang gi tshe snying rje chen po la bslabs par gyur pa de'i tshe dga' ba chen po la 'jug go/_/gang gi tshe dga' ba chen po la bslabs par gyur pa de'i tshe btang snyoms chen po la 'jug go/_/gang gi tshe btang snyoms chen po la bslabs par gyur pa de'i tshe byang 
[\[272a.3\]]chub sems dpa'i 'phags pa'i gnas pa bzhi la bslabs pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po'o/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'phags pa'i gnas pa 'di bzhi la bslabs par gyur pa de'i 
[\[272a.4\]]tshe rjes su 'thun pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po mi nyams pa dag la slob bo/_/gang gi tshe rjes su 'thun pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po mi nyams pa dag la bslabs par gyur pa de'i tshe pha rol tu phyin pa drug tshar phyin pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe pha rol tu phyin pa drug tshar phyin par gyur pa de'i tshe 
[\[272a.5\]]thabs mkhas pa rtogs par khong du chud pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe thabs mkhas pa rtogs par khong du chud pa de'i tshe rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa gnyis pa la gnas pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa gnyis pa la gnas pa de'i tshe mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo/_/
[\[272a.6\]]gang gi tshe mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung 
[\[272a.7\]]bstan pa de'i tshe sa brgyad pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe sa brgyad pa la zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa mthong ste/_de ting nge 'dzin de dang ldan pas sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]gang gi tshe sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing yongs su grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/des sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing yongs su grub pa la gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa mngon 
[\[272b.2\]]par sgrub bo/_/de sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa yongs su bzung nas skye ba dang /_rigs dang /_rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mngal du 'jug pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de skye ba dang /_rigs dang /_rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mngal 
[\[272b.3\]]du 'jug pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs par gyur nas sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de sa bcu la gnas nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba 'thob bo/_/de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob nas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[272b.4\]]cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob nas phyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas par 
[\[272b.5\]]'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid de yang mi gtong ngo /_/blo gros brtan pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang chos de lta bu dag la bslabs par gyur pa de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la 
[\[272b.6\]]gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni gang du yang bslab par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de la mngon du 'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/_dper na 'phong gi slob dpon nam/_'phong gi slob 
[\[272b.7\]]ma ni sgras mtshon pa la phog par byed par gnas pas phyis gang du yang mi slob bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir te/_phog par bya ba thams cad de la mngon du 'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas kyang chos gang la yang bslab par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir te/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /_rnam par thar pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[273a.2\]]dpa'i yon tan gyi chos thams cad de la mngon du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo 
[\[273a.3\]]gros brtan pa de'i dus la da bab par shes na khyod spobs par gyis shig_/blo gros brtan pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po la dbang ba'i tshangs pa chen po ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la tshegs chung ngus rnam 
[\[273a.4\]]par lta bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang tshegs chung ngus byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad la rnam par lta zhing sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa rnams kyang 'tshal to/_/bcom 
[\[273a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa de dag ni kun tu rnam par bltas par blta bar byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum 
[\[273a.6\]]du gyur pa dag go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lhun po'i rtse 'dzin ces bya ba stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i mtha'i gling na gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas na tshegs chung ngus bang 
[\[273a.7\]]rim thams cad blta'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang tshegs chung ngus nyan thos kyi spyod pa thams cad la rnam par lta zhing rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la yang rnam par blta'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas brgya byin lhun po'i rtse 'dzin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye grogs po khyod gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas 'dir 'ongs/_ri rab gang gi rtse mo 
[\[273b.2\]]la gnas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la brgya byin lhun po'i rtse 'dzin gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa de la khyod gang na gnas zhes gnas mi 'dri'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[273b.3\]]phyir zhe na/_de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gnas so/_/de ni gang du yang mngon par zhen pas mi gnas so/_/de ni dmigs pas mi gnas so/_/de ni lta bar gyur pas mi gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas brgya byin lhun po'i rtse 'dzin la 'di skad 
[\[273b.4\]]ces smras so/_/kye grogs po ci khyod kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bam/_brgya byin lhun po'i rtse 'dzin gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ci ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'am/_ma thob pas nye bar gnas sam/_smras pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_rigs 
[\[273b.5\]]kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa de ni chos gang yang mi 'thob cing thob pa med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas smras pa/_kye grogs po khyod kyi spobs pa las na khyod ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas so/_/
[\[273b.6\]]smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad gnas med pa'i phyir kho bos ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gang la gnas pa'i chos de ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa ni chos gang la yang mi gnas so/_/gang la 
[\[273b.7\]]yang mi gnas pa de la ni len pa med do/_/gang la len pa med pa de la chos bstan pa gang yang med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros brtan pa khyod kyis brgya byin lhun po'i rtse 'dzin mthong ngam/_gsol 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa brgya byin lhun po'i rtse 'dzin 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'o/_/nges par gyur pa thob pa'o/_/tshegs med pa thob pa'o/_/'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 
[\[274a.2\]]nge 'dzin la gnas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na brgya byin gyi gnas ji snyed yod pa de thams cad du 'di ston par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te brgya byin lhun po'i rtse 'dzin 'di/_brgya 
[\[274a.3\]]byin gyi gnas thams cad du gda' ba lags na/_bdag gis ni 'di brgya byin gyi gnas ri rab kyi rtse mor sngon chad ma mthong ngo /_/de nas brgya byin lhun po'i rtse 'dzin gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka gal te khyod lta bu la kho bo lta bu'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su 
[\[274a.4\]]grub pa bstan du zin na/_de'i phyir brgya byin gyi gnas thams cad du khyed gda' bar mi 'gyur te/_kau shi ka kho bo ni khyod kyi brgya byin gyi gnas su rgyu mod kyi kho bo khyod kyis mi mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[274a.5\]]bdag cag ni skyes bu dam pa 'di'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa mthong bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci kau shi ka skyes bu dam pa 'di'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa mthong bar 'dod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal 
[\[274a.6\]]lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lhun po'i rtse 'dzin la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di la rang gi gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ston cig_/de nas brgya byin lhun po'i rtse 'dzin gyis bdag gi gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub 
[\[274a.7\]]pa bstan to/_/gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa bstan ma thag tu de nas 'khor de na brgya byin nam/_tshangs pa'am/_'jig rten skyong ba'am/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'am/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]theg pa pa'am/_de ma yin pa sems can gzhan yang rung ste/_gang dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa de dag thams cad kyi lus ni 'di lta ste/_dper na snag tsha'i phung po bzhin du snang ngo /_/brgya byin de'i lus ni ri rab bzhin du mngon par 'phags shing lam me lhan ne lhang 
[\[274b.2\]]nger snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni de'i nyis gyur tu bzhugs par snang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can chen po 'di'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ngo mtshar te/_bcom ldan 'das brgya 
[\[274b.3\]]byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba 'di dag gi lus ni snag tsha'i phung po bzhin du mchis par gda'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ri rab kyi rtse mo 'di la mchis shing gang gi tshe na bdag chos bzang lha'i mdun sar mchis pa de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mgul du brgya 
[\[274b.4\]]byin thogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs pas de'i 'od kyis lha'i 'khor thams cad mog mog por gyur te/_lam mer ma mchis/_lhan ner ma mchis/_lhang nger ma mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de'i 'od kyis bdag mog mog por bgyis lags 
[\[274b.5\]]te/_bdag gi brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po de yang lam mer ma mchis/_lhan ner ma mchis/_lhang nger ma mchis so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka gal te stong gsum gyi 
[\[274b.6\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che chen pos yongs su gang du zin kyang lha thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i 'od kyis brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che de dag thams cad mog mog por 'gyur ro/_/kau 
[\[274b.7\]]shi ka gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu rin po ches yongs su gang du zin kyang rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che yod de/_de'i 'od kyis lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu rin po che de dag thams cad mog mog por 'gyur 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]ro/_/kau shi ka gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rje snang ba'i nor bu rin po ches yongs su gang du zin kyang snang ba thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che yod de/_des rdo rje snang ba'i nor bu rin po che thams cad mog mog por byed do/_/
[\[275a.2\]]kau shi ka brgya byin 'di'i mgul du snang ba thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs pa mthong ngam/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis brtags pa de'i tshe na mig zi zi por gyur lags te/_de'i 'od ni de lta bu lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka byang chub 
[\[275a.3\]]sems dpa' gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur pa de/_gang gi tshe na lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur pa de'i tshe/_de'i mgul du nor bu rin po che de lta bu thogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[275a.4\]]'das gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa 'di lta bu las yongs su nyams so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di las yongs su nyams so/_/
[\[275a.5\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bshad pa de lha'i bu sbed pas thos nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye yab nyan thos kyi nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa'i sems can brgya phrag mang po dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dod pa'i sems bskyed kyang ci zhig byar yod de/_
[\[275a.6\]]de dag ni 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi mtshams bcad pa'o/_/kye yab gang dag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_gang dag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_gang dag byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag la 'dod pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/_
[\[275a.7\]]de dag ni gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/kye yab 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma dang zla ba'i bsngags pa ji tsam mang du brjod cing bsngags pa bshad pa la mi dmus long gis 'dod pa'i sems bskyed kyang des de dag mi mthong ste/_myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[275b\]]
