[\[275b.1\]]kye yab de bzhin du nyan thos kyi nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod bsngags pa bstan pa la 'dod pa'i sems ji tsam mang du bskyed kyang des sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yon tan rnams mi shes mi mthong mi myong ngo /_/kye yab de bas na gzugs 'dod pas 
[\[275b.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/_de'i gzugs kyi lus kha dog yongs su grub pa 'di lta bur 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu sbed pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas 
[\[275b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas lha'i bu sbed pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam gyis bud med kyi lus las bsgyur/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu theg pa chen po la gnas pas nam bud med dam/_skyes par gnas kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[275b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems ni khams gsum dang lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyir te/_bud med dang skyes pa ni sems kyis rab tu phye ba yin no/_/yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam gyis bud med kyi lus las bsgyur ces gang de skad smras pa ni ji 
[\[275b.5\]]tsam du khyim thab la g.yo med cing phangs par sems pas rim gro byas pas so/_/smras pa/_khyod kyis ji ltar khyim thab la rim gro byas/_smras pa/_ston pa tsam du phangs par bsams pas so/_/smras pa/_ji ltar khyod kyis g.yo med par byas/_smras pa/_lus kyi las 
[\[275b.6\]]ji lta ba dang /_ngag gi las ji lta ba de bzhin du yid kyi las bgyis te/_rigs kyi bu de ni bud med kyi g.yo med pa'o/_/smras pa/_khyod kyis bud med kyi lus las ji ltar bsgyur/_smras pa/_ji ltar bsgrubs pa bzhin du'o/_/smras pa/_khyod kyis ji ltar bsgrubs/_smras pa/_ji ltar bsgyur ba 
[\[275b.7\]]bzhin du'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu bshad pa de'i don gang yin/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pas na/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni mi 'grub mi ldog go/_/yang rigs kyi bu ji srid du bdag smon par gyur pa de srid du bdag la bud med kyi 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]mtshan byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe na bdag la skyes pa'i mtshan byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bud med kyi rang bzhin gyi chos nyid de ma spangs so/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na 'di lta ste/_bud med dam/_skyes par 'dzin pa ni phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa'o/_/rigs kyi 
[\[276a.2\]]bu gang yang phyin ci log dang /_phyin ci ma log pa de gnyi ga gnyis su med pa gnyis su dbyer med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni shin tu gnyis dang bral ba'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas lha'i bu sbed pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci lha'i 
[\[276a.3\]]bu khyod kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i phyogs 'ga' yang mngon sum du gyur tam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gzhan gyis bstan pas bdag la mngon sum du gyur gyi/_bdag gi ye shes kyis mngon sum du gyur pa ni ma lags so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag gis mngon par shes 
[\[276a.4\]]pa gang gi tshe na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khab na byang chub sems dpar gyur cing bdag gi mal du slas kyi nang na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/_mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na shar phyogs nas tshangs pa 
[\[276a.5\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed lhags te/_de na byang chub sems dpa' la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /_nyan thos kyi lam yongs su zhus pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas de dag la ji ltar zhu ba zhus pa bzhin du lan blan te/_de na byang chub sems dpa' la tshangs pa 
[\[276a.6\]]gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa chos shes pa thob pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i shes rab dang /_spobs pa 'di lta bu yang yod la/_'dod pa'i longs spyod dang /_rgyal srid la chags par yang byed pa 'di ni mi rigs so/_/de nas tshangs pa gzhan byang chub 
[\[276a.7\]]sems dpa'i thabs shes pa'i yon tan gyi chos la mngon sum du gyur pa de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod dang /_rgyal srid kyi phyir khyim na gnas pa ma yin gyi/_'di ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khyim na gnas te/_'di ni 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du yang chos kyi 'khor lo skor la/_'dir yang byang chub sems dpar gyur par snang ngo /_/de'i tshe tshangs pa des 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na 'di 'dra ba'i rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[276b.2\]]tshangs pa 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul lo/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'dod pa la yang yongs su spyod cing rgyal srid kyang yongs su sdud la ting nge 'dzin kyang thob pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal ngo 
[\[276b.3\]]mtshar to snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu bdag gis de thos nas byang chub sems dpa' la shin tu ston par 'du shes mngon par bzhag go/_/bdag gis dad pa yang rnyed nas bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_bdag kyang 
[\[276b.4\]]ye shes dang /_yon tan gyi chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur cig ces bgyis so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di la ni bdag phyogs tsam zhig mngon du gyur gyi/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yon tan gyi bye brag ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems 
[\[276b.5\]]dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu sbed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bstan pa ni ngo mtshar te/_de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su zin pas 'di lta ste dper na/_da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[276b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu sbed pa 'di yang ring po mi thogs par dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[276b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa gang la la dag 'dus pa mchis sam/_de nas 'khor de na lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum zhes bya ba 'dus 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]par gyur te/_'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/blo gros brtan pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho chen po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi chos rin po che mtha' 
[\[277a.2\]]yas pa dang ldan pa go cha chen po bgos pa rnams kyi nang du phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa gang la la dag 'khor 'dir 'dus pa mchis sam zhes de skad zer ba'i khyod kyi zhu ba ni kho bos bsams na/_'di lta ste/_dper na/_'dron pa 
[\[277a.3\]]byis pa'i rang bzhin can la la zhig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs nas/_rgya mtsho chen po 'di na gang dag blangs te/_'gro bar bya ba'i rin po che dag yod dam zhes de skad zer ba dang mtshungs pa snyam byed do/_/blo gros brtan pa 'khor 'di na ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 
[\[277a.4\]]'dzin 'di thob pa brgya byin gyi kha dog dang /_gzugs dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa tshangs pa'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 
[\[277a.5\]]'dzin 'di thob pa'i lha'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'khor los sgyur ba'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge slong gi kha dog dang /_gzugs dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[277a.6\]]dpa' dge slong ma'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' dge bsnyen gyi kha dog dang /_gzugs dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do/_/dge bsnyen ma'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do/_/mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dag kyang 
[\[277a.7\]]yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa dag sems can gdul ba'i phyir lus dang /_kha dog dman pa dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do/_/blo gros brtan pa 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_spyod lam dang 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]ldan pa dag kyang yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa dag rang sangs rgyas kyi kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_spyod lam dang ldan pa dag kyang yod do/_/blo gros brtan pa gang gi tshe na de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[277b.2\]]sangs rgyas gal te rgyal rigs kyi 'khor tam/_gal te bram ze'i 'khor tam/_gal te khyim bdag gi 'khor tam/_gal te dge sbyong gi 'khor tam/_gal te lha'i 'khor tam/_gal te brgya byin gyi 'khor tam/_gal te tshangs pa'i 'khor tam/_gal te 'jig rten skyong gi 'khor tam/_
[\[277b.3\]]'khor gang dang gang du gshegs par de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag ji ltar mos pa de lta bu'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_spyod lam du snang zhing de dag gis kyang de'i kha dog de 'dra ba nyid du mthong ste/_blo gros brtan pa de yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sngon bsam pa sbyangs 
[\[277b.4\]]pa'i bye brag tu blta'o/_/blo gros brtan pa de ltar na khyod kyis gang dang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston pa mthong ba de dang der/_khyod kyis 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa/_chos thams cad kyi dbang 
[\[277b.5\]]phyug dang ldan par gnas pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dpag tu med pa dag yod par shes par gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di'i spobs pa ji lta ba dang /_'di'i ye shes thogs pa ma 
[\[277b.6\]]mchis par 'chad pa ji lta ba dang /_'di'i spyod pa rnam par 'byed pa 'chad pa ji lta ba las na/_bdag ni lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum 'dis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo snyam bgyid do/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[277b.7\]]blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros brtan pa de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_lha'i bu 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/_ting nge 'dzin 'di mngon du byas nas 'chad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]mngon sum la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu khyod kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di sbyangs pa'i bye brag gi phyogs 'ga' zhig ston cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/blo 
[\[278a.2\]]gros brtan pa khyod dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i phyogs tsam gyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa lta bar 'dod dam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu lta bar 'dod do/_/de nas lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum gyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i phyir de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 
[\[278a.3\]]'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i kha dog dang /_gzugs su gnas pa dang /_mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang /_'khor dang bcas pa dpung gi mthu dang ldan pa dang /_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'du shes pa de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa'i ltas bstan nas/_
[\[278a.4\]]smras pa/_blo gros brtan pa ci mthong /_smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bos ni thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_gzugs su gnas pa dang /_mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang /_'khor dang bcas pa dpung gi mthu dang ldan pa 
[\[278a.5\]]dang /_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_gzugs su gnas pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi khang pa na gnas shing 
[\[278a.6\]]lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis yongs su bskor te/_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dbyangs byed par 'du shes pa de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed par byin gyis brlabs nas smras pa/_blo gros brtan pa ci mthong /_smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bos ni thams 
[\[278a.7\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_gzugs su gnas pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i khang pa na gnas shing lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis yongs su bskor te/_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]dbyangs byed par mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum gyis yang gang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de tshangs pa'i kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_gzugs su gnas pa dang /_spyod lam shin tu zhi ba dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang na gnas pa dang /_
[\[278b.2\]]tshad med pa bzhi'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed par 'du shes pa de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs pa byin gyis brlabs nas/_smras pa/_blo gros brtan pa ci mthong /_smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bos ni thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di tshangs pa'i kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_gzugs su 
[\[278b.3\]]gnas pa dang /_spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang na gnas pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed par mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum gyis yang 'khor de dag gnas brtan 'od srung chen po'i kha dog 
[\[278b.4\]]dang /_gzugs dang /_dbyibs dang /_chos gos snam sbyar dang /_thang ba dang /_lhung bzed thogs pa'i spyod lam 'dzin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar snang la/_sna tshogs su med cing kha dog gcig tu gyur pa de lta bu'i byin gyi 
[\[278b.5\]]rlabs pa byin gyis brlabs nas/_smras pa/_blo gros brtan pa ci mthong /_smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bos ni thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di gnas brtan 'od srung chen po'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_dbyibs dang /_chos gos snam sbyar dang /_thang ba dang /_lhung bzed thogs 
[\[278b.6\]]pa'i spyod lam 'dzin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar snang la/_sna tshogs su med cing kha dog gcig tu gyur pa de lta bur mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum gyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid 
[\[278b.7\]]kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa bstan pa'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_dbyibs dang /_spyod lam dang /_mtshan bkod pas brgyan pa dang /_zhabs 'bring ba dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]pa mang po thams cad so so na dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par snang ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma bstan nas/_smras pa/_blo gros brtan pa ci mthong /_smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bos ni thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_
[\[279a.2\]]dbyibs dang /_spyod lam dang /_mtshan bkod pas brgyan pa dang /_zhabs 'bring ba dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar so so na dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_blo gros brtan pa 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu 
[\[279a.3\]]mchog tu gyur pa ste/_blo gros brtan pa byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de dang ldan pa ni 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yungs 'bru gcig tu byin gyis rlob bo/_/yang na yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par kun du ston cing gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[279a.4\]]khams thams cad kyang snang bar 'gyur/_nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad kyang snang bar gyur te/_sems can dag la gnod par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa de ltar na ting nge 'dzin 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo//_//bam po gsum pa/_de nas nyan thos chen 
[\[279a.5\]]po de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[279a.6\]]dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'am/_thob par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab par blta ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[279a.7\]]pa'i 'gros su mchi ba lags so/_/mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang /_rig pa dang ldan pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag stan gcig la mchis pa las 'di 'dra ba'i kha dog dang /_gzugs su gda' bar gyur nas/_bdag cag gcig la gcig kha 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]dog dang /_gzugs dang /_spyod lam de lta bur mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni gang dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnar mi grag pa'i sems can de dag bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das tha na gang dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 
[\[279b.2\]]thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba lags na 'don par bgyid pa lta ci smos/_thos nas nan tan bgyid pa lta ci smos/_gang dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa lta ci smos snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams 
[\[279b.3\]]cad kyi pha rol du mchi bar 'tshal bas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin mnyan par bgyi'o/_/gzung bar bgyi'o/_/bklag par bgyi'o/_/kun chub par bgyi'o/_/gzugs dang /_kha dog thams cad ston par 'tshal ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /_spyod lam 
[\[279b.4\]]ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'tshal ba dang /_de dag gi sems rab tu rtogs par 'tshal ba dang /_de dag gi nad ji lta ba bzhin du sman gyis gso bar 'tshal bas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid mnyan par bgyi'o/_/bklag par bgyi'o/_/bsgom par bgyi'o/_/gang dag gis 
[\[279b.5\]]dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul du mchis pa lags so/_/rang byung gi ye shes la dbang bgyid pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[279b.6\]]gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no/_/
[\[279b.7\]]ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de la ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes nga mi smra'o/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de la ni mngon par shes pa thob pa zhes nga mi smra'o/_/
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de la ni sbyang ba byas pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de la ni sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[280a.2\]]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs dang ldan pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de la ni mang du thos pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[280a.3\]]de la ni spobs pa dang ldan pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bas na nges par 'byung ba'i lam thams cad du nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas rlom sems thams cad med pa'i phyir dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bslab par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[280a.4\]]sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'dod pas gang la brtson par bya/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'dod pas 
[\[280a.5\]]so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la brtson par bya'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la brtson par bya/_smras pa/_ci nas kyang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin 
[\[280a.6\]]par mthong ba de lta bur/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas so so'i skye bo'i chos la brtson par bya'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu ci sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ldan pa'am/_mi ldan par nye bar gnas sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang sbyar ba'am/_
[\[280a.7\]]dbral bar mi nus te/_gang yang rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/_tshul gcig pas de'i phyir brtson pa zhes bya'i rigs kyi bu 'di la sbyar ba'am/_dbral bar bya ba'i chos ni gang 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni mi skye ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no/_/chos thams cad ni mi 'gog pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no/_/chos thams cad ni mi 'khrugs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no/_/chos thams cad ni 'du ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang 
[\[280b.2\]]ldan no/_/chos thams cad ni 'bral ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no/_/chos thams cad ni nam mkha' bzhin du dben pa dang ldan no/_/chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid dang ldan no/_/chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'i chos nyid dang ldan te shi 'pho med do/_/smras pa/_
[\[280b.3\]]lha'i bu dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang du 'gro ba yin/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'gro ba yang yin la/_sems dang lta ba dang /_dmigs par 'du shes pa la 'gro ba ni ma yin no/_/srid par 
[\[280b.4\]]'gro ba'i 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba thams cad du 'gro ba yang yin la/_srid par 'gro ba'i nyon mongs par 'gro ba ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad ston par 'gro ba yang yin la mnyam pa nyid 'khrugs par 'gro ba ni ma yin no/_/sangs 
[\[280b.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'jug par 'gro ba yang yin la zhing sna tshogs su 'du shes par 'gro ba ni ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas thams cad ston par 'gro ba yang yin la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /_mtshan la rnam par rtog cing ston par 'gro ba ni ma yin no/_/sgra dang /_skad 
[\[280b.6\]]thams cad ston par 'gro ba yang yin la yi ge'i 'du shes yongs su rtog par 'gro ba ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gro ba yang yin la shin tu mthong bar 'gro ba ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na dpa' bar 
[\[280b.7\]]'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ji lta bur 'gro ba yin zhes gang de skad smras pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa ting nge 'dzin 'di'i 'gro ba yang de yin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta bur gshegs/_smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]nyid kyi phyir mi 'gro bar gshegs so/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi gshegs sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba yin te/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su 
[\[281a.2\]]mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'gro ba ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das sam/_smras pa/_ci rigs kyi 
[\[281a.3\]]bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed skyes sam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed skyes la mya ngan las kyang 'das so zhes bka' stsal to/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang yang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[281a.4\]]pas lha dang mi'i skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir/_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir/_'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_skye bo phal po che dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don gyi phyir/_phan pa'i phyir/_bde ba'i phyir/_gang zag gcig 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin 
[\[281a.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes de skad ces bka' stsal pa/_/ci de bzhin gshegs pas gang skye ba'am/_'gag par 'gyur ba'i gang zag de rnyed dam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gang skye ba'am/_'gag par 'gyur 
[\[281a.6\]]ba'i chos gang yang ma rnyed do/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar yang 'chad mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni 'byung ba'am/_'gag pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[281a.7\]]'da' bar yang 'chad mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni yongs su mya ngan las kyang mi 'da'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa da ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu mi skye ba'i chos nyid 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]ji lta ba dang /_mi 'gog pa'i chos nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa skyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_rigs kyi bu bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa tha dad par mi 'dod do/_/smras 
[\[281b.2\]]pa/_ci'i phyir/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu chos gang shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 
[\[281b.3\]]bya nus sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du des mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mod kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de las kyang mi 'da'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni skye bas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[281b.4\]]par sangs rgyas pa ma yin/_'gag pas kyang ma yin/_chos gang la yang gnas pas kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin te/_rigs kyi bu gang na mi skye ba mi 'gag pa/_mi gnas pa de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu 
[\[281b.5\]]khyod dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te de ltar 'chad dam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag ni chos gang la yang gnas te 'chad pa med do/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu khyod ji ltar gnas med pa la gnas te 'chad par byed/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[281b.6\]]gang de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa sprul pas 'chad pa de gang du gnas te 'chad/_smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis 'chad do/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu yang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab pa gang 
[\[281b.7\]]zhig byin gyis brlabs te/_sprul pa la byin gyis rlob par mdzad/_ci bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'am/_smras pa/_de ma yin no/_/smras pa/_gzhan byin gyis brlabs pa'am/_/smras pa/_de ma yin no/_/smras pa/_chos bstan pa byin gyis brlabs pa'am/_smras pa/_
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]de ma yin no/_/smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang du gnas te byin gyis rlob/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas med pa la gnas te sprul pa sprul par mdzad do/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gnas med pa la gnas te 
[\[282a.2\]]sprul pa sprul par mdzad pa bzhin du sprul pa de dag kyang gnas med pa la gnas bzhin du 'chad do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni gnas med pa la gnas pa yin te/_bdag kyang gnas med pa la gnas nas ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad do/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu gnas med pa 
[\[282a.3\]]la gnas na khyod ji ltar na spobs par 'gyur/_smras pa/_ji ltar gnas med pa de bzhin du spobs so/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag tu 'du shes pas mi 
[\[282a.4\]]'chad/_gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang /_sems can du 'du shes pa dang /_chos su 'du shes pas mi 'chad pa de lta bu ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/_chos 'chad pa na ji ltar yi ge mi zad cing zad par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du chos mi zad cing 
[\[282a.5\]]zad par mi 'gyur la/_yi ge rnam pa sna tshogs su yang mi 'chad/_chos rnam pa sna tshogs su yang mi 'chad de/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi sgyu ma'i 
[\[282a.6\]]chos nyid kyang mi 'dor/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyang mi 'dor/_brag ca'i sgra lta bu'i chos nyid kyang mi 'dor na/_rigs kyi bu de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/ji ltar yi ge de dag yul na mi gnas/_phyogs na mi gnas/_nang 
[\[282a.7\]]na ma yin/_phyi rol na ma yin/_gnyis ka med par yang ma yin zhing gang na yang mi gnas te/_tshogs pa las byung ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang yul na mi gnas/_phyogs na mi gnas/_nang na ma yin/_phyi rol na ma yin/_gnyi ga med par yang ma yin/_
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]'das pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_da ltar byung ba ma yin te/_yi ge gang dag gis de dag bshad pa de dag kyang de ltar yi ge mi zad pa mngon sum du gyur pas 'chad pas na de'i phyir spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu khyod ji ltar 'chad pa de bzhin du 
[\[282b.2\]]spobs sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag de bzhin du spobs te/_brag ca'i sgra byung ba'i rang bzhin ji lta ba dag gi lam gyi sgras bshad pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu rtogs pa zhes bya ba ci/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rtogs pa zhes bya ba de ni 
[\[282b.3\]]nam mkha' rtogs pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni dpe med pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang dpe med pas na de'i phyir rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/gang du de 'gro ba'i chos de dag gi dpe yang bya bar sla ba ma yin pas na de'i 
[\[282b.4\]]phyir rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/ye shes de ni dpe med pa/_'dra ba med pa/_dngos po thams cad bral ba de rtogs par byed pas na de'i phyir rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/_lha'i bu legs 
[\[282b.5\]]so legs so/_/khyod kyi tshig 'di ni legs par smras pa'o/_/gal te bshad par bya na de ltar bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpas bshad pa de thos nas/_skrag par mi bya/_dngang bar mi bya/_dngang bar 'gyur bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rtogs par bya ba de ma rtogs 
[\[282b.6\]]par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum 'di sangs rgyas 
[\[282b.7\]]kyi zhing gang nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis/_lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ci zhig bya/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang na skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag gi gtsug lag khang ngam/_gnas khang ngam/_gnas sam/_'chag 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]sa yod pa'i phyogs der phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bshad pa 'di nyid glegs bam du bris nas gang dag gi lag tu song bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 
[\[283a.2\]]phyag bya ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros brtan pa lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon dga' 
[\[283a.3\]]nas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan cing 'chad du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mi 'chad dam/_ci lags na/_lha'i 
[\[283a.4\]]bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mngon dga' de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis/_bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa gang ting nge 'dzin 'di mi 'chad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de ni shin tu dkon mod kyi/_blo gros brtan pa lha'i bu sangs 
[\[283a.5\]]rgyas blo gros mngon sum 'di mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_lha'i bu 'di ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang snyigs ma lnga'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag spang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod 
[\[283a.6\]]pa dag kyang yongs su gzung ba dang /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yang shin tu bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mngon dga' de nas mi 
[\[283a.7\]]mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum 'di ji srid na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_'di 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]byang chub thob nas ming ci zhes bya bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das shing sangs rgyas stong yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[283b.2\]]nas bskal pa drug cu rtsa gnyis na sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de na rang sangs rgyas kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa bskal pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po de dag 'das nas lha'i bu de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[283b.3\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa de'i tshe de'i dus na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni mthong na dad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig 
[\[283b.4\]]rten gyi khams su 'gyur te/_blo gros brtan pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong na dad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag thams cad dad pa rnyed pas mdzes par 'gyur te/_de na sems can 
[\[283b.5\]]gang yang 'dod chags kyis sems kun tu dkris shing 'dug par mi 'gyur/_zhe sdang gis sems kun tu dkris shing 'dug par mi 'gyur/_gti mug gis sems kun tu dkris shing 'dug par mi 'gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad chos spyod pa dang ldan zhing chos la dad pa rnyed par 
[\[283b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bar ma bcu'i tshad du 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams ni theg pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob 
[\[283b.7\]]pa dang /_chos thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa ni tshad med par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa de'i tshe de'i dus na gang bdud dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur/_sems can thams cad la snying 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]rjes gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang ngan song gsum yongs su spangs par 'gyur/_mi khom pa brgyad las 'das pa dang /_rtag tu brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gyur te/_byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bdud 
[\[284a.2\]]dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang /_lta ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba phrag 'bum du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/blo 
[\[284a.3\]]gros brtan pa lha'i bu 'di ni bkod pa 'di lta bus mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas lha'i bu sangs rgyas blo gros mngon sum la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[284a.4\]]so/_/lha'i bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pas rnyed pa shin tu rnyed do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang chos thams cad kyi ma rnyed pa de ni chos kyi rnyed pa'o/_/gang chos 'ga' zhig dmigs pa de la ni chos kyi rnyed pa 
[\[284a.5\]]ci yang med do/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na gang chos thams cad kyi ma rnyed pa so sor ma rnyed pa ma dmigs pa de ni chos kyi rnyed pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu bdag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/lha'i bu de la 'di bshad cing lung bstan pa'i tshe srog chags sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa nyi khri lnga 
[\[284a.6\]]stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad 
[\[284a.7\]]pa'i tshe/_bdud sdig can mig gis mi rtsol bar bgyi ba'i slad du mi mchi ba bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod bdud sdig can skabs su mthong bar 'dod dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas bdud sdig can zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bcings la/_bcings pa de gcod pa'am/_de las thar bar byed mi nus par gang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung nas/_
[\[284b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis bdud sdig can zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bcings pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ni dpa' bar 'gro 
[\[284b.3\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad dam/_ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha gang dag yid rab tu zhe sdang zhing chos la bar chad bya ba'i phyir nye bar 
[\[284b.4\]]gnas pa de dag thams cad dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzi brjid dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bcings par shes par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu da ltar yang rung nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe 
[\[284b.5\]]yang rung ste/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di gang na 'chad dam/_ston tam/_yi ger 'dri'am/_glegs bam du byed par 'gyur ba der bdud sdig can nam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha'am/_de ma yin pa gzhan yang yid kyi rtog pa rab tu zhe sdang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dpa' 
[\[284b.6\]]bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzi brjid dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bcings par shes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[284b.7\]]lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la the tsom mi 'tshal lo/_/nem nur ma mchis so/_/bar 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]chad kyang mi bgyid do/_/bdag cag bcing mi 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni ting nge 'dzin 'di yongs su gzung ba'i slad du chos smra ba de'ang bsrung bar bgyid do/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/_/de 
[\[285a.2\]]skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye grogs po dag de'i phyir 
[\[285a.3\]]khyed lta bar gyur pa'i 'ching ba bcu gnyis las yongs su thar bar gyis shig bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag tu lta ba'i 'ching ba dang /_sems can du lta ba'i 'ching ba dang /_srog tu lta ba'i 'ching ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba'i 'ching ba dang /_chad par lta ba'i 'ching 
[\[285a.4\]]ba dang /_rtag par lta ba'i 'ching ba dang /_ngar 'dzin par lta ba'i 'ching ba dang /_nga yir 'dzin par lta ba'i 'ching ba dang /_'byung bar lta ba'i 'ching ba dang /_'jig par lta ba'i 'ching ba dang /_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 'ching ba dang /_chos thams cad la mngon par zhen 
[\[285a.5\]]par lta ba'i 'ching ba las so/_/kye grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la gang la la dag gshe ba'am/_spong ba'am/_zlog par byed pa de dag thams cad ni bcing ba 'di bcu gnyis kyis bcings nas/_zlog 
[\[285a.6\]]par byed/_spong bar byed/_gshe bar byed do/_/kye grogs po dag gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di thos nas mos par byed/_yid ches par byed de/_spong bar mi byed pa de dag thams cad ni lta bar gyur pa'i 'ching ba bcu gnyis kyi bcing ba 
[\[285a.7\]]'di dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ci bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can gyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming thos lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]shA ri'i bu thos mod kyi 'ong ba dang bdag bcing ba de las thar bar byed mi nus so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang de bzhin gshegs pas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming byin gyis brlabs na thos par gyur pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar 
[\[285b.2\]]to/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu chog gis khyod de skad ma zer cig_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mes yongs su gang ba yang 'bogs te/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming nyan du 'gro bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu dpa' bar 'gro 
[\[285b.3\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni thos nas kyang gces spras byed pa yin gyi/_bsam gtan bzhi la gnas shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/zhes ngas bshad do/_/shA ri'i bu bdud sdig can gyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming thos pa de nyid de'i bdud kyi las 
[\[285b.4\]]thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/gang yang bcing bas bcings bzhin du thos pa de nyid de'i lta bar gyur pa'i 'ching ba bcu gnyis las rab tu thar bar 'gyur ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de bas na lta bar gyur pa'i bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par gnas pas kyang 
[\[285b.5\]]dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bya na dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_mchog tu dga' ba thob pas mnyan pa lta ci smos/_de nas 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[285b.6\]]'das la byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can 'khor 'dir mchi bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de la bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul thams cad bstan par bgyi'o/_/dpa' bar 
[\[285b.7\]]'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la yang 'jug par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da de'i dus la bab par sems na'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pa 'khor der mi snang bar gyur nas/_bdud kyi gnas su 'dug par 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'chad na khyod mi nyan 
[\[286a.2\]]tam/_de na sems can dpag tu med pa dag byang chub kyi phyir go cha gyon par byed de/_de dag khyod kyi yul las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sems can shin tu dpag tu med pa dag khyod kyi yul las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[286a.3\]]bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pa la bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyan na mchi bar ni mi nus so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bdag ni zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings te/_lag pa gnyis dang /_rkang pa 
[\[286a.4\]]gnyis dang /_mgul bar bcings pas der mchi mi nus so/_/smras pa/_sdig can khyod sus bcings/_smras pa/_ting nge 'dzin 'di la bar chad bgyid du mchi zhing sems can gang dag 'di la mos pa de dbral bar bgyi'o snyam du bsams pa dang /_de'i tshe zhags pa'i bcing 
[\[286a.5\]]ba lngas bcings par 'tshal bar gyur to/_/gang gi tshe na bdag de bzhin gshegs pa ni mnyes par dka' ba byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yang mnyes par dka' ba lags kyis der mi mchi bar 'di nyid du bdag gi gnas na gnas so snyam du 
[\[286a.6\]]bsams na de'i tshe bdag grol bar gyur par 'tshal to/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas smras pa/_sdig can de lta bas na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni rang gi yongs su rtog pa'i phyin ci log gis bcings so/_/'du shes 'dzin pas 
[\[286a.7\]]bcings so/_/g.yo ba dang /_rlom sems dang /_spros pas bcings so/_/mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pas bcings pa yin te/_sdig can 'di la chos gang yang bcings pa yang med/_grol ba yang med do/_/de ci'i 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]phyir zhe na/_sdig can chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol bas chos thams cad grol ba ste/_sdig can chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/sdig can 'di ni ma bcings ma grol ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sgo 
[\[286b.2\]]des chos ston to/_/gang dag gis chos ston pa 'di shes pa de dag ni bcings pa las thar bar yang mi rtsol ba gang las thar bar 'gyur ba'i bcings pa yang mi dmigs so/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu mo bdun brgyas lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_spos 
[\[286b.3\]]dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pa'i lus la gtor nas/_rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe na bdud kyi bcing ba 'di las thar bar 'gyur/_rigs kyi bu des de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang bdud kyi bcing ba 
[\[286b.4\]]'khrugs par mi byed pa de ni bdud kyi bcing ba las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/bdud kyi bcing ba de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis yin te/_gang lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis 'khrugs par mi byed pa de bdud kyi bcing ba las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu mo de 
[\[286b.5\]]dag gis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar na lta bar gyur pa mi 'khrugs pa lags/_des smras pa/_lta bar gyur pa de dag ni chos gang gi nang du yang song ba yang ma yin/_ma song ba yang ma yin te/_de ltar gang du yang mi 'gro/_gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba 'di ni bdud kyi 
[\[286b.6\]]bcing ba las thar ba yin no/_/lta bar gyur pa de dag ni med pa yin te/_yod pa ma yin no/_/gang yod pa dang /_med par rnam par mi rtog pa de ni bdud kyi bcing ba las thar ba'o/_/lta bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni yongs su grub pa ma yin te/_gang chos thams cad kyi 
[\[286b.7\]]yongs su ma grub pa de ni bdud kyi bcing ba las thar ba'o/_/lta bar gyur pa de dag ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs/_ring ba yang ma yin/_nye ba yang ma yin te/_gang de ltar shes shing rlom sems med pa de ni bdud kyi bcing ba 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]las thar ba'o/_/lta ba de ni chos gang gi lta ba yang ma yin no/_/gang chos gang gi yang lta ba ma yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba gang yin pa de la ni mnyam pa'am mi mnyam pa med do/_/chos thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir gang 
[\[287a.2\]]na chos gang yang mnyam pa'am/_mi mnyam par byed pa yang med/_mi byed pa yang med pa de ni bdud kyi bcing ba las thar ba'o/_/de nas lha'i bu mo bdun brgyas bshad pa de thos nas 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/_rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang bdud kyi bcing ba'i yul 
[\[287a.3\]]gyis mi gos par gyur nas/_bdud kyi yul gyi bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can thams cad bdud kyi yul gyi bcings pa las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o zhes tshig de skad kyang smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas bdud 
[\[287a.4\]]sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di la sdig can khyod kyi g.yog lha'i bu mo 'di dag ni byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na da khyod kyis ji ltar bya/_bdud kyis smras pa/_de ji ltar bgyi/_bdag ni bcing ba lngas bcings na/_de ji ltar bgyi ma 'tshal to/_/smras pa/_sdig 
[\[287a.5\]]can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang /_bcings pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu mo de dag gis kyang sdig can la snying rje ba bskyed nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag gsol ba 'debs kyis sdig can khyod bla na 
[\[287a.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig_/bde ba la 'jigs par 'du shes ma skyed cig_/bde ba la sdug bsngal du 'du shes ma skyed cig_/thar pa la 'ching bar 'du shes ma skyed cig_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis sgyus byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_
[\[287a.7\]]gal te khyod byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa 'di slar gtong na/_nga byang chub tu sems skyed do zhes de skad kyi tshig kyang smras so/_/de nas bzod pa thob pa'i lha'i bu mo bdun brgya po de dag gis thabs mkhas pas bdud sdig can thar bar bya ba'i phyir/_gang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]gcig gi thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa yang de yin te/_sems de la ni mi mnyam pa med de/_sems de ni sems can thams cad mnyam pa'i sems so/_/de bas na sems de ni mnyam pa'o snyam nas/_bdag 
[\[287b.2\]]cag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de gtang gis sdig can khyod byang chub tu sems skyed cig ces de skad kyi tshig smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pa la bdud kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag byang chub tu sems bskyed 
[\[287b.3\]]kyis bcings pa 'di las thar bar gyur cig ces bdud sdig can gyis tshig de smras ma thag tu/_de nas bdud sdig can bdag thar par shes par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas de'i tshe gang du bdud kyi gnas thams cad snang bar gyur 
[\[287b.4\]]pa dang /_bdud sdig can 'di lta ste/_dper na snag tsha'i phung po bzhin du bdag la mog mog por mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od kyang lus las phyung /_de lta bu'i bdag gi lus yongs su grub pa yang bstan to/_/de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag gi nang nas lha mo 'dod 
[\[287b.5\]]chags la spyod cing chags pa nyis brgyas byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas chags par gyur to/_/chags nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te rigs kyi bu 'di dag bdag cag dang dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod 
[\[287b.6\]]par byed na/_bdag cag ni 'di'i sems kyi dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas lha'i bu mo nyis brgya gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir bdag gi lus kyi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang 'dra ba'i lha'i bu nyis brgya yang 
[\[287b.7\]]mngon par sprul/_khang pa brtsegs pa bdud kyi gzhal med khang gi dbyibs las lhag pa nyis brgya yang mngon par sprul pa dang /_lha'i bu mo de dag bdag cag de'i nang du zhugs so snyam du shes par gyur te/_re re zhing yang bdag 'di dang lhan cig tu rtse'o dga'o/_/dga' mgur 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]spyod do snyam du sems par gyur nas/_'dod pa la 'dod chags pa rgyun bcad pa/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pas sems kyis mos par gyur pa de dag la skyes bu dam pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[288a.2\]]bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bshad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song shig_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni bcing ba de 
[\[288a.3\]]las thar gyis bdag bar chad byed du 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas bdud sdig can gnyen 'dab dang /_g.yog dang /_bkod pa chen po dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slan chad dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[288a.4\]]'di ma 'chad cig_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe na bdag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming thos pa de'i tshe bdag zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings par 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na bka' mchid gzhan dag gsungs na legs so/_/slan chad dpa' bar 
[\[288a.5\]]'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma 'chad cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod bcings pa de las sus bkrol/_smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas bcings pa de las bkrol 
[\[288a.6\]]lo/_/smras pa/_sdig can khyod kyis de la ji lta bu zhig gis lan du phan btags/_smras pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa 'di lta 
[\[288a.7\]]ste dper na bdud sdig can gyis bcings pa las thar bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed kyi/_lhag pa'i bsam pas ni ma yin pa de bzhin du/_blo gros brtan pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la gang dge slong dang /_dge slong ma mang po dag rnyed 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur gyi lhag pa'i bsam pas ni ma yin no/_/blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i bye brag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i che ba nyid la 
[\[288b.2\]]ltos/_blo gros brtan pa dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag co dri ba'i phyir ram/_bsting ba'i phyir ram/_rim gro bya ba'i phyir ram/_gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ram/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir dpa' bar 
[\[288b.3\]]'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de nyid kyang /_blo gros brtan pa de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur na/_gang dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos te/_lhag 
[\[288b.4\]]pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lta ci smos te/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges par rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[288b.5\]]'di thos nas bcing ba las thar bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bdud sdig can gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin no/_/blo gros brtan 
[\[288b.6\]]pa bdud sdig can gyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bdud kyi las thams cad dang /_bdud kyi spyod pa thams cad dang /_bdud kyi g.yo thams cad dang /_bdud kyi sgyu thams cad dang /_gya 
[\[288b.7\]]gyu thams cad byang bar byas te/_spongs shing yongs su btang ste bor nas rim gyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang gnas de yod do/_/de nas byang 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[289a.2\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed na ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la lung ston par mdzad/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems las ni las/_las las ni rnam par smin par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar bdag mi smon na/_ji ltar na 
[\[289a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad kyi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub 
[\[289a.4\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_blo gros brtan pa byang chub tu sems ma bskyed par lung bstan pa yang yod do/_/sems bskyed ma thag tu lung bstan pa yang yod do/_/gsang ste lung bstan pa yang yod do/_/bzod pa thob nas mngon 
[\[289a.5\]]sum du lung bstan pa yang yod de/_blo gros brtan pa lung bstan pa bzhi po ni de dag yin te/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen gyi de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no/_/blo gros brtan pa de la byang chub tu sems ma bskyed par lung bstan 
[\[289a.6\]]pa gang zhe na/_blo gros brtan pa 'di la gang zag la la zhig yang na sems can dmyal ba'am/_yang na dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_yang na gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_yang na lha'am/_yang na mi'i nang du 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar skyes par gyur la/_gang zag de yang /_dbang po 
[\[289a.7\]]rno ba rgya chen po la mos pa yin na/_de la de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen te/_skyes bu gang zag 'di ni bskal pa 'di snyed/_bskal pa brgya phrag 'di snyed/_bskal pa stong phrag 'di snyed/_bskal pa brgya stong phrag 'di snyed/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]'di snyed na/_de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo zhig gi drung du byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur te/_de yang lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig tu byang chub 
[\[289b.2\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/grangs med pa brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig na byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[289b.3\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de byang chub thob nas ming 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'di snyed du 'gyur ro/_/de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni 'di snyed du 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe'i tshad ni 
[\[289b.4\]]'di tsam du 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i dam pa'i chos ni 'di srid du gnas so zhes blo gros brtan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di dang de bas kyang lhag pa dag rab tu mkhyen te/_blo gros brtan pa de ni byang chub tu sems ma bskyed par lung bstan pa zhes bya 
[\[289b.5\]]'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni de ring slan chad sems can thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sems can gang dag la byang chub tu yongs su 
[\[289b.6\]]smin pa'i dbang po mchis/_gang dag la ma mchis zhes bdag cag la ye shes de mi 'jug pas bcom ldan 'das de dag ma 'tshal nas/_de lta bu'i sems can dag la dman pa'i 'du shes skyed pas/_de'i slad du bdag cag ni nyams pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[289b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/'od srung tshig de ni legs par smras so/_/'od srung ngas kyang don de'i dbang mthong nas khyed la dge slong dag gang zag la tshod ma 'dzin cig_/dge slong dag gang zag gis gang zag la tshod bzung na nyams par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]nga'am/_gang gzhan yang nga dang 'dra ba dag gis tshod gzung ngo zhes de skad du chos bshad de/_'od srung bstan pa des na byang chub sems dpa'a'am/_nyan thos kyis sems can thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/'di la byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[290a.2\]]theg pa pa'i gang zag la la dag tu gyur ta re/_des na der bdag bsrung bar bya'o/_/blo gros brtan pa gzhan yang sems can la la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa/_sa bon btab pa/_sbyang ba byas pa/_dbang po rno ba/_rgya chen po la mos pa/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/_sems 
[\[290a.3\]]can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa/_sems bskyed ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa/_log par ltung ba'i chos can ma yin pa/_mi dal ba brgyad las 'das pa dag yod de/_de dag ni sems bskyed ma 
[\[290a.4\]]thag tu zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_ming brjod pa dang /_tshe'i mtha' brjod pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/_blo gros brtan pa de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gang zag de 'dra ba de dag gi bsam pa mkhyen nas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[290a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa de ni blo gros brtan pa sems bskyed ma thag tu lung bstan pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros brtan pa de la gsang ste lung bstan pa gang zhe na/_blo gros brtan pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' le lo can kha cig ji lta ji ltar lung ma bstan pa/_de lta 
[\[290a.6\]]de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson 'grus rtsom la/_byang chub sems dpa' de yang bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i phyir sbyin pa sna tshogs la mos pa yin/_tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir yi dam la brtan par 
[\[290a.7\]]gnas pa yin/_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas bzod pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgos pa yin/_mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba ltar dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su tshol bas brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa yin pas 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]dran pa dang shes bzhin la mkhas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pas shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin la/_de pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la spyod par byed cing de yang mtshan ma dang bcas pa byed pa dang bcas pa yin la/_de la byang chub 
[\[290b.2\]]sems dpa' gzhan dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dag 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa ngo mtshar na ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[290b.3\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_'di byang chub thob nas ming cir 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ji lta bur 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni ji lta bur 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji lta bur 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 
[\[290b.4\]]de dag gi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te/_ci nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis thos pa dang /_shes pa dang /_rtogs par 'gyur la/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs 
[\[290b.5\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' des mi shes mi mthong /_mi thos shing 'khor de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub thob nas ming 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di lta bur 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'di lta bur 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[290b.6\]]sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni 'di lta bur 'gyur ro/_/tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam du 'gyur ro zhes thos par 'gyur/_mthong bar 'gyur/_shes par 'gyur zhing /_de thos nas nem nur med pa dang /_som nyi med pa dang /_the tsom med par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de la ston 
[\[290b.7\]]pa'i 'du shes dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes dang /_'dren pa'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur la/_byang chub sems dpa' des ni bdag de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan par mi shes/_mi mthong /_mi rtogs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ste lung 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]bstan pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' la lung bstan pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis thos la byang chub sems dpa' des mi thos so/_/de la bzod pa thob nas mngon sum du lung 
[\[291a.2\]]bstan pa gang zhe na/_blo gros brtan pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba bsdus pa yin/_yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa mi dmigs par spyad pa dang /_bdag med pa'i chos la bzod pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa yin te/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa dag 
[\[291a.3\]]mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par mkhyen nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdun du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog_/bskal pa brgya stong 'di snyed kyis bla na med pa 
[\[291a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/khyod byang chub thob nas ming 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di lta bur 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'di lta bur 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni 'di lta 
[\[291a.5\]]bur 'gyur ro/_/tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam du 'gyur ro zhes bzod pa thob pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon sum du lung bstan pas lung ston te/_de'i rjes su bslabs nas sems can tshad med pa dag kyang byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub 
[\[291a.6\]]sems dpa' de yang mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam du mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/_blo gros brtan pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa bzhi pa zhes bya'o//_//bam po bzhi pa/_de nas bcom 
[\[291a.7\]]ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 'tshogs shing mchis pa las gang dag lung bstan pa 'di bzhis lung bstan pa dag mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]pa/_blo gros brtan pa yod do/_/gsol pa/_de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra bsgrags 'di dang /_khyim bdag dga' 'dod kyi bu 'di ni byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed par lung bstan to/_/
[\[291b.2\]]de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na yang byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu sems ma bskyed par lung bstan pas lung bstan pa tshad med pa dag yod do/_/blo gros brtan pa byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba ldan 'di dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di dang /_
[\[291b.3\]]de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na yang byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems bskyed ma thag tu phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pas lung bstan pa tshad med pa dag yod do/_/blo gros brtan pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpa' bo 'di dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khyad 
[\[291b.4\]]par blo gros 'di dang /_de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gsang ste lung bstan pas lung bstan pa tshad med pa dag yod do/_/blo gros brtan pa nga dang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di dang /_gang bskal pa bzang po 'di la 
[\[291b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba de dag thams cad bzod pa thob ste/_mngon sum du lung bstan pas lung bstan pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[291b.6\]]nas lung bstan pa'i bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar to/_/de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang ma lags na/_sems can gzhan gyi lta ci smos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin 
[\[291b.7\]]te/_blo gros brtan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa thams cad rtul ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smin par byas pa 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]de dag gis me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni gsang ste lung bstan pas lung bstan par mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bzod pa 
[\[292a.2\]]thob nas mngon sum du lung bstan pas lung bstan par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag bzod pa thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon sum du lung bstan pas lung bstan par mdzad na legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[292a.3\]]'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/_de nas kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs kha dog brgya stong du ma/_'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan 
[\[292a.4\]]dang /_shel gyi kha dog dang /_dngul gyi kha dog de dag zhal gyi sgo nas byung nas/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas te/_steng du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su mngon par 'phags nas/_gzi brjid kyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid 
[\[292a.5\]]zil gyis mnan te/_slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_
[\[292a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis lha'i bu 
[\[292a.7\]]mo dgu brgya thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ba 'di dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo lha'i bu mo dgu brgya po 'di dag gis 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]sangs rgyas lnga brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_phyis de bzhin gshegs pa grangs las 'das pa la bkur sti byed par 'gyur/_rim gro byed par 'gyur/_bsti stang byed par 'gyur/_mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/_bskal pa grangs med pa bdun brgya na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[292b.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo lha'i bu mo de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos te/_'chi ba'i dus byas ma thag tu bud med kyi lus las bsgyur te/_dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang lhan cig 'grogs 
[\[292b.3\]]shing mnyes par byed par 'gyur la/_rim gyis bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed do/_/mnyes par byas nas mi mnyes par mi byed de/_rim gro byed/_bkur sti byed/_bsti stang byed/_mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bdud sdig can 
[\[292b.4\]]gyis lha'i bu mo de dag lung bstan par rigs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi g.yog 'khor gang gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa de dag bdag gi dbang du mi 'gyur na/_de dag bdag gi slad bzhin du 'brang ba 
[\[292b.5\]]lta ci smos/_de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges par rig par bgyi'o/_/de nas lha'i bu mo de dag sems zhum par ma gyur nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can de skad ma zer/_yi chad 
[\[292b.6\]]par ma byed cig_/bdag cag ni khyod kyi yul las mi 'da' zhing mi ldog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdud kyi yul du 'gro ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba'i de bzhin nyid yin te/_de ltar na bdud kyi yul du 'gro ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[292b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/sdig can de lta bas na bdag cag ni de bzhin nyid las mi 'da'o/_/bdud kyi yul gyi chos nyid gang yin pa sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi chos nyid kyang de yin te/_de ltar na bdud kyi 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]yul gyi chos nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi chos nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/de bas na sdig can bdag cag ni chos nyid las mi 'da'o/_/bdud kyi yul yang chos gang yang rnam par rig par mi byed/_sangs rgyas kyi yul yang chos 
[\[293a.2\]]gang yang rnam par rig par mi byed de/_de ltar na bdud kyi yul dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul de ni rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin no/_/sdig can de bas na chos thams cad ni yul rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin te/_sdig can de bas na gang gi g.yog kyang ma yin/_g.yog 
[\[293a.3\]]ma yin pa yang ma yin no/_/de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la/_mi dga' bar gyur nas 'gro 'dod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod gang du 'gro/_smras pa/_
[\[293a.4\]]rigs kyi bu bdag ni gnas su mchi'o/_/smras pa/_de bas na sdig can khyod 'khor 'di nas kyang ma g.yo la/_bdag gi gnas su yang 'dug par gyis shig_/de nas bdud sdig can bdag nyid rang gi gnas su phyin pa snyam du shes so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' bdud 
[\[293a.5\]]kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod kyis ci mthong /_bdud kyis smras pa/_bdag nyid rang gi gnas su phyin par mthong ste/_rigs kyi bu kun dga'i ra ba nyams dga' ba 'di dag dang /_nags tshal nyams dga' ba 'di dag dang 
[\[293a.6\]]rdzing bu nyams dga' ba 'di dag dang /_chu bo nyams dga' ba 'di dag ni bdud kyi gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod kyis gnas 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[293a.7\]]spyad pa'i phyir phul cig_/smras pa/_phul lo/_/des bdag gi gnas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs shing dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad par mdzad/_ston par mdzad pa mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi gtsug lag khang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad par mdzad/_ston par mdzad pa dang /_gang gi bshos gsol te/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[293b.2\]]'di 'chad par mdzad pa'i sbyin pa po sbyin bdag gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i bsod nams ji tsam du 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas bshos gang gsol te byang chub thob pa dang /_bshos gang gsol te chos 
[\[293b.3\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_bshos gang gsol te dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad pa'i bshos de dag la tha dad pa cung zad kyang med do/_/kun dga' bo sa'i phyogs gang du byang chub thob pa'i sa'i phyogs rdo rje lta bu de ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar gyi bcom 
[\[293b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis yongs su spyad pa yin te/_kun dga' bo byang chub kyi snying po de ji lta ba de bzhin du sa'i phyogs gang du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan pa'am/_bshad pa'am/_yi ger bris pa'am/_lung phog pa la yang blta bar bya ste/_kun dga' bo de bzhin 
[\[293b.5\]]gshegs pa bshos gang gsol te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_chos smra bas sbyin pa po sbyin bdag gang gi zan zos te/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad dam/_ston tam/_lung 'bog par byed dam/_klog par byed pa zas de dag la tha dad pa cung zad kyang 
[\[293b.6\]]med do/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug lag khang gang na bzhugs shing cho 'phrul chen po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis sems can gdul bar mdzad pa dang /_gtsug lag khang ngam/_gnas khang ngam/_'chag sa'i sa phyogs gang dang gang du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 
[\[293b.7\]]'dzin 'di 'chad dam/_ston tam/_klog gam/_yi ger 'dri'am rjod na/_kun dga' bo gtsug lag khang de dag la tha dad pa cung zad kyang med do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can khyod kyis gnas khang 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la spyad pa'i phyir phul ba rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pa'i byin gyi rlabs yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi 
[\[294a.2\]]gos pa ni rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag gis rnam par 'phrul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pa ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te/_
[\[294a.3\]]rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag gis rnam par 'phrul par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis mi gos pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag 
[\[294a.4\]]gis rnam par 'phrul par byed do/_/bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyis kyang mi gos la bdud kyi spyod pa'i yul gyi spyod pa thams cad kyang ston to/_/'khrig pa'i dga' ba yang mi spyod la gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor bar yang snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas bdud rang 
[\[294a.5\]]gi gnas na gnas par yang ston la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor nas kyang mi g.yo'o/_/blo gros brtan pa byang chub sems dpa' ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas bdud rnams la bdud kyi yul yang ston/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang yongs su smin par byed do/_/de nas 
[\[294a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa ji lta bu bstan 
[\[294a.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis spyad pa de'i phyogs tsam zhig bka' stsal na/_legs so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/blo gros brtan pa ngas ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba bye ba brgya dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris bye ba brgya dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bye ba brgya dang /_'thab bral gyi lha bye ba 
[\[294b.2\]]brgya dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha bye ba brgya dang /_'phrul dga' bye ba brgya dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba brgya dang /_bdud kyi gnas bye ba brgya dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas bye ba brgya nas/_de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar du bye ba phrag brgya brgya dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang /_rgya 
[\[294b.3\]]mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_de rnams la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ste/_blo gros brtan pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 
[\[294b.4\]]'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_'dzam bu'i 
[\[294b.5\]]gling la lar ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par snang /_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni khyim na gnas par snang /_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni rab tu 
[\[294b.6\]]byung bar snang /_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas par snang /_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni khyim bdag tshong dpon du shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni ded dpon du shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni khams kyi rgyal por shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni 
[\[294b.7\]]blon por shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni sa'i rgyal por shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin du shes/_
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni tshangs par shes/_la lar ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris kyi dbang por shes/_la lar ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi dbang por shes/_la lar ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi dbang por shes/_la lar ni dga' ldan gyi lha 
[\[295a.2\]]rnams kyi dbang por shes/_la lar ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi dbang por shes/_la lar ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi dbang por shes/_la lar ni bdud du shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni tshong dpon du shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni khyim bdag tu shes/_
[\[295a.3\]]'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni khams kyi rgyal por shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni gzhon nur shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni blon por shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni ded dpon du shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni dga' ldan nas 'chi 'pho bar shes/_'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[295a.4\]]la lar ni ma'i mngal du 'jug par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni ma'i mngal na gnas par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni btsa' bar shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni gom pa bdun 'dor bar shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni phyogs bzhir lta zhing 'jig rten na nga 
[\[295a.5\]]gtso bo/_/'jig rten na nga mchog go zhes seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni mngon par 'byung bar shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni dka' ba spyod par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[295a.6\]]la lar ni zas za bar shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni rtswa len par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni byang chub kyi snying por 'dug par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bdud 'dul bar shes/_'dzam bu'i 
[\[295a.7\]]gling la lar ni byang chub thob par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni byang chub thob ste 'dug par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni byang chub thob nas bsam gtan byed par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag gsol ba 'debs par shes/_'dzam 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]bu'i gling la lar ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa sna tshogs mdzad par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar shes/_la lar ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes/_la lar ni yongs su mya ngan las
