[\[295b.2\]]'das par shes/_la lar ni sreg par shes/_la lar ni bsregs par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni lus gcig tu mkhregs par shes/_la lar ni ring bsrel 'ged par shes/_la lar ni chos nub par 'gyur bar shes/_la lar ni chos nub par shes/_la lar ni 
[\[295b.3\]]tshe dpag tu med par shes/_la lar ni tshe thung bar shes/_la lar ni ngan song du skye ba'i sgra yod par shes/_la lar ni ngan song du skye ba'i sgra yang med par shes/_la lar ni 'dzam bu'i gling lha'i longs spyod dang 'dra bar shes/_la lar ni sems can dag nga dang bdag gir mi 
[\[295b.4\]]'dzin pas 'dzam bu'i gling byang gi sgra mi snyan dang 'dra bar shes/_la lar ni rin po che'i gling du shes/_la lar ni sa'i gling du shes/_la lar ni rab/_la lar ni 'bring /_la lar ni tha mar shes pa de ni blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa yin te/_
[\[295b.5\]]de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang 'di 'dra ba'i bkod pas rnam par rtsen pa ston par mdzad pa la ltos/_blo gros brtan pa 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 
[\[295b.6\]]yang da lta na yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor la/_'dzam bu'i gling gzhan dag tu'ang da dung mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas par yang shes/_la lar ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni dang po sems bskyed par shes te/_blo gros brtan pa 
[\[295b.7\]]de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa'o/_/de nas 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]yin pa de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du rnam par rol pa'i bkod pa 'di lta bu bstan par gyur tam/_'on te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu yang 
[\[296a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug snyam pa dang /_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de dag gi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag sangs rgyas kyi yul du spyad pa spyod cing /_
[\[296a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed drug cu 'das nas steng gi phyogs su mchis pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma gcig ces bgyi ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhig chos ston te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du 
[\[296a.4\]]mchis nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das khyod mtshan ci/_ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod song la de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub 
[\[296a.5\]]pa de nyid la zhus shig dang /_de nyid khyod la lan 'debs par mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de ni bskal par yang bsngags pa mthar phyin par bya ba dang /_bde ba'i rgyu rnams bshad mi nus te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa 
[\[296a.6\]]ni de 'dra'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang mi grag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ston pa shin tu yongs su dag pa'i dge 'dun lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma gcig pa na/_da ltar de 
[\[296a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa de'i mtshan de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bka' stsal du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/thos nas kyang khyed kyis skrag par mi bya/_dngang bar mi bya/_dngang bar 'gyur bar mi bya/_the tsom du mi bya/_nem nur du mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab/_
[\[296b.2\]]dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa'i yul la 'jug pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma gcig pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi chos thams cad ston par snang ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po 
[\[296b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa ni 'jam dpal nga nyid yin na/_'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma gcig pa zhes bya ba de na yon tan gyi chos thams cad ston par snang ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes te/_nga nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'jug go/_/'jam dpal nga nyid de na phyir 
[\[296b.4\]]mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni nga nyid kyis sngon yongs su sbyangs pa'o/_/'jam dpal de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du nga'i yul la 'jug go_/der ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi chud do/_/gang gi phyir byang 
[\[296b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par sems can rnams la chos ston par yang byed la/_ting nge 'dzin 'di dang /_chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ba 'di ni 'jam dpal dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul yin no/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 
[\[296b.6\]]'khor ram/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gzhal med khang las kyang mi g.yo la/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du ston par byed kyang sems can dmus long dag gis ni mi shes mi mthong gi_/snod ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[296b.7\]]snang zhing shes pa'i phyir sems can mig gi las ji ltar yongs su dag pa rnams la gzhal med khang de snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'jam dpal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas/_ting nge 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di las kyang mi g.yo zhing chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las kyang mi g.yo la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams su yang sems can rnams la ston par byed cing /_sems can ji ltar mos pa dag la de bzhin du chos ston te/_sems 
[\[297a.2\]]can snod du ma gyur pa dag ni ji ltar dmus long gi sems kyis ma shes ma mthong ba bzhin no/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_mchog tu dga' ba la gnas so/_/gang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma 
[\[297a.3\]]yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la me tog sil mas gtor to/_/sil snyan yang dkrol to/_/me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dag kyang gtor to/_/nyan 
[\[297a.4\]]thos chen po de dag gis kyang bdag bdag gi bla gos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang me tog gi skon bu ri rab dang mnyam pa dang /_tsan dan dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor 
[\[297a.5\]]te tshig 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das gang na dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rab tu spyod pa'i sa'i phyogs de ni rdo rje lta bu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad pa thos nas mos par bgyid/_yid ches par bgyid/_mi skrag mi dngang 
[\[297a.6\]]dngang bar mi 'gyur gyi/_len par bgyid/_'dzin par bgyid/_klog par bgyid/_kun chub par bgyid/_'chad par bgyid pa'i sems can de dag kyang rdo rje lta bur 'gyur te/_bzod pa mi phyed pa/_dad pa la gnas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su zin pa/_dge 
[\[297a.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bgyis pa/_rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa/_bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/_ltung ba bcad pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis shin tu zin pa dag lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_gang dpa' bar 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos ma thag tu mos pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can dag gis ni bstan pa 'di 
[\[297b.2\]]thos nas yid ches par mi nus te/_rigs kyi bu gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la mos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni nyung ngo /_/gang dag spong zhing mos par mi 'gyur ba dag ni mang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin 'di la mos 
[\[297b.3\]]par nus so/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_des sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las ting nge 'dzin 'di sngon chad thos pa yin/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa yin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang rgya chen po la mos pa 
[\[297b.4\]]yin/_theg pa chen po 'di la lus mngon du byas pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu dag chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin 'di la mos pa'am/_yid ches par sla'o/_/dgra bcom pa brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'am/_
[\[297b.5\]]dad pas rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas mos pa yin gyi/_de dag 'di la mngon sum du gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rtogs par khong du chud par mi nus na/_sems can gzhan 
[\[297b.6\]]dag gis lta ci smos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na mi dmus long la la zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na mig rnyed de gzugs kyi rnam pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas/_de'i rmi lam na tshim 
[\[297b.7\]]zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas sems can mig dang ldan pa gzhan dag dang /_'greng ba'am/_mchis pa'am/_'chag pa'am/_smra bar bgyid pa las/_bcom ldan 'das mi dmus long de sad pa dang /_mi de dmus long 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]nyid lags te/_gzugs dag mi mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe bdag cag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thos pa de'i tshe/_bdag cag yi rangs te/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes par gyur la/_bdag cag ni lha'i mig dang ldan pa'o/_/
[\[298a.2\]]snyam du 'tshal cing byang chub sems dpa' dag dang smra bar bgyid pa zhig na gang gi slad du da ltar bcom ldan 'das las dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa de'i slad du bdag cag dmus long du gyur te/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar gnas pa dang /_
[\[298a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' dag ji ltar spyod pa ma 'tshal mi mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul la spyod pa ma 'tshal ba'i slad du/_bdag ni de ring slan chad bdag nyid la dmus long lta bur 'tshal to/_/gang dag shes pa la bzod pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[298a.4\]]la ni lha'i mig dang ldan par 'dzin te/_phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems ma mchis par su zhig bdag la ye shes dang ldan pa'am/_sbyin gnas so zhes khas 'che bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes de rtogs par 
[\[298a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/'di la ni nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes kyis rtogs pa 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_ye shes kyis rtogs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis khong du 
[\[298a.6\]]chud par 'gyur ro/_/gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha dang mi'i srog chags brgya stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[298a.7\]]'jam dpal sbyin pa'i gnas sbyin pa'i gnas zhes bgyi ba/_'jam dpal ji tsam gyis na sbyin pa'i gnas zhes bgyi/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i gnas sbyin pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni gang chos bcu dang ldan pa yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la gnas pa yang yin la/_nges par gyur pa la yang mi 'jug pa dang /_bden pa bzhi yongs su shes pa yang yin la/_'bras bu thob par yang mi byed pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi bsam gtan la 
[\[298b.2\]]bsam gtan pa yang yin la/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang mi gtong ba dang /_rig pa gsum dang ldan pa yang yin la/_khams gsum na yang spyod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs su gnas pa yang yin la/_sgra'i rjes su song zhing pha rol las 
[\[298b.3\]]thos pa tshol bar yang mi byed pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs su gnas pa yang yin la/_spobs pa thogs pa med pas chos kyang ston pa dang /_gcig pu mnyam par gzhag pa yang yin la/_sems can thams cad smin par bya ba'i spyod pa rnams 
[\[298b.4\]]na yang snang ba dang /_lam las kyang ma 'das la/_lam ngan pa na yang snang ba dang /_shin tu kun tu chags par yang snang la/_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral bar yang gyur pa dang /_shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang yin la/_'khor ba'i 
[\[298b.5\]]spyod pa 'khrugs par mi byed/_gtong bar yang mi byed pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na sbyin pa'i gnas zhes bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[298b.6\]]sbyin pa'i gnas kyi nang na mchog tu bka' stsal na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gang chos bcu po 'di dag bshad pa'i chos de dag gi nang na gnas brtan rab 'byor snang ngam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la 'di 
[\[298b.7\]]skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de las chos gcig kyang kho bo la med na bcu lta ci smos/_smras pa/_'o na da ji ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor sbyin pa'i gnas kyi nang na mchog ces bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' dang bskrun tam/_
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang bskrun te/_sbyin pa'i gnas kyi nang na mchog go zhes ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal gyi/_rigs kyi bu kho bo ni nyan thos rnams dang bskrun te/_sbyin pa'i gnas kyi nang na mchog go zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[299a.2\]]bka' stsal to/_/blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste dper na mtha' 'khob kyi gling na gnas pa la ni khams kyi rgyal po khams kyi rgyal po zhes bshad mod kyi/_gang gi tshe na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' 'khob kyi gling du song ba na de la khams kyi rgyal po zhes mi brjod kyi/_de ni 'khor los 
[\[299a.3\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po yin pas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos khams kyi rgyal po de zil gyis gnon to/_/blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa de dag na bdag sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/_gang 
[\[299a.4\]]gi tshe der de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs sam/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa la la zhig gnas par gyur na de'i tshe kho bo sbyin pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro ste/_kho bo byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyis zil gyis mnan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[299a.5\]]'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te rab 'byor 'di ltar nyan thos chen po mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa 'di bstan pa legs so legs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal mang 
[\[299a.6\]]du thos pa mang du thos pa zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal ji tsam gyis na mang du thos pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu mang du thos pa mang du thos pa zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe thos ma thag tu chos kyi sgo'i tshig gcig gi dris pa'i lan rnam par phye ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 
[\[299a.7\]]gyur du bskal pa'am/_bskal pa brgyar ston kyang chos kyi sgo de'i tshig dang spobs pa yongs su bri bar yang mi 'gyur bas na de'i phyir mang du thos pa zhes bya ste/_blo gros brtan pa de tsam gyis na mang du thos pa mang du thos pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros brtan pa gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i sangs 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa/_grangs med pas bshad pa kun 'dzin kyang de la tshig gcig kyang sngon ma thos pa'i rnar grags par mi 'gyur gyi gang ci thos kyang de thams cad mngon thos pa nyid thos pa yin gyi/_ma thos pa las thos pa ma yin pa dang /_mi brjed pa'i chos can du gyur pa'i 
[\[299b.2\]]phyir ji ltar thos pa kun 'dzin pa dang /_sems can med pa'i phyir sems can la de ltar chos 'chad cing bdag gam/_sems can nam/_chos la kun tu rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'du shes su yang mi byed pa yin te/_blo gros brtan pa de tsam gyis na mang du thos pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[299b.3\]]lha'i bu zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan kun dga' bo ni mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog go zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na/_ci gnas brtan kun dga' bo 
[\[299b.4\]]ji ltar na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa'i mang du thos pa de 'dra ba dang ldan nam/_kun dga' bos smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni mi ldan te/_kho bo ni ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa de 'dra ba'i mang du thos pa dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'o na ji ltar na 
[\[299b.5\]]gnas brtan kun dga' bo mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog go zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal smras pa/_lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos pha rol gyi sgra'i rjes su song zhing pha rol gyi sgra la mos pas rnam par grol ba la gtod pa gang su dag yod pa de dag tshad mar byas nas/_
[\[299b.6\]]kho bo mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog go zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gyi/_lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi rgya mtsho thogs pa med cing tshad med la shes rab dang spobs pa zad mi shes pa dag gi nang na mang du thos pa'i mchog go zhes bka' ma stsal to/_/lha'i bu 'di lta 
[\[299b.7\]]ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag ni nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyis na snang ba rnams kyi las dag kyang byed gzugs rnams kyang mthong ngo /_/lha'i bu de bzhin du shes rab kyi snang ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du 'dzin 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]gyi/_lha'i bu de la kho bo skyes bu'i mthur ni mi blta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu'i mthu nyid du blta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan kun dga' bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so legs so/_/kun dga' bo de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras 
[\[300a.2\]]pa bzhin te/_khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus kun chub par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dge slong kun dga' bos chos kun chub par byas pa ni nyung gi_/gang dag kun chub par ma byas pa ni dpag tu med do/_/lha'i bu 
[\[300a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji snyed mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos 'dul ba de las bye ba'i cha'am/_bye ba stong gi cha'am/_bye ba brgya stong gi cha'i cha shas kyang ngas ma bshad do/_/ngas gang bshad pa de las bye ba brgya stong gi cha shas kyang dge slong kun dga' bos ma bzung 
[\[300a.4\]]ngo /_/lha'i bu nga ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa'i brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dag dang /_nyin zhag gcig cig chos kyi 'bel pa'i gtam bshad pa 
[\[300a.5\]]dang /_dris pa rnam par phye ba bshad pa dang /_mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /_skyes pa'i 
[\[300a.6\]]rabs kyi sde dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /_rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /_gtan la dbab par bstan pa'i sde rnams bshad pa dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa 'jug pa bshad pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa bshad pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[300a.7\]]rgyas kyi theg pa bshad pa dang /_'khor ba smad pa bshad pa dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i yon tan gyi phan yon bshad pa 'chad par byed na/_lha'i bu chos bshad pa de las rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems can mang du thos 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]pa dge slong kun dga' bo dang 'dra ba dag gis kyang bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang thams cad chub par sla ba ma yin no/_/lha'i bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bshad pa ni dpag tu med de/_de la dge slong kun dga' bos ni nyung zad cig kun 
[\[300b.2\]]chub par byas su zin gyi/_gang dag kun chub par ma byas pa dag ni dpag tu med do/_/de nas lha'i bu zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying pos rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs 'bum bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/_gdugs de dag gis bar snang yog par snang ste/_sems can gdugs de 
[\[300b.3\]]dag gis ji snyed yog pa de dag thams cad kyi lus kyang gser gyi kha dog tu snang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu des gdugs de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul nas 'di skad kyi tshig smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[300b.4\]]chos bshad pa dang /_ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i dran pas chos 'dzin pa de lta bu de 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang /_chos 'chad pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/_blo gros brtan pa lha'i bu 'di ni bskal pa bzhi 
[\[300b.5\]]khri bzhi stong na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i gdugs gcig pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lha'i bu de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/
[\[300b.6\]]gtam 'di brjod pa'i tshe 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i srog chags nyis brgya sems zhum par gyur nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos dag kyang de lta bu yin/_'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang 'gyur bar dka' ba yin te/_bdag cag gis ni gnas de yongs su rdzogs 
[\[300b.7\]]par byed mi nus kyis bdag cag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya gor ma chag go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang phyir ldog pa de ni rang byang chub 'thob bo zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so snyam mo/_/de nas 'jam dpal 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems zhum pa nyis brgya po de dag gi sems rab tu 'dzin pa la brten nas/_kye ma 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do zhes de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir 
[\[301a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa rnam par snang ba zhes bgyi ba zhig byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag bskal pa rnam par snang ba de la lan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu rang sangs 
[\[301a.3\]]rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de the tsom du gyur nas/_'di ji lta bu zhig_/'di ci gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la nying mtshams sbyor ba med na/_ji ltar na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[301a.4\]]bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba/_bskal pa rnam par snang ba la lan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes de skad smra snyam mo/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[301a.5\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis na/_ji ltar na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di mya ngan las 'das nas nying mtshams sbyor bar bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i 
[\[301a.6\]]bu khyod kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig dang /_de nyid khyod la lan ldon par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la 'gro ba med cing 
[\[301a.7\]]nying mtshams sbyor ba med na/_'jam dpal khyod ji ltar na 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba bskal pa rnam par snang ba la lan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das zhes smra/_khyod kyis 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]smras pa'i don ji ltar blta bar bya/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_bden par gsung ba/_yang dag par gsung 
[\[301b.2\]]ba/_slu bar mi mdzad pa yin no/_/de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bslu bar mi nus te/_de ni 'dir kho bo'i dbang yin te/_gal te kho bo gzhan du smra bar gyur na/_kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa bslus par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na btsun pa shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal 
[\[301b.3\]]pa rnam par snang ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_des lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos lo 'bum du 
[\[301b.4\]]gnas par gyur to/_/de ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu dam pa'i chos de nub nas sems can de dag rkyen gyi stobs can du gyur te/_rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam gyis gdul nus par 'gyur ba ma gtogs par gal te de dag la sangs rgyas brgya stong gis chos bshad du zin kyang de dag chos 
[\[301b.5\]]bshad pa la mos par mi 'gyur te/_sems can de dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa sha stag go/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gang la sems can de dag gis yon dbul bar bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas 'ga' yang ma byung nas/_shA ri'i bu kho bo ni sems can de dag 
[\[301b.6\]]yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid rang sangs rgyas su khas 'ches te/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor gang dang gang du gnas pa de dang der rang sangs rgyas su 'du shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam yang bstan cing rang sangs 
[\[301b.7\]]rgyas kyi cha byad kyang bstan pas kho bo la sems can de dag gus pa dang bcas shing rim gro bskyed nas bsod snyoms sbyin par byed do/_/kho bos bsod snyoms de dag khas blangs nas sems can snod du gyur pa ji snyed pa'i sems can de dag la chos bshad do/_/bshad nas kyang 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]kho bo ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bar snang la 'phags te/_de na sems can de dag bdag la dad par gyur pas phyag 'tshal zhing /_bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag thob par gyur cig ces de skad kyi tshig kyang smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des 
[\[302a.2\]]na sems can mang po dag dge ba'i rtsa ba la yongs su smin par byas so/_/gang gi tshe na kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni bsod snyoms kyis skye'o snyam du shes pa de'i tshe kye grogs po dag bdag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab kyis/_bdag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o 
[\[302a.3\]]zhes sgra phyung ste/_de na yang sems can brgya stong mang po dag me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dag thogs nas 'ong ngo /_/kho bo ni 'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug cing smon lam gyi dbang gis yongs su 
[\[302a.4\]]mya ngan las 'das so/_/sems can de dag gis kyang kho bo yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes nas lus bsregs so/_/bsregs nas kyang mchod rten byed cing de dag mchod rten de la mchod pa'i las byed de/_de ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu kho bo la der yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 
[\[302a.5\]]'du shes so/_/yang gnyis su na kho bo rgyal po'i pho brang gzhan zhig tu song nas kho bo rang sangs rgyas su khas 'ches so/_/sems can de dag kyang kho bo la rang sangs rgyas su 'du shes nas bsod snyoms sbyin par byed de/_de dag gi nang du yang kho bo yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 
[\[302a.6\]]bstan cing de dag kyang kho bo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa byed do/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des kyang rnam par snang ba'i bskal pa bar ma de la kho bo lan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_
[\[302a.7\]]rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du yang kho bos srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la btul lo/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yin mod kyi shin tu yongs su mya ngan las kyang mi 'da'o/_/'jam 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa 'di'i lan btab ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to/_/lha brgya stong dag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char yang 
[\[302b.2\]]'bebs so/_/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sgra yang 'byin to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang mthong /_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yang thos te/_rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do/_/
[\[302b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa ngo mtshar na/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bu 'di ston par bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[302b.4\]]stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag 'di la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bu 'di ston te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yang yin la gzhan gyi dad pas 'gro ba yang ma 
[\[302b.5\]]yin/_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yang yin la chos nyid dang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba las nyams pa yang ma yin/_brgyad pa yang yin la log pa brgyad du lhung ba'i sems can rnams kyi phyir bskal pa grangs med par spyod pa yang yin/_rgyun du zhugs pa yang yin la sems can rgyun 
[\[302b.6\]]phyogs su ded pa rnams kyi phyir nyan thos rnams kyi skyon med par yang mi ltung /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang yin la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba yang yin/_phyir mi 'ong ba'ang yin la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du yang 'ong /_dgra bcom pa'ang yin la sangs 
[\[302b.7\]]rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin/_nyan thos kyang yin la spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la chos 'chad pa yang yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyang yin la sems can rkyen gyi stobs can rnams kyi ched du bskal pa grangs med 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]par spyod par yang byed/_sems can rkyen gyi mthu che ba rnams kyi phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang ston la ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis kyang skye ba yin te/_lha'i bu dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa ni 'phags 
[\[303a.2\]]pa'i tha snyad thams cad kyis kyang tha snyad 'dogs shing /_sems can ji lta bu'i sa la gnas pa de dag la yang chos ston la sa de la gnas par yang mi byed do//_//bam po lnga pa ste tha ma/_de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bshad pa de thos nas rab tu dga' ste tshig smras 
[\[303a.3\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag nyan thos kyi skyon med pa la zhugs pa dang /_gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa la zhugs pa'i sems can de dag gis ni mdud par bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di las nyams pa lags so/_/
[\[303a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang ldan pas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa ni legs kyi/_dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni de lta ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang ldan pas ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[303a.5\]]'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems kyang bskyed la/_des sngon sdig pa'i las bgyis pas ni sems can dmyal bar yang mchi mod kyi/_'on kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nang du yang chud par mchi'o/_/dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa shin tu 
[\[303a.6\]]bslabs pa snod du ma gyur pas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ci zhig bgyir mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na sbrang rtsi'am/_mar ram/_'bru mar gyi sbyin pa chen po bgyid pa'i tshe/_mi mang po snod thogs te mchis pa las/_de na mi zhig dran pa nyams 
[\[303a.7\]]pas snod chag par gyur na/_de sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dang /_'bru mar gyi sbyin gtong bgyid pa der mchis su lags kyang /_snod chag pa'i slad du ci bgyir yang ma mchis te/_de bdag ci yog pa zhig 'tshal nas mchi bar bas kyi/_sems can gzhan dag la 'drangs par bgyi zhing 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]bstabs pa'i slad du blangs te mchi ni mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das mi gang dag snod dang ldan pa ni bdag kyang ci yog tu 'tshal la/_snod kyang yongs su bkang nas blangs te mchis pas sems can gzhan dag gi yang nye bar 'tsho ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang sbrang rtsi dang /_mar 
[\[303b.2\]]dang /_'bru mar gyi sbyin gtong gi mchod sbyin zhes bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/snod chag pa'i mis ci yog par 'tshal te mchi bar bas kyi blangs te mchi mi nus so zhes bgyi ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/
[\[303b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das snod dang ldan pa'i mi zhes bgyi ba de ni bdag la phan pa dang /_gzhan la phan pa'i slad du zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems zhum pa rang gi rang bzhin la slar 'jug 'dod par gyur pa nyis brgya po de dag gis lha'i 
[\[303b.4\]]bu dag gi bshad pa 'di dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas/_lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_yang sems bskyed pa de byang chub dang 'brel bar gyur to/_/'di skad kyi tshig kyang smras 
[\[303b.5\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni srog yongs su gtong bar yang spro'i sems can yongs su gtong ba ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu thob par gyur cig_/
[\[303b.6\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la dad pa'i stobs dang /_mang du thos pa mi brjed pa'i stobs dang /_'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs dang /_sems can rnams la snying rje chen po brtan pa'i stobs dang /_
[\[303b.7\]]gtong ba spel ba'i sems kyi stobs dang /_tshul khrims yang dag par bslabs pa mi nyams pa'i stobs dang /_bzod cing dang du len pa'i stobs dang /_bdud 'dul ba'i shes rab kyi stobs dang /_chos zab mo la mos pa'i stobs te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu po de dag thob par gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa da ltar ram/_nga 'das nas kyang rung ste/_gang la la zhig gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 
[\[304a.2\]]'dzin 'di mnyan te thos nas mos par byed na/_de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/yang de'i tshe na 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[304a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i blo gros stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[304a.4\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams 'tshal bas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi'o/_/shes rab 'tshal bas thos pa la brtson par bgyi'o/_/mtho ris 'tshal bas tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/longs spyod 'tshal bas sbyin pa spel bar bgyi'o/_/gzugs 
[\[304a.5\]]'tshal bas bzod pa bsgom par bgyi'o/_/spobs pa 'tshal bas bla ma la gus par bgyi'o/_/gzungs 'tshal bas nga rgyal ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/ye shes 'tshal bas tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa dang ldan par bgyi'o/_/bde ba 'tshal bas sdig pa thams cad mi bgyi'o/_/
[\[304a.6\]]sems can gyi don bgyid par 'tshal bas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/sgra snyan par 'tshal bas bden pa smra bar bgyi'o/_/yon tan 'tshal bas rab tu dben pa la dga' bar bgyi'o/_/chos 'tshal bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par bgyi'o/_/zhi gnas 
[\[304a.7\]]'tshal bas 'du 'dzi mang po ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/lhag mthong 'tshal bas chos la stong par so sor brtag pa mang bar bgyi'o/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'tshal bas tshad med pa bzhi la bsgom par bgyi'o/_/lha'i dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'tshal bas dge ba bcu'i 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par bgyi'o/_/mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal bas chos la stong par mos par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bsod nams 'tshal ba dang /_shes rab 'tshal ba dang /_mtho ris 'tshal ba dang /_longs spyod 'tshal ba dang /_gzugs 
[\[304b.2\]]'tshal ba dang /_spobs pa 'tshal ba dang /_gzungs 'tshal ba dang /_ye shes 'tshal ba dang /_bde ba 'tshal ba dang /_sems can gyi don 'tshal ba dang /_sgra snyan pa 'tshal ba dang /_yon tan 'tshal ba dang /_chos 'tshal ba dang /_zhi gnas 'tshal ba dang /_lhag mthong 'tshal ba 
[\[304b.3\]]dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'tshal ba dang /_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'tshal ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das don thams cad rtogs par 'tshal ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid mnyan par bgyi/_
[\[304b.4\]]blang bar bgyi/_gzung bar bgyi/_bklag par bgyi/_bshad par bgyi/_bsgom par bgyi'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la ji ltar nan tan bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal ba'i blo gros gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[304b.5\]]chos thams cad ma zhugs par mthong ba de'i tshe/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la zhugs pa yin no/_/rgyal ba'i blo gros gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad thogs pa med pa dang /_skad cig pa dang /_ya ma brla dang /_rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang 
[\[304b.6\]]bral bar mthong ba de'i tshe/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la zhugs pa yin no/_/rgyal ba'i blo gros 'on kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni nan tan gcig tu ma zad kyi rgyal ba'i blo gros dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la nan tan byed pa'i rgyu ni sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[304b.7\]]sems dang spyod pa'i rgyu ba ji snyed pa de snyed yod do/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi nan tan 'jug pa yod do/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rgyu ba ji snyed 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]pa de snyed kyi nan tan 'jug pa yod do/_/sems can thams cad kyi ming dang gzugs ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa' des de snyed kyi ming dang gzugs bstan par bya'o/_/rgyal ba'i blo gros gang de ltar ston pa de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la nan tan byed pa'o/_/sangs 
[\[305a.2\]]rgyas thams cad kyi ming dang gzugs dang /_mtshan mthong ba ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa' des ming dang gzugs dang /_mtshan mthong ba de snyed bstan par bya ste/_rgyal ba'i blo gros gang de ltar ston pa de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la nan tan byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[305a.3\]]kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji snyed mthong ba byang chub sems dpa' des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mthong ba de snyed bstan par bya'o/_/rgyal ba'i blo gros gang de ltar ston pa de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la nan tan byed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[305a.4\]]'das la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la nan tan bgyi ba de ni shin tu bsgrub dka' ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal ba'i blo gros de'i phyir byang chub sems 
[\[305a.5\]]dpa' gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa ni nyung gi gang ting nge 'dzin ngan pa gzhan la spyod pa dag ni mang ngo /_/rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig 
[\[305a.6\]]gis thogs pa lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 
[\[305a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_dbang bskur ba thob pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul ston cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas de'i tshe de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo 
[\[305b.2\]]gros dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des de mthong ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dzam bu'i gling ji snyed pa de dag thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa snang ste/_la la na ni lha'i 'jig rten na gnas/_la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten na gnas/_la la 
[\[305b.3\]]na ni rab tu byung bar gyur/_la la na ni khyim na gnas par gyur/_la la na ni kun dga' bo bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yog byed/_la la na ni shA ri'i bu bzhin du shes rab che/_la la na ni maud gal gyi bu chen po bzhin du rdzu 'phrul che/_la la na ni 'od srung chen po bzhin du sbyangs pa smra/_la la 
[\[305b.4\]]na ni gang po bzhin du chos smra ba por gyur/_la la na ni sgra gcan zin bzhin du bslab pa 'dod par gyur/_la la na ni nye bar 'khor bzhin du 'dul ba 'dzin/_la la na ni ma 'gags pa bzhin du lha'i mig dang ldan/_la la na ni nam gru bzhin du bsam gtan par gyur/_la la na ni rab 
[\[305b.5\]]'byor bzhin du nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa'i mchog tu gyur to/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na nyan thos mchog bzhin du 'du shes te/_grong dang grong khyer la la na ni bsod snyoms spyod/_
[\[305b.6\]]la la na ni chos 'chad par byed/_la la na ni nang du yang dag par 'jog par snang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la 'jug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 
[\[305b.7\]]dga' mgu yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_gser khar ba dang /_mching bu dang /_lcags kyi dri ma dang bral ba rdul ma mchis pa ni gang dang gang du bdar ba de dang der gser gyi rigs bzang po mi 'dor ro/_/bcom 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag ni ji lta ji ltar brtags pa de lta de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos ston par bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[306a.2\]]ldan 'das bdag ji ltar sems pa ltar na/_gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i tshar phyin pa de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa tshar phyin/_de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa tshar phyin/_de ni theg pa chen po tshar phyin pa lags pa snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[306a.3\]]de de bzhin te/_gang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di tshar phyin pa de ni 'byung ba'i lam thams cad tshar phyin to/_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 
[\[306a.4\]]logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal cing bdag sems pa ltar na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis/_sngon byang chub kyi 
[\[306a.5\]]snying po bstan/_sngon chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_sngon yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa snyam bgyid do/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_'jam 
[\[306a.6\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas/_sngon byang chub kyi snying po bstan/_sngon chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_sngon yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan to/_/'od srung sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/_yangs 
[\[306a.7\]]pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu phyin pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam pa zhes bya ba ri dang rdo med pa/_bong ba dang /_gyo mo dang /_
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]gseg ma med pa/_lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/_ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i rtswa 'jam po skyes par gyur te/_der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten 
[\[306b.2\]]mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das klu'i rigs mchog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/_/der de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs mchog de bzhugs te/_byang chub thob bo/_/yang 
[\[306b.3\]]'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i rigs mchog des byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la ni bye ba phrag bdun cu yongs su smin par byas/_nyan thos kyi theg pa la ni bye ba phrag brgyad cu yongs su smin par byas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg 
[\[306b.4\]]pa la ni bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug yongs su smin par byas nas phyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs mchog de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med par gyur to/_/yang 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs mchog de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bzhi khrir gyur te/_des 
[\[306b.5\]]lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don byas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_de'i sku gdung dag kyang rgyas par gyur to/_/de'i mchod rten ni bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu gyur te/_de dag la sems can de dag gis mchod pa byas par gyur to/_/'od srung bcom ldan 'das klu'i 
[\[306b.6\]]rigs mchog de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos ni lo 'bum du gnas par gyur to/_/'od srung yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i rigs mchog des/_nga 'das pa'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' ye shes 'od ces bya 
[\[306b.7\]]ba 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_mtshan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od ces bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' ye shes 'od ces 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]bya ba lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/'od srung de ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam pa zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs mchog ces bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin no snyam na 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar 
[\[307a.2\]]mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'od srung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i rigs mchog ces bya bar gyur to/_/'od srung dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la ltos/_'di ltar 
[\[307a.3\]]mngal du 'jug pa dang /_btsas pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po dang /_ring 
[\[307a.4\]]bsrel 'ged par yang ston la/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid de yang mi 'dor/_shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas kyang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[307a.5\]]gang khyod 'di lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas dag ston pa ni khyod dka' ba byed pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung de ji snyam du sems/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di gang nas byung /_'jig rten gyi khams 'di gang nas byung /_smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[307a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni dbu ba ltar byung ste/_sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas mngon par grub bo/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin te/_chos thams cad kyang las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis 
[\[307a.7\]]mi khyab pa las byung ngo /_/de bas na 'dir kho bo la bya dka' ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni bcos ma/_rgyu la rag las pa/_bems po ste/_de dag ni bdag po med pa'i phyir ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par grub bo/_/gang gis tshul de rtogs pa de la ni 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]bya dka' ba ci yang med do/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag bden pa ma mthong ba de dag ni tshul 'di la mos par shin tu bya dka' ba yin gyi/_bden pa mthong ba de dag gi chos la gnas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de ni de lta ma yin te/_de dag ni ngo mtshar mi che'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 
[\[307b.2\]]'das steng gi bar snang la shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags nas skyil mo krung du bzhugs shing sku las kyang 'od gang gis phyogs bcu thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od btang ba dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des phyogs bcu 
[\[307b.3\]]na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad par mthong ngo /_/chos 'chad pa de yang chad pa med cing lhag pa med par 'di nas thos so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang steng gi bar snang la shing ta la bdun 
[\[307b.4\]]tsam du 'phags nas skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs par snang ngo /_/de dag thams cad kyis kyang sku las 'od btang bar snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor gang yin pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs par 
[\[307b.5\]]mthong ngo /_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dag kyang 'thor bar snang ngo /_/me tog de dag kyang song ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[307b.6\]]'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng gi drang thad na me tog gi gdugs su 'dug par snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 
[\[307b.7\]]dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba der me tog dag 'thor ro/_/me tog de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dbu'i gtsug gi steng gi drang thad na me tog gi gdugs su 'dug par snang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag bsdus 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]te/_gdan ji ltar bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba spel ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba'i cho 'phrul de bzhin gshegs pas bstan to/_/blo gros 
[\[308a.2\]]brtan pa de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i cho 'phrul 'dis lha dang mi brgyad stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i mthar phyin pa dang /_mur thug pa bstan pa bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 
[\[308a.3\]]dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan lnga brgyas kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu phyogs bcur sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang mthong bar gyur to/_/chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa la yang snang ba 
[\[308a.4\]]thob par gyur to/_/sa bcu pa yang thob cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba yang thob bo/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to/_/steng gi bar snang la lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dag kyang 
[\[308a.5\]]dkrol bar gyur to/_/me tog gi char yang bab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin long shig_/zung shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher 
[\[308a.6\]]shod cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin ri rab lhun po rtse mo 'dzin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_gnas brtan kun dga' bo dran pa'i ye shes phyogs gcig pa dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sgra'i rjes su mchis pa la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[308a.7\]]dkon mchog 'di gtad par mdzad dam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bden pa'i tshig gi bden pa gang gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di da ltar dang phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la rgyas par bgyid pa'i bden pa'i tshig gi bden pa des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i kho ra khor yug na shing 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]gang dag mchis pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi snying po'i shing ji lta ba de bzhin du gyur cig_/de dag thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' gnas par gda' bar gyur cig_/brgya byin lhun po'i rtse mo 'dzin gyis tshig de smras ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe shing de dag thams cad byang chub kyi 
[\[308b.2\]]snying po'i shing 'dra bar gyur to/_/byang chub kyi snying po'i shing de dag thams cad kyi drung na byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas par yang snang ngo /_/byang chub kyi snying po'i shing de dag las brgya byin lhun po'i rtse mo 'dzin khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_da ltar dang phyi ma'i tshe la khyod dpa' bar 
[\[308b.3\]]'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog 'di rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro zhes sgra byung ngo /_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_gal te de bzhin gshegs 
[\[308b.4\]]pa'i sku tshe bskal par gnas par gyur la/_nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te chos bshad nas chos bshad pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can ji snyed btul ba de snyed kyi sems can dul bar gyur pa bas/_gang yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 
[\[308b.5\]]nge 'dzin 'di bshad pa'i tshe sems can rnams kyi don bgyis pa ni de bas 'di ches mchog lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag thams cad ni nyan thos kyi theg par btul ba lags te/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 
[\[308b.6\]]mchi ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi mchi ste/_gang du byang chub sems dpa' dag nges par byung ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin de ni de tsam du tshad ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems 
[\[308b.7\]]dpa' nges par 'byung ba'i lam thams cad kyis nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam lags/_ji srid na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/_sangs rgyas 
[\[309a.2\]]kyi zhing sum khri nyis stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par spud pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs zhing 'tsho la gzhes shing 
[\[309a.3\]]chos kyang ston te/_blo gros brtan pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa nga'i tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam mo/_/blo gros brtan pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 
[\[309a.4\]]snang mdzad 'od zer gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de'i sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa khyod song la de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de nyid la zhus shig 
[\[309a.5\]]dang /_de nyid khyod la lan 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par spud pa zhes bya bar 
[\[309a.6\]]song ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad 
[\[309a.7\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam lags/_ji srid na shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa bzhin 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]te/_blo gros brtan pa tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa grangs med pa bdun brgya'o/_/nga'i tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 
[\[309b.2\]]'od zer gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor te/_skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[309b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa bdun brgya lags te/_nga'i tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam mo zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas sangs 
[\[309b.4\]]rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[309b.5\]]'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang /_bdag ji ltar sems pa ltar na/_bcom ldan 'das nyid 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par spud pa de'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes 
[\[309b.6\]]bgyi ba de lags te/_mtshan de nyid kyis sems can rnams la sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du chos 'chad do snyam bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/_legs so legs so/_/kun dga' bo khyod sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[309b.7\]]mthus rab tu shes so/_/nga nyid de yin te/_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par spud pa zhes bya ba de na sems can rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir ming de nyid kyis chos 'chad do/_/kun dga' bo de yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yin no/_/de nas bcom 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa de ltar na nga'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa grangs med pa bdun brgya ste/_de'i 'og tu shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/thams cad dang ldan 
[\[310a.2\]]pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad 'di thos nas mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces ngo mtshar to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das che ba'i bdag nyid rnams kyi bzhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul dang yon tan gyi khyad par bsam gyis mi khyab pa thugs su 
[\[310a.3\]]chud pa dang /_spyod pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa thams cad ngo mtshar te/_de ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa grangs med pa bdun brgya lags na/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ni sku tshe'i tshad thung bar gda'o/_/sems can thams cad kyis tshe'i tshad 
[\[310a.4\]]'di dang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par shog shig_/ces smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros brtan pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bshad pa 'di grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_yul 
[\[310a.5\]]lam/_ljongs sam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_dgon pa yang rung ste/_gang du spyod par 'gyur ba der bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha glags lta zhing klan ka tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/blo gros brtan pa chos smra ba de yang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 
[\[310a.6\]]yi ger 'dri'am/_klog gam/_lung nod dam/_kha ton byed dam/_'chang na/_mi'am mi ma yin pa las 'jigs par mi 'gyur bar re bar bya ba'i steng du/_de yon tan gyi bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyi shu thob par re bar bya'o/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsod 
[\[310a.7\]]nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_chos snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_chos kyi 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]sgor 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa'i snod bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi skad la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa dang /_
[\[310b.2\]]bsam pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sangs rgyas mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_chos thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_zhing gi 
[\[310b.3\]]yon tan bkod pa'i yon tan bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzugs dang /_mtshan mdzes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_bsngags pa dang /_yon tan dang /_snyan pa dang /_brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa sbyangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_
[\[310b.4\]]chos rtogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_blo gros brtan pa chos smra ba dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson pa yi ger 'dri'am/_klog gam/_lung nod dam/_kha ton byed dam/_ston na yon tan gyi bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyi shu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/_/blo gros 
[\[310b.5\]]brtan pa de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di'am tshe rabs gzhan la yon tan yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_bshad pa la brtson par bya'o/_/blo gros 
[\[310b.6\]]brtan pa yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pas bskal pa brgya phrag stong du pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa bas/_gang gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos ma thag tu sems ma zhum la mi skrag mi dngang /_dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing mos par byed na/_de ni ches 
[\[310b.7\]]myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur na gang gis thos nas lung 'bog pa'am gzhan la 'chad par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas mi 'jigs par 'dod pas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]dkon mchog 'di mnyan par bya'o/_/ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos nas mi spong bar 'dod pa dang /_ldem po ngag rtogs par 'dod pa dang /_ye shes mngon sum du gyur pa rtogs par 'dod pas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la mos par bya'o/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i 
[\[311a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad pa'i tshe sems can grangs med tshad med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs so/_/gang byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ni de bas kyang shin tu tshad med do/_/gang dag bzod pa thob par gyur pa ni de bas kyang shin tu tshad med do/_/
[\[311a.3\]]skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yang tshad med par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad stong gis ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/_/srog chags brgyad khri drug stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma nyi 
[\[311a.4\]]khri brgyad stong ni len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma brgyad khri drug stong ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/lha khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis ni chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/de 
[\[311a.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das la don las skyes pa'i tshig ji lta bu dag gis ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'das pa rnams kyi bslab pa slob cing 
[\[311a.6\]]lobs nas spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i don las skyes pa'i tshig bdag la bshad du gsol/_don las skyes pa'i tshig ji lta bus gzungs thob par 'gyur ba'i don las skyes pa'i tshig de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_de ni skye bo mang po 
[\[311a.7\]]la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_gang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus la/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]pas bskal pa bye ba du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_dam pa'i chos nub nas slar yang de dag chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar bgyid pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i slad du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_chos 
[\[311b.2\]]thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin nyid mthong ba dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcad par 'gyur ba dang /_mu stegs can gzhan spyod pa can dang /_kun tu rgyu dag tshar gcod cing 'joms par 'gyur ba dang /_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[311b.3\]]'khor lo dang /_ma g.yos pa'i 'khor lo dang /_mi gnas pa'i 'khor lo dang /_ma 'dres pa'i 'khor lo dang /_ma brnyas pa'i 'khor lo dang /_stong pa nyid kyi 'khor lo dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i 'khor lo dang /_smon pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i 'khor lo 
[\[311b.4\]]dang /_chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo dang /_tshig dang yi ge'i don yang dag par bstan pa'i 'khor lo dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i 'khor lo dang /_brjod du med pa'i 'khor lo dang /_phye ste brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'khor lo dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi 'khor lo dang /_
[\[311b.5\]]don mnyam par bstan pa'i 'khor lo dang /_chos rnams smos pa'i 'khor lo dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang /_chos thams cad la mi chags pa'i 'khor lo dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjes su skor bar 'gyur la/_'khor lo de bskor ma thag tu lha dang mir bcas pa'i 
[\[311b.6\]]'jig rten 'jigs shing dngangs par 'gyur ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das gang mngon pa'i nga rgyal can thams cad dang /_mu stegs can gzhan spyod pa can dang /_kun tu rgyu phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis ma lags pa'i don las skyes pa'i tshig rgya cher bshad du gsol/_de ni lha dang 
[\[311b.7\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu bar sems pa legs so legs so/_/
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]khyod ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi phyir zhugs pa 
[\[312a.2\]]yin no/_/'jam dpal khyod gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus skyes so/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[312a.3\]]kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni rgyu ba med pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug med pa'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/'jam dpal 
[\[312a.4\]]chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir kun nas slong ba med pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'bral ba med pa'i phyir ma 'khrugs pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i phyir 
[\[312a.5\]]dbyer med pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir 'du shes med pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni med pa'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_'du byed mi dmigs pa'i phyir ya ma brla'o/_/'jam 
[\[312a.6\]]dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni mig mi dmigs pa'i phyir mthong ba po med pa'o/_/'jam 
[\[312a.7\]]dpal chos thams cad ni sems mi dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i mu'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_sems can tshad med pa'i phyir tshad med pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_gnyen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gnyen po med pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_sna tshogs mi dmigs pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos 
[\[312b.2\]]thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_tha ma dang mchog dang mtshungs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir sna tshogs med pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_mi 'ong ba'i phyir mi 'pho ba'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_'byung ba med pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'o/_/'jam dpal 
[\[312b.3\]]chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ltos pa med pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir dus gsum las 'das pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[312b.4\]]dbye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_rnam par 'jig pa med pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par mi rig pa'i phyir ma zhig pa'o/_/'jam dpal chos thams 
[\[312b.5\]]cad ni 'di lta ste/_mi dmigs pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa yin te/_'jam dpal ma chags pa'i tshig de dag ni mtshan ma med pa'i tshig go/_/ma spros pa'i tshig go/_/rnyog pa med pa'i tshig go/_/ma nor ba'i tshig go/_/ma g.yos pa'i tshig go/_/mi 'phrogs pa'i tshig 
[\[312b.6\]]go/_/phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'o/_/nga rgyal can thams cad kyis zil gyis ma non pa'o/_/'di ni mu stegs can dang /_phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyis ma yin no/_/dmigs par lta ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_sems can du lta ba dang /_mtshan 
[\[312b.7\]]mar lta ba rnams kyis ma yin no/_/sems can 'du byed spyod pa thams cad kyis ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de dag ni don las skyes pa'i tshig rnams yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni des shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa thob cing /_chos thams cad kyang 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]rtogs par khong du chud pa yin no/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gnas pa/_de ltar zhugs pa dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams spobs pa nye bar sgrub bo/_/'jam dpal 'di 
[\[313a.2\]]lta ste/_dper na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can rigs btsun pa ni wa dang rkang pa bzhi pa 'ongs pa thams cad la ni mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur te/_tha na de spu zing zhes byed pa tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang 
[\[313a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa 'di lta bu dag la bslabs par gyur pa ni phas kyi rgol ba dang kun tu rgyu dmigs par lta ba can thams cad nas/_mngon par 'du byed pa can dag gi bar la mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[313a.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir yon tan gyi bye brag de 'dra bar 'gyur na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[313a.5\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnams lta ci smos/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs so/_/chos rnams thams cad mi gnas te/_/rang 
[\[313a.6\]]bzhin gyis ni dben pa'i phyir/_/de dag gi ni gnas med de/_/de phyir gnas pa med ces bya/_/chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/_/de dag dngos po yod ma yin/_/gang na dngos po med gyur pa/_/de ni chos kyi rnam dag yin/_/
[\[313a.7\]]dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/_/de na chags pa med pa yin/_/gang na chags pa med gyur pa/_/de yi phyir ni gzungs zhes bya/_/chos rnams thams cad de 'dra ste/_/de na tshig ni yod ma yin/_/chos rnams mang po'i rgya mtsho ni/_/de ni 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]gzungs zhes gsungs pa yin/_/gang na dngos po med gyur pa/_/de na de yang mi rtogs te/_/gang na bdag tu mi rtogs pa/_/gzungs nyid yin par shes par gyis/_/chos kun nye bar zhi ba ste/_/rang bzhin gyis ni mtshan nyid med/_/gang zhig ye shes 
[\[313b.2\]]der 'jug pa/_/de yang gzungs ni myur du 'thob/_/chos rnams thams cad g.yo ba med/_/de na 'jig rten med pa ste/_/gang na 'jig rten yod min pa/_/de ni gzungs zhes bya ba yin/_/chos kun grub pa med pa ste/_/gang na dngos po med pa dang /_/
[\[313b.3\]]gang na ci yang grub med pa/_/de ni gzungs zhes bya ba yin/_/chos rnams thams cad gzung du med/_/de la thog ma yod ma yin/_/gang la thog ma med gyur pa/_/de phyir gzungs su shes par gyis/_/chos rnams thams cad ma skyes te/_/rtogs pa 
[\[313b.4\]]las ni kun tu byung /_/gang na rtog pa med gyur pa/_/de phyir gzungs su shes par gyis/_/chos rnams thams cad med par gnas/_/mi rtog par ni bstan pa ste/_/'di la bstan pa cung zad med/_/des na bstan ces bya ba yin/_/chos rnams 
[\[313b.5\]]thams cad ma 'dres te/_/'di la ngo bo nyid kyang med/_/gang na chos su dmigs med pa/_/de ni de na tha dad med/_/chos rnams thams cad ma chags te/_/de ni nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra/_/chos kyi rang bzhin de yin te/_/gzungs zhes pa yang de yin 
[\[313b.6\]]no/_/chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid gcig_/'di na gcig kyang med pa ste/_/'di na rang bzhin tha dad med/_/de bas de dag mtshan nyid gcig_/chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med/_/de na dngos po med pa ste/_/gang na dngos po med gyur pa/_/de 
[\[313b.7\]]phyir gzungs zhes bya ba yin/_/chos rnams thams cad dben pas na/_/de na ngo bo nyid med de/_/gang na dngos po mi dmigs pa/_/de ni gzungs su shes par gyis/_/chos rnams thams cad mi gnas te/_/ldang ba byed pa'ang med pa yin/_/gang na 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]ldang ba med gyur pa/_/de ni mya ngan 'das zhes bya/_/chos kun mngon par 'dus ma byas/_/sems can dag kyang de na med/_/sems can rang bzhin gang yin pa/_/de ni gzungs zhes bya ba yin/_/chos rnams thams cad ma byas te/_/byed pa po yang de na med/_/gang dag las 
[\[314a.2\]]kyi bya ba med/_/de ni gzungs zhes bya ba yin/_/mig ni yod pa ma yin pas/_/chos rnams thams cad mthong ba med/_/gang na mig ni mi dmigs pa/_/de na med ces bya ba yin/_/sems ni yod pa ma yin pas/_/chos rnams rnam par shes dang bral/_/sems dang shes pa med pas 
[\[314a.3\]]na/_/rnam par shes pa med pa yin/_/gang na shes dang de bzhin du/_/mi shes pa yang med pa dang /_/gang na sems ni yod ma yin/_/de tsam gyis ni ye shes so/_/ji tsam du ni rnam rtog pa/_/ye shes dang ni mi shes 'gyur/_/rtog dang sgrib pa med gyur na/_/de la ye shes zhes kyang 
[\[314a.4\]]bya/_/chos rnams thams cad dngos po med/_/ming tsam du yang bshad pa ste/_/ye shes dang ni mi shes pa/_/de yang de bzhin shes par gyis/_/chos rnams thams cad med pa ste/_/'di na ci yang yod ma yin/_/gang na chos rnams yod min pa/_/de ni chos kyi mchog yin no/_/
[\[314a.5\]]chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/_/tshad med par ni bstan pa ste/_/sems can rang bzhin gang yin pa/_/de ni gzungs zhes bya ba yin/_/chos rnams thams cad gsog yin te/_/de la snying po yod ma yin/_/gang na snying po yod min pa/_/de ni gzungs kyi mtshan nyid yin/_/chos 
[\[314a.6\]]rnams thams cad gnyen po med/_/de ltar mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams kyi/_/gnyen po yod pa ma yin no/_/chos kun bye brag med pa ste/_/dam pa dang ni tha ma med/_/'di la 'dra ba gang yang med/_/de yi phyir ni gzungs zhes bya/_/mtshungs shing mnyam par 
[\[314a.7\]]zhugs pas na/_/chos kun la ni sna tshogs med/_/gang na sna tshogs yod min pa/_/de ni gzungs zhes bya ba yin/_/chos rnams thams cad med pas na/_/'dir ni 'ong ba yod ma yin/_/'dir ni gzhan yang 'pho ba med/_/der ni chos kyi chos nyid yin/_/chos rnams thams cad ma 'ongs 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]pas/_/'dir ni 'du bar 'gyur ba med/_/gang na 'du ba yod min pa/_/de ni gzungs zhes bya ba yin/_/chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/de ni yod dang med pa med/_/de ni 'dzin pa yod ma yin/_/de ni gzungs kyi mtshan nyid do/_/rang bzhin gyis ni bdag 
[\[314b.2\]]med pas/_/chos rnams thams cad ltos pa med/_/gang yang bdag ni med bshad pa/_/de phyir dngos med shes par gyis/_/khams gsum las ni 'das gyur par/_/gzungs la rab tu shes par gyis/_/chos rnams thob pa med pas na/_/de ni gzungs zhes 
[\[314b.3\]]brjod pa yin/_/chos rnams thams cad rdo rje bzhin/_/de dag la ni tha dad med/_/de ltar dngos po stong pa ste/_/de yi phyir ni dngos po med/_/chos kun g.yo ba med pa ste/_/de dag la ni bshig pa med/_/de dag la ni skye ba med/_/de yi phyir ni bshig pa med/_/chos rnams 
[\[314b.4\]]thams cad 'jig med na/_/yang dag rjes su mthong ba ste/_/gang dag gi ni byang chub mchog_/de ni cung zad rtogs pa med/_/phra rab chos kyang ma dmigs pas/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub bshad/_/chos rnams thams cad gzung du med/_/de ni byang chub mtshan 
[\[314b.5\]]nyid do/_/gzugs nyid rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/_/gzungs la gzugs ni med par bshad/_/gzhan du gzugs ni ma gtogs par/_/gzungs su dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzugs la ngo bo nyid med kyang /_/ngo bo nyid ces bya ba yin/_/de bzhin ngo bo nyid shes na/_/
[\[314b.6\]]gzungs ni nye bar 'byung ba yin/_/gzungs 'di bri bar bya ba ni/_/ming tsam la yang gnas pa ste/_/gzungs zhes nges par brjod pa yi/_/chos de yod pa ma yin no/_/mig la gzungs su shes par gyis/_/de ni 'khor los bstan pa ste/_/chos rnams kyi ni ma 
[\[314b.7\]]chags pa/_/de la gzungs zhes bshad pa yin/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_yid ni gzungs su shes par gyis/_/de ni 'khor los bstan pa ste/_/chos rnams kyi ni ma chags pa/_/gzungs so zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/'dir ni bshad pa mtha' yas pa/_/chos 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]rnams de ltar shes gyur na/_/ji tsam cung zad dmigs med pa/_/thams cad du ni gzungs zhes bshad/_/dmigs pa mang po mi mthong bar/_/mi gnas par ni 'chad byed de/_/chos rnams thams cad dngos po med/_/mtshan ma med cing 
[\[315a.2\]]mtshan nyid med/_/gzungs 'dod gang zhig 'gro byed pa/_/chos rnams de ltar shes gyur cing /_/chags pa med par rab 'chad na/_/gzungs ni bzhag par gyur pa yin/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[315a.3\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[315a.4\]]'das chos ta la la'i sgron ma zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur to/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rdul dang bral ba zhes bya bar gyur te/_mnyam pa/_nyams dga' ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_dag pa/_'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_mi dang skye bo mang 
[\[315a.5\]]pos gang bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams de ni bai dUr+ya las grub cing gser skud mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bres te/_mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris thams cad na yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur ldan par gyur to/_/sa chen po de 
[\[315a.6\]]yang ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin thams cad med par gyur to/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag kyang dge ba 
[\[315a.7\]]bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu yongs su dag par gyur te/_rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs shing rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs so/_/grong khyer de ni 'byung ba med ces bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]de'i tshe na mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum tshang bar gyur te/_ma tshang bar 'ga' yang 'chi ba'i dus byed pa med do/_/'jam dpal grong khyer 'byung ba med ces bya ba der rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_'jam dpal rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba zhes 
[\[315b.2\]]bya ba de la bu stong yod par gyur to/_/yang 'jam dpal rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba bu stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos ta la la'i sgron ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_mal stan dang /_na 
[\[315b.3\]]ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas par gyur to/_/bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis kyang bkur stir byas par gyur/_bla mar byas par gyur/_bsti stang byas par gyur/_rim gro byas par gyur/_mchod pa byas par gyur to/_/'jam 
[\[315b.4\]]dpal de nas rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba bu stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos ta la la'i sgron ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun zhus par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par 
[\[315b.5\]]gyur te/_thos ma thag tu rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba de bu stong dang lhan cig tu chos shes par gyur to/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa thob par gyur to/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na da ltar ram/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'das kyang rung ste/_rigs 
[\[315b.6\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad cing spobs pa thogs pa med pa 'di 'dod pa des zab pa chags pa med pa 'di 'dra ba'i gnas kyi chos la brtson par bya/_bslab par bya'o/_/chos kyi tshig zab mo 'di lta bu gzung bar bya'o/_/kun chub par 
[\[315b.7\]]bya'o/_/kha don du bya'o/_/chos zab mo'i rnam grangs 'di lta bu kun chub par byas nas gzhan la yang bstan par bya'o/_/chos thams cad la ser sna med par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slar yang spyod par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de 
[\[316a.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_
[\[316a.3\]]chos la bzod pas 'dul ba dag bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[316a.4\]]dpa' byams pa dang /_de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_
[\[316a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de rat+na rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing 
[\[316a.6\]]zhus te gtan la phab pa/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos lags so//_//
